Ma mwena handru badeh Kindrei mwesekei munyak ma kandrah.
Ya munyak kahis le badeh ma lakou aliy bwe, ndras badeh nohowan handru udu bolo lulik. Eme ya boto-on ta Malawi Ndrabun ta Kindrei badeh edek bwele-e gwa.
Eme Kindrei eme, iy anya eh, “Kon kaleu.” Eme badeh kon aleu. Eme iy anyolom badeh ma iy sekesek handru.
Ano iy atehei ndrokowan udu aliy, udu bolo len hawe lulik.
Eme iy tondrohani kon aleu badeh, “Len,” ma tondrohani lulik badeh, “Ben.” Ano kon eben ano kon aleu badeh len ari ah.
Ano Kindrei anya eh, “Ya abo lakou i buku asi jor badeh keme kasahan ki la-uh kon, ari kudu ndrandrahun labai ya ari kudu ndrandrahun labai.” Eme badeh asahan i le buku aliy.
Eme badeh Kindrei mwesekei lakou i buku asi jor badeh apwai gwa badu andri ma apwai gwa badu loken.
Eme iy tondrohaniy lakou i buku asi jor nane badeh “Kandrah.” Ano kon eben ano kon aleu badeh, len la-uh ai.
Ano Kindrei anya ja eh, “Abo gwa badu bahandra kandrah badeh keme lese ma hawe munyak kasahan.” Eme asahan i le buku aliy.
Eme Kindrei badeh tondrohani kon soboren badeh, “Munyak” ma iy tondrohani gwa udu se nane dah, “Ndras.” Eme Kindrei anyolom badeh ma iy sekesek handru.
Ano iy anya eh, “Abo kei ma bwidiu kasahan bwele-e munyak, kato-ou buwa kei ma kato-ou salin ya iri badeh ndrateheyan labai.” Eme badeh asahan i le buku aliy.
Eme saba buwa kei ateh bolo munyak eme loken, badeh Kindrei anyolom ma iy sekesek handru.
Ano kon eben ano kon aleu badeh len taloh ai.
Ano Kindrei anya ja eh, “Lakou ta anya badeh kanya bada kandrah ta apou len ma ben, ma kaleheyani kalem ta an ta len ma hawe ta jaha ma hawe len ta atudun nyamon tinan ta atukum.
Eme oro doh kameh adeu lomada oro kameh anya udu kandrah eme bwele-e munyak.” Eme badeh asahan i le buku aliy.
Ya eme Kindrei badeh mwesekei lakou la-uh tinan ta anya, iy mwesekei an baden eh ta atondrok len ai. Ya bun baden eh ta atondrok ben ai; ma hawe iy mwesekei iri ndrau ale.
Ano iy atehei lakou ta anya udu kandrah badeh ta adeu lomadan eme andri bwele-e munyak ai;
i doh ta atondrok len hawe ben ma ta apou len ma lik. Eme Kindrei anyolom badeh ma iy sekesek handru.
Ano kon eben ano kon aleu len hahuw ai.
Ano Kindrei anya ja eh, “Ya abo lakou mulin kasahan bolo gwa ma reu kaso na sirih.”
Kindrei badeh ndramwesekei iri ni tinan badu ndras ma hawe iri saba lakou mulin ala ado bolo gwa badeh ndrano, ma iri badeh ndrateheyan labai. Eme Kindrei anyolom badeh ma iy sekesek handru.
Eme iy atehei nyosowan i tiri ma iy anya, “Iri mulin badu gwa kadeu nah ma iri kaweleyani ndras, ma iri sirih ale kasahan solo-an.”
Eme kon eben ano kon aleu len limeh ai.
Ano Kindrei anya eh, “Abo iri saba lakou katin haka badeh kasahan bwele-e munyak. Iri katin haka ndriliu ma ndriliu bwe, nadu bwisik ma tinan badeh kasahan. Ya iri badeh ndrateheyan labai.” Eme asahan i le buku aliy.
Ya eme Kindrei badeh mwesekei iri mari doh ano iy anyolom eme badeh iy sekesek handru.
Ano Kindrei anya ja eh, “Ya abo i dah kameh to kamwekes ndramak awas ai; ya teheyan ma kone oro ki le buku to. Ya eme oro kameh katondrok iri ni, katondrok iri sirih ma katondrok iri katin haka ndriliu ma ndriliu bwe, bwisik ma tinan.”
Ano Kindrei badeh mwesekei ndramak awas mwesekei teheyan ma konen i le buku iy, mwesekei mwan ma hawe badih.
Ano badeh iy atehei nyosowan i turu ma tiye i turu i buku doh, “Ah badeh kamwekes nah ya lundriye ah oro kaweleyani kon munyak mari ma kado katondrok. Ma jo atehei ah badeh katondrok iri ni katondrok iri sirih ma hawe iri katin haka ndriliu.
Ya saba buwa kei badeh ah kaimon le ai.
Arile iri katin haka ndriliu hawe iri sirih baden eh, jo atehei nyamon tiri badeh bwidiu ma hawe la-u kei i ta nyumon tiri ai.” Eme badeh asahan le ai.
Eme Kindrei anyolom lakou mari iy mwesekei doh badeh ma iy sekesek handru ta aliy. Ano kon eben ano kon aleu badeh len onoh ai.
Eme ya kon mari ma kandrah badeh ndramwesekei ndrano ai.
Eme na len onoh badeh lahou ta Kindrei ano. Eme na len ndro taloh badeh iy amunyau.
Eme iy nyosowani len ndro taloh ma atehei ere len, tasah na len doh badeh iy mwesekei lakou mari ma iy amunyau.
Eme ya i dah nyala lakou mari badu munyak asahan i buku sah. Na len Laban Kindrei mwesekei kon munyak mari,
badeh sese kei bateh bwe, ari buwa kei badeh bateh bada ndren bwe, tasah iy batiye ur badeh bandruk bwe, ma lau ta apou ndren bwe.
Arile gwa ja badeh udu bolo ndren eme loken badeh asabu bwele-e munyak.
Ano badeh Laban Kindrei rawi ndren eme loken, ano iy amwekes ndramak na aliy; ano badeh iy aluhi kohan handru i no-on ma ndramak dah asahan awas.
Ano badeh Laban Kindrei mwesekei bilin nyaran Iden udu loboho an eme loken. Ano badeh iy tiye ndramak nane, iy mwesekei dah udu aliy ai.
Iy badeh mwesekei saba kei mwasin badeh ateh udu aliy ma edeu salin. Eme udu alih ta bilin badeh kei lu-ei le, kei doh ta edeu koham winiyan bano bwe. Ma kei ale ta edeu tanan ndra-in ma tanan mwasin.
Ma gwa rawa badeh arorou, udu bolo Iden ta edeu gwa i ta bilin; ano udu doh badeh, apou i handra.
Gwa rawa ma bwena eh, badeh aloh gwa Pison, badeh arorou awudi kon munyak aloh nyaran Habilah.
Ya bek nyikilikin aloh gol badeh, udu aliy ma kei ta suluw badeh udu aliy ma hawe bek mwasin mwasin badeh udu aliy ale.
Ya andra gwa rawa ja aloh gwa Gihon; badeh arorou awudi kon munyak aloh Kus.
Ano andra gwa taloh badeh gwa Taigres; iy badeh arorou loboho an eme loken ta kon Aseriya. Ano andra gwa hahuw badeh nyaran gwa Yupretis.
Ano badeh Laban Kindrei atehei ndramak nane udu bilin loboho kon Iden ta iy kinyor ma iy katondrok.
Ano iy tiye i tan, “Ou badeh winiyan aimon buwa kei mari badu bolo bilin;
Arile kei ala ta leheya tanan ndra-in ma ta leheya tanan mwasin badeh ou saimon buwan ndri-i labai. I buku na len ou aniy kameh, ou kameh amak.”
Ano Laban Kindrei lomondra i buku doh, “Ei, bamwenen se bwe, i buku ndramak udu ya iy badeh le ari le. Jo kamwesekei ari seben mwasin ta aseben iy.”
Eme iy andrei ndren eme, ano iy mwesekei iri katin haka mari ma hawe iri sirih. Ano badeh iy tukumwi iri ase ala hawe i ndramak nane dah ta iy katondrohan nyara iri.
Eme ma iy tondrohani nyara iri sirih mari ma hawe iri katin haka mari; arile ari toro badeh mwasin ta asahan borobwar tan bwe.
Ano ja badeh Laban Kindrei badeh mwesekei ndramak dah amadin tuk; eme iy i ndramatinou kahis le badeh iy andrei ndruwi kabeden ari. Ano iy lowosani odan i hamon ja.
Eme iy mwesekei badih dah nane na ndruwi kabede ndramak dah ano sirini iy ili hawen.
Ano ndramak dah anya ja eh, “Kabwe ai; i dah i buku le jo amwenen. Ndruwin andrei badeh badu ndruwik ma odan badeh badu odak amwenen. Ya eme iy badeh badih, tasah iy badeh asahan ta ndramak mwan.”
Eme ya ta katin doh badeh i mwan badeh karuwani taman uru tinen ya iy keme len hawe udun ya uru badeh ka ari buruwen.
Ya uru ma la-uh badeh kolau bwe, arile uru badeh buli uru bama uru bwe.
Eme ya mwak badeh tanan tan badeh ndrala labai udu bolo iri katin haka mari ala Laban Kindrei mwesekei. Eme ya mwak lelen i badih, “Em Kindrei tiye i tam handru ta ou badeh saimon buwa kei badu bolo bilin dah?”
Eme i badih anya eh, “Aru badeh winiyan aimon buwa kei badu bilin.
Arile kei udu alih ta bilin badeh Kindrei tiye anya, aru badeh saimon buwan. Ma aru sanyokar ale, bakameh aru amak.”
Eme badeh mwak anya eh, “Badeh wasai oh; ou winiyan bamak bwe.
Kindrei tiye badeh, tasah iy tanan i buku ou aniy kameh ou kameh asahan i buku iri Kindrei. Ma ou kameh atanam lakou mwasin ma lakou ndra-in.”
Eme i badih dah anyolom kei dah ma buwan badeh mwasin labai ta aimon, eme iy lomondra, “Mwasin handru en i buku jo kasahan badih ta tanan.” Eme iy andrei rayah ma iy aimon ai. Ano badeh iy andrei rayah i mine udun ma udun aimon ale.
Eme uru aniy le badeh, ma uru akohok tanan ma uru atanan ai, uru badeh kolau bwe; eme ma uru asowek la-u kei aloh pik i se ma uru taliye ai.
Eme na beyeh doh le badeh uru anuhun Laban Kindrei edek bolo bilin le badeh, uru aton ala bolo ndrokowa kei udu bolo bilin.
Eme Laban Kindrei aloh iy, “Ou ndraheh?”
Eme iy anya eh, “Jo anuhun ou ado bolo bilin; eme jo inoh ma jo aton tam, tasah jo kolau bwe.”
“Are tiye ta ah anya, ah kolau bwe?” Kindrei ndremenya, “Ah ndrani buwa kei ala jo mene anya ah saimon en?”
Eme i mwan anya eh, “I badih ou atehei iy udu hawek kada-ah, badeh atehei buwa kei eme ma jo iniy.”
Eme badeh Laban Kindrei lelen i badih, “Ou anya amwekes tasah?” Eme iy anya eh, “Mwak wendreyani jo ma jo iniy.”
Ano Laban Kindrei tiye i ta mwak, “Ou le kameh ou akohok isi ta aliy. Ou le ari badu bolo iri katin haka mari, ala adek ma seselek ya jo tandrakan ou le ari. Na len dah ma na len eme kameh, ou kameh seselek na baha ndrinem ma ou kameh kaniyam kameh ndren na len ari i buku ari udu le buku doh.
“Ya jo kameh mwesekei ou hawe i badih kameh ah kameh baseken ah bwe; nadu ah kameh uru kameh andra-i udu le buku doh. Ya nadu i badih kameh tihisiy batum abwesek ma i dah kameh ou kameh aso ma aimon katin.”
Ano iy tiye i ta i badih, “Jo kameh amwekes isi labai i buku nah ere ndrinem ma i dah kameh jo edeu sisi-in i buku ou anya adeu nah. Ya ta i doh kameh ou kameh anya udum sala len, arile i mwan le badeh atondrok ou.”
Eme iy tiye i ta i mwan, “Ou anuhun boho udum ma ou aniy buwa kei mene jo tiye anya ou saimon. Ya eme ta lakou ou ndramwesekei, i dah kameh munyak andra-i. Ya i dah kameh len ou ado kameh ou amwekes lahou boto-on boto-on ta amwekes munyak ta atah nam nyamon.
Ya i dah kameh iri bwidiu bobodon kameh ateh ma i dah kameh ou kameh aimon buwa kei badu lokei.
Ma i dah kameh ou amwekes lahou boto-on ma sa-ar asahan ta amwekes nyamon. Winiya len ou le barala hamon barala munyak ja mene amwekes ou na aliy, ma ou kameh a munyak leleyah.”
Adam tondrohani nyara udun badeh Ewa, tasah iy badeh tine iri lau mari.
Eme Laban Kindrei mwesekei kolau i turu na ku-i katin haka ma iy tani i turu.
Ano Kindrei tiye, “Abo iri ndramak badeh ndrasahan ndra buku to ai, ndratanan saba lakou mwasin ma saba lakou ndra-in. Eme ya iy badeh sakohok buwa kei ala ta amwekes kohan udu le buku doh ma iy badeh saimon. Bakameh iy kameh kohan kudu le buku doh.”
Eme ma Laban Kindrei suni iy iu i len ta bilin Iden ma mwesekei iy apou munyak ala mene bwidi iy mene asahan na aliy.
Eme ya loboho an eme loken manan ta bilin badeh iy atehei iri angelo, lau ta ndrokei; ma samen badeh anya ili eme udu mada san ta i bolo bilin Iden, badeh ta nohowa lau same mirihik ta kei ta edeu kohan mwasin.
Ano badeh Adam amadin hawe udun, eme ma ndrine udun i tinan.
Eme ma iy atehei nah mwan; ano iy tiye, “Laban aseben jo ma nah mwan ndrasahan.” Eme iy tondrohani nyaran Ken. Ano badeh iy atehei mwan ari ja nyaran Abol. Eme badeh Abol badeh asahan ndramak ta atondrok iri katin haka, ma hawe Ken badeh asahan ndramak ta bilin.
Ano oro ado sese badeh, Ken eme badeh andrei nyamon rayah badu bilin eme iy asun i nyara salom i ta Laban.
Ano Abol eme andrei nadu sipsip ari kasen mwasin handru, ano badeh iy idiy imek. Eme iy edeu i nyara salom mwasin. Eme ya Laban Kindrei badeh sekesek ma aseken Abol ma salom tan.
Arile ta Ken badeh iy baseken handru bwe. Eme badeh Ken i bolosen handru ma ndrinen isi handru en.
Ano badeh Kindrei tiye i ta Ken, “Ou a bolosen ta sasah? Badam asaram ta sasah?
I buku none ou amwekes lakou mwasin, i dah nane ou sekesek; arile ou ndramwesekei kandriyen ndra-in, eme karei ma lomondra ndra-in abe-en ou ma abwe-ek ou udu konam. Eme ou abadok doh?”
Ano badeh Ken tiye sahou i ta nadu tinen Abol, “Talu ka-au kala len.” Eme uru au ame len badeh, Ken eme tubuni iy, eme ma iy idi nadu tinen imek.
Ano Laban eme ndremenya Ken, “Nadu tinem ndraheh?” Eme iy anya, “Jo tanan bwe oh, jo atondrok iy ai?”
Ano Laban tiye, “I buku sah ou amwekes budon ndra-in dah? Ndraye nadu tinem asah eden udu bolo ndren kede-eh; eden eme tek ta ou kameh akohok isi saluwen.
Eme ya i dah kameh munyak kameh andra-i na bales tasah na ou. Munyak badeh ndranyuwi ndraye nadu tinem i buku none ari lakou bohon asak le, na len ou adai iy.
Ya i buku none ou anya atah baso kameh, munyak kameh winiyan bamwekes bateh bwe, ma ou kameh ta tekedek le.”
Eme Ken tiye i ta Laban i buku doh, “Ou tiye sahou badeh maha-an labai eme tek.
Ou kameh tikahei jo iu ta munyak ma ta tondrok ai, ma jo kameh edek le ai, ya are ndrondron jo kameh idi le jo ai?”
Arile Laban anya eh, “Bwe, i buku none are idi ou, i dah kameh lau ndro taloh amak i saluwem.” Eme Laban atehei kalem i ta Ken ta tiye tanan i tare ndrondron iy badeh sadai iy.
Eme Ken iu, iu ta mada Laban ili udu munyak aloh, “Lolo-an Le,” udu loboho an eme loken ta bilin Iden.
Ano badeh Ken uru udun atehei nadu uru eme tondrohani nyaran Inok. Ano badeh Ken tahi kon tinan ari ma tondrohani nyaran i nyara nadun.
Eme Inok atehei nadun ari tondrohani nyaran Irat, ya iy badeh tama Mahuja-el. Eme Mahuja-el atehei nadun mwan ari nyaran Matusa-el ya iy badeh tama Lemek.
Lemek badeh sudi badih la-uh, Adah hawe Silah.
Eme Adah badeh edeu Jabel eme iy badeh tubu iri lau ta amadin asiu balei, ma iri doh badeh lahou tiri ta atondrok iri katin haka.
Ya nadu tinen Jubel badeh tubu iri lau ta oloh bala-eu ma ta adi ndran.
Silah badeh edeu Tubal Ken; iy badeh tubu iri lau ta amwekes lakou ta lahou i buku samen na hayen nyikilikin. Ya nadu tinen badeh nyaran Namah.
Ano Lemek tiye i ta udun uru, “Adah ah Silah ah kanuhun jo! Jo badeh ndradai loweu ari ndramak, tasah iy anya ka-um jo.
I buku none lau ndro taloh amak ta saluwe Ken imek, badeh kameh ndro tonoh ndro taloh (77) kameh amak i buku none iri kadai jo.”
Ano Adam uru udun atehei nadu uru mwan ari ja. Eme udun tiye, “Kindrei badeh atehei nah mwan ari i saluwe Abol ala Ken mene idi iy.” Eme iy tondrohani nyaran badeh Set.
Eme Set atehei nadun mwan ari tondrohani nyaran Inos. Eme kabatana doh badeh iri lau baraloh nyara Laban barala ta atudun ai.
Ya i dah sare Adam oro ai. Len Kindrei mwesekei lau awas badeh, iy mwesekei konen i le buku iy.
(Iy mwesekei uru ari mwan ma badih ano iy atehei nyosowan i turu ma tondrohani uru “Lau”).
Len Adam jaha tan asahan rinek tonoh (130) badeh nadun ari asahan ya konen i le buku iy, eme iy tondrohani nyaran Set.
Ano hamon ta aliy badeh Adam udu winiya jaha ndru lunek (800), ma iy badeh nadun rayah ale udu aliy.
Ano jaha tan i ndro rawa tonoh (930) badeh ma iy imek.
Len Set jaha tan asahan rinek limeh (105), badeh nadun ari asahan nyaran Inos.
Eme iy udu winiya jaha ndru lunek ndro taloh (807) ma iy badeh nadun rayah ale udu aliy.
Ano jaha tan asahan ndro rawa ronoh la-uh (912) badeh iy imek.
Len Inos jaha tan asahan ndro ronoh (90), badeh iy atehei nadun ari nyaran Kenan,
eme iy badeh udu winiya jaha ndru lunek ronoh limeh (815). Iy badeh nadun rayah udu aliy ale.
Ano jaha tan asahan ndro rawa limeh (905) badeh ma iy imek.
Ano len Kenan jaha tan asahan ndro tonoh (70) badeh iy atehei nadun ari nyaran Mahalalel,
ano iy udu winiya jaha ma ndru lunek hanoh (840) ma iy nadun rayah ale udu aliy.
Ano jaha tan asahan ndro rawa ronoh (910) badeh iy imek.
Ano len Mahalalel jaha tan asahan ndro hanoh limeh (65) badeh iy atehei nadun mwan ari nyaran Jaret.
Ano iy udu badeh winiya jaha ndru lunek tonoh (830). Ma iy badeh nadun rayah udu aliy ale.
Ano na jaha ndru lunek ndro tonoh limeh (895) badeh iy imek.
Ano na len Jaret jaha tan asahan rinek ndro hanoh la-uh (162) badeh iy atehei nadun mwan ari nyaran Inok.
Ano iy udu winiya jaha ma ndru lunek (800). Ma iy ale nadun rayah ale udu aliy.
Ano na jaha ndro rawa ndro hanoh la-uh (962), badeh ma iy imek.
Ano len Inok jaha tan asahan ndro hanoh limeh (65) badeh, iy atehei nadun mwan ari nyaran Matusala.
Ano hamon ta aliy badeh Inok badeh in hamon ta sahou ta Kindrei winiya jaha tonek (300), ma nadun rayah ja asahan.
Iy udu badeh winiya jaha ma tonek ndro hanoh limeh (365).
Iy anuhun sahou ta Kindrei ma iy in hamon ta Kindrei handru; ano iy amai leleyah, Kindrei kuhi iy iu.
Ano len Matusala jaha tan asahan rinek ndru lunoh ndro taloh (187) badeh iy atehei nadun ari mwan badeh nyaran Lemek.
Ano iy udu winiya jaha ndru tuluwi ndru lunoh la-uh (782) ma iy nadun rayah badeh udu aliy ale.
Ano jaha tan asahan ndro rawa ndro hanoh ndro ari (969) badeh ma iy imek.
Ano len Lemek jaha tan asahan rinek ndru lunoh la-uh (182) badeh iy atehei nadun mwan ari nyaran Nowa.
Eme iy tiye i buku doh, “Tasah ta munyak mene ndrandra-i, i dah kameh i nah dah kameh aseben taha ta lahou boto-on taha amwekes.” Eme iy tondrohani nyaran badeh Nowa.
Eme Lemek badeh udu le winiya jaha lemenek ndro ronoh limeh (595) ma nadun rayah udu aliy ale.
Ano jaha tan asahan ndro tonek ndro tonoh ndro taloh (777) badeh ma, iy imek.
Ano hamon Nowa jaha tan asahan lemenek (500), badeh iy atehei nadun mwan oro ma taloh, Sem eh, Ham eh, ma hawe Jepet.
Na len iri lau weleyani kon munyak ma badih asahan ame len,
eme iri lau rayah batun badu kandrah, badeh anyolom iri badih badeh konen konen, eme iri asoh iri ala seken tiri udu tiri.
Ano Laban Kindrei anya eh, “Jo baseken kohak handru bado tiri luluwen bwe, iri ndramak leleyah labai. Na len dah ma len hamon eme kameh koha iri bado luwen bwe, winiya basakalawi jaha rinek lunoh bwe.”
Na len doh badeh ma na len eme kameh iri lau tinan tinan le, ado bwele-e munyak. Iri badeh lundriye badih awas ma lau badu kandrah. Iri badeh lau ndra handru le ma lau nyara iri tinan le, na len mene ndra-au.
Eme ya len Kindrei anyolom iri lau mari are bolo munyak badeh kandriyen tiri badeh ndrandra-i labai, ma budon tiri badeh ndra karei ma lomondra ndra-in na len mari.
Eme iy tikisiy, tasah iy mene mwesekei iri ma atehei iri ado bwele-e munyak. Eme ma batun isi handru.
Eme ma iy anya eh, “Jo tikisiy iri lau jo mwesekei ma hawe iri katin haka hawe sirih, arile jo kameh idi iri mari kameh amak ai.”
Arile Kindrei ja badeh sekesek handru labai ta Nowa.
Ya i dah badeh nyala Nowa ai. Nowa badeh nadun mwan badeh taloh; Sem eh, Ham eh, hawe Jepet. Nowa bamwekes se lakou bandra-i bwe ai, na len iy udu loken. Iy badeh anuhun sahou ma lakou mari mwasin ta Kindrei badeh iy in hamon ta aliy le ai.
<range>
Arile iri lau mari badeh amwekes lakou leleyah, amwekes karei ma lomondra ndra-in tinan labai udu mada Kindrei.
Kindrei anyolom eme munyak badeh, iy anyolom karei ma lomondra ndra-in tiri lau ndrala labai ai, tasah lau badeh amwekes lakou leleyah udu le buku doh.
Eme Kindrei tiye i ta Nowa, “Jo badeh ndratehei budon ta edeu sendrehendreh i tiri lau mari. Jo kameh idi iri ma munyak amak, tasah munyak badeh ndradah ta lomondra ndra-in tiri.
Ou badeh awuri ra-ei ndron na kei ki tam; ou mwesekei rum kudu aliy ano ou alesei ka-u ndron manan ma bolon.
Ou badeh tomondrohei nyaha ndron badeh kasahan rinek tonoh taloh (133) mita, ya tinan ta ndron badeh kasahan lunoh la-uh (22) mita ano tinan ta i loken badeh kasahan ronoh taloh (13) mita.
Ano ou mwesekei ndruwi bolobon ma ka-un i loboho loke reu kudu aliy, ki winiya hanoh hahuw sentimita ma ka-un ale ki buku aliy. Ya ou mwesekei sarasar ki taloh ma ou atehei mada san kudu kabede ndron.
Jo kameh bwidi kon munyak kameh atuh ma lakou mari mulin badeh kameh amak.
Arile jo kameh amwekes sahou randra le hawem. Ano ou a ndron hawe udum, hawe nadum oro ma udu oro.
Ou andrei iri lakou mulin, ari mwan ari badih badeh kawek ndron ta iri badeh samak.
<range>
Ou kuhi saba nyamon ki nam ma tiri ale badeh kewek.”
Eme Nowa badeh anuhun sahou ya iy mwekesei i le buku aliy.
Eme Laban Kindrei tiye i ta Nowa, eme iy anya eh, “Ado mari ka ndron; jo badeh anyolom ou le badeh ado bolo munyak dah, ou amwekes kandriyen mwasin.
Ou kuhi ndro taloh katin haka mwasin ta asun ta salom, ari mwan hawe ari badih, ma ou kuhi ari ari katin haka ndra-in, mwan ma badih ndra-in ta salom.
Ou ale kuhi ndro taloh sirih, ari mwan ari badih. Ou an hamon ta bohok, tasah oro sirih ma katin haka randrah doh randrah doh kameh ado ma kameh adeu nah ja ado bwele-e munyak.
Ya len ndro taloh ano kameh jo kameh edeu ur undruk winiya len ma ben hanoh (40) ta adi iri mulin mari jo mene mwesekei.”
Eme Nowa badeh mwesekei lakou mari Kindrei tiye.
Nowa badeh jaha tan asahan ndro hawa (600) eh, badeh kon munyak atuh.
Eme ya iy hawe udun, ma nadun oro hawe udu oro an ndron, tasah kon kameh atuh ai,
ma hawe ari mwan ari badih katin haka ma iri sirih ndra-in ma mwasin badeh an ndron hawe Nowa, i le buku Kindrei ndratiye.
<range>
Ano len ndro taloh ano badeh kon atuh.
Eme len Nowa jaha tan asahan ndro hawa (600), eme, len ronoh ndro taloh na bun la-uh; badeh gwa udu baha munyak eme loken, ma kandrah asak.
Ano badeh ur eme andri winiya len ma ben hanoh.
Ya eme na len doh badeh Nowa hawe udun ma nadu uru mwan ma taloh hawe udu nadun oro badeh a ndron ai,
ma hawe iri katin haka ndriliu ma ndriliu bwe, tinan ma bwisik ma saba sirih ale, ya iri ndrateheyan labai.
Ari mwan ari badih katin haka mulin badeh a ndron hawe Nowa, i buku none Kindrei ndratiye. Ano Nowa oro a bolon badeh, Kindrei le sulu-i kou ili.
<range>
Eme ur undruk udu bolo len hanoh nane eme ma ndron badeh telebek.
Gwa eme loken labai, eme badeh ma ndron ateheh bwele-e gwa.
Eme uluw eme loken labai eme badeh mandrei lawe-en sakalawi mandrei mari badeh atuh.
Eme gwa eme loken, eme loken badeh nyahan ta aliy asahan taloh ranah udu ta mandrei nane iu i loken.
Eme iri mulin mari badu munyak badeh amak, iri sirih eneh, iri katin haka eneh ma ndramak awas badeh amak ai.
Iri lakou mari mulin ado munyak badeh amak le ai.
Laban Kindrei badeh idi iri mulin mari ado munyak badeh amak ma lau awas ma katin haka ma sirih badeh amak. Iri mulin le ado badeh, Nowa le hawe iri mulin rayah nane a ndron hawen.
Gwa badeh bala se andri bwe winiya len rinek lomonoh (150).
Kindrei badeh balen bamani Nowa ma hawe iri katin haka nane an hawen an ndron bwe; eme iy bwidi jor atohou ma amwekes gwa i lok i andri.
Eme gwa badu baha munyak badeh badek bwe ma mada san ta gwa badu kandrah ili. Ya ur amondrei.
Eme udu bolo len rinek lomonoh (150) badeh gwa i lok ai.
Eme na len ronoh ndro taloh (17) udu bolo bun ndro taloh badeh mwe-e ndron amar ta mandrei Ararat.
Gwa badeh i lok kahis le eme na len ari asahan mwena ta bun ronoh badeh no-o mandrei asahan.
Ano len hanoh ano badeh Nowa sihi kadam asak.
Eme iy suni sirih ari ta aimon lakou abola nyara Raben badeh iu ili. Eme iy bame hamon bwe, iy atah atah le winiya gwa amar.
Ano ja badeh iy suni ban ili ta anyolom gwa ndra andri de bwe.
Arile gwa bala se andri bwe eme ban dah basilahei ndrahun ta manyah bwe, eme iy atah eme hamon eme ndron. Eme Nowa atehei minen i manan andrei iy eme bolon.
Ano Nowa abe-en ben ndro taloh ja ano badeh iy suni ban ili ja.
Eme ban nane eme hamon eme hawen na beyeh ma la-u kei aloh olip badeh udu bohon eme, ya eme Nowa ndratanan ai, gwa ndra andri ai.
Ano iy bini-i ben ndro taloh iu ano iy suni ban ili ja; eme ban dah ili ma ili ya iy bame hamon bwe.
Ano na len Nowa jaha tan asahan ndro hanek ari (601), na len ma mwena asahan ta bun ari badeh gwa amar. Eme Nowa abe-ei bwele-e ndron eme iy anyolom ili eme ma iy anyolom munyak anya kabosar ai.
Eme na len lunoh ndro taloh (27) badeh munyak abosar mara-ei.
Eme Kindrei tiye i ta Nowa, “Ou ma udum ma hawe nadum oro ma udu oro kame len ta ndron.
<range>
Ou kuhi iri sirih ma iri katin haka kame len hawem, ma iri kadeu nah ma kaseker kaweleyani kon munyak mari.”
Ya eme Nowa eme len ta ndron hawe udun, ma hawe nadun oro ma hawe udu nadun oro,
ma hawe iri katin haka ma iri sirih arakou le adek ame len ta ndron, randrah doh randrah doh badeh adek ase.
Ano Nowa eme tukumwi bek; ano iy andrei ari ari badu tiri katin haka ma hawe iri sirih ari ari mwasin badeh iy asun iri ma buruwen in bada bek dah i nyara salom i ta Laban.
Eme mahu bubure salom dah mwesekei Laban sekesek handru eme ma iy tiye udu ndrinen i buku doh, “Jo kameh winiya badeu maha bame ta munyak ja bwe ai, tasah tiri lau amwekes lakou; jo tanan na len iy ma loweu le badeh budon tan ma ndra-in le. Eme ya jo kameh winiyan badai iri lau mari ja bwe ai, i buku jo mene amwekes dah ja bwe ai.”
“I dah mada an ta atah basoh Ma i dah kameh mada an ta a-eh Ma abwe-eh udu aliy, I buku munyak udu le. Ya i dah kameh kon anyala Ma kon i nyarahan, Kon an ma hawe kon ur Udu bolo len ma ben.”
Eme Kindrei atehei nyosowan i bwele-e Nowa hawe nadun oro ano ma iy tiye, “Ado kadeu nah ma lundriye ado oro kaweleyani kon munyak mari.
Ya i dah kameh iri katin haka, sirih ma hawe iri ni kameh anoh adoh, ma iri kameh are baha tondrok tado.
Eme ado badeh kaimon iri hawe bara la-u kei; jo atehei mari doh ta nyumon tado.
Arile lakou ari le doh badeh ado saimon, lakou mulin ma ndra; jo anya ndri-i, ndra ki-iu op, tasah lakou doh badeh kohan ma ndrayen udu aliy.
I buku none are lau idi iri lau awas amak, i dah kameh iy kameh akohok sisi-in ta aliy. Ma jo kameh edeu isi i tare katin haka i buku none iy aimon lau amak.
Tasah ndramak badeh mwesekei iy konen i le buku Kindrei, eme ya i buku none are lau idi ari ndramak imek, badeh iy ndramak nane doh, badeh lowan oro kadai iy kimek.
“Ado badeh kamwekes nah kasola eme lundriye ado oro kado ma kaweleyani bolo munyak mari.”
Ano Kindrei tiye i ta Nowa hawe nadun oro,
“Na dah jo kameh amwekes sahou randra le hawem ma hawe tubum oro,
ma hawe iri mulin mari ala ado ndron mene ame len hawem.
Na sahou dah jo amwekes sahou randra le hawem, ya jo tandrakan jo kameh winiyan badai lakou mulin mari bwe ai, na len kon atuh bwe ai; ma badai munyak ma winiyan kon winiyan batuh ja badeh bwe ai.
Ya na kalem dah udu le ta sahou randra le, jo badeh amwekes hawem ma hawe iri mulin mari hamon asahan.
Jo kameh edeu betekenyabwiu udu bolo asi kandrah. I doh badeh kalem ta sahou randra le tek i hawem ma hawe iri mulin mari badu munyak.
Ya i buku none jo tubulu-i kandrah na asi kandrah ma betekenyabwiu asahan,
badeh kameh jo abudon tandrakan tek mene ewek tam, ma i tiri katin haka mulin mari ta kon winiyan batuh ta adai iri ja bwe ai.
Ya buku none betekenyabwiu asahan bolo asi kandrah ya i buku jo anyolom kameh, jo kameh lomondrani sahou randra le tek hawe iri mulin mari badu munyak.
Eme i dah kalem tek jo edeu udu ndrokowak hawe iri mulin mari.” Nowa Hawe Lundriyen Oro
Eme ya nadu Nowa oro ame len ta ndron badeh, kadok badeh nyaran Sem, bwaneh badeh nyaran Ham ya silih Jepet. (Ham badeh tama Kenan).
Nadu Nowa oro ma taloh doh baden adeh tubu iri lau mari badu munyak.
Nowa badeh ndramak ta amwekes bilin ma hawe iy ndramak ta atah wa-in ma mwena.
Ano hamon ta iy a-un wa-in ano badeh ma iy ibo lolo-ou ma iy amadin kolau bwe, udu bolo asiu balei.
Eme tama Kenan Ham badeh eme anyolom taman kolau bwe eme ma iy suburuk i ta nadu tinen uru.
Ano Sem uru Jepet ame andrei kolau, ano uru talahani udu kona uru. Eme uru adek na kona uru ala badeh tubulu-i tama uru. Ya mada uru badeh batou tama uru bwe.
Ano boto-on ta wa-in ano badeh Nowa amak iy i tanan ai nadun bwaneh badeh amwekes lakou nane doh i tan,
eme iy anya, “Jo tandrakan Kenan kameh i bonyo-ou ta nadu tinen uru.
Katudun Laban Kindrei ta Sem! Kenan kameh i bonyo-ou ta Sem.
Ya Kindrei badeh mwesekei kane Jepet ki sola! Ya lundriyen badeh kamanyah kado hawe lau ta Sem oro. Ya Kenan badeh ki bonyo-ou ta Jepet.”
Ano hamon ta kon atuh badeh Nowa udu winiya jaha tuluwi lemenek (350).
Ano jaha tan asahan ndro rawa lemenek (950) badeh ma iy imek.
I dah sare nadu Nowa oro; oro badeh Sem eh, Ham eh ma hawe Jepet. Hamon ta kon atuh badeh ano badeh oro nah ma taloh nadu oro udu aliy.
Ya nadu Jepet oro badeh Goma, Megok, Madai, Jaban, Tubal, Misek ma hawe Tiras ya eme i dah badeh nyara tubu oro.
Nadu Goma oro badeh iri lau ala ado kon Askanas, iri ado kon Ripat ma ado kon Togama.
Ya nadu Jaban oro badeh ado kon Elisah, ado kon Spa-in, ado kon Saipres ma kon Rodes.
Oro badeh tubu iri lau badu busu. Ya i dah baden eh tubu Jepet oro. Oro badeh manyah ado boho kamen ra-em ra-em ado kon rakon rakon. Ya boho kamen ra-em ra-em asehek bohon randrah labai udu kon nane doh.
Nadu Ham badeh Kus, Ijip, Libiya, ma hawe Kenan ya oro doh badeh tubu oro nyara oro i dah.
Tubu iri Kus doh badeh badu kon Seba, badu kon Habilah, badu kon Sabtah, badu kon Rama ma kon Sabteka. Tubu Rama badeh lau badu kon Seba hawe kon Dedan.
Nadu Kus ari badeh nyaran Nimrot, iy badeh ma mwena asahan ndramak ta inyek kon
ma na seben ta Kindrei badeh iy badeh asahan ndramak ta bwisir ta katin haka, eme ya iri lau anya, “Kindrei badeh kabwidi ou kasahan ndramak ta bwisir ta katin haka ki le buku Nimrot!”
Ma mwena handru badeh iy badeh atondrok Babilon ma hawe kon Irek, kon Akat ya oro kon ma taloh doh badeh udu bolo kon tinan Babilon.
Udu munyak doh badeh iy iu ili Aseriya ma tahi kon tinan aloh Ninibeh, kon Rehobot Ir, kon Kalah,
ma Resen badeh udu ndrokowa Ninibeh ma ndrokowa kon tinan aloh Kalah.
Ya tubu Ijip badeh lau badu kon Lidiya, badu kon Anam, badu kon Lehap, badu kon Naptuh,
badu kon Patrus, badu kon Kasluh ma kon Krit, ya na oro doh le badeh iri Pilistin asahan.
Nadu Kenan oro badeh kadok badeh Sidon ano badeh Het, ya i dah nyara tubu oro ai.
Kenan badeh tubu iri badu Jebusa, tubu iri Amora, tubu iri badu Gigasa,
tubu iri badu Hiba, tubu iri badu Aka, tubu iri badu Sina,
tubu iri badu Abada, tubu iri badu Samara ma hawe tubu iri badu Hamata. Ya oro boho kamen mari ta Kenan badeh aseker.
Ya kobek ta Kenan badeh ili taku kum ano ili isos Gerar mirihik ta kon Gasa. Ano ili loboho lan ili isos Sodom, Gomorah, isos Admah ma hawe isos Sebo-im mirihik ta Lasa.
I doh tubu Ham oro ya oro badeh manyah boho kamen ra-em ra-em ado munyak toro ma boho kamen toro badeh asehek boho kon toro randrah labai.
Ya Sem bwele-en ta Jepet badeh tubu iri Hiburu mari.
Ya nadu Sem oro badeh Ilam eh, Asur eh, Apaset eh, Lut eh, ma hawe Aram. Ya tubu oro lau ala nyara oro doh.
Badeh lau ala are kon Us, are Hul, are Geta, are Mesek, badeh tubu Aram oro.
Apaset badeh tama Silah ma Silah ja badeh tama Eba.
Eba badeh nadun badeh la-uh; ari badeh nyaran Pelek, tasah na len doh badeh lau badu munyak apou iri; ya iy ari ja badeh nyaran Joktan.
Ya iri lau badu kon Almodat, badu Selep, badu Hasamabet, badu Jerah,
badu Hadoram, badu Usal, badu Diklah,
badu Obal, badu Abima-el, badu Siba,
badu Opir, badu Habilah, ma hawe Jobap. Oro mari doh badeh nadu Joktan le.
Ya munyak oro are aliy badeh tinan tan badeh udu kon Mesa ili isos Separ udu loboho bolo mandrei loboho an eme loken.
Ya i dah badeh tubu Sem oro ya oro manyah boho kamen ra-em ra-em ado loboho munyak toro, ya oro badeh boho kon toro bala le randra bwe. Iy ari asehek tan labai iy ari asehek tan labai.
Iri lau mari doh badeh lundriye Nowa, kon ari i buku ari asahan ta boho kamen ra-em ra-em. Kon atuh ya hamon ta aliy kon munyak badeh asahan na lundriye Nowa oro.
Ma mwena handru badeh lau badu munyak badeh asehek boho kon randra le.
Eme iri badeh adek ala ame loboho an eme loken, eme iri ame Babilon ma ado aliy ado ai.
Ano badeh iri lelen iri ari ari, “Ado kame! Ya to kapon ndren ma kamwekes kabadok.” Eme iri asun ndren i bek ano iri amwekes alis i ta bek ta kasabata-an ki se.
eme iri anya, “Taha kamwekes asiu bokok kudu bolo kon dah ki loken bolo asi kandrah, eme ma to kasore nyara to ma to badeh saseker sala bolo munyak mari.”
Eme badeh Laban eme andri bolo kon nane doh ma anyolom asiu nane iri atah ma atudun dah.
Ano ma iy anya, “Iri lau dah badeh iri rabuk le, ma iri asehek sahou randra le; I dah ma mwena ai, ta iri amwekes lakou dah. Mirihik kameh iri amwekes lakou leleyah na seken tiri ai.
To ka-au ka andri, katubuni boho kon tiri, eme ya iri sanuhun sahou tiri ari ari.”
Eme badeh Laban sekerei iri badeh winiya munyak mari, ma iri ruwani asiu bokok ma iri batah bwe ai.
Kon tinan nane doh nyaran Babilon, tasah Kindrei badeh tubuni boho kon tiri lau mari ma kabatana doh badeh iri lau aseker ma weleyani kon munyak mari.
Ya i dah badeh lundriye Sem oro. Hamon ta kon atuh ya jaha la-uh ano badeh Sem badeh jaha tan asahan rawa (100), eme badeh nadun ari asahan nyaran Apaset.
Hamon ta aliy badeh iy udu winiya jaha lemenek (500) ma hawe nadun rayah ale udu aliy.
Ya na len Apaset jaha tan asahan tonoh limeh (35) eme nadun ari asahan nyaran Silah.
Hamon ta aliy badeh iy udu winiya jaha hanek taloh (403) ma iy atehei nadun rayah udu aliy.
Eme Silah jaha tan asahan tonoh (30) badeh eme iy atehei nadun ari nyaran Eba.
Hamon ta aliy iy udu winiya jaha hanek taloh (403) ma atehei nadun rayah ale.
Ano len Eba jaha tan asahan tonoh hahuw (34) badeh iy atehei nadun ari nyaran Pelek.
Ano hamon ta aliy badeh iy udu winiya jaha hanek tonoh (430) ma atehei nadun rayah ale udu aliy.
Ano len Pelek jaha tan asahan tonoh (30) badeh iy atehei nadun ari nyaran Reu.
Ano hamon ta aliy badeh iy udu winiya jaha lunek ndro ari (209) ma iy atehei nadun rayah ale udu aliy.
Ano len Reu jaha tan asahan tonoh la-uh (32) badeh iy atehei nadun ari nyaran Serak.
Eme hamon ta aliy badeh iy udu winiya jaha lunek ndro taloh (207) ma iy atehei nadun rayah ale udu aliy.
Ano na len Serak jaha tan asahan tonoh (30) badeh iy atehei nadun ari nyaran Nahor.
Ano hamon ta aliy badeh iy udu winiya jaha lunek (200) ma iy tuwi nadun rayah udu aliy ale.
Ano na len Nahor jaha tan asahan lunoh ndro ari (29) badeh iy atehei nadun ari nyaran Tera.
Ano hamon ta aliy badeh iy udu winiya jaha rinek ronoh ndro ari (119) ma tuwi nadun rayah ale udu aliy.
Ano hamon ta Tera jaha tan asahan ndro tonoh (70) badeh iy atehei Abram atehei Nahor ma hawe Haran.
I dah lundriye Tera oro, iy ala tama Abram tama Nahor hawe Haran. Haran badeh tama Lot.
Eme Haran badeh imek udu kon tan amwenen udu Ur udu Babilon. Ya taman badeh bamak bwe iy udu le.
Ano Abram sudi Sarai i tan ma Nahor sudi nadu Haran badih nyaran Milkah. Ya Haran badeh tama Iska.
Sarai badeh bato-ou nah bwe, iy badeh kis.
Tera kuhi nadun Abram hawe udun Sarai ma hawe nadu tubun Lot, iu ndrine Haran. Eme ma oro au ame len ta kon tinan Ur udu bolo Babilon ma au ala munyak Kenan. Eme oro ala asos Haran ma ado aliy ai.
Eme Tera imek udu aliy ya jaha tan badeh lunek limeh (205).
Ano Laban tiye i ta Abram, “Ou au ta munyak tam ma ou au ta lowam oro hawe asiu ta tamam ya ou au ai, ala kon munyak jo kameh leheya tam.
Jo kameh edeu lundriyem oro asahan solo-an ma i dah kameh oro asahan kon rakon buruwen. Ya i dah kameh, jo nyosowani ou ma nyaram kameh lau mari i tanan ma nyosowan kameh i tiri lau.
Jo kameh nyosowani are aseken ou. Arile jo kameh edeu isi i tare lau aten ou. Na ou le kameh jo kameh edeu nyosowan i lau kon rakon rakon buruwen.”
Eme na len Abram jaha tan asahan ndro tonoh limeh (75) iy edek udu Haran eme len i buku none Laban ndratiye tan, ma Lot i hawen ale.
Eme Abram andrei udun Sarai hawe Lot, nadu uru nadu tinen Haran, ma hawe lakou tan mari hawe iri lohowan tan. Iri mene ado Haran au ala munyak Kenan. Len oro asahan Kenan badeh
Abram edek ili eme bolo munyak doh, eme iy asahan ta kei ndrabun badu Moreh, kon ndrabun udu Sekem (na len doh badeh iri Kenan are aliy).
Eme Laban asahan hawe Abram ma iy tiye i tan i buku doh, “I dah kon munyak kameh jo edeu i ta lundriyem oro ai.” Ano Abram tukumwi bek i ta Laban mene asahan hawen.
Ano badeh iy edek ili loboho kum kon mandrei solo-an udu loboho lan eme loken kon tinan nyaran Betel, ano iy tahi asiu balei udu loboho an i andri ndrokowa Betel hawe Ai, udu loboho an eme loken. Ano iy tutuni bek ma iy aloh nyara Laban.
Ano iy edek rakon i rakon loboho kum loboho kon Kenan.
Eme ya Kenan badeh nyamon bwe, eme iri akohok andra-i labai, eme badeh Abram iu i andri manyah sese udu loboho kum ta Ijip.
Na len iy anya ki bilisiu ta kobek ta Ijip, iy tiye i ta udun, “Ou badeh ou badih konen labai.
I buku none iri Ijip anyolom ou kameh iri anya ou kede-eh uduk ma i dah kameh iri kameh adai jo ya ou kameh ado.
Ou kameh tiye tiri, ou badeh nadu tine, tasah na ou kameh iri kameh badai jo bwe, ma iri kameh tondrokei jo kameh udu mwasin.”
Eme iy sakalawi kobek i bilisiu badeh iri Ijip anyolom udun badeh konen labai,
eme iri lau ta lahou badu bolo asiu ta kabin anyolom iy badeh konen labai, eme iri ala asehek i ta kabin, eme ma iri andrei iy ili loboho ndrahu kabin.
Na iy le badeh kabin tondrokei Abram udu mwasin, nyohonei iy iri katin haka aloh sipsip, nyohonei iy katin haka aloh me, nyohonei iy katin haka aloh bulumakau, nyohonei iy katin haka aloh donki hawe katin haka aloh kamel ma hawe iri bonyo-ou tan ale.
Laban eme atehei sik i tan ma hawe iri lau are bahan, tasah iy mene andrei Sarai.
Eme kabin tiye Abram eme ya iy lelen iy, “Ou amwekes sasah eme tek dah?
I buku sah ou anya i dah nadu tinem, eme ya jo kandrei iy keme uduk. Udum doh, ou andrei iy ma ah ka-au!”
Eme kabin tiye iri lau tan tiyani iy eme len ta kon munyak doh hawe udun ma iri lakou tan mari.
Lot i hawe Abram uru udun ma hawe lakou ta Abram mari, eme oro au ala loboho rai ta Ijip ano oro ala loboho kum ta Kenan.
Abram badeh tan lakou solo-an handru en, iri katin haka i buku none iri sipsip, me hawe bulumakau, bek nyikilikin silba hawe gol.
Ano badeh iy udu doh edek i rakon rakon ili Betel. Eme iy asahan kon mene ndrokowa Betel hawe Ai kon mene iy udu aliy bwena.
Eme iy eme ta bek mene iy tukumwi ma iy aloh nyara Laban.
Lot badeh tan iri sipsip, me ma bulumakau ale i buku none udun nadun oro hawe iri lohowan tan ale.
Eme ya uru badeh munyak hawe bwidiu solo-an bwe, winiya uru ma la-uh bwe, tasah uru badeh katin haka turu badeh solo-an labai.
Eme iri lau ta tondrok katin haka ta Abram hawe ta Lot badeh andra-i. (Na len doh badeh iri Kenan hawe iri Perisa badeh manyah ado munyak nane doh).
Ano badeh Abram tiye ta Lot anya eh, “Talu badeh lowa talu, arile lau tam hawe lau tek badeh andra-i.
Eme ya talu kapou talu. Ou aseken munyak loboho heh bwena? I buku none ou aseken bilisiu badeh bilisiu baden eh jo ki aliy ai.”
Eme Lot anyolom ili eme iy anyolom nyamak Jordan ili isos So-ar badeh gwa solo-an i buku none bilin ta Kindrei ma i buku none munyak badu Ijip. (I doh badeh Kindrei basulumwi kon tinan Sodom hawe Gomora bwe le).
Eme Lot badeh solo-ei nyamak mari badu Jordan badeh i tan, eme iy iu i loboho lan ai. I dah sihide uru ma la-uh atalan i buku sah.
Ya Abram badeh udu munyak Kenan udu ai, ya Lot baden eh ili manyah udu bolo kon tinan nyamak ma manyah mirihik ta Sodom.
Iri badeh kandriyen tiri badeh ndrandra-i labai ta mada Kindrei.
Ano hamon ta Lot ndra-au badeh, Laban tiye ta Abram, “Kon ou are aliy baden, ou suri ou, ma ou anyolom kili keme ki jaha, ki rai, ki kum ma ki lan.
Jo kameh edeu munyak doh i tam ma lundriyem oro kameh nyaran bwe, winiya ari lau winiyan bandromwei bwe; on badeh winiyan andromwei.
<range>
Ou ala anyolom kili bwele-e munyak mari, munyak jo kameh edeu i tam.”
Eme Abram ili tahi asiu udu mirihik ta kei ndrabun loboho Mamre udu Hibron, eme udu doh badeh iy tukumwi bek ta salom i ta Laban.
Na len kabin Amrapel badu Babilon, Ariyok badu Elasar, Sedola-oma badu Ilam ma Tidal badu Go-im,
oro badeh ala amwekes bahun i ta kabin ma limeh: oro kabin doh badeh, Bera badu Sodom, Birsa badu Gomora, Sinah badu Admah, Semeber badu Sebo-im ma hawe kabin badu Bela (So-ar).
Ya oro kabin ma limeh doh badeh atukum ase ma lau ta bahun badeh ado nyamak Sidim, na dah badeh aloh gwa ndras nyakadan.
Oro badeh mene are baha tondrok ta Sedola-oma winiya jaha ronoh la-uh arile na jaha ronoh taloh badeh oro bwale oro ta are bahan.
Na jaha ronoh hahuw badeh Sedola-oma hawe iri kabin ta seben tan badeh, ame ma lau ta bahun tiri, ame andrei iri Repa-im an Asterot Karna-im, ma Susim an Ham, iri Emim ado loboho munyak ta Kiriyata-im,
ma hawe iri Hora ado mandrei Idom, tikahei iri ala Elparan loboho ka-u lomale an (kon ndra an le).
Ano oro tubuni oro, ano oro ame Kades (aloh Enmispat). Oro andrei munyak mari tiri Amaleka ma andrei Amora kon oro manyah ado Hasason Tamar.
Ano iri kabin badu Sodom, badu Gomora, badu Admah, badu Sebo-im ma Bela tukumwi iri lau ta bahun tiri, ma amwekes bahun ado nyamak Sidim, amwekes bahun, hawe iri kabin badu Ilam, badu Go-im badu Babilon hawe Elasar. Kabin limeh amwekes bahun i la-u kabin hahuw.
<range>
Eme nyamak doh badeh lawes udu aliy eme ya iri kabin badu Sodom hawe Gomora anya katobwak ta bahun eme badeh iri taku a bolo lawes amwekes na lakou sabata-an nane dah, eme ya oro kabin taloh le badeh taku akoh a mandrei.
Eme oro kabin ma hahuw dah andrei lakou mari badu Sodom hawe Gomora, ma nyamon ale ma oro au.
Ya Lot nadu nadu tine Abram badeh oro ado Sodom, eme badeh iri andrei oro ma lakou toro mari.
Eme ndramak ari ta atobwak eme badeh tiye nyala Abram ta lakou mari. Abram badeh Hiburu. Iy manyah udu mirihik ta kei ta aton ta Mamre badu Amora. Mamre hawe nadu tinen Eskol ma Aner badeh, oro lau ta seben Abram.
Eme Abram anuhun iri badeh ndrakuhi Lot oro. Eme iy nyuruwini iri lau ta bahun tan badeh ame, iri mari a se badeh asahan tonek ronoh ndru la-uh (318). Eme iri tikahei iri badeh ala asos Dan.
Ano iy apwai lau ta bahun tan, ano na ben badeh iri ala amwekes bahun tikahei iri ala asos Hobah loboho Damaskus.
Eme iy kuhi lakou mari mene andrei eme hamon. Ma hawe lowan Lot hawe lakou tan mari ma hawe iri badih ma hawe lau rayah ta bolo kou.
Ano len Abram eme hamon ta bahun ta i la-u Sedola-oma ma hawe iri kabin badeh, eme badeh kabin badu Sodom ili aturuk iy udu nyamak Sabeh (aloh Nyamak ta kabin).
Eme kabin Melsisedek, kabin badu Salem, lau ta ndrokowa lau hawe Kindrei ta Kindrei badu loken, eme atiye jabi hawe wa-in i na Abram.
Eme iy atehei nyosowan i tan, ano iy anya, “Ya abo, Kindrei badu loken, ou ta amwekes munyak ma kandrah, ou nyosowani Abram!
Kindrei badu loken atehei boto-on i tam ta bahun, ya masiye badeh ki ta Kindrei!” Eme badeh Abram eme atehei lakou tan rayah, i buku ronoh, iy atehei ari i tan ya i buku rinek, ronoh i tan, lakou doh iy andrei ta bahun eme badeh atehei i ta Melsisedek.
Ano kabin ta Sodom tiye i ta Abram, “Lakou tam mari kudu gwek, jo aseken le lau tek.”
Eme Abram anya eh, “Jo badeh tandrakan ta mada Laban Kindrei badu loken, ndramak ta amwekes munyak ma kandrah, ta jo winiyan basolo-ei ari lakou tam bwe, i buku none saba lakou nadu bwisik i buku kam hawe ku-i katim. Bakameh hamon ou asehek, ‘Jo le badeh jo mwesekei Abram tan lakou solo-an.’
<range>
Jo kameh winiyan basolo-ei ari lakou bwe. Jo aseken lakou le iri lau tek mene andrei ma ndraniy badeh keme ai. Arile Aner, Eskol hawe Mamre, oro lau ta aseben jo badeh kakohok ki toro ai.”
Ano hamon ja badeh lele asahan ta Abram, eme iy anuhun Laban tiye i tan, “Abram, ou sanoh! Jo kameh i turuk tam ma jo kameh edeu nyosowan tinan labai i tam.”
Arile Abram anya eh, “O Laban Kindrei, jo kada-ah nah bwe, ya saba lakou mwasin kameh ou kameh atehei eme la-uk? Lau ta atondrok lakou tek badeh Eliyesar badu Damaskus.
Ou badeh badeu tek rayah nah bwe, eme i dah kameh lau ari badu bolo oro lohowan tek kameh atondrok lakou mari tek ai.”
Ano iy anuhun Laban tiye tan ja, “Eliyesar lohowan tam badeh kameh batondrok lakou tam bwe, i dah kameh nadum amwenen kameh atondrok.”
Eme Laban kuhi iy eme manan ma tiye, “Ou anyolom ki loke bada kandrah ya none ou ondrek ndrau se, ou kameh lundriyem oro kameh i solo-a ndrau don.”
Eme badeh Abram atehei budon tan handru in ta Laban, tasah ta katin doh badeh Laban sekesek ma aseken iy ma aloh iy mwasin labai tan.
Ano Laban anya eh, “Jo badeh Laban, jo le badeh kuhi ou ado Ur udu Babilon ame len, ya jo badeh edeu munyak dah i tam.”
Eme Abram ndremenya, “Laban Kindrei, i buku sah jo ki tanan i dah munyak tek amwenen.”
Eme Kindrei anya eh, “Ou andrei ari bulumakau, ari rem ma hawe ari me jaha taloh ma hawe ari ban hawe ari ku.”
Eme Abram andrei oro katin haka ma taloh, ma taloh sirih dah i mada Kindrei. Eme sapwai katin haka dah i lusi, eme tulusi atehei in bilisiu ya tulusi atehei in bilisiu, arile sirih le badeh iy bapwai bala lusi bwe.
Eme iri manyuwe atah ame andri badeh anya kaimon, arile Abram tikahei iri au.
Eme an anya ki-iu ki andri badeh, Abram amadin tuk, ya lulik ma nohowan eme la-un.
Eme Laban tiye i tan, “Lundriyem oro kameh a buku lau badu leheleh ado munyak len labai; oro kameh a bonyo-ou udu gwek ma i dah kameh maha ndra-in handru i la-u oro winiya jaha hanek (400).
Ya jo badeh kameh edeu maha ma isi i ta kon heh iri are bonyo-ou tiri. Ano buku none iri ame len ta kon doh kameh, iri kameh kuhi lakou mari eme hawe iri.
Ou kameh ado alon winiyan isi basahan tam bwe winiya ou le barala lek hawe tamam oro.
I dah kameh lau rebesem au, ano rebesem au, ano rebesem au, ano rebesem au. Ano lundriyem oro barame dah ja ai. Tasah jo kameh winiyan batikahei iri Amora ba-au bwe, winiya kandriyen ndra-in tiri i tinan labai, ano jo baramwekes maha ma isi barala tiri ai.”
Ano len an amai ano kon ilik badeh kasu-er ma jih anya ma seselek, ma hawe sun anya asahan, ma edek ndrokowa katin haka dah.
Ano ma kabatana doh badeh, Laban amwekes sahou randra le hawe Abram, ano Kindrei tiye, “Jo badeh tandrakan ta edeu munyak i ta lundriyem oro badeh, kobek tan badeh udu Ijip ili taku gwa Yupretis,
hawe munyak tiri Keni, ma munyak tiri Kenis ma munyak tiri Kadmon,
ma munyak Hita ma munyak tiri Perisa ma munyak tiri Repa-im,
ma munyak Amora, ma munyak tiri Kenan, ma munyak tiri Gigasa ma hawe munyak tiri Jebus badeh ta lundriyem oro.”
Abram Sarai badeh badeu tan ari nah bwe. Arile iy badeh badih ari udu aliy i nyara badih ta lahou tan ya iy badu Ijip.
Eme iy tiye i ta Abram, “Laban badeh tawi jo, eme badeh jo bato-ou nah bwe. I buku sah, baden eh ou ala amadin hawe badih ta lahou tek? Koro-an iy katuwiy nah keme tek.” Eme Abram badeh aseken budon ta Sarai.
Eme Sarai atehei Haga badeh i hawe udun ta nyeu. (i doh asahan badeh, len Abram eme udu Kenan jaha ronoh).
Eme badeh Abram amadin hawe Haga ma Haga ndrinen i tinan. Eme len Haga tanan iy badeh ndratuwi nah, iy anyolom Sarai badeh anya jo le ai.
Ano Sarai tiye i ta Abram, “Ou le mwesekei badeh ma Haga banyolom jo bala mwasin bwe. Jo le badeh suni iy amadin hawem eme kabatana doh badeh iy atona iy badeh ndratuwi nah, eme ma iy madan andra-i eme tek. Eme Laban le baranyolom talu, ou mwasin de jo mwasin!”
Eme Abram anya eh, “Mwasin labai iy badeh ta lahou tam iy udu baha tondrok tam; Saba lakou ou anya amwekes ki tan ou amwekes ai.” Eme badeh iy amwekes tibine i ta Haga andra-i labai, eme Haga atobwak.
Eme Angelo ta Laban eme ndruni iy udu gwa li udu lomale an, gwa doh badeh udu ka-u san ili Sur.
Eme iy anya eh, “Haga, ou badeh badih ta lahou ta Sarai, ou ado heh ame, ma ou anya ahe.” Eme iy anya eh, “Jo badeh atobwak eme len, ta badih ta kati asiu.”
Eme iy tiye i tan, “Ou a hamon ja ma ou asahan bonyo-ou tan.”
Ano iy tiye, “Jo kameh edeu lundriyem oro a sola, winiya ari lau bandromwei bwe.”
Angelo ta Laban tiye i tan ale, “Ou kede-eh nah mwan ere ndrinem eme ou tondrohani nyaran badeh ki Isma-el, tasah Laban badeh ndranuhun ndrelen ma tikisiy tam.
Arile nadum kameh ta ramwes, iy kameh ta amwekes ramwes i la-u lau mari. Ma iri lau mari kameh budon tiri andra-i i tan, ma iy kameh udu ndrahun len labai ta lowan oro.”
Ano Haga aloh nyara Laban ma tiye sahou tan i buku doh, “Ou Kindrei ou ndranyolom jo, jo ndratou, ou are ala anyolom jo.”
Eme ma iri aloh li doh badeh li ta Ber Lahai Roi, moson “Gwa li ta Kindrei, ou anyolom jo,” udu ndrokowa Kades hawe Beret.
Eme Haga atehei nadu Abram mwan; eme badeh Abram tondrohani nyaran Isma-el.
Na len doh badeh Abram jaha tan ndru lunoh onoh (86).
Na len Abram jaha tan asahan ndro ronoh ndro ari (99), Laban badeh asahan hawen tiye, “Jo dah jo Kindrei jo tek boto-on. Ou anuhun jo ma len mari badeh ou amwekes kandriyen mwasin le.
Jo kameh amwekes sahou randra le hawem ma edeu lundriyem oro a sola.”
Eme Abram aluh i andri ma bulin i andri bada munyak, ano Kindrei anya eh,
“Jo amwekes sahou randra le dah hawem. Jo badeh tandrakan, ou badeh kameh asahan tubu iri lau mari badu kon munyak.
Nyaram kameh bala Abram bwe ai, nyaram kameh Abraham, tasah ou kameh asahan tubu iri lau badu kon munyak solo-an.
Jo kameh edeu lundriyem oro a sola, eme oro rayah kameh asahan kabin.
“Jo kameh balek winiyan bamani tandrakan tek i tam ma hawe i ta lundriyem oro na len, eme, eme, bwe. Sahou randra le dah, winiyan ta bano bwe. Jo kameh asahan Kindrei tam ma Kindrei ta lundriyem oro.
Ou badeh badu leheleh ta kon Kenan mari, jo kameh edeu i tam ma i ta lundriyem oro udu le buku doh ma jo kameh i Kindrei toro.”
Ano Kindrei tiye ta Abraham, “Ou ma lundriyem oro badeh ndrine ado kise, ta sahou randra le hawek ma lau rebesem hamon ame.
I dah sahou randra le tek ou samaniy, udu ndrokowak hawe ndrokowam hawe lundriyem oro: lau mwan mari badeh kasan ku-i lakou tiri ki-iu.
Na dah ma na len hamon eme ou badeh asan ku-i lakou ta nah ki-iu i buku len tan kasahan ndru la-uh. Iri ta lahou tam badu leheleh ma badu asiu tam ale. I doh badeh ta leheya sahou randra le udu ndrokowa talu ma la-uh.
<range>
Ado ari ari badeh kasan ki-iu eme ya mada lau kanyolom i dah badeh kalem ta leheya sahou randra le tek ma ou badeh udu le buku doh.
Are lau mwan basan ku-i lakou tan bwe, iy badeh lau tek bwe, tasah iy babudon sahou randra le tek hawen bwe.”
Ano Kindrei tiye ta Abraham, “Ou badeh saloh udum Sarai ja ai; na dah ma na len eme badeh ou aloh Sara.
Jo kameh edeu nyosowan i tan ma iy kameh atehei ari nah i tam. Jo kameh atehei nyosowan i tan ma iy kameh asahan tine iri lau mari badu kon rakon buruwen, ma kabin kameh asahan ta lundriyen oro.”
Eme Abraham aluh ya bulin i andri bada munyak eme iy lomondra ili ma iy akodei iy ta ehe-en anya eh, “Winiyan ari ndramak jaha tan rinek (100) winiyan mwesekei nah? Ya Sara badeh jaha tan ndro ronoh (90), ya iy winiyan tuwi ale?”
Eme Abraham tiye ta Kindrei, “I buku sah ou winiyan batehei Isma-el bame nah badu ndrinek bwe?”
Arile Kindrei anya eh, “Bwe ai. Udum Sara kameh atehei nah ari i nadum ya ou tondrohani nyaran badeh ki Aisik. Jo bamani sahou randra le hawen ma lundriyen oro bwe. I doh ta udu le buku doh. Ya winiyan ta bano bwe.
Ya ndrelen tam ta Isma-el baden eh, jo ndranuhun; jo kameh nyosowani iy handru; ma jo kameh mwesekei iy asahan sola ma kanen kameh i sola. Iy kameh asahan tama oro lau ta batun ma ronoh la-uh ma jo kameh edeu iy asahan kon rakon buruwen.
Arile jo kameh bamani sahou randra le hawe nadum Aisik bwe. I dah kameh adeu iy na jaha eme.”
Eme Kindrei asehek sahou i ta Abraham ano badeh iy iu ai.
Eme Na len doh le badeh, Abraham anuhun sahou ta Kindrei ma iy sani ku-i lakou ta Isma-el iu hawe tiri lau mwan are asiu tan ale. Iri doh badeh iri lau ta lahou tan badu bolo asiu. Iri lau ala adeu iri ado hawen ma hawe iri lau rayah ta sisih ale.
Abraham jaha tan asahan ndro ronoh ndro ari (99) badeh, sani ku-i lakou tan iu,
ya Isma-el badeh jaha tan ronoh taloh.
Uru ma la-uh badeh asan ku-i lakou turu iu na len ari le,
ma hawe iri lau ta lahou mari ta Abraham.
Ano na len, kon i nyarahan badeh Abraham eme manyah udu mada san ta asiu balei tan, eme ya Kindrei asahan hawen. Madan eme loke badeh iy anyolom lau taloh badeh ales.
Iy anyolom oro le badeh iy sakaliye ili aturuk oro ano iy aluh i andri, bulin i ta bada munyak.
Ano iy anya eh, “Laban, ado sa-au ta kon tek, ado kado; jo dah ta atondrok ou.
Gwa doh ado kasikine kati ado, ano ado kamunyau kado baha kei badeh.
Jo kameh akohok rayah nyamon ta aseben ado, tasah san lawe-en labai. Ado badeh anuhun jo ma ado ame asiu tek, eme ya jo katondrok ado ma kaseben ado.” Eme oro anya eh, “Wurah handru, aso aseken kandriyen tam labai.”
Ano Abraham i bolo balei badeh asehek i ta Sara, “Suwi Ou andrei rayah palawa ma ou asun sabe jabi ramen.”
Ano iy sakaliye ili bolo iri katin haka badeh andrei bulumakau kasen mwasin handru, iy andrei atehei i mine ndramak ta lahou tan ari ili sesek ma ajeh.
Ano iy andrei sur simidin ta katin haka ma hawe bulumakau kasen nane ndrajuhi dah, bwese-ei i hawe oro. Eme oro aimon ai. Ya Abraham badeh ales udu baha kei.
Eme oro ndremenya iy, “Udum Sara ndraheh?” Eme iy anya eh, “Iy udu bolo asiu balei.”
Ano Laban anya eh, “Jo kameh eme ja, na bolo jaha eme, ma udum Sara kameh nah udu ndrinen.” Ya Sara badeh udu mada san ta asiu balei udu konan.
Sara hawe Abraham badeh uru ndra alon handru ma jaha turu badeh ndra sola labai, ma Sara badeh winiyan bato-ou nah ja bwe ai.
Eme Sara badeh akodei iy ma iy ehe-en ma iy lomondra, “Jo badeh ndra ndrolo-oh, ma iy lau tek ndra alon, jo kameh barasekesek ta lakou dah de bwe.”
Ano Laban tiye i ta Abraham, “I buku sah Sara ehe-en ma anya eh, ‘Handru eh, jo kada-ah ndra alon, jo kameh ato-ou nah?’
Lakou mari kede-eh manamun ta Laban le ai. Jo kameh eme hamon na len ta aliy amwenen udu bolo jaha eme, ma Sara kameh tuwi nah mwan.”
Eme Sara inoh ma mwesekei wasai anya eh, “Jo behe-en bwe.” Arile iy anya eh, “Ou ehe-en handru.”
Ano badeh oro lau dah au, adek ala, ano oro anyolom eme andri ta Sodom ma Abraham atiye oro ma anyolom oro au.
Eme Laban anya eh, “Jo winiyan batonei sasah jo anya kamwekes ta mada Abraham bwe ai.
Lundriyen oro kameh asahan kon tinan ari buruwen, ma na iy le badeh kameh, jo kameh atehei nyosowan i tiri kon munyak tinan mari.
Jo badeh ndrasehek tan ta atehei iy badeh kabatanau nadun oro hawe lau badu asiu tan kanuhun le jo, ma kamwekes kandriyen mwasin le handru. I buku none oro an hamon ta batanau mari, jo tandrakan ta amwekes lakou mari i tan.”
Ano Laban tiye, “Ndrelen ta bada Sodom hawe Gomora tinan labai, ma karei ma lomondra ndra-in ndrandra-i labai.
Eme ya jo ki-iu ki andri kanyolom i buku none lakou oro amwekes doh handru de bwe, i buku none ndrelen toro ndrame.”
Eme uru lau dah au ala Sodom, arile Abraham le ales udu le mada Laban udu.
Ano Abraham eme mirihik ma iy lelen, “Ou kameh adai iri lau mwasin ma lau ndra-in ale?
I buku none lau mwasin ma lomonoh (50) i dah kameh ou sulumwi kon de bwe, ma ou sulumwi kon mari ano. Ya ou winiyan basebenei bwe ai, ta lau ma lomonoh (50) bado bwe ai.
Ou winiyan bamwesekei bwe. I buku none ou mwesekei kameh iri lau mwasin kameh ado bolo lau ndra-in ale. Ya iy kameh winiyan bwe. Iri lau ta anuhun sahou badu munyak badeh anuhun sahou badeh mwasin ja.”
Ano Laban tiye, “I buku none oro lau lomonoh (50) mwasin ado Sodom eh, badeh kameh jo winiyan basulumwi kon mari bwe.”
Eme Abraham tiye ja, “Jo badeh ndrasehek sahou boto-on labai ndra ta Laban. Jo badeh lakou leleyah, jo munyak ma koloweh leleyah.
Ya ki buku none lau limeh le ka-au udu baha lomonoh (50), ou winiyan sulumwi kon de bwe?” Eme Laban tiye, “I buku none jo anyolom lau hanoh limeh (45) ado aliy, badeh kameh jo winiyan basulumwi bwe ai.”
Eme iy ndremenya ja i tan, “I buku sah i buku none lau hanoh (40) kado aliy?” Eme iy tiye, “Buku none oro lau hanoh le, jo winiyan bamwesekei bwe.”
Ano Abraham tiye, “Laban ei, ou sabolosen, jo kasehek, ya i buku none tonoh (30) ado aliy?” Eme iy tiye, “Buku none oro lau tonoh le, jo winiyan bamwesekei bwe.”
Eme Abraham tiye, “Len ndra-au badeh jo ndrasehek sahou boto-on ndra ta Laban, ki buku none lunoh (20) ado aliy, mwasin?” Eme iy tiye, “Oro lunoh le badeh jo winiyan basulumwi kon bwe.”
Ano iy tiye, “Laban ou sabolosen; jo anya kasehek sahou san rasan le ja. Ya ki buku none lau ronoh le mwasin de bwe?” Eme iy anya eh, “Buku none lau ronoh le badeh jo winiyan basulumwi bwe.”
Eme Laban asehek sahou hawe Abraham ano badeh iy iu ai, eme ma Abraham i asiu ai.
Lot badeh manyah udu mada san ta i bolo kon na beyeh, eme badeh uru Angelo la-uh asahan hawen. Iy anyolom uru le badeh iy edek ili hawe uru ma akor ma bulin i andri bada munyak.
Eme iy tiye, “Laban, ah ma la-uh kame asiu tek tasah jo ta lahou ta ah. Ah kasikine kati ah ma ah kamadin ben ari, ano ma ndraben ah bara-au.” Eme uru anya, “Bwe ai, aru kameh amadin na ben dah ado lohalak bolo kon.”
Arile iy andresei uru ma uru ala asiu tan. Ano Lot tiye oro lau ta lahou tan mwesekei jabi ramen yis bala bolon bwe i nuru lau dah.
Eme oro bamadin bwe le badeh, iri lau loweu hawe iri lau-en mari badu kon Sodom badeh ala awudi asiu.
Eme iri aloh Lot, “Oro lau ame na ben nane ndraheh? Oro kameh manan aso anya katou oro!”
Eme Lot sulu-i kou ano iy eme manan, ma atuwi kou ili.
“Ado kawas tek, ado samwekes kandriyen badeh.
Naduk badih ma la-uh kada-ah, uru bakohok se mwan bwe. Jo katiye uru kame manan ya ado badeh kamwekes sasah na seken tado ki turu. Ya ado samwekes ari lakou sala toro, oro badeh are baha tondrok tek.”
Eme oro anya, “Ou abelek!” Ma oro tiye, “Ou lau dah badeh badu leheleh ame dah, eme ya ou anya amwekes kandriyen ta sahou ai. Oro kameh, bwe ai, arile aso kameh adeu maha tinan labai i tam.” Oro andres Lot boto-on labai ano oro anya katokos asiu.
Arile oro lau ado bolon sulu-i kou ma aluwi Lot i bolon ano sulu-i kou ili.
Ano badeh oro bwidi mada iri agwah, eme ma iri banyolom kou bwe.
Ano uru lau ma la-uh dah lelen Lot, “Ou ari lowam, o ari molosou ta nadum, o ari nadu mwan ma badih udu kon dah de bwe. O ari lau udu bolo kon dah tam de bwe. Ou kuhi oro ka-au ta kon dah.
Tasah aso kameh asun kon dah. Laban badeh anuhun ndrelen tiri, eme iy suni aso ame ta asun.”
Eme Lot ili badeh asehek ta masa-an oro, ala sudi nadun oro badih. Iy tiye, “Suwi ado kame len ta kon dah, Laban kameh asun kon dah.” Arile udu nadun oro anya badeh iy ibo nyorei le.
Na boholen badeh oro Angelo wekewek Lot, “Suwi! Ou kuhi udum ma nadum badih ma la-uh ya ado ka-au. Eme ya ado samak, len kon kameh andrakak!”
Eme Lot badeh babotatahan bwe. Laban tikisiy iy eme iy kuhi udun ma nadun uru na lim ma sariye oro ame len ta kon.
Eme oro ame len le badeh iy ari tiye anya eh, “Ado kabotataha batu ado! Ado sanyolom same hamon, ma ado samunyau loboho kon bwidiu udu aliy. Ado katobwak ka mandrei, bakameh ado kamak.”
Arile Lot tiye i turu, “Ndri-i, Laban tek!
Ou badeh anuhun jo labai, ma mwesekei jo, ma ou sebenei kohak. Mandrei udu len labai, jo winiyan batobwak bala aliy bwe. Koro-an maha ma sisi-in tinan labai kabwidi jo kimek.
Ou ndranyolom kon bwisik udu mirihik ai kodo-oh. Ma kon doh nadu bwisik, eme jo katobwak ki aliy. Ma jo kameh winiyan bamak bwe.”
Eme iy anya eh, “Abo mwasin jo aseken. Jo badeh winiyan basulumwi kon badeh bwe.
Suwi ado kala suwi! Jo badeh winiyan bamwekes ari lakou bwe winiyan ado ndrasos.” Eme ta katin doh badeh kon doh aloh So-ar, tasah kon doh bwisik.
Lot oro ala asos le So-ar badeh, an eme loken la-u kon.
Ano badeh Laban mwesekei jih nyarahan labai anya udu kandrah eme sulumwi Sodom hawe Gomora.
Eme badeh sulumwi iri lau mari, sulumwi nyamak ma hawe sulumwi baso mari ano. Lakou mari badeh andrakak.
Eme udu Lot anyolom i hamon badeh ma iy ibin i bek.
Eme ma ndraben ta len ari ja, Abraham amak ma iy ili ndrahu kon iy mene ales udu aliy mada Laban,
eme iy anyolom i andri ili Sodom hawe Gomora ma hawe munyak ma nyamak mari loboho doh badeh iy anyolom kasu-er i loken. I buku none kasu-er ta jih nyarahan badeh i loken.
Len Kindrei sulumwi kon tinan ma nyamak mene Lot manyah udu aliy, eme iy badeh bamaniy Abraham bwe ya eme iy mwesekei Lot atobwak ma iy udu mwasin. Loboho Iri Mowaba Ma Amora
Ano Lot hawe nadun uru badih ma la-uh badeh ruwani So-ar, eme oro ala manyah ado bolo mandrei, tasah iy badeh inoh ta manyah udu So-ar. Oro ma taloh badeh manyah ado munu bek.
Eme len ari badeh nadu Lot badih bwele-en tiye i ta nadu tinen badih bahan, “Tama talu badeh ndra alon, eme ari lau ja kede-eh ja bwe ai, ta amadin talu bwe, i buku none kandriyen ta munyak mari.
Talu kamwesekei tama talu badeh ka-un wa-in eme iy kamadin talu ya talu kato-ou nah.”
Eme na ben doh badeh uru atehei wa-in i ta tama uru, ano badeh iy bwele-en turu badeh amadin hawen bwena. Iy amadin hawen badeh ano iy suri iy badeh, Lot batona bwe.
Len ari ja badeh iy bwele-en tiye i ta iy bahan, “Na ben badeh jo amadin tama, talu kamwesekei iy ka-un wa-in na ben dah, eme ou ala amadin hawen ja eme ma talu kato-ou nah kasahan ta tama talu.”
Eme uru mwesekei tama uru a-un wa-in na ben doh ano iy bahan ili amadin hawen. Eme i le buku aliy, iy amadin hawen badeh, ano iy suri iy eme loken badeh Lot batona se bwe.
Eme uru ma la-uh tuwi nah nadu tama uru.
Iy bwele-en badeh atehei nadun eme len badeh tondrohani nyaran badeh Mowab, moson “Ta tama.” Eme iy badeh tama iri Mowaba na len dah.
Iy bahan badeh atehei nah mwan ale, eme tondrohani nyaran badeh Ben-ami, moson “Nadu tama oro.” Eme na len dah badeh iy badeh tama iri Amora.
Ano badeh Abraham ruwani ndrahunen bwena, eme iy edek ili loboho Negeb ma manyah udu ndrokowa Kades hawe Sur. Iy udu Gerar badeh luwen bwe,
eme badeh Abraham tiye anya Sara badeh nadu tinen. Ano kabin badu Gerar nyaran Abimelek atehei sahou ili andrei Sara ili.
Arile Kindrei asahan ta Abimelek na ameh na ben ma tiye i tan, “Ou kameh amak tasah ou andrei badih tasou badeh.”
Eme badeh Abimelek bala mirihik tan bwe, eme iy tiye, “Laban, jo badeh mwasin labai, ou kameh adai jo ma iri lau tek ai?
Abraham tiye badeh anya iy nadu tinen, eme Sara ale tiye i buku aliy. Jo mwesekei doh badeh budon tek bandra-i bwe ma jo bamwesekei ari lakou ndra-in bwe.”
Eme Kindrei tiye i tan na ameh, “Jo tanan, ou badeh budon tam bandra-i bwe, eme jo badeh bamwesekei ou bamwekes lomondra ndra-in bame badak bwe, ma bamwesekei ou batawi iy bwe.
Ya eme na le dan, badeh ou atehei udun ki hamon. Tasah iy badeh ndramak ta boho Kindrei iy kameh amwekes salom i tam, i buku bwe, jo tiye tanan tam ou kameh amak ma hawe iri lau tam mari.”
Eme na ma ndraben badeh iy luhi iri lau ta lahou badu bolo asiu tan ame, eme badeh iy asehek nyala iri. Eme badeh iri anoh.
Ano badeh Abimelek luhi Abraham eme bolon ma tiye, “Ou amwekes sasah eme taso dah? Jo mwesekei madam andra-i ta sasah handru, eme ya ou adeu maha tinan eme la-u aso ma tondrok tek dah? Lakou ou amwekes dah badeh ou winiyan bamwekes bame tek bwe ai.”
Ano badeh Abimelek ndremenya Abraham, “Saba katin handru ou badeh amwekes kandriyen dah?”
Eme Abraham anya eh, “Jo abudon le i buku doh, iri lau badu kon dah banoh Kindrei bwe, eme i dah kameh iri kadai jo, tasah na uduk.
Arile iy badeh nadu tine handru. Iy badeh nadu tama arile, nadun ta tine ta tewedeu jo bwe, eme badeh jo sudi iy.
Eme Kindrei tiye jo eme len ta munyak, eme kon leheleh, eme badeh jo tiye i tan ta iy badeh kaleheya mwasin tan hawe seken tan udu tek handru ki tiri kon mari, ta jo badeh nadu tinen.”
Ano badeh Abimelek eme badeh kuhi katin haka sipsip ma bulumakau ma hawe iri bonyo-ou mwan ma badih atehei i ta Abraham, ma iy atehei udun Sara i hamon.
Eme badeh Abimelek tiye i tan, “Munyak tek udu madam kede-eh, ou manyah ado aliy na seken tam.”
Ya i ta Sara badeh iy tiye i buku doh, “Jo kameh edeu ta nadu tinem kameh wa-iralou hayen nyikilikin amwekes na silba. Ta leheya udu mada iri lau tam mari, ta ou badeh bamwekes ari kandriyen ndra-in bwe, eme iri lau mari katanan ou badeh bamwekes ari lakou bandra-i bwe.”
Ano badeh Abraham amwekes salom i ta Kindrei, ma Kindrei mwesekei Abimelek ma hawe udun hawe oro bonyo-ou badih tan badeh ato-ou nah ja.
Tasah ta udu Abraham Sara le mene, Kindrei mene sokei lakou ta amwekes nah tiri lau mari badu baha tondrok ta Abimelek.
I buku none Kindrei mene ndrasehek ma ndratandrakan ndra-au ta iy badeh tikisiy Sara labai,
Eme udu bada Abraham i alon badeh, Sara ndrinen i tinan ma iy tuwi nah mwan i nadun. Amwenen le ta len mene Kindrei tandrakan iy.
Eme badeh Sara atehei nah dah eme len badeh, Abraham tondrohani nyaran Aisik.
Ano len ta nadun Aisik asahan ndru la-uh badeh Abraham sani ku-i lakou tan iu, i buku Kindrei ndratiye tan.
Abraham jaha tan asahan rinek (100) badeh nadun Aisik eme len.
Eme badeh Sara tiye, “Kindrei badeh atehei sekesek eme ndrinek ma buku none iri lau mari anuhun kameh iri kameh sekesek hawek.”
Ano iy tiye le, “Are tiye i ta Abraham anya, Sara kameh winiyan nyowo-ei nah bwe? Arile udu bada alon tan badeh jo ndratehei nah mwan ai.”
Iy nah badeh i tinan ano na len Aisik aruwe sur badeh, Abraham mwesekei tine nyamon.
Arile Sara anyolom nadu i badih Haga badu Ijip, atehei i nadu Abraham badeh bobose, eme iy tiye ta Abraham, “Ou tikahei badih ta lahou tam ma hawe nadun ki-iu, tasah nadun kameh winiyan bakohok ari lakou hawe nadum Aisik bwe.”
<range>
Eme Abraham abudon la bwe, tasah iy badeh nadun le.
Arile Kindrei tiye, “Ou sabudon tinan labai ta nah nadu badih ta lahou tam kede-eh. Ou badeh anuhun boho Sara asehek tam, tasah na Aisik le kameh lundriyem oro asahan.
Jo kameh edeu nadu badih ta lahou tam kameh asahan kon rakon buruwen, tasah iy badeh nadum le.”
Na ma ndraben ta len ari ja badeh Abraham kuhi nyamon rayah ma hawe bwisi gwa (amwekes na ku-i katin haka) idih na gwa atehei i mine Haga. Iy bwese-ei i nah badeh tukuni i konan ma tiye uru au. Eme iy edek leleyah ili bolo lomale an Bersiba.
Eme gwa udu bolo bwisin ano badeh, iy nyahani i nah udu bolo bwidiu udu ai.
Eme iy ili manyah udu len. Ano iy abudon, “Jo bwalek anyolom nah mwan kodo-oh imek.” Eme iy anya keden.
Eme Kindrei anyolom i nah dah eden, eme badeh Angelo ta Kindrei udu kandrah aloh i ta Haga, “Ou ndra buku sah badeh? Ou sanoh, Kindrei badeh ndranuhun i nah eden kede-eh.
Ou bwese-ei iy keme loken ma ou apon iy, tasah jo kameh amwekes lundriyen oro kameh asahan kon tinan rakon handru.”
Ano badeh Kindrei mwesekei madan asak badeh, iy atou gwa li. Eme iy andrei bwisi gwa ili badeh asuniy ma i nah dah a-un.
Iy badeh i tinan, Kindrei badeh udu hawen le. Iy badeh ndrahu manyah tan udu kon lomale an, eme iy badeh asahan nyekelen handru ta beteleu.
Iy manyah udu lomale an nyaran Paran, ano tinen badeh andrei badih ari badu Ijip i udun.
Na len doh badeh Abimelek hawe Pikol ndramak ta mwena ta bahun tan tiye i ta Abraham, “Sasah ou amwekes badeh Kindrei udu hawem.
Na dah udu mada Kindrei badeh ou tandrakan ta ou badeh sawasai jo ma lundriye naduk oro. Jo badeh tikisiy ou labai, eme jo aseken ou badeh tikisiy jo ale ma kon munyak ou manyah are aliy dah.”
Eme Abraham tandrakan.
Ano badeh Abraham eme nunu-uh Abimelek ta gwa li oro lau ta lahou ta Abimelek solo-ei.
Eme Abimelek anya, “Aliy, jo tanan are amwekes badeh bwe. Ou batiye tek bwe, nane le jo badeh baranuhun.”
Eme badeh Abraham kuhi sipsip hawe bulumakau eme atehei i ta Abimelek. Eme uru amwekes sahou randra le.
Ano Abraham kuhi sipsip kasen ndro taloh tan eme len,
eme badeh Abimelek ndremenya Abraham, “Saba moson ta ou atehei sipsip kasen ndro taloh udu len kede-eh?”
Eme iy tiye, “Ou kuhiy sipsip kasen ma ndro taloh doh, tasah gwa li badeh jo a-eh.”
Eme nyara kon doh badeh Bersiba, moson “Li ta tandrakan,” tasah uru lau ma la-uh badeh tandrakan ado aliy.
Hamon ta sahou randra le ano udu Bersiba badeh, hawe Pikol ndramak ta bwena ta bahun tan badeh uru au a hamon ala Pilistin.
Ano Abraham tahi kei tamarisk udu Bersiba, eme iy aloh nyara Laban, Kindrei ta udu le buku doh.
Eme Abraham badeh manyah ili eme udu munyak ta Pilistin luluwen labai.
Udu hamon ta aliy badeh Kindrei none Abraham. Eme iy tiye i tan, “Abraham!” Eme Abraham anya eh, “Jo kada-ah.”
Ano Kindrei tiye, “Ou andrei Aisik, nadum ala adem handru in tan kede-eh badeh ou ala loboho Moreya. Jo kameh leheya mandrei kameh i tam ma ou asun iy ki nyara salom.”
Eme Abraham amak na ma ndraben, abedei ndro-o jih ano andrei i ta asun salom eme iy atehei i bwele-e katin haka donki ma andrei Aisik hawe uru lau ta lahou tan la-uh. Eme oro adek ala kon Kindrei ndratiye tan.
Len la-uh ano ya i bada len taloh badeh Abraham atou kon nane udu len.
Eme badeh iy tiye i turu lau ta lahou tan, “Ah kado dah ma donki kado jo hawe Aisik badeh aru kala kodo-oh. Aru kameh ala atudun ano badeh aru barame hamon hawe ah ja.”
Ano Abraham andrei ndro-o jih ta asun atehei i kase nadun Aisik eme iy andrei jih ma samen. Eme uru adek se ala badeh,
Aisik ndremenya taman Abraham, “Tama?” Eme Abraham anya, “Abo naduk sasah?” “Ndro-o jih hawe jih kada-an ai, ya sipsip ta asun ta salom ndrahe bah?”
Eme Abraham anya eh, “Naduk, Kindrei le baradeu sipsip kasen barame ta asun ta salom.” Eme uru ma la-uh adek ala.
Eme uru ala asos kon mene Kindrei tiye tan badeh, iy eme tukumwi bek i loken ta asun. Ano badeh iy kuhi ndro-o jih i bwele-en. Ano badeh i sawei nadun Aisik badeh atehei iy i bwele-e ndro-o jih udu bada bek dah.
Eme iy andrei samen anya kamundroh le iy badeh,
Angelo ta Laban aloh udu kandrah eme anya, “Abraham! Abraham!” Eme Abraham anya, “Jo kada-ah.”
“Ou sadai iy ma ou samwekes sasah sala tan, jo badeh tanan, ou badeh anoh Kindrei labai, eme ou basolo-ei nadum bwe.”
Eme Abraham madan eme loken badeh iy anyolom katin haka rem badeh andra batun badeh malou sakabwitiniy iy. Eme iy ruwani Aisik, iy ili badeh tawi rem dah eme, akohok kon ta Aisik ta salom.
Eme Abraham tondrohani nyara kon nane doh badeh, “Kindrei Kameh Atehei.” Eme ma taku len dah aloh, “Mandrei doh badeh Laban Kameh Atehei.”
Ano badeh Angelo ta Laban udu kandrah aloh ja i ta Abraham ma tiye, “Ou badeh banoh ta adeu nadum ou aseken labai bwe, jo tandrakan handru jo kameh amwekes lundriyem oro kameh nyaran bwe, oro kameh a solo-a ndrau badu loken ma solo-a on badu babi. Lundriyem oro kameh akohok lakou mari tiri lau ta ndra-i i tam udu kon tinan tiri.
<range>
<range>
Ya nyosowan ta lundriye nadum oro kameh ili la-u kon munyak mari, tasah na ou anuhun sahou tek.”
Ano badeh Abraham uru au ala hawe uru lau ta lahou tan nane ma oro au ala Bersiba. Eme Abraham udu Bersiba udu le.
Ano udu len hamon badeh Abraham anuhun nadu tinen Nahor udun Milkah badeh atehei nadun ma ndru la-uh:
Kadok badeh Us ano Bus ano badeh Kemu-el tama Aram,
Keset, Haso, Pildas, Jidlap ma Betu-el, tama Rebeka.
Milkah badeh atehei nah ndru la-uh nane doh.
Udu Nahor badih ta mada san nyaran Reumah badeh atehei Tebah, Gaham, Tahas hawe Ma-akah.
Sara badeh udu winiya jaha rinek lunoh ndro taloh (127).
Iy imek badeh udu Kiriyat Arba (aloh Hibron) udu munyak Kenan, eme Abraham ili moroha iy ma eden i la-un.
Ano Abraham suri iy udu ka-u udun eme loken badeh, iy tiye i tiri Hita. Iy tiye i buku doh,
“Jo badeh badu leheleh eme udu ndrokowa ado. Jo anya kisih sese munyak loboho dah eme ya jo ka-eh uduk ki aliy.”
Eme iri Hita tiye i ta Abraham,
“Laban, ou anuhun aso. Udu bolo ahi dah, ou badeh ou lau ta Kindrei. Ou ahi udum badeh ki munu bek na seken tam le. Ari ndramak badeh winiyan bala bwalen ta lek (munu bek) tan ta a-eh bada kei tam kede-eh bwe.”
Ano badeh iy ales ma iy aluh i andri mada iri lau mari badu Hita ta munyak tiri.
Eme Abraham tiye i tiri, “I buku none ado aseken ta jo kihiy bada kei tek dah, badeh ado kanuhun jo, ado kala hawe Epron nadu Sohar, badeh ado ka nyara bohok,
eme kasihinei munu bek ta Makpelah, i doh tan amwenen udu ka-u munyak tan badeh. Ado kandremenyani iy ta sihinen handru badeh sabe, eme ma kudu mada ado, jo kasihinei ki ndrahu a-eh tek.”
Eme Epron badeh manyah udu hawe iri Hita ndrahu kon ta atukum, mada san ta i bolon; eme iri lau mari badeh anuhun iy asehek;
“Laban ou anuhun, lo ndranye oro lau tek mari kede-eh, jo kameh atehei munyak mari ma munu bek udu aliy kede-eh i tam. Ta ou badeh ahi udum ki aliy.”
Eme ja badeh Abraham aluh i andri udu mada iri lau mari ta munyak dah.
Lo ndranye iri lau mari badeh iy tiye ta Epron, “Aha kanuhun jo, i buku none aha aseken badeh jo kasihinei munyak mari. I buku ado aseken sisih badeh, jo kihiy uduk ki aliy.”
Eme Epron tiye ta Abraham,
“Laban, ou anuhun jo, munyak badeh sihinen badeh hanek (400) boroh amwekes na silba; arile lakou doh badeh talu barasehek ta aliy ndrokowa talu. Ou ahi udum.”
Eme Abraham aseken budon ta Epron eme ma iy andromoi sihine lakou mari iy nane aloh udu ndranye lau mari badu Hita nane dah: badeh hanek (400) boroh amwekes na silba i buku none maha ta aliy udu ndrokowa lau ta atondrok.
Eme udu ndranye iri Hita mari nane ame ado mada san ta i bolo kon dah, munyak ta Epron ma munu bek hawe iri kei udu kobek udu Makpelah mirihik ta Mamre badeh atehei i ta Abraham.
<range>
Ano badeh Abraham atehei udun Sara i munu bek udu munyak Makpelah mirihik ta Mamre (aloh Hibron) udu munyak Kenan.
Eme munyak doh badeh ma munu bek udu aliy badeh ta Abraham handru badu mine iri Hita i tan ta mada lek.
Abraham badeh ndra alon labai, ma jaha tan ndra sola, eme Laban badeh atehei nyosowan i la-un ta mada san mari.
Eme iy tiye i ta lau ta lahou tan ta atondrok badu asiu tan, ma iy ta atondrok lakou mari tan, “Ou tawi baha bak ta kalem,
Jo badeh aseken ou tandrakan na nyara Laban, iy Kindrei badu kandrah ma munyak, ta ou sakohok badih sala ta naduk badu kenan, kon jo manyah udu hawe iri dah,
arile ou kameh ala kon tek ala hawe lowak oro amwenen akohok ari badih ki ta naduk Aisik.”
Eme iy lau ta lahou tan tiye, “Ya ki buku none iy badih ki bwalen ta eme kameh ki buku sah bah?”
Abraham anya eh, “Ou badeh sandrei naduk sawek badeh.
Laban Kindrei badu kandrah le badeh kuhi jo eme len ta boho kamen ta tama udu munyak tek, iy tiye ma tandrakan jo ta edeu munyak dah i ta lundriyek oro. Iy kameh suni angelo ili bwena tam, ta aseben ou kandrei ari badih badu badeh keme ta naduk.
I buku none i badih bwalen ta eme hawem eme, badeh batanau tek balem kamani ai. Arile ou sandrei naduk sawek badeh.”
Ano badeh i lau ta lahou tan dah tawi baha ba Abraham dah ma tandrakan bohon i tan ta nyala lakou nane dah.
Ano badeh i lau ta lahou tan dah andrei katin haka ronoh kamel ma hawe lakou rayah mwasin ta Abraham badeh, ma iy iu ili Aram Nahara-em ma edek iu ili kon Nahor mene udu aliy.
Eme iy bwidi iri kamel manyah ado andri ka-u gwa li udu manan ta kon; i doh na beyeh ai, mada an tiri badih ta ame a-us gwa.
Ano badeh iy amwekes salom, “O Laban, Kindrei ta Abraham len dah ou atehei keme tek, ma ou leheya tikisiy tam ki ta Abraham.
Ou anyolom jo badeh ales udu ka-u gwa dah ya nadu iri lau badih badu kon kameh ame ta a-us gwa.
Kasahan i buku none jo katiye ki ta i badih, ‘Ei, bwisi gwa tam ki andri ya jo anya ka-un se gwa,’ Ya i buku none iy anya, ‘Abo ou a-un; ma jo kedeu gwa ki ta kamel tam.’ Eme badih doh baden adeh, ki ta nadu i lau tam Aisik. Eme ya jo kameh i tanan ou badeh leheya mwasin tam i ta Abraham.”
Iy ano salom le badeh, Rebeka edek ma sabok tan udu kasen eme. Iy badeh nadu Betu-el ya Betu-el i ndrine Milkah, udu nadu tine Abraham Nahor.
Iy badeh konen labai, ma iy ma bihin le; ari lau bakohok iy bwe le. Iy edek ili gwa li, asuni sabok tan ano iy eme hamon ja badeh,
iy lau ta lahou dah edek ili suwi badeh tiye, “Ei, jo anya ka-un se gwa badu bolo sabok tam badeh?”
Eme iy anya, “Laban tek, Ou a-un.” Eme Rebeka suri sabok tan atehei i minen ma iy a-un.
Iy atehei gwa ili iy a-un, ano badeh iy tiye, “Jo kili ka-us rayah gwa ale ki wa-i oro kamel tam winiya oro le barakoh ta a-un.”
Eme badeh iy solowei gwa i bolo bwisi gwa toro kamel, ano badeh iy ibotatahan ili mada gwa li asuni gwa ja eme, winiya le oro kamel akoh na gwa.
Eme i lau ta lahou dah anyolom iy le, iy bawadei bwe, iy anyolom ma iy lomondra, “Laban kameh baratehei jo barasekesek de bwe.”
Ano oro kamel a-un gwa ano badeh, lau ta lahou dah lihidi bek nyikilikin ta ndrundrun ta no-o ndramak eme len, maha i le winiyan maha, la-uh ja ta bohan badeh maha sese ta bohan.
Ano iy anya, “Ou nadu are handru? Ou tiye tek asiu ta tamam badeh winiyan aso amadin aliy na ben dah de bwe?”
Eme iy tiye, “Jo badeh nadu Betu-el, Betu-el i ndrine Milkah uru Nahor.”
Ano iy asehek le ili, “Bwidiu solo-an asoker ma asiu tado ta amadin na ben dah winiyan.”
Eme iy aluh kandrun i andri ma iy atudun Laban,
tiye, “Katudun Laban, Laban ma Kindrei ta Abraham, iy badeh amwekes sahou tandrakan hawe Abraham ta iy bamani iy bwe. Eme Laban le badeh tiyani jo edek ili isos asiu ta lowan oro.”
Eme badih dah sakaliye ili asiu ta tinen ma asehek nyalan ta sahou mari.
Ya Rebeka badeh nadu tinen mwan ari nyaran Leban, eme iy edek suwi, suwi ili hawe iri lau ado mada gwa.
Iy anyolom bek nyikilikin ta no-o ndramak ano, ma anyolom bokomwak udu boha nadu tinen ma Rebeka asehek nyalan, ano badeh iy edek ili badeh anyolom i lau dah ales udu mirihik ta kamel mirihik ta gwa udu aliy kahis le,
“Ou badeh Laban atehei nyosowan udu tam. Ou ales are dah abosah? Jo badeh ndralowosani bolo asiu ma ndralowosani ndrahune oro kamel.”
Eme oro ala asiu, iy ili boho asiu, ano oro bwese-ei lakou udu la-u kamel eme andri. Eme atehei bwidiu asoker i noro kamel ma gwa i wa-in ma i wa-i lau tan ma i toro ta sikine kati oro.
Ano badeh bwese-ei nyamon eme batalan, eme iy anya eh, “Jo katiye sahou tek op, ano jo baraimon.” Eme Leban anya eh, “Abo ou asehek taso.”
Eme iy anya, “Jo dah jo lau ta lahou ta Abraham.
Laban badeh ndratehei nyosowan ndra ta Abraham mwasin labai, ma iy badeh tan lakou solo-an labai. Kindrei badeh atehei tan sipsip, bulumakau, silba ma hawe gol ma atehei tan iri lau ta lahou tan mwan ma badih ma hawe iri kamel hawe donki.
Udu Abraham Sara badeh ndra alon handru eme iy atehei tan nah mwan ari, ma atehei tan lakou mari iy aseken.
Eme Abraham badeh tiye sahou boto-on ma tandrakan ma tiye, jo badeh sakohok ari badih nadu iri Kenan sala ta nadun badu munyak iy manyah udu aliy doh,
arile iy tiye tek badeh keme hawe lowa taman oro keme boho kamen tan amwenen kakohok ari badih ki ta nadun.
“Ano jo ndremenya Abraham, ‘Ya i buku none i badih bwalen ta eme hawek kameh i buku sah bah?’
“Eme iy tiye, ‘Laban, ala jo edek hawen dan badeh kameh barasuni angelo tan barawek hawem ma i dah kameh tedek tam udu mwasin, ma ou kameh winiyan andrei ari badih eme ta naduk badu boho kamen tek amwenen badu hawe lowa tama.
Na len ou ala boho kamen tek, ya i buku none oro batehei iy bame bwe, badeh na tandrakan tek le ou ame hamon.’
“Eme jo eme na len dah, eme mada gwa, jo tiye, ‘O Laban, Kindrei ta Abraham, i buku none seken tam handru, ou atehei len ta tekedek tek jo eme ta aliy dah badeh keme minek.
I buku none ari badih keme dah ta a-us gwa, ya jo katiye ki tan, “Ei, jo anya ka-un se gwa badu bolo sabok tam badeh,”
ya i buku none iy katiye anya, “Ou a-un ma jo ka-us rayah gwa ki wa-i kamel tam oro ale,” Iy don baden adeh, kameh ou anya ki ta nadu Abraham!’
“Salom tek udu ndra ndrinek le badeh, Rebeka asahan ma bwisi sabok tan udu kasen eme. Eme iy ili a-us gwa, ano jo tiye i tan, ‘Ei, jo anya ka-un se gwa tam.’
“Eme suwi labai badeh iy suri sabok udu kasen eme andri ma iy tiye, ‘Ou a-un,’ ma ‘Jo ka-us rayah gwa ki wa-i kamel tam oro ale.’ Eme badeh jo a-un gwa, ya iy edeu gwa i toro kamel.
“Eme badeh jo ndrmenya iy, ‘Ou nadu areh?’ “Iy anya eh, ‘Jo badeh nadu Betu-el i ndrine Nahor, ala Milkah atehei nadun.’ Ano badeh jo atehei bek nyikilikin i no-on ma hawe atehei bokomwak i bohan,
Ano jo aluh i andri ma atudun Laban. Jo asore Laban, Kindrei ta Abraham, ta iy badeh tiyani jo eme amwenen ta nadu tubu, nadu tine Abraham ta iy udu nadum.
Eme ya, i buku none ou tikisiy Abraham eh, badeh ou asumon; ya i buku none bwe eh, badeh ou asehek tek. Eme ya jo kasilah madan san ari ja.”
Eme Leban hawe Betu-el uru tiye, “Tanan dah badeh badu ta Laban labai; aru badeh winiyan basehek sasah ta aliy bwe.
Rebeka badeh kada-ah; ou andrei iy kewek ki ta nadu Abraham i buku le Kindrei ndratiye.”
Eme lau ta lahou ta Abraham anuhun uru tiye, ano le badeh iy aluh i andri bada munyak ta mada Laban Kindrei.
Ano badeh lau ta lahou dah badeh lihidiy gol hawe silba nyikilikin hawe ra-ei kolau ma atehei i ta Rebeka; ano iy ale edeu lakou rayah sowan tinan handru i ta nadu tine Rebeka hawe tinen.
Ano badeh iy ma hawe lau nane badu hawen badeh aimon nyamon ma a-un gwa, ano badeh oro amadin. Ano iy amak mandraben handru iy anya, “Ou satawi jo, jo ki-iu ki hamon ja hawe Abraham.”
Arile nadu tine Rebeka hawe tinen tiye anya, “Rebeka winiyan bawek bwe, iy kudu winiya len ma ronoh kano badeh, iy barawek.”
Eme iy tiye i turu, “Ah badeh satawi aru sado. Laban badeh ndramwesekei san tek ndramwe-es; ou atehei jo ki-iu ki hawe Abraham.”
Ano uru anya, “To kaluhi iy keme ya to kandremenya seken tan.”
Eme oro luhi Rebeka eme, ano oro lelen iy, “Ou aseken ala hawe ndreh kede-eh de bwe?” Eme badeh iy anya eh, “Ehe, jo aseken ta ili.”
Eme badeh oro tiye iy, ma hawe oro badih ta tondrok iy ala hawe iy lau ta lahou ta Abraham ma lau tan.
Ano oro batanau ma tiye tan, “Nadu tine aso, lundriyem kasahan sola wa-iralou ano wa-iralou, ma lundriyem oro kadai lau ta amwekes lomondra ndra-in i toro!”
Ano badeh Rebeka hawe badih tan badeh alokou oro ano badeh sawei kamel i hamon hawe oro lau. Eme oro lau ta lahou andrei Rebeka ma oro au.
Aisik badeh udu Negeb ndrame ndra-en Ber Lahai Roi.
Iy edek leleyah ili lobwidiu na beyeh eme madan anya kili badeh iy anyolom iri kamel adek ame mirihik.
Rebeka anyolom eme loken iy atou Aisik. Eme iy udu bwele-e kamel eme andri,
ma ndremenya oro lau ta lahou ta Abraham, “Are lau edek udu lobwidiu len eme, nyaha le to dah?” Eme iy lau ta lahou dah anya eh, “I doh Aisik.” Eme badeh Rebeka kuhi kolau su-i badan ma batun.
Ano lau ta lahou ta Abraham badeh asehek nyala Aisik ta lakou mari iy amwekes,
