Eme Aisik kuhi iy ili bolo asiu balei ta tinen Sara, ma iy andrei Rebeka i udun. Rebeka asahan udun ma iy aseken iy labai; ki buku none tinen imek badeh iy babudon bwe ai, badih ta seben iy udu aliy.
Abraham sudi badih ari ja nyaran Katura.
Eme badeh iy atehei nadun oro badeh Simran, Joksan, Medan, Midiyen, Isbak ma hawe Su-ah.
Seba hawe Dedan badeh tama uru badeh Joksan; ya lundriye Dedan oro badeh aloh Asura hawe aloh Letusa ma hawe Le-uma.
Ya nadu Midiyen oro badeh Epah, Eper, Hanok, Abida ma hawe Elda-ah. Oro doh bu-u oro badeh Katura.
Abraham badeh atehei lakou tan mari badeh i ta nadun Aisik.
Hawe iy udu ndra loken kahis le badeh, iy atehei lakou rayah i ta nadun ta udun ta nyeu ma tiye oro au a len ta lewa nadun Aisik. Oro ado munyak loboho an eme loken.
Abraham udu i alon handru ma jaha tan badeh asahan rinek ndru lunoh limeh (175).
Eme Abraham jaha tan i solo-an labai ano aden taku ma iy imek; iu i hawe tubun oro.
Eme badeh nadun uru, Aisik hawe Isma-el badeh ahi iy udu munu bek Makpelah mirihik ta Mamre udu manan ta Epron nadu Sohar badu Hita,
munyak le mene Abraham sihinei bwena badu mine iri Hita. Abraham badeh ahi iy udu hawe udun Sara.
Ano hamon ta Abraham ndramak badeh, Kindrei atehei nyosowan i ta nadun Aisik. Iy manyah badeh udu mirihik ta Ber Lahai Roi.
I dah badeh sare nadu Abraham Isma-el, nadun ta badih ta lahou ta Sara nyaran Haga badu Ijip.
Ya i dah badeh nyara nadu Isma-el oro, Kadok badeh Nebayot, Kedar, Adbe-el, Mibsam,
Misma, Dumah, Masa,
Hadat, Tema, Jetur, Napis ma hawe Kedemah.
I doh badeh nyara nadu Isma-el oro. Nyara oro lau ma ronoh la-uh doh badeh asahan boho kamen ma ronoh la-uh, in hamon ta ndrahu manyah udu kon ma ta tekedek tiri.
Isma-el badeh udu winiya jaha tan asahan rinek tonoh ndro taloh (137). Aden taku badeh ma iy imek iu i hawe tubun oro bwena.
Lundriyen oro badeh manyah ado loboho Habila ili taku Sur mirihik ta kobek badu Ijip, i buku none ou adek ala loboho Aseriya. Oro badeh manyah are len labai, ta lundriye Abraham oro.
I dah badeh sare nadu Abraham Aisik. Abraham badeh atehei Aisik,
ano Aisik jaha tan asahan hanoh (40) badeh iy sudi nadu Betu-el Rebeka. (iy badu Aram badu Mesopotamiya nadu tine Leban).
Rebeka badeh kis iy bato-ou nah bwe, eme Aisik badeh amwekes salom i nyaran i ta Laban. Eme Laban badeh anuhun salom tan, eme ndrine Rebeka i tinan.
Eme uru nah are ndrinen badeh nyokolokon eme ma iy anya, “I buku sah lakou dah asahan tek?” Eme iy lelen Laban.
Eme Laban tiye i tan, “Kon tinan munyak badeh udu ndrinem, Ma uru lau ma la-uh ado ndrinem kameh atalan; Iy ari kameh i boto-on labai ja ta iy ari, Ma iy bwele-en kameh i ta asore i bahan.”
Eme badeh len eme mirihik ta iy anya kedeu nadun keme len, badeh uru mwimwir ado ndrinen.
Iy eme len bwena badeh badan saraman ma lamin solo-an; eme uru tondrohani nyaran Iso.
Ano ja badeh nadu tinen in hamon eme len ja badeh, minen tawi bwisimwe-e kati Iso. Eme nyaran badeh i Jekop. Aisik badeh jaha tan asahan ndro tonoh (60) eh, Rebeka atehei uru ame len.
Uru ma la-uh badeh a tinan ma Iso badeh asahan ndramak ta mwi. Iy ndramak ta edek i lokei. Arile Jekop badeh ndramak bohon bwe, iy badu bolo iri asiu balei le.
Aisik badeh aseken Iso, tasah Iso badeh atiye katin haka badu lokei eme, ya iy aimon, ya Rebeka badeh aseken Jekop.
Len ari badeh Jekop badeh amwekes ndranoh, eme Iso badeh edek udu lokei eme badeh iy imeson handru.
Eme iy tiye ta Jekop, “Suwi, se ndranoh saraman badeh keme jo kaimon. Jo ndrameson!” (eme badeh aloh iy Idom moson saraman).
Eme Jekop anya eh, “Badeh jo ki kadok eh?”
Eme Iso tiye, “Ou anyolom, jo kimek ai! Kadok badeh ari sasah tek?”
Arile Jekop anya, “Ou tandrakan bwena op.” Eme badeh iy tandrakan iy, ma atehei Jekop asahan kadok.
Ano badeh Jekop andrei jabi ramen rayah ma ndranoh ndronoha lentil i nan ma iy aimon ma iy a-un gwa ano iy suri iy ma iy iu. Iso badeh ndrakahei tanan mwasin nane ndra-au.
Ano badeh munyak doh nyamon bwe, i buku none len bwena Abraham mene i ndra loken. Eme Aisik badeh ili hawe kabin badu Pilistin, Abimelek udu Gerar.
Eme badeh Laban asahan hawen tiye, “Ou sala Ijip, ou manyah ado munyak jo ndrasehek tam.
Ou ado munyak dah ado sese, jo kameh udu hawem ma jo kameh atehei nyosowan i tam. Jo kameh edeu tam hawe edeu ta lundriyem oro ta munyak dah ma jo kameh leheya tandrakan tek handru mene i ta tama Abraham.
Jo kameh amwekes lundriyem oro a sola, solo-a ndrau badu kandrah ma edeu munyak mari dah i toro, ma eme iri kon munyak tinan mari kameh ndremenya jo ta kadeu nyosowan ki la-u iri, i buku none jo edeu nyososwan i ta lundriyem oro dah,
tasah Abraham badeh anuhun bohok ma hawe anuhun batanau tek.”
Eme Aisik badeh manyah udu Gerar udu gwek.
Eme oro lau badu kon doh badeh ndremenya Aisik ta udun, eme iy badeh inoh, ma iy anya, “Iy badeh nadu tine.” Iy lomondra badeh i buku doh, Rebeka badeh konen labai eme koro-an iri lau badu kon doh kadai iy, tasah na Rebeka.
Aisik udu kon doh luluwen eme badeh, Abimelek kabin badu Pilistin anyolom udu mada kadam i andri badeh iy anyolom Aisik badeh awadei Rebeka.
Eme Abimelek luhi Aisik eme ano iy tiye, “Rebeka badeh udum handru! I buku sah ou anya, iy nadu tinem?” Eme badeh Aisik anya, “Jo lomondra koro-an na iy kameh iri kadai jo.”
Ano badeh Abimelek tiye, “Ou amwekes sasah eme taso dah. I buku none ari ndramak katawi udum nane, i dah nane aso ato-ou maha ta aliy, arile kati lakou dah badeh ou.”
Eme Abimelek badeh tiye sahou boto-on i tiri lau mari: “Ou are lau amwekes kandriyen ndra-in i ta ndramak dah hawe udun kameh, ou amak.”
Ano Aisik badeh tahi baso udu munyak doh, eme uni udu bolo oro baso ari ari nane iy tahi doh, badeh oro ari ari ato-ou rinek rinek sakalawi bwena mene ndra-au, tasah Laban atehei nyosowan i la-un.
Iy badeh tan lakou solo-an handru, eme ma lakou tan badeh asahan solo-an eme iy asahan ndramak ari tan lakou solo-an labai.
Iy badeh katin haka tan solo-an labai ma iri lau ta lahou tan solo-an ale, eme badeh mada iri Pilistin alikis.
Eme iri gwa li mene iri lau ta lahou ta taman Abraham mene a-eh, badeh iri Pilistin ala sokei na ndren.
Ano Abimelek anya, “Aisik, ou au ta mada aso; ou badeh tam lakou solo-an labai ma hawe ou ndra boto-on labai.”
Eme Aisik suri iy ma iy iu ta kon doh, eme iy ili manyah udu nyamak Gerar.
Ano badeh Aisik ili ja ihiy gwa li rayah ja mene taman Abraham udu ndra loken a-eh, mene iri Pilistin sokei, udu kona Abraham imek. Eme iy aloh nyara iri gwa li i buku none taman mene tondrohani.
Ano badeh oro lau ta lahou ta Aisik amwekes lahou ado nyamak doh, eme oro takalahei gwa sakaliye bolo ndren.
Eme oro lau ta tondrok katin haka badu Gerar badeh andres hawe oro lau ta tondrok katin haka ta Aisik anya, gwa doh toro. Eme iy tondrahani nyara gwa doh Isek, moson “Andres,” tasah oro badeh andres ta aliy hawen.
Ano badeh oro ahi ari ja, eme oro andra-i manyuwa aliy le; eme tondrohani badeh Sitnah, moson, “Oro ta andra-i badu bilisiu.”
Eme iy ili ja ihi ari ja, eme badeh oro bandra-i ta aliy bwe ai. Eme iy tondrohani nyaran badeh Rehobot, moson “Ndra winiyan ai.” Eme iy tiye, “Laban ndratehei seken ndra winiya to ai, ya to winiyan asahan amwe-es ai.”
Ano udu doh badeh iy iu ili loken ili Bersiba.
Eme na ben doh badeh Laban asahan hawen tiye, “Jo dah badeh jo Kindrei ta tamam Abraham. Ou sanoh, jo udu hawem; tasah ta i lau ta lahou tek Abraham le, jo kameh atehei nyosowan i tam ma jo kameh edeu kane lundriyem oro kameh a sola.”
Eme udu doh badeh Aisik tukumwi bek i loke ta salom ma aloh nyara Laban, ma udu doh le badeh iy tahi asiu balei ma oro lau ta lahou tan ahi gwa li.
Ano udu badeh, Abimelek hawe ndramak ta budon tan Ahusat hawe nadramak ta mwena ta bahun tan Pikol badeh oro ado Gerar ame.
Eme Aisik ndremenya oro, “Ado badeh mene lomondra ndra-in tado udu tek ma ado sobolei jo eme len, ya ado anya kame dah kabosah?”
Eme oro tiye, “Aso badeh anyolom Laban badeh udu hawem eme aso tiye, To badeh kamwekes budon ta sahou randra le kudu ndrokowa to.
Aso aseken ou tandrakan, ta ou badeh samwekes bahun same taso, i buku none aso samwekes sawek tam. Aso amwekes mwasin i tam ma ou manyah mwasin le. Ya eme na dah aso ndratanan ndramwe-es ai, Laban badeh atehei nyosowan udu tam.”
Eme badeh Aisik mwesekei tine nyamon oro aimon ma a-un gwa.
Ano na mandraben badeh uru ma la-uh amwekes sahou randra le ma tandrakan i la-un, ano Aisik batanau oro ma oro kawas tan au ai.
Na len doh badeh oro lau ta lahou ta Aisik asahan, ya tiye nyalan ta gwa li mene oro a-eh. Oro anya, “Aso badeh ndrasilahei gwa.”
Eme tondrohani nyara gwa li doh, Siba moson “Tandrakan.” I don adeh san kon tinan Bersiba akohok nyaran adeh.
Len Iso jaha tan asahan hanoh badeh iy sudi Judit uru Basemat, uru badu Hita. Judit badeh nadu Beri ya Basemat badeh nadu Elon.
Uru badeh mwesekei manyah ta Aisik hawe Rebeka bado mwasin bwe.
Ano len Aisik i alon handru ma boto-on tan ano badeh, madan agwah ma iy winiyan banyolom kon bwe, eme iy aloh i ta nadun kadok Iso, eme iy tiye tan, “Naduk.” Eme iy anya, “Jo kada-ah.”
Eme Aisik tiye, “Jo kada-ah badeh ndra alon ai, jo bala tanan len ta imek tek bwe.
Ou andrei bonara ma nyah tam ma ou a lokei adai ari katin haka ndriliu keme.
Ou juhi nyamon simidin badeh ma ou tiyani keme, eme ya jo udu ndra loken kahis le, jo katehei nyosowan ki tam.”
Ya Rebeka badeh ndranuhun sahou nane Aisik asehek i ta nadun Iso. Eme Iso iu ili lokei orou katin haka badeh,
Rebeka tiye i ta nadun Jekop, “Jo badeh anuhun tamam tiye i ta nadu tinem Iso anya,
iy badeh kidi ari katin haka ano iy kajuhiy nyamon simidin badeh kili nan iy kaimon, eme ya udu mada Laban badeh iy katehei nyosowan ki tan, koro-an iy kimek.
Eme ya, naduk Jekop ou anuhun kamwe-es, ma ou an hamon ta sahou tek jo asehek tam dah:
Ou ala kuhi me kasen la-uh keme ya jo kajuhiy ma kamwesekei ki simidin kamwenen ta seken ta tamam.
Ano badeh ou andrei ki na tamam kaimon, ndrakan iy in ndra loken le, eme iy katehei nyosowan kewek tam.”
Eme Jekop tiye i ta tinen Rebeka, “Arile nadu tine Iso badeh lamin solo-an ya jo badeh badak lamin bwe.
Ya i buku none tama kanyokar badak kameh, i dah kameh iy anya jo wasai, ma iy kameh madan andra-i tek ma jo kameh winiyan bakohok nyosowan bwe.”
Eme badeh tinen tiye i tan, “Naduk, ou anuhun le jo, ou ala andrei me keme, losen tam badeh kameh jo ato-ou.”
Eme iy ili andrei eme badeh atehei i mine tinen, eme iy juhiy nyamon i simidin, amwenen le ta seken ta taman Aisik.
Ano badeh Rebeka andrei awin ta kadok tan udu bolo asiu eme, atehei i la-u bwaneh tan Jekop.
Ano iy andrei ku-i me asiniy i bohan ma balen.
Ano iy atehei nyamon simidin nane dah i mine Jekop ma jabi ramen nane lowosani dah.
Eme iy ili hawe taman badeh iy anya, “Tama.” Eme taman anya, “Abo naduk, Ou are badeh?”
Eme Jekop anya, “Jo tama jo kadok tam, lakou ou nane tiye jo ndramwesekei ai, ou suri ou ma ou aimon katin haka tek, eme ya ou adeu nyosowan keme la-uk.”
Eme Aisik anya, “Naduk ou takalahei suwi i buku sah?” Eme iy tiye, “Laban Kindrei badeh atehei len mwasin tek.”
Ano Aisik tiye i tan, “Naduk, ou ame mirihik ya jo kanyokar badam, ou badeh naduk Iso handru de bwe.”
Eme Jekop i hawe taman Aisik, ano Aisik anyokar iy eme Aisik anya, “Ei, nyaro balen i buku none Jekop arile bohan badeh boha Iso.”
Iy bala tanan iy bala mwasin bwe, tasah lami bohan badeh i buku none nadu tinen Iso; eme badeh iy atehei nyosowan i tan.
Eme Aisik ndremenya, “Ou dah naduk Iso handru?” Eme iy anya, “Ehe, jo handru.”
Ano Aisik anya, “Naduk ou tiyani katin haka ndrajuhiy keme jo kaimon, eme ya jo kedeu nyosowan ki tam.” Eme Jekop bwese-ei ili iy aimon; ano iy andrei wa-in ili ma iy a-un le.
Ano Taman Aisik anya, “Ou ame dah ma ou atamas jo.”
Eme iy ili badeh atamas iy. Eme Aisik ihon mahu awin tan badeh, ma iy atehei nyosowan i tan ma tiye, “Mahu naduk badeh i buku none kanyeu badu bilin. Laban atehei nyosowan i ta aliy.
Ya Kindrei atehei tam rahu badu kandrah, ma munyak ki mwasin. Iy badeh kedeu tam kalom ma wa-in solo-an.
Ya iri kon munyak tinan badeh katudun ou, ma iri lau kaluh ki tam, ma ou atondrok nadu tinem oro, ma nah badu ndrine tinem oro kaluh ki tam. Ya oro are amwekes maha i tam badeh kakohok isi ma oro are adeu nyosowan i tam kameh akohok nyosowan ale.”
Aisik atehei nyosowan i la-u Jekop ano badeh Jekop iu i len ta taman le badeh, nadu tinen Iso udu lokei eme.
Eme iy juhiy nyamon simidin ma bwese-ei i na taman. Ano badeh iy tiye i ta taman, “Tama, ou suri ou ma ou aimon katin haka, eme ya ou atehei nyosowan tam keme la-uk.”
Eme badeh taman ndremenya Iso, “Ou are dah?” Eme iy anya, “Jo kadok tam Iso.”
Eme Aisik totoreh ma iy anya, “Are lau nane andrei katin haka nane tiyani eme dah? Jo baraimon barano ai, ou bame bwe le, eme jo ndratehei nyosowan ndra la-un ma i dah kameh erah ai.”
Eme Iso anuhun boho taman badeh, iy tabaniy bohon i ta ndrelen. Eme iy anya, “Tama jo ale, jo ale ou atehei nyosowan ki la-uk!”
Arile taman tiye, “Nadu tinem eme wendreyani jo ma iy ndrandrei nyosowan ndra la-un.”
Ano Iso anya, “Iy Jekop doh? Iy ndra bukuhiy no-ok san la-uh ai: iy asahan kadok ano na dah ja badeh, iy andrei nyosowan tek?” Ano iy ndremenya, “Nyosowan rayah ou tawiy udu kede-eh tek de bwe?”
Eme Aisik tiye i ta Iso, “Jo badeh atehei Jekop atondrok ou ma mwesekei lowan oro badeh asahan lau ta lahou tan. Ma jo badeh ndratehei kalom hawe wa-in ndra tan. Saba lakou udu kede-eh ja kameh jo kedeu tam, naduk?”
Eme Iso tiye i ta taman, “Tama ou ari udu kede-eh, ou nyosowani keme tek. Ou nyosowani jo ale!” Ano ma iy eden bohon i loken.
Eme badeh taman Aisik tiye i tan, “Manyah tam kameh udu len labai ta lakou mari badu munyak, Rahu badu kandrah kameh bawek tam bwe Ma munyak tam kameh mada lihin bwe.
Ou kameh manyah na boto-on ta beteleu, Ma ou kameh asahan bonyo-ou ta nadu tinem. Arile i buku none ou a bolosen badeh kameh Ou kameh atobwak ta are baha tondrok tan.”
Iso badeh bwalen atou Jekop handru en, tasah taman badeh ndratehei nyosowan ndra la-un. Eme iy lomondra le udu tan, “Len ta tama badeh ndrame bakep; ano badeh jo kameh idi Jekop imek.”
Eme len Rebeka, anuhun lau tiye boho nadun kadok Iso badeh, iy suni lau tiye Jekop eme ma iy tiye, “Nadu tinem Iso badeh ndrasehek ta anya kidi ou amak.
Eme badeh naduk ou anuhun bohok: ou badeh atobwak ala hawe nadu tine Leban udu kon Haran.
Ou ala ado gwek winiya ndrine nadu tinem kamwunum,
ma ndra iy kamani sasah ou mine amwekes i badan. Ano jo barasuni lau barawek barakohok ou barame hamon. Bwe kameh ah ma la-uh kamak ai!”
Ano badeh Rebeka tiye ta Aisik, “Jo ndrawoyah ta udu Iso badu Hita kede-eh. I buku none Jekop kasudi ari badih ki buku doh jo kameh imek.”
Eme badeh Aisik luhi Jekop eme ano iy batanau iy ma atehei nyosowan i tan: “Ou badeh sasoh badih badu Kenan, ndri-i.
Ou badeh ales ala Padan Aram, ala asiu ta tama tinem Betu-el. Ou ala sudi ari badih badu bolo nadu Leban nadu tine tinem oro badeh.
Ma Kindrei badeh kudu hawem ma katehei nyosowan ki la-um ma lundriyem ki sola ma kasahan lau rakon buruwen.
Hawe iy badeh katehei nyosowan ki ta lundriyem oro, i buku none iy atehei nyosowan i ta Abraham. Ma hawe ou andrei lakou mari badu munyak ou manyah ado aliy dah, lakou mene Kindrei atehei i ta Abraham.”
Ano Aisik badeh tiye Jekop ili Padan Aram i hawe Leban iu ndrine Betu-el. Leban badeh nadu tine Rebeka ya Rebeka badeh tine Jekop uru Iso.
Eme Iso badeh ndratanan Aisik badeh ndratehei nyosowan ndra ta Jekop ma tiye iy ndra-au ndrala Padan Aram ta kasoh badih badu doh, na len iy edeu nyosowan i tan ma batanau iy badeh sasoh badih badu Kenan.
Eme Iso ale tanan taman uru badeh ndratiye iy ndra-au ndrala kon Padan Aram.
Ano badeh Iso badeh i tanan ai, ta Aisik badeh baseken badih badu Kenan bwe;
Eme Iso ili hawe Isma-el edek ndrine Abraham. Ya Isma-el badeh nadun badih la-uh udu aliy. Uru badeh nyara uru Mahalat hawe Nebayot. Eme badeh Iso sudi Mahalat i tan.
Eme Jekop udu Bersiba eme len ma iy iu ili Haran.
Iy edek ili kon ari, an i andri ma iy amadin. eme iy andrei bek ari i nyara kason tan badeh ma iy amadin.
Eme badeh iy ameh ma iy atou kandren udu andri i kandrah ma atou iri angelo ta Kindrei badeh adek andri loken bada kandren dah.
Eme udu bwele-e kandren badeh Laban udu aliy tiye, “Jo dah jo Laban Kindrei ta tamam Abraham ma Kindrei ta Aisik. Jo kameh edeu munyak ou amadin ado aliy dah kameh i ta lundriyem oro.
Lundriyem oro kameh a sola i buku none kasu ndren badu munyak ma oro kameh aseker ala kum, ala lan, ma loboho an i andri. Iri lau mari badu munyak kameh jo edeu nyosowan i la-u iri tasah na ou hawe lundriyem oro.
Ou kameh heh a heh jo kameh udu hawem ma madak kameh udu tam ano jo le kameh, tiyaniy ou ame hamon ja ame munyak dah. Jo kameh winiyan bakahei ou bwe, winiyan le lakou jo mene tandrakan ou barasahan.”
Ano Jekop amak badeh iy lomondra, “Handru labai jo ndratanan, Laban kede-eh udu kon dah.”
Eme iy inoh labai ma iy anya, “Kon dah i buku sah handru! Handru labai i dah asiu ta Kindrei, i dah badeh mada san ta i bolo kandrah labai.”
Eme na mandraben badeh Jekop andrei kason ta batun dah tutuni udu loken i buku bek ta salom ano iy solowei ndrelekei i bwele-en ta kalem hawe ta ndrahu salom ta Kindrei.
Kon doh bwena aloh Lus arile iy aloh ja badeh Betel, moson, “Asiu ta Kindrei.”
Ano badeh Jekop tandrakan, “I buku none Kindrei udu hawek ma madan udu tek, udu bolo tekedek tek dah badeh iy kedeu nek nyamon ma kalawik kolau.
Eme ya jo kedek kili asiu ta tama ma mwasin le, ano badeh Laban barasahan Kindrei tek.
Ma bek jo tutuni udu loken kodo-oh badeh kameh asahan asiu ta Kindrei. Ma udu bolo lakou mari ou adeu eme tek badeh kameh jo edeu sese ja i hamon i tam, i buku none ronoh, badeh kameh jo edeu ari ewek tam.”
Ano Jekop edek ili badeh, asahan munyak tiri lau badu an eme loken.
Eme iy eme badeh atou gwa li ari badeh udu manan ma oro sipsip tulumuk manyah ado andri awudiy. Iri katin haka badeh a-un le gwa doh, gwa doh badeh bek malahan badeh turuki madan.
I buku none len iri katin haka ame, badeh kameh iri lau ta tondrok katin haka kameh suri madan iu, ano iri a-us wa-i iri gwa. Ano ja kameh iri tundruwi bek ta madan i hamon i bwele-en.
Eme Jekop badeh lelen oro lau ta tondrok katin haka, “Ado nadu tine ado badu heh?” Eme oro anya, “Aso badu Haran.”
Eme iy tiye, “Ado tanan Leban, iy ala nadu tubu Nahor en?” Eme oro anya, “Ehe, aso tanan iy.”
Ano Jekop ndremenya, “Iy mwasin de bwe?” Eme oro anya, “Ehe iy udu mwasin, ya nadun Rejel asa ma sipsip tan eme ah.”
Eme Jekop anya, “Ado kanyolom an udu ndra loken kahis; iri katin haka winiyan bame se bwe le kahis. Ado ka-us gwa ki toro sipsip ma ado kasariye oro ka hamon ta bwidiu ja.”
Eme oro tiye, “Aso winiyan bwe, winiya oro sipsip kase ya katukumwi bek ta madan ki-iu ta mada gwa. Ano badeh aso bara-us gwa barala tiri sipsip.”
Eme iy asehek sahou i toro kahis le badeh, Rejel ma sipsip ta taman oro ame. Iy badih ta atondrok sipsip le.
Eme Jekop anyolom ili badeh atou Rejel ma sipsip ta kalin Leban eme. Eme iy ili badeh atuwi bek ta mada gwa iu ma a-us gwa i wa-i sipsip ta kalin oro.
Ano badeh Jekop tawi Rejel badeh ma iy tabani bohon i ta ndrelen.
Eme iy asehek nyala Rejel ta iy badeh nadu Rebeka lowa taman ari ai. Ano Rejel sakaliye ili kon badeh tiye ta taman.
Eme iy anuhun le badeh, i doh kalin, nadu nadu tinen, eme iy ibotatahan ili atou iy. Eme iy tawi iy ma iy sekesek iy ano badeh iy kuhi iy ma uru au ala asiu. Eme Jekop asehek nyalan ta lakou mari.
Ano badeh Leban tiye tan, “Ou badeh to rabuk amwenen.” Jekop badeh udu hawen badeh bun ari,
eme badeh Leban tiye i ta Jekop, “Ou kede-ek lowak, eme ou badeh sabudon anya i dah kameh ou amwekes lahou tek leleyah bwe? Ou tiye tek, sihinem badeh na sasah handru.”
Leban badeh nadun badih, badeh la-uh, iy aluh badeh nyaran Liya ya iy sah badeh nyaran Rejel.
Liya badeh madan mwasin, arile Rejel badeh konen labai, i buku tariye ka-ukon.
Ya Jekop badeh aseken Rejel labai, eme iy anya, “Jo kameh ibo gok tam jaha ndro taloh ta sah tam Rejel.”
Eme Leban anya, “Mwasin handru ta Rejel badeh ki tam, jo bwalek iy i ta ari lau buku liliy. Ou ado hawek ado.”
Eme Jekop badeh amwekes lahou ta Leban jaha ma ndro taloh ta akohok Rejel. Iy amwekes lahou boto-on ya eme jaha ndro taloh doh badeh i buku none len la-uh le, tasah iy aseken Rejel labai.
Ano Jekop tiye i ta Leban, “Kabwe ai, len ndrano ai, ya uduk keme ya jo kamadin iy.”
Eme Leban nyuruwini iri lau mari badu kon ame ma iri amwekes tine nyamon.
Arile kon eben badeh iy atehei nadun Liya badeh ili hawe Jekop ma uru amadin uru.
Ma Leban atehei badih ari nyaran Silpah badeh i badih ta lahou ta Liya.
Kon anya kaleu badeh Rejel bwe, Liya. Eme Jekop tiye ta Leban, “Ou amwekes sasah eme tek dah? Jo amwekes lahou tam badeh ta Rejel labai? Ou wasai jo ta sasah?”
Eme Leban anya, “Kandriyen tahi badu dah badeh i bahan winiyan bala tasou bwena ta iy bwele-en bwe.
Ou abe-en len ta molak sandre ari kano op, ano Rejel barawek. Arile, ou amwekes lahou tek jaha ndro taloh ja.”
Eme Jekop mwesekei i buku le aliy. Eme iy udu hawe Liya badeh sandre ari ano badeh iy atehei Rejel i udun ja.
Ano Leban badeh atehei badih ta lahou ari i nyara badih ta lahou ta Rejel, nyaran badeh Bilhah.
Eme Jekop badeh amadin Rejel ale, ma iy aseken iy labai ja ta Liya. Eme iy amwekes lahou ta Leban jaha ma ndro taloh ta Rejel.
Na len Laban anyolom Jekop badeh baseken Liya handru bwe, iy mwesekei iy badeh ato-ou nah ja. Arile Rejel badeh iy kis.
Eme Liya ndrinen i tinan eme badeh iy atehei kadok tondrohani nyaran Ruben. Eme iy anya, “Laban badeh ndratou maha-an tek ma i dah kameh uduk aseken jo ai.”
Ano ja badeh ndrinen i tinan ja ma iy tuwi nah mwan, tondrohani nyaran badeh Simiyon. Eme iy anya, “Laban badeh anyolom Jekop baseken jo bwe, eme iy atehei tek nah ja dah.”
Ano ja badeh ndrinen i tinan ja, iy tuwi nah mwan ja ma tondrohani nyaran Lebi. Eme iy anya, “I dah kameh uduk kameh budon tan abadok tek, tasah jo badeh atehei nah mwan taloh i tan.”
Ano ja badeh ndrinen i tinan ja badeh iy tuwi nah mwan ari ja, eme iy tondrohani nyaran badeh, Juda. Eme iy anya, “Na len dah kameh jo kameh atudun Laban.” Ano badeh iy ano ta ato-ou nah.
Ano na len Rejel anyolom iy bato-ou nah nadu Jekop bwe badeh, eme madan alikis nadu tinen. Eme badeh iy tiye i ta Jekop, “Ou atehei nah ki ndrinek, bwe kameh jo imek ai!”
Eme Jekop ibolosen i tan eme iy tiye, “Jo winiyan bakohok ndrahu Kindrei bwe, iy le badeh baramwekes ou barato-ou nah!”
Ano badeh Rejel anya, “I doh badih ta lahou tek Bilhah doh. Ou amadin iy ya iy kato-ou nah keme tek. Eme na iy le badeh lundriyek oro kasola.”
Eme iy atehei Bilhah badeh i nyara udu Jekop ma Jekop amadin iy, eme ma iy tuwi nah mwan.
<range>
Ano badeh Rejel tiye, “Kindrei badeh ndramwesekei sahou ma iy ndratehei seken tek; iy badeh anyolom tikisiy tek ma iy atehei tek nah mwan.” Eme nah doh badeh tondrohani nyaran badeh Dan.
Ano badih ta lahou ta Rejel ndrinen tinan ja ma iy tuwi nadu Jekop mwan ari ja.
Eme Rejel anya, “Jo badeh amwekes lahou boto-on labai hawe nadu tine eme ma jo ndrasakalawi iy.” Eme iy tondrohani nyaran badeh Nabtali.
Eme Liya anyolom iy badeh bato-ou nah bwe badeh, eme iy andrei badih ta lahou tan Silpah badeh atehei iy i ta Jekop i buku none udun.
Eme Silpah tuwi nah nadu Jekop.
Eme Liya badeh anya, “Jo ndramwe-es ai,” eme iy tondrohani nyaran Gat.
Ano Silpah badih ta lahou ta Liya tuwi nadu Jekop mwan ari ja.
Eme iy tiye, “Jo badeh sekesek labai! I dah kameh iri badih kameh aloh jo, ‘Sekesek.’” Eme iy tondrohani nyaran Aser.
Na len bwidiu wit uni badeh Ruben ili lokei badeh ndruni kei ta nah aloh mandrake, eme iy kuhiy eme atehei i mine tinen Liya. Eme Rejel eme iy anya, “Liya, nek rayah mandrake ta nadum keme.”
Arile i tan badeh iy anya, “Ou mene ndrandrei uduk ka-i ai. Ya i dah kameh mandrake kewek la-un ale?” Eme Rejel tiye i buku doh, “I buku none ou atehei mandrake ta nadum, ou kameh amadin hawe Jekop na ben kameh.”
Eme Jekop udu lokei eme na beyeh badeh, Liya ili aturuk iy, eme Liya tiye, “Jo badeh andrei mandrake ta naduk, atehei ndra na Rejel eme ya na ben kameh ou ame amadin jo.” Eme badeh iy ili badeh amadin iy na ben.
Eme Kindrei anuhun Liya, eme Liya ndrinen i tinan ma iy atehei kuwim tan nadu Jekop.
Eme Liya anya, “Jo badeh atehei badih ta lahou tek i ta uduk, eme Kindrei badeh atehei nah i sihinek.” Eme tondrohani nyaran badeh Isakar.
Ano badeh Liya ndrinen i tinan ja iy tuwi nadu Jekop ja So-on tan.
Ano Liya anya, “Kindrei badeh ndratehei tek lakou mwasin labai. Na dah kameh uduk kameh anyolom jo udu mwasin ta madan ai, ma iy kameh masiye jo, tasah jo badeh ndratuwi nah onoh ndra nadun.” Eme iy tondrohani nyaran badeh Sebulun.
Ano udu ja badeh iy tuwi badih ma tondrohani nyaran badeh Dinah.
Ano badeh Kindrei lomondrani Rejel; iy anuhun iy, eme iy mwesekei ndrom ta ato-ou nah ja amwe-es.
Eme ma ndrinen i tinan ma iy tuwi mwan. Ano iy tiye, “Kindrei badeh ndramwesekei tikisiy tek badeh ndrano.”
Eme iy tondrohani nyaran badeh Josep, ano ma iy tiye, “Jo aseken Kindrei kedeu tek rayah nah ja.”
Rejel atehei Josep eme len ano badeh Jekop tiye ta Leban, “Ou satawi jo, jo anya ki-iu ki kon tek.
Jo mene amwekes lahou tam ta uduk uru ma la-uh ma oro nah. Ou atehei oro kame ma jo ki-iu ki len tam. Ou badeh tanam jo mwasin labai len jo amwekes lahou tam.”
Arile Leban anya, “Ou badeh mwasin ta madak ya ou winiyan ba-au bwe. Ou ado. Jo badeh ndrada kau, Laban atehei nyosowan eme tek tasah na ou.”
Ano badeh iy tiye le, “Abo, sabe ou aseken jo kisih ou.”
Eme badeh Jekop anya, “Ou tanam lahou jo amwekes, ma san jo atondrok iri katin haka tam udu mwasin labai.
Lakou tam sola bwe len jo eme, arile na dah ndra sola, tasah Laban atehei minen udu la-um, tasah na jo; ma loboho heh jo edek i aliy. Arile na dah badeh jo anya kasilah lakou ta aseben asiu tek ai.”
Eme iy lelen, “Jo katehei sasah tam?” Eme Jekop anya, “Ou sanyohan jo lakou. I buku none ou aseken tanan tek doh; jo badeh kameh atondrok katin haka tam ilih le:
Jo kameh anyolom iri katin haka tam mari, ma jo kameh lebelei iri sipsip kasen bokodon ma hawe iri me busuwen are len. I doh sihinek ai.
Eme ya i buku none len hamon ou kameh i tanam jo badeh ta wasai bwe, buku na ben ou anya ame adeu sihinek. I buku none ari me belen udu bolon tek ma hawe i buku none ari sipsip kasen bokodon udu bolon tek, badeh jo bene-ei tam ai.”
Eme Leban anya, “Mwasin. Ki buku none bohom baden.”
Arile na len doh le badeh Leban lebelei iri me mwan busuwen ma hawe iri me badih busuwen ma iri sipsip bokodon. Ano iy atehei nadun oro ta atondrok.
Ano badeh Leban atehei len taloh udu ndrokowan hawe Jekop ta adek. Ya Jekop badeh atondrok kati haka rayah ta Leban ai.
Ano badeh Jekop tatasei andra kei popola ma almon rayah ma kei badeh alim ku-i kei winiya belen asahan bada iri.
Eme badeh tatahiy andra kei doh badeh udu bwena ta bwekei ta gwa tiri katin haka. Iy tatahiy udu doh, tasah iri katin haka amwekes mada bun tiri na len iri ame a-un gwa. Eme iri katin haka kanyolom badeh iri kales kala ka-un gwa.
Ya i buku none iri me amwekes mada bun tiri are bwena ta kei dah, i dah kameh iri adeu nah bokodon hawe nah busuwen.
Ano badeh Jekop lebelei iri sipsip badeh are len labai ta me, ya batala iri badeh ili tiri katin haka busuwen ta Leban. Eme san doh badeh iri katin haka tan bala bolon ta Leban bwe.
I buku none iri katin haka boto-on mada bun tiri asahan badeh, Jekop tatahiy andra kei udu bwena ta bwekei ta gwa tiri katin haka eme iri ame amunyau ma iri amwekes mada bun tiri.
Arile iri katin haka boto-on bwe badeh iy batehei iri bala aliy bwe. Eme badeh iri katin haka boto-on bwe baden eh a hawe Leban ai, ya boto-on badeh a hawe Jekop ai.
I san le doh badeh Jekop asahan ndramak tan lakou solo-an labai. Tan badeh iri katin haka solo-an, ma iri lau tan ta lahou solo-an ma hawe iri kamel hawe donki solo-an ado aliy.
Ano badeh Jekop eme anuhun nadu Leban oro asehek anya, “Jekop badeh tan lakou sola kede-eh badeh ta lakou ta tama to le.”
Eme Jekop eme badeh atona kandriyen ta Leban bala buku none mwena mene bwe.
Ano Laban Kindrei tiye ta Jekop, “Ou au a hamon ala munyak ta tamam oro ma ala hawe lowam oro, ya jo kameh madak udu tam.”
Eme iy suni sahou i ta Rejel uru Liya ame hawen ame lobwidiu hawe katin haka udu hawen dah.
Eme iy tiye i turu, “Jo anyolom kandriyen ta tama ah amwekes eme tek bala buku none bwena mene bwe, arile Kindrei ta tama badeh udu hawek.
Ah tana ah, jo badeh amwekes lahou ta tama ah boto-on labai,
arile tama ah badeh mwesekei wasai san ronoh ta anya kisih jo; eme Kindrei badeh bamwesekei lomondra ta amwekes isi eme tek bwe.
I buku none iy katiye, ‘Iri me busuwen badeh sihinem, badeh kameh ma iri katin haka ala bada iri busuwen kameh tam le.’ Ma buku none iy katiye, ‘Iri me torowanan badeh sihinem, badeh kameh ma iri katin haka ala ato-ou bada iri torowanan badeh kameh tam le.’ Oro kasen ala busuwen badeh tek ai.
Eme badeh Kindrei badeh kuhi katin haka ta tamam oro badeh atehei eme tek.
“Na mada bun tiri katin haka ta adeu nah badeh jo ameh. Jo ameh iri me mwan badeh amwekes mada bun hawe iri katin haka torowanan ma hawe busuwen.
I doh badeh angelo ta Kindrei tiye na ameh, anya, ‘Jekop.’ Eme jo anya, ‘Jo kada-ah.’
Eme iy tiye, ‘Ou anyolom ki loke tiri me mwan amwekes mada bun hawe iri katin haka torowanan busuwen kede-eh. Jo le badeh amwekes kandriyen doh, tasah jo badeh ndranyolom kandriyen mari Leban amwekes ewek badam.
Jo dah badeh jo Kindrei mene asahan hawem udu Betel, eme ou mene tutuni bek i loke i buku none kalem ta abudon jo ma ou mene mwitiniy ndrelekei ta olip i bwele-en ma ou tandrakan eme tek. Na len dah badeh ou ruwani kon dah ya ou au ala munyak tam amwenen.’”
Ano Rejel uru Liya tiye, “Aru kameh winiyan bakohok munyak ta tama aru bwe ai.
Iy badeh amwekes aru i buku none lau badu leheleh. Iy atehei aru a ta sisih ma iy ale ndrani sihine aru, mene ndrano.
Handru labai lakou mari Kindrei kuhiy udu hawe tama aru badeh taru ma hawe lundriye aru oro. Ou an hamon ta sasah Kindrei asehek tam badeh.”
Ano Jekop eme, nyahani nadun ma udun uru ala manyah ado bwele-e kamel,
eme iy edek iu sariye iri katin haka tan i bwena tan, ma hawe lakou tan mari badu Padan Aram, edek iu ili hawe taman Aisik ili munyak Kenan.
Ya Leban badeh ndra-au, ndrasan lami iri sipsip, eme badeh Rejel ili badeh bene-ei ndramak, (asehek na sukumada kei) ta taman dah.
Ma ale Jekop badeh batiye tanan ta Leban badu Aram ta oro nane atobwak doh bwe.
Eme iy atobwak ma hawe lakou tan mari ili gwa i bilisiu ili loboho mandrei badu munyak Gileyat.
Udu len la-uh iu, ano i bada len taloh badeh lau tandra-un ta Leban, ta Jekop badeh ndratobwak.
Eme iy kuhi lowan oro a hawen, eme oro sakaniy an hamon toro, eme na len ndro taloh oro ala badeh tawi oro ado munyak Gileyat.
Ano badeh Kindrei asahan ta Leban badu Aram na ameh tiye i tan i buku doh, “Balem kudu tam kamwe-es, ou badeh sandres oro.”
Jekop badeh tahi asiu balei tan badeh udu bolo mandrei Gileyat, amwenen le na len Leban oro lowan ala asos ma oro amadin doh ale.
Ano Leban tiye i ta Jekop, “Ou amwekes sasah dah? Ou badeh ndrawendreyani jo, eme ou tuwi naduk uru i buku none lau ta ateu ta bahun.
I buku sah ou aton le ma ou wendreya le ma ou atobwak? I buku sah ou batandra-un tek bwe. Eme ya ou au ma sekesek ma wari ma ada ndran?
Ou badeh ale batehei jo babose se nadu tubu oro ma hawe naduk uru bwe. Ou amwekes kandriyen dah bamwenen bwe.
Jo badeh jo tek boto-on udu aliy ta amwekes maha ma isi ewek tam; arile na ben badeh Kindrei ta tamam badeh tiye tek, ta jo badeh balek kudu tek kamwe-es, jo badeh sasehek sahou ndra-in o sahou mwasin sawek tam ndri-i labai!
Jo tanan ou badeh koham ndrapwe ta ala kon tam, arile ou badeh ndrabene-ei sukumada kei badu asiu tek.”
Eme Jekop anya, “Jo badeh inoh, jo anya koro-an ou ka tawi nadum uru kado.
Arile i buku none ou silahei are andrei sukumada kei tam badeh iy kimek, ma udu mada lowa talu oro badeh, ou anyolom i buku none ari lakou tam udu bolon tek handru, badeh ou andrei kewek hamon.” Arile Jekop badeh tanan bwe, Rejel badeh andrei sukumada kei nane doh.
Eme badeh Leban asilah bolo asiu balei ta Jekop ano iy i bolon ta Liya ano badeh iy i bolon turu badih ta lahou dah, eme badeh iy batakalei ari lakou bwe. Iy udu asiu balei ta Liya eme len ano iy i bolon ta Rejel.
Rejel badeh andrei sukumada kei badu asiu ta taman badeh, tonei udu baha ndrahu manyah ta udu bwele-e kamel udu bada munyak ma iy manyah udu la-un. Leban badeh silahei bolo asiu balei mari arile iy batakalei ari lakou bwe.
Eme Rejel tiye i ta taman, “Tama, ou sabolosen, jo badeh winiyan bales bare loken bwe; mada bun tek ndrasahan.” Eme iy asilah sukumada kei ta asiu tan, arile iy batakahei bwe.
Eme Jekop i bolosen, Anya, “Sasah jo mwesekei andra-i dah? Saba kandriyen jo mwesekei ya ou ame atikah jo dah?
Na dah ou badeh ndratakalahei bolo lakou tek mari. Ou silahei sasah badu asiu tam jo andrei? Abo, ou atehei keme manan ya lau tam ma lau tek kanyolom, are mwasin.
Jo badeh udu hawem jaha lunoh ai, arile iri sipsip ma me tam badeh baruwe ta ato-ou nah bwe, ma jo badeh baimon ari katin haka tam bwe.
Iri katin haka ndriliu aimon katin haka tam, arile jo bandrei bawek hawem bwe; jo le atehei saluwen. Arile ou badeh andrekei sihinen udu minek ewek na ben na len, buku none amai.
Jo badeh an suluwmi jo na len ma nyala iniy jo na ben, ma jo bakohok matinou bamwenen bwe,
udu le buku doh winiya jaha ma lunoh jo udu asiu tam. Jo badeh amwekes lahou tam ta akohok nadum badih uru jaha ma ronoh hahuw, ano jaha onoh ta katin haka tam. Arile ou wendreyani jo ta adeu sihinek san ronoh.
Ki buku none Kindrei ta tama, Kindrei ta Abraham ma Aisik bare hawek bwe; i dah nane ou suni jo ki-iu na ari minek ma katik le. Arile Kindrei badeh atou maha ma isi udu tek ma lahou tinan jo mwesekei, eme na ben mene ou atou losen tan.”
Eme Leban anya, “Uru badih kede-eh naduk, oro nah kede-eh badeh naduk ma hawe oro katin haka kede-eh tek. Lakou mari udu mada kede-eh tek le ai. Ya sasah na dah jo kamwekes ki bada naduk uru hawe nadu naduk oro?”
Ano Leban tiye, “Talu kamwekes sahou randra le, ki buku none kalem ta ndrokowa talu.”
Eme badeh Jekop tutuni bek i loken i buku none kei ales.
Ano iy tiye i ta lowan oro, “Ado katukumwi rayah bek.” Eme oro tukumwi bek i se ano badeh oro aimon nyamon ado mirihik ta aliy.
Eme Leban tondrohaniy kon doh Jegar Sahaduta, moson, “Bek ta tandrakan” i boho kon Aram, hawe Jekop tondrahani Galit, i boho kon Hiburu moson i le buku aliy.
Ano badeh Leban tiye, “Bek tukumwi dah i nyara kalem udu ndrokowak hawe ndrokowam na dah.” Tasah badeh aloh Galit.
I doh badeh aloh ale Mispah, moson, “Bokok,” tasah iy anya, “Laban Kindrei badeh madan kudu tam ma kudu tek len talu banyolom talu bwe.
I buku none ou batondrok naduk uru bala mwasin bwe, ya i buku none ou asoh badih ari ja, ya lau bare hawe talu banyolom bwe, arile Kindrei le baranyolom talu ma baradeu talu barala ta sahou.”
Ano badeh Leban tiye i ta Jekop le, “Bek tukumwi doh ma bek tutuni doh badeh jo mwesekei badeh ta ndrokowa talu.
Tukumwi bek ma tutuniy bek doh badeh kalem ta tandrakan ta talu. Ta jo winiyan basakalawi bek tukumwi kede-eh bawek bilisiu ta amwekes isi bwe ai, ma ou ale sasakalawi bek tukumwiy ma bek tutuniy same bilisiu samwekes isi same tek.
Winiya le Kindrei ta Abraham, ta Nahor, ma Kindrei ta tamam oro badeh baranuhun talu.” Eme Jekop tandrakan i ta nyara Kindrei ta taman Aisik.
Eme iy amwekes salom i bada bek udu mandrei ma tiye iri lowan aimon nyamon. Oro aimon ano badeh oro amadin ben ari.
Na mandraben badeh Leban atamas ma sekesek nadu tubun oro ma hawe nadun uru ma edeu nyosowan i toro. Ano badeh iy iu i hamon ja i kon tan.
Jekop ale suri iy ma iy iu, eme badeh angelo ta Kindrei eme asahan hawen.
Jekop anyolom oro badeh iy tiye, “I dah badeh ndrahu Kindrei!” Eme ma iy tondrohaniy badeh Mahana-em, moson, “Oro lumuk.”
Eme Jekop eme badeh suni lau tan rayah ala bwena hawe nadu tinen Iso udu munyak Se-ir udu kon tinan Idom.
Eme iy tiye i toro, “Ado katiye sahou ki ta Iso ki buku doh: ‘Jo badeh Jekop. Jo ndramak ta lahou tam. Jo badeh udu hawe Leban amwekes lahou tan eme taku len dah.
Jo badeh tek iri bulumakau udu aliy, iri donki udu aliy, iri sipsip udu aliy, iri me udu aliy ma hawe lau mwan ma badih ta lahou tek ale udu aliy. Eme jo atiye sahou doh ewek tam, ta ou aseken jo de bwe.’”
Ano oro lau ta tiye sahou ame hamon badeh tiye ta Jekop i buku doh, “Aso ala nadu tinem Iso tiye; iy badeh eme ta atou ou, ma lau tan ma hanek (400) ado hawen ame.”
Jekop eme badeh iy inoh andra-i, eme badeh iy apwai lau ma katin haka sipsip, bulumakau ma hawe kamel tan i lumuk.
Iy abudon badeh i buku doh, “I buku none iy amwekes bahun i la-u oro rabuk eh, badeh oro rabuk katobwak ai.”
Ano badeh Jekop amwekes salom i buku doh: “O Kindrei ta tama Abraham ma Kindrei ta tama Aisik, ou Laban ou tiye eme tek anya, jo badeh ki-iu ki hamon kili kon tinan ta lowak oro ma ou kameh adeu lundriyek oro a sola.
Jo badeh bamwenen ta kandriyen mwasin tam bwe ma ba-en hamon tam i buku none ou leheya ndramak ta lahou tam bwe. Jo mene andrei le kandro tek len aso mene ame bilisiu ta gwa Jordan. Arile na dah jo ndra lumuk.
Jo badeh inoh, jo amwekes salom, ou sebenei jo ta mine nadu tine Iso eme, koro-an iy kamwekes bahun keme tek ma oro nah ma hawe tine oro.
Arile ou badeh ndratiye, ou kameh adeu kanek ma ou kameh adeu lundriyek oro kameh nyaran bwe, i buku none on badu babi, winiya are lau winiyan bandromwoi bwe.”
Eme iy amadin ben ari eme badeh iy atehei lakou ta adeu i ta nadu tinen Iso:
iy atehei lunek (200) me badih, lunoh me mwan, lunek (200) sipsip badih ma lunoh mwan,
iy atehei tonoh kamel badih ma hawe rayah kasen, atehei hanoh bulumakau badih ma ronoh bulumakau mwan ano lunoh donki badih ma ronoh donki mwan.
Iy apwai oro katin haka, rabuk are doh, rabuk are doh. Ano iy weleyani oro lau ta lahou tan atondrok, eme iy ari atondrok rabuk, iy ari atondrok rabuk, i le buku doh. Eme iy tiye i toro, “Ado kadek kabwena tek ya ndrokowa to sese udu aliy tiri katin haka.”
Eme iy tiye ta ndramak badu bwena: “Ya i buku none nadu tine Iso kandruni ado, ya i buku none iy kandremenya ado, ‘Ado lau tare ame dah ya ado ado heh ame dah? ma katin haka mari ado bwena kede-eh tare?’
Eme ado katiye ki buku doh, ‘Oro badeh ta ndramak ta lahou tam Jekop. Oro doh tam ai. Ya Jekop badeh in hamon taso eme.’”
Ano iy ale tiye oro nane are hamon toro badu mwena ma hawe oro badu hamon tiri katin haka dah:
“Ma ado samaniy ta tiye, ‘Jekop in hamon eme.’” Jekop badeh abudon, “Jo kameh tamarei iy na lakou ki tan ma iy kameh mani kandriyen jo mene amwekes, i buku none jo ndruni iy.”
Eme iri lakou ta anyohan Iso na aliy badeh in mwena ili. Ya Jekop udu amadin ben ari.
Ano na ben doh badeh Jekop suri iy, eme iy kuhi udun ma la-uh, kuhi uru badih ma la-uh ta lahou tan ma hawe nadun oro ma ronoh ari mwan badeh, oro adek ala bilisiu ala gwa Jabok.
Iy tiyani oro a bilisiu ta gwa ano badeh iy tiyani iri lakou tan mari i bilisiu ale.
Jekop le ari badeh in hamon, eme badeh ndramak ari ili badeh uru akek, uru akek winiya le kon aleu.
Eme ndramak dah atona boto-on tan anya kano le badeh, iy atehei minen i ba Jekop le badeh, ma ban asoh.
Ano iy ndramak dan anya, “Jo ki-iu ai, kon ndra leu.” Arile Jekop anya, “Jo winiyan baruwani ou ba-au bwe, ndra ou atehei nyosowan eme tek.”
Eme ndramak dah ndremenya iy, “Nyaram areh?” Eme iy anya, “Nyarak Jekop.”
Ano badeh ndramak dan anya, “Nyaram kameh bala Jekop ja bwe ai, nyaram kameh aloh Isra-el, tasah ou badeh boto-on labai ta akek i la-u Kindrei hawe iri ndramak.”
Eme Jekop anya, “Abo, ou tiye nyaram keme tek.” Arile iy anya, “Ou anya atanam nyarak ta sasah?” Ano badeh iy atehei nyosowan i la-un udu doh.
Eme badeh Jekop tondrohani nyara kon Peniyel, moson “Mada Kindrei.” Eme iy anya, “Jo badeh anyolom Kindrei udu madak amwenen arile jo bamak bwe.”
An eme loken badeh iy udu Peniyel iu ma soka le, tasah ta ban.
Eme ta katin doh badeh iri lundriye iri Isra-el badeh baimon ndrubulo katin haka bwe, tasah Jekop badeh edek andra-i na ban.
Jekop anyolom ili badeh iy atou Iso hawe lau tan ma hanek (400) badeh adek ame; eme iy eme andromwoi oro nah i le winiya Liya uru Rejel hawe uru badih turu ta lahou turu.
Eme iy atehei nadun oro rayah ado hawe uru badih ta lahou tan ma la-uh ado bwena. Ano badeh Liya hawe oro nah rayah are hamon toro ano badeh udu hamon toro badeh iy atehei Rejel uru Josep ado hamon.
Jekop le udu bwena, eme iy aluh i andri bada munyak san ndro taloh udu mada Iso.
Arile Iso sakaliye ili badeh tawi Jekop ma atamas iy, eme ma uru aden.
Ano mada Iso i loke badeh anyolom badih hawe iri nah. Eme iy ndremenya, “Are oro are hamon ame dah?” Eme Jekop anya, “Oro doh badeh Kindrei tikisiy jo eme iy atehei eme tek.”
Ano badeh uru badih ta lahou ma hawe nadu oro ame mirihik ma oro aluh a andri.
Ano ja Liya hawe nadun oro ame ja aluh a andri ale. Ano udu hamon handru badeh Rejel uru nadun Josep am ma uru ale aluh a andri.
Eme badeh Iso ndremenya, “Oro lau jo ndrondron oro mene, moson i buku sah?” Eme badeh Jekop anya, “Badeh ta anya kanuhun ou sekesek tek de bwe.”
Arile Iso tiye, “Nadu tine, jo badeh lakou tek solo-an labai udu aliy. Kudu gwek tam ai.”
Arile Jekop tiye, “Bwe ai, i buku none ou ndraseken jo badeh, ou andrei. Jo badeh sekesek ta atou madam badeh i buku none jo sekesek ta atou Kindrei, ou badeh amwekes kandriyen mwasin ma ou ndraseken.
Abo, ou andrei lakou tek jo andrei eme hawem dah; Kindrei badeh tikisiy jo labai, eme iy badeh atehei lakou mari dah eme tek.” Jekop eme andresei iy, andresei iy ma iy andrei.
Ano Iso tiye, “Jo ki hawem ma talu ma la-uh ka-au.”
Eme Jekop tiye, “Ou tanam oro nah badeh babadok bwe le, eme ya jo badeh katondrok iri sipsip hawe iri bulumakau ma nadu iri bwisik. Ya ki buku none iri adek na len ari buruwen kameh ma iri kamak.
Abo, ou adek a bwena tek, ya jo badeh kedek kamunum ki-in hamon. Jo kameh edek amunum hawe oro bulumakau ma hawe oro nah, winiya le jo le barateu ado barado Se-ir.”
Eme Iso anya, “Abo, lau tek rayah kado hawem kado.” Eme Jekop anya, “Ou anya amwekes badeh ta sasah? I doh nane jo anya kanuhun le seken tam.”
Eme na len doh le badeh Iso, iu ili Se-ir.
Arile Jekop badeh ili Sukot ma iy tahi asiu tan hawe tahi mandron rayah tiri katin haka tan. Eme nyara kon Sukot badeh, moson, “Mandron,” badeh asahan kabatana doh.
Jekop udu Padan Aram, eme asahan mwasin le eme kon tinan Sekem udu Kenan, eme atehei ndrahu manyah tan udu rai mirihik ta kon tinan.
Iy sihinei munyak doh badeh ta lundriye Hamor, tama Sekem na su-ubek kanen i winiya rinek silba boroh.
Ano iy tukumwi bek ta salom ma aloh “El Elohe Isra-el,” moson, “Kindrei tahi Isra-el.”
Liya badeh atehei nah ari badih nyaran Dinah nadu Jekop. Eme iy ili badeh manyah hawe iri badih badu munyak doh.
Eme badeh nadu Hamor nyaran Sekem badeh badu Hiba, iy atondrok loboho doh, eme badeh iy anyolom Dinah badeh iy mwesekei karei i tan.
Iy ibis nadu Jekop Dinah labai, eme badeh iy atamar ma indrek iy kaseken iy.
Eme Sekem tiye ta taman, “Tama ou andrei badih bihin kodo-oh keme uduk.”
Nadu Jekop oro mwan badeh ado ndra lobwidiu atondrok iri katin haka, eme Jekop anuhun nadun badih badeh lau ndratawi iy. Eme iy bamwekes ari lakou bwe winiya le nadun oro ame.
Eme tama Sekem badeh ili hawe Jekop asehek sahou hawen.
Eme nadu Jekop oro badeh barado lobwidiu barame ai. Eme oro anuhun nyala karei le badeh, boho oro asak ma ndrine oro isi labai. Tasah Sekem badeh mwesekei kandriyen ndra-in ma bobose iri Isra-el handru ta iy tawi Dinah nadu Jekop badih, lakou ndrabun handru ta amwekes.
Arile Hamor tiye i toro, “Naduk, Sekem badeh ndrinen eden ta nadu ado badih labai. Ado katehei iy keme ma iy ki udu naduk.
To kasehek sahou ki randra ta to badeh kasoh to kili keme kudu ndrokowa to.
Eme ya ado kado hawe aso kado munyak dah kado; ado badeh kamanyah loboho heh seken tado udu aliy ma ado badeh kamwekes sasah ki tado ma ado katiye lakou tado ta sisih kili keme.”
Ano Sekem tiye i ta tama Dinah hawe nadu tinen oro, “Ado aseken sasah le, eme sasah ado aseken jo kedeu kewek tado.
Ado katiye sasah ado aseken ma ado kadeu masah ta nadu ado ki loken jo winiyan atehei. Buku none ado katehei badih kede-eh keme uduk.”
Tasah nadu oro Dinah badeh badan ndrandra-i, eme badeh nadu Jekop oro abukoh no-o Sekem uru taman le.
Eme oro tiye i turu, “Aso winiyan basumon bwe ai, aso winiyan bamwekes kandriyen dah bwe; Aso winiyan batehei nadu tine aso badih winiyan bala tare ku-i lakou tan ba-au bwe.
Aso badeh aseken le i buku none iri nah mwan tam kasan ku-i iri ki-iu ki buku taso.
Ano badeh aso baradeu nadu aso badih barawek ma tado barame taso. Ma aso kameh ado manyah hawe ado ma to asahan ari buruwen.
I buku none ou baseken budon taso bwe, i dah kameh aso au ma hawe nadu tine aso badih.”
Tanan toro badeh mwasin ta ndranye Hamor uru nadun Sekem. Sekem badeh iy kadok, eme iy babe-en ta amwekes budon nane bwe ai, tasah iy badeh ndraseken nadu Jekop badih labai ai.
<range>
Eme badeh Hamor hawe nadun Sekem badeh uru adek ala loboho mada san ta i bolo kon tinan turu ma tiye i tiri lau badu kon doh.
Eme uru tiye, “Oro lau kede-eh kawas mwasin tato. Oro kamanyah kado munyak tato ma oro katiye sasah ki ta asih; munyak kada-ah winiya oro mari. To badeh winiyan asoh nadu oro badih ma oro ale, winiyan asoh tato.
I buku none to kasan ku-i lakou ta mwan ki-iu i le buku toro eh, i dah kameh oro kameh ado ma to kameh asahan ari buruwen. I buku none bwe eh, oro kameh au.
I dah kameh iri katin haka toro ma hawe lakou mari toro kameh i tato. Eme to katiye mwasin, oro sa-au oro kado hawe to kado.”
Eme iri lau mari badu kon doh badeh aseken budon ta Hamor uru nadun Sekem, eme iri sani ku-i lakou tiri mwan iu.
Ano badeh len taloh ano, oro lau badeh ndrana toro mene ta baka sasan bano bwe le. Nadu Jekop ma hawe nadu tine Dinah, Simiyon uru Lebi badeh banoh bwe, uru ma samen ta bahun turu ala kon tinan badeh mwetehei iri lau mwan mari,
ma hawe Hamor uru nadun Sekem ale. Ano badeh uru aluwi Dinah udu asiu ta Sekem eme andri ma uru au.
Ano udu hamon turu nadu Jekop oro mari ala kon tinan mene tawi Dinah udu aliy, oro ala badeh adek bwele-e lau amak ma bene-ei lakou mari, tasah ta kandriyen ndra-in ta karei i bada Dinah.
Eme oro ala andrei iri katin haka sipsip, ma donki ma hawe lakou mari udu kon tinan doh.
Eme oro kuhi lakou mwasin toro mari ma tawi badih ma nah hawe tuwi lakou mari badu asiu.
Ano badeh Jekop tiye i ta Simiyon uru Lebi, “Ah badeh ndramwesekei nono-ou ndrame tek; eme iri lau badu Kenan hawe badu Perisa ma lau mari badu munyak dah kameh mada iri andra-i eme tek. Jo badeh lau sola bwe; i buku none iri mari kase kame kamwekes bahun keme la-uk kameh, to mari kameh amak.”
Arile oro anya, “Aso bwale aso iri amwekes nadu tine aso i buku none badih ta mada san.”
Ano badeh Kindrei tiye ta Jekop, “Ou au ala atah asiu ma atukum bek ki loke ta salom ki ta Kindrei kudu Betel. Iy mene asahan hawem len ou mene atobwak ta nadu tinem Iso ma ou manyah ado aliy.”
Ano Jekop eme badeh tiye nadun hawe udun ma hawe iri lau are hawen dah anya, “Ado kakahei iri kindrei badu leheleh tado ki-iu; Ya ado katubuni lomondra tado ma ado kasin iri kolau ha-un:
Ano ado kame to ka-au kala Betel ma jo katukum bek ta salom ki ta Kindrei. Ta iy mene aseben jo len jo mene udu ndra-in ma jo edek i heh badeh madan udu le tek.”
Eme badeh iri mari andrei kindrei tiri mene badu leheleh i mine Jekop ma hawe buwadin ta ndranye iri ili, ma Jekop kuhiy ma ihiy udu baha kei aloh o-uk mirihik ta kon Sekem.
Ano len Jekop oro nadun suri oro au badeh nohonoh i la-u iri lau mari badu kon mirihik ta kon tinan nane, eme iri badai oro bwe.
Eme Jekop ma hawe iri lau tan mari badeh ame asos Lus, na dah aloh badeh Betel udu munyak Kenan.
Eme iy tutuni bek ta salom eme tondrohani kon doh in hamon ta nyara Kindrei badu El Betel, tasah Kindrei mene asahan madan len iy mene atobwak ta nadu tinen Iso.
Ma badih ta tondrok ta Rebeka nyaran Debora badeh imek, eme ahi iy badeh udu loboho kum ta Betel baha kei o-uk. Ma tondrohani loboho doh badeh, Alon Bakut, “Kei o-uk ndrahu ndrelen.”
Ano len Jekop udu Padan Aram eme hamon badeh, Kindrei asahan hawen ja ma atehei nyosowan i la-un.
Eme badeh Kindrei tiye i tan, “Ou badeh nyaram Jekop, arile i dah kameh baloh ou Jekop bwe ai, na dah kameh aloh nyaram Isra-el.”
Eme badeh Kindrei tiye i tan, “Jo dah jo Kindrei, jo tek boto-on labai. Ou badeh amwekes nah ma sola. Iri nah badu kon munyak tinan kasahan ta lau tam, ma ou badeh tama iri kabin na len hamon kameh asahan.
Jo kameh edeu munyak mene jo edeu i ta Abraham uru Aisik kameh ewek tam, ma jo kameh edeu ale i ta lundriyem ame.”
Ano Kindrei ruwani iy ma iy iu ai.
Ano udu kon nane Kindrei asehek sahou hawen nane, Jekop tutuni bek toka udu loken ta budon tan samaniy. Ano iy solowei gwa i la-un; ma solowei ndrelekei ta olip i la-un ta salom.
Eme iy tondrohani nyara kon doh Betel.
Ano Jekop oro ruwani Betel ma oro au. Eme oro bala mirihik ta Eprat bwe le badeh, Rejel atona iy anya kedeu nadun ma iy akohok andra-i handru ta isi.
Eme isi ta adeu nah amaha badeh iri badih ta lahou ta nah tiye i tan, “I dah nah mwan ja, Rejel; ou sanoh.”
Arile bwe ai, iy anya kimek, eme kohan anya kano le badeh iy tondrohani nyaran Benoni, moson “Naduk ta tikisiy.” Arile udu ja, taman tondrohani nyaran ja Benjamin, moson “Naduk ta anyo-ou jo.”
Eme badeh ahi iy udu ka-u san ta kon Eprat na len dah aloh Betelehem.
Eme Jekop tutuni bek i loken ta abudon udun udu aliy, eme na dah udu aliy le.
Ano Jekop edek ili le badeh ma manyah udu loboho bilisiu ta bokok Eder.
Isra-el oro manyah ado doh le, eme badeh nadun Ruben ili amadin hawe Bilhah, badih ta taman Isra-el ta nyeu. Eme Isra-el eme anuhun nyala aliy. Jekop badeh nadun ma ronoh la-uh.
Nadu Liya oro mwan kadok badeh Ruben, ano Simiyon, ano Lebi, ano Juda, ano Isakar hawe Sebulun.
Ya Nadu Rejel oro badeh Josep uru le Benjamin.
Ya nadu bonyo-ou ta Rejel Bilhah badeh Dan hawe Naptali.
Ano nadu bonyo-ou ta Liya Silpah badeh Gat hawe Aser. Oro mari doh badeh nadu Isra-el adeu oro are Padan Aram.
Ano Jekop ili hawe Taman Aisik ili Mamre mirihik ta Kiriyat Arba, loboho mene Abraham uru Aisik manyah are aliy.
Aisik badeh udu winiya jaha rinek ndru lunoh (180) ma iy imek mwasin le ari isi bwe ili hawe tubun oro. Eme badeh nadun uru Iso hawe Jekop ahi iy.
<range>
I dah nyala lundriye Iso oro nyaran ari ja aloh Idom.
Iso badeh Sudi badih ari badu Kenan nyaran Adah: Adah badih i ndrine Elon badu Hita, ma udu Iso Oholibamah badeh i ndrine Anah ma Anah bu-un badeh Sibiyon badu Hiba;
Ya Iso ale badeh sudi Basemat ya Basemat badeh nadu tine Nebayot. Uru mala-uh badeh nadu Isma-el.
Eme Adah badeh atehei Elipas; ano Basemat atehei Reu-el;
ano Oholibamah atehei Je-us, Jalam hawe Korah. Oro mari doh badeh adek ndrine Iso le ari, ma adeu oro ado Kenan.
Ano badeh Iso ma nadun oro mari ma hawe udun ma katin haka tan mari hawe lakou tan mari udu Kenan badeh oro suri oro ame len ta nadu tinen Jekop ala munyak ari ja.
Iy iu badeh, tasah munyak nane uru nadu tinen Jekop ado aliy doh nane winiya uru bwe; uru badeh turu katin haka solo-an labai.
Eme Iso ala aloh Idom badeh manyah udu bolo mandrei ndrokowa Se-ir.
Eme i dah badeh Sare lundriye Iso oro, tubu iri lau Idom badu munyak Se-ir:
Udu Iso Adah badeh atehei nah mwan ari badeh nyaran Elipas. Ano udu Elipas eme atehei nadun mwan malimeh: Oro badeh Teman, Omar, Sepo, Gatam ma hawe Kenas. Ya ta udu Elipas ari ja badeh Timna atehei nadun ari nyaran Amalek. Ya udu Iso ari ja nyaran Basemat badeh atehei nadun ari le mwan nyaran Reu-el. Ano Reu-el eme badeh tuwi nadun oro ma hahuw: Oro badeh Nahat, Serah, Samah hawe Misah.
<range>
<range>
<range>
Ano udu Iso ari ja nyaran Oholibamah atehei nadun mwan taloh: Je-us, Jalam hawe Korah. Oholibamah iu ndrine Anah, ya Anah iu ndrine Sibiyon.
I doh badeh oro nadu Iso le, oro lau ta atondrok: Nadu Iso kadok Elipas badeh tubu iri lau ta atondrok: Oro badeh Teman, Omar, Sepo, Kenas,
Korah, Gatam hawe Amalek. Oro doh nadu tubu udu Iso, Adah. Iri doh badeh iri lau ta tondrok au ndrine Elipas ado Idom.
Nadu Iso Reu-el, badeh tama iri lau ta atondrok: Oro badeh Nahat, Serah, Samah hawe Misah. Oro doh badeh lau ta atondrok, oro badeh lundriye Reu-el badu Idom. Ya oro badeh tubu Basemat, ya Basemat badeh udu Iso.
Ya i dah badeh lundriye udu Iso nyaran Oholibamah: Oro lau ta tondrok ya nyara Oro badeh Je-us, Jalam hawe Korah.
Ya udu Iso badeh Oholibamah nadu Anah. Oro lau doh badeh nadu Iso ale, aloh Idom. Iri doh badeh lau ta atondrok.
Ya i dah badeh lundriye Se-ir oro; Se-ir badeh badu kon Idom. Oro badeh Lotan, Sobal, Sibiyon, Anah, Dison, Eser hawe Disan. Nadu Se-ir oro doh badeh ndramak ta budon badu Hora.
<range>
Ya i doh nadu Lotan uru: Uru badeh Hori hawe Heman. Ya nadu tine Lotan badih ari udu aliy nyaran Timna.
Ya lundriye nadu Sobal oro badeh: Alban, Manahat, Ebal, Sepo hawe Onam.
Ya lundriye Sibiyon oro badeh: Ayah hawe Anah. Anah doh badeh ari labai, iy doh badeh ala silahei gwa lakon nyarahan udu kon lomale an kon ndra an le, na len amwenen ta iy ili sariye donki ta taman Sibiyon aimon bwidiu.
Ya nadu Anah oro badeh: Nadu uru badeh mwan Dison hawe badih Oholibamah.
Eme nadu Dison oro badeh: Hemdan, Itron, Esban hawe Keran.
Ya nadu Eser badeh: Bilhan, Saban hawe Akan.
Ya nadu Disan badeh: Us hawe Aran.
Ya i dah badeh oro lau ta budon badu Hora: oro badeh Lotan, Sobal, Sibiyon, Anah, Dison, Eser hawe Disan. Oro ari ari an munyak toro loboho munyak Se-ir.
<range>
Oro lau dah asahan kabin tiri Idom udu bwena len iri Isra-el ari basahan kabin bwe le.
Oro badeh Bela nadu Be-or badeh asahan kabin ta Idom. Kon tinan tan badeh nyaran Dinhabah.
Ano na len Bela imek badeh, Jobap nadu Serah badu Bosrah badeh asahan saluwen, i kabin.
Ano ja Jobap imek badeh Husam badu kon munyak tiri Teman badeh asahan saluwen i kabin.
Ano len Husam imek badeh nadu Bedat nyaran Hadat badeh akohok kon tan asahan kabin. Iy bwena mene amwekes bahun i tiri Midiyen ano ma iy asahan kabin ta kon munyak Idom. Kon tinan tan badeh nyaran Abit.
Ano na len Hadat imek badeh Samlah badu kon Masrekah akohok kon tan asahan kabin.
Ano na len Samlah imek badeh Sa-ul badu Rehobot badu gwa lakon akohok kon tan asahan kabin.
Ano na len Sa-ul imek badeh nadu Akbor nyaran Ba-al Hanan akohok kon asahan kabin.
Ano na len nadu Akbor nyaran Ba-al Hanan imek badeh Hadat akohok kon tan asahan kabin ma udun badeh nyaran Mehetabel badih i ndrine Matret, ma Matret i ndrine Mesahap. Ya kon tinan Hadat badeh nyaran Pau. Eme Iso badeh tama iri Idom mari.
I doh badeh nyara iri kabin badu ndrine Iso. Oro ari ari badeh ado boho kamen toro ma are munyak toro. Oro badeh Timna, Albah, Jetet, Oholibamah, Elah, Pinon, Kenas, Teman, Mipsar, Maktiyel hawe Iram. Oro doh badeh kabin tiri badu Idom, ari ari atondrok boho kamen tan udu munyak oro manyah ado aliy.
<range>
<range>
<range>
Jekop badeh manyah udu munyak mene taman udu aliy aloh munyak Kenan.
Ya eme i dah sare nadu Jekop oro: Josep badeh ma loweu le, jaha tan badeh ma ronoh ndro taloh le. Iy badeh udu atondrok katin haka hawe nadu tinen oro ta lundriye Bilhah hawe Silpah, udu Jekop ta nyeu. Oro badeh atondrok iri sipsip hawe me. Ano badeh iy eme, asehek nyala taman ta kandriyen ndra-in ta nadu tinen oro.
Jekop badeh aseken Josep tinan labai ja ta nadun oro mari. Tasah nadun doh badeh iy atehei iy badeh udu suniya iy ndra alon. Eme Jekop eme, mwesekei awin lawe-en moroyan labai i ta Josep.
Eme nadu tinen oro anyolom tama oro badeh aseken Josep tinan labai ja toro. Eme oro ame badeh amwekes budon ndra-in i tan ma oro badeh bawadei iy bwe hawe basehek sahou mwasin bala tan bwe.
Ano badeh Josep eme ameh, eme iy asehek nyala nadu tinen oro. Eme badeh mwesekei budon toro andra-i labai ja tan.
Eme Josep asehek i toro anya, “Ado kanuhun ameh tek doh:
To mari badeh ado lobwidiu aseu bwidiu wit ise, eme oro bwidiu wit tek badeh toka udu loken. Eme badeh tado mari badeh ame badeh awudi tek, eme ma oro aluh andri i ta tek.”
Ano nadu tinen oro tiye i tan anya, “Ou kede-eh anya, i dah kameh ou a kabin ma atondrok aso ai?” Eme badeh oro badeh no-o oro atok tan labai ai, tasah ta iy asehek nyala ameh tan i toro.
Ano ja badeh iy ameh ja, eme iy asehek ta nadu tinen oro, “Ado kanuhun, jo ameh ja, i doh ja badeh an hawe bun ma hawe ndrau ma ronoh ari badeh aluh i andri eme tek.”
Ano badeh iy asehek ameh doh i ta taman, eme badeh taman arah i tan, “Ameh tam badeh i buku sah badeh? Ou abudon anya i dah kameh tinem ma nadu tinem oro hawe jo kameh kandru aso kameh i andri tam?”
Eme nadu tinen oro badeh mada oro badeh alikis tan, arile taman tawiy udu budon tan.
Nadu tine Josep oro ndra-au ndrasariye iri katin haka ndrala ndraimon bwidiu mirihik ta Sekem.
Eme badeh Jekop tiye i ta Josep, “Ou tanam nadu tinem oro badeh atiye iri katin haka badeh aimon bwidiu ado mirihik ta Sekem. Ou ame, jo anya kaseken ou a hawe oro.” Eme iy anya, “Mwasin jo aseken.”
Eme taman tiye i tan, “Ou ala anyolom nadu tinem oro ma hawe iri katin haka, oro ado mwasin de bwe em, oro ado ndra-in, ano ou ame hamon asehek tek.” Ano badeh taman suni iy edek udu nyamak Hibron ili. Eme Josep asahan Sekem badeh,
ndramak ari ndruni iy edek leleya eme, eme iy ndremenya Josep, “Ou takaleh sasah?”
Eme badeh iy anya eh, “Jo asilah nadu tine oro. Oro badeh atondrok katin haka. Ou tanam oro ado heh de bwe?”
Eme ndramak dah anya, “Oro badeh ndra-au. Jo anuhun oro badeh tiye anya oro kameh ala Dotan.” Eme Josep in hamon toro ili badeh asahan hawe oro mirihik ta Dotan.
Oro anyolom iy edek udu ndra len eme kahis le badeh, oro atilik nyala oro ta anya kadai iy.
Eme oro tiye i toro ari ari: “Iy ndramak ta ameh asa eme ah! Abo, to kadai iy ma kakahei iy ki bolo oro ari lek, ano to kato-en anya, iy badeh katin haka ndriliu ndrani iy. Ano badeh to kanyolom sasah kameh kasahan ta ameh tan.”
<range>
Arile Ruben eme anuhun badeh iy anya kaseben ta akohok iy udu mine oro. Eme ma iy anya, “Ndri-i to sadai iy.
Kakahei iy le, ki bolo lek kudu lomale an dah, ya to sadai iy ndrayen samou.” Ruben asehek sahou doh badeh, ta iy anya kaseben iy ma iy katiyani iy ki hamon hawe taman.
Ano badeh Josep eme isos hawe nadu tinen oro le badeh, oro tawi iy, sadi awin moroyan tan. Awin iy edeu doh nane sowan badeh tinan labai.
Ma oro bwese-e iy ma akahei iy i bolo lek gwa bolon bwe dah.
Ano oro manyah aimon nyamon, ano oro suri mada oro eme loken badeh oro anyolom iri lau ta Isma-el badeh adek are loboho Gileyat ame. Udu bwele-e kamel badeh lakou solo-an labai, lakou i buku none spais kei ta ndrelekei, bam hawe mer ndraye kei ta bekebek ndrana. Oro badeh adek ala Ijip ta atiye lakou ta sisih.
Eme badeh Juda tiye i ta nadu tinen oro, “Saba lakou kameh kasahan ki ta to ki buku none to kadai nadu tine to, ano to kabisiniy?
Ado kame iy badeh nadu tine to, to katehei iy ki ta sisih. To badeh sadai iy, tasah iy badeh nadu tine to ma ndraye to le.” Eme badeh nadu tinen oro aseken.
Eme iri lau rayah badu Midiyen ame badeh, oro aruwi Josep udu bolo lek eme loken. Ma oro atehei iy i ta sisih i toro Midiyen na su-ubek lunoh silba boroh i tiri lau badu Isma-el ma iri kuhi iy iu ili Ijip.
Ano badeh Ruben eme mada lek anya katou nadu tinen, arile nadu tinen aliy bwe. Eme badeh iy sadiy awin tan ma iy tikisiy andra-i labai.
Eme iy ili hawe nadu tinen oro ma tiye, “Jo kameh barabwidiy barala buku sah handru? Iy nah badeh aliy bwe!”
Ano badeh oro adai me ari imek ano oro andrei awin tan badeh tahiy i ta ndra.
Eme badeh oro andrei awin i hawe tama oro ma oro tiye, “Ou none anyolom awin doh se, koro-an ta nadum.” Aso badeh ndruniy.
Eme iy anya, “I dah ta naduk le ai. Josep badeh ndramak handru, rayah katin haka ndriliu badeh ndrasadi iy ma ndrani iy.”
Eme Jekop tikisiy ma iy sadiy awin tan eme iy asiniy awin ta tikisiy amwekes na lami me ma iy eden ndranye nadun ben solo-an.
Nadun oro mwan ma badih ame atamar iy, arile winiyan bwe, iy bwalen. Eme iy tiye, “Winiyan bwe. Jo kameh eden winiya jo imek ta naduk.” Eme badeh iy eden ili le, ta ndranye nadun.
Ano udu badeh, udu kon Ijip badeh iri Midiyen atehei Josep ja i ta sisih i ta Podipa. Podipa badeh ndramak ta lahou badu bolo asiu ta kabin, ma iy ndramak ta mwena ta ndrokei.
Na len doh badeh Juda ruwani nadu tinen oro ma iy iu i andri ili hawe ndramak ari badu Adulam nyaran Hirah.
Eme udu doh badeh Juda awadei hawe badih ari badu Kenan nadu Su-a. Eme iy sudi iy ano iy amadin hawen.
Ma ndrinen i tinan ano ma iy atehei nah mwan ari tondrohani nyaran Er.
Ano ja badeh iy atehei mwan ari ja, tondrohani nyaran Onan.
Ano iy atehei ari ja ale ma tondrohani nyaran Silah. Iy atehei iy badeh udu Aksip.
Ano Juda andrei badih ari nyaran Tamar i ta nadun Er.
Arile Er nadu Juda badeh kandriyen tan badeh bamwenen ta mada Laban bwe; eme Laban idiy iy imek.
Ano badeh Juda tiye ta Onan, “Ou amadin hawe nyawe nadu tinem ma ou mwesekei lahou ki handru, ta ou a udun ki saluwe nadu tinem. Eme ma ou amwekes ari nah ki ta nadu tinem.”
Arile Onan badeh tanan, i dah kameh nah kameh bala lundriyen bwe; eme i buku none len mari iy amadin udu nadu tinen kameh gwa tan iu leleya bada munyak. Ya i dah kameh basahan nah nadu nadu tinen bwe.
Kandriyen iy amwekes doh bamwenen ta mada Laban bwe; eme Laban idiy iy imek ale.
Ano Juda tiye i ta udu nadun badih Tamar, “Ou badeh ado badih nyau ado asiu tam ado gwek, winiya le Silah ki tinan.” Iy badeh abwerei koro-an iy kameh kimek ki le buku nadu tinen oro ale. Eme Tamar badeh iu i hamon i asiu ta taman.
Ano udu luluwen badeh, udu Juda iu ndrine Su-a imek. Ano tikisiy tan ta udun ano badeh, uru kawas tan Hirah badu Adulam badeh ala Timnah ala hawe iri lau asan lami sipsip tan.
Eme na len lau tiye ta Tamar anya, nyanan mwan badeh ndra-au ndrala Timnah ndrasan lami sipsip,
eme iy eme badeh asini awin ta udun nyau mene iy edeu iu, ano andrei awi jam tubuluhi bulin na aliy. Ano nyahani iy manyah udu mada san ta kon Ina-im kon tinan ari udu san ili Timnah. Ma iy badeh tanan, nadu Juda mwan Silah badeh ndra winiya tasou, arile iy bala tasou bala tan bwe le.
Eme Juda anyolom iy badeh iy anya i badih ta mada san, tasah iy tubuluhi batun.
Iy banyolom iy bamwenen bwe, eme iy edek ili hawen ili ka-u san ma tiye, “Ou ame jo anya kamadin ou.” Arile iy badeh nyanan. Eme iy anya, “I buku none jo kamadin hawem sasah handru ou kameh atehei keme tek.”
Eme iy anya, “Jo kameh edeu tam ari me kasen.” Eme iy tiye, “Ou atehei ari lakou ki nyara tandrakan tam, winiya ou le baratiyani barame.”
Eme iy anya, “Saba lakou ki nyara tandrakan jo atehei tam?” Eme iy anya, “Na lakou ta balem ma ring hawe kandro tarou ta minem.” Eme iy atehei i minen ma iy amadin hawen, ano iy atehei nah i ndrinen ma ndrinen i tinan.
Ano hamon Tamar iu badeh iy asiniy awin ja iu. Ano iy asiniy awin ta nyau tan iy la-un ja.
Ano udu badeh iy suni kawas tan Hirah badu Adulam atiye me ili, ma tiye tan kakuhi lakou ta nyara tandrakan tan udu hawe i badih doh keme hamon. Arile iy ili badeh, iy batakalahei iy bwe.
Eme iy ndremenya iri lau nane manyah ado doh, “I badih ta mada san ala manyah udu ka-u san Ina-im ndraheh?” Eme iri anya, “Ari badih ta mada san dah bwe oh.”
Eme iy iu i hamon ja ili hawe Juda ma iy tiye, “Jo badeh batakalahei iy bwe. Ma iri lau badu kon doh anya, iri ari badih ta mada san i buku doh bare don bwe.”
Eme Juda anya, “Lakou doh ki tan kudu gwek. Jo bwalek iri lau sondrokonya ma sehe-en to. Jo badeh none ta anya kisih iy, arile ou takaleh iy labwe.”
Udu, bun taloh ano badeh, lau asehek ta Juda anya, “Nadu nyanam Tamar badeh ndra buku badih ta mada san ma nyolom tan ndra randra ma iy ndrinen ndra tinan.” Eme Juda anya, “Katiyani iy keme ma kasulumwi iy kimek.”
Ano iri andrei iy eme len, ano iy suni sahou i ta nyanan mwan Juda eme: “Jo badeh nah udu ndrinek dah nadu ndramak lakou tan dah. Ou tanam lakou dah ma tarou udu badan de bwe?”
Juda anyolom ma iy tanan, ano iy tiye, “Iy badeh tiye sahou handru. Jo badeh ndra bwe ai, ta tandrakan tek, jo mene ndratehei iy ndratasou ndra ta Silah ai.” Eme iy bamadin hawen ja bwe ai.
Ben ano ta iy anya kedeu nadun keme len badeh, iri silahei iy badeh nah mwimwir udu ndrinen.
Nah anya keme len badeh iy ari badeh minen eme len; eme badih ta lahou ta nah andrei kam saraman, eme iy sawei boha nah dah. Eme iy tiye, “I dah, eme len bwena.”
Arile iy ruwani minen ja badeh, nadu tinen mwan eme len, ano iy tiye, “San ta iy eme len asa i le buku doh!” Eme badeh nyaran i Peres, moson “Iy eme len bwena.”
Ano badeh kam saraman udu boha nadu tinen in hamon eme len ja, eme tondrohani nyaran Serah, moson “Lomadan saraman.”
Ya Josep badeh ndrakuhi iy badeh ndrala Ijip. Podipa ndramak ta lau ta bolo asiu hawe ta bwena ta ndrokei sihine iy udu mine iri lau badu Isma-el. Iri mene kuhi iy ili doh.
Eme Laban badeh udu hawe Josep, ma lakou mari iy amwekes badeh ndra mwasin le. Eme Josep badeh manyah tan badeh badu asiu ta Podipa,
eme Podipa anyolom Laban udu hawen ma mwesekei iy amwekes lakou ndra mwasin le.
Eme iy anyolom Josep badeh udu mwasin ta madan, eme iy asahan ndramak ta lahou tan; ano Podipa anyolom iy badeh winiyan, eme iy atehei iy atondrok asiu tan ma lakou tan mari.
Na len iy atehei Josep atondrok asiu tan ma lakou tan mari, Laban badeh atehei nyosowan i la-u asiu ta Podipa. Tasah na Josep le badeh, Laban atehei nyosowan i la-u lakou mari ta Podipa badu bolo asiu ma manan ale.
Eme lakou mari iy atehei udu baha tondrok ta Josep. Iy badeh babudon ta lakou mari bwe, nyamon le iy aimon. Josep badeh ndramak ari buruwen ma iy badeh konen labai.
Ano udu sese badeh udu Podipa budon tan andra-i ta Josep eme iy ndremenyani iy ta iy kili hawen ki bada sau.
Arile Josep bwalen, ma iy tiye, “Jo badeh atondrok lakou mari. Podipa winiyan babwerei bwe, tasah iy atehei budon i tek ta jo badeh winiyan tondrokei lakou mari badu asiu tan ma lakou tan mari.
Ari lau ja bado bwele-ek ja udu asiu dah bwe, jo le. Podipa badeh batawiy ari lakou bare minen ja bwe, arile udun: Tasah ou badeh udun labai. I buku sah handru kameh jo kamwekes kandriyen ndra-in ma karei ki ta Kindrei?”
Eme iy badeh ndremenya seken ta Josep len ari i buku ari, ta iy kili bada sau hawen, arile Josep bwalen.
Ano na len ari badeh Josep anya kili bolo asiu kamwekes lahou tan. Eme ari lau ta lahou badeh bare aliy bwe.
Eme udu Podipa tawi awin tan indrek iy, “Ou ame sau hawek.” Arile Josep atobwak eme manan, awin tan ta bwele-en le badeh udu ndra minen udu gwek.
Eme udu Podipa anyolom awin tan badeh udu minen udu badeh,
eme iy luhi iri lau ta lahou tan ame. Eme iy tiye i toro, “Ado kanyolom. Iy ndramak badu Hiburu ala andrei iy mene eme hawe taha dah badeh bobose taha handru. Iy eme bolon dah badeh anya kamadin jo, arile jo eme arah.
Iy anuhun jo arah le badeh, iy ruwani awin tan udu ka-uk udu ai, iy le atobwak eme len ta asiu ma iy iu.”
Eme badeh awin tan udu ka-un udu gwek winiya le udun eme.
Ano iy asehek i ta udun i buku doh, “Iy ndramak ta lohowan badu Hiburu ou kuhi iy eme kede-eh anya kateu jo.
Eme jo arah i ta lau kaseben jo le badeh, iy ruwani awin tan udu ka-uk udu ma iy atobwak i manan ta asiu.”
Eme udu Podipa tiye i tan, “Iy ndramak ta lahou tam badeh amwekes kandriyen doh eme tek.” Eme iy anuhun sahou udun asehek i tan badeh, eme ndrinen i buku jih.
Eme Podipa tawi Josep ma atehei iy i bolo kou, ndrahune iri lau ta bolo kou ta kabin areu aliy.
Arile Josep udu bolo kou badeh, Laban udu hawen, Laban tikisiy iy ma mwesekei ndramak ta atondrok bolo kou badeh aseken iy.
Eme ndramak ta atondrok iri badeh atehei Josep badeh atondrok iri lau mari nane are bolo kou nane dah.
Eme iy ndramak ta atondrok ari lakou bwe, lakou badeh udu baha nyolom ta Josep, tasah Laban badeh udu hawe Josep, eme badeh mwesekei Josep winiyan amwekes lahou mari.
Ano udu, len rayah ja hamon badeh uru ndramak ta lohowan, ndramak ta lohowan ta kabin badu Ijip. Iy ari ndramak ta atiye wa-in, ya iy ari ndramak ta mwena ta amwekes jabi ramen. Uru badeh mwesekei kabin i bolosen.
<range>
Eme kabin atehei uru a bolo kou bolo asiu ta ndramak ta ndrokei. Ado bolon hawe Josep.
Eme ndramak ta mwena ta ndrokei atehei ben solo-an i turu, eme iy atehei Josep badeh i ta lahou turu.
Ano uru ado bolo kou luluwen sese badeh, iy ndramak ta atiye wa-in hawe ndramak ta amwekes jabi ramen ta kabin badu Ijip badeh ameh. Ameh turu badeh i buku doh, ta iy ari moson i randrah labai, ta iy ari moson i randrah labai.
Ano Josep mandraben eme hawe uru badeh iy anyolom uru badeh tikisiy.
Eme Josep ndremenya uru, “Ah tikisiy ta sasah na len dah?”
Eme uru anya, “Aru mala-uh badeh ameh, arile ari ndramak ta tobolowe moso ameh taru bwe.” Ano Josep badeh tiye i turu, “Kindrei badeh ta edeu moso ameh, eme ah kasehek ameh ta ah.”
Eme iy ndramak ta atiye wa-in asehek ameh tan i ta Josep i buku doh, “Jo badeh ameh malou wa-in badeh ateh udu bwena tek,
ma wa-in doh badeh andran ma taloh. Eme la-un ateh le badeh buwan asahan ma buwan uni.
Eme jo badeh tawi bwiniu ta kabin udu minek ano jo andrei buwa wa-in eme ma jo apis gwa tan i bolon. Ano badeh jo atehei i mine kabin.”
Eme Josep tiye, “Moson badeh i buku doh: Andra wa-in ma taloh badeh moson len taloh.
Len taloh ano kameh kabin kameh tiye ou ano ta bolo kou, ma iy kameh atehei ou a hamon ta lahou tam ja. Ma i dah kameh ou kameh atiye wa-in bwiniu i minen i buku bwena le mene.
Arile ou samani jo, i buku none ou ado mwasin, ma ou tikisiy jo eme ou asehek nyala kabin, ma kameh iy sebenei jo eme len ta bolo kou.
Bwena ndra-au badeh iri bene-ei jo udu munyak ta Hiburu eme dah; eme udu badeh jo bamwekes ari lakou bandra-i bwe, arile iri atehei jo i bolo kou leleyah.”
Ano iy ndramak ta amwekes jabi ramen anuhun Josep badeh tiye moso ameh badeh mwasin, eme iy tiye ta Josep, “Jo ale ameh; Jo ameh badeh, udu bwele-e batuk badeh bwak jabi ramen ma taloh.
Udu bwak bwele-e batuk loken badeh saba jabi ramen ta kabin udu bolon, eme iri sirih ame badeh aimon.”
Eme Josep anya, “Moson ta aliy badeh i buku doh: Len taloh ano badeh kameh, kabin kameh andrei batum kameh iu.
Ma i dah kameh tatahiy badam udu ta kei ya iri sirih kameh ame aimon odam.”
Eme na len taloh badeh amwenen ta len ta kabin, tinen atehei iy eme len, eme iy mwesekei tine nyamon niri lau ta lahou tan badu bolo asiu tan. Eme iy kuhi ndramak ta atiye wa-in ma ndramak ta amwekes jabi ramen uru ado bolo kou ame len, eme uru ame badeh ales are mada iri lau ta lahou tan badu bolo asiu dah.
Ano iy ruwani iy ndramak ta atiye wa-in; eme ma iy iu i ta lahou tan bwena mene, eme ma iy atehei bwiniu wa-in dah i mine kabin.
Arile iy ndramak ta amwekes jabi ramen le badeh, iy tatahiy badan. Ma tatahiy i buku none Josep mene ndrasehek ndra-au.
Arile ndramak ta atiye wa-in badeh balen ndramaniy sahou mene Josep asehek tan.
Jaha la-uh ano badeh, kabin badu Ijip badeh ameh. Iy ameh badeh, iy ameh iy badeh ales udu gwa Na-el.
Eme badeh iy anyolom oro bulumakau ma ndro taloh tinan bada oro nyimirin badeh asahan gwa ame loke an kapa gwa aimon bwidiu.
Ano ja iy anyolom bulumakau ndro taloh ja asahan; oro doh badeh sali oro bwe, ndruwin ndruwin. Oro ame ales are hawe oro bulumakau bwena nane are kapa gwa.
Eme badeh oro bulumakau sali oro bwe nane dah aniy oro bulumakau sali oro udu aliy dah, ano badeh ma kabin amak.
Ano iy amadin ja badeh iy ameh ja. Eme iy anyolom bada kalom ari le, eme badeh udu bada kalom ari le doh badeh iy anyolom buwa kalom ma ndro taloh tinan badeh sukik udu badan badeh ndruni.
Ano ja badeh iy anyolom bada kalom ari le ja, eme badeh udu bada kalom ari le doh badeh iy anyolom buwa kalom ma ndro taloh badeh awa-is ma siyer rai oloh ili eme.
Eme oro kalom ma ndro taloh awa-is nane dah sakalamiy oro kalom buwa oro tinan dah. Eme kabin amak badeh iy anya, “Jo dah nane ameh.”
Eme iy tikisiy handru, eme na mandraben badeh iy suni sahou i tiri lau mari ta kau tan ma hawe iri lau ta budon tan badu Ijip ame. Eme iy asehek ameh tan i tiri, arile iri ari winiyan batiye moso ameh bala tan bwe.
Ano ndramak ta atiye wa-in tiye i ta kabin, “Jo anya kasehek tam, jo badeh ndramwekes lakou ndrandra-i.
Ou mene a bolosen i tek ma hawe i ta ndramak ta atondrok ta amwekes jabi ramen. Ano ou mene atehei aru a bolo kou udu bolo asiu ta ndramak ta bwena ta ndrokei.
Eme na ben ari badeh aru ma la-uh ameh, ya ameh taru badeh, ta iy ari badeh moson randra labai, ya ta iy ari moson randra labai.
Ya nah loweu ari badeh Hiburu badeh udu hawe aru. Iy badeh lohowan ta ndramak ta bwena ta ndrokei. Eme aru asehek ameh taru i tan badeh eme iy tubuniy moson eme taru.
Eme badeh asahan i le handru; jo badeh ou atehei jo i hamon ta lahou tek, arile ou andrei bale ndramak ta bwena ta amwekes jabi ramen.”
Ano kabin suni lau ala suwi badeh andrei Josep udu bolo kou eme. Ano Josep ili isik lami behesen, iy asiniy awin ano badeh iy ili ales ere mada kabin.
Eme kabin tiye i tan, “Jo badeh ameh, eme ari ndramak badeh batiye moson bame tek bwe. Eme ndramak ari tiye tek anya, ou badeh winiyan tobolowe moso ameh.”
Eme Josep tiye, “Jo le, jo winiyan bwe, arile Kindrei le winiyan tiye moson i tam.”
Ano badeh kabin asehek ameh tan, “Jo ameh badeh, jo badeh ales udu kapa gwa Na-el.
Eme jo anyolom oro bulumakau ma ndro taloh tinan ma bada oro nyimirin are gwa ame badeh aimon bwidiu ado kapa gwa.
Ano ja badeh jo anyolom oro bulumakau ma ndro taloh sali oro bwe, ndruwin ndruwin are gwa ame loken. Jo bwena batou ari bulumakau munya-un bala buku none doh udu munyak Ijip bwena bwe.
Eme oro aniy bulumakau tinan nyimirin dan.
Oro ndraniy, arile ndramak anyolom badeh i buku none oro baniy bwe, oro ma ndrusarak kahis le. Eme badeh ma jo amak.
Ano ja badeh jo ameh ja, eme jo anyolom bada kalom ari le, eme udu bada kalom ari le doh badeh jo anyolom buwa kalom ma ndro taloh tinan badeh sukik udu badan badeh ndruni.
Ano ja jo anyolom bada kalom ari le ja, eme badeh udu bada kalom ari le doh badeh, jo anyolom buwa kalom ma ndro taloh tinan bwe awa-is ma siyer rai aloh ili eme.
Eme oro buwa kalom salin bwe dah sakalamiy oro tinan nyimirin dah. Ya eme jo asehek ameh doh i tiri lau ta kau, arile iri winiyan batiye moson bame tek bwe.”
Ano badeh Josep tiye i ta kabin, “Ameh tam ma la-uh badeh moson i randra le; Kindrei badeh asehek tam ta lakou kameh iy kameh amwekes eme bakep ai.”
Oro bulumakau tinan ma ndro taloh badeh moson jaha ma ndro taloh. Ya oro buwa kalom tinan ma ndro taloh badeh moson jaha ma ndro taloh ale.
Ya oro bulumakau ndruwin ma ndro taloh, oro an hamon ame ma buwa kalom ma ndro taloh awa-is siyer rai oloh badeh, moson, jaha ndro taloh kameh nyamon bwe.
I doh i buku le jo asehek tam kabin, luwen bwe kameh Kindrei badeh leheya tam lakou kameh iy amwekes.
I dah kameh jaha ndro taloh kameh munyak Ijip kameh idih na nyamon.
Ano udu hamon ta aliy na jaha ndro taloh ja kameh len ta son, len kameh nyamon bwe; eme jaha mwasin mene kameh lau maniy, tasah nyamon bwe kameh weleyani kon mari.
Len ta nyamon solo-an mene lau ndramaniy, tasah len ta nyamon bwe eme kameh akohok andra-i labai.
Moso ameh tam badeh Kindrei ndrasani ben, ya luwen bwe kameh asahan ai.
“Eme na dah badeh ou adeu ari lau ta budon ma lau ta tanan eme ou atehei iy katondrok kon munyak mari badu Ijip.
Ou ale tiye lau rayah ta lahou ta bolo asiu katondrok kon ari ari, iri kakohok lunoh nyamon badu bolo rinek rakum rakum na len ta nyamon amasu dah.
Udu baha tondrok tam ou tiye toro, udu bolo jaha ndro taloh mwasin dah oro kakohok nyamon badeh ma oro katehei kudu bolo asiu bolo kon tinan dah. Ma oro badeh katondrok.
Eme buku none jaha ndro taloh ta son asahan kameh, arau kameh i niri kon mari na len ta son kameh asahan Ijip. Eme kameh iri lau winiyan bakohok bandra-i ta son bwe.”
Eme kabin hawe iri lau ta lahou tan ta bolo asiu aseken budon tan, ma tiye i toro, “To winiyan basilahei ari ndramak i buku none Josep kede-eh bwe ai, iy badeh malawi ndrabun ta Kindrei udu tan.”
<range>
Ano kabin tiye i ta Josep, “Kindrei badeh ndraleheyani lakou mari doh i tam. Eme ya ou kede-eh ndramak ta budon ma ou kede-eh ndramak ta tanan labai, ari ndramak bala buku none ou bwe.
Jo kameh atehei ou atondrok munyak mari; ma iri lau mari kameh anuhun le ou. Boto-on tek badeh udu bwele-em ya boto-on tam badeh udu bahan tek.
Na dah jo badeh atehei ou atondrok munyak mari badu Ijip.”
Eme kabin andrei ring tan amwenen atehei i andra lime Josep. Eme kabin asiniy awin i badan ma atehei gol sen nyikilikin i balen.
Ano iy atehei Josep manyah udu la-u sau, sau doh iri katin haka aliu, ma sau doh badu bahan ta kabin; ano iri lau ta ndrokei ta atudun adek an mwena tan aloh, “Aha kabelek! Aha kabelek!” Josep badeh ndrasahan ndramak ta atondrok munyak tinan mari badu Ijip.
Ano kabin tiye i tan, “Jo badeh kabin, eme ari ndramak badu Ijip mari dah, winiyan are lau winiyan batudun iy bwe, i buku none ou batiye ehe bala tan bwe.”
Eme iy tondrohani Josep i badu Ijip badeh aloh Sepenat Paneya. Ano iy atehei badih i udun nyaran Asenat ya iy badih doh badeh nadu Podipera. Ya Podipera badeh iy Pris badu kon tinan On. Josep badeh jaha tan asahan tonoh badeh iy eme amwekes lahou ta kabin badu Ijip. Eme iy ruwani ndrahu kabin eme iy edek ili anyolom kon mari badu Ijip.
<range>
Udu bolo jaha mwasin badeh munyak ato-ou nyamon solo-an labai,
eme iri nyamon solo-an labai. Eme Josep badeh akohok ano badeh iy atehei iri ado bolo asiu udu kon tinan. Udu bolo bilin awudi kon tiri ari ari, badeh iy atukum nyamon ma atehei udu kon tinan.
Iy ma mwena ondrek kalom. Ano badeh kalom nyaran bwe, solo-a on badu ndras, eme badeh iy badeh babudon ta ondrek bwe.
Ben ta nyamon bwe basahan bwe le badeh, udu Josep Asenat badeh atehei nadun mwan la-uh.
Eme Josep tiye, “Kindrei badeh ndramwekes jo ndramaniy isi tek ma ndramaniy iri lowa tama oro.” Eme iy tondrohani kadok tan badeh nyaran Manase.
Ano ja Josep tiye, “Kindrei badeh ndratehei jo ndrasola udu munyak ta ndra-i dah; eme iy tondrohani bwaneh tan Ipra-im.”
Ano badeh jaha ma ndro taloh ta nyamon solo-an udu Ijip nane iri lau sekesek ndrano.
Eme i buku none Josep ndratiye len ta nyamon bwe asahan ai. Kon mari badeh nyamon bwe, arile munyak Ijip le, nyamon udu aliy.
Eme udu sese iri lau badu Ijip nyamon bwe, iri ameson, eme iri aden i ta kabin ta nyamon. Eme kabin tiye iri ala hawe Josep ma iri kanuhun le Josep.
Ano udu nyamon bwe ma son akohok kon munyak mari eme Josep sihiy asiu ta nyamon ma edeu kalom i ta sisih i niri lau badu Ijip.
Eme iri lau mari badu bolo munyak ame Ijip, ame hawe Josep asih nyamon, tasah kon mari ndrandra-i labai ta nyamon bwe.
Na len Jekop badeh anuhun, udu Ijip badeh kalom udu aliy, eme Jekop tiye i ta nadun oro, “Ado kede-eh abosah le kede-eh?
Jo anuhun badeh, anya Ijip badeh kalom udu aliy; eme ado kala kasih nato rayah, bwe kameh to amak ta son ai.”
Eme badeh nadu tine Josep oro ma ronoh badeh ala Ijip ala asih kalom.
Arile Jekop badeh batiye nadu tine Josep Benjamin bala hawe oro bala bwe, tasah iy badeh inoh koro-an lakou katok tan.
Nadu Jekop oro ala hawe iri lau ame asih kalom, tasah munyak Kenan badeh nyamon bwe.
Eme Josep badeh atondrok munyak mari badu Ijip, ya iy badeh edeu kalom ta sisih i tiri lau mari badu kon munyak. Eme nadu tine Josep oro ame badeh aluh andri bada munyak i ta Josep.
Eme Josep badeh ndraseleyani nadu tinen oro, arile iy badeh amwekes iy i buku none iy tanan oro bwe. Eme Josep ndremenya oro boto-on, “Ado badu heh ame dah?” Eme oro anya, “Aso badeh badu Kenan, aso ame dah ta asih nyamon.”
Josep badeh ndraseleyani nadu tinen oro, arile nadu tinen oro baseleyani iy bwe.
Eme Josep badeh abudon ameh mene iy ameh oro ma iy tiye, “Ado dah badeh ado lalou; ado ame dah ta asilah kon munyak boto-on de bwe.”
Eme oro anya, “Bwe Laban, aso ame dah i buku none lohowan ame ta asih nyamon.
Aso badeh nadu tinen aso, aso nadu ndramak ari le ya aso badeh lalou bwe, aso badeh ta wasai bwe, aso tiye sahou handru.”
Ano Josep tiye, “Bwe! Ado kede-eh ame ta anya kasilah kon munyak dah boto-on tan bwe udu heh.”
Ano oro tiye, “Aso nadu tine aso badeh ma ronoh la-uh; aso nadu ndramak ari le udu munyak Kenan. Eme nadu tinen aso ari badeh ndramak, arile iy ari le bahan badeh udu hawe tama aso.”
Eme Josep anya, “I buku le jo nane ndrasehek ndra-au eh. Ado kede-eh lalou!
I dah kameh asilah tanan ta takaleh ado! Jo badeh tandrakan ta nyara kabin, ta ado kameh winiyan ba-au bwe, ndra ado kandrei nadu tine ado bahan keme.
Ado ari kala kandrei iy. Ado mari kameh ado, iri lau ta ndrokei kameh atondrok ado, ndra kasilahei labai, ado tiye sahou handru de bwe. Eme kabin in ndra loke kahis, iy ki tanan ado badeh lalou.”
Ano badeh Josep atehei oro a bolo kou len taloh.
Ano na len taloh badeh Josep tiye i toro, “Jo badeh ndramak ta inoh Kindrei, ado kamwekes lahou doh ma ado kameh bamak bwe:
