Iri Parasi hawe Sadusi ame hawe Jises anya kanone iy. Oro tiye tan ta amekes ari lahou tinan ta leheya buku none iy amekes gok ta Kindrei handru.
Arile iy asumon oro i buku doh, “Na beyeh ado anya, ‘Mada kon ndra saram. Sebwe idah kameh jor bwe ma kon mondrei nadeh.’
Na mandraben ado anya, ‘Asi kandrah ndra bokodon ma mada kon ndra saram. Sebwe na idah kameh jor atohou ma ur undruk nadeh.’ Ehe, ado atou kalem ere bolo kandrah, ma tiye amwenen. Arile ado batou ma baleheya bamwenen iri kalem ta len dah bwe.
Iri lau mwan ma badih ta len dah badeh, lau ndra-in handru, ma iri batehei ndrine iri handru bala ta Kindrei bwe. Iri ndremenya ta anya katou kalem, arile winiyan bwai. Kalem ari le kameh iri atou, kalem ta Jona.” Eme ma Jises ruwani iri ma iy iu.
Jises hawe oro lau tan ala kapa gwa li bilisiu, arile oro lau tan maniy, ma oro bakohok jabi ramen bwe.
Eme Jises tiye toro i buku doh, “Ado kanyolom kamwenen. Mada ado kaleu ta yis tiri Parasi hawe Sadusi.”
Eme oro lau tan asehek sahou ndrokowa oro amwenen, “Sebwe iy amekes sahou doh tasah to bakohok jabi ramen bwe nadeh?”
Arile, Jises tanan ta sahou nane oro asehek, eme iy tiye i buku doh, “Ado lau budon tado tinan handru bwe. Buku sah handru ado asehek, anya ado jabi ramen bwe?
Sebwe mada ado baleu bwe le nadeh? Ado ndramaniy ja, ta limeh jabi ramen mene iri lau ma lamawa (5,000) aimon? Ma bwak sabe mene erah ado anyuhiy?
Ado ndramaniy ja ta jabi ramen ma ndro taloh iri lau ma hawa (4,000) mene aimon, ma bwak sabe ado anyuhiy?
Buku sah handru budon tado kede-eh baleu bwe le? Jo babudon ta jabi ramen bwe. Mada ado kaleu ta yis tiri Parasi hawe Sadusi.”
Oro anuhun sahou doh, ma oro atana oro buku iy basehek ta mada oro kaleu ta yis ta amekes jabi ramen, bwe. Arile, iy anya mada oro kaleu ta sahou toro Parasi hawe Sadusi oro leheya iri lau na aliy.
Jises iu ili loboho kon tinan Sesariya Pilipai. Kala doh iy ndremenya oro lau tan i buku doh, “Iri lau anya Nadu Ndramak Awas, iy are lau handru?”
Eme oro anya, “Lau ra-on anya ou Jon ta alomwa. Ya ra-on anya ou Alaija, ya ra-on anya ou Jeremaya, deh ou ari propet.”
Eme Jises ndremenya oro, “Ya ado amwenen anya jo are lau?”
Saimon Pita asumon iy i buku doh, “Ou Krais, Kindrei suni ou ame dah. Ou Nadu Kindrei kohan handru udu aliy.”
Eme Jises asumon sahou tan i buku doh, “Saimon, ou nadu Jon, ou winiyan sekesek. Tasah, ari ndramak badu kon munyak baleheya ou ta sahou dah bwe. Idoh tama le udu kandrah, iy leheyani sahou dah ewek tam.
Ya jo tiye tam i buku doh: Ou Pita, ya jo kameh amekes iri mwan ma badih tek asahan i buku asiu salom tek, ya ou kameh aseben iri i buku ndru bek aseben asiu ales boto-on udu bwele-e munyak dah, ya Satan hawe boto-on ta imek kameh winiyan batohowei asiu salom tek doh bala andri bwe.
Ya jo kameh amekes nyaram ki buku nyarak. Iri lakou ou asehek iri mwan ma badih kamekes udu munyak dah, mwasin, Kindrei udu kandrah mukuni ale. Ya saba lakou ou turukiy udu kon munyak, idoh kameh Kindrei ale turukiy udu kandrah.”
Eme Jises batanau oro lau tan boto-on labai i buku doh, “Ado sasehek nyala lakou dah sala ta ari ndramak, anya jo badeh, Krais, ndri-iy.”
Kala doh Jises leheya oro lau tan anya iy ki-iu kili Jerusalem. Ya iy kameh akohok sisi-in solo-an labai ereu mine iri lau tinan areu bwena, ma hawe iri lau tinan tiri pris, hawe iri lau tanan ta sahou batanau. Ya iri kameh adai iy imek, ya len taloh ano iy kameh amak ja.
Pita anuhun sahou doh, ya iy seheyani Jises i kabwak, ma iy ibolosen i tan i buku doh, “Laban, sebwe lakou doh kameh winiyan basahan tam bwe nadeh.”
Arile Jises tubuni iy ma iy asehek ta Pita i buku doh, “Satan, ou a len a konak! Ou anya aturuk san tek. Ou ba-en hamon ta budon ta Kindrei bwe. Ou a-en hamon le ta budon tiri lau.”
Eme Jises tiye toro lau tan i buku doh, “Buku none ari ndramak anya ki-in hamon tek, mwasin, iy kamani iri so-ok tan mari, ya iy kabwese-ei kei tondreh tan, ya iy ki-in hamon tek.
Tasah, buku none ari ndramak anya katawi kohan kudu, kohan kameh ano. Arile, buku none ari ndramak abudon jo ya kohan ano, iy kameh winiyan andrei kohan ja.
Ya, buku none ari ndramak kuhi lakou mari badu kon munyak, ya iy kimek, iri lakou doh kameh sebenei iy i buku sah handru? Ya lau kadeu saba sowan handru kameh ta akohok kohan keme hamon?
Nadu Ndramak Awas kameh eme ma lomadan ta taman. Ya iy kameh eme hawe oro angelo tan. Na len doh kameh iy edeu ndramas i tiri lau mwan ma badih i le winiya le kandriyen iri amekes.
Jo asehek sahou handru ewek tado. Lau ra-on ales areu bolo to dah kameh bamak bwe, ya iri kameh atou Nadu Ndramak Awas eme hamon ma atondrok kon munyak i buku kabin.”
Len onoh ano, Jises kuhi Pita uru Jemis hawe nadu tinen Jon. Iy kuhi oro ala bwele-e mandrei ari loken labai, ya oro le ado aliy.
Oro ado, oro anyolom ili bada Jises ndratubuniy ndra randrah ja. Ya bwilin anya buku none an. Ya awin tan asahan belen, handru en!
Eme Moses uru Alaija asahan, ma oro lau ta Jises nane atou uru asehek sahou hawen.
Pita atou lakou doh ya iy asehek ta Jises i buku doh, “Laban, mwasin handru ta aso are ndra kada-ah. Buku none ou aso-ok jo katahi mandron ki taloh kudu dah; ra-em tam, ra-em ta Moses, ma ra-em ta Alaija.”
Pita asehek sahou kahis le, asi kandrah ari anya labai ili tubuluhi oro. Ya sahou randra asahan bolo asi kandrah nane asehek i buku doh, “Idah naduk handru. Jo aso-ok iy labai, ma jo sekesek tan handru. Ado kanuhun sahou tan.”
Oro lau ta Jises nane anuhun sahou doh, ya oro atehei bwili ndru-u oro i andri, ma bwili oro i bada munyak, ma oro anoh labai.
Arile, Jises eme mirihik toro, ma iy tawi oro ma iy anya, “Ado kareu loken, ado sanoh, ndri-iy.”
Eme oro suri mada oro eme loken, oro batou ari ndramak ja bwe, oro atou Jises le ari.
Eme oro are bwele-e mandrei ame andri, Jises batanau oro boto-on buku doh, “Saba lakou ado ndratou, ado sasehek ta ari ndramak ili winiya le Nadu Ndramak Awas amak ereu bolo lek eme loken ja.”
Eme oro lau tan ndremenyani iy i buku doh, “Buku sah iri lau ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis anya Alaija kameh eme bwena op?”
Iy asumon oro i buku doh, “Sahou badeh handru. Alaija kameh eme, iy kameh lowosa iri lakou mari.
Arile jo asehek tado i buku doh, Alaija ndrame, arile iri lau tana iri iy bwe. Iri an hamon ta budon tiri amwenen, ya iri amekes iri kandriyen mari i badan. Ya iri kandriyen doh kameh iri amekes i bada Nadu Ndramak Awas ale.”
Jises asehek i buku doh, ya oro lau tan atana oro buku iy asehek ta Jon ta alomwa.
Jises hawe oro lau tan ma taloh ame ndruni iri lau solo-an. Eme ndramak ari asahan ta Jises, ma iy atehei bwili ndru-un i andri,
ma iy anya, “Laban, ou tikisi naduk mwan. Iy asahan lolo-ou, ya badan udu ndra-in labai. Len ra-on iy kataku i bolo jih, len ra-on kameh iy taku i bolo gwa.
Jo tiyani iy ili hawe oro lau tam, arile oro winiyan babwidi iy bamwenen bwe.”
Eme Jises asehek sahou i buku doh, “Ado lau mwan ma badih batehei budon handru bwe, budon ma kandriyen tado bamwenen bwe. Len sabe kameh jo kereu hawe ado, ano ado barala tanan boto-on ta Kindrei? Ado katiyani nah badeh, keme hawek.”
Eme Jises ibolosen i ta malawi balik nane, ma balik ruwani nah nane, ma nawin bwe, lolo-ou tan ano.
Hamon ta aliy oro lau tan ame hawen, ma oro ndremenya iy i buku doh, “Buku sah handru ya aso winiyan batikahei malawin ndra-in nane iu bwe?”
Eme iy tiye toro i buku doh, “Budon tado boto-on handru bwe, mesekei ado winiyan bwe. Jo asehek tado handru, buku budon tado kasahan ki buku badu buwa kei mastet, idoh ado winiyan tiye ta mandrei idoh, ‘Ou suri ou, ya ou ala kodo-oh;’ iy winiyan ili. Ya idah kameh ari lakou ja batawi ado ta amekes lahou bwe.”
<range>
Jises hawe oro lau tan atukum areu loboho kon Galili. Eme Jises asehek i toro i buku doh, “Iri kameh atehei Nadu Ndramak Awas ili mine iri lau.
Ya iri lau kameh adai iy imek, ya hamon ta len taloh kameh iy amak ja.” Oro lau tan anuhun sahou doh, oro tikisiy labai.
Hamon ta aliy Jises hawe oro lau tan ala asahan kon tinan Kapen-um. Ya iri lau ta akohok takis ta asiu tinan ta Kindrei asahan ta Pita, ya oro ndremenya iy i buku doh, “Sebwe ndramak ta leheya ado edeu luk ale i ta asiu tinan ta Kindrei nadeh?”
Eme Pita asumon anya, “Ehe.” Eme Pita iu ili bolo asiu, Pita basehek sahou bwe le, Jises eme ndremenyani iy, “Saimon ou abudon buku sah? Iri kabin badu kon munyak akohok luk ta takis ere mine are lau eme? Oro akohok ere mine oro lau toro amwenen, deh, oro akohok ereu mine ndramak ari ja?”
Eme Pita anya, “Oro akohok luk ta takis ta ndramak ari ja.” Eme Jises tiye tan, “Idoh ya oro lau toro amwenen kameh bakeh luk ta takis bwe.
Arile, kora-on to kabwidiy, ma oro kabolosen keme ta to. Ou ala kapa gwa ou akeh jai. Ari ni ou aluwiy ma bwena, idoh ou sihi bohon, ya ou kameh atou luk ari ereu bohon. Ou andrei luk doh ou ala atehei ki mine oro. Idoh ta takis ta talu ma la-uh.”
Kala doh oro lau ta Jises ame hawen ma ndremenya iy, “Are lau nyaran tinan ereu baha tondrok ta Kindrei?”
Eme Jises luhi nadu nah ari nadu bwisik eme ales ereu ndrokowa oro.
Ano iy tiye i buku doh, “Jo tiye sahou handru ewek tado, buku none ado batubuni ndrine ado bwe, ma basahan buku none nah nadu bwisik dah bwe, ado winiyan bala bolo tondrok ta Kindrei bwe.
Ndramak atehei budon tan asahan buku le nah, ndramak doh kameh nyaran asahan tinan ereu bolo tondrok ta Kindrei.
Ya buku none ari ndramak abudon jo ya iy aseben ari nadu nah bwisik buku nah dah, badeh iy aseben jo.”
Jises asehek ja anya, “Buku none ari ndramak bwidi ari nadu nah ale atehei budon tan eme tek taku ta kandriyen ndra-in, sebwe mwasin ta ndramak doh kasawei ari bek maha-an ki balen ma kakahei iy katuh kili bolo ndras lawe-en ya iy kimek.
“Sisi-in tinan labai kameh i bwele-e iri lau badu kon munyak, iri nane amekes ndramak ari ja taku ta kandriyen ndra-in. Handru, iri kandriyen ndra-in doh kameh asahan. Arile jo tikisiy handru ta ndramak mesekei asahan.
Buku none minem deh katim aliu ou ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in, mwasin ou saniy ya ou akahei ki-iu! Sebwe mwasin ta ou minem raka le ma ou katim raka le ta akohok koham mwasin ta ereu le buku doh. Kora-on minem ma la-uh ma katim ma la-uh udu aliy, ya iri kakahei ou ala bolo jih ale winiyan bamak bwe-en!
Ya, buku none madam aluwi ou ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in, sebwe mwasin ta ou sudiy ma ou akahei ki-iu! Mwasin ta ou madam ari le ya ou akohok koham mwasin ta ereu le buku doh, kora-on madam ma la-uh kudu aliy, ya iri kakahei ou ala bolo jih ta anya ereu le buku doh.
“Ado kabudon kamwenen. Kora-on ado anya ari ereu ndrokowa oro nah kede-eh lakou laleyah. Bwe handru. Jo asehek tado amwenen, ereu kandrah oro angelo toro badeh, len mari oro areu mada tama ereu kandrah.”
<range>
Jises asehek sahou ja anya, “Ado abudon buku sah? Buku none ari ndramak tan rinek (100) sipsip udu aliy, ya buku none ari sipsip tan amai, sebwe iy winiyan bala batakaleh bwe nadeh? Neh? Bwe labai. Iy kameh ruwani oro sipsip tan ma ndro ronoh ndro ari (99) nane areu bwele-e mandrei are gwek, ma iy kameh iu ili takaleh ari nane amai.
Jo asehek sahou handru ewek tado, buku none iy takalahiy, iy kameh sekesek labai. Iy sekesek toro ndro ronoh ndro ari (99) sipsip nane bamai bwe, arile, buku none iy takalahei sipsip ari nane amai, sekesek tan kameh i tinan labai.
Buku le tama ado udu kandrah, iy bwalen ari nadu nah kede-eh samai.”
Jises asehek sahou ja i buku doh, “Buku none nadu tinem bwidi kandriyen ndra-in ewek tam, mwasin ta ou ala atou iy, ya ah kasehek sahou ki se ta kandriyen nane. Buku none iy anuhun sahou tam, mwasin, ou ndrandrei nadu tinem ndrame hamon.
Arile, buku none iy banuhun sahou tam bwe, mwasin, ou andrei ari deh la-uh ndramak ja kewek hawem, ya, ‘Buku lau la-uh o taloh asehek anya, oro anyolom ari ndramak amekes kandriyen ndra-in, mwasin ta aha kasehek sahou hawen.’
Arile, buku none iy banuhun sahou toro bwe, mwasin, ou tiye ki tiri lau mwan ma badih badu bolo iri lau ta Kindrei. Buku batun boto-on ma iy bwalen anuhun sahou toro ale, mwasin, ou atou iy buku none ari ndramak tanan Kindrei bwe, deh iy ndramak ta kolowa luk ta takis ta lau.
“Jo asehek sahou handru ewek tado, iri lakou ado asehek iri mwan ma badih kamekes udu munyak dah, mwasin, Kindrei udu kandrah sekesek ale. Ya saba lakou ado turukiy udu kon munyak, idoh kameh Kindrei ale turukiy udu kandrah.
Ya jo asehek ja ewek tado. Buku none ah la-uh lau badu kon munyak atehei budon ta ah i se ta ari lakou, ya ah asolom ta amekes, o, ta akohok lakou doh, mwasin tama udu kandrah winiyan atehei ewek ta-ah.
Ya, buku none lau la-uh deh lau taloh ame atukum ta nyarak, mwasin, jo amwenen kameh ereu ndrokowa oro.”
Kala doh Pita eme hawe Jises ma ndremenyani iy i buku doh, “Laban, san sabe buku nadu tine kamekes ndra-in keme tek, ya jo kamani kandriyen ndra-in tan doh? Sebwe san ndro taloh le nadeh?”
Ya Jises asumon iy i buku doh, “Jo basehek anya ou mani kandriyen ndra-in tan san ndro taloh le bwe. Jo anya ou mani kandriyen ndra-in tan san ndro taloh, ano san ndro taloh ja, ano san ndro taloh ja, ili ili winiya asahan san nyaran bwe.
Ado kanuhun, tondrok ta Kindrei i buku none ari kabin anya kakohok iri luk oro lau tan ta gok mene andrei buku dinau udu minen, ma oro batehei saluwen bwe le.
Iy anya kamekes lakou doh le, iri tiyani ndramak ari eme hawen, iy kameh kisih luk ki hamon ki ta kabin nane na luk solo-an labai (K10,000,000).
Arile iy ndramak nane tan luk ta edeu saluwe luk nane bwe. Eme ma, kabin nane anya iy kameh atehei iy ndramak nane hawe udun ma nadun ala mada ba-en, ya ari ndramak kasihinei oro kala lau ta gok buku bonyo-ou tan. Ya oro kandrei iri lakou mari ta ndramak nane ki mada ba-en ale ya ta kandriyen doh oro winiyan andrei luk tan mari eme hamon.
Eme ndramak ta gok nane anuhun sahou doh, iy atehei bwili ndru-un in mirihik ta kati kabin nane, ma iy tiye ta kabin nane i buku doh, ‘Ou tikisi jo, ma ou abe-en jo, idah kameh jo winiyan atehei ewek hamon iri luk mari mene jo akohok tam.’
Eme ndramak tinan ta lau ta gok nane tikisi iy, ma iy ruwani iy, ma tiye tan ta iy sadeu luk sala hamon sala tan, ndri-iy ai.
“Arile, ndramak ta gok nane iu ili manan, ya iy atou ndramak ari ta gok badu hawen, iy mene andrei luk tan winiya rinek (K10) le. Eme ma iy tawi ndramak badu hawen nane ta gok, iy tawi balen ma iy asehek sahou boto-on i tan i buku doh, ‘Ou adeu iri luk mari mene ou akohok tek, keme hamon.’
Lau ta gok badu hawen nane anuhun sahou doh, ma iy atehei bwili ndru-un i andri, ya iy tiye ta ndramak nane i buku doh, ‘Ou tikisi jo, ya ou abe-en jo. Idah kameh jo winiyan atehei ewek hamon iri luk mari mene jo akohok tam.’
Arile, ndramak nane bwalen. Eme iy atehei lau badu hawen nane i bolo kou winiya le ndramak nane atehei i hamon iri luk mari iy andrei ta ndramak nane.
“Oro lau ta gok ra-on ja badu hawe uru lau nane atou kandriyen doh, ya ndrine oro andra-i labai. Eme oro ala tiye ta tinan toro.
Eme ya tinan nane luhi ndramak ta gok nane, ma tiye tan i buku doh, ‘Ou lau ta gok ndra-in. Nane ou aden eme tek, ya jo anya ou sasih same hamon iri luk mari mene ou akohok tek.
Jo tikisi ou handru. Arile, buku sah handru ya ou batikisi iy lau ta gok badu hawem nane bwe?’
Ndramak tinan nane ndrinen irih ya iy atehei iy lau ta gok nane i bolo kou ma iy tiye iri lau ta ndrokei katehei maha-an ki tan winiya le iy kasihinei iri luk tan mari nane kili hamon.
“Idoh buku le tama udu kandrah, iy kameh amekes iri kandriyen doh ewek taha mari, buku aha bamani iri kandriyen ndra-in nadu tine aha ari ja amekes ewek taha bwe.”
Jises asehek sahou tan nane ano, iy ruwani kon Galili ma iy iu ili loboho kon Judiya ereu kapa gwa Jodan bilisiu.
Eme iri lau solo-an an hamon tan, ya iy mesekei bada iri nane udu ndra-in amwenen ja.
Eme oro Parasi rayah ame atou Jises ma oro anya kanone iy. Oro ndremenyani iy i buku doh, “Sebwe sahou batanau tataha anya, lau winiyan tikahei udun na saba katin udu budon tan amwenen nadeh?”
Jises asumon boho oro i buku doh, “Sebwe ado batou tarou ta Kindrei ereu bolo buk ndrabun tan bwe nadeh? Bwena handru kala Kindrei mene ‘mesekei lakou mari, iy mesekei lau mwan ma badih.’
Eme Kindrei anya, ‘Ta katin le doh, iy mwan karuwani taman uru tinen ya iy keme len hawe udun, ya uru kasahan ari buruwen.’
Kindrei asehek anya, bada uru la-uh bwe, bada uru ndrasahan ari le buruwen. Idoh le, saba lakou Kindrei ndrasawei mari ndrase, ari ndramak sasaniy ja ai.”
Ya oro Parasi tiye tan i buku doh, “Ya buku sah handru Moses atehei sahou batanau eme tataha ya iy asehek anya ndramak winiyan atorou la-ukei ta amendren tasou ya iy atehei i mine badih ano iy winiyan aruwe badih iu?”
Eme Jises asumon i buku doh, “Batu ado boto-on labai, eme Moses aruwe ado ta atikah badih iu. Arile bwena handru kandriyen doh bwe.
Jo asehek ewek tado i buku doh. Buku none udu ari ndramak bamekes madasarah bwe, ya udun ruwani iy, ma iy i tasou i ta badih ari ja, iy le mesekei karei i tan.”
Oro lau ta Jises anuhun sahou doh, ya oro asehek i buku doh, “Buku none ndramak anya ki-in hamon ta kandriyen buku doh ya iy in hawe udun, sebwe mwasin mwan satasou, ndri-iy.”
Jises asehek i toro i buku doh, “Iri lau mari winiyan bakohok sahou dah bwe. Kindrei atehei boto-on i ta lau ra-on le.
Ado kanuhun. Iri lau rayah areu kede-eh iri ale batasou bwe. Lau ra-on bada iri andra-i kala tine iri tuwi iri. Lau ra-on asan iri, ma iri winiyan bamekes nah bwe, ya ra-on abudon ta amekes gok ta Kindrei, ya iri abeles iri ya iri batasou bwe. Arile, are lau winiyan akohok sahou dah, iy kakohok.”
Kala doh iri lau atiye iri nah bwisik ame hawe Jises. Iri aso-ok anya Jises katehei minen ki la-u iri nah nane, ya iy kasolom. Arile oro lau ta Jises abolosen i tiri lau nane.
Arile Jises tiye toro lau tan i buku doh, “Ado karuwani iri nah kame hawek. Ado saturuk iri, ndri-iy. Tondrok ta Kindrei badeh, tiri lau buku iri nah nadu bwisik kede-eh.”
Eme iy atehei minen i la-u iri nah nane, ano iy ruwani kon nane ma iy iu.
Eme ndramak ari eme atou Jises ma iy anya, “Ndramak ta leheya, jo kamekes saba kandriyen mwasin handru ya jo kakohok kohan mwasin ta ereu le buku doh len mari?”
Jises tiye i tan i buku doh, “Tasah handru ya ou ndremenya jo ta kandriyen mwasin? Ndramak ari le Kindrei, iy mwasin labai. Arile, buku none ou anya akohok kohan mwasin ta ereu le buku doh, ou a-en hamon ta sahou batanau ta Kindrei.”
Eme ndramak nane ndremenya Jises ja i buku doh, “Ou asehek ta saba sahou batanau handru?” Jises anya, “Iri sahou batanau ale anya, ‘Ou sadai ndramak samak, ou samekes karei ta badih tasou. Ou sabahana, ou sawasai, ma sadeu iri lau laleyah sala ta mada sahou, ndri-iy.
Ou a-en bahandra tamam uru tinem, ma ou anuhun sahou turu.’ Ya, ‘Ou aseken iri lau ari ari badu hawem, i le buku ou aso-ok ou le.’”
Eme ndramak loweu nane asehek ta Jises i buku doh, “Jo badeh, in hamon ta sahou batanau mari, ya saba lakou ja jo kamekes?”
Eme Jises asehek tan i buku doh, “Buku none ou anya asahan ndramak mwasin handru, mwasin, ou ala atehei iri lakou tam mari kili mada ba-en, ya luk ou akohok ta iri lakou tam nane ou adeu ki tiri lau tiri lakou bwe. Ou amekes i buku doh kameh ou tam lakou mwasin handru udu kandrah. Ano ou bara-en hamon tek.”
Ndramak loweu nane anuhun sahou doh, ya budon tan andra-i, ma iy iu ai, tasah tan lakou solo-an labai.
Eme Jises tiye toro lau tan i buku doh, “Jo tiye handru ewek tado, idah kameh, boto-on labai ta ndramak tan lakou solo-an, i buku none iy anya kili bolo tondrok ta Kindrei!
Jo asehek tado ja, masakan boto-on boto-on labai ta ndramak tan lakou solo-an ta iy ili bolo tondrok ta Kindrei, arile manamun labai ja ta kamel i buku iy i bolo manamunu nunu.”
Oro lau tan anuhun sahou doh mani oro atur labai, ma oro anya, “Buku none i buku baden eh, are lau handru kameh winiyan akohok kohan mwasin ta ereu le buku doh?”
Eme Jises anyolom amwenen i toro, ma iy anya, “Lau winiyan bwe. Arile Kindrei winiyan mesekei lakou mari.”
Ya Pita asumon bohon anya, “Ou atou, aso ndraruwani lakou mari, ya aso ndra-en hamon tam. Ya idah kameh aso kakohok sasah handru?”
Jises asehek i toro i buku doh, “Jo asehek handru ewek tado, na len lakou mari asahan ha-un, ya Nadu Ndramak Awas kameh akohok nyaran i tinan, ma iy kameh manyah udu koyeu ta kabin, koyeu doh tan amwenen. Na len doh ado lau ale an hamon tek, ado ale kameh manyah ado koyeu ma ronoh la-uh mwasin, ma ado kameh anuhun sahou toro boho kamen ma ronoh la-uh badu Isra-el.
Ya are mwan ma badih ale abudon nyarak, ma iy ruwani asiu tan ma nadu tinen mwan ma buru-un, ma taman uru tinen, nadun ma bilin tan, iy kameh akohok ndramas buku san rinek (100) ja i la-un, ma akohok kohan mwasin ta ereu le buku doh.
Arile lau solo-an na dah areu bwena, iri kameh ame hamon. Ya iri lau solo-an na dah areu hamon iri kameh ame bwena.”
Jises asehek sahou ja anya, “Jo asehek dah tiri lau ale anya ka-en bwena, tasah tondrok ta Kindrei i buku le ndramak ari tan munyak solo-an. Na mandraben handru iy iu ili takaleh iri lau ta ame abo gok ta bolo bilin waen tan.
Oro lau ta gok nane ndraso-ok ta akohok luk ronoh (K1) ta len ari, eme ndramak nane suni oro ala abo gok bolo bilin waen tan.
“Mada an eme ndro ari ndramak nane ili ma iy atou oro lau ra-on areu laleyah areu mada ba-en.
Eme iy tiye toro i buku doh, ‘Ado ale kala kabo gok bolo bilin waen. Ya jo kameh isih ado winiya le gok ado bwidiy.’
Eme oro ala. “Ya, na mada an udu alih ma mada an taloh beyeh, ndramak nane ili amekes buku aliy ale.
Eme na mada an limeh na beyeh, iy ili ja iy atou oro lau ra-on ales laleyah, eme iy ndremenyani oro, ‘Buku sah handru ya len ari ma buruwen dah ado ales laleyah ya ado bamekes ari gok bwe?’
“Oro asumon bohon buku doh, ‘Ari ndramak badeu gok bame taso bo-oh.’ “Ndramak nane anya, ‘Mwasin, ado ale kala kabo gok bolo bilin waen tek.’
“Kon abeyeh handru tama bilin waen nane tiye ta ndramak ta in bwena ta gok tan buku doh, ‘Ou luhi oro lau ta gok kame ya ou adeu sihine oro. Ou adeu sihine oro lau ame hamon ta gok bwena, kano ou adeu sowa oro lau mari kili kisos are lau eme bwena handru ta gok.’
“Eme oro lau nane abo gok na mada an limeh ame akohok sihine oro; oro ari, ari akohok luk ronoh (K1).
Eme oro lau nane oro abo gok ma bwena handru oro ame, oro abudon buku oro kameh akohok luk solo-an ja. Arile bwe. Oro akohok luk ronoh (K1), ndramak ari, ari.
Oro atou luk oro akohok ma oro abolosen i ta tama bilin waen nane buku doh,
‘Oro lau ame hamon oro babo gok luwen bwe, arile ou adeu sihine oro i buku le aso akohok. Arile aso abo gok boto-on handru na mandraben eme isos dah, ya an sulumwi aso andra-i labai.’
“Tama bilin nane anuhun sahou doh ya iy tiye ta ndramak ari toro lau ta gok nane anya, ‘Kawas tek, jo bamekes ari ndra-in bawek tam bwe, sebwe na mandraben handru, talu asehek ta ou kameh akohok luk ronoh (K1), neh?
Ou akohok sihinem ma ou a-au ai. Na so-ok tek amwenen ya jo edeu sihine i ndramak nane in hamon eme i buku le ado nane ame bwena.
Idoh lakou tek amwenen. Sebwe jo winiyan ba-en hamon ta budon tek amwenen ta ondrek luk tek bwe nadeh, neh? Buku none jo anya kamekes kandriyen mwasin ki toro lau doh, buku sah handru ya ou abudon andra-i.’”
Eme Jises anya, “Idoh i buku le iri lau ale an hamon handru, oro kameh ame bwena. Ya oro lau ale an bwena, oro kameh ame hamon ja.”
Jises edek iu ili Jerusalem. Iy kuhi oro lau tan ma ronoh la-uh ala a ka-un, ya oro adek kahis le, Jises tiye toro i buku doh,
“Ado kanuhun, na dah to ala loke ala Jerusalem, ma iri kameh atehei Nadu Ndramak Awas ili mine iri tinan tiri pris ma hawe iri lau ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis. Ya iri kameh atehei iy ili ta mada sahou, ma iri kameh atilik sahou i se ta kadai iy kimek.
Ya oro kameh atehei iy ili mine iri lau ra-on badu leheleh, ta oro lau doh kabobose iy, ma ka-um iy na malou sakabuk i bek, ma katehei iy ki bada kei tondreh. Ya hamon ta len taloh iy kameh amak ja.”
Hamon ta aliy tine uru nah ma la-uh nadu Sebedi hawe nadun uru ame atou Jises. Eme iy atehei bwili ndru-un i andri ma iy anya kandremenya Jises ta lakou ari.
Eme Jises ndremenyani iy anya, “Ou aso-ok saba lakou?” Iy badih nane asehek ta Jises i buku doh, “Jo aso-ok ou asehek anya naduk uru ma la-uh dah kameh manyah areu mirihik hawem areu kon tam ta atondrok, ari ereu minem salin, ari ereu minem kamweu.”
Jises anuhun sahou doh ma iy asumon i buku doh, “Ado tana ado saba lakou ado ndremenya kede-eh bo-oh! Sebwe ah winiyan a-un na bwiniu jo kameh a-un na aliy dah nadeh?” Uru asumon, “Aru winiyan.”
Jises tiye turu buku doh, “Handru, bwiniu kameh jo a-un na aliy, ah kameh a-un na aliy ale. Arile, are kameh manyah ereu minek salin ma are kameh manyah ereu minek kamweu, idoh jo winiyan batiye bwai. Tasah, kon doh tiri lau ale tama Kindrei ndralowosani iri kabwe.”
Ya eme oro lau tan ma ronoh anuhun sahou turu, oro abolosen labai ili turu.
Arile Jises luhi oro mari ame hawen, ma iy asehek i toro i buku doh, “Ado tana ado, iri kabin tiri lau badu leheleh badeh, iri boto-on labai ta atondrok iri lau tiri, ma iri batanau boto-on labai ta iri lau tiri kanuhun sahou tiri handru.
Arile kandriyen doh sa-en ndrokowa ado, ndri-iy. Ndramak anya ki tinan kereu ndrokowa ado, iy kasahan lau ta gok kereu ndrokowa ado.
Ya are lau anya kereu bwena tado, iy kasahan ndramak ta gok laleyah kereu ndrokowa ado.
Idoh le Nadu Ndramak Awas eme ta iri lau kabo gok i tan bwe. Iy eme ta aseben iri, ma ta edeu kohan ta akunoh lau mari.”
Jises hawe oro lau tan ruwani kon tinan Jeriko, ma oro au. Iri lau solo-an labai an hamon toro.
Uru lau la-uh manyah areu kabede san. Uru mada uru bwe, uru anuhun le buku Jises edek eme. Eme ma, uru arah boto-on buku doh, “Laban, ou nadu tubu kabin Debit, ou tikisi aru!”
Iri lau solo-an abolosen i turu ma iri tiye turu ta uru kandru-uk. Arile, bwai, uru aloh ma arah boto-on le gwek anya, “Laban, ou nadu tubu kabin Debit, ou tikisi aru!”
Eme Jises udu rasi ma aloh i turu, “Ah aso-ok jo kamekes sasah kewek ta ah?”
Uru asumon sahou tan i hamon i buku doh, “Laban, aru aso-ok ou sihi mada aru kasak.”
Eme Jises tikisi uru, ma iy atehei minen i mada uru, ma nawin bwe mada uru amwenen, ma uru anyolom kon ja. Ma uru an hamon ta Jises.
Jises hawe oro lau tan ame mirihik ta Jerusalem, oro asahan kon Betapes ereu mandrei Olip. Eme Jises suni uru lau tan ma la-uh,
ma iy tiye turu buku doh, “Ah kala kon to anyolom i aliy don. Suwi labai ah kameh atou donki ari iri sawei udu aliy, ma nadun ale udu hawen. Ah katolowei malou ma kasirini uru kame hawek.
Ya, buku none ari ndramak kandremenya ah, ah katiye ki buku doh, ‘Laban gok udu turu, ano iy baratiyani uru barame hamon ja.’”
Lakou dah asahan ta amekes sahou mene propet ndrasehek bwena asahan handru,
“Kasehek sahou dah ki tiri lau mwan ma badih badu Sayon, ‘Ado kanyolom, kabin tado eme ai. Iy eme buku ari ndramak nyaran bwe, ya iy manyah udu bwele-e donki ari. Ehe, iy manyah udu bwele-e donki ari ndramak bamanyah ba-en bwele-en bwena bwe.’”
Eme uru lau tan ma la-uh nane ala bwidiy buku le nane iy ndratiye turu.
Uru ame sirini donki uru nadun nane, ya uru atehei kolau turu lawe-en badu bwele-e awin turu i la-u uru donki ma la-uh nane, ya Jises manyah udu bwele-en.
Ya iri lau solo-an ame talaha awin tiri lawe-en badu bwele-e iri i san. Ya iri ra-on ala amundroh andra kei, ya iri anyehe ili san.
Iri lau ra-on adek ala bwena ta Jises ma hawe iri ra-on adek an hamon tan, ya iri mari arah i buku doh, “Hosana! Kasekesek ki ta nadu Debit! Kasore nyaran! Iy eme ta nyara Laban!” “Hosana! Kasekesek ki loken mara-ei!”
Jises iu ili bolo kon Jerusalem, ya iri lau mari badu bolo kon tinan nane mani iri lau mari atur tan, ma iri ndremenya iri i buku doh, “Idoh are lau handru?”
Eme iri lau mwan ma badih nane adek hawen anya, “Idah propet nyaran Jises, iy badu kon Nasaret, badu loboho Galili.”
Jises ili loboho bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei ya iy atikah iri lau amekes ba-en udu asiu doh. Iy bukudi iri sau tiri lau ta tokoha luk, ma hawe bwabwai tiri lau asih iri sirih aloh ban.
Ya iy tiye tiri i buku doh, “Buk ndrabun tiye i buku doh, ‘Asiu tek dah, asiu ta amekes salom labai,’ arile ado ndramesekei asiu tek, ndrasahan ‘asumwe iri lau ta bahana.’”
Jises udu bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ya iri lau mada iri bwe, ma hawe kati iri ndra-in ame hawen, ma iy mesekei iri amwenen.
Arile iri pris tinan hawe iri lau tanan ta sahou batanau atou iri lahou tinan iy amekes, ma oro anuhun iri nah arah udu bolo kou ta asiu tinan buku doh, “Hosana! Sekesek i ta nadu Debit!” Idoh mesekei ndrine oro andra-i.
Ma oro ndremenya Jises i buku doh, “Sebwe ou ndranuhun sahou oro amekes doh?” Eme Jises asumon boho oro i buku doh, “Ehe, jo ndranuhun. Arile, sebwe ado banyolom sahou doh bwe, ‘Iri nadu nah atudun nyaran ili loken.’”
Eme iy ruwani oro ma iy iu i len ta kon nane ma iy ili udu Betani na ben doh.
Na mandraben handru Jises edek iu i hamon i kon tinan nane ja, ya iy imeson andra-i labai.
Iy atou kei pik ra-ei ales udu kabede san, ya iy ili mirihik ta aliy. Arile iy batou ari buwan ba-en aliy bwe. La-un le udu aliy. Eme iy tiye ta kei nane buku doh, “Ou winiyan bato-ou salim ja bwai.” Na le liliy kei pik doh asara ai.
Oro lau tan atou lakou doh, ya mani oro atur. Eme oro anya, “Buku sah ya kei doh asara suwi labai?”
Eme Jises asumon boho oro i buku doh, “Jo asehek sahou handru ewek tado, buku none ado atehei budon handru in ta Kindrei ya ado babwerei bwe, ado winiyan mesekei kandriyen jo amekes i ta kei pik nane. Ya idoh le bwe, buku none ado tiye i ta mandrei dah, ‘Ou suri ou ya ou sandroh ala bolo ndras,’ lakou doh kameh asahan buku le ado nane ndratiye.
Ya buku none ado atehei budon boto-on ma asolom, iri lakou ado asolom ta akohok, ado winiyan kuhiy.”
Jises iu ili hamon ili asiu tinan ta Kindrei nane ja, ya iy leheya iri lau mwan ma badih ta bolo sahou mwasin. Eme ya iri lau tinan tiri pris ma hawe iri lau-en ame hawen, ya oro ndremenyani iy i buku doh, “Ou akohok boto-on badu heh handru, ma ou amekes iri lakou kede-eh? Are lau atehei nyaran tinan ewek tam ma tiye ou ta amekes iri lahou dah?”
Jises asumon boho oro i buku doh, “Jo ale jo anya kandremenya ado ta lakou ari. Ya, buku none ado tiye amwenen eme tek, sebwe jo kameh tiye ewek tado are lau handru atehei boto-on eme tek ta amekes gok dah.
Kala Jon mene alomwa iri lau, iy akohok boto-on badu heh? Lakou doh badu kandrah deh, badu kon munyak le?” Eme oro andres udu ndrokowa oro le i buku doh, “Buku none to katiye anya, ‘Idoh lakou badu kandrah,’ idah kameh iy ndremenyani to ja anya, ‘Buku sah handru ya ado batehei budon tado bala ta aliy bwe?’
Arile buku none to katiye anya, ‘Idoh kandriyen tiri lau le,’ idah kameh to anoh iri lau ale, tasah iri anya, Jon badeh, propet ta Kindrei handru.”
Eme oro asumon boho Jises i buku doh, “Aso tana aso bwe.” Eme Jises tiye toro i buku doh, “Jo ale jo winiyan batiye bawek tado are lau handru atehei nyaran tinan eme tek ya jo amekes iri gok dah.”
Jises asehek sahou i toro pris ma hawe oro lau tinan ja i buku doh, “Ehe, ya ado abudon buku sah? Ndramak ari nadun la-uh. Iy ili hawe nadun kadok iy tiye tan buku doh, ‘Naduk, ou ala abo gok bolo bilin waen.’
Nadun tiye tan buku doh, ‘Jo bwalek.’ Arile hamon iy tubuni budon tan ja ya iu ili ibo gok.
Ya ndramak nane ili hawe nadun bwaneh ja, ya iy asehek i buku le aliy ili tan ja. Ya nadun tiye tan buku doh, ‘Abo tama.’ Arile iy bala bwe.
Ya uru nah ma la-uh doh are lau handru in hamon ta budon ta tama uru?” Eme oro lau nane anya, “Nadun kadok.” Eme Jises tiye toro i buku doh, “Jo asehek tado handru, iri lau ta akohok luk ta takis taha ma hawe iri badih ta madasarah kameh ala bwena ala bolo tondrok ta Kindrei.
Tasah, Jon asahan tado bwena ma iy leheya kandriyen mwasin ewek tado, arile ado batehei budon boto-on bala ta aliy bwe. Arile iri lau ta akohok luk taha ta takis, ma hawe iri badih ta madasarah atehei budon boto-on i tan, ma ado atou kandriyen doh, arile ado batubuni budon tado bwe. Ma ado batehei budon boto-on bala ta aliy bwe.”
Jises asehek i tiri lau tinan ja i buku doh, “Ado kanuhun sahou sokek ari ja i buku doh: Ndramak ari bwidi bilin ta waen ari, ma iy bwidi kou awudiy. Ma in bolo bilin nane iy ihi lek ari ta atik ma apis buwa waen, ano iy tahi asiu ra-em ta atondrok. Ano iy atehei bilin ili mine iri salibah ta atondrok. Ma iy iu ili kon rakon ja.
Ya mirihik ta buwa waen nane uni, iy suni iri lohowan tan ala hawe iri lau nane iy atehei bilin i tiri ta atondrok, ta iri kakohok ra-on buwa waen ki hamon ki tan.
“Arile oro salibah ta bilin tawi oro lohowan tan, ubwi ari, adai iy ari, ma orowei ari na bek.
Hamon ta aliy tama bilin suni oro lohowan tan ra-on ja ta gok ala, kane oro solo-an ja sakalawi oro nane ala bwena. Ya oro lau ta gok ta bilin nane tawi oro ya mesekei kandriyen ili toro i buku le bwena nane.
Eme hamon ta aliy tama bilin suni nadun amwenen ili hawe oro. Tama bilin nane abudon buku doh, ‘Sebwe oro kameh anuhun boho naduk.’
“Arile oro salibah ta bilin atou nadun edek eme, ya oro asehek sahou ndrokowa oro buku doh, ‘Ei, nadun eme, to kadai iy, ma to kakuhi iri lakou tan mari.’
Eme oro tawi iy, ma kuhi iy iu ili kona bilin, ma oro adai iy imek.
“Ya ado abudon buku sah? Buku tama bilin keme, eme iy kameh amekes saba lakou handru kili toro salibah nane abo gok an bolo bilin nane?”
Eme oro asehek tan buku doh, “Iy kameh idi oro lau doh amak, ma iy kameh atehei bilin ili mine iri lau rayah ja kabo gok ta aliy, ya buku none buwa waen uni, iy kameh akohok ra-on ale.”
Eme Jises ndremenya oro i buku doh, “Sebwe ado banyolom sahou doh ereu bolo buk ndrabun ta Kindrei bwe nadeh, sahou i buku doh, ‘Bek ale iri lau ta atah asiu bwale iri, na dah, iy ndrasahan kati ndru ta ka-u asiu bek. Idah san ta Laban amekes, ma mwasin labai ta mada taha.’
“Ya jo asehek tado, Kindrei kameh kuhi tondrok tan ereu mine aha lau badu Isra-el eme hamon, ya iy kameh atehei ili mine iri lau ra-on ja ale winiyan a-en hamon ta so-ok tan amwenen.
Are lau oro taku a bada bek doh kameh, ndruwi oro kameh ibok i le bwisik, arile, are lau oro i buku none bek doh, taku i la-u oro, idah kameh ati-i oro abwesek.”
Oro tinan tiri pris hawe oro Parasi anuhun sahou sokek Jises amekes, oro tana oro buku Jises amekes sahou doh i la-u oro.
Idoh mesekei budon toro ta ateu Jises handru, arile oro anoh iri lau mwan ma badih, tasah iri lau mwan ma badih anya Jises badeh, propet.
Jises amekes sahou sokek ili tiri lau ja i buku doh:
“Tondrok ta Kindrei i buku none ari kabin, nadun mwan anya ki tasou, ya kabin nane mesekei tine nyamon.
Ma mwena handru iy atehei sahou ili tiri lau kame ta nyamon ta tasou ta nadun. Ya, na len ta nyamon amwenen iy suni oro lohowan tan ala kaloh iri kame ta nyamon. Arile iri bwale iri.
“Ya iy suni oro lohowan tan ra-on ja, ma iy tiye toro i buku doh, ‘Ado kala katiye tiri lau nane jo ndraluhi iri, ma ado katiye toro buku doh, jo ndralowosani nyamon kabwe. Iri bulumakau mwan ma hawe iri bou apar jo ndradai kabwe, ma jo ndralowosani lakou mari kabwe. Aha kame le kaimon nyamon ta tasou.’
“Oro lohowan tan au ala tiye tiri lau nane, arile iri bwale iri anuhun, ma iri au ala amekes budon tiri amwenen. Ari iu ili bolo bilin tan, ari iu ili amekes gok ta akohok luk tan amwenen.
Iri rayah tawi oro lohowan ta kabin nane luhani oro, ma adai oro amak.
Eme ya kabin nane ibolosen, ma iy suni oro lau tan ta bahun ala adai iri lau nane, ma sulumwi kon tiri andrakak iu.
“Eme kabin nane anya, ‘Nyamon ta tasou ndralowosaniy kabwe, oro lau nane jo aloh oro ma bwena, ado kamani oro.
Ado kadek kala madasan mari, ya are lau ado ndruniy, ado kaluhi iri kame ta nyamon ta tasou.’
Iy tiye i buku doh, ya oro lohowan tan nane au ala kon mari, ma oro luhi iri lau mwasin ma ndra-in ale ame. Asiu ta tasou nane aso na lau.
“Iri lau mari nane manyah ado andri, ya kabin nane eme bolon atou iri. Madan ili, iy atou ndramak ari, iy batehei awin ta ame bolo nyamon ta tasou nane bwe.
Eme kabin nane ndremenyani iy, ‘Kawas tek, buku sah handru ou basini ari awin mwasin ta ame bolo nyamon ta tasou dah bwe?’ Iy ndramak nane basumon bwe.
“Kabin nane tiye toro lau ta ndrokei tan anya, ‘Ado kasawei katin ma minen ya ado kakahei iy ki-iu kili manan bolo lulik. Bolo lulik doh kameh iri lau aden andra-i labai ma lihi iri kameh asenyer andra-i labai.’
“Ado kanuhun. Kindrei aloh taha mari. Arile iy ndralebelei ndramak ari, ari ta ili bolon.”
Eme iri Parasi au ala manan atilik sahou tiri i se, ta takaleh madasan ta bolowa Jises ya sahou tan kinyon ma iri katehei iy ki mada sahou.
Iri suni oro ra-on tiri hawe oro lau ra-on ta Herot, ala atou Jises, ma oro tiye tan i buku doh, “Ndramak ta leheya, aso tanan, ou lau ta asehek sahou handru. Ya, na sahou handru ou ale leheya iri lau mwan ma badih ta kandriyen ta Kindrei. Ou banoh ta ari ndramak bwe. Ya, ou asehek sahou ari le ili tiri lau mari, buku ndramak nyaran tinan, deh, ndramak iy nyaran bwe.
Eme ya, ou asehek kamwenen keme taso. Ou abudon buku sah? Mwasin ta taha kadeu takis ki ta Sisa, deh, ndri-iy?”
Arile Jises ndratanan budon toro ndra-in. Eme ya, iy asehek i buku doh, “Ado lau ta wasai, buku sah handru ado anya kanone jo?
Ado kaleheya keme tek ari luk nane ado asih takis tado na aliy.” Eme oro andrei luk bororoh ari ili minen.
Eme Jises ndremenyani oro i buku doh, “Malawi ndramak ma nyaran kede-eh are lau handru?”
Oro anya “Ta Sisa.” Iy tiye toro, “Mwasin, saba lakou ta Sisa, ado kadeu ki ta Sisa. Ya saba lakou ta Kindrei, ado kadeu ki ta Kindrei.”
Oro anuhun sahou doh ma boho oro asak. Eme ma, oro ruwani iy ma oro au ai.
Na len le nane, oro Sadusi ame hawe Jises anya kanone iy. Oro anya, iri lau ale ndramak bwena mene, iri kameh winiyan bamak ja bwe. Eme oro ndremenyani Jises i buku doh,
“Ndramak ta leheya, Moses bwena mene anya, ‘Buku none ari ndramak imek, ya iy nadun bwe, nadu tinen kameh kandrei nyau tan ki udun, ya iy katehei nah ki tan, ma nah doh ki nyara nadu tinen, ya nyara nadu tinen sa-au, ndri-iy.’
“Ya, len ari bwena, oro lau ma ndro taloh nadu tine oro areu ndrokowa ahi dah. Eme kadok toro i tasou ta badih ari, ya iy nadun bwe ma iy imek. Ma iy ruwani udun i mine nadu tinen oro.
Bwaneh andrei iy, nadun bwe ale ma iy imek. Silih andrei iy buku aliy le, badih nane andromwei oro mari ano ili isos ta kalai.
Oro amak, ya hamon ta aliy badih nane imek ale.
Ya, ou tiye taso. Na len hamon ta iri lau mari amak ame loken ja, badih doh kameh ili udu are lau handru? Ou tanam, iy i tasou ili toro mari.”
Eme Jises asumon boho oro i buku doh, “Ado ndrandra-i labai, tasah ado tana ado tarou ereu bolo buk ndrabun ta Kindrei bwe. Ma ado tana ado boto-on ta Kindrei bwe ale. Eme ya ado asehek sahou laleyah.
Na len iri lau ndramak kameh amak ame awas ja, ya iri kameh winiyan bala batasou ja bwe. Iri kameh asahan buku iri angelo areu kandrah.
Handru labai. Iri lau ndramak bwena, hamon kameh iri amak ja. Sebwe ado batou bolo tarou ta Kindrei iy mene asehek ewek tado bwe nadeh? Iy asehek i buku doh,
‘Jo Kindrei ta Abraham, ta Aisik, ma ta Jekop.’ Sahou doh leheya taha i buku doh: Kindrei atondrok koha oro ma taloh, ma oro ado awas ado hawen kahis le. Eme ma, Kindrei batiye anya iy mene Kindrei tiri lau ndramak, arile na dah, bwe. Bwe! Iy badeh, Kindrei tiri lau koha iri udu aliy kahis le.”
Iri lau mari anuhun sahou doh, mani iri atur ta sahou tan.
Kala doh oro Parasi anuhun buku Jises ndrasokei san toro Sadusi. Eme oro Parasi tukumwi oro a se ma oro ame atou Jises.
Ereu ndrokowa oro, ndramak ari iy tanan labai ta sahou batanau. Iy anya kanone Jises na sahou ya iy ndremenyani iy i buku doh,
“Ndramak ta leheya, saba sahou batanau badeh, tinan handru ma sakalawi iri sahou batanau mari?”
Eme Jises asumon i buku doh, “‘Ou aseken Laban tam Kindrei na ndrinem mari, ma na koham handru mari, ma hawe na budon tam mari.’
Sahou batanau dah tinan handru ma iy batanau udu bwele-en labai.
Ya sahou batanau ari ja i buku le aliy, ‘Ou aseken iri lau ari ari badu hawem, i le buku ou aso-ok ou le.’
Sahou batanau ma la-uh doh kati iri sahou batanau malen mari hawe sahou tiri propet ale.”
Oro Parasi atukum kahis le, Jises ndremenyani oro buku doh,
“Ado abudon i buku sah handru ta ndramak taha aloh Krais o Mesaya? Iy nadu are handru?” Eme oro tiye i tan i buku doh, “Iy nadu Debit.”
Jises ndremenya oro ja i buku doh, “Ya i buku sah handru ya Malawi Ndrabun atehei budon i ta Debit ya Debit aloh ndramak nane ‘Laban’? Debit asehek i buku doh,
‘Laban Kindrei tiye i ta Laban tek i buku doh: “Ou ame manyah ado loboho minek salin, winiya jo le baratehei iri lau ta amekes budon ndra-in i tam barado bahandra katim.”’
“Ado kanuhun. Debit amwenen aloh ndramak nane Laban tan. Ya ki buku sah handru kameh iy ndramak nane ja ki nadu Debit?”
Ari toro winiyan basumon boho Jises bwe. Kala le doh, iri anoh ta ndremenya Jises ta randra sahou ja.
Hamon ta aliy Jises asehek sahou ili tiri lau mwan ma badih hawe oro lau tan.
Iy asehek i buku doh, “Iri lau ta leheya batanau malen hawe iri Parasi leheya aha ta sahou batanau, buku le Moses bwena mene amekes.
Iri sahou mari oro asehek ewek taha badeh, aha kanuhun ma ka-en hamon ta aliy. Arile kandriyen oro amekes, ado sa-en hamon ta aliy, tasah oro asehek iri sahou, arile oro ba-en hamon ta sahou toro bwe.
I buku le oro atisih lau na kandriyen malen solo-an labai ta iri ka-en hamon ta aliy, arile oro winiyan batehei mine oro ta aseben bwe.
“Iri lakou mari oro amekes doh, ta amekes iri lau katou. Oro asin nyeh ndra tinan ta asolom ereu mine oro ma bwili oro, ma oro aseu malou lawe-en ereu kiri awin toro.
Iri anya kamanyah kareu le ndrahu kon ta atudun ta nyamon tinan, ma bwabwai mwasin badu ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis.
Ya oro anya lau mari kasumon oro na len ta baen. Ma oro anya lau kaloh oro ‘ndramak ta leheya.’
“Arile lau saloh ado ‘ndramak ta leheya,’ ndri-iy. Tasah ndramak ari le, iy ndramak tinan ta leheya ado, ya ado mari badeh, nadu tine ado.
Ya ereu kon munyak dah ado saloh ari ndramak tama ado, ndri-iy. Ndramak ari le tama aha, ya iy udu kandrah.
Ya iri saloh ado ‘ndramak ereu bwena,’ ndri-iy, tasah ndramak ari le ereu bwena, iy Mesaya o Krais.
Ndramak nyaran tinan ereu ndrokowa aha iy kasahan lohowan taha.
Ndramak atudun nyaran amwenen ili loken, nyaran kameh eme andri, ya are lau amekes nyaran amwenen eme andri, nyaran kameh ili loken.”
Jises asehek sahou ja i buku doh, “Ado lau tanan ta batanau malen ma ado Parasi, mada ado kaleu! Sisi-in laba tinan doh kameh ewek bwele-e ado! Ado kalime ado la-uh! Tasah, ado ndrasulu-i kou ta ala bolo kon mwasin udu kandrah ereu mada iri lau. Ado ale winiyan bala bolon bwe. Ya, buku none iri lau anya kala bolon, ado aturuk san tiri.
<range>
“Ado lau tanan ta batanau malen ma ado Parasi, ado kabudon kamwenen! Sisi-in laba tinan doh kameh ewek bwele-e ado! Ado kalime ado la-uh! Ado adek bolo kon ma bwele-e ndras mari ta amekes ndramak ari le ta in hamon taha. Ya buku none iy in hamon taha, ado mesekei iy ndramak ta i bolo jih, i buku none ado le. Ado mesekei kandriyen tan asahan ndra-in, sakalawi tado ja.
“Ado lau mada ado bwe! Sisi-in laba tinan doh kameh ewek bwele-e ado! Ado anya kaleheya san ki tiri lau, ado kabudon kamwenen. Ado asehek i buku doh, ‘Buku none ndramak asehek sahou handru i ta asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ma iy tandrakan handru i ta kon loken, idoh lakou laleyah. Arile, buku none ndramak asehek i ta gol ereu bolo asiu ta Kindrei, ma iy tandrakan ili kon loken, idoh kameh iy kabwidi lakou buku iy nane ndrasehek.’
Ado lolo-ou ma mada ado bwe. Saba lakou iy mwasin ereu mada Kindrei? Gol mwasin deh, asiu tinan ta Kindrei? Ado tana ado bwe nadeh? Buku none gol ereu asiu tinan ta Kindrei, gol doh bamesekei asiu tinan ta Kindrei bala mwasin bwe; asiu ta Kindrei le mwasin, ma iy mesekei gol doh asahan mwasin ma ndrabun.
Ya ado ale anya, ‘Buku none ari ndramak tandrakan in bwele-e mada koto-ok, idoh ari lakou handru bwe. Arile, buku none iy tandrakan in bwele-e iri lakou ta asun ere bwele-e mada koto-ok, iy kamesekei buku iy nane ndratandrakan.’
Ado mada ado bwe. Saba lakou mwasin ereu mada Kindrei, iri lakou ta asun nane deh, o mada koto-ok? Iri lakou ta asun nane ereu bwele-e mada koto-ok, idoh lakou laleyah. Arile, mada koto-ok le mesekei iri lakou ta asun nane asahan ndrabun ta Kindrei.
Ya, buku none ou tandrakan ereu bwele-e mada koto-ok, idoh ou asehek sahou ndrabun handru. Ou ndratandrakan udu bwele-e mada koto-ok ma hawe iri lakou mari ta salom nane ereu bwele-e mada koto-ok nane.
Ya buku none ou tandrakan ili bwele-e asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ou ndratandrakan ndrala bwele-e asiu tinan ta Kindrei ma ndrala bwele-e Kindrei ale, tasah ou ado bolo asiu tan.
Ya are lau tandrakan ili kandrah, iy ndratandrakan ndrala ndrahu manyah ta Kindrei ma Kindrei ale, tasah idoh ndrahunen ta manyah.
“Ado lau ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis ma ado Parasi, mada ado kaleu! Sisi-in laba tinan doh kameh ewek bwele-e ado! Ado kalime ado la-uh! Iri bake mari badu bolo bilin ado apou ari, ari i ronoh, ronoh, ya ado adeu ari ari badu bolo ronoh doh, i ta Kindrei. Idoh mwasin, arile ado ndramani iri sahou tinan badu bolo batanau ta Kindrei, buku none kandriyen ta anuhun sahou amwenen, ma tikisiy lau, ma adeu budon boto-on i ta Laban. Sebwe mwasin ta ado ka-en hamon ta sahou batanau tinan ma ado samani iri sahou batanau bwisik nane ale.
Ado mada ado bwe. Ado anya kaleheya san ki tiri lau, arile ado amwenen batou san bwe. Ado atou lakou nadu bwisik buku buruku udu bolo suw tado, ya ado abo gok ta akohok eme len, arile ado batou lakou tinan buku kamel udu bolo suw tado, ya ado a-un le ma sakalami lakou mari.
“Ado lau ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis ma ado Parasi, mada ado kaleu! Sisi-in laba tinan doh kameh ewek bwele-e ado! Ado kalime ado la-uh! Ado sikine kona bwesam ma kona bwekei amwenen, arile nyamon ale ado apwe irek in bolo bwekei tado, ado akohok i san ta bahana ma san ta ndrakok.
Ado Parasi, ado mada ado bwe! Ado kasikine bolo bwesam ma bolo bwekei op, ano konan barasahan mwasin ale.
“Ado lau ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis ma ado Parasi, mada ado kaleu! Sisi-in laba tinan doh kameh ewek bwele-e ado! Ado kalime ado la-uh! Ado buku none ari lek ta lau ndramak areu bolon, konan badeh, iri nyosowaniy na iri kanyeu ma iri lakou konen mwasin labai, arile bolon kodo-oh ndrarahak le ndruwi ndramak ma manahun ndra-in labai.
Ado a buku aliy adeh. Iri lau atou bada ado, iri anya ado mwasin. Arile bolo oda ado kodo-oh irek ta sahou wasai ma kandriyen ta ba-en hamon ta sahou batanau bwe.”
Jises asehek sahou ili ja i buku doh, “Ado lau ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis ma ado Parasi, mada ado kaleu! Sisi-in laba tinan doh kameh ewek bwele-e ado! Ado kalime ado la-uh! Ado a-eh lek mwasin tiri propet, ma ado anyasou lek tiri lau mwasin.
Ma ado anya, ‘Buku none to ka-en hawe iri tubu taha bwena, sebwe to winiyan baseben ta adai iri propet ta Kindrei amak bwe.’
Na sahou ado amekes doh, ado leheya buku none ado nadu iri lau mene adai iri propet ta Kindrei bwena.
Mwasin, ado kadek, ado kabwidiy kano iri kandriyen ndra-in mene iri tubu aha mene ndramesekei!
“Ado mwak ndra-in. Kindrei kameh atehei ado ala ta mada sahou, ma ado kameh ala bolo jih. Ya ado kasahan kamwenen ki buku sah handru?
Ado kanuhun kamwenen! Jo kameh suni iri propet ma iri lau budon tiri mwasin ma iri lau tanan mwasin ta leheya ado, ame atou ado. Arile ado kameh adai iri ra-on amak ma atahi iri ra-on ala bada kei tondreh, hawe iri ra-on kameh ado ubwi iri na malou an bolo asiu ta atukum taha. Ya ado kameh sobolon iri ereu bolo kon tinan taha ma oro kameh sakaliye au ala kon rakon ja.
Kandriyen ta adai iri lau mwasin don adeh, mesekei maha-an eme kon munyak. Maha-an doh kameh ereu bwele-e ado amwenen. Iri adai iri lau mwasin udu ndra kabatana ndraye Ebol eme isos ndraye Sekaraya nadu Berekaya, iy ndramak ale ado adai ereu ndrokowa asiu tinan ta Kindrei ma mada koto-ok. Ado amwenen kameh akohok iri maha-an ta kandriyen ndra-in doh.
Jo asehek sahou handru ewek tado, sohowa iri kandriyen ndra-in doh kameh ewek bwele-e aha lau mwan ma badih ale kede-en.”
Jises asehek sahou ja anya, “Jerusalem, Jerusalem, jo tikisi ado labai, ado adai iri propet, ma ado ateu iri lau Kindrei suni iri ame atou ado, ma ado orowei iri na bek ma adai iri amak. San solo-an jo anya katukumwi nadum oro, buku none iri kakaro tukumwi nadu iri areu bahandra bani iri. Arile ado bwale ado!
Nadah asiu ta salom tado kameh andra-i ma udu laleyah.
Jo asehek tado amwenen, ado winiyan batou jo ja bwe, winiya le len hamon kameh ado anya, ‘Kasekesek ki ta ndramak doh iy eme ta nyara Laban.’”
Jises ruwani asiu tinan ta Kindrei ma iy iu i len, ya oro lau tan ame leheya i tan asiu tinan ta Kindrei nane, konen handru.
Eme iy asehek sahou ja i toro i buku doh, “Ado ndratou iri lakou mari ta asiu kede-eh? Jo tiye tado amwenen, ari ndruwi asiu bek kameh winiyan bales bareu loken bwe. Iri marakon kameh ato-oh iu i andri.”
Jises eme manyah udu bwele-e mandrei Olip, oro lau tan aton le ame ndremenya iy anya, “Ou tiye keme taso, na saba len handru kameh lakou doh kasahan? Ya saba kalem kameh leheya aso buku none len tam ta eme hamon, ma kon munyak ano.”
Jises asumon oro i buku doh, “Ado kanyolom kamwenen, ya ari ndramak sawendreyani ado, ndri-iy.
Iri lau solo-an kameh ame anya iri asehek sahou tek ma anya, ‘Jo dah Krais.’ Ya iri kameh wendreyani lau solo-an.
Ado kameh anuhun kurutuwe bahun ereu mirihik, ma yoyou ta bahun ereu len. Arile, budon tado sandra-i, ndri-iy. Iri lakou doh kameh asahan bwena op, arile lakou mari ta ano kameh, kahis le.
Tasah, kon munyak tinan ari kameh amekes bahun i ta kon tinan ari, ya kabin badu kon rakon kameh amekes bahun i ta kabin badu kon rakon ja. Son kameh asahan bolo kon, ma kon ari ari kameh ndroi asahan.
Iri lakou mari doh anya kasahan buku none sisi-in ta badih anya kato-ou nah.
“Ano, iri kameh ateu ado, ma a-um ado, ma adai ado amak. Iri lau badu kon munyak tinan mari kameh baseken ado bwe, tasah ado an hamon tek.
Na len doh kameh iri lau solo-an aruwe budon tiri udu tek iu, ma au ala hamon. Iri ari, ari kameh nyowonya ndramak ari ja ili tiri lau ndra-in, ma iri kameh bwale iri ndramak ari ja.
Iri propet solo-an ta wasai kameh asahan, ma iri kameh wendreyani iri lau solo-an.
Kandriyen ndra-in solo-an kameh asahan, ma iri lau solo-an kameh ruwani kandriyen ta aseken ndramak ari ja.
Arile, are lau tawiy ili isos munyak ano, Kindrei kameh winiyan akohok iy i hamon ja.
Sahou mwasin dah nyala tondrok ta Kindrei kameh tiyaniy ili isos kon mari, ta iri lau marakon kanuhun, ano kon munyak dah barano.
“Hamon kameh aha anyolom ‘lakou munya-un ndra-in’ propet Daniyel mene tiye, lakou doh munya-un ndra-in ales udu kon ndrabun ta iy sare aliy. (Are lau anyolom sahou dah iy kabudon kamwenen.)
Are lau iri are kon Judiya katobwak kala bolo mandrei.
Are lau ereu bwele-e asiu loken sala hamon sala bolo asiu sakohok lakou tan, ndri-iy.
Ya are lau ereu bolo bilin sala hamon sala sakohok kolau tan, ndri-iy.
Len doh kameh len ndra-in labai tiri badih ale nah ere tiri, ma badih nah ma nyandren.
Aha kasolom ki ta Kindrei ta aha satobwak na len ta jor ma ur, ma na len ta amunyau, ndri-iy.
Tasah, na len ndra-in doh eme kameh kon mari kameh andra-i handru en, sakalawi iri len ndra-in mene kabatana Kindrei bwidi munyak eme taku dah. Ya ari ja hamon winiyan basakalawiy bwai.
Arile, Kindrei ndrasani kane len doh. Ya i buku none iy basaniy bwe, ari ndramak winiyan basakalawiy bwe. Arile, toro lau le nane Kindrei ndranyowonyani oro, iy kameh sani len doh kameh a mo-on.
Ya buku none ari ndramak katiye taha, ‘Krais asah idah!’ deh, ‘Laban asah in kenoh!’ Aha sanuhun, ndri-iy labai.
Tasah, idah kameh, krais ta wendreya ma hawe propet ta wendreya kameh asahan. Ya iri kameh amekes iri lahou tinan ma kalem ta wendreya iri lau, ma iri ale anya kanone iri lau ala budon ta Kindrei udu tiri kataku.
Aha ndranuhun! Jo ndratiye taha bwena.
“Ya, buku none lau asehek anya, ‘Laban ndrame, iy ereu bolo kon lomale an.’ Aha sala, ndri-iy. Ya buku none iri anya, ‘Iy asah aton kenah,’ aha satehei budon taha sala ta aliy, ndri-iy.
Len ta Nadu Ndramak Awas eme hamon kameh mada lau mari atou iy. Iy kameh eme buku le kalik anya ereu rai, lau areu ndra jaha kameh atou ale.
Kon ale oda ari lakou, o ndramak ereu aliy, idoh kamen adeh, iri sirih ta aimon lakou bolo-an le kameh atukum areu aliy.”
“Hamon ta len ndra-in asahan, ‘An kameh ilik, ma bun kameh winiyan banya bwe. Ya ndrau udu kandrah kameh taku ereu kandrah eme andri, ma boto-on mari badu kandrah kameh nyukunyok.’
“Hamon ta aliy, idah kameh kalem ta Nadu Ndramak Awas asahan bolo kandrah, ya lau mari badu munyak kameh aden, ma iri kameh atou Nadu Ndramak Awas asahan ereu bwele-e asi kandrah, ma boto-on tan ma lomadan tinan labai.
Ya kurutuwe ndrah kameh anyar tinan labai, ma iy kameh suni oro angelo tan au ala kati jor ma hahuw ereu bolo munyak dah, ta atukum iri lau tan, ala budon tan udu tiri, ereu kon ranah ili taku ranah ame hawen.
“Ado kanyolom kei pik, ya iy kameh tiye tado. Buku none andran irek ta gwa ma nyabun asahan, ado tana ado, idah kameh mirihik kon i le an ai.
Ya, buku none aha anyolom iri lakou nane jo ndrasehek, aha tana aha len ndrame bakep, ya Nadu Ndramak Awas ndrareu le mada kou ta eme hamon ai.
Jo tiye tado handru en! Iri lau rebesem areu kede-eh kahis na len dah kameh bamak bwe le, iri lakou mari doh kameh asahan.
Kandrah hawe kon munyak dah kameh ano iu, arile sahou tek le kameh winiyan bano bwe.
“Ari ndramak bala tanan len, deh, mada an ta Laban eme hamon bwe. Iri angelo badu kandrah ale ma nadun ale tanan bwe, taman le ari tanan.
Len ta Nadu Ndramak Awas eme kameh asahan, buku le iri lakou mene asahan na len ta Nowa.
Na len bwena ta wadah asahan, iri lau amekes nyamon tinan, iri a-un gwa, iri mwan ma badih atasou ili eme, ili le isos ta len Nowa oro ala bolo ndron tan tinan.
Arile, iri lau tana iri bwe, winiya le wadah eme aluwi iri mari au. Len ta Nadu Ndramak Awas kameh asahan buku le len mene ndrasahan bwena.
Na len doh, uru lau la-uh kameh abo gok se ereu bolo bilin, ya ari kameh iu, ya ari kameh udu api.
Uru badih la-uh kameh alim badu wit areu se, ari kameh andrei iy iu, ya ari kameh udu api.
“Aha kanyolom kamwenen, tasah aha tanan saba len Laban taha eme hamon, bwe.
Arile, budon tado kaleu ta tanan doh: Buku tama asiu i tanan, saba ben handru iri lau ta bahana kameh ame apou asiu tan, iy kameh winiyan bamadin bwe, iy kameh atehei ndrokei, tasah iy winiyan bamukuni iri lau ame apou asiu tan bwe.
Ya buku none aha ale, aha kalokou aha na len mari. Tasah, Nadu Ndramak Awas kameh asahan na len aha batehei budon ta iy eme bwe.
“Are lau iy mwasin ta gok, ma iy budon mwasin? Iy don adeh, tinan tan ndratehei tondrok tiri lau tan ra-on ja ndra-en bahandran ta adeu niri nyamon na len ari ari, iy le tanan.
Sekesek handru in bwele-e ndramak doh, buku none tinan tan eme takalahi iy amekes gok tan mwasin.
Jo tiye tado handru, tinan tan kameh atehei iy ta atondrok iri lakou tan mari.
Arile, buku none iy lau ta gok ndra-in katiye anya, ‘Ndramak ta asiu doh kameh winiyan bame suwi bwe,’
ya iy kameh a-um iri lau ta gok hawen, ma iy kameh ili aimon nyamon ma a-un gwa lolo-ou hawe iri lau ta a-un gwa lolo-ou.
Ya, na len ari, tinan ta ndramak nane ta gok kameh eme hamon na len iy ndramak nane tanan bwe.
Tinan tan kameh sani iy i lunah, ma mesekei iy akohok maha-an buku le iri lau kalime iri la-uh. Iy kameh anyar, ma asenyer lihin.
“Tondrok ta Kindrei udu kandrah i buku le oro badih bihin ma ronoh. Ndramak ari anya ki tasou. Eme ma, iri badih bihin doh bwese-ei sun toro ta ala ndruni iy in san ma tiyani iy eme ta molak.
Oro limeh badeh bale oro bwe, ya oro limeh oro tanan labai.
Oro limeh bale oro bwe nane bwese-ei lam toro, oro bakohok ra-on ndrelekei ja bwe.
Oro limeh nane bale oro udu aliy, oro kuhi lam toro, ma oro kuhi ndrau ndrelekei ari ale.
Ndramak nane ta tasou bame suwi bwe, ya oro badih nane mada oro amadin, ya oro amadin.
“Na ndrukulu ben alih, iri anuhun ndramak ari aloh i buku doh, ‘Iy ndrame, ndramak ta tasou ndrame! Aha kame katou iy.’
“Eme oro badih ma ronoh nane amak, mine oro i ta sun toro, anya katelem ja.
Eme ya, oro limeh nane bale oro bwe, tiye toro limeh nane bale oro udu aliy, ‘Ado kanyohan aso sese ndrelekei tado, sun taso anya kamak ai.’
“Arile oro limeh nane bale oro udu aliy anya, ‘Sebwe winiya to bwe nadeh! Ado ka hamon kala kasih ra-on ja kewek tado.’
“Eme oro badih ma limeh nane adek au ala hamon ala asih toro ndrelekei, oro adek ala anya kasih le badeh, ndramak ta tasou nane asahan, ya oro limeh nane ndralowosani oro ma oro abe-en iy, oro au ala bolo asiu hawen, ma oro aimon nyamon ta tasou nane, ma iri sulu-i kou ihis.
“Luwen bwe oro badih limeh nane ame hamon aloh anya, ‘Laban, Laban, ou sulu-i kou, aso anya kawek asiu.’
“Arile iy asumon boho oro anya, ‘Jo tiye handru, jo tanan ado bwe oh!’
“Eme ya, ado kanyolom kamwenen, tasah ado tana ado bwe, saba len, ma saba mada an handru, kameh iy eme hamon ja.
“Tondrok ta Kindrei kameh i buku le ndramak ari anya kedek kili kon ari leheleh, ya iy luhi oro lohowan tan ya iy indrom luk tan ili toro ta oro katondrok.
Iy abudon kandriyen ta gok ma nyamu lohowan tan ari, ari. Eme ya, i ta iy ari, iy atehei lamalou (K5,000), i ta ari ja iy atehei lulou (K2,000), i ta ari ja iy atehei ralou (K1,000), ano iy akohok tekedek tan iu ili kon len.
Iy nane kuhi lamalou (K5,000), nawin bwe iy ili amekes ba-en na luk tan, eme ya iy kuhi lamalou (K5,000) ja ili hawen.
Ya iy nane kuhiy lulou (K2,000) mesekei buku aliy ale, ma iy kuhi lulou (K2,000) ja ili hawen tan nane.
Arile, iy ari nane kuhiy ralou (K1,000) le, ili ihi lek ili bolo ndren, ma iy tone luk ta tinan tan nane.
“Jaha solo-an iu ano tinan toro lohowan nane eme hamon, ma iy ndremenya oro ta luk tan mene iy atehei ili mine oro.
Ndramak nane kuhi lamalou (K5,000) eme madan ma iy anya, ‘Tinan tek, ou mene atehei lamalou (K5,000) eme tek. Jo ili ja mesekei lamalou (K5,000) ja ndrala hawen.’
“Tinan tan anya, ‘Lohowan tek, ou ndramak mwasin, ou ndranyowo-ei lakou nadu bwisik, idah kameh jo mesekei ou atondrok lakou tinan; ou ala bolo kon tek ta sekesek.’
“Ya iy ndramak nane kuhi lulou (K2,000) eme madan ma iy anya, ‘Tinan tek, ou atehei lulou (K2,000) eme minek, jo ndramesekei lulou (K2,000) ja ndrala hawen.’
“Tinan tan tiye tan, ‘Ou ndramak mwasin; Ou ndranyowo-ei lakou nadu bwisik, idah kameh jo mesekei ou atondrok lakou tinan, ou ala bolo kon tek ta sekesek.’
“Iy ndramak nane kuhi ralou (K1,000) le eme bwena ma iy anya, ‘Tinan tek, jo tanan ou badeh, ndramak ta losen. Ou akohok lakou laleyah ma akohok lakou badu bwisi limem bwe.
Eme ya, jo inoh, ma jo ili tone luk tek nane ili bolo ndren. Idoh luk ralou (K1,000) tam kewek hamon.’
“Arile tinan tan anya, ‘Ou ndramak ndra-in ma ou lau ta awoyah! Ou tanam jo kameh akohok lakou jo batah bwe, ma jo kameh atukum nyamon bolo kon mari ale jo bakeh badu nyamon bala aliy bwe.
Tasah handru ou mene batehei luk tek bala mine iri lau ta amekes luk asahan solo-an bwe? Ya, buku none jo asahan, jo kameh akohok luk tek ma saba lakou ja badu hawen.
Ado kakuhi luk ralou (K1,000) ereu minen keme len, ma katehei kili mine iy lau tan nane akohok lamalou (K5,000) i bwele-e lamalou (K5,000) mene udu minen ta atondrok.
Tasah, i ta ndramak ari, ari tan lakou udu aliy, idah kameh iy akohok solo-an ja ili la-un. Arile, ndramak tan lakou bwe, ya sese le iy tawiy, idah kameh kuhi mari ano iu.
Ya, ta lohowan ndra-in nane, ado kakahei iy kili bolo kon lulik. Kon doh iri kameh aden ma asenyer lihi iri.’”
Jises asehek sahou ili ja anya, “Na len Nadu Ndramak Awas eme ma lomadan, iri angelo tan ale ereu hawen, iy kameh manyah ereu koyeu tan lomadan handru.
Ya, iri lau mari badu munyak kameh ame atukum areu madan, ya iy kameh apou iri, ari i len, ari i len, buku none iri lau ta atondrok lebelei iri sipsip hawe me.
Ma iy kameh atehei iri sipsip ala minen salin, ma iri me kameh ala minen kamweu.
“Ya kabin kameh tiye toro lau areu minen salin anya, ‘Ado kame, tama ndranyosowani ado. Ado kame kakohok ndrahune ado, tama ndralowosaniy kala munyak dah ma ha-un kahis le.
Tasah, bwena jo imek son, ou adeu nek nyamon, balek amar ou atehei wa-ik gwa, jo lau badu leheleh ou luhi jo ili asiu.
Jo kolau bwe, ou atehei kolau ra-ei eme jo taniy, jo ibo sik ou ame tondrokei jo, jo in bolo kou, ou ame anyolom jo.’
“Ya iri lau mwasin kameh asumon iy anya, ‘Laban, na saba len ahi atou ou amak son, ya aso nyohonei ou; ya, na saba len balem amar ya aso atehei wa-im gwa?
Na saba len aso atou ou lau badu leheleh, ya aso luhi ou ame asiu; ya, ou kolau ta taliye bwe, ya aso atehei kolau ra-ei ewek ya ou taniy?
Ya na saba len ou abo sik, ya, ou areu bolo kou, ya aso awek anyolom ou?’
“Ya kabin kameh asumon i buku doh, ‘Handru, jo tiye tado, buku none ou ndrabwidiy ndrala ta ari nadu tinek laleyah kede-eh, ou ndrabwidiy ndrame tek.’
“Ya iy kameh tiye toro lau areu minen kamweu i buku doh, ‘Ado ka-au ka len! Lakou ndra-in udu la-u ado. Ado kala bolo jih, tama ndralowosaniy ta balik hawe oro angelo tan.
Tasah, jo imek son ado banyohan jo nyamon bwe, balek asamar ado badeu wa-ik gwa bwe.
Jo lau badu leheleh ado baluhi jo bawek asiu bwe, jo kolau ta taliye bwe, ado badeu kolau bame tek ta taliye bwe, jo ibo sik ma jo in bolo kou ado bame banyolom jo bwe.’
“Oro kameh asumon i buku doh, ‘Laban na kahis aso atou ou amak son, deh, balem amar, deh, ou lau badu leheleh, deh, ou kolau ta taliye bwe, deh, ou abo sik, deh, ou a-en bolo kou, ya aso banyohan ma bawek batou ou bwe?’
“Iy kameh asumon i buku doh, ‘Handru jo tiye tado, buku none ou bamekes bala ta ari ndramak laleyah kede-eh bwe, ou bamekes bame tek bwe le.’
“Ya oro kameh au ala bolo kon ndra-in, arile iri lau mwasin kameh au ala bolo kon mwasin.”
Jises bwidi iri sahou doh ano, iy tiye toro lau tan anya,
“Ado tana ado, len la-uh hamon kameh taha abudon len tinan ta Pasoba, ma Nadu Ndramak Awas kameh, iri atehei iy ili mine iri lau ndra-in, ma oro kameh tatahi iy ili bada kei tondreh.”
Na len doh iri tinan tiri pris hawe iri lau tinan areu bwena tiri Isra-el atukum areu asiu ta tinan tiri pris, nyaran Kayapas.
Oro atilik sahou toro i se ta takaleh san ta wendreya Jises, ma kateu iy, ma kadai iy kimek.
Arile, oro tiye anya, “To samekes na len tinan ta nyamon, ndri-iy, koro-an iri lau kabokoro-ei ma bahun tinan kasahan.”
Jises udu Betani udu asiu ta Saimon, iy bwena lepra udu tan.
Jises udu andri aimon nyamon kahis le, badih ari eme ma bwisi ndrau ari ma ndrelekei manahun mwasin udu bolon, lakou doh sowan tinan labai, ma iy solowei ili batu Jises.
Oro lau tan atou, ma oro abolosen ma oro anya, “Aden! Tasah handru iy asolou ndrelekei mwasin doh iu laleyah?
Ndrelekei doh nane katehei kili mada ba-en ya luk solo-an asahan ta aliy, ya katehei ki tiri lau tiri lakou bwe.”
Arile, Jises tanan budon toro, ma iy anya, “Ado abudon ndra-in i ta badih kede-eh tasah? Badih kede-eh ndramesekei lakou tinan ma mwasin labai ndrame tek.
Iri lau tiri lakou bwe kameh len mari ado hawe ado, arile jo kameh winiyan bado hawe ado len mari bwe.
Iy solowei ndrelekei doh eme badak ta alokou jo ta ili bolo lek.
Handru, jo tiye tado. Saba kon iri atiye sahou mwasin ili udu bolo kon munyak dah, saba lakou iy ndrabwidiy dah kameh iri asehek ta aliy ta abudon nyaran.”
Ano ya iy ari ereu ndrokowa oro ronoh la-uh nyaran Judas Iskariyot, iy ili atou oro tinan tiri pris.
Ma iy tiye toro, “Saba lakou handru kameh ado atehei eme tek, buku none jo atehei iy ewek mine ado?” Eme oro sihinei iy na bek nyikilikin silba ma tonoh (30).
Kala doh iy takaleh madasan ta katehei iy kili mine oro.
Na len ma bwena ta nyamon tinan ta jabi ramen oro bamekes yis bala bolon bwe, oro lau ta Jises ame ndremenya iy anya, “Saba kon ou aso-ok aso kalowosaniy ta to kaimon nyamon ta Pasoba kudu aliy?”
Eme iy anya, “Ado kala bolo kon tinan kala katou ndramak ari ma katiye ki tan, ‘Ndramak ta leheya anya, len tek ndrame mirihik; jo kameh aimon nyamon udu asiu tam hawe oro lau tek.’”
Eme oro lau ta Jises mesekei buku le Jises nane ndrasehek, ma oro lowosani nyamon ta Pasoba ma asiu buku le aliy.
Kon abeyeh Jises hawe oro lau tan ma ronoh la-uh manyah ado andri ta aimon nyamon.
Oro aimon nyamon kahis le, iy tiye, “Jo asehek sahou handru ewek tado, iy ari ereu bolo ado kede-eh kameh atehei jo ili mine iri lau ndra-in.”
Eme oro tikisiy handru en, ma oro ari ari ndremenya iy anya, “Laban ou tiye, jo deh, bwe?”
Eme iy asumon boho oro anya, “Are lau na dah edeu minen i bolo bwekei hawek, iy kameh adeh, atehei jo ili mine iri lau ndra-in.
Nadu Ndramak Awas kameh imek i buku le tarou mene ndratorowenei ta nyalan. Arile sisi-in laba tinan kameh i bwele-e ndramak iy ale atehei Nadu Ndramak Awas ili mine iri lau ndra-in, sebwe mwasin tinen mene satuwi iy, ndri-iy!”
Judas, iy lau kameh edeu iy ili mine iri lau ndra-in, ndremenya anya, “Ndramak ta leheya, jo deh bwe?” Jises tiye tan, “Ou ndratiye badeh, kabwai.”
Kala oro aimon nyamon doh, Jises kuhi jabi ramen, ma iy asolom i la-un, iy boso-ei i noro lau tan, ma iy anya, “Ado kakohok ma ado kaimon, idah odak amwenen.”
Ano iy kuhi bwiniu waen, ma iy edeu wurah i ta aliy, ano iy edeu wa-i oro lau tan, iy anya, “Ado mari ka-un.
Tasah, idah ndrayek ta sahou randra le, ndrayek amou ta sikine lau mari ta kandriyen ndra-in tiri.
Jo asehek tado, jo kameh winiyan ba-un ndraye buwa waen dah hawe ado ja bwe, winiya le len jo kameh a-un ja i san ha-un hawe ado udu bolo tondrok ta tama amwenen.”
Eme oro ayah wari ari ta atudun, ano ma oro au ala mandrei Olip.
Ano Jises tiye toro i buku doh, “Ado mari kameh ruwani jo, ma sakaliye au na ben dah, tasah iri ndratorowei bwena udu bolo buk ndrabun i buku doh, ‘Jo kameh idi ndramak ta tondrok, ya iri sipsip tan kameh aseker laleyah.’
Arile, hamon ta aliy kameh jo amak ja, ya jo kameh ili bwena tado ili Galili.”
Pita asumon iy i buku doh, “Buku none oro mari atou lakou asahan tam, ya oro anoh ma aseker, jo kameh winiyan baruwani ou bwe.”
Jises tiye tan anya, “Handru jo asehek tam. Na ben dah kameh, kakaro baden bwe le, ou kameh besebes anya ou tanam jo bwe san tulusin.”
Pita tiye tan anya, “Jo winiyan basehek sahou badeh bwe, buku none jo imek hawem jo winiyan babesebes anya jo tanan ou, bwe.” Eme ya oro lau tan mari asehek sahou buku aliy ale.
Ano Jises ma hawe oro lau tan au ala kon ari aloh Getsemeni. Eme iy tiye i toro lau tan, “Ado kamanyah kado dah, ya jo kameh ili sese kodo-oh asolom.”
Iy kuhi Pita hawe nadu Sebedi uru ma la-uh, iy tikisiy ma budon tan andra-i labai.
Iy tiye toro anya, “Jo tikisiy labai, ma jo anya kimek. Ado kado dah ma mada ado katele hawek.”
Eme Jises edek ili bwena sese, ma iy taku i le batalan. Eme ma iy asolom i buku doh, “Tama, buku none winiyan eh, ou kuhi maha-an ta tikisiy udu bwele-ek dah ki-iu, arile idoh budon tek le, ou amekes saba lakou ou tanam mwasin.”
Ano, iy eme hamon iy atou oro lau tan ndramadin, ma iy tiye ta Pita, “Buku sah handru ya ado winiyan bareu loken luluwen hawek bwe?
Ado kanyolom ma ado kasolom ki ta Kindrei ta ado sataku sala bolo kandriyen ndra-in. Ndrine ado aso-ok handru ta amekes gok, arile oda ado badeh, boto-on handru bwe.”
San rasan ja Jises iu ili len ma iy asolom, “Tama, buku none maha-an dah winiyan ba-au bwe winiya le jo kanyuwiy, mwasin, tama jo in hamon ta budon tam.”
Ano ja iy eme hamon atou oro ndramadin ja, tasah mada oro amadin labai.
Jises ruwani oro areu gwek, iy iu ili hamon asolom san rasan ja, iy tiye sahou buku le iy nane ndrasehek ndrala ta taman.
Ano iy eme hamon atou oro lau tan ma iy anya, “Ado kede-eh amadin ma amunyau kahis le? Ado katou! Mada an ndrano ai. Idah kameh, Nadu Ndramak Awas kameh ili mine iri lau ndra-in ai.
Ado kareu loken, to ka-au. Ado katou, iy ndramak ta atiye jo ili mine iri lau ndra-in asah ndrasahan idah.”
Iy asehek sahou kahis le, Judas, iy badu hawe oro lau ma ronoh la-uh nane, iy edek eme hawen, hawe iri lau solo-an handru en, ma samen ma kei udu mine iri. Iri tinan tiri pris ma ndramak ereu bwena tiri lau suni oro ame.
Judas nane ndratiye toro i buku doh, “Are lau jo atehei bohok i bohon, badeh iy le ai, ado katawi iy ai.”
Judas ales amwenen ili hawe Jises ma iy anya, “Ei, ou ndramak ta leheya!” Ma iy atehei bohon i boho Jises.
Eme Jises asumon bohon anya, “Kawas tek, sasah ou anya amekes, ou amekes ai.” Iri lau ame atehei mine iri i ta Jises ma tawi iy.
Ndramak ari badu hawe Jises aluwi samen tan, ma sani ka-u ndranye bonyo-ou ta tinan tiri pris iu.
Jises tiye tan, “Ou atehei samen tam ki hamon ki ndrahunen! Are lau akohok samen, iy kameh imek na samen.
Sebwe ou tanam bwe nadeh? Jo winiyan ndremenya tama, ya iy winiyan suni iri angelo solo-an labai, kane iri sakalawi iri lau ta bahun badu kon munyak tinan ma ronoh la-uh, tukumwi i le se.
Arile, buku none jo kamesekei buku doh, sahou ta Kindrei ereu bolo buk ndrabun tan kameh basahan handru bwe. Buk ndrabun ta Kindrei anya, iri lakou doh kasahan tek.”
Kala doh Jises asehek tiri lau nane ta ateu iy anya, “Buku sah ya ado ame ma samen hawe kei ta ateu jo, jo ari lau ta amekes ramwes deh? Len mari jo manyah udu bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei ma jo asehek sahou ma leheya aha, ya aha bateu jo bwe.
Arile iri lakou mari dah asahan ta amekes sahou iri propet mene ndratorowenei asahan i handru.” Eme oro lau ta Jises mari ruwani iy ma oro atobwak au.
Iri lau nane tawi Jises kuhi iy ili asiu ta Kayapas iy tinan tiri pris. Iri lau ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis ma hawe iri lau-en atukum ado aliy.
Arile, Pita in hamon tiri ili, iy ili isos bada kowah ta mada asiu ta Kayapas. Iy iu ili bolo kowah ma iy manyah hawe iri lau ta ndrokei, iy anya kanyolom saba lakou handru kameh asahan ta Jises.
Oro tinan tiri pris ma hawe iri lau mari ta kansol nane anya kanone katakaleh ari sahou wasai kihis bada Jises ma iri kadai iy kimek.
Iri lau solo-an ame asehek sahou wasai, arile iri batakalahei ari lakou ndra-in Jises mesekei bwe. Hamon ta aliy uru lau la-uh asahan.
Ma uru anya, “Ndramak kede-eh anya, ‘Jo winiyan tohowei asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ya len taloh hamon jo winiyan tahiy i loken ja.’”
Tinan tiri pris suri iy ereu loken ma iy tiye ta Jises anya, “Ou randra sahou ta tiye i ta sahou nane doh oro to-en ewek tam deh bwe?”
Arile bwai, iy andru-uk le ai. Ano, tinan tiri pris asehek sahou i tan ja anya, “Jo ndremenya ou na nyara Kindrei kohan udu aliy, ya ou tandrakan handru ki loken ma ou tiye taso. Ou kede-eh Krais handru deh bwe? Ya ou Nadu Kindrei?”
Jises asumon bohon anya, “Ou ndrasehek badeh kabwai. Arile jo tiye tado, hamon kameh ado anyolom Nadu Ndramak Awas kameh manyah udu loboho lim salin ta Kindrei iy boto-on labai, ya iy kameh udu bwele-e asi jor badu kandrah eme.”
Eme ma tinan tiri pris ibolosen ta sahou doh ya iy tarani awin tan le ma iy anya, “Iy ndrabobose nyara Kindrei kabwai. Ya buku sah ja to anya kasilah sahou ta i badan ja? Ado mari ndranuhun sahou bobose nane.
Ya ado abudon i buku sah?” Eme iri asumon anya, “Iy ndrabwidi kandriyen ndra-in, ya iy kimek ta aliy.”
Ano iri amuri bwilin ma a-um iy, ya oro ra-on atahan lim i kapan,
ma anya, “Ou ndramak Kindrei ndraleheyaniy, ou asehek sahou buku none iri propet. Ou tiye taso, are lau a-um ou doh?”
Pita manyah udu manan boho asiu, ya badih ari lohowan ta tinan tiri pris eme atou iy, ma iy anya, “Ou ale, ou are hawe Jises badu Galili.”
Arile Pita besebes udu mada iri lau mari anya, “Jo tanak saba sahou ou asehek kede-eh bo-oh.”
Ya Pita suri iy ma iy iu ili manyah udu madasan ta eme asiu. Badih ta lohowan ari ja atou iy, ma iy tiye toro lau areu mirihik tan anya, “Iy ndramak kede-eh badu hawe Jises badu Nasaret.”
Pita anuhun ma iy anya ja, “Jo tanan ndramak badeh bwe, handru!” Ma iy tandrakan ale.
Luwen bwe iri lau areu san ame, ma tiye ta Pita, “Handru labai, ou kede-eh ari ai badu hawe oro, tasah sehek sahou tam kede-eh buku le aliy, handru en!”
Ano Pita tandrakan boto-on labai, “Jo asehek sahou handru, jo tanan ndramak badeh, bo-oh. Buku none jo wasai, Kindrei kamesekei maha-an keme la-uk.” Iy asehek sahou ano le badeh, kakaro eden.
Ano, Pita bwetenei sahou ta Jises ndratiye ndrala tan anya, “Kakaro baden bwe le, ou kameh besebes anya ou tanam jo bwe san tulusin.” Eme iy iu ili len, ma iy eden andra-i labai.
Na mandraben handru en, iri tinan tiri pris ma hawe iri lau tinan amekes budon i bada Jises ta kadai iy kimek.
Iri sawei iy, ma tiyani iy ili, ma atehei iy ili mine tinan tiri Rom nyaran Pailat.
Judas, ndramak ta edeu Jises ili mine iri lau ndra-in, iy i tanan ta iri atehei maha-an i la-u Jises, iy tubuni budon tan, ma iy kuhi luk silba bororoh ma tonoh (30) iu ili hamon ili mine tinan tiri pris ma tinan tiri lau.
Iy anya, “Jo ndrabwidi kandriyen ndra-in. Ndramak jo atehei ewek mine ado badeh, babwidi ari kandriyen ndra-in bwe, ya ado kameh adai iy imek.” Oro asumon bohon i buku doh, “Ari lakou taso bwe, badeh lokowam labai.”
Iy akahei luk nane ili andri in bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ma iy sakaliye iu. Eme iy ili simidi iy.
Tinan tiri pris kuhi luk nane ma iy anya, “Luk dah ta sa-oh. To satehei sala hawe luk badu bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ndri-iy.”
Oro mari atehei sahou i se, ya luk nane oro sihinei munyak ranah tiri lau ta amekes kun na ndren, ya munyak doh iri a-eh iri lau badu leheleh amak ala aliy.
Idoh le ya iri aloh munyak doh, “Munyak ta ndra,” eme isos dah.
Idoh mesekei sahou ta propet nyaran Jeremaya asahan handru anya, “Oro kuhi luk silba bororoh ma tonoh (30), kanen badeh, iri lau badu Isra-el sekesek ta akohok buku none sihinen,
Ya na luk nane oro sihinei munyak tiri lau ta amekes kun, buku none le Laban tiye tek.”
Jises ales udu bwena ta tinan tiri Rom, ma iy ndremenya iy anya, “Ou kabin tiri Juwis, neh?” Jises anya, “Ou ndrasehek badeh, kabwai.”
Arile, iy basumon ari sahou bwe-en, kala tinan tiri pris hawe tinan tiri lau to-en sahou ili tan.
Eme Pailat tiye tan buku doh, “Oh anuhun iri sahou doh iri lau to-en ewek la-um kede-eh deh bwe?”
Arile Jises basehek ari sahou bwe, idoh mesekei tinan tiri Rom abudon solo-an labai.
Jaha mari na len ta nyamon tinan, ndramak in bwena ta kon tinan ruwani ndramak ari badu bolo kou eme len. Iri lau le aloh nyaran, ya Pailat kameh aruwe iy ili mine iri.
Na len doh ndramak ari nyaran Barabas udu bolo kou ale tasah iy ta amekes kandriyen ta ramwes.
Iri lau tukumwi iri, ma Pailat ndremenya iri anya, “Aha aso-ok are lau jo karuwaniy kewek mine aha? Barabas deh Jises, iri asehek anya iy Krais, Kindrei suni iy eme.”
Pailat asehek buku doh, tasah iy tanan, ndrine iri ndra-in ta Jises, ma iri tiyani iy eme mada sahou.
Ma kala Pailat manyah udu bada koyeu tan ta anuhun sahou kahis le, udun atehei sahou eme anya, “Ou samekes ari lakou sala bada iy lau badeh, ndri-iy, tasah na ben jo ameh jo atou ndramak badeh, ya ameh doh mesekei budon tek andra-i labai.”
Eme iri tinan tiri pris ma oro lau tinan tiri lau sosokok iri lau solo-an dah anya, “Aha kaloh, ‘Ahi aso-ok Barabas keme mine ahi, ya ou adai Jises kimek.’”
Pailat ndremenya iri ja, “Are lau handru aha aso-ok jo karuwaniy kewek mine aha?” Iri arah, “Barabas!”
Eme Pailat ndremenya iri, “Ya jo kamekes sasah ki ta Jises iri aloh Krais?” Iri mari anya, “Katahi iy ki bada kei tondreh!”
Iy anya, “Buku sah handru, saba lakou ndra-in handru iy mesekei?” Arile bwai, iri sarakau i loken le gwek anya, “Katahi iy ki bada kei tondreh!”
Pailat ndratanan ai, buku iri kameh winiyan banuhun sahou tan bwai, ya mirihik bahun anya kasahan. Eme iy kuhi gwa, ma iy sikine minen ereu mada iri lau mari, ma iy anya, “Ado sato-en sahou same la-uk buku none ndramak dah imek. Lokowa ado ai!”
Eme iri lau mari anya, “Ndrayen badeh, keme la-u ahi, ma nadu ahi!”
Pailat eme ruwani Barabas ili mine iri, arile iy atehei Jises ili mine iri lau ta bahun, ta iri ka-um iy na malou sakabuk i bek. Ano iy atehei Jises ili mine iri lulik ta katahi iy kili ta kei tondreh.
Iri lau ta bahun ta Pailat kuhi Jises ili bolo asiu tinan ta atukum tiri Rom, ma iri mari tukumwi iri ame ales are madan.
Eme iri tarani kolau tan iu, ma atehei kolau ari saraman lawe-en ili la-un.
Ya oro tabuwi bada malou bobodon i se buku none barak ma atehei ili batun. Ano oro atehei bala banap ari ili minen salin; ano oro atehei bwili ndru-u oro in bwena tan ma oro bobose iy anya, “Ou kabin tiri Juwis ou, areu le buku doh len mari!”
Eme oro amuri iy, ano oro kuhi bala banap nane ereu mine oro ubwiy i batun.
Oro bobose iy ano, oro tolowei kolau saraman nane udu la-un iu, eme ma oro tani kolau tan amwenen ili hamon i badan. Ano oro sirini iy iu ili ta kadai iy ki bada kei tondreh.
Oro adek au ala len, oro ndruni ndramak ari badu Sairini nyaran Saimon. Oro lau ta bahun andrekei iy bwese-ei kei tondreh ta Jises.
Oro ame asos kon iri aloh Golgata, moson ta aliy iri aloh, “Kon ta bwisi bar ta ndramak.”
Oro atehei waen, oro tubuni i hawe gwa ari nyakadan labai anya iy ka-un, arile Jises atona, eme iy ba-un bwai.
Oro atahi iy i bada kei tondreh, ano oro atehei kolau tan i andri ma oro amekes laki na aliy, ta andrei kolau tan i le winiya iri.
Ano oro manyah ado andri, ma oro atondrok iy.
Udu bwele-e batun loken, oro torowenei sahou tanan ta bobose anya, “Idah Jises, Kabin tiri Juwis.”
Ano oro atahi uru lau la-uh ta bahana areu mirihik ta Jises. Iy ari ereu minen salin, ya iy ari ereu minen kamweu.
Eme ya iri lau adek mirihik tan, nyokoda batu iri ili eme ma bobose Jises i buku doh,
“Ou adeh, ou mene anya ou kameh tohowei asiu tinan ta Kindrei eme andri, ano kameh ou tutuniy ja na len taloh le. Ya abo, ou sebenei ou le ai, buku none ou Nadu Kindrei, ou ame andri ta kei tondreh badeh!”
Oro tinan tiri pris ma iri lau ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis ma tinan tiri lau bobose Jises buku aliy ale.
Iri anya, “Iy sebenei iri lau rayah, arile iy winiyan basebenei iy amwenen bwe! Iy badeh, kabin tiri Isra-el; iy keme andri ta kei tondreh, ya eme aso kameh atehei budon taso in hamon tan.
Iy atehei budon tan in ta Kindrei, ma iy anya, iy badeh, Nadu Kindrei. Mwasin, aso anya katou iy kasebenei iy amwenen na dah
Uru lau mala-uh nane sukik areu hawen ale asehek sahou ndra-in i tan ale.
Na mada an udu le alih, lulik tubuluhi kon marakon udu gwek winiya mada an i taloh na beyeh.
Mada an ili taloh na beyeh, Jises arah boto-on labai anya, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” moson ta aliy i buku doh, “Kindrei tek, Kindrei tek, buku sah handru ya ou ruwani jo?”
Eme iri lau ra-on areu mirihik anuhun sahou tan ma anya, “Iy kede-eh aloh Alaija!”
Eme ma, suwi handru oro ari toro sakaliye ili kuhi konyei ari, tolomwani i bolo waen titi-in, ma atehei ili no-o banap ma atehei ili bohon ta iy ka-un.
Arile oro ra-on anya, “Kareu op, to kanyolom, idah kameh Alaija eme aseben iy deh bwe.”
Eme Jises arah tinan labai ja, ano iy ruwani kohan ma iy imek.
Kala doh amwenen kolau tinan badu bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei atarah i ma lusi ereu loken eme andri. Munyak totoreh ma iri bek asak, i ma lusi.
Ma lek tiri lau mwasin ndramak bwena asak, ma iri lau mwasin ta Kindrei amak ame loken.
Iri ruwani lek tiri. Hamon ta Jises amak eme loken, iri ala bolo kon tinan Jerusalem, ma iri lau solo-an atou iri.
Iri lau ta bahun ma tinan tiri nane atondrok Jises nane atou kon totoreh ma iri lakou mari nane asahan, oro anoh labai ma oro anya, “Handru labai, iy kede-eh Nadu Kindrei handru!”
Iri badih solo-an ale ales areu len anyolom le, iri mene areu hamon tan adek loboho Galili ame ta aseben iy.
Ereu ndrokowa iri badeh, Mariya badu Makdala ma hawe Mariya ari ja tine Jemis uru Josep ma hawe udu Sebedi ale.
Kon abeyeh, ndramak ari nadu batun, tan luk solo-an badu Arimateya asahan, nyaran Josep. Iy badeh, ndramak ari ale badu hamon ta Jises.
Iy ili atou Pailat ta ndremenya bada kei, ma Pailat atehei sahou ta oro katehei bada kei kili mine Josep.
Eme Josep kuhi bada kei eme andri, ma su-i iy na kolau ari ha-un,
ma atehei iy ili bolo lek tan ma ha-un le iy ihiy in bolo munu bek. Ano iy tundruwi bek ari laba tinan ili turuki madan ano iy iu ai.
Mariya badu Makdala hawe Mariya ari ja uru ale manyah anyolom ili boho lek nane.
Len ta alokou iri lakou ta len ta amunyau ano, ya len ari hamon, iri tinan tiri pris ma hawe iri Parasi ala atou Pailat.
Oro tiye tan buku doh, “Tinan, aso bwetenei sahou ari ndramak ta wasai kede-eh mene asehek kala iy mene ereu loken kahis le, iy anya, ‘Hamon ta len taloh, jo kameh amak eme loken ja.’
Idoh le ya ou tiye, ya oro katondrokei mada lek nane kamwenen winiya len taloh, koro-an oro lau tan same sabwese-ei bada kei sa-au, ano oro kameh asehek tiri lau anya iy ndramak ndrame loken. Sahou wasai doh kameh ndra-in ja sakalawi wasai nane ndrasahan bwena.”
Pailat tiye toro anya, “Ado kakuhi iri lulik kala katondrokei lek nane, ya oro katondrokei kamwenen handru en.”
Eme oro ala turuki mada lek nane, ma oro lulik ales areu aliy ta atondrok.
