Eme iy edek ili badeh, iri lau ame asin awin tiri lawe-en ya iri talaha in san.
Ano iy edek eme mirihik ta kon tinan, san ili andri ili bwilin ndrondro-ou Olip. Eme iri lau solo-an badu hamon tan badeh, iri sekesek tinan labai, ma hawe iri atudun nyara Kindrei na boho iri i loken, ta lahou tinan mari mene iri ndranyolom ndra-au.
Ma iri anya, “Kasekesek ki ta kabin! Kasore nyaran! Iy eme ta nyara Laban!” “Mondrei udu kandrah, ma lomadan ki ta Kindrei badu loken!”
Eme oro Parasi rayah ado bolo iri lau nane, tiye i ta Jises anya, “Ndramak ta leheya, ou abarah iri lau tam kandru-uk!”
Eme iy tiye i toro anya, “I buku none oro kandru-uk kameh iri bek kameh katubuni iri, ma iri kasarakau.”
Eme iy edek eme mirihik ta kon tinan Jerusalem, ma iy anyolom badeh, iy eden ndranye Jerusalem.
Iy anya, “Jo badeh, aseken labai na len dah, ado katanan kandriyen ta amekes mondrei. Arile, bwai, ndramai ta mada ado ai.
Na len eme kameh iri lau ta amekes bahun ewek tado kameh tabadah munyak eme loke anyek kon tado. Ma iri kameh awudi kon tado mari, ma turuki madasan mari awek bolon.
Iri kameh adai ado ma hawe nadu ado oro. Kon ma asiu tado kameh atokos, ari lakou winiyan bado bwe. Tasah, ado banyolom tanan ta Kindrei bwe, ta aseben ado bwe.”
Ano Jises ili bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ya iy atikah iri lau asih lakou are aliy, au a manan.
Eme iy tiye i tiri anya, “Buk ndrabun tiye i buku doh, ‘Asiu tek dah, asiu ta amekes salom labai,’ arile ado ndramesekei asiu tek badeh, ndrasahan ‘asumwe iri lau ta bahana.’”
Eme na len mari badeh, Jises leheya udu asiu tinan ta Kindrei, arile iri tinan tiri pris, ma hawe iri lau ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis, ma hawe iri lau batun tiri lau lomondra ta anya kadai iy.
Arile, iri takaleh madasan ta kada iy labwe, tasah iri lau mari badeh, tawi sahou tan.
Ano na len ari, Jises leheya iri lau ta bolo sahou mwasin udu bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei. Eme iri lau tinan tiri pris, hawe iri lau ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis, ma hawe iri lau ta batun tiri lau badu Isra-el ame hawen.
Eme iri tiye i tan anya, “Ou tiye keme taso, ou akohok boto-on badu heh handru, ma ou amekes iri lakou kede-eh? Are lau atehei nyaran tinan ewek tam ma tiye ou ta amekes iri lahou dah?”
Eme Jises asumon boho oro i buku doh, “Jo anya kandremenya ado ta lakou ari. Ano ado katiye keme tek ja.
Kala Jon mene alomwa iri lau, iy akohok boto-on badu heh? Lakou doh badu kandrah deh, badu kon munyak le?”
Eme oro asehek nyala aliy udu ndrokowa oro ari ari anya, “Buku none to katiye anya, ‘Idoh lakou badu kandrah,’ idah kameh iy ndremenya to ja anya, ‘Buku sah ado batehei budon tado bala ta aliy bwe?’
Arile, i buku none to katiye anya, ‘Idoh kandriyen tiri lau le,’ idah kameh, iri lau korowei to na bek, tasah budon tiri lau ndrahas anya, Jon badeh, propet ta Kindrei handru.”
Eme iri asumon bohon i buku doh, “Ahi tana ahi bwe.”
Eme Jises tiye tiri i buku doh, “Jo ale, jo winiyan batiye bawek taha are lau handru atehei nyaran tinan eme tek ya jo amekes iri gok dah.”
Ano Jises asehek sahou sokek ari ili tiri lau anya, “Ndramak ari bwidi bilin ta waen ari. Eme iy atehei bilin ili mine iri salibah ta atondrok, ma iy iu i kon rakon ja, ma udu gwek luluwen labai.
Eme na len ta abwe-eh buwan asahan, iy suni lohowan tan ari ili hawe oro salibah atondrok bilin waen nane dah, anya kakohok rayah buwa waen ki minen. Eme oro salibah adai iy ma tikahei iy iu na luka minen ma luka katin.
Ano ja, tama bilin dah, suni lohowan tan ari ili ja. Iy ili i le buku aliy le, oro adai iy ma abolei iy andra-i labai, ma tikahei iy iu na luka minen ma luka katin.
Ano ja, iy suni lohowan tan ari ili ja san tulusin ai. Eme oro adai iy, ma iy akohok andra-i labai, ma oro akahei iy eme len.
“Ano tama bilin anya, ‘Ki buku sah bah? I buku none jo kasuni naduk amwenen ala jo aseken iy labai kede-eh, sebwe oro kameh anuhun boho naduk.’
“Arile, oro salibah ta bilin atou iy edek eme, oro asehek nyala oro anya, ‘Ei, nadun eme, to kadai iy, ma to kakuhi iri lakou tan mari.’
Eme oro kuhi iy eme len ta bilin, ma oro adai iy imek. “Ya ado abudon i buku sah? Tama bilin kameh amekes saba lakou handru kili toro salibah nane abo gok an bolo bilin nane?
Iy kameh idi oro lau doh amak, ma iy kameh atehei bilin ili mine iri lau rayah ja kabo gok ta aliy.” Ya iri lau anuhun sahou sokek doh aleu labai, eme iri anya, “Sasahan ai, ma ndri-iy ai!”
Arile, Jises anyolom boto-on i toro ma i lelen, “Sahou mene ndratorowenei ndra-au, saba moson ta aliy handru? Sahou i buku doh, ‘Bek ale iri lau ta atah asiu bwale iri, na dah, iy ndrasahan kati ndru ta ka-u asiu bek.’
Are lau oro taku a bada bek doh kameh, ndruwi oro kameh ibok i le bwisik, arile are lau oro i buku none bek doh, taku i la-u oro, idah kameh ati-i oro abwesek.”
Eme iri lau ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis hawe iri tinan tiri pris nane anya ja Jises asehek sahou sokek doh i bada iri. Eme ma iri anya katakaleh madasan ta ateu iy na le liliy. Arile, oro winiyan bwe, tasah oro anoh iri lau.
Eme oro atehei mada oro udu ta Jises, ma oro suni iri lalou rayah atehei mada iri udu ta Jises. Oro amekes oro i buku none lau ta tandra-un sahou handru, ala, anya kasan Jises na sahou. Ya eme oro anya katehei iy ki mine iri lau ta atondrok hawe kili baha boto-on ta tondrok tiri Rom.
Eme ya oro lalou lelen Jises anya, “Ndramak ta leheya, aso badeh, tanan sasah ou leheya kede-eh, ndra handru le ai, ma ou badeh, banoh are ndramak bwe. Ou badeh are le alih turu. Tasah, ou badeh, leheya san ta Kindrei handru i tiri lau.
Ou abudon i buku sah? Mwasin ta taha kadeu takis ki ta Sisa, deh ndri-iy?”
Arile, Jises anyolom ili mada oro ta wasai ma tiye toro anya,
“Ado kaleheya keme tek ari luk bororoh. Malawi ndramak ma nyaran kede-eh are lau handru?”
Eme oro anya, “Ta Sisa.” Ya eme Jises tiye i toro, “Mwasin, saba lakou ta Sisa, ado kadeu ki ta Sisa. Ya saba lakou ta Kindrei, ado kadeu ki ta Kindrei.”
Eme oro anya kawasai iy kasehek sahou ndra-in kudu mada iri lau, ma oro kateu iy. Arile, oro winiyan batawi iy bwe. Eme ya boho oro asak ta sahou tan i toro, ma oro andru-uk.
Eme oro Sadusi rayah ame hawe Jises anya kanone iy. Oro anya, iri lau ale ndramak bwena mene, iri kameh winiyan bamak ja bwe.
Eme oro ndremenyani Jises i buku doh, “Ndramak ta leheya, Moses bwena mene torowenei nyala taha anya, ‘Buku none ari ndramak imek, ya udun erah ya iy nadun bwe, nadu tinen kameh kandrei nyau tan ki udun, ya iy katehei nah ki tan, ma nah doh ki nyara nadu tinen, ya nyara nadu tinen sa-au, ndri-iy.’
Ya, len ari bwena, oro lau ma ndro taloh, oro badeh, nadu tine oro. Eme kadok toro i tasou ta badih ari, eme ya iy imek ma iy nadun bwe.
Ano iy bwaneh sudi nyawe nadu tinen i tan, eme iy imek, ma nadun bwe le.
Ano ja silih sudi nyawe nadu tinen uru ja, eme iy imek ale, nadun bwe le. Eme amekes i buku doh, ili ano ta kalai. Oro mari badeh, amak ari nadu oro bwe.
Ano udu hamon badeh, badih imek ale.
Ya, ou tiye taso. Na len hamon ta iri lau mari amak ame loken ja, badih doh kameh ili udu are lau handru? Ou tanam, iy i tasou ili toro ma ndro taloh nane doh.”
Eme Jises tiye i toro anya, “Lau mwan hawe badih are munyak dah, asoh iri a tasou.
Arile, iri mwan hawe iri badih mwasin ta mada Kindrei kameh, na len eme kameh iri amak ame awas ja, iri winiyan bala tasou ja bwe.
Iri kameh asahan buku iri angelo, ya iri badeh, nadu Kindrei labai, tasah iri amak ame awas ja.
Handru labai. Iri lau ndramak bwena, hamon kameh iri amak ja. Moses ale leheya i buku aliy le. Idoh asehek nyala len mene Moses atou jih anya udu ta kei. Tasah, Moses mene tiye nyala Laban i buku doh: ‘Ou badeh, Kindrei ta Abraham, ta Aisik, ma ta Jekop.’
Sahou doh leheya taha i buku doh: Kindrei atondrok koha oro ma taloh, ma oro ado awas ado hawen kahis le. Eme ma, Kindrei batiye anya iy mene Kindrei tiri lau ndramak, arile na dah, bwe. Bwe! Iy badeh, Kindrei tiri lau koha iri udu aliy kahis le. Handru labai. Iri lau mari mene ndramak ndrasu-u, ma hawe iri lau mari ado loken kahis le, iri mara-ei a buku awas kahis le, tasah Kindrei atondrok iri.”
Eme oro lau rayah ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis anya, “Ndramak ta leheya, ou tiye sahou badeh, amwenen handru.”
Ya eme ma iri anoh, ma iri bandremenya iy ja bwe.
Ano Jises ndremenya oro anya, “I buku sah handru iri mwan ma badih anya ja, Krais badeh, nadu Debit?
Tasah, udu bolo buk Wari ta Debit tiye i buku doh, ‘Laban Kindrei tiye i ta Laban tek i buku doh: “Ou ame manyah ado loboho minek salin,
winiya jo le, baratehei iri lau ta amekes budon ndra-in ewek tam, barabwesek barado bahandra katim.”’
Ado kanuhun. Debit amwenen aloh ndramak nane Laban tan. Ya ki buku sah handru kameh iy ndramak nane ja ki nadu Debit?”
Eme iri lau anuhun kahis le badeh, Jises tiye i toro lau tan anya,
“Mada ado kaleu toro lau ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis. Oro badeh, aseken adek ala ame na kolau moroyan lawe toro, eme oro anya lau mari kasumon oro na len ta baen. Ya oro anya kamanyah kareu le bwabwai mwasin badu ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis, ma ndrahu kon ta atudun ta nyamon tinan.
Oro bene-ei asiu tiri badih nyau, ya iri wendreya ta aliu salom lawe-en lawe-en. Oro lau buku doh kameh akohok maha-an laba tinan labai.”
Jises badeh, udu ndra bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei kahis, iy eme suri madan eme loken badeh, iy atou iri lau tiri lakou solo-an, adeu luk tiri i bolo lakou ta ndrahu luk udu asiu tinan ta Kindrei dah.
Ano ja, iy atou badih nyau ari tan se lakou bwe badeh, akahei luk tan bororoh saraman ma la-uh le.
Eme Jises anya, “Jo katiye tado handru en! Iy badih nyau tan lakou bwe kede-eh, akeh luk solo-an labai ja ta lau mari.
Tasah, iri lau mari kede-eh akahei rayah le badu bolo luk tiri solo-an, arile iy badih nyau tan lakou bwe badeh, atehei luk mari ta sukunyan ndrala.”
Eme oro lau tan rayah atou asiu tinan ta Kindrei amekes na bek badeh, konen konen labai; ma lakou moroyan adeu i ta Kindrei, eme oro asehek nyala aliy. Arile, Jises eme tiye i toro,
“Ado ndratou lakou mari kede-eh, na len eme kameh ado winiyan batou ari ndruwi asiu bek winiyan bales, bareu loken bwe. Iri marakon kameh ato-oh iu i andri.”
Eme oro ndremenya iy anya, “Ndramak ta leheya, na saba len handru kameh lakou doh kasahan? Ya saba kalem kameh kasahan bwena ta leheya lakou doh eme bakep ai?”
Eme Jises tiye i buku doh, “Ado kanyolom kamwenen, ya ari ndramak sawendreyani ado, ndri-iy. Iri lau solo-an kameh ame anya iri asehek sahou tek ma anya, ‘Jo dah Krais,’ ma, ‘Len ndra bakep ai, ta Kindrei eme akohok taha ame hamon.’ Arile, ado sa-en hamon toro.
Ya, i buku none ado anuhun kurutuwe bahun, hawe lakou maha-an asahan, budon tado sandra-i, ndri-iy. Iri lakou doh kameh asahan bwena op, arile lakou mari ta ano kameh kahis le.”
Ano iy tiye i toro ja anya: “Kon munyak tinan ari kameh amekes bahun i ta kon tinan ari; ya kabin badu kon rakon kameh amekes bahun i ta kabin badu kon rakon ja.
Ma idah kameh kon ari ari kameh ndroi asahan aliy, ya son kameh asahan bolo kon, hawe sik asahan aliy. Ma idah kameh kalem ta nohowa lau kameh asahan bada kandrah.
“Arile, lakou mari doh kahis le kameh iri ateu ado. Ma iri kameh adai ado, ano seheyani ado ala asiu ta atukum tiri Juwis ales are mada sahou. Ano ja kameh iri seheyani ado ala hawe iri kabin hawe iri lau ta atondrok. Iri amekes doh tasah, idoh len ta ado katiye sahou tek mwasin ki tiri.
Ma idoh kameh atehe san mwasin i tado kasehek nyala sahou tek ki toro.
Arile, ado badeh, kalomondra bohon ki bwena ta ado sabwerei ta sasah kameh ado kasehek.
Jo le kameh edeu sahou hawe budon mwasin ewek tado, ya iri lau kameh winiyan bandres ma tebelese budon nane jo edeu ewek tado ta atiye bwe. Ma winiyan babisini sahou tado bwe.
Ya tama ado oro, hawe tine ado oro, hawe nadu tine ado oro, hawe lowa ado oro, ma hawe kawas tado oro kameh adeu sa-oh tado, ma eme iri kameh adai ado rayah kameh amak.
Ya iri lau mari kameh baseken ado bwe, tasah ado an hamon tek.
Arile, ari lami batu ado winiyan ba-au bwe, ma koha ado kameh udu le buku doh.
Arile, i buku none ado le kabadok ado, idah kameh, ado le winiyan sebenei koha ado handru.
“Ya, i buku none ado katou iri lau ta bahun kawudi Jerusalem, badeh, ado tanan ai, mirihik kameh Jerusalem atokos ai.
Eme ya, are lau oro are kon Judiya badeh, katobwak kala bolo mandrei. Ya are lau oro are bolo kon tinan badeh, katobwak kame len. Ma hawe are lau oro are len badeh, sala bolo kon tinan, ndri-iy.
Tasah, idoh badeh, len ta adeu maha-an i hamon, amwenen le ta sahou ta Kindrei mene ndratorowenei.
Len doh kameh len ndra-in labai tiri badih ale nah ereu tiri, ma badih nah ma nyandren! Tasah, Kindrei kameh ibolosen i tiri lau badu munyak dah, ma iri kameh bwese maha-an laba tinan labai.
Ya idah kameh, iri amundroh lau rayah na samen, ya iri rayah kameh kuhi iri a bonyo-ou a kon munyak tinan mari. Ma iri lau badu leheleh kameh atondrok lakou mari badu Jerusalem, winiya le tondrok tiri barano.
“Idah kameh kalem asahan ta an, kalem asahan ta bun hawe iri ndrau. Ya iri kon munyak tinan kameh bwese maha-an laba tinan labai, hawe iri anoh ma anyon ala ame ta kurutuwe bayau badu ndras.
Lau mari kameh anoh ma mada iri abuluw ta lakou kameh asahan la-u kon munyak, ma boto-on mari badu kandrah kameh nyukunyok.
Ano amwenen ta lakou doh, asahan kameh, iri lau kameh anyolom Nadu Ndramak Awas asahan ereu bwele-e asi kandrah, ma boto-on tan ma lomadan tinan labai.
Eme ya, i buku none ado atou lakou mari doh kasahan badeh, mada ado katele ai, tasah len ta ndramak ta seben badeh, ndrame bakep ai.”
Ano ja iy asehek sahou sokek doh i toro, “Ado kanyolom kei pik hawe iri kei mari kede-eh se.
I buku none ado katou la-un ha-un kasahan badeh, ado tana ado, idah kameh kon i le an ai.
Ya, buku ado anyolom iri lakou nane jo ndrasehek, ado tana ado tondrok ta Kindrei ndrame bakep ai.
Jo tiye tado handru en! Iri lau rebesem areu kede-eh kahis na len dah kameh bamak bwe le, iri lakou doh kameh asahan.
Kandrah ma kon munyak dah kameh ano iu, arile sahou tek le kameh winiyan bano bwe.
“Bale ado ki tado doh! Ado satehei budon hawe ndrine ado sahis ta lakou badu kon munyak, hawe ado sabulum ndrine ado na nyamon hawe a-un gwa boto-on ta amekes manyah tado kudu mwasin. Bwe kameh, len doh asahan kameh i le mani tur.
Tasah, lakou doh kameh asahan eme ta lau mari badu munyak.
Arile, na len mari, mada ado kaleu hawe ado kasolom, eme ya ado winiyan ales boto-on ma ado winiyan teleyani lakou doh kameh asahan. Ma hawe ado winiyan ales are mada Nadu Ndramak Awas.”
Na len ari ari badeh, Jises leheya udu asiu tinan ta Kindrei. Ano kon eben, iy iu ili mandrei Olip amadin.
Eme iri lau mari na mandraben badeh, ala anuhun iy asehek sahou udu asiu tinan ta Kindrei.
Kabwai, mirihik ta len ta nyamon tinan, ta jabi ramen yis bolon bwe asahan ai, iri aloh Pasoba.
Eme iri lau tinan tiri pris, hawe iri lau ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis anya kadi Jises ki san ta bahana le. Tasah, iri badeh, anoh iri lau solo-an ado aliy.
Eme Satan badeh, i bolo ndramak ari badu bolo oro lau ma ronoh la-uh ta Jises, nyaran Judas Iskariyot.
Eme iy ili edeu sa-oh i tiri lau tinan tiri pris, ma hawe iri lau tinan ta ndrokei ta atondrok asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ma oro asehek nyala aliy; ta Judas kameh edeu Jises ki mine oro ki buku sah handru.
Eme oro sekesek ta aliy, ma sekesek ta asih Judas na luk.
Eme Judas sekesek ta aliy, ma iy ili takaleh madasan ta kadeu Jises ki san ta bahana le, ya iri lau sala tanan ta aliy labai.
Ano, len ta nyamon tinan ta jabi ramen yis bolon bwe badeh, asahan. Len doh, iri aloh Pasoba. Idoh badeh, iri pris adai sipsip kasen ta aimon ta Pasoba.
Eme Jises suni Pita uru Jon kala Jerusalem ma tiye turu anya, “Ah kala bwena kalowosa lakou ta to ta aimon na len ta Pasoba.”
Eme uru anya, “Ou aseken aru kala heh, kalowosa na to nyamon?”
Eme Jises tiye turu anya, “Ah kanuhun. Ah kadek kala bolo kon tinan badeh, ya idah kameh, ah atou ndramak ari bwese-ei gwa in bolo sabok kameh ndruni ah. Eme ah ka-en hamon tan kala asiu iy ili aliy,
ma ah katiye ki ta ndramak ta asiu anya, ‘Ndramak ta leheya anya, asiu tan ndraheh? Ya idah kameh oro lau tan ma iy kameh aimon nyamon ta Pasoba a-en aliy.’
Idah kameh, iy leheyani ah ta bolo asiu ari udu loken badeh, ndralowosani le. Eme ah kala aliy kamekes nyamon kudu le tato ai.”
Eme uru ala amwenen le, i buku boho Jises ndratiye turu nane. Eme oro lowosani nyamon ta Pasoba ma asiu buku le aliy.
Eme mada an ta aimon nyamon asahan badeh, Jises hawe oro lau tan manyah ado andri ndrahu nyamon.
Ano iy tiye i toro anya, “Jo badeh, aseken handru ta aimon nyamon ta Pasoba dah hawe ado, tasah len hamon eme kameh, jo kameh bwese sisi-in tinan labai.
Eme jo katiye tado kamwenen, jo kameh winiyan baimon nyamon na len ta Pasoba ja bwai; winiya le barasahan handru i san ta imek tek i nyara Pasoba, ma tondrok ta Kindrei winiya udu le buku doh.”
Ano, Jises kuhi bwiniu ma iy edeu wurah, ma edeu salom, ma tiye anya, “Ado ka-un waen dah, a sese le ki winiya ado.
Jo katiye tado kamwenen, jo kameh winiyan ba-un ndraye buwa waen dah ja bwai, winiya le tondrok ta Kindrei barasahan.”
Ano Jises kuhi jabi ramen, iy edeu wurah i ta aliy, ano iy boso-ei i noro ma iy anya, “Idah odak amwenen. [Jo edeu ta aseben ado. Ado kamekes kandriyen ki le buku doh ta abudon jo.”
Ano i le buku aliy, nyamon ano badeh, iy kuhi bwiniu waen, ma iy anya, “Bwiniu waen dah, kalem ta sahou randra le ha-un ja, ta ndrayek amou ewek ta aseben ado mari.]
Arile, ndramak ta edeu sa-oh tek hawe ta edeu jo i mine iri lau ndra-in badeh, manyah udu ndrahu nyamon hawek kada-ah.
Nadu Ndramak Awas kameh imek, ya sahou ta aliy bwai. Idoh in hamon ta seken ta Kindrei le. Arile sisi-in laba tinan kameh i bwele-e ndramak iy ale atehei iy ili mine iri lau ndra-in.”
Eme oro ndremenya oro ari ari ta are lau handru badu bolo oro doh kameh amekes lakou doh.
Ma hawe oro ale andres oro ta are handru kameh kudu bwele-en toro.
Eme Jises tiye i toro anya, “Iri kabin tiri lau badu leheleh badeh, atondrok iri lau tiri, ya oro aseken iri lau doh badeh, kaloh oro kawas toro ta aseben oro.
Arile, ado badeh, sala buku doh, ndri-iy labai. Are tado nyaran udu loken badeh, katehei iy keme andri ki buku nah bwisik. Ya are tado udu bwena badeh, iy kasahan lau ta gok kereu ndrokowa ado.
Are lau handru udu bwele-en? Ndramak ta asiu aimon nyamon deh, bwe, iy lohowan ta atiye nyamon? Sebwe iy ndramak ta asiu dah, nadeh? Arile, jo udu ndrokowa ado badeh, i buku lohowan ta aseben le ado.
Ado le badeh, baruwani jo bwe, ado an hawek na len mari jo bwese maha-an.
I buku none tama le edeu boto-on dah, eme tek ta atondrok, ya na dah jo kameh edeu ewek tado atondrok i le buku aliy.
Eme ya ado kameh aimon nyamon, ma a-un gwa ado bolo tondrok tek, ma ado kameh manyah ado koyeu hawek anuhun sahou toro boho kamen ma ronoh la-uh badu Isra-el.
“Ou ndranuhun Saimon! Tama Balik Satan badeh, ndrasumon ta none ado mari ta anya kapou ado, i buku ndramak ta bilin aleben buwa wit i len, ya munyahun i len.
Arile, Saimon, jo badeh, ndrasolom ta budon handru tam sataku. Ya, i buku none ou taku, ou badeh, tubuni ndrinem ma ou aseben budon toro kirih ja.”
Arile, Pita tiye i ta Jises anya, “Laban, i buku none ou ala bolo kou kameh jo ewek hawem ale. Ya, i buku none ou amak kameh jo imek hawem ale.”
Eme Jises tiye i tan anya, “Pita, jo katiye tam kamwenen. Na ben kameh, kakaro baden bwe le, ou kameh besebes anya ou tanam jo bwe san tulusin.”
Ano Jises ndremenya oro anya, “Jo mene suni ado ala laleyah, ari kohoya ado bwe, ya ari kohei ndrahu luk tado bwe, ma hawe ari ku-i kati ado bwe. Eme ado andriliu ta ari lakou deh bwe?” Eme oro anya, “Bo-oh, aso bandriliu ta ari lakou bo-oh.”
Ya eme iy tiye i toro, “Arile, na dah kameh i buku none ado ari kohei ta kohoya luk bwe, hawe i buku none ado ari kohoya ado ari kohei ta ndrahu lakou bwe badeh, ado kasilah tado ai. Ma i buku none ado ari samen ta bahun bwe, badeh, ado katehei lakou tado ki ta sisih ya ado kasih samen ta bahun ki tado.
Sahou mene ndratorowenei anya; ‘Iri lau badeh, ondrek jo ale udu mada sahou, hawe iri lau ndra-in.’ Ya eme, jo katiye tado kamwenen, lakou doh kameh asahan handru eme badak. Handru labai sahou mene ndratorowenei asehek ta nyalak, ndrame bakep handru.”
Eme oro lau tan anya, “Laban, ou anyolom samen ta bahun la-uh asah idah.” Eme Jises anya, “Badeh, ka-iy ai.”
Ya eme, i buku none Jises mene ndramekes ndra-au ndra-au badeh, iy hawe oro lau tan ala bwili ndrondro-ou Olip.
Oro asos badeh, Jises tiye i toro anya, “Ado kasolom ki ta Kindrei ta ado, sataku sala bolo kandriyen ndra-in.”
Ano iy ili bwena sese, reu i buku none ndramak korou bek kili kisos aliy en. Eme iy atehei bwili ndru-un i andri ma iy asolom anya,
“Tama, na seken tam le, i buku none ou aseken badeh, ou andrei bwiniu ta isi udu hawek ki-iu. Arile idoh budon tek le, ou amekes ta seken tam le kasahan ki handru.” [
Eme angelo ari badu kandrah eme edeu boto-on i tan. Eme ya Jises atona maha-an laba tinan labai, ma iy asolom irih le gwek; ma sa-ar tan atekeu i buku none ndra i andri bada munyak.]
<range>
Ano iy suri iy eme loke edek ili hawe oro lau tan atou oro ndramadin ta tikisiy.
Eme iy anya, “Ado amadin ta sasah? Ado kamak kasolom ki ta Kindrei ta ado sataku sala bolo kandriyen ndra-in.”
Ya eme iy asehek sahou kahis le, Judas, iy badu hawe oro lau ma ronoh la-uh nane, in mwena ma hawe lau rayah an hamon tan, ame. Iy edek eme hawe Jises anya kedeu bohon ki boho Jises.
Arile, Jises lelen iy anya, “Judas, ou kameh adeu bohom eme bohok ma leheya Nadu Ndramak Awas i mine iri lau ai?”
Eme oro lau ta Jises anyolom teheya lakou asahan badeh, oro tiye i ta Jises anya, “Laban, aso amundroh oro na samen ai?”
Eme ari toro badeh, mwetehei ndranye bonyo-ou ta tinan tiri pris ari, salin iu.
Eme Jises eme anya, “Ka-iy ai!” Eme Jises atehei minen i ndranye bonyo-ou dah, ma ndranyen amwenen ja.
Ano Jises tiye i tiri tinan tiri pris, ma i tiri tinan ta atondrok asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ma hawe i tiri lau batun tiri Juwis nane, ame ta ateu iy dah anya, “Buku sah ya ado ame ma samen hawe kei? Jo ari lau ta amekes ramwes deh?
Jo badeh, udu hawe ado na len mari udu asiu tinan ta Kindrei, eme ya ado bateu jo bwe. Arile, na ben dah, ben tado ta amekes ai, tasah boto-on ta balik badeh, ndratondrok kon ai.”
Iri tawi Jises ma andrei iy ili asiu ta tinan tiri pris. Ya Pita badeh, edek udu hamon tiri amunum le, udu ndra len eme.
Ya iri badeh, tabani jih udu lohalak ta bolo kowah ta mada asiu doh, ma iri manyah anyan jih. Pita ili badeh, manyah udu hawe iri.
Eme badih ari ta lohowan atou Pita udu lomada jih. Eme iy anyolom Pita amwenen badeh, iy anya, “Iy ndramak kede-eh mene, ari badu hawen adeh.”
Eme Pita besebes anya, “Ou badih den, jo tanan iy ndramak kede-eh bo-oh.”
Ano udu ja badeh, ndramak ari atou iy ja anya, “Ou kede-eh, ari badu hawe oro adeh.” Eme Pita anya, “Aden, jo bwe!”
Ano udu luluwen badeh, ndramak ari ja anyolom Pita ili ili, ya iy seleyani Pita ma iy anya, “Iy ndramak kede-eh, badu hawen handru ma iy badu Galili.”
Eme Pita anya, “Aden, jo maliye sahou ou asehek badeh!” Pita asehek udu ndra bohon le badeh, kakaro eden.
Eme ya Jises tubuni iy, ma anyolom amwenen eme ta Pita. Eme Pita bwetenei sahou ta Laban mene asehek i tan i buku doh: “Na ben dah kameh kakaro baden bwe le, ou kameh besebes anya ou tanam jo bwe san tulusin.”
Eme iy iu ili len, ma iy eden andra-i labai.
Ya eme oro lau ta ndrokei atondrok Jises badeh, bobose iy ma a-um iy.
Eme oro sawei madan na kolau ma oro andrek iy anya, “Abo, buku none ou propet, ou none tiye se, are lau a-um ou doh?”
Ma hawe oro asehek sahou ndra-in solo-an i badan.
Kon aleu badeh, iri lau tinan atukum ame hawe iri tinan tiri pris, hawe iri lau ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis atukum iri ase. Ano iri lau tiyani Jises ili ales udu mada iri.
Eme iri anya, “Abo, ou tiye taso! Ou kede-eh Krais deh?” Eme Jises anya, “I buku none jo katiye tado kameh, ado anya jo wasai.
Ma i buku none jo kandremenya ado ale kameh, ado winiyan basumon bohok bwe.
Arile, na dah ma na len eme kameh Nadu Ndramak Awas kameh manyah udu loboho lim salin ta Kindrei iy boto-on labai.”
Eme iri ndremenya iy anya, “Sebwe, ou kede-eh Nadu Kindrei ai?” Eme iy tiye i hamon i toro anya, “Ehe, ado tiye badeh, amwenen handru!”
Ano iri anya, “To anya kanuhun bohon ja ta sasah? To ndranuhun amwenen udu bohon kede-eh!”
Ano iri lau mari nane suri iri are loken ma tiyani Jises ili hawe Pailat,
Eme iri tebeya wasai anya, “Ahi badeh, ndratakalahei ndramak dah amekes bolo manyah tiri lau tahi, bamwenen bwe. Iy tandra-un tiri lau badeh, sakeh luk sala ta Sisa, ma tiye anya, iy badeh, Krais, ma iy kabin tiri Isra-el.”
Ya eme Pailat ndremenya iy, “Ou kabin tiri Juwis neh?” Eme Jises anya, “Ou ndrasehek badeh kabwai.”
Ano, Pailat aloh i tiri tinan tiri pris, hawe iri lau mari dah, anya, “Jo batou ari lakou ndra-in iy ndramak dah, amekes bo-oh!”
Arile, iri sarakau anya, “Iy mene leheya ma amekes ndrokowa iri lau badu loboho Judiya bado mwasin bwe. Iy mene amekes kandriyen doh, udu ndra Galili on, eme taku dah.”
Eme Pailat anuhun sahou nane iri asehek ano iy ndremenya iri anya, “Iy badu Galili handru?”
Ya eme Pailat akohok tanan amwenen ta kon ta Jises. Kon ta Jises badeh, udu baha tondrok ta Herot, eme iy suni Jises ili hawe Herot. Tasah, na len doh badeh, Herot udu Jerusalem ale.
Eme Herot atou Jises badeh, iy sekesek handru, tasah iy ndra mwena mwena ndra-au badeh, aseken ta atou Jises labai. Iy mene anuhun le nyalan, eme na dah, iy anya kanyolom Jises kamekes kalem.
Iy ndremenya Jises san solo-an solo-an, arile Jises andru-uk le.
Eme iri lau tinan tiri pris, hawe iri lau ta leheya kandriyen tiri Juwis adek ame mirihik asehek sahou boto-on i bada Jises.
Ano Herot hawe oro lau ta bahun tan bobose iy, ma atehei kolau moroyan i la-un, ma suni iy i hamon hawe Pailat ja.
Na len bwena ndra-au, Herot uru Pailat badeh, ndrokowa uru udu aliy, arile na le len dah, badeh, uru ndra kawas ja.
Ano Pailat luhi iri lau hawe iri tinan tiri pris, ma hawe iri lau ta atondrok, hawe iri mari, ame.
Ya eme iy tiye i tiri anya, “Ado tiyani ndramak dah eme, ado anya iy badeh, amekes bolo ndrokowa iri lau andra-i. Udu mada ado nane ndra-au badeh, jo batakalahei ari lakou ndramak dah, amekes andra-i, i buku none ado mene asehek, bwe.
Ma Herot ale batakalahei ari lakou iy amekes andra-i bwe le. Ya eme ado anyolom, iy suni iy eme hamon ja dah. Iy winiyan bamak laleyah bwe, tasah iy bamesekei ari lakou bandra-i bwe.
Ya eme, idah kameh jo tiye iri lau ta bahun tek amekes isi i badan, ano iy bara-au.”
<range>
Arile, iri mari sarakau i le rasan anya, “Kadai iy, kadai iy! Ya karuwani Barabas keme hawe ahi!”
Barabas in bolo kou mene badeh, iy ta amekes bahun udu bolo kon tinan, ma hawe idi ndramak amak.
Eme Pailat tiye i toro ja anya, “Katolowei Jises ki-iu ai?”
Arile, iri aloh ma sarakau anya ja, “Katahi iy ki bada kei tondreh! Katahi iy ki bada kei tondreh!”
Ano i san tulusin ja iy tiye: “Buku sah handru, saba lakou ndra-in handru iy mesekei? Ndramak dah bamesekei se ari lakou bandra-i bwe, ya iy kimek laleyah ai? Eme idah kameh oro lau ta bahun tek ubwi iy ano iy bara-au.”
Arile, iri arah ma tiye sahou boto-on anya, “Katahi iy ki bada kei tondreh!” Eme ma abadok i tiri ai.
Eme Pailat in hamon ta boho iri ma tiye ta Jises badeh, kadai iy.
Ya eme iy ruwani Barabas mene amekes bahun udu kon tinan, ma idi ndramak badeh, udu bolo kou eme len. Ano iy atehei Jises ili mine iri, ma iri amekes sasah na seken tiri ai.
Eme iri lau ta bahun badu Rom sirini Jises ili le badeh, iri ndruni ndramak ari nyaran Saimon badu kon Sairini. Iy edek udu kon munyak tinan eme. Eme iri tawi iy, atehei kei tondreh i kasen ma iy bwese udu hamon ta Jises.
Na bolo len doh badeh, iri lau mwan ma badih solo-an solo-an labai adek an hamon ta Jises. Ma hawe iri badih solo-an aden ma taya ndranye Jises.
Eme Jises tubuni iy ma tiye i toro anya, “Ado badih badu Jerusalem, ado saden ndranyek; ado kaden ndranye ado le, hawe nadu ado oro.
Tasah, udu bolo maha-an doh, eme kameh iri tiye anya, ‘Iri badih kis, hawe iri badih bato-ou nah bwe, hawe iri badih ta asus nah bwe kameh ado mwasin ja tiri ala nah udu aliy.’
Tasah, na bolo len hamon doh kameh iri lau badu Israel tiye i tiri mandrei anya, ‘Ado katohou kame bwele-e aso!’ Ma hawe tiye i ta bwilin ndrondro-ou anya, ‘Ado tubuluhi aso ma katone aso ta lakou ndra-in doh!’
Iri kameh amekes lakou doh, eme badak. Ya jo kameh i buku kei nyamanyak. Ya i buku none len ndra-in handru keme kameh, ado kameh i buku kei sana-an.”
Eme uru lau la-uh ndra-in ta tebelese badeh, sariye uru ala ta adeu uru ala bada kei tondreh ale.
Eme iri asos kon aloh, “Bwisi bar ta ndramak.” Eme iri atahi Jises i bada kei tondreh. Ma hawe atahi uru lau ma la-uh nane ale. Eme, iy ari udu loboho lim salin ta Jises, ya ari badeh, udu loboho lim kamweu.
Eme Jises tiye anya, “Tama, ou mani kandriyen ndra-in toro, tasah oro bala tana oro sasah oro amekes dah bwe.” Eme oro lau ta bahun atehei kolau tan i andri, ma oro amekes laki ta aliy, ta andrei kolau tan i le winiya oro.
Iri lau mari badeh, anyolom Jises, ya iri lau ta atondrok badu Juwis badeh, bobose iy anya, “Iy badeh, aseben iri lau rayah oh; ya abo, i buku none iy anya iy Krais handru, Kindrei suni iy; kanone iy kasebenei iy le amwenen se.”
Eme ya iri lau ta bahun ame bobose iy ale. Ma iri adeu waen titi-in i tan,
ma iri anya, “Buku none ou kabin tiri Juwis handru eh, ou none sebenei ou le se!”
Ya sahou tanan ari badeh, torowenei udu bwele-e batu Jises tiye i buku doh: “Idah Kabin tiri Juwis”
Eme ndramak ndra-in ari udu ta kei tondreh mirihik tan nane asehek sahou ndra-in i ta Jises anya, “Ou kede-eh Krais, bwe nadeh? Ou sebenei ou, ma hawe aru ah!”
Arile, ndramak ari udu bilisiu badeh, ibolosen i tan anya, “Ou kede-eh, banoh Kindrei bwe nadeh? Ou badeh, bwese maha-an i le buku iy kede-eh!
Talu bwese maha-an dah, amwenen ai, ta lakou talu amekes, arile iy badeh, bamekes se ari lakou bandra-i bwe.”
Ano iy tiye i ta Jises anya, “Jises, i buku none ou ame hamon, ma boto-on tam atondrok kon mari, ou samani jo.”
Eme Jises tiye i tan, “Jo katiye tam kamwenen handru en, na le dah kameh, ou ado hawek ado kon mwasin udu kandrah.”
Eme, an eme udu le alih badeh, lulik tubuluhi kon marakon udu gwek winiya mada an taloh na beyeh.
Ma an banya bwe. Eme ma kolau ta aturuk madasan ta asiu tinan ta Kindrei badeh, atarah i le ma lusi.
Eme Jises aloh bohon i loke, anya, “Tama! Jo atehei kohak handru ewek minem.” Iy tiye sahou doh ano le badeh, kohan ano ma iy imek.
Eme ndramak ari tinan ta bahun anyolom lakou nane doh asahan badeh, iy atudun nyara Kindrei ma anya, “Handru labai, ndramak kede-eh, mwasin labai ta mada Kindrei.”
Ya eme iri lau mari anyolom lakou marakon doh badeh, ndrine iri tikisiy andra-i labai, ma mine iri i ade iri, hawe kandru iri i andri, ma iri adek au.
Arile, oro are tanan iy, hawe oro badih mene an hamon tan ado ndra Galili ame badeh, ales ado len anyolom lakou mari doh asahan.
Ya eme ndramak ari badu hawe iri kansol nyaran, Josep badeh, ndramak ari mwasin handru ta mada Kindrei. Iy badeh, badu kon ari iri aloh Arimateya udu bolo kon loboho Judiya.
Ya iy mene basekesek ta budon tiri mene amekes i bada Jises bwe. Ma hawe iy udu le, abe-en tondrok ta Kindrei kasahan.
Eme iy ili hawe Pailat ta ndremenya bada kei.
Ano iy eme kuhi bada kei eme andri, su-i iy na kolau ra-ei belen, ma atehei iy i munu bek ari, ndrasaniy bwena, ya lau bala aliy bwe le.
Idoh badeh, asahan na len ta alokou len ta amunyau, anya kasahan ai.
Eme oro badih mene ado hamon ta Jises ado ndra Galili ame badeh, an hamon ta Josep ala anyolom munu bek nane, hawe anyolom lowosa iy i bolon i andri i buku sah.
Ano oro au ala kon anyas ndrelekei hawe suluw ta amekes ki badan. Arile, oro amunyau na len ta amunyau in hamon ta batanau ndratiye.
Len ta amunyau ano, ya ma ndra wahun ta len ma bwena ta wik ari ja, oro badih mene andrei ndrelekei hawe suluw, oro mene amekes badeh, oro ala mada lek.
Oro ala badeh, anyolom bek ta mada lek ndratundruwiy ndra len.
Eme oro ala bolon badeh, oro banyolom Laban Jises bare aliy bwe.
Eme ya oro lomondra solo-an solo-an ta aliy le badeh, oro anyolom lau la-uh asini awin lomadan labai i buku kalik ame ales are ka-u oro.
Eme oro badih dah, anoh labai badeh, oro aluh ala andri bada munyak. Eme uru lau ma la-uh dah, tiye i toro anya, “Ado anya kame kanyolom ndramak mulin udu ndrahu lau amak dah ta sah?
Ado ndramani sahou mene iy tiye tado udu Galili ja? Iy bado dah bwe; Iy ndramak ja!
Nadu Ndramak Awas mene atehei iy i mine iri lau ndra-in ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in, ya iri atahi iy i bada kei tondreh, ma iy imek. Ya eme na len taloh ja badeh, iy ndramak ja ndrame loken.”
Ano badeh, oro baralomondrani ai.
Ano oro ado mada lek ame hamon badeh, oro asehek i toro lau ta Jises ma ronoh ari hawe asehek i tiri lau rayah ja.
Oro badih nane badeh, Mariya Makdala, Jo-ana hawe Mariya tine Jemis ma hawe oro lau rayah are hawe oro asehek nyala oro aposel.
Arile, oro batehei budon toro handru bala ta sahou toro badih nane bwe, tasah oro anya sahou toro badeh, ari moson bwe.
Ya eme Pita suri iy ma sakaliye ili mada lek. Eme iy aluh anya kanyolom kili badeh, atou le kolau le udu api. Ya eme iy eme len badeh, lomondra i tan le, ta lakou nane asahan dah.
Eme na le len doh badeh, uru lau ta Jises la-uh badeh, adek ado san ala kon Ema-us. San doh, udu Jerusalem ili Ema-us badeh, i buku none kilomita ronoh ari.
Uru adek san asehek nyala lakou mari mene ndra-au.
Uru asehek nyala uru ala le, eme Jises asahan hawe uru.
Arile, uru baseleyani se iy bwai.
Eme iy tiye i turu anya, “Ah asehek nyala ah ta sasah nane adek san dah?” Eme uru ado rasi, ma mada uru i andri ta tikisiy.
Eme iy ari nyaran Kliyopas anya, “Ou dah, lau badu leheleh barame Jerusalem ai, ya ou tanam lakou mari mene asahan doh bwe?”
Eme iy anya, “Saba lakou asahan deh?” Eme uru anya, “Aru badeh, asehek nyala Jises badu Nasaret. Iy badeh, propet. Iy asehek sahou badeh, sahou tan nyarahan labai, ma iy badeh, udu mwasin labai udu mada iri lau mari, ma udu mada Kindrei, ta bolo lahou tan mari iy amekes.
Eme ya iri tinan tiri pris tahi, ma hawe iri lau ta atondrok ahi, atehei iy ili mine iri lau ta bahun badu Rom, ma atahi iy i bada kei tondreh.
Arile, ahi badeh, abudon boto-on tan anya, iy le kameh winiyan sebenei iri lau badu Isra-el ado mwasin. Ya eme idah, i bada len taloh ai, ta lakou mari mene asahan.
Ma laba tinan ja badeh, oro badih rayah badu hawe aso badeh, mesekei boho aso asak handru ta aliy. Oro badeh, ala mada lek na mandraben nane anya katou iy,
arile oro batou iy bado aliy bwe. Eme oro ame badeh, tandra-un nyala aso mari ta aliy, ma oro tiye badeh, anya oro atou oro angelo ale. Ya eme oro angelo tiye i toro anya, ‘Jises ndramak ja.’
Eme oro lau taso rayah ja ala atou, i le buku aliy. I buku none oro nane ndrasehek, oro banyolom iy bwe.”
Eme iy tiye turu anya, “Ah badeh, ndra bwe oh, ma ndrine ah badeh, edek amunum labai ta budon handru ta lakou mari mene iri propet asehek!
Idoh mwasin o? Ta Krais mene bwese maha-an doh, ya eme iy winiyan ili bolo lomadan tan.”
Eme iy asehek nyala lakou mari udu bolo sahou ta Kindrei i turu aleu labai, udu ndra kabatana Moses hawe tarou tiri propet, ano i turu.
Ya eme oro adek ame mirihik ta kon nane oro anya ka aliy badeh, Jises edek ales ili.
Arile, uru anya, “Ei, ou anya a heh? Ou amadin hawe aru na ben dan op, mirihik kon eben ai.” Eme iy eme hamon hawe uru.
Eme Jises manyah hawe uru udu andri ndrahu nyamon badeh, andrei jabi ramen ma edeu wurah i ta aliy. Ano iy boso-ei ma edeu i nuru.
Eme mada uru aleu, ma uru baraseleyani iy ai. Arile, bwe adeh, iy ndramai ta mada uru ai.
Eme uru asehek i turu ari ari anya, “Sahou tan doh mene adeh, mesekei aru abadok ma sekesek adeh! Na len mene, iy edek san hawe talu asehek sahou mari badu bolo sahou ta Kindrei aleu eme ta talu.”
Eme uru suri uru suwi suwi ala Jerusalem. Eme uru ala badeh, ndruni oro lau ma ronoh ari ta Jises hawe lau rayah are hawe oro atukum.
Eme oro anya, “Handru! Handru! Laban badeh, ndramak handru, iy badeh, asahan hawe Saimon.”
Ano, uru asehek nyala oro ta lakou mene asahan san hawe uru, ma hawe asehek ta uru seleyani iy badeh, udu ta iy abo-os jabi ramen.
Ya oro asehek nyala lakou doh, kahis le badeh, Jises amwenen asahan alih toro ma tiye anya, “Mondrei kudu hawe ado.”
Eme oro anya oro atou nyam, ma oro toroyani oro.
Eme iy tiye i toro anya, “Ado anoh ta sasah? I buku sah ado lomondra i buku badeh, udu ndrine ado?
Ado kanyolom minek hawe katik se. Idah jo amwenen! Ado ndranyolom ai, nyam badeh, salin bwe, hawe iy ndruwin le, arile jo badeh, salik udu aliy.” [
Eme iy tiye sahou ano badeh, iy leheya minen hawe katin i toro.]
Eme ya oro sekesek tinan labai, arile budon toro androndro kahis le. Eme iy ndremenya oro anya, “Ado ari nyamon udu aliy deh bwe?”
Eme oro atehei ni sese ame-er i minen,
eme iy aimon udu mada oro mari atou.
Eme iy tiye i toro, “Lakou mene jo udu ndra hawe ado asehek anya: Lakou mari mene ndratorowenei ta nyalak udu bolo tarou malen ta Moses, hawe udu bolo sahou tiri propet, ma hawe udu bolo buk Wari badeh, ndrasahan handru na dah.”
Ano, iy amekes budon toro aleu na sahou ta Kindrei.
Eme iy asehek i toro anya, “Sahou mene ndratorowenei asah i buku doh: Krais badeh, bwese maha ma iy imek, ya na len taloh ja kameh iy amak ja.
Ma sahou ta nyalan winiyan tubuni ndrine iri, ma winiyan sikine karei ma lomondra ndra-in tiri iu, na boto-on ta nyaran. Ya sahou doh badeh, kudu Jerusalem bwena, ano katiye kili bolo kon munyak tinan mari.
Ya ado dah badeh, kasehek nyala lakou mari ado ndratou dah.
Ma jo kameh suni lakou mene tama mene tandrakan ta aliy badeh kameh, ewek tado. Arile, ado badeh, kado kon tinan dah kado, winiya ado le barakohok boto-on badu loken.”
Ano iy kuhi oro ame len ta kon tinan ame loboho Betani, ano iy suruni minen i loke ma iy edeu nyosowan i la-u oro.
Eme iy edeu nyosowan i la-u oro le badeh, ma Kindrei andrei iy iu i loken bolo kandrah.
Eme oro atudun nyaran, ano oro ma sekesek au a hamon ala Jerusalem.
Ya eme na len mari badeh, oro are asiu tinan ta Kindrei adeu wurah i tan.
Kon munyak basahan bwe le, Sahou Awas badeh ndrasahan ndra bwena labai. Sahou Awas badeh, udu hawe Kindrei. Sahou Awas badeh, Kindrei.
Iy udu hawe Kindrei ndra bwena labai.
Na iy le badeh, lakou marakon asahan. Buku iy bwe, lakou marakon winiyan basahan bwe.
Iy le badeh, kohan. Kohan anya buku sun ta lomada taha lau badu kon munyak.
Sun tan anya udu bolo lulik. Arile lulik winiyan baturuki lomadan bwe.
Kindrei suni ndramak ari ta atiye sahou nyaran Jon.
Iy eme bwena ta tiye lau marakon ta nyala Sun, ta lau marakon kanuhun ma katehei budon tiri kili ta aliy.
Jon amwenen badeh, bala buku Sun doh bwe. Iy eme bwena ta asehek le ta nyala Sun.
Iy le ari doh badeh, iy Sun handru, iy eme bolo kon munyak, ta edeu lomadan ili tiri lau marakon.
Sahou Awas badeh, ndra bwena labai ndra-en bolo kon munyak. Kon munyak asahan badeh, na iy le amwenen. Arile, iri lau badu kon munyak badeh, bala tanan iy bwe.
I buku bolo kon munyak ma hawe iri lau tan amwenen badeh, baso-ok iy ja bwe.
Arile, are lau mwan o badih iri atehei budon tiri in tan; ma aso-ok iy labai, iri le doh kameh winiyan asahan nadu Kindrei handru.
Iri basahan nadu Kindrei ta ndraye tama taha hawe tine taha iri amwenen bwe, buku uru asehek sahou ta nyala uru kato-ou nah, bwe. Kindrei le ari badeh, bwidi iri asahan nadun, tasah iri atehei budon tiri handru in tan le ari.
Sahou Awas eme asahan Ndramak Awas, ma manyah tan udu hawe taha. Ahi ndranyolom lomada Nadu Ndramak Awas. Iy badeh, Nadu Kindrei ari le. Iy irek ta tikisiy ma hawe iri sahou handru.
Jon asehek nyala Jises. Iy anya, “Iy le adeh mene jo asehek taha. Jo anya, ‘Iy in hamon tek eme kameh, iy sakalawi jo ja, tasah iy bwena tek labai.’”
Iy badeh, irek labai ta kandriyen ta aso-ok ma ta tikisi taha. Iy amekes kandriyen mwasin eme tataha lau mwan ma badih mari, ma taha ndrakohok nyosowan mwasin, eme taha arek ta aliy.
Kindrei edeu kandriyen malen ili mine Moses. Arile, kandriyen mwasin ta tikisiy ma ta sahou handru badeh, udu bada Jises Krais.
Ari ndramak batou Kindrei bwe le. Nadun le ari badeh, atou iy. Iy i buku le Kindrei, iy manyah udu hawe taman. Nadun le bwidiy, eme ma lau marakon atanan iy.
Iri lau ta mwena tiri Juwis ado Jerusalem tiye tiri pris ma hawe iri lau rayah badu boho kamen ta Libai badeh, kala hawe Jon kandremenya iy ki buku doh, “Ya, ou are lau handru?”
Jon bawendreya oro bwe, iy asehek sahou handru i tiri anya, “Jo Krais bwe.”
Iri ndremenya iy ja, “Ka, ou are lau handru? Sebwe ou Alaija nadeh?” Iy anya, “Jo Alaija bwe.” Iri anya ja, “Sebwe ou ari propet nadeh?” Iy anya, “Jo dah ari propet bwe.”
Iri anya, “Abo, ou tiye ki tahi, ou are lau handru? Ahi kameh ala hamon a kon ma kasehek kili tiri lau nane suni ahi ame dah. Ma ahi kasehek ou kili tiri.”
Jon asumon boho oro na sahou ta propet Aisaya, “Jo i boho ndramak ari, iy aloh in kon lomale an, ‘Kalowosa san ta Laban ma kadik san kales lewan.’”
Iri lau nane ala ta atou Jon badeh, iri Parasi ra-on ado bolo iri ale.
Ano iri lelen Jon, “Buku ou anya, ou Mesaya bwe, ou Alaija bwe, ma ou ari propet bwe. Ya, i buku sah ja, ou anyu iri lau?”
Jon anya, “Jo inyu iri lau badeh, na gwa. Arile, ndramak ari ales udu hawe to kada-ah, ado tanan ado iy bwe.
Iy in hamon tek eme kameh jo bala winiyan ta talou malou ta molowa ku-i katin bwe.”
Iri lakou marakon mene asahan doh badeh, udu kon Betani, udu loboho kapa gwa Jodan mene Jon inyu iri lau udu aliy.
Udu len ari ja, Jon anyolom Jises edek ales eme hawen, ma iy aloh, “Kede-eh Nadu Sipsip ta Kindrei, iy le adeh andrei taha ame len ta kandriyen ndra-in badu kon munyak.
Iy le adeh mene jo asehek iy ewek taha. Jo asehek, ‘Iy ndramak in hamon tek eme kameh, tanan tan kameh udu bwele-en labai ja ta tanan tek. Tasah, iy ndra bwena labai, ano tine baradeu jo.’
Jo ma bwena badeh, bala tanan iy bamwenen bwe, arile jo eme dah badeh ta inyu iri lau na gwa, ta iri lau badu Isra-el kameh katanan, iy are lau handru.”
Jon eme asehek eme lewan i buku doh, “Jo anyolom Malawin Mwasin badeh, atah udu kandrah i buku ban eme andri, ma erah udu bwele-en.
Jo bala tanan iy bala mwasin bwe, arile Kindrei leheyani iy i buku doh eme madak: Iy tiye jo kinyu iri lau na gwa. Idoh iy asehek eme tek, ‘Buku ou anyolom Malawin Mwasin atah eme andri, ma erah udu bwele-en, badeh, iy le ai. Iy kameh inyu iri lau na Malawin Ndrabun.’”
Eme Jon asehek, “Handru, jo ndranyolom, ma jo ndrasehek taha. Iy kede-eh Nadu Kindrei handru.”
Ano eme len ari ja, Jon ales udu hawe uru lau tan la-uh.
Jon anyolom Jises edek eme, ma iy aloh, “Aha kanyolom, iy kede-eh Nadu Sipsip ta Kindrei.”
Uru lau ma la-uh nane anuhun boho Jon ano le badeh, uru ame ruwani Jon ma uru an hamon ta Jises.
Mada Jises anya keme hamon badeh, iy anyolom lau la-uh adek an hamon tan. Iy eme ndremenyani uru, “Ah aso-ok sah handru?” Uru ame asehek ili tan, “Ndramak ta leheya, ou ado heh handru?”
Jises tiye turu, “Ah kame kanyolom.” Ndra beyeh ai, uru ame ala hawen anyolom ndrahunen, ma uru ado hawen ado gwek.
Uru lau ma la-uh nane an hamon ta Jises badeh, ndranuhun Jon ndrasehek nyala Jises. Nyara iy ari Enduru, iy nadu tine Saimon Pita.
Ano le badeh, Enduru edek ili asilah nadu tinen Saimon. Iy eme ndruni iy ma iy tiye i tan, “Aru badeh ndrandruni Mesaya.” (Iy i buku le Krais.)
Enduru andrei nadu tinen Saimon, uru ala hawe Jises. Jises anyolom iy le badeh, ma iy anya, “Ou Saimon nadu Jon, neh? Nyaram kameh Sepas” (Boho kon tiri Aramek aloh Sepas. Boho kon tiri Grik aloh Pita. Moso boho kon ma la-uh doh badeh, Bek).
Ano len ari ja, Jises anya kedek kili kon ari iri aloh Galili. Iy ili ndruni ndramak ari nyaran Pilip. Jises eme tiye i tan, “Ou ame an hamon tek.”
Pilip i buku le Enduru uru Pita. Oro ma taloh badeh, badu kon tinan ari iri aloh Betsaida.
Pilip ili ja ndruni Nataniyel. Iy eme asehek i tan anya, “Aso badeh, ndrandruni ndramak mene Moses hawe iri propet arikiy udu bolo kandriyen malen. Iy Jises badu Nasaret, nadu Josep.”
Nataniyel ndremenya, “Saba lakou mwasin kameh asahan Nasaret?” Eme Pilip asumon bohon anya, “Ou ame, anyolom kudu madam amwenen.”
Jises anyolom Nataniyel edek ales eme hawen. Iy eme asehek, “Iy ndramak eme dah badeh, iy ndramak ari handru badu Isra-el, iy tanan wendreya bwe!”
Nataniyel lelen iy, “Ou atanam jo i buku sah?” Jises eme asehek i tan i buku doh, “Jo anyolom ou badeh, manyah ado bahandra kei ra-ei iri aloh pik. Ano Pilip ewek aloh ou.”
Ano Nataniyel asehek sahou i tan ja, “Ndramak ta Leheya, ou kede-eh Nadu Kindrei, ma ou kabin badu Isra-el.”
Jises anya, “Ou atehei budon tam eme tek, tasah jo nane asehek tam, jo anyolom ou ado bahandra kei pik? Idah kameh ou anyolom lakou laba tinan labai ja.”
Jises tiye i toro, “Jo tiye tado handru, ado kameh anyolom kandrah asak, ma iri angelo ta Kindrei kameh atah ala loken, ano atah ame andri bwele-e Nadu Ndramak Awas.”
Udu bada len la-uh anya kili len taloh badeh, iri amekes molak ari udu kon Kana, udu loboho Galili. Tine Jises udu aliy ale.
Ndramak ta kati molak nane doh aso-ok Jises hawe oro lau tan kala ta molak tan.
Iri ado, waen tiri ano. Tinen eme asehek i tan anya, “Waen tiri badeh ndrano.”
Jises eme asehek i ta tinen anya, “Tine, jo bwalek ou ame tiye jo ta amekes lakou. Tasah len tek ta amekes lakou badeh, kahis le.”
Tinen eme tiye toro lau ta atondrok waen, “Ado badeh, ka-en hamon ta sahou tan buku iy asehek ewek tado.”
Udu loboho doh badeh, bwisi sabok ma onoh udu aliy. Iri Juwis badeh, a-us gwa ili bolon ta sikine iri lakou ta salom ma mine iri na aliy. Bwisi sabok ari ari gwa udu bolon i buku lita rinek (100).
Jises tiye i toro bonyo-ou nane dah i buku doh, “Ado kasuni gwa kili bolo bwisi sabok ma onoh kede-eh.” Eme oro ala asuni bwisi sabok ma onoh ili irek madan.
Iy eme tiye toro ja anya, “Abo, ado kasolowei se gwa keme len, ado kandrei kili mine ndramak ta atondrok molak dah.” Oro ame bwidiy i buku le bohon asehek oh.
Oro ame bwese-ei gwa ili mine ndramak ta atondrok molak nane dah. Iy a-un, iy eme atona nyiminye gwa badeh, ndra buku waen ja. Iy bala tanan bwe, waen badu heh handru. Oro lau tan le badeh, tanan. Iy eme aloh i ta iy tasou ha-un eme len,
ma iy asehek i tan i buku doh, “Iri lau ta atiye waen badeh, iri adeu waen mwasin ili mwena. Udu hamon ta iri lau ndra-un solo-an labai, iri ame adeu waen sowan bwisik ili tiri ja. Arile ou badeh, tawi waen sowan tinan labai udu hamon handru, na le nane barame len ai!”
Jises amekes lahou tinan hawe kalem ma bwena badeh, udu kon Kana udu loboho Galili. Ma iy leheya boto-on ma kandriyen tan, eme ma iri lau tan anyolom, ma iri atehei budon tiri handru in le tan.
Ano le badeh, Jises hawe tinen, nadu tinen, ma hawe oro lau tan adek au ala andri ala Kapena-um. Oro ala ado doh luluwen sese.
Ndrame mirihik labai ta len ndrabun tiri Juwis aloh Pasoba ma nyamon tinan anya kasahan, eme Jises iu ili Jerusalem.
Jises edek ili isos le badeh, iy ili bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ma iy anyolom iri lau amekes ba-en, tiri bulumakau, sipsip ma ban udu bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei. Iy ale anyolom oro lau rayah tokoha luk ado bada koyeu toro.
Jises eme andrei malou ranah, iy bawei i le se. Iy eme tikahei iri lau ma bulumakau, hawe sipsip tiri au ala manan. Iy eme bukudi iri sau tiri nane ondrek luk udu bwele-en, amou ili andri, ma luk marakon udu bwele-en atalan laleyah.
Iy eme asehek sahou boto-on labai ili tiri lau nane amekes ba-en ta ban, “Aha kakohok lakou taha marakon ki-iu ki manan! Aha ka-iy amekes asiu ta tama ili asumwe ba-en taha.”
Oro lau tan ame bwetenei ja sahou udu bolo buk ndrabun asehek: “Budon tek ewek asiu tam, O Kindrei, budon tek i buku jih sulumwi bolo odak mara-ei.”
Iri Juwis ame asehek sahou boto-on labai i ta Jises, “Ou winiyan amekes saba kalem ma lahou tinan kameh keme tahi kanyolom, ma ahi katanan boto-on tam, ma ahi katanan ou are lau handru?”
Jises eme asehek i toro anya, “Katohowei asiu tinan ta Kindrei kede-eh ki-iu, ano kameh jo tahiy na le bolo len ma taloh.”
Oro Juwis asehek i ta Jises ja, “Adeh, ahi atah asiu tinan ta Kindrei kede-eh na bolo jaha ma ndro hanoh onoh (46). Ta budon tam anya, ou winiyan tahiy na le bolo len taloh?”
Arile, iri bakohok bolo sahou tan bamwenen bwe. Jises asehek, iy amwenen badeh, i buku asiu tinan ta Kindrei.
Udu hamon ta Jises amak udu bolo lek tan eme awas ja badeh, eme ma iri lau tan barabwetenei iri sahou mene iy asehek. Eme ma iri atehei budon tiri in ta buk ndrabun, ma in ta iri sahou marakon nane Jises asehek.
Iy udu ndra Jerusalem badeh, len ndrabun iri aloh Pasoba tiri Juwis ma hawe nyamon tinan asahan. Iri lau solo-an labai ado aliy anyolom iri lahou tinan hawe kalem iy amekes, ma iri atehei budon tiri marakon in ta nyaran.
Arile Jises batehei budon tan bala tiri bwe, tasah iy ndratanan iri marakon.
Tasah, iy ndranyolom ma iy ndratanan kandriyen tiri lau marakon. Iy barah ta tanan bwe, ma iy baseken ndramak asehek i tan ta kandriyen tiri lau. Iy badeh, ndratanan budon tiri marakon.
Ndramak ari nyaran Nikodemus, iy badu Parasi, iy lau tinan ari ta atondrok kandriyen tiri Juwis. Iy badu hawe iri kansol ta atondrok kandriyen tiri Juwis.
Na ben ari Nikodemus ili anya kasehek sahou hawe Jises, eme ma iy asehek anya, “Ndramak ta leheya, ahi tanan, ou badeh, Kindrei suni ou ame ta leheya ahi. Ou badeh, ado hawe Kindrei ame. Ari ndramak winiyan bamekes kalem hawe lahou tinan buku ou amekes kede-eh bwe, tasah Kindrei badeh, udu hawen.”
Jises eme asumon bohon anya, “Jo tiye tam handru. Ari ndramak winiyan batou tondrok ta Kindrei bwe. Buku kato-ou iy san rasan ja, san ari le doh badeh, iy kameh winiyan anyolom tondrok ta Kindrei.”
Nikodemus eme ndremenya ja i buku doh, “Barala buku sah handru ndramak ndrasahan alon labai, ya iy kili hamon kili ndrine tinen ma kato-ou iy san rasan ja, kasahan buku nah nyandren ja?”
Jises asehek i tan ja, “Jo tiye tam handru, ndramak winiyan bala bolo tondrok ta Kindrei bwe, buku badeu iy na gwa ma na Malawin Ndrabun, bwe.
Saba lakou oda taha edeu, badeh ta oda taha. Ya saba lakou Malawin Ndrabun edeu, badeh ta Malawin Ndrabun.
Manim satur tiri sahou nane jo asehek tam, kato-ou aha san rasan ja.
Siyer badeh, atohou salan labai, ou anuhun kurun, arile ou winiyan batiye buku iy atohou udu loboho heh handru eme, o iy atohou ili loboho heh bwe. Taha kameh a buku aliy. Taha lau marakon badeh, kasahan ha-un ja na Malawin Ndrabun.”
Nikodemus eme ndremenya ja, “Moson ta aliy i buku sah?”
Jises tiye i ta Nikodemus ja anya, “Adeh, ou badeh, ndramak tinan ari ta leheya udu bolo iri Isra-el. Buku sah handru ou bakohok bolo sahou dah bala mwasin bwe?
Jo tiye tam handru, ahi asehek nyala lakou ahi tanan. Ma ahi asehek nyala lakou ahi ndranyolom. Arile, aha badeh, bakohok sahou mwasin nane ahi akeh ewek taha, bwe.
Jo mene ndrasehek nyala iri lakou badu kon munyak ndrawek tam, arile ou batehei budon tam bala ta aliy bwe. Ya ou atehei budon tam keme tek kameh, kili buku sah handru? Buku jo kasehek tam ta nyala iri lakou badu kandrah ja.
Ya ari ndramak bala loken bolo kandrah bwe le. Jo Nadu Ndramak Awas le ari badeh, udu bolo kandrah eme andri.
Buku bwena mene Moses atehei mwak udu bada kei, iy eme tutuniy ili loken udu bolo kon lomale an, iri kameh tutuni Nadu Ndramak Awas ili loken i le buku aliy.
Buku are lau iy atehei budon tan handru in ta Nadu Ndramak Awas, idah kameh kohan handru winiyan bano bwe, iy kameh ta udu le buku doh.
“Sahou doh handru, tasah Kindrei aso-ok taha lau marakon badu kon munyak tinan labai. Iy eme tikisi taha, ma iy atehei nadun mwan ari le eme tataha. Buku are lau iy atehei budon handru in tan, iy kameh winiyan bamak bwe, ma kohan handru kameh ta udu le buku doh.
Kindrei atehei nadun eme andri bolo kon munyak ta edeu ndramak ari, ari ala ta mada sahou, bwe; iy eme ta akohok taha ado ta bolo kandriyen ndra-in ame hamon ja.
Are lau iy atehei budon tan handru in ta nadun, iy kameh winiyan bado ta mada sahou bwe. Arile, are lau iy batehei budon tan bala ta nadun bwe, iy ndrandra-i ta mada Kindrei; iy kameh ales udu ta mada sahou, tasah iy batehei budon tan handru bala ta Nadu Kindrei ari le bwe.
Kati sahou ta Kindrei i buku doh: Sun anya ndra bwena ndrame bolo kon munyak. Arile, iri lau aso-ok lulik tinan labai, iri baso-ok sun bwe, tasah iri badeh, aso-ok labai ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in.
Lau marakon amekes kandriyen ndra-in, iri baso-ok sun bwe, ma iri winiyan bame mirihik ta sun bwe. Tasah iri anoh, kora-on kandriyen tiri ndra-in kasahan keme lewan.
Arile, are lau iy in hamon ta kandriyen mwasin, badeh iy ndrala mirihik ta sun, ma sun kameh anya i lomadan, ma leheyani gok nane iy amekes, in hamon ta boto-on ta Kindrei.”
Ano le badeh, Jises hawe oro lau tan adek au ala lokei loboho Judiya. Iy udu loboho doh luluwen sese hawe oro lau tan, ma iy tiye oro lau tan ta anyu iri lau.
Jon badeh, inyu iri lau ale udu Enon udu mirihik ta Salim, tasah loboho doh badeh, iri gwa solo-an udu aliy. Eme iri lau solo-an labai ala le hawen, ta anyu iri. (
Udu bolo len doh, kabin Herot batehei Jon bala bolo kou bwe le ai.)
Eme losen sese asahan ndrokowa oro lau ta Jon ma hawe ndramak ari badu Juwis, ta kandriyen ta sikine iri lakou ta salom.
Ano badeh, oro lau ta Jon ala asehek i tan, “Ndramak ta leheya, iy ndramak mene udu hawem, udu kapa gwa Jodan bilisiu loboho rai, ou mene asehek iy; na len dah badeh, iy inyu iri lau, idah iri lau alih le hawen ai.”
Jon anuhun, eme iy asehek i toro, “Ndramak winiyan ateu lahou, buku Kindrei badu kandrah amwenen edeu.
Aha ndranuhun jo ndrasehek taha. Jo Krais bwe. Jo badeh, Kindrei suni jo eme bwena ta lowosa le san tan ta iy eme.
Aha kabudon sahou tek doh: Ndramak mwan ari sudi badih, iy badih doh kameh ili udun. Kawas ta iy mwan ili ales ereu le ai, iy atehei ndranyen, ma iy sekesek labai ta anuhun boho ndramak nane asoh badih. I buku nane dah, sekesek ndratuhi jo mara-ei.
Krais kameh kasahan kabin, ma iri lau marakon ka-en hamon tan. Jo kameh kudu le bahandran.
“Iy udu kandrah eme andri, iy kabin udu bwele-en labai. Are lau badu kon munyak, iy badu kon munyak, ma iy kameh asehek nyala iri lakou badu kon munyak amwenen. Iy nane badu kandrah eme andri, iy kameh udu bwele-en labai ja ta lau marakon.
Iy asehek saba lakou iy ndranyolom, ma iy ndranuhun, arile ari ndramak baso-ok ta atehei budon ba-en ta sahou tan bwe.
Are lau iy andrei sahou tan, ma iy tawiy ihis udu ndrinen, iy lau le doh badeh, tanan sahou ta Kindrei, handru.
Are lau Kindrei nane suni iy eme, iy badeh, asehek sahou badu boho Kindrei amwenen. Tasah, Kindrei ndranyuhi iy ndrarek mara-ei na Malawin Mwasin.
Taman badeh, aso-ok nadun tinan labai, ma iy eme atehei lakou marakon ili minen.
Are lau iy atehei budon tan handru in ta Nadu Kindrei, kohan handru kameh ta udu le buku doh. Are lau iy batehei Nadu Kindrei bado ndrinen bwe, iy kameh winiyan banyolom kohan handru doh bwe, ma losen ta Kindrei kameh udu ndra bwele-en udu gwek.”
Jises ndratanan buku iri Parasi badeh, ndranuhun Jises inyu iri lau solo-an labai, ma iri lau tan a solo-an labai ja ta Jon.
Handru ta aliy badeh, Jises banyu iri lau bwe, oro lau tan le badeh, anyu iri lau.
Jises anuhun iri asehek iy, eme iy udu Judiya edek iu ili hamon ili loboho Galili.
Jises anya kili Galili, arile budon tan boto-on badeh, anya kili kon Samariya bwena op.
Iy eme ili kon ari udu bolo Samariya iri aloh Sikar, idoh udu mirihik ta nadu munyak sese mene Jekop atehei ili ta nadun Josep.
Gwa ta Jekop a-eh udu loboho doh ale. San lawe-en labai eme ma bwidi Jises awoyah ta edek. Iy eme manyah udu mirihik ta gwa nane doh. Mada an badeh, udu le alih.
Udu, badih ari badu Samariya eme anya ka-us gwa tan. Jises eme asehek sahou i tan i buku doh, “Wa-ik se gwa.”
Iy le ari udu. Oro lau tan badeh, ndra-au ndrala bolo kon tinan ndrasih noro nyamon.
Eme iy badih badu Samariya asehek sahou i tan i buku doh: “Ou badu Juwis, jo badih badu Samariya. Buku sah handru ou ndremenya jo ta gwa?” (Iri Juwis badeh winiyan bala hawe iri Samariya bwe.)
Jises eme asumon sahou tan ja i buku doh, “Buku ou tanam boto-on ta Kindrei, ma are lau nane ndremenya ou ta gwa, ou winiyan ndremenya iy, iy winiyan edeu wa-im gwa kohan handru udu aliy.”
Butuhu Samariya dah anya, “Ndramak tinan, ou akohok wa-im gwa kohan udu aliy badeh, badu heh handru? Gwa kede-eh munun lawe-en labai, ma ou tam ari kawau ta a-us wa-im gwa kede-eh bo-oh.
Sebwe ou kabin are loken labai ja ta tama ahi Jekop nadeh? Iy atehei gwa kede-eh eme tahi. Iy amwenen a-un gwa badu aliy; nadun oro ma iri bulumakau tan hawe iri sipsip tan a-un gwa dah ale.”
Jises tiye i tan ja i buku doh, “Lau marakon a-un gwa dah, bale iri kameh amar ja.
Buku are lau a-un gwa, jo edeu i wa-in, balen kameh winiyan bamar ja bwe. Gwa nane jo edeu i wa-in doh kameh asahan i buku gwa mulin udu bolo odan eme loken ma edeu kohan handru ta winiyan bano bwe, kameh ta udu le buku doh.”
Butuhu Samariya tiye i ta Jises ja i buku doh, “Ndramak tinan, wa-ik se gwa badeh. Ma balek kameh winiyan bamar ja bwe. Ma jo kameh winiyan bame hamon ba-us gwa dah ja bwai.”
Jises tiye i ta butuhu Samariya ja i buku doh, “Ou ala aloh udum, ano ah ma la-uh kame dah.”
Eme iy badih nane dah anya, “Jo ari uduk bo-oh!” Jises tiye i tan ja i buku doh, “Ou asehek handru, ou ari udum bwe.
Handru, ou atasou a toro mwan ma limeh. Arile, iy mwan ou an hawen kede-eh badeh, udum handru bwe, ou asehek sahou handru.”
Iy badih asehek, “Ndramak tinan, jo ndranyolom ai, ou badeh, propet.
Tama ahi iri badeh, atudun nyara Kindrei udu bwele-e mandrei kodo-on. Arile aha Juwis asehek Jerusalem badeh, kon ta atudun nyara Kindrei.”
Jises asehek i tan anya, “Ou badih kede-en, ou atehei budon tam marakon keme le tek. Len hamon eme kameh aha winiyan batudun tama taha Kindrei winiyan bado bwele-e mandrei dah bwe, ma iri Juwis ale winiyan batudun iy bado bolo Jerusalem bwe le.
Aha Samariya atudun lakou, aha bala tana aha iy bwe. Ahi atudun saba lakou ahi tanan. Tasah lahou ta Kindrei ta akohok taha ame len ta kandriyen ndra-in badeh, asahan tahi Juwis.
Len eme, ma ndrasahan ai. Idah kameh iri lau ta atudun iy handru, iri kameh atudun tama i san ta Malawin Ndrabun, ma ta kandriyen handru. Tama badeh, aso-ok iri lau marakon katudun iy le ari.
Kindrei badeh, iy Malawin Ndrabun. Are lau atudun iy badeh, ki-in hamon ta san ta Malawin Ndrabun, ma ki-in hamon ta sahou handru.”
Badih badu Samariya asehek i ta Jises ja i buku doh, “Jo tanan, idah kameh Mesaya eme, iri aloh iy Krais. Buku iy eme kameh iy barasehek lakou marakon barame tataha.”
Jises tiye i tan, “Jo le asah idah, iy ndramak nane ta udu le buku doh. Jo le adeh asehek sahou ewek tam dah.”
Iy udu, ano le badeh, oro lau tan are kon tinan ame hamon ame hawen. Eme ma mani oro atur ta atou iy asehek sahou hawe badih ari. Ma oro ame abudon solo-an. Arile, oro bandremenya Jises bala buku doh bwe, “Ou aso-ok saba lakou handru?” o, “Tasah handru ou asehek sahou hawe iy badih kede-eh?”
Butuhu Samariya eme ruwani bwisi gwa tan irek na gwa udu andri udu. Iy eme iu ili hamon ili kon, ma iy ili asehek nyala iri lau,
“Ei, aha kame katou iy ndramak ari kodo-oh. Iy eme asehek iri kandriyen tek mene jo amekes ndra bwena ndra-au on! Iy sala Krais?”
Ano iri ado bolo kon tinan adek ame len ame atou Jises.
Iri lau adek kahis le, oro lau tan asehek sahou boto-on ili tan, “Ndramak ta leheya, ou aimon se nyamon.”
Iy eme asehek i toro i buku doh, “Nyamon tek in aliy. Ado tanan nyamon doh bwe.”
Eme oro lau tan suburuk i toro ari ari anya, “Kora-on ari ndramak ndrame ndratiye nan nyamon, nadeh.”
Jises asehek sahou ili toro lau tan i buku doh, “Nyamon tek badeh, ta jo ki-in hamon ta budon ta Kindrei. Iy nane suni jo eme ta amekes gok tan, ma iy aso-ok jo kabwidi marakon kano.
Ado asehek i buku doh: ‘winiya bun hahuw ja, nyamon badu bilin buruni.’ Jo katiye tado, mada ado kasak, ado kanyolom kili bolo bilin. Nyamon marakon ndruni.
Iri lau abo gok ta a-eh nyamon badu bilin, iri badeh, akohok sihine iri. Ma iri atukum nyamon ta koha taha handru kameh udu le buku doh, winiyan bano bwe. Buku iri lau ta atah nyamon badeh, kala le hawe iri lau nane ta asoh nyamon, iri marakon kasekesek.
Sahou tataha asehek badeh, handru, ‘Ndramak ari ta atah bilin, iy ari ja ta asoh sali nyamon.’
Jo suni ado ala ta asoh nyamon badu bilin, ado mene babo gok ta aliy bwe. Arile, ado ala bolo bilin ja asoh nyamon nane iri lau rayah ja awoyah ta aliy.”
Iri lau solo-an badu bolo kon tinan Samariya badeh, ndratehei budon tiri ndra tan. Tasah, iy badih badu Samariya nane ndrasihidiy ndrala tiri i buku doh, “Iy badeh, asehek iri kandriyen tek marakon bwena jo amekes ndra-au on!”
Eme iri lau badu Samariya ame hawen. Iri asehek sahou boto-on i tan ta iy kudu hawe iri sese op. Eme iy in hawe iri winiya len la-uh.
Ta sahou tan le badeh, bwidi iri lau solo-an labai atehei budon tiri ili le tan.
Iri ame tiye sahou i ta butuhu Samariya i buku doh, “Ma bwena badeh, ahi atehei budon tahi ili le ta Jises, tasah ou ame asehek tahi. Arile, na dah ja badeh, ahi ndratehei budon tahi ndrala tan, tasah ahi ndranuhun udu ndranye ahi amwenen. Ahi ndratanan, iy ndramak kede-eh, iy kameh akohok taha lau marakon badu kon munyak ame hamon.”
Jises udu hawe iri Samariya len ma la-uh, ano iy eme edek iu ili Galili. (
Jises amwenen mene ndratiye toro, “Iri lau badu bolo kon tiri propet amwenen badeh, winiyan banoh iy bwe.”)
Jises edek ili isos Galili. Iri lau ame sekesek ta atou iy, tasah iri ndratou iy amekes lakou marakon udu kala len ndrabun iri aloh Pasoba, ma nyamon tinan udu Jerusalem, iri badeh, ado aliy ale.
Jises edek eme hamon eme Kana loboho Galili. Loboho doh mene iy tubuni gwa asahan ili waen ja udu aliy. Iy udu kon tinan Kapena-um badeh, ndramak ari ta atondrok, nadun ibo sik in andri.
Iy ndramak ta atondrok nane dah anuhun Jises udu Judiya ndrame Galili. Iy eme ili hawe Jises ta tiye iy kili kanyumor nadun, iy anya kimek.
Jises eme tiye i tan i buku doh, “Buku aha banyolom lahou tinan hawe iri kalem bwe, aha kameh winiyan batehei budon taha bame tek bwe.”
Iy ndramak ta kabin nane tikisiy labai. Iy eme asehek i ta Jises i buku doh, “Ndramak tinan, ou ame talu kala, bwe kameh naduk imek ai.”
Arile, Jises tiye i tan i buku doh, “Ou ala hamon nadum winiyan bamak bwe.” Iy eme atehei budon tan in ta sahou ta Jises, ma iy edek iu ili hamon ja.
Iy edek san kahis le badeh, oro lau tan ame aturuk iy udu ndra ndrukulu san ranah. Oro ame asehek i tan i buku doh, “Nadum bamak bwe!”
Iy eme ndremenya oro ja, “Mada an udu buku sah handru, eme badan anyala ja?” Oro anya, “Na mene mada an udu le alih, sik tan ano.”
Taman ndratanan, mada an udu le alih na mene badeh, amwenen ta Jises asehek sahou i tan, “Nadum winiyan bamak bwe.” Iy eme atehei budon tan ili ta Jises. Eme ma lau marakon nane ado hawen badeh, atehei budon tiri i ta Jises ale.
Idoh ili badeh, ili san lusan ai ta Jises amekes lahou tinan ma hawe kalem udu hamon ta iy udu Judiya ta ili Galili.
Udu len sabe ano, Jises edek iu ili loken ili Jerusalem ta nyamon tinan ari tiri Juwis.
Mirihik ta madasan tiri sipsip loboho Jerusalem doh badeh, gwa li ari udu aliy. Iri tahi beleheleh ma limeh na bek udu kabede gwa li nane doh. I boho kon tiri Hiburu, iri aloh Betesda.
Lau solo-an labai amadin ado bahandra beleheleh udu kabede-e gwa li nane doh. Mada iri kaseu, kati iri ndra-in, ma ndruwi iri rayah badeh, ndramak.
<range>
Ndramak ari ibo sik in loboho doh badeh, winiya jaha ma tonoh ndru la-uh (38).
Jises eme anyolom iy amadin in andri, eme iy i tanan iy ndramak kodo-oh ibo sik luluwen labai. Jises eme ndremenya iy, “Ou aso-ok ou amwenen deh?”
Ndramak nane ibo sik dah asehek i buku doh, “Ndramak tinan, ari ndramak bado kada-ah ta aseben ta sariye jo ili bolo gwa, buku gwa tuburok. Jo none ta ili bolo gwa, arile ndramak ari ndrasandroh ndrala bwena.”
Jises eme tiye i tan i buku doh, “Ou suri ou, ou andrei nyahan tam ma ou adek.”
Udu se luwen bwe, iy ndramak nane dah ndramwenen ja. Iy eme bwese-ei nyahan tan, ma iy edek iu. Idoh badeh, udu bolo len ta amunyau.
Iri tinan tiri Juwis ame asehek sahou i ta iy ndramak nane ndrabwidi iy ndramwenen dah, “Ya idah len ta amunyau. Idah ba-en hamon ta kandriyen malen tahi mene Moses batanau bwe. Ou sabwese nyahan tam sado bolo len ta amunyau.”
Ano iy asehek i toro, “Iy ndramak nane bwidi jo amwenen dah badeh, tiye jo ta bwese nyahan tek, ma iy tiye jo ta edek.”
Oro ndremenya iy ja, “Are lau handru tiye tam ta bwese nyahan tam, ma ou adek?”
Iy ndramak nane ndramwenen dah bala tanan are lau handru Jises. Lau ale solo-an labai ado loboho doh, eme bwidi Jises ndramai ndrala bolo iri lau.
Ano Jises ndruni iy udu asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ma iy tiye i tan, “Ou anyolom, ou ndramwenen kede-eh, ou ka-iy abudon lomondra ndra-in. Bwe kameh lakou ndra-in labai ja asahan tam.”
Iy eme ili asehek tiri Juwis, “Nane badeh, Jises bwidi jo amwenen.”
Jises amekes iri lakou doh udu bolo len ta amunyau tiri Juwis. Eme ma iri Juwis asilah madasan ta adi iy.
Jises asehek ili toro i buku doh, “Tama badeh, iy ta amunyau bwe, iy ibo gok ili le ai. Jo ibo gok i buku le iy.”
Idoh le badeh, bwidi iri Juwis abadok ta adai iy. Iri anya, “Ma bwena handru iy ba-en hamon ta len ta amunyau bwe, ano ja, iy anya, taman handru badeh, Kindrei. Iy amekes iy ja i buku le Kindrei.”
Arile, Jises asehek i toro i buku doh, “Handru labai jo tiye tado, Nadu Kindrei winiyan bamekes lakou laleyah bwe. Iy winiyan amekes, buku iy atou taman amekes. Tasah, saba lakou taman amekes, nadun ale amekes.
Tama aso-ok nadun labai ma iy leheyani iy ta iri lakou iy amekes. Handru, tama winiyan leheya nadun ta lakou laba tinan ja, ma mani ado kameh atur ta aliy.
Tama mete-ei iri lau ndramak ma iy atehei kohan ili tiri. Nadun kameh amekes i buku le budon ta taman, iy ale edeu kohan ili tiri lau na le budon tan.
Tama batehei ari ndramak bare ta mada sahou bwe. Tasah, gok marakon badeh, iy ndratehei ndrala mine nadun.
Kindrei amekes i buku doh ta iri lau marakon kamasiye nadun, i buku le iri lau marakon masiye taman. Are lau bamasiye nadun bwe, iy ale bamasiye taman bwe le. Tasah, tama suni nadun ta eme.
“Handru labai, jo katiye tado: Are lau iy anuhun sahou tek ma iy atehei budon in ta iy nane suni jo eme, kohan handru kameh winiyan bano bwe, iy kameh ta udu le buku doh. Iy winiyan bala ta mada sahou bwe. Iy ndrasakalawi imek, ma iy akohok kohan handru.
Handru labai, jo katiye tado: Len hamon badeh, ndrasahan. Idah kameh iri lau ndramak anuhun boho Nadu Kindrei. Are lau iy anuhun, iy kameh akohok kohan handru.
Tama badeh, kati kohan handru udu tan. Iy edeu boto-on ta kati kohan handru ili ta nadun ale.
Ma iy ale ndratehei boto-on ndrala ta nadun ta edeu lau ala ta mada sahou, tasah iy Nadu Ndramak Awas.
“Mani aha satur ta len eme. Iri lau ado bolo lek tiri kameh anuhun bohon,
ma iri ame len ta bolo lek tiri. Are lau iri amekes mwasin kameh ales ta akohok kohan handru winiyan bano bwe. Iy are lau iy amekes kandriyen ndra-in, iy amak, ano iy ales udu ta mada sahou, ma iy kameh akohok maha-an ta iri kandriyen ndra-in nane iy amekes.
“Jo winiyan bamekes lakou na budon tek le ari bwe. Jo edeu iri lau ala ta mada sahou in hamon ta sahou ta tama, iy asehek eme tek. Ma mada sahou tek badeh, amwenen, tasah jo bamekes lakou na budon tek amwenen bwe. Jo amekes lakou in hamon ta tama, iy nane suni jo eme.
“Buku jo kasehek jo kili tiri lau, idah kameh sahou jo asehek badeh, wendreya.
Ndramak ari udu kede-eh atiye sahou tek ili tiri lau. Jo tanan sahou doh badeh, handru.
Aha mene tiyani iri lau taha ala le hawe Jon. Iy badeh, anyolom ma asehek iri sahou handru.
Jo amwenen, jo babudon ta sahou ta ari ndramak winiyan basihidi sahou mene jo asehek taha winiyan barih bwe. Jo asehek sahou dah ja, ta aha katehei budon taha ki-in ta sahou tek, ma Kindrei winiyan sebenei manyah taha udu mwasin.
Jon badeh, buku sun anya lomadan tinan labai. Len sabe le badeh, aha sekesek ta lomada sun tan.
“Jon asehek sahou anya, jo are lau, badeh, handru. Arile, lakou ari udu bwele-en labai ja ta sahou ta Jon, eme leheyani aha, jo are lau: Iri gok nane tama atehei eme tek ta jo kamekes ma jo kabwidi iri kano. Iri gok nane jo amekes doh, eme ma leheyani jo ili tiri lau mwan ma badih i buku tama badeh, suni jo eme kon munyak.
Tama le amwenen atehei jo eme. Iy ndratiye taha ta nyala tekedek tek. Aha banuhun se bohon ma aha batou se badan bwe.
Aha batawi sahou tan ba-en ndrine aha bwe, ma aha batehei budon taha bala ta iy are lau nane suni jo bwe.
Aha abo gok ta asilah sahou iri torowenei udu bolo buk ndrabun, tasah budon taha anya, iri sahou doh kameh adeu taha kohan handru udu le buku doh. Idoh mwasin, arile sahou iri ndratorowenei badeh, nyarak udu aliy, ma kohan handru ale badeh, udu ndra hawek.
Arile aha bwale aha ame hawek ta akohok taha kohan handru ta udu le buku doh.
“Jo bwalek iri lau masiye jo.
Jo ndratanan aha. Jo ndratanan, aha badeh, batehei tikisiy ta Kindrei bado ndrine aha bwe.
Jo eme dah badeh, ta nyara tama. Arile aha baso-ok sahou tek bwe. Buku ari ndramak keme, iy kamasiye nyaran, idah kameh aha anuhun sahou tan ai.
Aha marakon kede-eh, aha winiyan batehei budon taha bame tek bwe. Winiyan bwe en! Tasah, aha abudon boto-on labai ta akohok ndramas tiri lau taha amwenen. Eme ma aha baso-ok ta akohok ndramas nane Kindrei le ari edeu, bwe.
“Aha satehei budon anya, jo tiye ta tama ta aha kameh ales ado ta sahou hawen. Ndramak ari ja udu kede-eh, iy kameh atehei aha a ta mada sahou. Aha anya Moses le kameh winiyan sebenei aha, arile bwe. Moses le kameh atehei aha a ta mada sahou.
Buku aha atehei budon taha in ta sahou ta Moses, badeh aha katehei ki-in ta sahou tek ale. Tasah iri sahou ale ndratorowenei badeh, leheyani jo.
Arile, aha batehei budon taha ba-en tiri sahou iy atorou bwe. Idah kameh aha winiyan batehei budon taha ba-en ta sahou tek bwe le.”
Hamon ta len sabe ano le badeh, Jises hawe oro lau tan sandroh a ndron ra-ei au ala kapa gwa li Galili bilisiu. (Iri ale aloh Gwa Li Taiberiyas.)
Eme ma iri lau solo-an labai an hamon toro ala bilisiu ale. Tasah iri ndranyolom iy ndramekes iri lahou tinan ma kalem i tiri lau abo sik asahan amwenen.
Ano Jises edek ili loken kabede mandrei ari. Iy eme manyah udu andri hawe oro lau tan.
Nyamon tinan ta Pasoba tiri Juwis mirihik anya kasahan.
Jises suri batun i loken, iy anyolom lau solo-an labai adek amwenen ame hawe oro. Iy eme ndremenya Pilip, “To kasih jabi ramen niri lau marakon ame dah kameh kala heh handru?”
Iy ndremenya doh ta none ndrine Pilip. Tasah, lakou marakon badeh, iy ndrabwetenei ndrano ta iy kameh amekes.
Pilip asehek i ta Jises i buku doh: “Sihinek ta bun ma ndru la-uh badeh, winiyan basihinei jabi ramen winiyan bala boho ndramak ari, ari are kede-eh bwe!”
Lau tan ari ja badeh, Enduru nadu tine Saimon Pita, iy asehek anya,
“Nah ari doh ni tan ma la-uh ma hawe bali ma limeh iri ndrabwidiy le. Arile, barala winiya lau marakon deh?”
Jises tiye i toro lau tan i buku doh, “Ado katiye kili tiri lau marakon kamanyah ka-en andri.” Bwidiu solo-an udu kon doh. Eme ma iri lau marakon manyah an andri bwele-e bwidiu. Kane iri mwan marakon i se badeh, asahan ma lamawa (5,000).
Ano Jises andrei jabi ramen, iy edeu wurah i ta Kindrei ta aliy. Iy atehei ili mine oro lau tan, oro adeu i niri lau marakon nane manyah an bwele-e bwidiu. Ano iy andrei ni ja, iy amekes i buku le aliy. Iri aimon ili ili winiya le so-ok tiri ano.
Ma ndrine iri marakon badeh, idih. Jises eme tiye oro lau tan anya, “Ya ado katukumwi tikibwah tiri nyamon erah, marakon ki le se, sakeh laleyah.”
Oro lau tan ame tukumwi tikibwah tiri ili le se, oro anyuhiy ili bwak ma ronoh la-uh.
Iri lau marakon nane dah anyolom lahou tinan ma hawe kalem Jises amekes. Iri ame asehek i buku doh, “Aliy le ai, iy propet mene anya keme bolo kon munyak.”
Arile, Jises ndratanan budon tiri, iri anya kasehek sahou ki se na boto-on tiri, ma iri anya katehei Jises kasahan kabin tiri. Arile, Jises eme ruwani iri, iy le ari iu ili bwele-e mandrei.
Kon ndra beyeh ai, oro lau ta Jises adek ame andri kapa gwa li ja.
Oro ala bolo ndron ra-ei, ma oro abahau ala loboho bilisiu Kapena-um. Kon ndraben ai, Jises bala hawe oro bwe le.
Jor atohou boto-on eme bwidi bayau a tinan.
Oro abahau luluwen sese, i buku kilomita limeh ala len. Mada oro ili anyolom Jises edek bwele-e gwa ili mirihik toro. Eme ma bwidi oro anoh labai.
Arile, iy eme tiye ili toro, “Jo, jo, ado sanoh!”
Eme bwidi ndrine oro sekesek. Oro ame suni iy i ndron hawe oro. Sese luwen bwe oro ndrasos babi bilisiu nane oro anya kala aliy.
Kon aleu len ari ja. Lau ra-on ado kapa gwa bilisiu nane bwena, oro tanan buku Jises badeh, bala ndron hawe oro lau tan bwe. Oro lau tan le badeh, ala.
Ano, ndron ra-on badu Taiberiyas ame asos bilisiu, mirihik ta kon iri lau mene ado aliy, aimon jabi ramen Jises edeu wurah i ta aliy.
Iri lau marakon banyolom Jises ma hawe oro lau tan bwe. Eme ma iri ala bolo iri ndron ra-on ja, abahau ala bilisiu ala Kapena-um asilah Jises.
Iri ame ala ndruni iy udu kapa gwa li bilisiu. Iri ame ndremenyani iy, “Ndramak ta leheya, saba len handru ou asahan dah?”
Jises asumon sahou toro i buku doh, “Handru labai jo katiye taha. Aha babwetenei iri lahou tinan ma kalem mene aha anyolom jo amekes, bwe, eme aha ame asilah jo ja. Arile, aha ndrani jabi ramen ma bwidi ndrine aha irek. Ta idoh le, aha abo gok ta asilah jo.
Aha sabo gok ta nyamon ale kameh andra-i, ano abola. Aha kabo gok ta nyamon udu luluwen ma udu mwasin, ma nyamon kameh edeu kohan handru ewek taha ma ta udu le buku doh. Nadu Ndramak Awas kameh edeu naha nyamon doh. Taman Kindrei suni nadun eme, ma iy atehei boto-on i tan ta atondrok iri lakou marakon.”
Iri ame ndremenya iy ja, “Ahi kamekes saba gok handru, ta ahi winiyan amekes lahou ta Kindrei?”
Jises asehek sahou ja i toro i buku doh, “Gok ta Kindrei i buku doh: Aha katehei budon taha kili ta iy ndramak nane Kindrei ndrasuni iy ndrame.”
Iri ndremenya iy ja, “Saba kalem ja kameh ou amekes ta ahi kanyolom ma ahi katehei budon tahi ki le tam? Ou amekes sah handru?
Tubu ahi iri mene aimon nyamon ari, iri aloh mana i buku jabi ramen, udu bolo kon lomale an. Buku iri ndratorowenei, ‘Iy edeu niri jabi ramen ta aimon badu kandrah.’”
Jises asehek i tiri i buku doh, “Handru labai jo tiye taha, Moses badeu naha jabi ramen badu kandrah bwe. Badeh, tama edeu naha jabi ramen handru badu kandrah.
Jabi ramen ta Kindrei nane iy udu kandrah eme andri ta edeu kohan handru eme ta kon munyak.”
Iri anya, “Ndramak tinan, na le dan ou adeu nahi jabi ramen baden!”
Jises tiye i tiri i buku doh, “Jo le, jo jabi ramen handru kohan udu aliy. Are lau iy eme hawek, iy winiyan bamak son bwe, ma are lau iy atehei budon tan eme tek, balen kameh winiyan bamar ta gwa ja bwe.
Buku jo ndrasehek taha, aha ndranyolom jo, arile aha batehei budon taha handru bame tek bwe le.
Iri lau, tama abudon ta edeu iri ame tek, idah kameh iri ame hawek handru. Buku are lau iy anya keme hawek, jo kameh winiyan batikahei iy ba-au bwe.
Jo udu kandrah ndrame andri. Jo eme ta amekes lahou na budon tek le bwe. Jo eme ta amekes iri lahou na budon ta tama, iy nane suni jo eme.
Idah badeh, budon tan, iy suni jo eme ta jo samani iri lau nane iy ndraleheyani iri ndrame tek. Buku len hamon, jo kameh kamete-ei iri ja.
Budon ta tama badeh, iy aso-ok lau marakon kanyolom kili le ta nadun, ma iri katehei budon tiri kili le ta nadun. Idah kameh koha iri winiyan bano bwe, ta udu le buku doh. Jo eme kameh mete-ei iri lau amak, ame loken ja na len hamon.”
Udu ja badeh, iri Juwis abolosen i tan ta iri sahou iy asehek i buku doh, “Jo badeh, jo jabi ramen handru udu kandrah eme andri.”
Iri ame nunu-uh i buku doh, “Kede-eh Jises, taha tanan taman uru tinen. Iy le ai, iy nadu Josep. Buku sah ja iy asehek, ‘Jo udu kandrah eme andri’?”
Jises eme asehek sahou i tiri i buku doh, “Aha ka-iy nunu-uh.
Tama suni jo eme andri. Ari ndramak winiyan bame hawek le manyah bwe, winiya le tama andrei iy eme hawek, ma jo kameh mete-ei iy ili loken na len hamon.
Sahou iri ndratorowenei in bolo buk tiri propet tiye i buku doh, ‘Kindrei kameh leheya iri.’ Are lau anuhun tama, ma iy in hamon ta tanan tan, badeh, iri kame hawek.
Ari ndramak banyolom tama bwe le. Iy le ari nane udu hawe Kindrei, iy le badeh, ndranyolom tama.
Handru labai jo tiye taha. Are lau iy atehei budon tan eme tek, idah kameh kohan handru winiyan bano bwe ta udu le buku doh.
Jo badeh, jabi ramen handru ta edeu kohan handru ili tiri lau.
Tubu aha iri bwena mene aimon jabi ramen udu kon lomale an, arile iri ndramak.
Jabi ramen dah badeh, badu kandrah amwenen eme andri. Buku are lau iy aimon, iy winiyan bamak bwe.
Jo jabi ramen kohan handru udu aliy, iy udu kandrah eme andri. Buku are lau iy aimon jabi ramen dah, kohan handru kameh udu le buku doh. Jabi ramen dah i buku odak, ta jo edeu ta koha iri lau badu kon munyak.”
Eme ma bwidi losen udu ndrokowa iri Juwis amwenen. Iri anya, “I buku sah handru iy ndramak kede-eh edeu na taha odan?”
Jises asehek ili tiri i buku doh, “Handru labai, jo tiye taha. Aha badeh, kaimon oda Nadu Ndramak Awas ma aha ka-un ndrayen. Buku aha bamekes bwe, idah kameh kohan handru doh aha winiyan bakohok bwe.
Are lau iy aimon odak, ma iy a-un ndrayek, idah kameh kohan handru udu tan udu le buku doh, ma jo kameh mete-ei iy amak ja na len hamon.
Tasah odak badeh, nyamon awas handru ma ndrayek badeh, gwa simidin handru.
Are lau iy aimon odak ma iy a-un ndrayek, iy badeh, in hawek ma jo in hawen.
Tama badeh awas, ma na boto-on ta tama le jo asahan eme awas. Iy suni jo eme. Buku are lau iy aimon jo, iy winiyan bamak bwe tasah iy aimon jo.
Jabi ramen dah badeh, udu kandrah amwenen eme andri. Iy bala buku jabi ramen mene tubu taha iri aimon ado kon lomale an bwe. Iri aimon, arile iri amak. Are lau iy aimon jabi ramen dah badeh, iy winiyan bamak bwe. Kohan handru kameh udu le buku doh.”
Jises asehek iri sahou marakon doh, ma iy leheya iri udu bolo asiu ta atukum tiri Juwis udu Kapena-um.
Eme oro lau tan anuhun, ma oro solo-an asehek, “Leheya tan doh badeh, baleu se bwe. To kakohok bolo sahou tan barala buku sah handru?”
Jises ndratanan oro lau tan badeh, nunu-uh ta sahou nane. Iy eme asehek ili toro i buku doh, “Sahou nane tono-ei ndrine ado deh?
Budon tado i buku sah handru, buku ado anyolom Nadu Ndramak Awas iu ili hamon ili kon mene iy udu aliy eme?
Oda ndramak winiyan badeu kohan handru bala ta ndramak bwe. Idoh badeh Malawin Ndrabun edeu kohan handru. Sahou jo asehek ewek taha badeh, ta Malawin Ndrabun, ma iri sahou doh edeu koha iri ewek taha.
Arile aha rayah badeh, batehei budon taha bwe.” Jises ndratanan are lau iy batehei budon ba-en tan bwe. Iy i tanan udu ndra bada katin ta are lau handru kameh amekes sa-oh tan.
Jises asehek ili le i buku doh, “Jo katiye taha: Ari ndramak winiya bame hawek bwe, buku tama badeu boto-on bala tan bwe.”
Udu bada len doh, oro lau tan rayah atobwak. Oro ba-en hamon tan ja bwe.
Jises eme ndremenyani oro lau tan ma ronoh la-uh, “Ado anya ka-au ale?”
Saimon Pita eme asehek ili tan i buku doh, “Laban, are handru kameh aso kala hawen? Sahou ou asehek badeh, kohan handru udu aliy iy winiyan bano bwe, iy kameh ta udu le buku doh.
Ahi ndratehei budon tahi marakon ndrawek tam, ma ahi ndratanan, ou badeh, Nadu Kindrei ndrabun ari le.”
Ano Jises asehek sahou i toro i buku doh, “Jo andrei ado ma ronoh la-uh badeh, an hamon tek. Arile, iy ari in bolo ado badeh, iy balik.” (
Jises asehek Judas nadu Saimon Iskariyot. Judas iy ari badu hawe oro ma ronoh la-uh. Arile, udu hamon ja badeh, iy amekes sa-oh ta adai Jises.)
Ano badeh, Jises edek in bolo kon Galili. Iy bwalen edek ili bolo kon Judiya, tasah iri Juwis badeh, atondrok ta adai iy kimek.
Idoh mirihik ta len tinan tiri Juwis ta amekes nyamon tinan ta asiu beleheleh.
Nadu tinen oro ame asehek i tan i buku doh, “Ou au ala Judiya ma oro lau tam kanyolom ou amekes lahou tinan.
Are lau iy anya lau marakon katanan iy badeh, iy winiyan batone ari lakou bwe. Buku ou amekes iri lakou doh, mwasin ta ou leheya ou ala ta lau marakon badu kon munyak.”
Nadu tinen oro amwenen badeh, asehek sahou doh, tasah oro batehei budon toro bala tan bwe.
Jises asehek sahou amwenen ili ta nadu tinen oro, “Len tek handru badeh, kahis le. Arile len marakon mwasin tado.
Ndrine iri lau marakon badu kon munyak winiya bandra-i bawek tado bwe. Ndrine iri kameh andra-i eme tek, tasah jo asehek kandriyen ndra-in iri amekes.
Abo, ado kala ta len tinan ma nyamon tinan. Jo winiyan bawek bwe le. Len tek amwenen badeh, kahis le.”
Iy asehek sahou ili toro ano, iy udu Galili udu.
Nadu tinen oro ndradek ndra-au ndrala ta len tinan ma nyamon tinan tiri Juwis. Ano Jises edek in hamon toro ili, tasah iy bwalen iri lau sanyolom iy.
