Udu ta len tinan ma nyamon tinan tiri doh, iri Juwis asilah iy. Iri ndremenya, “Iy ndramak doh ndraheh?”
Loboho doh badeh, iri lau solo-an labai. Iri badeh, suburuk i tiri ta Jises. Iri rayah asehek Jises i buku doh, “Iy ndramak ari mwasin.” Iri rayah ja asehek anya, “Iy ta wendreya iri lau.”
Arile, iri ari winiyan bales bado mada iri lau asehek ta nyala Jises bwe, tasah iri anoh iri Juwis.
Len taloh ta nyamon tinan tiri Juwis kahis le, Jises eme edek amwenen ili bolo kowah ta asiu tinan ta Kindrei, iy eme leheya iri lau.
Iri lau tinan tiri Juwis ado aliy ale, mani iri atur, eme iri ndremenya iri, “Iy bala ari kon ta leheya bwe, arile iy akohok iri tanan doh badu heh handru?”
Jises eme asehek i buku doh, “Saba lakou jo leheya badeh, na budon tek amwenen bwe. Kindrei suni jo eme dah, ma iy edeu iri budon tan eme tek.
Buku are lau anya ki-in hamon ta lahou ta Kindrei iy winiyan i tanan sahou nane jo asehek, iy kameh i tanan sahou udu ta Kindrei eme, o, sahou jo asehek na le budon tek amwenen.
Are lau iy asehek sahou na le budon tan amwenen badeh, iy ta atudun le nyaran. Arile, are lau iy anya katudun nyara ndramak nane iy suni iy eme, iy ndramak doh asehek sahou handru. Iy ta wendreya bwe.
Bwena mene Moses edeu taha sahou batanau ta kandriyen malen. Arile aha ari ba-en hamon ta aliy bwe. Buku sah ja aha anya kadi jo kimek?”
Iri lau asehek sahou i tan i buku doh, “Ou kede-eh balik udu bwele-em. Are lau handru anya kidi ou amak?”
Jises tiye i tiri i buku doh, “Jo bwidi lahou tinan ari, eme mani aha atur ta aliy.
Moses mene tiye i taha ta sani ku-i nadu aha iri. (Kandriyen doh basahan ta Moses bwe. Kandriyen doh udu ndra bada tubu aha iri.) Arile aha asan ku-i nadu aha iri udu bolo len ta amunyau.
Buku sani ku-i nah mwan udu bolo len ta amunyau, taha tanan, kandriyen malen ta Moses bandra-i bwe. Taha kede-eh an hamon le ta kandriyen handru ta Moses. Ya buku sah ja aha abolosen eme tek ta jo bwidi ndramak ari amwenen ja udu bolo len ta amunyau?
Aha ka-iy seleya lakou na mada aha le. Aha kaseleya iri lakou marakon ki-in san ta kandriyen mwasin.”
Lau rayah badu Jerusalem lelen, “Sebwe iy ndramak kede-eh iri anya kadi iy kimek a nadeh?
Iy ales, iri ndranyolom iy, ma iri ndranuhun iy leheya iri lau. Ma iri kabin tiri Juwis basehek ari sahou bala tan bwe. Kora-on iri kabin ndratanan iy ndramwenen, ma iri anya, iy ndramak kede-eh Mesaya handru.
Arile bwe, ahi tanan iy badu heh handru. Arile, len ta Mesaya handru ta eme hamon kameh ari ndramak winiya bala tanan, iy udu heh eme, bwe.”
Jises leheya iri kahis le udu ndra bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei. Iy asehek sahou bohon a tinan i loken, “Ya, aha tanan jo ma aha tanan jo badu heh handru. Jo bame dah na boto-on tek amwenen bwe. Tama suni jo eme, ma iy badeh, handru. Aha tanan tama bwe,
arile jo tanan iy, tasah jo badu hawen. Iy le adeh suni jo eme.”
Jises asehek sahou le badeh, eme iri lau rayah ame anya kateu iy. Arile ari ndramak batehei minen bala badan bwe, tasah idoh bamwenen ta len tan bwe le.
Arile, iri lau solo-an labai atehei budon tiri ili ta Jises. Iri suburuk i buku doh, “Buku Mesaya keme, iy kameh amekes iri lahou tinan ma kalem solo-an. Arile, iy Jises kede-eh ja, iy amekes iri lahou tinan ma kalem solo-an labai ja. Sebwe iy Jises kede-eh, iy Mesaya nadeh?”
Iri Parasi ndranuhun iri lau rayah nane suburuk ta nyala Jises. Eme iri ala hawe iri tinan tiri pris, suni iri lau ta atondrok asiu tinan ta Kindrei kala katawi Jises.
Jises eme asehek i tiri i buku doh, “Jo kameh bado hawe aha luluwen bwe. Jo kameh iu ili hawe are lau iy nane suni jo eme.
Aha kameh asilah jo, arile aha winiyan basilahei jo bwe. Ma aha kameh winiyan bame kon kameh jo ilih aliy bwe.”
Iri Juwis rayah asehek amunum le ili tiri ari ari i buku doh, “Iy ndramak kede-eh anya iy kameh ili kon rakon doh, kameh taha winiyan basilahei iy bwe. Iy kameh ilih saba kon handru? Kora-on iy ki-iu kili bolo kon tinan tiri Grik, iri lau tataha rayah ado aliy? Kora-on iy kili kaleheya iri nadeh?
Iy ndramak kede-eh asehek i buku doh: Taha kameh asilah iy, arile taha winiyan basilahei iy bwe. Ma taha kameh winiyan bala kon iy ilih aliy doh bwe. Kati sahou tan kede-eh, tasah handru?”
Mirihik ta len tinan tiri Juwis ta nyamon tinan tiri anya kano. Jises eme suri iy ere loken, ma iy asehek sahou i tinan i buku doh, “Buku are lau balen asamar, iy keme hawek ka-un gwa.
Buku are lau iy atehei budon tan mara-ei eme tek, idah kameh gwa kaloh udu bolon amou eme len. Idah i buku buk ndrabun ndrasehek.”
Jises asehek nyala Malawin Ndrabun. Buku are lau iri atehei budon tiri in tan, hamon kameh iri akohok Malawin Ndrabun. Udu ndra bada len doh Jises bala hamon bala kandrah, ta Kindrei leheya lomadan i tan bwe le. Eme ma Malawin Ndrabun bame andri bwe.
Iri lau anuhun sahou badu bohon eme ma iri rayah asehek, “Handru labai, iy ndramak kede-eh badeh, propet.”
Iri lau anya, “Iy ndramak kede-eh Mesaya.” Iri rayah ndremenya ja, “I buku sah handru Mesaya udu Galili eme?
Buk ndrabun ndrasehek, Mesaya kameh asahan boho kamen ta Debit. Ma buk ndrabun asehek ale ta Mesaya kameh asahan Betlehem kon tinan ta Debit bwena mene udu aliy.”
Eme ta Jises le badeh, bwidi iri lau apou iri.
Iri lau rayah badeh anya kateu iy, arile mine iri bala se badan bwe.
Iri lau ta atondrok asiu tinan ta Kindrei ala hamon hawe iri pris ma iri Parasi. Iri ame ndremenya oro, “Buku sah handru ado batawi Jises bame bwe?”
Oro lau ta atondrok asiu tinan ta Kindrei anya, “Ei, ari ndramak basehek sahou bala buku iy ndramak doh asehek bwe!”
Iri Parasi tiye ili toro i buku doh, “Sebwe iy ndrawendreya ado ale nadeh?
Ya, ado ndranyolom, iri Parasi ma iri pris badeh, batehei budon tiri handru bala tan bwe.
Arile, iri lau laleyah badeh, tanan kandriyen malen ta Moses mene bwe. Idah kameh losen ta Kindrei udu bwele-e iri.”
Nikodemus badeh, ndrala bwena ndratou Jises. Iy badu hawe iri ale. Iy eme ndremenya iri i buku doh,
“Buku sah, kandriyen malen tataha kede-eh winiyan atehei ari ndramak i ta mada sahou, buku taha banuhun iy bwe, ma taha bala tana taha ta saba lakou handru, iy bwidiy andra-i?”
Iri ame tiye sahou i tan i buku doh, “Neh? Ou badu Galili ale? Buku ou anyolom bolo buk ndrabun amwenen badeh, ari propet winiyan bame loboho Galili bwe-en.” [
Ano le badeh, iri lau marakon au ala hamon ala kon tiri amwenen.
Arile, Jises le ari udu, ano iy edek iu ili bwele-e mandrei ari iri aloh mandrei ta Olip.
Udu mandraben ma wahun iy edek eme hamon eme andri ili bolo kowah ta asiu tinan ta Kindrei ja. Iri badih ma mwan ame hawen ja. Jises eme manyah ma iy leheya iri.
Eme iri lau ta leheya kandriyen malen ta Moses, ma hawe iri Parasi, andrei badih ari eme, atehei iy ales udu mada Jises hawe iri lau marakon. Iri anya iy amekes karei.
Iri ame asehek i ta Jises i buku doh, “Ndramak ta leheya, ahi anyolom iy badih kede-eh amekes karei le badeh, eme ahi andrei iy eme dah.
Kandriyen malen ta Moses mene batanau taha badeh, i buku are badih, iy amekes karei i buku doh, ahi kandrei bek korowei iy kimek ki-iu. Abo, ou kameh asehek i buku sah handru?”
Iri amekes sahou i buku doh anya kawendreya Jises kili ta mada sahou. Arile Jises aluh i andri iy atorou lakou na kandro minen in bada munyak.
Iri ndremenya Jises kahis le. Ano iy suri iy ere loken ma iy asehek sahou ili tiri i buku doh, “Ya, are lau handru udu hawe aha kada-ah, iy bamekes se karei bwe-en? Iy kandrei bek, iy korowei i badih kede-eh.”
Jises asehek sahou ano iy aluh ili andri ja. Iy atorou lakou na kandro minen in bada ndren ja.
Iri marakon anuhun sahou doh badeh, ma iri asilah san tiri ta atobwak. Iri asoh ari ari. Iri lau alon adek au ma bwena. Ano iri rayah ja an hamon tiri. Jises le ari erah udu, hawe iy badih nane ales udu batalan.
Jises eme suri iy ere loken ma iy ndremenya iy i buku doh, “Badih den? Iri lau marakon nane ndraheh? Ari tiri batehei ou bala ta mada sahou bwai?”
Iy badih nane dah anya, “Bo-oh! Ndramak tinan.” Ano Jises asehek sahou i tan, “Jo ale batehei ou bala ta mada sahou bwe. Ou au ai. Arile, ou sala samekes karei ja ai.”]
Ano Jises asehek sahou ili tiri lau ja. Iy asehek ili tiri i buku doh, “Jo badeh, sun ta kon munyak. Are lau iy in hamon tek, iy winiyan ba-en lulik bwe. Iy kameh akohok tan sun kohan udu aliy, kameh edeu kohan udu le buku doh.”
Arile iri Parasi asehek i ta Jises i buku doh, “Ou kede-eh asehek iri gok ma kandriyen tam amwenen, eme ma iri lau kameh winiyan batehei budon tiri bala ta iri sahou nane ou asehek bwe.”
Jises anya, “Ehe, jo asehek saba lakou eme badak amwenen. Arile iri sahou handru. Jo tanan jo udu heh eme handru, ma jo tanan jo kameh ili heh. Aha bala tanan jo badu heh handru, ma jo kameh ili heh handru, bwe.
Aha adeu ndramak i ta mada sahou badeh, in hamon ta budon tataha lau badu munyak amwenen. Arile jo badeu ari ndramak bala ta mada sahou bwe le.
Arile, buku jo edeu ndramak i ta mada sahou, jo kameh anuhun sahou tan amwenen labai, tasah jo le ari badeh, banuhun sahou tan bwe; tama suni jo eme ma iy amekes gok hawek ale.
Kandriyen taha malen asehek i buku doh, ‘Buku sahou turu lau ma la-uh i le randra eh, uru badeh, tiye sahou handru ai.’
Jo badeh, asehek jo amwenen. Ano tama nane suni jo eme dan, iy ale asehek jo.”
Iri ndremenya iy, “Tamam ndraheh?” Jises eme tiye tiri i buku doh, “Aha tanan jo bwe, ma aha tanan tama bwe le. Buku aha tanan jo eh, badeh kameh aha tanan tama ale ai.”
Jises asehek iri sahou marakon doh badeh, udu bolo len iy leheya iri udu bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei. Iy ales udu mirihik ta lakou ari ta iri adeu ta ndrahune luk ta nyara salom. Arile ari ndramak babawei iy bwe, tasah len tan handru badeh, kahis le.
Jises asehek sahou ili tiri lau ja, “Jo kameh iu ai. Aha kameh asilah jo, arile aha kameh amak ta kandriyen ndra-in taha. Aha kameh winiyan bame kon kameh jo ilih aliy bwe.”
Eme bwidi iri Juwis ndremenya iy ja, “Iy kidi iy nadeh? Eme adeh iy asehek i buku doh, ‘Aha winiyan bame kon kameh jo ilih aliy bwe.’”
Arile Jises asehek le ai, “Aha lau marakon kede-eh badu kon andri dah. Jo le badu kon loken. Aha marakon badu kon munyak dah. Jo badu kon munyak dah bwe.
Jo ndratiye taha, ta aha kameh amak ma ndra-in taha. Buku aha batehei budon taha bame tek bwe, buku, ‘Jo iy ndramak nane iy ta udu le buku doh,’ aha kameh amak hawe kandriyen ndra-in taha.”
Iri ame ndremenya iy ja, “Ya ou are lau handru?” Jises eme tiye i tiri, “Jo adeh lakou nane jo ndrasehek taha.
Budon tek solo-an labai ta asehek ewek taha ma ta maha-an taha. Arile jo kameh tiye iri kandriyen taha i buku ari ndramak ta anuhun sahou. Jo ndranuhun iri sahou ta are lau nane suni jo eme dah, iy asehek iri sahou handru. Eme jo asehek ili tiri lau badu kon munyak.”
Jises asehek taman ili tiri, arile iri bandrei bolo sahou tan bamwenen bwe.
Jises eme asehek ili tiri ja, “Buku aha ndratudun Nadu Kindrei ere bada kei tondreh, ma aha kameh atanan, jo iy ndramak nane iy udu le buku doh. Ma jo winiyan bamekes iri lakou na le budon tek le bwe. Jo asehek dah buku tama ndraleheya jo.
Are lau iy nane suni jo eme dah iy udu hawek. Iy winiyan bamani jo bwe, tasah jo amekes iri lakou in hamon ta budon tan.”
Jises asehek iri sahou doh kahis le, eme iri lau solo-an atehei budon tiri ili tan.
Jises eme asehek tiri Juwis nane atehei budon tiri in tan, “Ya, buku aha anuhun sahou tek, ma aha an hamon tiri leheya tek badeh, aha lau tek.
Idah kameh aha atanan sahou handru, ma sahou handru kameh bwidi aha mani gok taha bonyo-ou.”
Iri Juwis ame asehek i ta Jises, “Ahi dah nadu Abraham handru. Ahi bala buku bonyo-ou ta ari ndramak bwe le. I buku sah ja, ou anya, ahi kameh mani gok tahi bonyo-ou?”
Jises asehek sahou ili tiri ja, “Handru labai jo tiye taha, buku are lau iy amekes kandriyen ndra-in, iy badeh, ndra bonyo-ou tiri kandriyen ndra-in.
Buku are lau iy bonyo-ou, iy kameh winiyan bala buku nadu iy ndramak ta asiu nane iy in hawe oro, bwe. Arile nadun handru amwenen kameh udu hawe taman uru tinen na len marakon.
Ya, buku Nadu Ndramak Awas ndrabwidi aha ndramani iri gok taha bonyo-ou, badeh, kameh aha winiyan bamekes gok ta bonyo-ou ja bwe.
Jo tanan aha nadu Abraham handru. Arile aha anya kadi jo kimek, tasah aha batehei budon taha bala ta sahou tek bwe.
Jo asehek taha ta iri lakou tama ndraleheya jo. Arile aha amekes lakou an hamon ta tama aha, iy ndrasehek taha.”
Iri ame asehek i ta Jises, “Ahi nadu Abraham.” Ano Jises asehek ili tiri ja, “Buku aha nadu Abraham handru eh, ya aha kamekes lakou kili le buku iy ndramekes.
Iri lakou marakon jo ndrabwidiy ma sahou handru jo ndrasihidiy ndrawek taha, jo anuhun ta Kindrei. Bwe ja, aha none ta adi jo. Abraham bamekes bala buku aliy bo-oh.
Aha amekes iri lakou kede-eh i le buku tama aha amwenen amekes.” Iri Juwis anya, “Ahi nadu andra bweu bwe! Kindrei le ari amwenen badeh, tama ahi, ma ahi dah nadun handru.”
Jises asehek ili tiri, “Buku Kindrei tama aha handru eh, badeh, aha kaso-ok jo ai, tasah jo udu hawe Kindrei eme udu kada-ah. Jo bame laleyah na le budon tek amwenen bwe. Iy suni jo ta eme.
Buku sah handru aha bakohok bolo iri sahou tek bala mwasin bwe? Tasah aha bandrei kati iri sahou tek bamwenen bwe.
Tama aha balik, aha nadun, aha amekes lakou an hamon ta iri lakou iy aso-ok. Udu ndra bada katin eme, iy ta idi lau. Iy bwalen sahou handru, tasah iy tanan ta asehek sahou handru bwe. Iy ta wendreya, ma iy aso-ok ta asehek sahou ta wendreya. Iy badeh, tine wendreya udu tan.
Jo badeh, asehek iri sahou handru. Arile, aha ja, batehei budon taha bame ta sahou tek bwe.
Are lau taha winiyan nyuwani jo amekes iri kandriyen ndra-in? Buku jo asehek sahou handru, i buku sah, aha batehei budon taha bame tek bwe ja?
Are lau iy badu hawe Kindrei handru, iy anuhun saba lakou Kindrei asehek. Katin ta ou bwalem ta anuhun, tasah ou badu hawe Kindrei bwe.”
Iri Juwis asehek sahou boto-on i ta Jises i buku doh, “Ahi asehek handru, ou ndramak ndra-in badu Samariya, malawin ndra-in udu bwele-em.”
Jises asehek i tiri, “Ari malawin ndra-in bado bwele-ek kada-ah bo-oh. Jo masiye tama, arile aha ja bamasiye jo bwe.
Jo bwalek ta atudun nyarak. Ndramak ari kede-eh, iy aso-ok ta atudun nyarak, ma iy kameh ta anuhun sahou tiri lau.
Jo asehek taha handru. Are lau iy anuhun sahou, ma iy in hamon ta sahou tek, iy kameh winiyan bamak bwe.”
Ndrine iri Juwis irih ta sahou ta Jises, eme iri asehek sahou i buku doh, “Idah ahi ndratanan ndramwenen ai. Ou kede-eh malawin ndra-in udu bwele-em! Abraham ma hawe iri propet badeh, ndramak ndra bwena ndra-au. Arile ou anya ja, ‘Iy are lau iy anuhun ma iy in hamon ta leheya tek, iy winiyan bamak bwe.’
Budon tam kede-eh anya ou bwena labai ma ou ado bwele-en labai ta Abraham ja nadeh? Abraham ma iri propet badeh, ndramak ndra-au ndra bwena. Ya ou anya, ou are lau handru?”
Jises eme asehek i toro i buku doh, “Buku jo katudun nyarak amwenen, idah kameh basahan bala mwasin bwe. Iy ndramak nane masiye jo badeh, tama amwenen. Aha nane aloh iy Kindrei taha en?
Aha bala tanan iy bwe, arile jo tanan iy. Buku jo kasehek anya jo tanan iy bwe eh, badeh, kameh jo ndrawendreya i buku le aha. Arile jo tanan iy, ma jo anuhun sahou tan.
Tama aha Abraham ndrasekesek ndrandra-i labai, ta anyolom len tek nane dah. Iy anyolom ma iy sekesek tinan labai.”
Iri Juwis asehek i tan ja i buku doh, “Ou bala mirihik ta jaha ma lomonoh (50) bo-oh! I buku sah ja ou ndranyolom Abraham?”
Jises tiye ili tiri, “Jo asehek taha handru en. Abraham basahan bwe le badeh, jo iy ndramak nane ta udu le buku doh.”
Jises asehek sahou ano le badeh, iri lau akohok bek, iri ame anya korou iy. Arile Jises aton udu bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei udu. Ano iy iu ili manan.
Jises edek ili, eme ma iy anyolom ndramak ari tinen atehei iy madan bwe.
Oro lau tan ame ndremenya iy, “Ndramak ta leheya, are lau handru amekes kandriyen ndra-in? Iy ndramak kodo-oh deh, bwe taman uru tinen amekes, ma bwidi madan bwe?”
Jises anya, “Iy ma taman uru tinen oro bamekes ari kandriyen ndra-in bwe. Idoh asahan ta iri lau kanyolom gok ta Kindrei kameh asahan ta manyah tan.
Len dah, len tataha ta amekes gok ta iy nane suni jo eme. Buku ben asahan, ari ndramak winiya bamekes gok bwe.
Buku jo udu ndra kon munyak dah, jo sun handru ta lomada kon munyak.”
Iy asehek sahou ano, iy sakaruk ili bada ndren, ano iy rawi sakaruk tan nane ma ndren udu bolo minen eme iy tahiy i mada iy ndramak nane.
Iy asehek i tan, “Ou ala sikine madam kili bolo gwa li Silowam.” (Moson ta sahou i buku doh: “Iy tiye iy kili.”) Eme iy ndramak nane edek ili sikine madan, eme ma madan ma la-uh asak. Ano iy edek iu ili kon.
Oro lau badu hawen ma oro lau rayah ndranyolom iy bwena anyolou iri lau ta lakou, lelen, “Sala iy ndramak mene ale manyah? ma iy mene anyolou lakou tiri lau?”
Oro rayah anya, “Iy le ai.” Oro rayah ja anya, “Bwe, ndramak ari ja. Arile nyolom tan i buku le iy amwenen.” Ano, iy le amwenen eme asehek i toro, “Jo le asah idah.”
Oro lau rayah ame lelen iy, “Ya, i buku sah handru madam asak?”
Iy eme asehek i toro, “Iy ndramak ari, iri aloh nyaran Jises, tahi ndren i madak ma la-uh. Ano iy tiye jo ili sikine madak ili gwa li Silowam. Jo ili sikine madak, eme ma jo anyolom kon ja.”
Oro ame lelen iy ja, “Ya, iy ndramak badeh, ndraheh?” Iy anya, “Jo tanan bwe.”
Oro andrei iy ndramak bwena mene madan bwe ili hawe iri Parasi.
Na len nane Jises tahi ndren i madan, idoh udu bolo len ndrabun tiri Juwis ta amunyau.
Ta idoh, iri Parasi ame lelen i ndramak nane ja, “I buku sah handru madam asak?” Iy eme tiye i tiri, “Iy tahi ndren i madak, ano iy tiye jo ili sikine madak, eme ma madak asak.”
Iri Parasi rayah anya, “Iy ndramak nane amekes lakou i buku doh, iy badu hawe Kindrei bwe, tasah iy ba-en hamon ta kandriyen malen ta len ndrabun ta amunyau bwe.” Rayah anya, “I buku sah handru iy ndramak ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in, amekes kalem i buku doh?” Eme ma apwai iri a la-uh.
Ano iri Parasi lelen i ndramak nane san rasan ja, “Ou asehek anya iy bwidi madam asak, ya, ou amwenen asehek, i buku sah handru?” Eme ndramak nane anya, “Iy propet ari ai.”
Eme ma iri Juwis batehei budon tiri bala ta sahou tan bwe. Iri tiye sahou i ta taman uru tinen kame.
Uru ame asahan hawe iri. Iri ame lelen uru, “Kede-eh nadu ah? Iy mene ah asehek anya, ah atehei iy madan bwe? Ya, i buku sah handru madan ndrasak ja?”
Taman uru tinen anya, “Aru tanan, kede-eh nadu aru handru, aru atehei iy asahan, madan bwe.
Arile aru tanan bwe; i buku sah handru madan ndrasak ja kada-ah, ma are lau handru sihi madan, aru tanan bwe. Aha kandremenya iy. Iy tanan, ma iy winiyan asehek taha.”
Taman uru tinen asehek, tasah uru anoh iri Juwis. Iri Juwis ndratehei sahou ndra-en aliy bwena, i buku are lau iy asehek anya Jises badeh, Mesaya, iri kameh tikahei iy udu bolo asiu ta atukum tiri Juwis iu ili manan.
Eme taman uru tinen asehek anya, “Iy ndrabadok, ma iy winiyan ta asehek sahou, aha kandremenya iy.”
Iri luhi iy ndramak nane eme hamon san rasan ja, ma iri asehek i tan, “Abo, ou tandrakan, ma masiye Kindrei na dah, ma ou asehek sahou handru! Ahi tanan, iy ndramak nane bwidi madam asak, iy badeh, irek ta lomondra ndra-in.”
Iy ndramak nane madan ndrasak asehek ili tiri anya, “Jo bala tanan bwai, buku iy ndramak doh lomondra ma kandriyen ndra-in udu tan deh bwe. Lakou ari le jo tanan: Bwena mene jo madak bwe, arile nadah madak ndrasak ja.”
Ano iri ndremenya iy ja, “Saba lakou handru iy amekes ewek tam? I buku sah handru iy sihi madam?”
Eme iy asehek, “Jo nane ndrasehek taha eh, aha banuhun bwe. Buku sah aha anya kanuhun ja? Sebwe aha anya kasahan iri lau tan ale nadeh?”
Eme bwidi iri asehek sahou boto-on i tan, “Ou lau tan ari ai! Ahi lau ta Moses labai!
Ahi tanan Kindrei badeh, asehek sahou i ta Moses, arile ta i ndramak badeh, ahi tanan iy bwai, ma ahi bala tanan, iy badu heh, bwe.”
Iy ndramak nane madan ndrasak anya, “Adeh! Jo barala tanan, ma baranuhun ai! Aha asehek anya, aha bala tanan, iy badu heh handru, bwe. Jo mene madak bwe, arile iy ndrabwidiy ndrasak ja.
Ahi tanan, Kindrei winiyan banuhun are lau, iy ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in, bwe. Arile, iy anuhun le iri lau mwasin ta atudun iy, ma iri an hamon handru ta tanan tan.
Taha marakon banuhun se bwe, ta ndramak ari badeh, bwidi ndramak ari, tinen atehei iy madan bwe, asak ja.
I buku Jises iy badu hawe Kindrei bwe, iy winiyan babwidiy se lakou bwe.”
Eme iri asehek i ta ndramak nane madan ndrasak ja anya, “Tinem atehei ou badeh, udu bolo iri kandriyen ndra-in. I buku sah ja, ou anya leheya ahi?” Eme iri tikahei iy udu bolo asiu ta atukum tiri Juwis iu ili manan.
Jises ndranuhun iy ndramak nane iy bwidi madan ndrasak, iri tikahei iy iu ta bolo asiu ta atukum tiri Juwis. Iy ndruni iy, ma iy eme ndremenya iy, “Budon tam kede-eh handru in ta Nadu Ndramak Awas deh?”
Iy ndramak nane lelen, “Are lau handru, ndramak tinan? Ou tiye keme tek, ma jo katehei budon tek marakon kili le tan.”
Jises anya, “Ou ndranyolom jo kede-eh, jo le asah asehek sahou hawem.”
Eme iy ndramak nane anya, “Laban, jo atehei budon tek ndrawek tam.” Ma iy eme aluh i andri udu mada Jises.
Ano Jises anya, “Jo eme andri kon munyak ta edeu lau ala ta mada sahou, ta iri lau mada iri bwe, winiyan asak. Ya mada iri lau mene mwasin, idah kameh i kaseu ja.”
Iri Parasi rayah ado hawen ala anuhun iy asehek, eme iri ndremenya, “Ou tiye sah? Sebwe mada ahi kaseu ale?”
Jises anya, “Buku mada aha bwe handru, badeh, aha bamekes iri kandriyen ndra-in nane doh bwe. Arile aha anya aha ndranyolom ja, badeh kameh kandriyen ndra-in taha udu bwele-e aha kahis.”
Jises tiye ja i buku doh, “Jo tiye taha handru, are lau iy badek madasan ta kowah tiri sipsip bwe, iy inyek o iy apou ja san kabede kowah, idoh iy ndramak ta bahana.
Ndramak iy edek amwenen ta madasan ta kowah tiri sipsip idoh ndramak handru ta atondrok iri sipsip.
Ndramak ta atondrok madasan kameh eme sihi kou, ma iri sipsip ale anuhun bohon amwenen. Iy eme aloh nyara iri, ma iy sirini iri ado bolo kowah ame manan.
Iy eme sirini iri sipsip tan marakon ado bolo kowah ame manan, ano iy edek in bwena, ma iri sipsip tan adek a-en hamon tan, tasah iri tana iri iy ma iri anuhun bohon amwenen.
Iri winiyan ba-en hamon ta ari ndramak badu kon leheleh bwe, ma idah kameh iri atobwak tan ale, tasah iri anuhun boho ndramak ari ja.”
Jises amekes sahou sokek, arile iri bandrei se bolo sahou tan iy asehek ili tiri se bwai.
Jises eme asehek sahou san rasan ja, “Jo tiye taha handru, jo madasan handru tiri sipsip.
Iri lau rayah ndrame bwena badeh, iri lau ta bahana ma iri ta akohok lakou laleyah, eme ma bwidi iri sipsip banuhun boho iri bwe.
Jo le, jo madasan handru, are lau iy anya keme bolon loboho madasan jo udu aliy, iy kameh winiyan bamak bwe. Iy kameh winiyan edek ili bolon, ano iy eme manan ja, ta asilah nan bwidiu nyorowan badu kapa gwa.
Iy ndramak ta bahana, iy winiyan bame laleyah bwe, iy eme badeh, ta bahana iri sipsip ma ta adai iri marakon amak au. Jo eme dah badeh, ta edeu koha iri udu luluwen. Ma koha iri winiyan bapwe bwe, idah kameh udu luluwen labai.
“Jo le badeh, jo ndramak mwasin handru ta atondrok iri sipsip. Iy ndramak mwasin ta atondrok sipsip badeh, iy winiyan banoh ta imek ta iri sipsip tan bwe.
Iy ndramak ibo gok ta akohok ndramas le, iy ndramak doh iy ta atondrok iri sipsip bwe, ma iri sipsip doh, tan bwe. Buku iy anyolom mwi badu lokei sakaliye eme ta aimon iri sipsip, iy kameh inoh, ma iy ruwani iri sipsip areu, iy kameh atobwak iu. Mwi eme ini iri, ma iri kameh atalan laleyah.
Iy ndramak nane atobwak iu, tasah iy ta akohok le ndramas ta gok, iy ari ndramak handru ta tanan ta atondrok iri sipsip bwe.
“Jo ndramak ari mwasin labai ta atondrok iri sipsip, jo tanan iri sipsip tek amwenen, ma iri sipsip tek amwenen tanan jo.
I buku tama, iy tanan jo ma jo ale tanan iy, ma jo winiyan banoh ta imek ta iri sipsip tek bwe.
Iri sipsip tek rayah badeh, bado bolo kowah bwe. Gok tek ta akohok iri kame hamon bolo kowah ale. Iri ale katana iri bohok, ma iri kameh ala le rakou, ma ndramak ari le atondrok iri mara-ei.
“Katin ta tama aso-ok jo badeh, ta jo atehei ndrinek labai, ma jo banoh ta imek tiri sipsip tek bwe. Ano kameh jo andrei kohak eme hamon ja.
Ari ndramak winiyan bandrei kohak ba-au bwe. Na tanan ma budon tek le amwenen jo edeu kohak iu. Boto-on ta adeu ma boto-on ta akohok eme hamon badeh, tek amwenen. Sahou batanau dah jo akohok badu mine tama amwenen.”
Sahou nane doh eme ma bwidi ndrokowa iri Juwis udu aliy, ma apwai iri a la-uh.
Iri solo-an asehek anya, “Iy badeh, malawin ndra-in udu bwele-en ma iy lolo-ou. Buku sah? Taha sanuhun iy!”
Iri lau rayah anya, “Sahou doh bala buku iy ndramak, balik bado bwele-en bo-oh! I buku balik udu bwele-en, iy winiyan babwidi mada ndramak kaseu, basak bwe.”
Len ta nyamon tinan anya kasahan Jerusalem ta abudon len nane iri atah asiu tinan ta Kindrei. Idoh udu bolo len ta kon nyala-an asahan ale.
Na len doh badeh, Jises edek in bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei bahandra beleheleh ta Solomon, iri amekes na bek.
Iri Juwis ame turuki iy ales udu le alih tiri marakon, eme ma iri ndremenya iy, “Len sabe handru kameh ahi kabe-en ou? Buku ou Mesaya handru, ahi aso-ok ou asehek amwenen keme tahi na le dan!”
Jises eme asehek i tiri, “Jo ndrasehek ndrawek taha, arile aha batehei budon taha bala ta sahou tek bwe. Iri lahou tinan jo amekes na boto-on ta nyara tama badeh, ta aha katanan jo,
arile aha batehei budon taha bala ta aliy bwe, tasah aha sipsip tek handru bwe.
Iri sipsip tek anuhun ma iri tanan bohok. Jo tanan iri, ma iri adek an hamon tek.
Jo atehei kohak handru ili tiri, ma iri kameh winiyan bamak bwe, ma ari ndramak winiyan baruwi iri ado minek bala len bwe.
Tama amwenen, iy ndratehei iri ndrame tek, iy udu bwele-en labai tiri lakou marakon, ma ari ndramak winiyan baruwi iri ado mine tama ame len bwe.
Jo hawe tama, aru ari le.”
Sahou tan eme ma bwidi iri Juwis akohok bek anya korou iy ja.
Eme Jises asehek sahou i tiri ja i buku doh, “Jo ndraleheyani aha ta iri lahou laba tinan solo-an labai, ta tama. Ta saba lahou tinan handru, aha anya korou jo na bek?”
Iri anya, “Ahi winiyan borou ou na bek ta iri lahou tinan rayah ou amekes bwe, arile ou bobose Kindrei, tasah ou ndramak laleyah, ou aloh ou, ma ou amekes ou ja i buku Kindrei.”
Jises eme tiye sahou ili tiri anya, “Ta kandriyen malen taha, sahou ta Kindrei randra asehek i buku doh, ‘Jo Kindrei, jo asehek, aha badeh, ndra kindrei.’
Bwena mene Kindrei asehek sahou dah ili tiri lau, iy tiye tiri ta iri ndra kindrei. Aha ndranuhun, sahou udu bolo buk ndrabun ta Kindrei kameh udu le buku doh, winiyan bano bwe.
Arile jo, tama amwenen leheyani jo, ma iy suni jo eme andri kon munyak. Jo ndrasehek taha, ‘Jo Nadu Kindrei.’ Buku sah ja aha anya, jo bobose Kindrei ma jo anya kakohok ndrahunen?
Buku aha anya jo bamekes gok ta tama bwe, mwasin ta aha satehei budon taha same ta sahou tek.
Jo badeh, amekes iri gok ta tama. I buku aha batehei budon taha bame ta sahou tek bwe, mwasin, aha katehei budon taha kili le tiri lahou tinan mene jo ndramekes. Tasah, jo aso-ok aha katanan ma aha kabudon kamwenen ki buku doh: Tama badeh, i buku jo, jo i buku le tama. Aru ma la-uh badeh, ari le.”
Eme ma bwidi iri anya kateu iy, arile iy eme atobwak iri.
Jises eme edek iu ili hamon ili kapa gwa Jodan bilisiu bwena mene Jon ta alomwa inyu iri lau are aliy, ma iy udu aliy udu gwek.
Ma iri lau solo-an labai adek ame hawen. Iri ame asehek i tan, “Jon badeh, bamekes ari lahou tinan ma kalem bwe; iri sahou marakon iy asehek nyala iy ndramak doh badeh, marakon amwenen le.”
Ma udu bolo kon doh iri lau solo-an labai atehei budon tiri marakon ili le ta Jises.
Ndramak ari nyaran Lasarus iy ibo sik in andri. Iy badu Betani, kon ta Mariya uru nadu tinen Mata.
Uru ma la-uh doh, nadu tine uru nane, Lasarus, iy ibo sik in andri. Mariya mene ale asolou suluw manahun buburen ili bwele-e kati Laban, ano iy owei na lami batun.
Eme uru nadu tinen suni sahou turu ili ta Jises i buku doh, “Laban, kawas tam mene, ou ale aso-ok iy labai badeh, ibo sik in andri.”
Jises anuhun le badeh, iy eme tiye, “Sik doh ta amekes ndramak imek bwe. Bwe, idoh eme ta taha kanyolom ma taha katudun Kindrei, ta idoh le nadun kameh akohok nyaran mwasin.”
Jises aso-ok Mata uru nadu tinen ma Lasarus tinan labai.
Iy akohok sahou ta Lasarus badeh, ibo sik, arile iy eme udu kon doh udu gwek, len la-uh ja.
Ano iy eme asehek i toro lau tan, “To ka-au kala hamon ja kala Judiya.”
Oro lau tan ame asehek ili tan, “Ndramak ta leheya, na le mene badeh, iri Juwis badu loboho Judiya anya korou ou na bek, arile ou anya ala hamon ala kon doh ja?”
Jises asehek sahou i toro lau tan, “Ado sanoh. Len ari ma buruwen mandraben ili winiya beyeh, idoh luluwen labai. Are lau iy edek na len iy winiyan bataku bwe, tasah iy atou lomada len ta kon munyak.
Buku iy are edek na ben, iy kameh winiyan banyolom kon bwe, ma iy kameh taku, tasah iy lomadan ari sun bwe.”
Iy asehek sahou ano, iy eme ili tiye toro, “Kawas tato Lasarus badeh, amadin tuk le, arile jo kameh ili mete-ei iy amak eme loken ja.”
Oro lau tan asehek sahou i tan, “Laban, i buku iy ndramadin tuk, iy kameh winiyan amwenen.”
Jises asehek nyala imek tan, arile oro lau tan anya iy kede-eh asehek ta iy amadin le.
Ma iy eme asehek amwenen ili toro, “Lasarus ndramak.
Jo abudon ado labai, eme bwidi jo sekesek ta to marakon bado hawen bwe. Tasah, ado kameh atehei budon tado eme le tek. Ya, to ka-au kala katou iy.”
Ano Tomas (iri aloh iy Didimus) asehek sahou i toro lau ta Jises marakon, “Mwasin, to marakon kala Judiya, ma to kamak ka le hawen ka-au ai!”
Jises hawe oro lau tan asahan le badeh, ma iy i tanan Lasarus iri ndratehei iy ndrala munu bek len hahuw ndra-au.
Betani udu mirihik ta Jerusalem. Nyolom ta aliy i buku kilomita taloh,
ma iri Juwis badeh, solo-an labai ame hawe Mata uru Mariya ta bahabah uru ta imek ta nadu tine uru.
Mata ndranuhun, idah kameh Jises eme, iy eme edek ili ndruni iy udu ndra ndrukulu san ranah. Mariya le ari udu asiu turu udu.
Mata eme asehek i ta Jises, “Laban, buku ou ado aliy nane, nadu tine winiyan bamak bwe.
Arile, jo tanan, na idah kameh Kindrei edeu saba lakou ewek tam buku ou ndremenya iy ta aliy.”
Ano Jises asehek sahou i tan i buku doh, “Nadu tinem kameh amak eme loken ja.”
Mata anya, “Jo tanan, idah kameh iy amak ja na len hamon.”
Jises tiye i tan, “Amak udu bolo lek eme awas ja badeh, jo le ari. Iy are lau atehei budon tan mara-ei eme tek, iy imek arile kohan handru kameh udu mwasin.
Ma are lau iy bamak bwe le, iy atehei budon tan mara-ei eme tek, iy winiyan bamak bwe. Ya ou atehei budon tam in ta aliy?”
Iy tiye i tan, “Ehe Laban, jo atehei budon tek in tam, tasah ou Mesaya, ma ou Nadu Kindrei. Ou le mene, Kindrei suni ou ame andri bolo kon munyak.”
Iy asehek sahou ano le badeh, iy edek eme hamon eme luhi nadu tinen Mariya eme hawen ma iy asehek i tan, “Ndramak ta leheya ndrame, iy anya ou ala hawen.”
Mariya anuhun le badeh, iy suri iy ere loken suwi suwi, ma iy edek ili hawe Jises.
Jises bame basos bolo kon bwe le, iy udu ndra san ranah nane Mata asahan hawen.
Oro Juwis rayah ado hawe Mariya ado asiu ta tikisiy hawen. Eme oro anyolom Mariya suri iy suwi suwi ere loken, ma iy edek iu ili manan. Ano oro an hamon tan ala manan, tasah oro abudon anya, “Kora-on iy kili keden kili mada lek.”
Mariya edek ili isos ndrukulu san nane Jises udu aliy, ma iy anyolom iy, iy eme taku ili bada katin ma iy asehek sahou i ta Jises, “Laban, i buku ou ado aliy badeh, nadu tine winiyan bamak bwe.”
Jises anyolom iy eden, ma iri Juwis nane adek an hamon tan aden ale, iy anyolom iri aden eme bwidi ndrinen eden tinan labai ta tikisiy.
Iy eme lelen iri, “Aha ndratehei iy udu heh?” Iri anya, “Laban, ou ame anyolom.”
Eme ma Jises eden.
Iri Juwis asehek, “Aha kanyolom iy eden. Iy aso-ok Lasarus tinan labai!”
Arile iri rayah asehek anya, “Iy le mene adeh, sihi mada ndramak ari bwe asak. I buku sah iy winiyan basebenei iy ndramak kede-eh ja bwe?”
Jises tikisiy tinan labai, iy eme edek ili mirihik ta mada lek. Lek doh udu munu bek iri turuki madan na bek tinan.
Jises tiye i tiri, “Aha katundruwi bek udu mada lek kede-eh ki-iu kili len.” Mata nadu tine ndramak nane imek asehek sahou i buku doh, “Laban, manahun ndrala, iy udu bolo lek badeh len hahuw ai.”
Ano Jises asehek sahou i tan i buku doh, “Jo nane ndrasehek tam eh, i buku ou atehei budon tam mara-ei eme tek eh, idah kameh ou winiyan anyolom boto-on ta Kindrei.”
Iri ame tundruwi bek udu mada lek nane ili len. Ano Jises anyolom ili kandrah, ma iy asehek sahou, “Tama jo edeu wurah i tam ta ou anuhun jo.
Jo ndratanan len marakon ou anuhun jo, arile jo asehek sahou dah ta lau badih ma mwan ales ado hawek kada-ah, ta iri kameh katehei budon tiri kewek tam, tasah ou suni jo eme.”
Iy asehek ma iy aloh boto-on labai, “Lasarus ou ame manan.”
Ndramak imek nane dah edek eme manan, minen ma katin badeh, iri su-iy na kari kolau. Ma kolau ra-ei ja iri su-i madan na aliy. Jises eme asehek i tiri, “Aha kala katolowei kolau ta lek udu badan kodo-oh ki-iu, ma iy kedek.”
Iri Juwis solo-an an hamon ame ta atou Mariya, ma iri anyolom saba lakou Jises amekes, ma iri atehei budon tiri marakon i tan.
Arile iri rayah ala hamon asehek i tiri Parasi ta saba lakou nane Jises amekes.
Eme iri lau tinan tiri pris ma iri Parasi luhi iri kansol ame atukum ma asehek i tiri. Iri ndremenya iri i buku doh, “Taha kamekes kili buku sah handru? Iy ndramak kede-eh amekes iri lahou tinan ma kalem solo-an labai.
I buku taha bamekes ari lakou bwe, idah kameh iri lau marakon atehei budon tiri, ma iri an hamon tan. Ano, iri lau ta bahun badu Rom ame kameh tohowei asiu tinan ta Kindrei tataha iu, ma andrei iri lau tataha marakon au.”
Ano ndramak tiri ari nyaran Kayapas, iy in bwena tiri pris na le jaha doh. Iy asehek bohon a tinan i loken, “Aha kede-eh tana aha se lakou bwe!
Aha babudon se bwai? Mwasin ta ndramak ari le, iy kimek ta saluwe lau marakon. Ndra-in ta lau marakon amak laleyah.”
Iy basehek sahou na budon tan amwenen bwe, iy asahan kabin tiri pris na jaha nane doh, iy eme amekes sahou i buku propet ta adi Jises kimek ta saluwe lau marakon badu Juwis;
ma iy imek kameh tiri Juwis le bwe, iy imek ta atukum nadu Kindrei iri mene ndratalan, kame hamon ka le se.
Ma udu ndra bada len doh ili badeh, iri amekes sa-oh ta adai iy.
Eme ma Jises badek bala bame hawe iri Juwis ja bwai. Iy ruwani kon nane iy udu aliy, iy edek iu ili kon ari doh mirihik ta kon lomale an, ili loboho kon ari iri aloh Iparayim, ma iy manyah udu hawe oro lau tan ado kon doh udu gwek.
Len ndrabun iri aloh Pasoba ma nyamon tinan ta jabi ramen yis bolon bwe tiri Juwis anya kasahan, eme iri lau solo-an badu loboho doh adek au ala le loken Jerusalem, ta sikine ndraka-an udu tiri iu, ano iri baramekes Pasoba.
Iri badeh, asilah Jises, iri ales ado bolo kowah ta asiu tinan ta Kindrei, iri ndremenya iri ari, ari i buku doh, “Saba budon taha handru? Sebwe iy winiyan bame ta nyamon tinan dah bwe nadeh?”
Iri lau tinan tiri pris ma iri Parasi ndratehei sahou ndrado aliy, i buku are lau tanan Jises udu heh handru, iy keme katiye tiri ma iri kala katawi iy.
Len ma onoh kahis le ta len ndrabun iri aloh Pasoba anya kasahan, Jises eme edek ili asahan Betani, kon ta Lasarus, iy ale mene imek arile Jises mete-ei iy amak ja.
Oro ame amekes nadu nyamon sese na Jises. Mata akohok nan nyamon, Lasarus ale manyah udu hawe iri lau nane aimon nyamon hawe Jises.
Ano Mariya andrei bwisi ndrau ari, suluw irek udu bolon. Suluw doh iri amekes na kandro kei aloh nat. Manahun ma sowan badeh, tinan labai. Iy eme asolou ili kati Jises, ano iy owei abosar na lami batun. Ma manahu bubure suluw nane doh tuhi bolo asiu mara-ei.
Lau tan ari nyaran Judas Iskariyot, iy hamon kameh iy leheyani Jises ili mine iri lau ndra-in, iy asehek i buku doh,
“Adeh! Tasah handru iy badih kede-eh amekes i buku doh? Ndrelekei doh nane katehei kili mada ba-en, ya winiyan asahan i luk denariyus ma tonek (300), eme ya kanyohan ki tiri lau lakou bwe.”
Iy asehek sahou doh, arile iy babudon ta iri lau nane tiri lakou bwe. Tasah iy ndramak ari ta bahana, iy ta atondrok kohoya luk toro ale; iy akohok ta aseben iy amwenen ta saba lakou iy atehei udu bolo kohei doh.
Jises asehek anya, “Iy kudu gwek, mwasin ta iy katawiy kudu winiya le len iri adeu jo anya kili bolo lek.
Iri lau tiri lakou bwe kameh len mari ado hawe ado, arile jo kameh winiyan bado hawe ado len mari bwe.”
Iri Juwis marakon ndratanan Jises ndrame ndrado Betani, iri ame ta atou iy le bwe, iri ame ta anyolom Lasarus ale, iy mene Jises mete-ei iy udu bolo lek tan amak eme awas ja.
Eme iri lau tinan tiri pris amekes sa-oh ta adi Lasarus ale.
Ta amak tan le badeh, bwidi iri Juwis ala le ta Jises ma iri atehei budon tiri mari ili le tan.
Kon aleu asahan len ari ja, iri lau solo-an labai ndrame ta Pasoba ma nyamon tinan, iri ndranuhun Jises badeh, ndradek ndrame Jerusalem.
Iri ame andrei la-u badou udu mine iri ma aloh ta sekesek i ta Jises i buku doh, “Hosana! Kasekesek iy! Kasore nyaran! Iy badeh, eme ta nyara Laban!” “Kasore kabin badu Isra-el!”
Jises eme ili ndruni donki ari ma iy sandroh ili manyah udu bwele-en, i buku le iri sahou ta Kindrei ndrasehek udu bolo buk ndrabun:
“Aha lau badu Sayon, aha sanoh. ‘Aha kanyolom, kabin taha eme ai. Iy eme, iy manyah udu bwele-e donki ari ndramak bamanyah ba-en bwele-en bwena bwe.’”
Ma bwena handru oro lau tan bala tanan ta saba lakou handru, nane iy amekes, bwe. Udu hamon ja ta Jises iu ili hamon ili kandrah, eme oro barabudon iri sahou marakon nane udu bolo buk ndrabun asehek ili badan, ma iri lakou rayah doh oro ndramekes ndrala tan ale.
Iri lau marakon ado hawe Jises ndranyolom iy mene aloh Lasarus udu bolo lek tan eme len, ma mete-ei iy nane imek, amak ja. Iri ame, tiyani sahou ili bolo kon mara-ei.
Eme ma lau solo-an labai ala ta anyolom iy, tasah iri ndranuhun iy mene amekes kalem.
Eme iri Parasi asehek sahou ndrokowa iri, “Taha kanyolom, budon tataha nane basahan bamwenen bwai. Tasah, lau marakon badu kon munyak ndra-en hamon tan!”
Oro Grik rayah ado bolo iri nane ala ta salom ta nyamon tinan doh ale.
Oro ala hawe Pilip, iy badu kon Betsaida udu loboho Galili, oro ame tiye iy, “Ndramak tinan, aso anya katou Jises.”
Pilip eme tiye Enduru, oro adek ala. Eme uru ala tiye Jises.
Jises eme tiye toro, “Len dah ndrasahan ta Nadu Ndramak Awas kameh akohok lomadan.
Jo tiye tado handru, i buku badu kalom ari bataku bala bwele-e munyak bwe, ma iy bamak bwe, badun ari le udu. Arile, i buku iy imek, idah kameh iy asahan ma iy ato-ou salin solo-an labai.
Iy are lau iy atehei budon ma kohan amwenen in ta munyak dah tinan labai, kohan kameh ano laleyah. Arile, buku are lau iy batehei budon ma kohan amwenen ba-en ta munyak dah bwe, kohan kameh winiyan bano bwe, kameh udu le buku doh.
Are lau iy anya kamekes gok tek, iy badeh, ki-in le hamon tek, eme ma kon heh jo udu aliy, iy kameh udu hawek ale. Buku are lau iy amekes lahou tek, tama kameh atehei lomadan tinan ili tan.”
Jises asehek sahou ja i buku doh, “Len dah jo tikisiy handru labai, ya jo kasehek saba lakou? Jo katiye anya, tama, ou winiyan sebenei jo na bolo len dah deh? Ndri-iy ai, tasah jo eme dah ta ili bolo iri sisi-in.
Tama, ou bwidi nyara lomadam kili tinan.” Jises asehek sahou ano le badeh, boho ndramak ari asehek sahou udu bolo kandrah eme andri i buku doh, “Jo ndrabwidi nyara lomadak ndra tinan ndrano. Idah kameh jo kamekes ja.”
Iri lau solo-an nane ales ale ado mirihik, anuhun boho ndramak doh. Eme iri lau rayah anya, “Idoh kuruh.” Iri lau rayah ja anya, “Idoh angelo asehek sahou i tan.”
Arile Jises eme tiye i tiri, “Sahou nane ta aseben jo bwe, sahou ta aseben aha amwenen.
Na len idah kameh Kindrei atehei lau marakon badu kon munyak a ta sahou; na idah kameh iy tikahei kabin badu kon munyak dah iu.
Na idah jo udu kon munyak, arile hamon kameh iri tutuni jo ere loken, ma jo kameh aruwi iri lau marakon ame le hawek.” (
Iy asehek sahou doh ta leheya san, ta iy kameh imek i buku sah handru.)
Iri lau marakon tiye, “Ahi ndranuhun udu ndra bada kandriyen malen ta Moses mene edeu, ‘Mesaya kameh winiyan bamak bwe, iy kameh udu le buku doh.’ I buku sah handru ou asehek anya, ‘Nadu Ndramak Awas kameh iri tutuni iy ili loken bada kei tondreh’? Nadu Ndramak Awas–Iy are lau handru?”
Ano Jises tiye i toro, “Aha kameh lomada sun udu hawe aha luluwen sese. Aha kadek ma sun, tasah iy udu ndra hawe aha kahis. Kora-on lulik katubuluhi aha. Are lau iy edek bolo lulik, iy bala tanan ta iy ilih heh handru.
Aha katehei budon taha marakon kili le ta lomada sun, buku iy udu ndra hawe aha, ma aha kameh asahan nadu lomada sun.” Jises asehek iri sahou doh ano le, iy ruwani iri ado, iy iu aton ta mada iri lau.
Iri lau marakon nane doh anyolom Jises amekes iri kalem solo-an labai, arile iri ari batehei se budon tiri bala tan bwai.
Eme ma sahou ta propet Aisaya mene asehek, eme asahan handru: “Laban, are lau handru atehei budon tan in ta sahou tam aso ndrasehek? Ya are lau handru ndranyolom ou amekes iri lahou tinan?”
Iri winiyan batehei budon tiri bala ta Jises bwe, tasah propet Aisaya ndrasehek:
“Kindrei ndrabwidi mada iri ndralik, ma iy ndrawahei budon tiri, eme ma iri winiyan banyolom, ma winiyan bala tanan ta kati iri lakou mwasin Kindrei amekes bwe. Kindrei anya, ‘Iri kameh winiyan bame hawek ja bwai, ta bwidi iri kamwenen ja.’”
Propet Aisaya asehek ta aliy, tasah iy ndranyolom lomada Jises eme ma iy asehek iy.
Handru, iri tinan tiri Juwis solo-an atehei budon tiri ili tan. Arile iri anoh iri Parasi, ma iri basehek budon tiri bame len bwe. Iri abudon, kora-on iri katikahei iri kame len ta asiu ta atukum tiri Juwis.
Iri babudon ta iri lakou nane Kindrei aso-ok bwe, iri badeh, aso-ok iri lau ta atudun nyara iri le.
Jises asehek sahou bohon i tinan, “Buku ari ndramak iy atehei budon tan in tek, badeh, ba-en tek le bwe, badeh, in ta are lau nane iy suni jo eme dah.
Buku are lau iy anyolom jo, badeh, iy anyolom are lau iy nane suni jo eme dah ale.
Jo ndrame andri bolo kon munyak i buku lomada sun, ta iy are lau atehei budon tan eme tek, iy kameh winiyan ba-en bolo lulik bwe.
“I buku iy are lau iy anuhun sahou tek, arile iy ba-en hamon ta aliy bwe, jo winiyan badeu maha-an bala bwele-en bwe. Jo bame ta edeu maha-an ili ta lau marakon badu kon munyak bwe; jo eme dah ta aseben iri.
Maha-an udu aliy ta are lau iy atehei konan eme tek, ma iy baso-ok sahou tek bwe, sahou le nane jo ndrasehek kameh edeu maha-an i tan na len hamon.
Idoh handru, tasah jo basehek iri sahou dah na budon tek amwenen bwe. Iri budon dah ta tama, iy nane suni jo eme. Iy tiye jo ta iri lakou ta asehek ma iri lakou ta leheya.
Jo tanan iri sahou batanau tan badeh, kohan handru udu aliy winiyan bano bwe, kameh ta udu le buku doh. Iri lakou jo asehek badeh, i buku le tama asehek eme tek.”
Len ndrabun iri aloh Pasoba ma hawe nyamon tinan ndrame mirihik. Jises ndratanan, udu bolo len doh eme kameh iy ruwani kon munyak ta iy iu ili loken hawe taman. Iy aso-ok iri lau tan marakon ado bolo kon munyak tinan labai, ili winiya le iy imek.
Oro manyah aimon nyamon ta beyeh, balik ndratehei budon boto-on labai ndrala ndrine Judas Iskariyot nadu Saimon, ta iy kameh edeu sa-oh ta Jises.
Jises tanan taman badeh, ndratehei iri boto-on marakon ndrala bahandra tondrok tan, iy udu hawe Kindrei eme, ano iy kameh iu ili loken hawen ja.
Eme ma iy aimon nyamon hawe oro, ano iy suri iy ere loken, iy asini awin badu bwele-en le iu, ma iy andrei kolau ra-ei eme iy tabuwiy i ndrukulun.
Ano ja iy solowei gwa ili bolo bwisi sabok ma iy sikine kati oro lau tan, ano iy owei kati oro lau tan abosar na kolau nane iy tabuwiy udu ndrukulun.
Iy eme isos hawe Saimon Pita, Saimon Pita eme asehek sahou i buku doh i tan, “Laban, ou anya sikine katik?”
Jises asumon sahou ta Pita i buku doh, “Ou bala tanam ta saba lakou jo amekes dah bwe, arile hamon kameh ou barala tanam baramwenen.”
Pita anya, “Jo bwalek, ou winiyan basikine katik bwe!” Jises eme asehek sahou i tan ja, “I buku jo basikine katim bwe eh, ou kameh winiya bado hawek bwai.”
Saimon Pita anuhun sahou ta Jises nane doh, ma manin atur labai. Eme ma iy asehek sahou i tan ja, “Laban, anya i buku baden eh! Ndri-iy ai, ou sasikine le katik, ou sikine minek ma la-uh ma batuk ale.”
Jises anya, “Are lau ndranyu mara-ei, iy winiyan banyu ja bwai, idah kameh kasikine le katin. Bada ado ndra bele, arile jo basehek bada ado marakon bwe.”
Iy ndratanan are lau handru kameh edeu sa-oh tan, ta idoh le ma iy eme asehek, “Bada ado ndra bele, arile jo basehek bada ado marakon bwe.”
Iy sikine kati oro lau tan ano, iy eme atehei awin tan ili la-un ja, ma iy edek ili hamon manyah ili ndrahunen ja. Iy eme lelen oro lau tan, “Saba lakou jo ndramekes ndrawek tado, ado ndratanan sese deh bwe?
Ado aloh jo ndramak ta leheya, ma Laban, mwasin handru ta ado aloh jo i buku doh, tasah, badeh jo amwenen.
Jo Laban ma jo ndramak ta leheya, jo nane ndrasikine kati ado. Ado satudun nyara ado, mwasin ta ado kala kasikine kati nadu tine ado iri rayah ja.
Jo leheya ado ta kandriyen mwasin, ta ado ari ari kamekes ki buku le jo nane ndramekes.
Ado kanuhun kamwenen, iri lau bonyo-ou winiya basakalawi kabin tiri bwe, ma iri salibah ale winiyan bala bwena tare lau nane tiye iy eme ta amekes gok tan bwe ale.
Idah ado ndratanan iri lakou marakon nane doh, ya Kindrei winiyan nyosowani ado i buku ado amekes iri lakou marakon doh.
“Jo winiyan basehek ado marakon bwe, jo tanan are lau jo ndrandrei, arile sahou udu bolo buk ndrabun asehek, kameh asahan handru, tiye i buku doh, ‘Ndramak nane iy aimon nyamon hawek, iy le kameh edeu sa-oh tek.’
“Lakou doh basahan bwe le, jo kasehek tado kere bwena ai, ano lakou barasahan hamon, i buku lakou doh asahan, idah kameh ma ado barabudon ai, jo iy ndramak nane iy udu le buku doh.
Ado kanuhun, jo tiye tado handru, are lau iy akohok ma aseben ndramak nane iy amekes lahou tek, idoh i buku none le iy akohok jo ma aseben jo ale. Ma are lau akohok jo, idoh i buku none le iy akohok Kindrei iy suni jo eme dah.”
Sahou tan ano le bohon badeh, ndrinen eden ta tikisiy. Iy eme asehek sahou amwenen ili toro lau tan i buku doh, “Jo asehek sahou handru ewek tado, iy ari ereu bolo ado kede-eh kameh atehei jo ili mine iri lau ndra-in.”
Oro lau tan anuhun, ma mada oro ari i ta ari, tasah oro bala tanan ta are lau handru Jises asehek.
Lau ta Jises ari manyah udu hawen, iy lau doh Jises aso-ok iy labai.
Eme Saimon Pita ndrokonya batun ili ta iy lau nane ma iy asehek, “Kandremenya iy, are lau handru ale iy asehek iy doh?”
Iy lau tan ari nane dah sosokok ili mirihik ta Jises. Iy eme atehei batun ili batalan ma suburuk i tan, “Ndramak tinan, ou tiye tek, are lau handru?”
Jises anya, “Ou anyolom, jo kameh atehei jabi ramen ili bolo suw, ano kameh jo atehei ili nan, badeh, iy le ai.” Iy eme atehei jabi ramen ili bolo suw ano iy atehei ili na Judas Iskariyot nadu Saimon.
Judas andrei jabi ramen ano le badeh, balik ndrala bolo iri budon tan mara-ei ai. Jises anya, “Judas, ou ala. Saba lakou nane ou anya amekes, ou amekes suwi.”
Oro lau tan ado bada koyeu doh, oro anuhun Jises asehek sahou ili ta Judas, arile oro bakohok bolo sahou tan bwe.
Judas badeh, ta atondrok kohei ta luk, eme oro lau rayah anya Jises kede-eh tiye iy ta asih rayah nyamon ta len ndrabun aloh Pasoba nadeh, o, iy kili kedeu rayah lakou kili tiri lau, tiri lakou bwe nadeh.
Judas ini jabi ramen ranah nane ano le badeh, iy suri iy iu ili manan, ma kon eben ai.
Iy ndra-au ndra manan ndra luluwen sese, Jises eme asehek, “Na idah kameh Nadu Ndramak Awas atudun nyaran, ma Kindrei kameh leheya lomadan i ta lohowan tan Jises.
Buku Kindrei atudun iy, se nawin bwe iy atudun uru nadun i le rasan.
“Ado naduk, jo kameh bado hawe ado luluwen bwe. Ado kameh asilah jo, arile jo asehek tado i buku jo mene ndrasehek ndrala ta tinan tiri Juwis, ta ado winiya bala kon kameh jo ilih aliy bwe.
“Na dah jo edeu kandriyen ta batanau ha-un ewek tado: Ado ari ari badeh, kaso-ok nadu tine ado iri rayah ja. I buku le jo mene aso-ok ado labai, eme ma ado kaso-ok nadu tinem iri rayah ja.
Buku ado ari ari aso-ok labai iri lau tek rayah badu hawek, idoh kameh leheyani iri lau marakon badu kon munyak, i buku ado badeh, lau tek handru.”
Ano Saimon Pita lelen Jises i buku doh, “Laban, ou kameh alih heh handru?” Jises tiye i tan ja, “Jo ili heh, ou winiyan ba-en hamon tek na dah bwe, arile ou kameh bara-en hamon tek ja na len hamon.”
Pita lelen iy ja, “Laban, i buku sah handru jo kameh winiyan bawek hawem na len dah bwe? Jo kameh atehei kohak marakon ewek le tam.”
Jises eme tiye i tan ja i buku doh, “Buku sah? Ou winiyan atehei koham marakon eme tek ta aseben jo handru deh? Ou anuhun, jo asehek sahou handru ewek tam, kakaro baden bwe le, ou kameh besebes anya, ou tanam jo bwe san tulusin.”
Jises tiye sahou ili toro lau tan, “Ado satikisiy ma ado sabudon solo-an labai. Ado katehei le budon tado mara-ei kili le ta Kindrei ma keme tek ale.
Udu bolo kon ta tama doh, iri asiu nadu bwisik solo-an labai udu aliy. Idah kameh jo ilih mwena ta lowosa iri nadu asiu nane doh taha. Buku bado aliy bwe eh, idah jo winiyan basehek iri sahou dah bwe.
I buku jo ilih bwena lowosani iri nadu asiu marakon nane doh ano, jo kameh eme hamon ja ta akohok aha ala ado hawek. Tasah jo aso-ok aha kameh ame ado hawek ado kon kameh jo udu aliy.
Aha ndratana aha ta san ta ili kon nane jo kameh ilih aliy.”
Tomas ndremenya Jises, “Ndramak tinan, ahi bala tanan ta ou alih kon heh handru, ya kili buku sah handru ahi kala tanan ta san ili kon badeh?”
Jises eme tiye sahou i ta Tomas, “Jo le ari jo san handru, ma jo kati iri sahou handru, ma kati kohan handru kameh udu le buku doh. Ari ndramak winiya bala hawe tama, bala rasan san ja bwe. Iy kameh keme badak bwena.
Na idah ado ndratanan jo ndramwenen, ma idah kameh ado atanan tama udu mwasin labai. Ehe, na idah ili, aha kameh atanan iy udu mwasin labai, ma aha ndranyolom iy.”
Pilip lelen Jises, “Ndramak tinan, ou leheya tamam keme taso, idoh le tinan udu budon taso.”
Jises tiye i tan, “Pilip, jo udu hawe ado luluwen labai, arile buku sah handru ou bala tanam jo bwe? Are lau iy ndratou jo badeh, iy ndratou tama ale. I buku sah ja ou anya jo kaleheya tama kewek tado ja?
Sebwe ou atehei budon tam handru in tek, ta jo in hawe tama, ma tama udu hawek. Iri sahou ale jo ndrasehek ndrawek tado badeh, jo basehek na budon tek amwenen bwe. Tama in hawek, eme iy le amekes iri gok tan amwenen.
Aha katehei budon taha keme tek ta sahou jo asehek anya, jo udu hawe tama, ma tama udu hawek ale. Buku sah, aha katehei budon taha kili le ta sahou jo asehek, tasah aha ndranyolom iri gok jo amekes.
Jo tiye tado handru, are lau iri atehei budon tiri marakon eme le tek, idah kameh iri amekes iri gok i buku le gok jo amekes. Ehe, ma gok iri amekes idah kameh udu mwasin labai ja ta iri gok jo ndramekes. Tasah, jo kameh ilih hawe tama.
Ma jo kameh amekes iri lakou marakon, buku aha ndremenya tama in ta nyarak. Eme ma tama kameh akohok nyaran i tinan i san ta nadun amwenen.
Ehe, buku lakou marakon aha ndremenya in ta bwele-e nyarak, idah kameh jo winiyan bwidiy ma atehei ewek taha.”
Jises eme asehek sahou ili toro lau tan, “I buku ado aso-ok jo labai, idah kameh ado ka-en hamon tiri sahou batanau tek.
Jo kameh ndremenya tama ta iy katiye seben keme ta aseben aha kabadok. Ma iy kameh udu hawe aha udu le buku doh.
Seben doh, iy Malawin Ndrabun, iy eme ta asehek sahou handru ta Kindrei. Iri lau marakon badu kon munyak winiya bandrei iy bwe, tasah iri winiyan batou iy bwe, ma iri winiya bala tanan iy bwe. Arile aha le kameh tanan iy ai. Tasah iy in hawe aha, ma iy kameh udu hawe aha, udu le buku doh.
“Buku jo iu, ado kameh winiya barah bwe. Jo kameh eme hamon eme hawe aha ja.
Mirihik ai, idah kameh iri lau badu kon munyak kameh winiya batou jo ja bwe. Arile aha le kameh atou jo ai. Jo kameh imek, ano jo amak ja. I buku le aha kameh amak, ano aha amak ame awas ja, ma koha aha kameh eme hamon ja ma udu le buku doh.
Len doh kameh asahan taha, ma aha kameh atanan ta jo badeh, in hawe tama, aha a-en hawek, ma jo in hawe aha.
Are lau iy andrei iri sahou batanau tek ma iy in hamon ta aliy, iy lau doh badeh, aso-ok jo tinan labai. Ma tama kameh aso-ok are lau nane iy aso-ok jo. Jo ale aso-ok iy, ma jo kameh leheya jo amwenen ili tan.”
Judas anya, (Idoh Judas Iskariyot bwe, iy ari ja.) “Laban, i buku sah handru ou leheya ou amwenen ame lewan mada aso? Buku sah bala mada iri lau badu kon munyak bwe?”
Jises eme tiye i ta Judas, “I buku are lau iy aso-ok jo labai, iy kameh in hamon ta leheya tek. Ma tama kameh aso-ok iy. Eme ma aru ma la-uh kameh ala manyah ado hawen ere le buku doh.
Are lau iy baso-ok jo bwe, iy lau doh, iy ba-en hamon ta iri leheya tek bwe. Iri leheya handru nane aha ndranuhun, badeh tek amwenen bwe, ta tama iy nane suni jo eme.
“Jo ndratiye tado ta iri lakou dah, mene jo udu hawe ado.
Seben badeh, Malawin Ndrabun. Tama kameh suni iy eme in ta bwele-e nyarak. Iy kameh leheya aha ta iri lakou marakon, ma amekes iri budon taha kudu tiri lakou mene jo ndrasehek ndrawek taha.
“Mondrei jo ruwani ndrado hawe ado badeh, mondrei tek amwenen. Jo badeu bala buku kon munyak edeu bwe. Aha satikisiy, aha sabudon solo-an ma aha sanoh.
Aha ndranuhun jo ndrasehek taha, ‘Jo kameh iu o, arile ano kameh jo eme hamon hawe aha ja.’ Buku aha aso-ok jo labai, aha kasekesek ta jo kameh iu ili hawe tama, tasah nyaran badeh, udu bwele-e nyarak ja.
Iri lakou marakon nane doh basahan bwe le, arile jo kasehek taha ai, ta aha kameh anyolom hamon. Ano, aha baratehei budon taha barala tan.
“Jo winiya basehek sahou luluwen hawe aha bwai, tasah ndramak ta atondrok kon munyak dah eme. Boto-on tan badeh, winiya batubuluhi boto-on tek bwe.
Arile, iri lau marakon badu kon munyak katanan, jo badeh, aso-ok tama tinan labai, tasah jo amekes iri lakou marakon badeh, iy le tiye jo ta amekes.” Ano iy tiye oro lau tan, “Ado kame, to ka-au kala rasi ja.”
Jises anya, “Jo bada kei waen handru, tama badeh, iy tama bilin handru.
Buku andrak rayah bato-ou sali iri bwe, tama eme atubwa iu. Tama eme apis la-uk rayah ndra-in iu, ta iri kato-ou sali iri kamwenen ma solo-an.
Na le iri leheya tek badeh, bwidi aha ndrasahan ha-un.
Arile ado badeh, kahis badak, jo kihis bada ado ale. Buku andra waen bahis badan tinan bwe, idah kameh iy winiyan bato-ou salin bwe. Idoh i buku ado bahis badak bwe, ado kameh winiyan bato-ou sali ado bwe.”
Jises anya, “Jo bada kei waen handru, ado badeh, andran. Are lau iy ihis badak ma jo ihis badan, idah kameh iy ato-ou salin solo-an labai. Ado winiya bamekes ari lakou bwe, buku ado bahis badak bwe.
Are lau iri bahis badak bwe ma bato-ou sali iri bwe, idah kameh akahei iri au. Ma iri kameh asara, ano tukumwi mari i le se, ano iri akahei mara-ei ili bolo jih ta andrakak iu.
“Buku aha ahis hawek ma aha tawi iri sahou tek udu ndrine aha ihis, aha winiyan ndremenya jo ta iri saba lakou aha aso-ok. Jo kameh winiyan atehei ewek taha.
Tama akohok lomadan tinan labai, ta aha ato-ou buwa kei solo-an labai. I san le doh bwidi aha asahan iri lau tek handru.
“Jo aso-ok aha tinan labai, i buku le tama aso-ok jo. Aha ahis ado bolo so-ok tek tinan labai.
Buku aha a-en hamon ta sahou batanau tek eh, aha kameh ahis ado ta bolo so-ok tek, i buku le jo ndra-en hamon ta iri sahou batanau mara-ei ta tama, ma jo ihis udu bolo so-ok tan.
Jo ndrasehek tado ta lakou marakon doh, ta iri sekesek tek kudu taha, ma kidih bolo oda aha.
Sahou batanau tek i buku doh: Aha kaso-ok nadu tine aha ari, ari i buku le jo aso-ok aha labai.
I buku ari ndramak iy anya kaleheya so-ok tan tinan labai kili tiri kawas tan, badeh, iy katehei iy mara-ei amwenen kili, iy kimek ta aseben iri. Kandriyen ari le doh udu bwele-e iri kandriyen mari.
Aha marakon badeh, ndra kawas tek le ai, i buku aha an hamon ta iri sahou mene jo ndrasehek taha.
Jo winiyan baloh aha bonyo-ou ja bwai, tasah iri bonyo-ou bala tana iri ta saba lakou handru iri kabin amekes bwe. Akohok kon ta bonyo-ou eme jo aloh aha kawas tek le, tasah jo ndrasihidiy ndrawek taha iri lakou marakon mene jo anuhun eme ta tama.
“Ado basolo-ei jo bwe, jo le amwenen andrei ado, ma jo atehei ado ala ta ato-ou buwa kei solo-an, ma sali iri kameh kudu luluwen. Eme ma buku aha asolom i ta tama, ma aha ndremenya iy in ta nyarak ta saba lakou aha aso-ok, tama winiyan atehei ewek taha.
Eme ma jo kabatanau aha buku doh: Aha kaso-ok nadu tine aha iri ari ja.
“Ado samaliye, i buku iri lau badu kon munyak baso-ok ado bwe, ado ndratanan, iri ma bwena mene amekes eme tek ale.
Buku aha badu kon munyak handru, idah kameh lau badu kon munyak aso-ok aha labai, i buku aha badu hawen handru. Arile, jo akohok aha badu kon munyak dah, eme aha badu aliy bwe. Ta idoh le, bwidiy, ma kon munyak baso-ok aha bwe.
“Aha samani iri sahou mene jo ndrasehek ndrawek taha: ‘Iri lau bonyo-ou winiya basakalawi kabin tiri bwe.’ I buku iri lau adai jo, iri kameh adai aha ale; buku iri an hamon tiri leheya tek, iri kameh an hamon ta leheya taha ale.
Arile, iri kameh winiyan amekes iri saba lakou ndra-in ewek taha, tasah aha lau tek, ma iri bala tanan ta are lau handru nane suni jo eme dah bwe.
“Iri winiyan batona kandriyen ndra-in tiri bwe, buku jo bame basehek tiri bwe. Arile, na dah, jo asehek iri lakou ili tiri, eme ma iri ari madasan ta tone ndra-in tiri bwai.
Are lau bwalen jo, iy bwalen tama ale.
Iri winiyan batona kandriyen ndra-in tiri bwe, buku jo bamekes lakou bado ndrokowa iri bwe. Arile, na dah, jo amekes iri lakou ale, ari ndramak bamekes se bwe. Iri ndranyolom saba lakou jo amekes, eme ma iri baso-ok aru tama ja bwe.
Kandriyen nane iri amekes eme asahan, ta sahou ndratorowenei udu bolo kandriyen malen tiri kameh asahan handru. Sahou i buku doh, ‘Iri baso-ok jo bwe, idoh ari katin bwe.’
“Seben kameh eme. Malawin Ndrabun iy eme ta nyowonya iri sahou handru ta nyala Kindrei. Iy badeh, udu hawe tama eme. Iy badu hawe tama, arile jo kameh suni iy amwenen ewek hawe aha. Ma iy kameh asehek taha ta nyala iri gok nane jo amekes ma hawe iri kandriyen tek.
Eme ma aha ale kameh asehek jo, tasah aha ado hawek ndra bwena labai, eme asahan nane dah.
“Jo mene ndrasehek ndrawek taha, ta aha sataku ma aha samani iri budon taha udu tek.
Iri kameh tikahei aha au ala manan ta asiu ta atukum tiri Juwis. Ano ma len asahan ta are lau iy idi aha amak, abudon anya, iri amekes gok doh ta atudun nyara Kindrei.
Iri lau kameh amekes kandriyen i buku doh ewek taha, tasah iri bala tanan aru tama bwe.
Arile jo ndrasehek iri sahou dah ndrawek taha, i buku len asahan ta iri anya kamekes iri lakou nane doh, eme aha kameh abudon ja, ta sahou jo mene ndrasihidiy ndrawek taha. “Jo ma bwena mene udu hawe aha, arile jo basehek iri lakou marakon nane dah bawek taha bwe.
Arile na dah kameh jo ilih hawe tama, iy nane suni jo eme dah. Arile, ado ari bandremenya, ta jo ili heh bwe le.
Na dah jo ndrasehek taha, ma ndrine aha irek ta tikisiy.
Arile, jo asehek tado handru: Mwasin tado ja badeh, ta jo ki-iu. Tasah, i buku jo ba-au bwe, seben kameh winiyan bame tado bwe. Arile, buku jo iu, idah kameh jo suni iy eme hawe aha.
Len iy eme, iy kameh leheya ndra-in tiri lau badu kon munyak eme lewan, i buku iri ndrandra-i ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in, ma ta nyala lakou mwasin, ma nyala len ta sahou ta Kindrei.
Iri ndrandra-i labai ta kandriyen ndra-in, tasah iri batehei budon tiri mara-ei bame tek bwe.
Iri ndrandra-i ta lakou mwasin, tasah jo ilih hawe tama, ma aha winiyan batou badak ja bwe.
Iri ndrandra-i ta len ta sahou ta Kindrei, tasah Kindrei ndratehei maha-an ndrala bwele-e kabin badu kon munyak.
“Sahou tek solo-an labai ta asehek ewek taha, arile na dah kameh aha winiyan bakohok bolo iri sahou tek bala mwasin bwe.
Arile Malawin Mwasin ta sahou handru eme, iy asehek lakou handru ta nyala Kindrei. Iy kameh in bwena ta leheya aha ala bolo iri lakou handru. Iy winiyan badeu tanan tan amwenen bwe, iy kameh tiye taha ta lakou iy ndranuhun, ma asehek taha ta nyala lakou asahan hamon.
Iy kameh edeu lomadan eme tek, tasah iy kameh andrei lakou jo asehek ma tiye ndrawek taha.
Iri lakou ta tama marakon badeh, tek. Eme ma jo tiye ili ta Malawin Mwasin kameh kandrei lakou jo edeu i tan, ma iy kasihidiy kewek taha.
“Se luwen bwe, aha kameh banyolom jo ja bwe. Ano sese luwen bwe ja, aha kameh anyolom jo ja.”
Oro lau tan nunu-uh oro le, “Moso sahou tan iy asehek i buku sah handru, ‘Se luwen bwe, aha kameh banyolom jo ja bwe, ano sese luwen bwe ja, aha kameh anyolom jo ja’? Ya saba moson handru iy asehek, ma iy tiye ale, ‘Idoh, tasah jo iu ili hawe tama?’
Moso sahou iy asehek, ‘Se luluwen bwe,’ i buku sah handru? Ahi bandrei se bolo sahou tan bwe.”
Jises ndratanan, oro lau tan anya kandremenya iy, eme ma iy asehek ili toro, “Jo nane asehek, ‘Se luwen bwe, aha kameh banyolom jo ja bwe. Ano sese luwen bwe ja, aha kameh anyolom jo ja.’ Idoh, sahou nane ado anya kasehek ta aliy ai?
Jo asehek tado handru. Aha marakon kameh aden i tinan, ma aha kameh tikisiy tinan labai, arile iri lau badu kon munyak kameh sekesek; ado kameh tikisiy, arile tikisiy tado kameh asahan ili ta sekesek ja.
“Jo anya kasehek sahou sokek ari ki tado: Badih anya kedeu nadun, iy tikisiy labai, tasah len tan ta akohok sisi-in ndrasahan. Arile, iy ndratehei nadun ndrame len, ma iy ndramani iri sisi-in tan nane doh. Iy sekesek, tasah iy ndratehei nadun ndrame len bolo kon munyak.
Idoh i buku le ado are ta tikisiy na dah, arile jo kameh anyolom ado ja, ma ndrine ado kameh idih ta sekesek. Iri sekesek doh, ari ndramak winiyan bandrei udu ndrine ado ba-au bwe.
Buku len doh asahan, ado kameh bandremenya jo ta saba lakou ja bwai. Jo tiye tado handru. Tama kameh edeu tado iri saba lakou ado aso-ok, buku ado ndremenya iy in ta bwele-e nyarak.
Ndra bwena eme asahan nane dah, ado bandremenya tama ta saba lakou ado aso-ok in ta bwele-e nyarak bwe le. Ado kandremenya, idah kameh ado andrei, ma ndrine ado kameh idih labai ta kandriyen ta sekesek udu le buku doh.
“Jo badeh, amekes sahou sokek ewek tado. Arile, hamon kameh jo winiyan basehek sahou sokek bawek tado ja bwe, jo kameh asehek sahou amwenen ta tama ewek tado.
Buku len doh asahan, ado kameh winiya asolom amwenen i tan in ta bwele-e nyarak, ma jo kameh winiyan bala bwena ta ndremenya iy ja bwai.
Tama badeh, aso-ok ado labai. Iy aso-ok ado, tasah ado aso-ok jo labai, ma ado atehei budon tado handru ere tek, ta jo udu hawe Kindrei eme andri.
Jo udu hawe tama eme andri kon munyak, ano kameh jo ruwani kon munyak, ma jo iu ili hawe tama.”
Ano oro lau tan tiye i buku doh, “Na nane le dah ou barasehek baramwenen ai, ou basehek sahou sokek ja bwe.
Aso ndratanan ndramwenen ai, idah ou ndratanam lakou marakon. Iri lau winiya bandremenya ou ja bwe, tasah ou ndratanam budon tiri bwena. Idoh le, bwidi budon ma nyolom taso handru ihis tam, ta ou ado hawe Kindrei ame.”
Jises eme tiye ili toro ja, “Na dah budon tado barahis ai?
Len nane ndrasahan, ma eme udu kada-ah, buku ado marakon anya katalan, iy ari ari ili ndrahunen amwenen, ya jo le ari kameh erah. Arile jo le ari barah bwe, tasah tama udu hawek ale.
Jo mene ndrasehek tado ta mondrei kudu hawe ado. Kati mondrei doh ta ado kahis hawek. Lau badu kon munyak kameh amekes iri maha-an ma tikisiy ewek tado. Arile ado kabadok! Tasah jo ndratisi boto-on ta kon munyak ndra-au ndrala bahandra katik.”
Jises asehek sahou dah ano, iy eme anyolom ili loken ili kandrah, ma iy asolom i buku doh, “Tama, len ndrasahan ai. Ou atehei lomadam keme ta nadum, ma nadum ale kameh edeu lomadan ewek tam.
Tasah ou ndratehei boto-on tam ndrame tek ta atondrok iri lau marakon, ma jo kameh edeu kohak udu luluwen ili toro lau nane oro atehei budon toro in tek.
Kohan handru udu luluwen kameh udu le buku doh. Moson ta aliy i buku doh: Oro katanan ou, ou le ari Kindrei handru, ma oro katanan Jises Krais, iy nane, ou suni iy eme.
Jo ndraleheyani lomadam ndrala tiri lau badu kon munyak. Iri gok marakon nane ou tiye jo ta amekes badeh, jo ndrabwidi marakon ndrano.
Tama, kon munyak basahan bwe le, jo ndra bwena udu hawem, ma lomadam udu hawek. Na dah, jo aso-ok lomadam le mene keme tek ja.
“Jo ndrasehek ou ndrala toro lau tam. Oro lau tam bwena, arile ou andrei oro ado kon munyak ame len, ame are bahandrak. Ma oro a-en hamon tiri sahou tam marakon.
Ya na dah, oro ndratanan, iri lakou marakon ou adeu eme tek, badu minem eme.
Jo ndratiye toro ta sahou mene ou asehek tek, ma bwidi oro sekesek. Oro ndratanan jo udu hawem eme, ma oro atehei budon toro ewek tam ta ou le suni jo eme.
“Jo asolom oro, jo basolom ta iri lau marakon badu kon munyak bwe. Jo asolom toro le lau mene ou atehei oro ame are bahandra tondrok tek, tasah oro lau tam.
Oro lau tek, oro lau tam; oro tam, oro tek ale. Iri lau atou oro lau tek nane, ma iri anyolom lomadak handru udu toro.
Eme na len dah kameh jo anya kewek hawem ai. Jo winiyan bado kon munyak ja bwai, arile oro kameh are ndra kon munyak areu. Tama, ou ndrabun labai! Ou tondrokei oro kudu mwasin bahandra boto-on ta nyaram, nyaram mene ou tondrohon jo. Ma idah kameh oro asahan ari, i buku le talu.
Len jo udu ndra hawe oro, jo atondrok oro udu mwasin labai, are bahandra boto-on ta nyaram, ou mene tondrohon jo. Jo turuki oro na aliy, eme oro mari are mwasin. Iy ari le toro kameh amai iu mara-ei. Idah kameh iri sahou marakon udu bolo buk ndrabun asahan eme lewan handru.
Na len dah jo ewek hawem, arile jo udu ndra kon munyak kahis, jo asehek iri lakou dah ili toro, ta sekesek tek tinan kirek ndrine oro.
“Jo ndrasihidi iri sahou tam marakon ndrala toro, ano iri lau badu kon munyak baso-ok oro ja bwe. Tasah oro badu kon munyak bwe, i buku jo ale badu kon munyak dah bwe le.
Jo bandremenya ou ta andrei oro ado kon munyak au bwe, arile jo ndremenya ou ta tondrokei oro kare ndra len ta ndramak ndra-in balik.
I buku le jo badu kon munyak dah bwe, oro ale badu kon munyak dah bwe.
Sahou tam handru. Jo aso-ok ou atehei sahou tam handru kamekes gok kili bolo ndrine oro ma kabwidi oro kameh kasahan oro lau tam handru.
Jo suni oro ta ala bolo kon munyak, i buku le ou mene suni jo eme andri kon munyak.
Jo anya kaseben oro, eme ma jo atehei jo mara-ei ewek tam, ta oro katehei oro mara-ei kewek tam, ma ta oro kameh asahan oro lau tam handru.
“Tama, jo basolom toro le lau nane ado hawek kada-ah bwe, arile ta are lau kameh iy atehei budon tan ale in tek, tasah ta sahou tam oro kameh asehek.
Jo asolom ta oro kala le ari. Tama, oro kare hawe talu, i buku le ou ado hawek, ma jo udu hawem. Oro kasahan ari le, ta iri lau badu kon munyak kameh anyolom ma atehei budon tiri ewek tam, ta ou suni jo eme.
Jo ndratehei lomadam ndrala toro. Lomadam doh mene ou adeu eme tek, ta oro kameh kasahan ka le ari, buku talu ma la-uh badeh, ari le.
“Jo udu hawe oro, ya ou ado hawek. Jo aso-ok oro kasahan ari buruwen, ta iri lau badu kon munyak kanyolom ma iri katanan, ta ou suni jo eme. Ma iri ale katanan ta ou aso-ok oro, i buku le ou aso-ok jo tinan labai.
“Tama! Ou ndratehei oro ndrame tek, eme jo aso-ok oro kame kare hawek, kare kon kameh jo udu aliy. Ma jo aso-ok oro kanyolom lomadak mene ou adeu eme tek, tasah ou aso-ok jo bwena labai, ano kon munyak barasahan.
“Tama, ou mwasin labai! Lau badu kon munyak tana iri ou bwe, arile jo tanan ou mwasin labai. Oro lau tek badu hawek nane, oro tana oro ou le badeh, suni jo eme.
Jo ndrasehek iri kandriyen ma nyaram ndrala toro. Jo kameh asehek ili toro kahis le, winiya le oro andrei kandriyen ta aso-ok ndramak ari ari, i buku ou aso-ok jo tinan labai. Jo aso-ok kandriyen doh kihis kudu ndrine oro. Eme ma jo kameh in hawe oro.”
Jises asolom ano le badeh, iy hawe oro lau tan, oro adek ala bolo gwa Kindron ala asahan bilisiu. Udu loboho bilisiu nane doh, bilin ta Olip udu aliy, eme Jises ma hawe oro lau tan ala ado bolo bilin nane doh.
Judas, iy nane edeu sa-oh ta Jises, iy ndratanan kon nane doh, tasah len marakon ta ndrahune tutukum ta Jises hawe oro lau tan ala le bolo bilin nane doh.
Iri tinan tiri pris ma iri Parasi tiye i tiri lau ta bahun badu kon Rom, ma iri lau ta atondrok asiu tinan ta Kindrei ka-en hamon ta Judas. Judas tanan kon doh, eme ma iy in bwena tiri. Iri telemei sun hawe iri lakou ta bahun, iri ala asahan bolo bilin ta Olip nane doh.
Jises ndratanan ta iri lakou kameh asahan tan, ma iri lau asahan badan ale. Iy eme suri iy, iy edek ili bwena ma iy ndremenya iri i buku doh, “Aha asilah are lau handru?”
Iri anya, “Ahi asilah Jises badu Nasaret.” Jises anya, “Jo iy ndramak nane udu le buku doh, asah idah.” Judas, iy nane edeu sa-oh ta Jises, iy ales udu hawe iri ale.
Jises tiye i tiri i buku doh, “Jo iy ndramak nane ta udu le buku doh, asah idah,” eme iri marakon arou ala le kona iri ma iri taku ala andri.
Jises eme ndremenya iri ja, “Aha asilah are lau handru?” Iri marakon anya, “Ahi asilah Jises badu Nasaret.”
Jises anya, “Jo nane ndrasehek taha eh, jo iy ndramak nane ta udu le buku doh, asah idah. I buku aha asilah jo handru eh, ya oro lau nane ado hawek kada-ah ka-au o.”
Iy asehek iri sahou nane doh, eme ta iri lakou iy nane ndrasehek idah kameh marakon asahan handru: “Tama, oro lau marakon ou mene atehei oro ame bahandra tondrok tek, ari toro bamai bwe.”
Saimon Pita badeh, samen gwak tan ari udu aliy, iri aloh bainat. Eme iy aluwi samen tan eme len, ma iy sani ka-u ndranye bonyo-ou salin iu. Nyara bonyo-ou nane doh Malkus.
Jises anyolom ili ta Pita ma iy asehek sahou i tan anya, “Ou atehei samen tam ki hamon bolo awin ja! I buku sah handru? Bwesam ta sisi-in nane doh, tama atehei eme tek, jo sa-un sala aliy ai?”
Ano iri lau nane ta bahun badu kon Rom hawe tinan ta bwena ta bahun tiri, ma hawe iri lau ta atondrok asiu ta Kindrei ame tawi Jises, ma bawei iy.
Ano iri andrei iy ma bwena ili hawe Anas. Anas doh badeh, nyana Kayapas, iy badeh, tinan tiri pris ta bolo jaha nane doh.
Kayapas mene edeu budon ma iy tiye tiri Juwis i buku doh, “Mwasin, ta ndramak ari le, iy kimek ta saluwe lau marakon. Ndra-in ta lau marakon amak laleyah.”
Saimon Pita hawe lau ta Jises ari ja, uru adek an hamon ta Jises. Tinan tiri pris tanan iy lau ta Jises ari doh, eme ma iy lau doh in hamon ta Jises ili bolo kowah ta asiu, ta tinan tiri pris.
Arile Pita badeh, bala bolon bwe, iy ales udu ndra manan kona kou udu. Eme iy lau ta Jises ari nane tinan tiri pris tanan iy, eme iy ili ndremenya i badih ta atondrok madasan nane doh ta Pita keme bolon, eme ma iy andrei Pita eme bolon.
Iy badih ta atondrok madasan nane doh, anyolom Pita, eme ma iy ndremenya Pita, “Sebwe ou lau ta iy ndramak kodo-oh ale, neh?” Pita eme besebes le, “Bwe, jo lau tan bo-oh.”
Ben nane doh nyala-an labai, eme iri lohowan hawe iri lau tinan tabani jih, eme iri ales are aliy ta anyan. Pita anyala ale, iy eme edek ili ales udu hawe iri, ma anyan jih.
Uru lau tan ma la-uh nane are ndra manan. Tinan tiri pris eme ndremenya Jises ta oro lau tan ma ta sahou iy ndrasihidiy ndrala tiri lau.
Jises eme asehek i tan, “Len marakon jo badeh, asehek sahou ili tiri lau ba-en kabwak bwe, ma jo leheya iri lau marakon badeh, udu bolo asiu ta atukum tiri Juwis, ma udu bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, na len marakon iri ala aliy. Jo batone ari sahou bwe.
Ya, i buku sah handru ou ndremenya jo ta aliy? Ou ndremenya iri lau nane ndranuhun iri sahou tek. Iri tanan ta saba lakou jo ndrasehek.”
Jises asehek sahou doh kahis le badeh, ndramak tinan ari mudi minen i bolo kapan, ma iy asehek i buku doh, “I buku sah handru, ya ou asehek sahou boto-on labai i ta tinan tiri pris i buku doh?”
Jises eme asumon sahou tan ja, “Ya, i buku jo ndrasehek saba sahou bamwenen bwe, abo, jo aso-ok ou tiye tiri lau marakon nane ado kada-ah ta saba sahou handru jo asehek. Arile, i buku jo asehek sahou amwenen eh? Ya tasah handru ou a-um jo?”
Ano Anas tiye iri kasirini iy kili hawe Kayapas tinan tiri pris. Arile, iri batolowei malou nane iri bawei iy na aliy ba-au bwe le.
Pita ales udu hawe iri lau anyan jih kahis le. Eme oro lau rayah anyolom iy ma oro ndremenya iy ja, “Sebwe ou lau tan ari ale?” Arile Pita besebes le, iy anya, “Jo bwe.”
Arile ndramak ari, iy lohowan ta tinan tiri pris, iy badu hawe iy ndramak nane Pita sani ndranyen na samen, asehek ja, “Jo mene anyolom ou ado bolo bilin ta Olip hawen oh?”
Pita besebes ja, iy anya, “Bwe.” Eme ma nawin bwe kakaro eden.
Mandraben ma wahun, iri sirini Jises udu asiu ta Kayapas iu ili asiu ta kabin badu Rom. Iri tinan tiri Juwis bala bolo asiu nane doh bwe, tasah kora-on iri kandraka-an ta mada Kindrei, ma idah kameh iri winiyan baimon nyamon ta len ndrabun aloh Pasoba bwe. Eme iri are ndra manan areu.
Pailat eme manan hawe iri, ma iy ndremenya iri, “Aha anya kadeu iy ndramak dah kili ta mada sahou ta saba lakou handru?”
Eme iri marakon asumon sahou tan, “I buku iy ndramak ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in bwe, ahi winiyan bandrei iy bame hawem bwe.”
Pailat eme asehek i tiri ja, “Mwasin, aha kandrei iy kewek hawe aha, ma aha katehei iy ki ta mada sahou ki-in hamon ta iri kandriyen taha amwenen.” Iri ame asumon sahou ta Pailat ja, “Badeh, ndrabun tinan labai, ta ahi winiyan badai iri lau amekes kandriyen ndra-in amak bwe.”
Bwena mene Jises asehek ta iri kandriyen iy kameh imek ta aliy, eme ma iri lakou marakon doh asahan ta amekes sahou tan kasahan handru.
Pailat eme anuhun iri sahou i buku doh, eme iy edek iu ili hamon ili bolo asiu tan ja. Eme iy aloh iri lau katiyani Jises kili hawen. Iy eme ndremenya iy, “Ou kabin tiri Juwis, neh?”
Jises anuhun ano, eme iy asumon ndremenya tan, “Ou ndremenya jo nane dah, na le budon tam amwenen o rayah lau ja tanan jo, eme iri adeu budon ewek tam?”
Pailat eme tiye i ta Jises, “Ou kede-eh anya jo badu Juwis nadeh? Idah iri lau tam amwenen ma iri tinan tiri pris, iri le adeh tiyani ou ame hawek nane dah. Ya ou amekes saba lakou handru eme iri atehei ou a ta sahou?”
Jises anya, “Boto-on ta tondrok tek badeh, badu kon munyak dah bwe; i buku boto-on ta tondrok tek badu kon munyak, badeh kameh iri lau tek winiya amekes bahun hawe iri Juwis, ta iri sandrei jo same hawem. Arile boto-on ta tondrok tek badeh, badu kon rakon ja.”
Pailat eme ndremenya iy ja, “Ou kabin ari handru, neh?” Jises asehek i tan i buku doh, “Ou anya jo kabin ari, badeh handru. Arile sahou handru bala buku budon tam badeh bwe. Tine atehei jo eme kon munyak ta atiye iri sahou handru, kili tiri lau marakon. Are lau iri an hamon ta sahou handru, kameh anuhun jo.”
Pailat ndremenya Jises, “Ya ‘sahou handru,’ saba moson ta aliy?” Pailat asehek sahou ano, iy eme ili manan ja hawe iri Juwis. Iy eme tiye i tiri, “Jo badeh, basilahei ari ndra-in udu tan bwai.
Arile, idah in hamon ta kandriyen taha. Jo badeh, ruwani ndramak ari udu bolo asiu lulik eme len laleyah, udu bolo len tinan aloh Pasoba. Ya, aha aso-ok jo karuwani kabin tiri Juwis kewek mine aha?”
Iri arah ma aloh i tinan i buku doh, “Iy badeh, bwai. Ahi aso-ok ou ruwani Barabas keme len laleyah.” Barabas badeh, iy ndramak ta bahun ta adai lau amak ma iy ale ta bahana.
Ano Pailat atehei Jises ili mine iri lau ta bahun, ta iri ka-um iy na malou iri sakabuk ihis i bek.
Iri lau ta bahun tabuwi bada malou bobodon i se buku none barak ma atehei ili batun. Ano iri atehei kolau ra-ei saraman lawe-en ili la-un.
Ano iri marakon adek ame hawen ma iri bobose iy i buku doh, “Ou kabin tiri Juwis ou areu le buku doh len mari!” Ano iri a-um iy na bolo mine iri i bolo kapan.
Pailat edek eme manan ja, iy asehek sahou ili tiri san rasan ja, “Aha kanuhun, jo kameh andrei iy eme manan hawe aha ta aha kanyolom, ma aha katanan, jo badeh, basilahei ari ndra-in udu tan bwe-en.”
Udu, Jises eme manan. Bada malou bobodon nane iri tabuwiy i buku barak udu batun ma awin saraman udu bwele-en ale. Pailat eme tiye ili tiri, “Aha kanyolom iy ndramak nane asah idah!”
Iri tinan tiri pris hawe iri lau ta atondrok asiu tinan ta Kindrei anyolom iy le badeh, iri arah, ma iri asehek sahou boto-on i buku doh, “Katatahi iy ki bada kei tondreh! Katatahi iy ki bada kei tondreh!” Pailat eme asehek sahou ili tiri ja, “Aha kandrei iy kewek hawe aha, ano aha baratatahi iy barala ta kei tondreh. Jo winiyan basilahei ari ndra-in tan bwai.”
Iri Juwis somolei sahou ta Pailat ja anya, “Ahi badeh, kandriyen tahi malen udu aliy, asehek ta adi ndramak imek, tasah iy le anya, iy Nadu Kindrei.”
Pailat anuhun iri asehek i buku doh, eme ma bwidi iy inoh tinan labai.
Iy eme iu ili bolo asiu tiri kabin ja, ma iy ndremenya Jises ja, “Ou badu heh handru?” Arile, Jises basumon bohon bwe.
Pailat asehek sahou i tan ja, “Tasah handru ou winiya basumon bohok bwe? Ou tanam jo bwe? Jo le ari atondrok, ta jo winiya tiye ou au laleyah, ma jo winiya tatahi ou ala ta kei tondreh ale.”
Jises eme tiye i tan ja, “Ou winiya batondrok jo bwe, i buku Kindrei batehei boto-on ta atondrok jo bawek tam bwe. Ta idoh le kameh, are lau iy atehei jo eme minem dah, iri kandriyen tan marakon kameh udu bwele-en labai ja ta iri kandriyen ndra-in tam.”
Pailat anuhun iri sahou doh, eme iy asilah san ta Jises ki-iu laleyah. Arile iri Juwis arah i tan ja, “Buku ou ruwani iy ndramak badeh, iu laleyah eh, badeh, kameh ou kawas ta Sisa bwai. Are lau asehek, anya iy kabin, badeh, iy bobose Sisa.”
Pailat anuhun iri sahou nane doh, eme iy sirini Jises eme manan ja. Ano Pailat manyah udu andri bada koyeu tiri kabin, udu loboho bolo asiu doh iri aloh “Bek Malahan.” (Iri Hiburu aloh Gabata.)
Mada an eme ndrado le alih, mirihik ta len ndrabun iri aloh Pasoba anya kasahan. Pailat eme tiye i tiri Juwis, “Ya, aha kanyolom, idah kabin taha.”
Iri lau ame arah ili bwele-e Pailat, “Kadi iy kimek! Kadi iy kimek! Katatahi iy ki bada kei tondreh!” Pailat eme ndremenya iri, “Aha aso-ok jo katatahi kabin taha kede-eh kili ta kei tondreh?” Arile, iri tinan tiri pris anya, “Ahi ari kabin ja bwe. Sisa le ari, kabin tahi.”
Eme bwidi Pailat inoh, ma iy atehei Jises ili mine iri, ta iri katatahi iy kili ta kei tondreh. Iri lau ta bahun ame andrei Jises iu ili hawe iri.
Iri tiye iy ta bwese kei tondreh tan. Iy bwese-ei ili isos kon ari iri aloh “Kon ta bwisi bar ta ndramak,” ili boho kon tiri Hiburu iri aloh Golgata.
Udu loboho doh, iri lau ta bahun tatahi Jises ili ta kei tondreh. Iri tatahi uru lau la-uh ala ta kei tondreh ale. Iy ari udu loboho minen salin, iy ari udu loboho minen kamweu, Jises udu alih turu ma la-uh.
Pailat eme torowenei sahou rayah, ano iy tiye oro lau ta bahun tatahiy udu bwisi no-o kei tondreh ta Jises. Tarou nane tiye i buku doh, “Jises Badu Nasaret, Kabin tiri Juwis.”
Sahou nane doh iri torowenei ili boho kon tiri Hiburu, boho kon tiri Latin (Rom), ma boho kon tiri Grik. Iri Juwis badeh, solo-an ame anyolom sahou nane iri torowenei udu ta kei tondreh ta Jises. Tasah kon nane iri tatahi Jises udu aliy bado len ta kon tinan nane doh bwe.
Eme iri tinan tiri pris anyolom ma iri abolosen. Iri ame asehek ili ta Pailat i buku doh, “Ou satorou sala buku kodo-oh: ‘Kabin tiri Juwis.’ Ndri-iy labai. Ou atorou kili buku doh: ‘Iy ndramak le kede-eh asehek i buku doh: “Jo Kabin tiri Juwis”’”
Pailat eme asehek sahou boto-on i tiri, “Ndri-iy ai, saba sahou jo ndratorowenei badeh, kudu gwek ai.”
Na len iri lau ta bahun tatahi Jises ili ta kei tondreh, iri andrei awin tan ta bwele-en, iri tarani ili ma ha-ei, ano iri ondrek tiri. Awin tan ra-ei ja ma buruwen ta badan badeh, iri andrei ale.
Iri asehek ili tiri ari, ari, “To satarani awin tan mwasin dah, to kamekes laki ta aliy. To kanyolom are handru kameh andrei.” Lakou nane dah bwidiy amwenen ta sahou udu bolo buk ndrabun asahan handru, “Iri andromwei iri awin tek ili le winiya iri. Iri amekes nyorei laki ta awin tek.” Iri kandriyen marakon nane doh, iri lau ta bahun amekes.
Ales are mirihik ta kei tondreh ta Jises badeh, tinen, nadu tine tinen, Mariya udu Klopas, ma hawe Mariya badu Makdala.
Jises anyolom tinen ma hawe lau tan ari iy aso-ok iy tinan labai ales are hawe tinen. Iy eme asehek sahou ili ta tinen, “Tine, iy ndramak kede-eh nadum handru.”
Ano iy asehek ili ta lau tan nane, “Iy badih kede-eh tinem.” Eme udu ndra bada len doh badeh, iy lau ta Jises nane andrei tine Jises ili asiu hawen ma tondrokei iy.
Jises tanan ta iri gok tan mara-ei ndrano ai. Iy eme aloh, “Balek ndramar ta gwa.” Iy asehek doh ta amekes sahou udu bolo buk ndrabun eme asahan handru.
Kun ari, waen titi-in udu bolon udu mirihik ta kei tondreh tan. Iri lau ta bahun andrei konyei, oro tolomwani i bolo waen titi-in nane doh, ano oro atehei ili no-o kei ari, iri aloh hisop. Ma oro adeu ili bohon.
Jises anyuwi waen nane dah ano, ma iy anya, “Kabwai, lahou mara-ei ndrano.” Iy eme atehei batun i andri ma iy ruwani kohan ma iy imek.
Len doh badeh, ta alokou len ndrabun ta amunyau tiri Juwis. Len tiri nane doh kameh ndrabun labai. Eme ma iri Juwis bwale iri ta ndramak sukik udu bada kei tondreh na bolo len doh.
