Eme iri ndremenya Pailat ta atubwa kati oro lau nane are bada kei tondreh, ta oro kamak suwi, ma iri lau ta bahun kandrei oro are bada kei tondreh kame andri.
Iri lau ta bahun ala tubwani kati uru lau ma la-uh nane sukik are hawe Jises ado bada kei tondreh.
Arile iri ame ta Jises, iri anyolom iy ndramak ndra nane, ma iri batubwani katin bwai.
Arile ndramak tiri ari ta bahun eme aso-ei kabede Jises na nyah. Eme ma ndra hawe gwa amou eme len.
Jo ndramak nane jo anyolom iri saba lakou nane asahan doh, eme jo asehek, “Lakou marakon doh handru. Jo tanan, lakou marakon jo ndratorowenei ndrano, iri ndra handru le ai. Aha katehei budon taha kili aliy.”
Iri lakou marakon nane doh, bwidiy amwenen ta sahou udu bolo buk ndrabun eme asahan handru, “Ari ndruwin winiyan babok bwe.”
Sahou randra ja bolo udu buk ndrabun asehek i buku doh, “Iri kameh anyolom i ta ndramak nane iri orowei kabeden na nyah.”
Ano, ndramak ari nyaran Josep iy badu kon tinan Arimateya, iy ili ndremenya Pailat ta akohok Jises udu ta kei tondreh keme andri, ta adeu iy kili lek. Josep doh, lau ta Jises ari ale. (Arile iy inoh iri tinan tiri Juwis, iy eme basehek nyaran bame len bwe.) Pailat eme aso-ok, eme Josep ili andrei bada kei udu ta kei tondreh eme andri.
Nikodemus, iy le mene ili atou Jises na ben rasan. Iy ili hawe Josep ale. Iy bwese-ei kohei rahak irek tiri suluw ma iri nyasou manahu buburen. Maha-an tiri suluw doh i buku kilo tonoh hahuw (34).
Uru lau ma la-uh nane dah andrei bada kei eme andri, uru su-iy na iri kari kolau ma hawe adeu iri suluw i badan. Uru asu iy i buku kandriyen le tiri Juwis ta asu lau amak.
Mirihik ta kon tinan nane iri adi Jises, bilin ari udu mirihik ta aliy. Ya udu bolo bilin doh, munu bek ari ma ha-un le, iri badeu ari ndramak imek bala aliy bwe le.
Len doh ta alokou len ta amunyau tiri Juwis. Munu bek nane doh udu le mirihik turu, eme uru anyuhi Jises ili bolon.
Ma ndra wahun ta len ma bwena ta wik ari ja, Mariya badu Makdala edek ili mada lek anya kanyolom Jises. Iy ili mirihik, iy anyolom bek bado mada lek bwe, iri ndratundruwiy ndra-au ndrala len.
Iy sakaliye eme hamon tiye jo hawe Saimon Pita. Jo badeh, lau ta Jises iy aso-ok labai. Mariya tiye taru i buku doh, “Iri ndrabwese-ei Laban udu bolo lek tan ndra-au. Iri ndrabwese-ei iy ndrala heh handru, to bala tanan bwe.”
Eme aru Pita adek ala mada lek anya kanyolom.
Aru ma la-uh sakaliye taseh ala, arile jo sakalawi Pita eme hamon, jo ili isos mada lek bwena.
Jo aluh, ma anyolom ili munu bek. Eme jo anyolom iri kari kolau nane iri asu iy na aliy, arile jo bala munu bek bwe.
Saimon Pita in hamon tek eme ja, edek ales amwenen ili munu bek. Iy anyolom iri kari kolau marakon nane iri asu iy na aliy udu api.
Ma iy anyolom kolau nane asu batu Jises na aliy. Arile kolau nane doh, bare hawe iri kari kolau rayah nane bwe. Nyolom ta aliy i buku kolau le nane alokom iy.
Pita ndra-au ndrala bolon, jo eme edek in hamon tan ili munu bek ale. Eme jo anyolom iri lakou marakon nane doh, ma jo atehei budon tek ili tan i buku Jises badeh, ndramak ndrame awas ja.
(Na len doh badeh, aso bala tanan ta buk ndrabun asehek ta Jises kameh amak ja bwe.)
Aru anyolom iri lakou marakon udu lek nane ano, aru ame adek au ala hamon ala kon ja.
Mariya badu Makdala eden udu mirihik ta mada lek. Iy eden kahis, iy aluh ma anyolom amwenen ili bolo lek.
Iy anyolom angelo ma la-uh ado bolo lek, asini awin belen. Uru manyah are loboho bada kei mene udu aliy. Iy ari udu loboho batun, iy ari ja udu loboho kiwin.
Uru ndremenya Mariya i buku doh, “Badih den, ou aden ndranye sah?” Iy asumon, “Iri ndrandrei Laban tek ndra-au, jo bala tanan bwe, iri ndratehei iy ndrado heh handru.”
Iy asehek sahou ano, iy tubuni madan ili amwenen ta Jises ales udu konan, arile iy baseleyani Jises bwe.
Jises eme ndremenya iy, “Badih den, ou aden ndranye sah handru? Ya ou asilah are lau handru?” Iy anya, kede-eh iy ndramak ta bilin doh le ai. Iy anya, “Ndramak den, i buku ou ndrandrei iy ndra-au, ou tiye tek, ou atehei iy udu heh handru, jo kameh kili kandrei iy.”
Jises anya, “Mariya.” Mariya tubuni iy amwenen tan, ma iy aloh i boho iri Hiburu anya, “Raboni!” (Moso sahou Raboni badeh, “Ndramak ta leheya.”)
Jises anya, “Minem same badak o! Tasah, jo bala loken hawe tama bwe le. Arile ou ala tiye oro lau tek, ou tiye toro, ‘Jo kameh ilih loken hawe tama, iy tama ado. Jo ili hawe Kindrei tek ma Kindrei tado ale.’”
Eme Mariya badu Makdala sakaliye eme tiye taso lau tan, “Jo ndratou Laban!” Ma iy asehek taso mari ta iri sahou nane Jises asehek i tan.
Na len ma bwena ta wik doh, an i andri badeh, oro lau tan atukum oro a le se ado bolo asiu ari. Oro sulu-i kou toro marakon ihis, tasah oro anoh iri lau tinan badu Juwis. Oro ado le badeh, Jises eme ales udu alih toro, ma iy anya, “Mondrei kudu hawe ado.”
Iy asehek sahou ili toro ano, iy eme leheya minen ma kabeden. Oro lau tan badeh, sekesek tinan labai ta anyolom Laban ja.
Jises tiye toro ja, “Mondrei kudu hawe ado. Buku le tama suni jo eme, ma jo suni ado ta ala bolo kon munyak.”
Ano iy aluhi kohan ili bwele-e oro, ma iy anya, “Malawin Ndrabun ndrawek bolo ndrine ado.
I buku ado mani kandriyen ndra-in tiri lau, idah kameh kandriyen ndra-in tiri amai iu. I buku aha bamani kandriyen ndra-in tiri bwe, idah kameh kandriyen tiri udu bwele-e iri udu le buku doh.”
Na ben nane doh Jises asahan hawe oro lau tan rayah, arile iy lau tan ari nyaran Tomas, nyaran ari ja Didimus, bado hawe oro bwe.
Oro ame asehek ili tan, “Aso ndranyolom Laban!” Arile iy anya, “Jo winiyan batehei budon tek bala tan bwe, jo anya kanyolom mweleke minen ma jo anya kanyokar na minek amwenen. Jo anya katehei kandro minek kili mweleke nyah udu kabeden. Jo kanyolom na madak ma la-uh amwenen, ano jo baratehei budon tek barala tan.”
Udu hamon ta len ma ndro taloh ano, oro lau tan atukum ala le asiu nane ja. Na len doh Tomas udu hawe oro ai. Oro sulu-i kou marakon ihis, arile i buku le bwena mene, Jises ili ales udu le alih toro, ma iy anya, “Mondrei kudu hawe ado.”
Ano iy tiye ta Tomas, “Ya, ou ame atehei minem keme dah, ma madam kanyolom bolo minek ma la-uh, ou suri ou ame atehei minem keme kabedek. Budon tam sala la-uh. Budon tam keme le tek.”
Tomas eme asumon bohon i buku doh, “Ou Laban tek, ma ou Kindrei tek!”
Ano Jises tiye ta Tomas, “Ou ndratehei budon tam ndrame tek, tasah ou ndranyolom jo amwenen. Iri lau banyolom jo bwe, arile iri atehei budon tiri eme tek, eme ma sekesek tiri kameh udu bwele-en labai.”
Jises amekes iri kalem ma iri gok tinan solo-an labai udu mada oro lau tan. Eme jo batorou iri sahou marakon bala bolo buk dah bwe.
Arile katin ta jo atorou iri sahou dah, ta aha katehei budon taha kili le ta Jises. Iy Mesaya, ndramak nane Kindrei suni iy eme kon munyak, ta akohok lau tan marakon badu kon munyak ame hamon. Iy nadu Kindrei. Buku aha atehei budon taha marakon in tan, aha kameh akohok koha aha in le ta nyaran.
Udu len sabe ja, Jises asahan hawe oro lau tan ado mirihik ta kapa gwa Galili, iri aloh Li Taiberiyas. Iy asahan hawe oro lau tan i buku doh:
Saimon Pita, Tomas (nyaran ari ja Didimus), Nataniyel iy badu Kana udu loboho Galili, ma nadu Sebedi uru ma la-uh, hawe uru lau tan la-uh ja, are hawe oro ale.
Saimon Pita asehek toro anya, “Jo kameh ili asilah nato ni!” Oro asehek i tan anya, “Aso anya kawek hawem ale.” Eme oro ala a ndron hawen, oro asowe au ala len. Arile na ben ari ma buruwen oro bakohok ari ni bwe.
Kon ndraleu ai, an edek eme loken, eme oro anyolom Jises ales udu bada babi, arile oro lau tan baseleyani iy bwe.
Jises eme aloh ili toro, “Ado kawas tek, ari ni keme!” Oro anya, “Ni bwe!”
Iy eme aloh i toro ja, “Ado kakahei kubwin tado kili bilisiu loboho lim salin ja, idah kameh ado akohok.” Oro ame akahei kubwin toro ili gwa ja, eme ni solo-an labai ihis udu bolo kubwin toro, ma oro winiyan baruwi kubwin hawe ni udu bolon bame loken bwe.
Jo, iy lau nane Jises aso-ok labai, asehek i ta Pita, “Laban asah kodo-oh!” Saimon Pita anuhun le badeh, iy eme asini awin tan ili la-un suwi suwi, tasah awin tan nane iy ibo gok, eme iy asiniy iu. Iy eme sandrakon i gwa ma iy eya iu ili amik.
Oro lau tan rayah ado ndra ndron ado gwek ariu kubwin hawe ni, ma oro asowe ame amik ale. Ndron toro badeh, bado len ta babi bwe, i buku mita rinek le.
Oro asos bada babi le badeh, oro anyolom jabi ramen ma ni udu bolo mitihi jih.
Ano Jises tiye toro, “Ado kakohok rayah ni nane ado akohok badeh, keme loken.”
Saimon Pita eme ili ndron ja, aseben oro ta ariu kubwin irek ta ni eme amik. Udu bolo kubwin badeh, ni ma rinek lomonoh taloh (153), iri ni ndra badan le, arile kubwin batarah bwe.
Jises aloh ili toro, “Kame kaimon nyamon!” Ade oro lau tan a len sese ta ndremenya iy buku, “Ou are lau?” Tasah oro tanan, idoh Laban le ai.
Jises eme ili kapa jih iy andrei jabi ramen, iy eme edeu ili noro lau tan. Ano, iy edeu ni ili noro i buku le aliy.
Idoh badeh, i san tulusin ai, ta Jises ili asahan eme awas hawe oro lau tan amwenen, udu hamon ta iy ndramak ndrame awas ja.
Udu hamon ta nyamon toro ano, Jises eme ndremenya Saimon Pita, “Saimon, nadu Jon, ou kede-eh aso-ok jo tinan labai ja, toro rayah kede-eh ja nadeh?” Pita anya, “Ehe Laban, ou ndratanam jo, jo badeh, aso-ok ou tinan labai i buku ari kawas.” Jises eme tiye i tan ja, “Ou atondrok iri nadu sipsip tek.”
Jises asehek sahou le nane san rasan ja ili tan, “Saimon, nadu Jon, ou kede-eh aso-ok jo handru?” Iy anya, “Ehe Laban, ou ndratanam jo, jo badeh, aso-ok ou labai i buku ari kawas.” Jises eme tiye i tan ja, “Mwasin, ou atondrok iri sipsip tek.”
Ili san tulusin ai, Jises asehek sahou le nane ili tan ja, “Saimon, nadu Jon, ou kede-eh aso-ok jo handru?” Eme bwidi Pita tikisiy, tasah Jises badeh, ndremenya iy san tulusin ai, ta sahou randra le doh, “Ou kede-eh aso-ok jo handru deh?” Eme iy asehek i tan, “Laban, ou tanam lakou marakon; ou ale ndratanam jo, jo badeh, aso-ok ou labai!” Jises eme asehek sahou ili tan ja, “Mwasin, ou atondrok iri sipsip tek.
“Jo asehek tam handru: Mwena mene ou ma loweu, ou amwenen apeu balaban tam, ma ou adek ala kon solo-an ou aso-ok ta ala aliy. Arile ou ado, ou ala asahan alon, badeh kameh ou suri minem ili loken, ya ndramak ari ja kameh apeu balaban tam, ano iy sirini ou ala kon nane ou bwalem ta ala aliy.”
Jises asehek iri sahou marakon nane doh ta leheya kandriyen ta Pita kameh iy imek i buku sah, eme iy atudun nyara Kindrei. Ano iy tiye Pita, “Ou ame an hamon tek.”
Pita tubuni madan, eme iy anyolom lau ta Jises ari nane nyaran Jon, Jises ale aso-ok iy tinan labai. Iy in hamon turu eme. Iy doh mene manyah udu mirihik hawe Jises aimon nyamon ado se. Iy ale mene atehei batun ili batala Jises ta ndremenya iy, “Laban, are lau handru kameh edeu sa-oh tam ili mine iri lau ta bahun?”
Pita anyolom iy, eme iy ndremenya Jises, “Laban, iy i buku sah handru?”
Jises eme asumon iy, “Buku jo aso-ok iy kudu katondrok jo keme hamon, ya saba budon tam? Ou ame a-en hamon tek.”
Eme sahou ndraseker ndrala toro lau tan anya, “Iy lau nane doh, winiyan bamak bwai.” Arile Jises basehek ta iy winiyan bamak bwe. Iy anya, “Buku jo aso-ok iy kudu le, winiya le jo eme hamon ja, idoh ari lakou tam bwe.”
Jo iy lau nane, jo ndranyolom iri lakou nane doh, ma jo ndratorowenei iri ndrala andri. Ma taha ndratanan, saba lakou jo ndratorowenei, iri ndra handru le ai.
Jises amekes iri lakou rayah solo-an, arile jo batorowenei iri bala andri bwe. Buku katorowenei iri marakon ari, ari kili andri, jo anya kon munyak kameh winiya bala winiyan bwe, buku katorowenei marakon.
Tiyopilus ei, udu bolo tarou tek mwena mene badeh, jo atorou ta nyala lahou mari Jises amekes ma leheya iri mwan ma badih ma mwena handru,
eme, eme taku na len andrei Jises iu i kandrah. Idoh, udu hamon ta iy edeu batanau na boto-on ta Malawin Ndrabun i toro aposel tan, iy mene ndralebelei.
Udu hamon ta imek tan ja badeh, iy leheya iy amwenen i toro lau doh, ma leheya lahou solo-an i mada oro ta iy badeh, ndramak ndrame awas ja. Iy badeh, asahan hawe oro udu bolo len ma hanoh (40). Iy asehek sahou i toro ta nyala tondrok ta Kindrei.
Ya udu bolo tukum toro ari ja, iy udu hawe oro aimon nyamon, ma iy batanau oro i buku doh: “Ado badeh, sa-au op, ado kado Jerusalem kado kabe-en ndramas tado Malawin Ndrabun. Tama mene tandrakan i tado mene, ado anuhun jo asehek nyala aliy.
Tasah, Jon mene inyu ado na gwa, arile len rayah iu, ano kameh, ado anyu na Malawin Ndrabun.”
Eme na len oro atukum badeh, oro ndremenya iy anya, “Laban ei, na len dah kameh, ou atudun tondrok ta Isra-el ja ai?”
Eme iy tiye i toro i buku doh, “Len ma sasah asahan kameh, udu mine tama le ari. Idoh badeh, ta ado katanan ta aliy bwe.
Arile, ado kameh akohok boto-on na len Malawin Ndrabun kameh ewek la-u ado; ma ado kameh atiye sahou tek ili Jerusalem, ili Judiya, ili Samariya, ano kili kon munyak mari.”
Eme iy asehek sahou doh i toro ano le badeh, Kindrei kuhi iy udu mada oro iu i loken, ma asi jor turuki iy amai ta mada oro.
Eme mada oro badeh, udu le tan, ma iy iu i kandrah. Ya eme suwi suwi badeh, uru lau la-uh asini awin belen mara-ei ales udu ka-u oro.
Eme uru anya, “Ado lau badu Galili. Ado ales ado kede-eh, anyolom i kandrah, ta sasah handru? Iy ndramak Jises le doh, kameh, ado anyolom, andrei iy ndra-au ndra kandrah; idah kameh, ado anyolom iy eme andri ja kameh i le buku none ado anyolom iy i loken doh.”
Ano oro adek ado bwili ndrondro-ou Olip ala hamon ala Jerusalem. Ya ndrokowa bwili ndrondro-ou doh kilomita ari udu len ta kon tinan Jerusalem.
Eme oro asos badeh, oro ala loken a bolo asiu mene oro areu aliy. Oro lau areu aliy badeh, Pita, Jon, Jemis hawe Enduru, Pilip, Tomas, Batolomiu, Metiu, Jemis nadu Alpeyus, Saimon Selot ma hawe Judas nadu Jemis.
Oro mari atukum ame se ya oro atehei budon toro i randra le i ta salom. Ma hawe oro badih rayah hawe Mariya tine Jises hawe nadu tine Jises ale udu hawe oro.
Eme na len doh badeh, Pita ales ere loken bolo iri lau ta Kindrei, kane iri ma rinek lunoh (120),
ma iy tiye anya, “Ado nadu tine mwan ma badih, sahou ta Kindrei mwena mene Malawin Ndrabun mene ndratiye udu boho Debit tiye nyala Judas mene udu bwena tiri eme ateu Jises badeh, ndrasahan handru.
Judas badeh, mene badu hawe to ta amekes lahou dah.
Eme Judas badeh, sihinei munyak na luk, tasah ta kandriyen ndra-in tan; eme iy taku i andri ma imek ya ndrinen asikak ma ndrinen talou eme len.
Eme iri lau badu Jerusalem anuhun badeh, ma tondrohani kon iy imek udu aliy doh i boho kon tiri aloh Akeldama, moson ‘munyak ta ndrahu ndra.’
“Tasah, ndratorowenei udu bolo buk Wari badeh, tiye i buku doh: ‘Asiu tan badeh, kudu laleyah, ya ari ndramak sado aliy.’ Ma torowenei ale i buku doh: ‘Ya ndramak ari ki saluwen ta in bwena.’
“Ya eme, are lau mene udu hawe to na len mari to adek hawe Laban Jises badeh, ki saluwen?
Udu ndra kabatana Jon ta alomwa eme, eme taku kabatana andrei Jises udu hawe to iu i loken. Iy doh badeh, keme hawe to ta asehek nyala Jises mene amak eme awas ja.”
Eme oro badeh, aseken lau la-uh: Iy ari badeh, Matiyas. Iy ari ja nyaran taloh: Josep, Barsabas,
Ano oro amekes salom anya, “Laban, ou badeh anyolom ndrine lau mari. Ou leheyani keme lewan keme taso ta are turu kasahan aposel ta amekes lahou tam ki saluwe Judas mene iy ndramak ndra-au.”
<range>
Ano oro asoh nyek. Eme nyek ihis ta Matiyas. Ya eme iy ili hawe oro aposel ma ronoh ari nane dah.
Eme len ta Pentikos asahan badeh, oro mari atukum ame kon rasi le.
Eme nawin bwe badeh, nyaro lakou asahan i buku none nyaro siyer tinan atohou udu kandrah eme andri idih bolo asiu nane oro areu aliy dah.
Eme oro anyolom jih anya eme andri, ma weleyaniy i la-u oro ari ari.
Eme Malawin Ndrabun anyuhi ndrine oro, ma mesekei oro badeh, asehek boho kon randra doh, randra doh.
Ya udu Jerusalem badeh, iri Juwis ta atudun Kindrei badu kon mari manyah ado aliy.
Eme iri anuhun kurutuwe lakou doh badeh, iri arou ame. Tasah, iri ari ari badeh, boho iri asak ta anuhun oro badeh, asehek sahou na boho kon tiri mari.
Eme mani iri atur labai, ya iri lomondra ma anya, “Oro lau asehek sahou kede-eh badu Galili o?
Arile, i buku sah ja to anuhun oro asehek sahou na boho kon ta to mari?
To badeh, badu kon munyak tinan Partiya, Midiya, ma Elam. To ale badu kon munyak tinan Mesopotemiya, Judiya, Kapadosiya, Pontus hawe Esiya.
Ma to badeh, badu kon munyak tinan Prijiya, Pampiliya, Ijip, hawe kon rayah badu Libiya udu mirihik ta kon Sairini. Ma udu ndrokowa to badeh, iri lau badu Rom adek ame dah ale.
Ma to badeh, Juwis hawe oro lau badu leheleh ala a-en hamon ta leheya tiri Juwis; ma hawe to lau rayah badu busu Krit hawe badu kon munyak tinan Arabiya; badeh, to mari anuhun sahou nyarahan ta lahou tinan ta Kindrei oro asehek i boho kon ta to amwenen.”
Eme ya mani iri atur ma budon tiri bameles bwe, ma eme iri ndremenya anya, “Lakou dah, asahan i buku sah handru?”
Arile iri rayah badeh, bobose oro anya, “Oro kede-eh, a-un waen solo-an labai.”
Ano Pita suri iy ere loken hawe oro ma ronoh ari dah, aloh i tinan ma asehek sahou i tiri anya: “Ado nadu tine badu Juwis ma hawe ado lau mari areu Jerusalem dah, ndranye ado kasak, ya jo kasehek kaleu kewek tado.
Oro lau dah badeh, ba-un gwa boto-on bwe. I buku bale ado badeh, bwe. Kon mandraben kahis le oh, mada an barala ndro ari adeh!
Arile, idoh lakou mene propet Jowel asehek nyala aliy:
“Kindrei anya, ‘Suniya len anya kano kameh, jo kameh solowei Malawik i la-u lau mari badu kon munyak. Ya iri nadu ado mwan ma badih kameh asehek sahou i buku iri propet, ma iri lau loweu tado kameh amekes lele, ma hawe oro lau tado ndrala bada ndramak kameh ameh solo-an.
Ma hawe oro lohowan tek mwan ma badih na len eme kameh, jo kameh solowei Malawik i la-u oro, ya oro kameh winiyan asehek sahou i buku iri propet.
Jo kameh leheya kalem udu bada kandrah loken, ma udu bada munyak andri ale. Idah kameh, ndra ma hawe jih ma hawe kasu-er hutuwen kameh asahan.
Ya an kameh amak ma kon ilik, ma bun kameh asaram i buku ndra. Ya lakou doh kameh asahan bwena op. Ano len tinan ta lomadan ta Laban asahan.
Ya lau amekes salom na nyara Laban ma ndremenya iy ta seben kameh, iy winiyan sebenei iri.’
“Ado lau badu Isra-el kanuhun sahou doh. Jises Krais badu Nasaret mene, Kindrei suni iy ewek hawe ado. Ya iy mene amekes lahou tinan ma amekes kalem tinan na boto-on ta Kindrei edeu i tan udu ndrokowa ado. Ya ado tanan iy.
Bwena mene Kindrei ndratanan iri lakou kameh asahan hamon, ma iy bwidi iri lakou asahan na le tanan ma seken tan. Eme ma, ado badeh, atehei iy i mine iri lau ndra-in, ma iri atahi iy imek i bada kei tondreh.
Arile, Kindrei mete-ei iy amak eme awas ja ta imek; ma sebenei iy ta sisi-in ta imek. Tasah, imek badeh, winiyan batawi iy bwe.
Tasah, Debit mene asehek nyalan i buku doh: ‘Jo badeh, anyolom Kindrei udu madak na len mari. Tasah, iy badeh, udu loboho lim salin hawek ya jo winiyan banoh bwe.
Eme bwidi ndrinek sekesek ma jo asehek ta aliy, Ma jo ale atondrok ta lakou mwasin handru kameh asahan hamon.
Tasah, ou winiyan baruwani jo bamak bado bolo munyak dah bwe. Ma ou winiyan baruwani bada lau tam mwasin labai sabola sado bolo lek.
Ou badeh, ndraleheyani jo ta san mwasin ta akohok kohak handru ta udu le buku doh. Ou kameh ado hawek ma atehei sekesek tinan labai eme tek.’
“Ado nadu tine, jo katiye tado kamwenen. Tubu taha Debit mene imek ma ahi iy. Ya lek tan asah udu hawe to kahis le eme taku dah.
Iy badeh, propet ya iy tanan tandrakan ta Kindrei mene tandrakan iy. Kindrei badeh, tandrakan ta lundriyen oro ari kameh asahan kabin, i buku le iy amwenen.
Debit ndratanan ta lakou doh, Kindrei anya kamekes hamon, ma iy ndratanan Krais nane, iy kamak udu bolo lek tan keme awas ja. Eme ma iy tiye i buku doh, Kindrei kameh winiyan baruwani iy bado ndrahune iri lau amak ado aliy bwe, ma badan kameh winiyan babola bwe.
Kindrei badeh, mete-ei Jises amak eme awas ta imek. Eme ya aso dah badeh, asehek nyala lakou handru mene asahan.
Iy ales ili udu loboho lim salin ta Kindrei ma akohok Malawin Ndrabun udu mine taman mene tandrakan. Ma iy solowei Malawin Ndrabun eme, i buku none ado atou hawe anuhun dah. Lakou doh badeh, Jises edeu eme taso.
Ya Debit badeh, bala kandrah buku Jises bwe, arile iy anya, ‘Laban Kindrei tiye i ta Laban tek i buku doh: “Ou ame manyah ado loboho minek salin,
winiya jo le baratehei iri lau ta amekes budon ndra-in i tam barado bahandra katim.”’
“Eme ya ado lau mari badu Isra-el ki tana ado kudu mwasin ta lakou doh: Kindrei badeh, ndrabwidi Jises, ado mene atahi iy i bada kei tondreh, iy ndrasahan Laban ma Krais.”
Eme iri lau anuhun sahou doh badeh, ndrine iri tikisiy handru ma tiye i ta Pita hawe oro aposel rayah ja anya, “Ado nadu tine aso, aso ka buku sah bah?”
Eme Pita asumon boho oro i buku doh, “Ado mari badeh, katubuni ndrine ado ma kanyu na nyara Jises Krais, ya idah karei ma lomondra ndra-in tado kameh sikine iu. Ma idah kameh, ado akohok Malawin Ndrabun i nyara ndramas ewek tado.
Ya tandrakan ta lakou doh badeh, i tado ma hawe i ta nadu ado oro, ma i toro lau badu len. Idoh i toro lau heh Kindrei aloh oro ame hawen.”
Pita asehek sahou batanau i toro ma indrek oro anya, “Ado badeh, katondrok ado kamwenen, kora-on ado kala bolo maha kameh eme la-u iri lau ndra-in ado munyak dah.”
Eme iri lau solo-an badeh, atehei budon tiri handru i ta sahou tan ma anyuwi oro. Ya kane iri lau mari nane doh, i buku none tuluwi (3,000) i bwele-e iri lau rayah na len doh.
Eme iri badeh, aso-ok labai ta a-en hamon ta leheya toro aposel ma atukum ta atudun hawe abo-os jabi ramen ma asolom.
Iri mwan ma badih badeh, anyolom kalem hawe lahou tinan solo-an labai Kindrei amekes udu mine iri aposel, eme boho iri asak ta lahou iri aposel amekes, ma iri anoh.
Eme ya bolo iri mari badeh, ndrine iri i se, ya iri anyohan lakou i tiri ari ari.
Eme iri adeu lakou tiri hawe adeu nyamon tiri i ta sisih ma hawe anyohan iri lau lakou bwe.
Ma len mari badeh, iri atukum ala bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei. Ma iri badeh, ado kon tiri abo-os jabi ramen ma aimon amunum le ma sekesek,
ma atudun Kindrei. Ma, iri badeh, mwasin labai udu mada iri lau ta kon doh. Eme ya udu bolo len mari badeh, kane iri lau asola ala hawe iri rayah mene, tasah Kindrei ibo gok ta akohok iri ame hamon.
Ya, na mada an taloh na beyeh ari badeh, Pita hawe Jon, uru au ala loken ala asiu tinan ta Kindrei asolom.
Eme ndramak ari badan imek kabatana tinen atehei iy eme len. Eme iri bwese-ei iy ili madasan tinan ta i asiu tinan ta Kindrei aloh, “Madasan Mwasin.” Eme iy udu aliy na len mari badeh, anyolou lakou tiri lau adek ala ame ala bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei.
Eme iy anyolom Pita uru Jon ame le badeh, iy anyolou uru ta luk.
Eme uru anyolom amwenen i tan. Ano Pita anya, “Madam keme taru!”
Ya eme iy anya, uru kameh anyohan iy lakou, ya eme madan i turu.
Ano Pita anya, “Aru badeh, luk ta anyohan ou bwe. Arile, sasah taru udu aliy kada-ah, aru kameh atehei ewek tam. Na boto-on ta nyara Jises Krais badu Nasaret badeh, ou suri ou, ma ou adek.”
Ya eme Pita tawi minen salin ma suri iy ere loken. Eme katin hawe kusu-u bekan tan abadok ma iy edek.
Ano iy ili hawe oro ili bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ma edek ma sandroh ta atudun Kindrei.
Ya eme iri lau mari anyolom iy edek ma atudun Kindrei;
ma iri seleyani iy, tasah iy badeh, ndramak ta anyolou lakou. Iy mene manyah udu Madasan Mwasin ta i bolo asiu ta Kindrei. Eme ya, mani iri mari atur ma mada iri atau, ta sasah nane ndrasahan tan.
Eme ndramak nane ta anyolou lakou tawi Pita uru Jon kahis le badeh, iri lau mani iri atur ya iri sakaliye ala ame ala hawe uru ala beleheleh ta Solomon.
Eme Pita anyolom badeh, iy tiye i toro anya, “Aha lau badu Isra-el, mani aha atur ta sasah? Aha anyolom aru boto-on tasah handru? Budon taha kede-eh anya, boto-on mari badeh udu taru, tasah aru mwasin mara-ei ta mada Kindrei, ma aru bwidi iy ndramak kede-eh edek ja. Arile bwe.
Kindrei ta Abraham uru Aisik hawe Jekop, ma ta tama taha badeh, bwidi lomadan i ta lohowan tan Jises asahan. Aha mene atehei iy ili mine iri lau adai iy. Pailat anya karuwani iy, arile aha badeh, bwale aha, ma aha baseken iy udu mada Pailat bwe.
Aha tubuni kona aha i ta iy ndramak mwasin labai doh, iy bamekes ari kandriyen ndra-in bwe. Iy irek na iri kandriyen mwasin le. Aha bwale aha ta Pailat tolowei Jises. Aha tiye Pailat tolowei iy ndramak ta adi ndramak.
Aha badeh, adai ndramak ta edeu kohan handru ta udu le buku doh. Arile, Kindrei le mete-ei iy ta imek eme loken. Eme aru badeh, anyolom na mada aru amwenen ma aru asehek nyala aha.
Eme i san ta budon handru in ta nyara Jises badeh, ndramak badan imek, ndra boto-on ja. Ehe, na budon handru in ta Jises le, ndramak badeh, ndramwenen ja. Eme na dah aha anyolom.
Eme ya aha nadu tine, jo badeh, tanan, ta aha tanan bala mwasin ta lakou aha amekes i ta Jises bwe; ma hawe oro lau ta atondrok ale.
Arile, sahou mene Kindrei atehei i kani iri propet mari asehek badeh, i buku doh: Krais kameh bwese isi. Ma na kandriyen aha amekes i tan, Kindrei bwidi sahou tiri propet tan i handru.
Ya eme aha badeh, katubuni ndrine aha ma aha ka-en hamon ta Kindrei. Ma idah kameh, lomondra ndra-in taha kameh Kindrei sikine iu. Ya len ta akohok manyah mwasin ta Laban kameh eme.
Ma iy kameh suni Jises eme hamon ja. Iy badeh, Krais, ndramak Kindrei mene ndralebelei ta akohok aha ame hamon ja.
Jises kameh udu kandrah udu gwek, winiya le len Kindrei anya kamekes lakou mari kasahan ha-un ja, i buku none iy mene ndrasehek i tiri propet tan ndrabun mwena mene.
Moses mene tiye anya, ‘Laban Kindrei kameh tutuni ndramak ari badu bolo aha kameh asahan propet taha. Iy kameh suni iy i le buku iy mene suni jo. Ya eme aha badeh, kanuhun sahou tan mari iy asehek i taha.
Ya are lau banuhun bohon bwe, badeh kameh tikahei iy eme len ta bolo lau tan.’
“Handru labai, iri propet kabatana Samuwel eme, eme taku dah badeh, mari asehek nyala le len doh.
Ya eme aha dah, badeh, lundriye iri propet ta sahou randra le mene Kindrei amekes hawe tubu aha Abraham i buku doh: ‘Na lundriyem oro le kameh, jo kameh edeu nyosowan i la-u iri lau mari badu munyak.’
Na len Kindrei tutuni lohowan tan, iy suni iy ewek taha bwena ta adeu nyosowan ewek la-u aha, ta amekes aha badeh, katubuni kona aha ki tiri kandriyen ndra-in.”
Pita uru Jon asehek sahou i tiri lau kahis le badeh, iri pris hawe tinan ta ndrokei ta asiu tinan ta Kindrei hawe iri Sadusi badeh, ame hawe uru.
Ya ndrine iri badeh, ibolosen i toro aposel. Tasah, oro badeh, leheya iri lau ta nyala Jises Krais ndramak ndrame awas ja ta imek tan, eme ma iri lau mari ale kameh winiyan amak ame awas ja ta imek tiri.
Eme iri anya katehei uru a ta mada sahou, arile ndra mirihik ta an i andri. Eme ma iri tawi Pita uru Jon ma atehei uru a bolo kou, andrei ben ari.
Arile, iri lau solo-an anuhun sahou turu ma iri atehei budon tiri handru i ta aliy. Ya, eme sebenei iri ma kane iri badeh, i sola asahan lamawa (5,000).
Eme na len ari ja badeh, iri lau ta atondrok, hawe iri lau-en, hawe iri lau ta leheya kandriyen malen tiri Juwis atukum ame Jerusalem.
Iri lau rayah ta lundriye iri pris badeh, are aliy. Ya Anas tinan tiri pris hawe Kayapas oro lau tan. Jon hawe Aleksandra badeh, ado aliy ale.
Eme iri kuhi Pita uru Jon ala ales are mada iri ma iri ndremenya uru, “Na boto-on ma hawe nyara are handru, ah amekes iri lahou dah?”
Eme Pita idih na Malawin Ndrabun badeh, ma iy tiye i tiri, “Ado lau ta atondrok, hawe ado lau-en tiri lau!
I buku none ado kandremenya aso na dah, ta lahou mwasin aso amekes i ta ndramak badan imek ma kalelen iy kamwenen i buku sah,
idah kameh, ado ma hawe iri lau badu Isra-el katanan ta ndramak ales udu mada ado ndramwenen dah badeh, na boto-on ta nyara Jises Krais badu Nasaret. Iy mene ado atahi iy i bada kei tondreh ma iy imek. Ano Kindrei mete-ei iy amak eme awas ta imek tan.
Iy badeh, Jises i buku ‘bek, ado lau ta atah asiu bwale ado, na dah, iy ndrasahan kati ndru ta ka-u asiu bek.’
Taha badeh, winiyan batakalahei ari seben bare ta ari lau ja bwe; tasah ari lau udu baha kandrah ja kada-ah atehei iy ki nyara seben tataha bwe.”
Eme oro anyolom Pita uru Jon badeh, banoh se bwe, uru abadok handru. Ma oro atanan uru badeh, mene bakohok tanan tinan bwe, uru badeh lau badu kon laleyah. Eme ya mani oro atur, ma oro atanan, ta uru lau doh mene badu hawe Jises.
Eme oro badeh, basehek randra sahou bala bada uru bwe. Tasah, iy ndramak mene uru mesekei iy amwenen badeh, ales ere hawe Pita uru Jon are mada oro mari.
Eme oro badeh, tiye iri lau ta ndrokei katiyani Pita uru Jon ka len ta mada iri kansol, ya eme oro atilik nyala oro,
“To kamekes sasah handru ki turu lau kede-eh bah? Iri lau mari manyah ado Jerusalem badeh, ndratanan kalem mwasin uru amekes. Ya eme to winiyan babisiniy bwai.
Arile, san le doh badeh, to kabwidi lahou dah saseker badeh, to katiye uru badeh, ka-i ta asehek nyara iy ndramak doh.”
Ano oro luhi uru ame bolon ja badeh, tiye i turu sasehek sahou ma saleheya boto-on ta nyara Jises ja, ndri-iy ai.
Arile, Pita uru Jon anya, “Ado kanone kaseleya ki tado le se. Mwasin ta mada Kindrei ta aso kanuhun boho ado deh, bwe-em kanuhun boho Kindrei?
Ya aso kameh winiyan bandru-uk ta asehek lakou aso ndranyolom na mada aso, ma anuhun na ndranye aso amwenen bwai.”
Eme oro kansol nohowa oro abadok le gwek, ma tiye uru au. Oro badeh, winiyan badeu maha-an bala turu bwe, tasah iri lau mari atudun le Kindrei ta lahou tinan mene uru amekes.
Jaha ta ndramak nane amwenen badeh, sakalawi hanoh (40).
Eme oro tiye uru ame len badeh, ala hawe oro lau turu amwenen, ma asehek nyala oro ta lakou mari, oro tinan tiri pris hawe oro lau-en tiye i turu.
Eme oro anuhun badeh, oro asore boho oro i le se i loken, asolom i ta Kindrei. Eme oro anya, “Laban Kindrei, ou le mesekei kandrah ma munyak hawe ndras ma hawe lakou mari udu bahandran ma udu bwele-en.
Ou mene asehek sahou na Malawin Ndrabun edek boho lohowam, tubu ahi Debit anya: ‘I buku sah iri lau badu leheleh abolosen le gwek? Ya i buku sah iri lau atilik budon labwe?
Iri kabin badu munyak lowosa iri, ma hawe iri lau ta atondrok atukum a se amekes bahun i ta Laban hawe ndramak ta seben tan iy suni iy eme.’
Idoh mene handru, Herot hawe Pontiyus Pailat atukum a hawe iri lau badu leheleh ma hawe iri lau badu Isra-el, badu bolo kon tinan dah amekes budon ta adai Jises. Iy badeh, lohowan tam ndrabun ou mene suni iy eme ta amekes gok tam.
Oro amekes doh badeh, in hamon le ta budon ma seken tam, ou ndrasehek.
Abo, Laban, na dah badeh, ou anuhun iri anya kanohowa aso, arile ou bwidi aso lohowam kabadok ta asehek sahou tam.
Talasei minem kamekes lau kamwenen ma kamekes kalem mwasin na boto-on ta nyara lohowam ndrabun, Jises.”
Oro asolom ano, kon nane oro atukum are aliy dah, totoreh. Ma eme oro mari badeh, adah na boto-on ta Malawin Ndrabun ma oro abadok ta asehek sahou ta Kindrei.
Eme iri lau ta Kindrei, budon tiri hawe ndrine iri i le ari. Iri mari badeh, bamekes ndrakok bala ta sanuw tiri bwe. Arile, iri mari badeh, anyohan lakou tiri, i tiri ari ari.
Eme oro aposel asehek sahou ta nyala amak eme awas ja ta Laban Jises na boto-on ta Kindrei. Ya eme Kindrei apwai nyosowan badeh, i la-u iri mari.
Eme iri ari ari badeh, bandriliu ta lakou bwe. Ya len rayah, oro lau heh, munyak toro udu aliy hawe asiu toro udu aliy badeh, adeu i ta sisih.
Ya luk ta lakou nane oro asih doh badeh, oro atiye ili hawe oro aposel. Ano oro apou i toro lau heh nane, lakou bwe.
Eme Josep badeh, badu boho kamen ta Libai, adeu iy udu Saipres, ya oro aposel badeh, aloh iy Banabas (moson “ndramak ta edeu tanan mwasin.”)
Iy eme atehei munyak tan i ta sisih. Eme iy andrei luk badeh, atehei i mine oro aposel.
Ya eme ndramak ari nyaran Ananayas uru udun Sapira ale atehei munyak turu i ta sisih.
Ya uru tanan, uru badeh, tone luk rayah, ya rayah le uru atehei i mine oro aposel.
Ano Pita tiye i ta Ananayas anya, “I buku sah handru tama balik Satan ewek ndrinem ma mesekei ou wasai Malawin Ndrabun. Ya eme ou tone luk ranah mene ta munyak ou atehei i ta sisih.
Ou tanam ou basihinei bala ta luk bwe le badeh, idoh tam. Ano ou andrei luk ta aliy i tam le ai. Saba lakou mesekei ou, ya ou amekes kandriyen doh? Ou badeh, bawasai lau bwe, arile ou badeh, wasai Kindrei.”
Eme Ananayas anuhun le badeh, iy taku i andri ma imek. Eme iri lau anuhun badeh, iri anoh andra-i labai.
Ano iri loweu ame su-i iy ma bwese iy eme len ma iri ala ahi iy.
Hamon ta awa taloh ano badeh, udun eme ja, ya iy bala tanan sasah nane ndrasahan bwe.
Eme Pita ndremenya iy anya, “Idoh le kabwai, ta sihine munyak mene ah udum andrei ta munyak ta ah ai?” Eme iy anya, “Ehe, aliy le badeh.”
Eme Pita tiye anya, “I buku sah ah udum anya kanone boto-on ta Malawin Ndrabun ta Laban? Ou ndranuhun! Iri lau ta bwese udum ma a-eh iy asah barame ado madasan kada-ah. Ya iri kameh bwese ou a manan ale.”
Eme na le liliy badeh, iy taku i andri udu kati Pita ma imek. Ano iri lau loweu ame anyolom iy ndramak, eme iri bwese-ei iy ili ma ahi iy udu ka-u udun.
Eme iri lau ta Kindrei ma hawe iri lau mari anuhun badeh, iri anoh andra-i labai.
Eme oro aposel badeh, amekes lahou tinan hawe kalem tinan udu bolo iri lau. Ma hawe iri lau mari ala atehei budon tiri in ta Kindrei badeh, atukum ame bahandra beleheleh ta Solomon udu loboho asiu tinan ta Kindrei.
Ya eme iri lau rayah badeh, bala bolo oro lau ta Jises bwe. Iri lau badeh, masiye oro, arile iri anoh ta atukum hawe oro.
Arile, bwai, iri lau solo-an labai badeh, atehei budon tiri handru ili le ta Laban, ma andromwei iri hawe iri lau tan nane.
Eme ta katin le doh badeh, iri lau bwese iri lau abo sik ala bolo kon tinan. Ma adeu iri an bada sau hawe ndrou ta abe-en i buku none Pita kedek keme badeh, korohan le ki tiri.
Eme iri lau solo-an badu kon tinan mirihik ta Jerusalem atiye iri lau tiri abo sik ma hawe malawin ndra-in udu la-u iri ame le hawe oro. Eme iri mari badeh, amwenen ja.
Ano, tinan tiri pris hawe oro lau badu hawen, oro badu hawe oro Sadusi, mada oro alikis oro aposel, tasah iri mwan ma badih mara-ei badeh, sekesek labai ta gok toro aposel.
Eme ma iri ala tawi oro aposel ma atehei oro ala bolo kou ta ndrahu lau mari.
Arile, na ben badeh, angelo ta Laban eme sihi iri madasan ta i bolon asak ma kuhi oro ame len,
ya iy tiye oro anya, “Ado kala bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei katiye nyala lau mari ta sahou mari ta nyala manyah ha-un ta Kindrei.”
Eme na mandraben handru badeh, oro ala bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei i buku le angelo mene ndrasihidiy toro, ma oro leheya iri lau. Eme tinan tiri pris hawe oro lau badu hawen asahan, eme oro luhi oro kansol ma hawe oro lau-en mari badu Isra-el ame, ya iri atilik nyala iri. Ano oro suni sahou ili bolo kou tiye oro aposel kame kales kado mada oro kansol.
Arile, oro lau ta atondrok asiu ta Kindrei ala asos bolo kou, iri batou oro aposel bado bolo kou doh bwe. Eme oro a hamon badeh, asehek nyala oro,
“Aso ala asos, ma anyolom iri kou badeh, ndrahas, se lakou babwidiy bwe, ma hawe oro lau ta ndrokei are aliy atondrok. Arile, aso sihi kou anya kabolon badeh, oro bado aliy bwe.”
Eme oro anuhun sahou doh badeh, ya budon ta tinan ta ndrokei ta asiu ta Kindrei, hawe iri tinan tiri pris lomondra anya sasah kameh asahan bah?
Ano ndramak ari eme badeh, anya, “Ei! Oro lau mene, ado atehei oro ala bolo kou badeh, ales areu asiu tinan ta Kindrei kodo-oh leheya iri lau mwan ma badih.”
Eme oro batun hawe oro tinan ta ndrokei ala badeh, andrei oro aposel dah. Oro badeh, baseheya oro boto-on bwe, tasah oro anoh, kora-on iri lau korowei oro na bek.
Eme oro tiyani oro aposel ame atehei oro ales are mada iri kansol, eme ma iri pris ndremenya oro i buku doh,
“Aso tiye sahou boto-on boto-on ndrawek tado, ta ado saleheya boto-on ta nyara ndramak badeh, ja ai, ndri-iy labai. Arile, ado badeh, ndramesekei bolo kon Jerusalem na leheya tado, ma ado anya kamekes aso kabwese maha-an ta ndraye ndramak badeh.”
Eme ma Pita hawe oro aposel rayah tiye i hamon anya, “Aso badeh, winiyan banuhun ari ndramak bwe, aso anuhun le Kindrei, kabwai!
Kindrei ta tama aso mene mete-ei Jises udu ta imek eme loken. Iy mene ado adai iy imek udu bada kei tondreh.
Kindrei eme tutuni iy ere loken udu loboho limen salin, ma iy asahan kabin ma ndramak ta seben. Ma iy badeh, leheya madasan ta ado winiyan tubuni ndrine ado, ma iy winiyan sikine karei ma lomondra ndra-in tiri Isra-el.
Ya, eme aso dah badeh, anyolom lakou mari doh, na mada aso amwenen. Ma hawe Malawin Ndrabun ta Kindrei ale bwidiy aleu iri lakou doh. Kindrei badeh, winiyan edeu Malawin i tare lau, buku none iy anuhun bohon.”
Ya eme oro kansol anuhun sahou doh badeh, ma bwidi ndrine oro irih mara-ei, ma oro anya kadai oro aposel kamak.
Arile, ndramak ari nyaran Gamaliyel, iy tinan tiri, iy badu Parasi, iri beleben iy tinan labai. Iy badeh, ndramak ari ta leheya bolo kandriyen malen, iy ales ere loken bolo iri kansol, ma iy asehek sahou boto-on, ta iri badeh, karuwani mine iri ma oro ka manan sese op.
Ano iy tiye sahou i toro kansol anya, “Ado lau badu Isra-el, ado anya kamekes sasah ki toro lau doh badeh, ado kabudon kamwenen bwena op.
Len sabe mene ndra-au Tudas asahan, iy amekes iy i buku ndramak ari handru, ya lau ma hanek (400) badeh, a-en hamon tan. Eme iri adai iy imek badeh, iri lau tan aseker, eme ma ari lakou basahan se bwe.
Ano, udu hamon tan ja badeh, ndramak ari badu Galili nyaran Judas asahan kabatana len ta ndromondrom kane lau; iy ale aluwi lau solo-an an hamon tan ale. Eme iri adai iy imek ale, ma iri lau tan aseker.
Ya, jo katiye tado kamwenen: Oro lau dah badeh, ado karuwani mine ado ki-iu toro! Ya oro ka-au! Ki buku none budon dah i buku none tiri lau laleyah, badeh kameh winiyan bala bala bwe.
Arile, buku none budon doh ta Kindrei handru eh, idah kameh ado winiyan batobohei oro bwe; ya ado kameh amekes bahun i bada Kindrei le.”
Eme ma sahou tan badeh, tubuni budon toro. Eme iri luhi oro aposel ame bolon, ma ubwi oro na malou sakabuk i bek. Ano iri tiye sahou i toro, hamon oro sasehek sahou na nyara Jises ja ai, ndri-iy, ma eme iri tiye oro au.
Eme oro aposel ame len ta mada iri kansol ma sekesek tinan labai ta Kindrei badeh, ndranyulumwi oro badeh, mwasin labai ta bwese maha-an ta nyara Jises.
Eme len ari buku ari udu bolo asiu lohalak ta Kindrei ma i asiu ra-em i ra-em, oro badeh, baruwani ta leheya ma ta tiye sahou mwasin ta nyala Jises bwe. Oro asehek boto-on labai ta Jises badeh, Mesaya.
Na len doh badeh, kane iri lau nane a-en hamon ta Jises ma atehei budon tiri handru i ta Kindrei i sola le ai. Eme ma iri Juwis nane asehek boho iri Grik badu bolo iri lau ta Kindrei badeh, tebelese hawe iri Juwis rayah nane asehek boho Aramek. Iri Grik anya iri badih nyau tiri badeh, bakohok nyamon sola bwe.
Eme oro aposel ma ronoh la-uh ame luhi iri lau ta Kindrei ame, ma tiye i toro i buku doh, “Aha kanuhun, gok ta apou nyamon ma luk ili tiri mwan ma badih badeh, sokei gok taso, ma idoh badeh, bamwenen bwe. Gok taso handru badeh, ta atiye sahou ta Kindrei le kabwe.
Ado nadu tine, ado badeh, kalebelei oro lau ma ndro taloh badu bolo ado. Oro lau doh badeh, kadah na Malawin Ndrabun hawe tanan ta aleben budon. Ya to kameh atehei lahou doh kameh i kani oro.
Ya aso badeh, budon taso ki le ta salom ma katiye sahou ta Kindrei.”
Eme iri mari badeh, sekesek ta budon doh. Eme iri lebelei Stiben, ndramak idih na Malawin Ndrabun hawe ndramak ta budon handru; ale hawe Pilip, Prokorus, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas, hawe Nikolas badu Antiyok. Iy mene badu Juwis bwe, arile udu ja, iy in hamon ta kandriyen tiri Juwis.
Eme iri tiyani oro lau doh ala hawe oro aposel. Eme oro adeu nyosowan i la-u oro ma asolom oro.
Eme ya sahou ta nyala Kindrei badeh, aseker. Eme kane iri lau badu Jerusalem atehei budon tiri handru i ta Kindrei i sola suwi suwi. Ma iri pris solo-an badeh, anuhun sahou ma atehei budon handru.
Stiben badeh, Kindrei nyosowani iy tinan labai, ma atehei boto-on i tan ta amekes kalem tinan hawe amekes lahou tinan, udu bolo iri lau.
Arile, iri lau rayah suri iri badeh, andresei iy. Oro lau doh badeh, badu asiu ta atukum tiri Juwis, ya oro lau nane doh badu boho kamen iri aloh, “Kamen tiri salibah.” Ya, iri lau doh badeh, iri Juwis badu kon tinan Aleksandriya ya kon tinan Sairini. Oro rayah ja badeh, oro Juwis badu kon munyak tinan Silisiya hawe badu bada kon munyak tinan Esiya atukum hawe oro ta tebelese hawe Stiben.
Arile, Malawin Ndrabun badeh, edeu budon mwasin i ta Stiben asehek sahou, ya oro winiyan basehek sahou bala tan bwe.
Ano, oro tamarei lau rayah tiye boho oro anya, “Aso badeh, anuhun Stiben asehek sahou ndra-in i bada Moses hawe Kindrei.”
Eme oro mesekei ndrine iri lau hawe ndrine iri lau-en ma hawe iri Juwis ta leheya kandriyen malen towodau. Eme iri tawi Stiben ma tiyani iy ili hawe iri kansol.
Eme iri amekes budon laleyah ma iri wasai anya, “Iy lau doh badeh, asehek sahou ndra-in i bada kandriyen malen hawe kon ndrabun.
Aso badeh, anuhun iy tiye anya, ‘Idah kameh, Jises badu Nasaret kameh tokosei kon dah ma hawe tobolowe kandriyen tataha mene Moses edeu eme ta taha.’”
Eme oro manyah ado bolo oro kansol anyolom Stiben boto-on ma anyolom bwili Stiben anya i buku ari angelo.
Ano pris tinan ndremenya Stiben anya, “Ou amekes iri lakou doh, handru?”
Ya, eme Stiben asumon anya, “Wurah lomada ado nadu tine, ma hawe ado tama, ado kanuhun jo! Kindrei badu bolo lomadan mene asahan hawe tubu taha Abraham na len iy mene manyah udu Mesopotemiya mwena, ano iy barala baramanyah barado Haran.
Eme Kindrei tiye i ta Abraham anya, ‘Ou ruwani kon tinan tam hawe ou ruwani iri lau tam, ya ou adek au ala kon kameh jo leheya i tam.’
“Eme ma iy ruwani kon munyak Kaldiya, iy eme badeh, manyah udu Haran. Iy udu gwek winiya taman imek, ano Kindrei suni iy ili manyah udu kon ado areu aliy dah.
Ma iy badeh, badeu se ranah munyak bala tan bwe. Arile, Kindrei badeh, tandrakan iy hawe lundriyen oro kameh, iy kameh edeu munyak i tan ma hawe lundriyen oro asahan hamon. Na len Kindrei tandrakan doh badeh, Abraham ari nadun bwe le.
Ya eme Kindrei asehek sahou i ta Abraham i buku doh: ‘Lundriyem oro kameh manyah are kon munyak toro amwenen bwe, ma idah kameh, oro asahan bonyo-ou, winiya jaha ma hanek (400). Ma iri lau ta atondrok oro kameh amekes ndra-in i toro.
Ano, jo kameh edeu maha i la-u iri kon munyak nane adeu oro a bonyo-ou, ma jo kameh kuhi oro ame hamon ame kon dah atudun jo ja.’
Ano, Kindrei amekes sahou randra le ta nyala asan ku-i lau i ta Abraham. Eme Abraham asahan tama Aisik, ma tinen atehei iy eme len ano. Len tan asahan ndru la-uh badeh, taman Abraham sani ku-in. Ano Aisik badeh, atehei Jekop, ya Jekop asahan tama tubu taha oro ma ronoh la-uh.
“Eme nadu tine Josep oro ma ronoh ari badeh, mada oro alikis iy, ma oro atehei iy i ta sisih i buku bonyo-ou ili Ijip. Arile, Kindrei udu hawen,
ma sebenei iy ta bolo maha-an mari. Eme iy atehei budon mwasin i ta Josep ma mesekei iy asahan mwasin, mesekei Parou, kabin badu Ijip sekesek. Eme ma iy mesekei Josep asahan tinan ta atondrok kon Ijip ma iri lakou badu bolo asiu ta kabin ale.
“Ano, kon mari badu bolo Ijip hawe Kenan badeh, nyamon bwe. Ma edeu maha-an tinan labai, ma tubu taha oro, ari madasan ta takaleh nyamon bwe.
Ya, eme Jekop anuhun Ijip badeh, nyamon udu aliy, eme iy suni tubu taha oro ala selesen bwena op.
Ano oro ala san lusan ja badeh, Josep baranyowonya, iy are lau handru barala ta nadu tinen oro ai. Ma Parou barala tanan nadu tine Josep oro ai.
Ano hamon ta idoh badeh, Josep suni sahou i ta taman Jekop hawe lundriyen oro mari ma ndro tonoh limeh (75) kame.
Ano Jekop hawe lundriyen oro mari au ala Ijip. Ya eme iy hawe tubu taha iri amak ado loboho doh.
Ya a-eh iri mari badeh, a hamon ja ala Sekem ala lek mene Abraham sihine i ta nadu Hamor oro na luk rayah.
“Eme ya suniya len Kindrei anya kamekes tandrakan tan i ta Abraham kasahan handru badeh, kane iri lau tataha ado Ijip i sola le gwek.
Ya eme kabin ari asahan ja atondrok Ijip. Iy badeh, tanan Josep se bwe.
Iy eme wendreyani iri lau tataha, ma amekes kandriyen ndra-in handru i ta tubu taha iri. Iy indrek iri badeh, kakeh nadu iri ma borolak le kamak ka-au.
“Na len doh badeh, tine Moses atehei iy eme len. Iy badeh, konen mwasin labai ma Kindrei aseken iy handru. Udu bolo bun ma taloh badeh, atondrok iy udu le asiu ta taman.
Ano na len iri atehei iy eme manan badeh, nadu Parou badih bwese-ei iy eme loken ma nyowo-ei iy i nadun.
Eme Moses badeh, akohok tanan tinan labai badu Ijip ma iy badeh, asehek sahou nyarahan labai, ma iy amekes lahou tan badeh, irih labai.
“Ano jaha ta Moses asahan hanoh (40) badeh, iy ili selesen iri lau tan badu Isra-el.
Eme iy anyolom ndramak ari badu Ijip badeh, idi ndramak ari badu Isra-el andra-i labai. Eme Moses suri iy ili badeh, aseben lau tan badu Isra-el ma iy idi ndramak nane imek.
Eme Moses lomondra anya kameh, iri lau tan baraseleyani iy, Kindrei suni iy eme ta aseben iri, arile bwe.
Ano na len rasan ja badeh, Moses eme, iy anyolom uru lau la-uh badu Isra-el ada uru. Eme iy ili anya katalou uru ma tiye sahou i turu i buku doh, ‘Ah anya kada ah ta sasah? Ah badeh, nadu tine ah.’
“Arile, iy ari nane ta amekes bahun bwena atuwi Moses i hamon ma iy tiye sahou nyarahan i tan anya, ‘Are lau atehei ou atondrok ahi hawe suni ou asehek sahou nyarahan eme tahi?
Ou anya adai jo ja, i buku none ou na mene adai iy lau badu Ijip mene imek, neh?’
Eme Moses anuhun sahou doh badeh, ma iy atobwak iu ili Midiyen, i buku lau badu leheleh manyah udu kon doh. Ya eme nadun mwan la-uh asahan.
“Iy udu gwek jaha ma hanoh (40) ano badeh, angelo ari asahan hawen udu bolo jih anya laleyah udu ta kei udu kon lomale an, udu mirihik ta mandrei Sainai.
Eme Moses anyolom jih doh badeh, manin atur, eme iy edek ili mirihik anya katou kamwenen. Eme iy anuhun boho Laban aloh anya,
‘Jo dah badeh, Kindrei ta tamam oro. Jo Kindrei ta Abraham, ta Aisik, ma ta Jekop.’ Eme Moses totoreh, ma inoh ma madan bala loken bwe.
“Ano Laban tiye i tan anya, ‘Ou tolowei ku-i katim ki-iu, kon ou ales areu aliy badeh, turuwen.
Jo badeh, ndranyolom sisi-in ndra-in labai tiri lau tek are Ijip. Jo badeh, ndranuhun ndrelen tiri, ya eme jo ndrame andri dah ta aseben iri kame len kado mwasin. Abo, ou suri ou ya jo kasuni ou ala hamon ala Ijip ja.’
“Iy Moses dah le mene adeh iri badeh, asehek na boho iri anya ‘Are lau atehei ou atondrok ahi ma asehek sahou nyarahan eme tahi?’ Iy le badeh, Kindrei suni iy ili atondrok iri, ma ta akohok iri ame len na seben ta angelo mene asahan hawen udu bolo jih.
Iy badeh, kuhi iri ame len ta Ijip ma iy amekes kalem tinan tinan udu Ijip, udu gwa ndras aloh Retsi, ma iy sariye iri ado kon lomale an, jaha ma hanoh (40).
Iy Moses le doh mene adeh tiye i tiri lau badu Isra-el anya, ‘Kindrei kameh suni propet ari ewek taha i le buku jo badu bolo ado amwenen.’
Iy le badeh, mene udu ndrokowa iri lau badu Isra-el ado kon lomale an udu hawe tama taha iri. Ma iy udu hawe angelo mene asehek sahou i tan udu mandrei Sainai, ma iy akohok sahou awas ta asehek nyala taha.
“Arile, tubu taha iri badeh, baseken iy bwe, ma iri tikahei iy ma udu ndrine iri badeh, iri lomondra ili hamon ja ili Ijip.
Ya eme iri ame tiye Aron anya, ‘Ou amekes rayah kindrei ya iri ka-en bwena ta to ja. Iy lau Moses ta sariye to ame dah badeh, to bala tanan sasah ndrasahan tan udu mandrei Sainai kodo-oh bwe!’
Na len doh badeh, iri mesekei sukumada lakou ari asahan i buku nadu bulumakau. Eme iri atiye lakou i nyara salom eme ta asun i tan, ma iri amekes tine nyamon ta atudun lakou iri amekes na mine iri doh.
Arile, Kindrei atehei konan i tiri ma mesekei iri ala atudun iri lakou badu bada kandrah. Idoh amwenen le ta sahou mene torowenei udu bolo tarou tiri propet i buku doh: ‘Aha Isra-el, na len aha mene ado kon lomale an udu bolo jaha ma hanoh (40), aha atiye lakou i nyara salom eme tek deh bwe?
Bwe handru! Asiu balei mene aha bwese, tek bwe, ta kindrei ta wasai Molek le, ma sukumada kei i buku ndrau ta kindrei taha ta wasai aloh Repan; oro sukumada kei doh ado asah, ta aha atudun iri. Ya eme idah kameh, jo kameh tikahei aha au a len ala kon munyak tinan Babilon.’
“Iri tubu taha iri badeh, mene kuhi asiu balei ta Kindrei ma sahou handru tan udu bolon mirihik tiri, udu kon lomale an. Amekes doh mene in hamon ta boho Kindrei tiye i ta Moses, amekes in hamon ta malawin Moses ndranyolom.
Ano udu hamon badeh, tubu taha iri bwese-ei udu mine tama iri, ma an hamon ta Josuwa, ma akohok iri kon munyak tinan mene Kindrei takahei iri au. Eme asiu balei doh udu gwek, eme taku len ta Debit asahan.
Eme iy aluwi budon ta Kindrei badeh, aseken iy ma ndremenyani Kindrei i buku none iy kaseken, badeh, iy katahi ra-em asiu ki asumwe Kindrei ta Jekop.
Arile bwe, idoh badeh Solomon labai tahi asiu i asumwe Kindrei.
“Arile bwe, Kindrei udu bwele-e kindrei mari badeh, bamanyah bado asiu ala lau amekes na mine iri bwe. I buku none propet ari asehek i buku doh,
‘Kandrah badeh, ndrahu manyah tek labai, ma munyak badeh, ndrahu katik. Ma Laban anya, saba asiu handru ado anya kamekes keme asumwek? Ya ndrahu amunyau tek kameh kudu heh bah?
Sebwe, jo bamekes lakou mari bwe, nadeh?’
“Aha badeh, ta tebelese handru en! Ma ndrine aha badeh, ndradah na kindrei ta wasai i buku iri lau tana iri Kindrei handru bwe, ma ndranye aha ndralun ma aha winiyan banuhun sahou handru ta Kindrei, bwe! Aha badeh, i le buku none tama aha oro mene. Aha banuhun sahou ta Malawin Ndrabun bwe!
Are propet asahan bwena mene, ya tama aha oro mene badai iy bwe? Oro mene adai iri propet mene asehek ta nyala ndramak mwasin handru kameh barasahan. Ya eme na dah, iy ndrame, arile aha badeh, atehei sa-oh ma adai iy imek.
Aha mene andrei batanau malen udu mine iri angelo, arile aha ba-en hamon ta aliy bwe.”
Eme na len iri anuhun sahou doh badeh, iri abolosen handru ma lihi iri asenyer i tan.
Arile Stiben badeh, idih handru na Malawin Ndrabun, ya eme iy suri madan ili bolo kandrah, ma iy anyolom lomadan ta Kindrei, ma anyolom Jises ales udu loboho lim salin ta Kindrei.
Eme iy anya, “Ado kanyolom! Jo anyolom bolo kandrah asak ma jo anyolom Nadu Ndramak Awas ales udu lim salin ta Kindrei.”
Eme iri arah ma sokei ndranye iri na lime iri, ma iri sakaliye ala hawen ma tawi iy,
ma aluwi iy eme len ta kon tinan, ma orou iy na bek. Ya iri lau nane amekes sahou wendreya, ta adeu Stiben i ta sahou, badeh, talou awin tiri iu, ya iri akahei ili udu kati iy ndramak loweu ari, nyaran Sol.
Iri badeh, abo gok le ta orou Stiben na bek ai, ta adi iy kimek. Iy eme asolom bohon i tinan ili ta Laban i buku doh, “Laban Jises, ou andrei malawik ai.”
Ano badeh, iy atehei bwili ndru-un udu andri, ma iy aloh i tinan i ta Kindrei i buku doh, “Laban, balem kamani kandriyen ndra-in toro nane amekes eme tek doh.” Iy asehek sahou doh ano le badeh, ma iy imek.
Na len doh Sol badeh, udu aliy anyolom ale ma iy tiye iri ta kadai Stiben kimek. Eme na le bolo len doh badeh, iri lau mwan ma badih nane manyah ado bolo kon tinan Jerusalem amekes ndra-in labai, ili tiri lau nane atehei budon tiri handru in ta Jises, eme ma iri akohok sisi-in laba tinan labai. Eme ma iri atobwak au ala loboho kon munyak tinan Judiya hawe Samariya. Arile, oro aposel le badeh, batobwak bwai.
Eme iri lau ta Kindrei rayah ame aden ndranye Stiben. Ano iri ala ahi iy.
Iy ndramak Sol doh badeh, edek ta idi iri lau nane atehei budon tiri handru i ta Kindrei. Iy edek ili asiu ra-em ili ra-em takaleh ma aliu iri mwan hawe iri badih ame, ma adeu iri ala bolo kou.
Iri lau mwan ma badih nane atehei budon tiri handru in ta Jises badeh, atobwak ala ado bolo kon mara-ei, ma iri atiye sahou mwasin ta nyala Jises ili loboho heh iri adek ma ala ado aliy.
Pilip badeh, ili andri bolo kon tinan ari badu loboho Samariya, atiye sahou ili tiri lau ta nyala Jises, ta iy ndramak doh Krais, iy mene Kindrei ndraleheyani iy eme ta aseben taha mari.
Eme na len iri lau anuhun sahou ta Pilip asehek ma anyolom kalem iy amekes badeh, ma iri atehei ndranye iri irih labai ta anuhun sahou iy asehek.
Ma hawe iri malawin ndra-in badeh, anyar ma ame len ta ndramak, ma hawe lau kati iri imek, ma bada iri imek badeh, mara-ei amwenen ja.
Ya iri lahou tinan ta Kindrei eme bolo kon tinan doh badeh, ma bwidi iri lau mara-ei sekesek laba tinan labai.
Ya ndramak ari nyaran Saimon udu kon tinan doh ale badeh, amekes balahak san solo-an solo-an ndra-au, ya amekes iri lau mari badu loboho Samariya, boho iri asak ta aliy. Iy badeh, atudun iy anya, iy le kabwai.
Ya eme iri lau mari ma tinan ma bwisik badeh, atehei budon tiri i tan anya, “Iy ndramak dah badeh, iy Kindrei, ma boto-on tan ili labai.”
Iri lau badeh, an hamon tan, tasah iy badeh, bwidi boho iri asak san solo-an labai, ma amekes kalem luluwen labai.
Arile, na len Pilip tiye tiri ta sahou mwasin ta nyala tondrok ta Kindrei ma hawe nyara Jises Krais, iri mwan hawe iri badih badeh, atehei budon tiri in ta sahou ta Pilip, ma alomwa iri.
Ma Saimon ale atehei budon tan handru in tiri sahou doh, ya eme alomwa iy ale. Eme ma iy in hamon ta Pilip ili kon rakon, rakon, ma anyolom iri kalem tinan Pilip amekes ma bohon asak.
Eme na len oro aposel ado Jerusalem anuhun iri lau badu Samariya badeh, ndrandrei sahou ta Kindrei, eme oro suni Pita uru Jon ala anyolom oro.
Eme uru ala asahan hawe oro lau mwan ma badih nane, uru asolom oro ta oro kakohok Malawin Ndrabun,
tasah Malawin Ndrabun badeh, bala la-u oro ari bwe le; oro badeh, alomwa oro na nyara Laban Jises le.
Ano Pita uru Jon atehei mine uru i la-u oro, ma oro adah na Malawin Ndrabun.
Eme na len doh Saimon anyolom oro akohok Malawin Ndrabun i san ta oro aposel adeu lim i la-u oro badeh, iy anya kedeu luk ki ta Pita uru Jon ta asih boto-on turu nane doh.
Eme ma iy tiye turu i buku doh, “Ah katehei boto-on badeh, keme tek ale, ya i buku none jo kedeu minek ki la-u are ki la-u are, iri kakohok Malawin Ndrabun ale.”
Eme Pita anya, “Ou ndrandra-i kede-eh, ou abudon anya, ou winiyan sihinei ndramas ta Kindrei dah na luk tam badeh? Arile, bwe! Ou ma luk tam badeh, kameh amak.
Ou badeh, balem bahas ta lahou dah bwe, tasah ndrinem badeh, bamwenen ta mada Kindrei bwe.
Ou tubuni ndrinem ta kandriyen ndra-in badeh, ya ou amekes salom ki ta Laban. Sebwe iy winiyan mani budon ndra-in marakon udu ndrinem badeh ano iu.
Tasah, jo anyolom ou badeh, ndradah na iri madalakis hawe kandriyen ndra-in ndrasebete-ei ou.”
Ano Saimon anya, “Ndri-iy! Ah kamekes salom kili ta Laban ta aseben jo, ya eme sasah nane ah ndrasehek badeh, kameh sasahan tek.”
Ya uru asehek sasah uru tanan ma ndranyolom udu bada Jises amekes ma asehek sahou ta nyala Laban ano badeh, Pita uru Jon au a hamon ja ala Jerusalem. Ya udu bolo tekedek turu au a hamon badeh, uru atiye sahou mwasin ili kon solo-an badu loboho Samariya.
Eme angelo ari ta Laban eme tiye Pilip anya, “Ou ala san ili loboho kum, kon lomale an ala udu Jerusalem i andri ili kon tinan Gasa.”
Eme iy edek ili badeh, ndruni ndramak ari badu Itiyopiya. Iy badeh, ndramak ari tinan ta atondrok lakou mwasin mwasin ta kabin badih badu Itiyopiya nyaran Kandasi. Iy badeh, mene ili Jerusalem ta atudun Kindrei.
Ano, iy udu san ta ki-iu ki kon ja ai. Ya iy badeh, udu bwele-e sau, ya iri hos aliu iy. Eme iy manyah udu bwele-en badeh, anyolom sahou propet Aisaya mene atorou.
Eme Malawin Ndrabun tiye Pilip anya, “Ou ala mirihik ta sau ale iri hos aliu kodo-on.”
Ano, Pilip sakaliye ili mirihik ta bada sau nane anuhun ndramak dah aloh sahou badu bolo tarou ta propet Aisaya. Eme Pilip ndremenya iy anya, “Batum aleu ta sahou ou aloh badeh, deh bwe?”
Eme iy anya, “Batuk kaleu ta aliy ki buku sah? Ki buku none ari ndramak keme kaleheya keme tek.” Ya eme iy tiye Pilip anya, “Ou ame loke manyah ado hawek, ma aseben jo.”
Eme ma, Pilip ili loke hawe ndramak doh, anyolom tarou ta buk ndrabun ranah nane, atorou i buku doh, “Iy badeh, i buku none ari sipsip andrei iy eme len ta adai iy; Iy badeh, i buku none ari sipsip nadu bwisik se balohou bwe na len anya kasan lamin; Iy badeh, randra sahou bwe.
Iri atehei iy i andri labai, ma iri atehei iy i ta mada sahou, arile iri balelei iy, ta mada sahou tan bwe, Are lau handru barasihidi saren barala ta lundriyen oro? Tasah iri ndradai iy ndramak.”
Eme ma ndramak tinan badu Itiyopiya ndremenya Pilip anya, “Abo, ou tiye tek, are propet handru asehek nyalan dah? Iy asehek iy le deh? Bwe-em iy asehek nyala ndramak ari ja?”
Ano Pilip asehek nyalan ta sahou nane iy aloh, ma asehek sahou mwasin ta nyala Jises i tan.
Eme uru sakaliye ado san ala badeh, asahan ta gwa rayah, eme ndramak tinan badu Itiyopiya dah anya, “Ou anyolom se, gwa asah idah. I buku sah handru, balomwani jo bwai?”
<range>
Eme iy tiye oro hos tan aliu sau dah udu rasi. Ano Pilip hawe iy ndramak dah, uru ame andri a gwa, ma Pilip alomwa iy.
Eme uru ado gwa ame loken le badeh, Malawin Ndrabun ta Laban kuhi Pilip iu, ya ndramak tinan badu Itiyopiya batou iy ja bwe. Arile, iy ma sekesek tan edek iu ai.
Ya Pilip badeh, ili ja asahan Asdot; eme iy ili bolo kon tinan mari atiye sahou mwasin ili ili asahan Sesariya.
Na bolo len doh, Sol badeh, alohou ta idi iri lau ta Laban marakon kamak ka-au. Eme ma iy amwenen ili hawe batun tiri pris,
anya kalelen iy ta iy katorou rayah la-ukei ta tiye nyala Sol badeh, are lau handru. Ya Sol aseken ta atiye iri la-ukei doh i mine iri tinan ta ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis udu kon Damaskus katanan ta aliy. Ya eme i buku none iy kili kanyolom iri lau mwan hawe badih ta a-en hamon ta San ta Laban ado aliy badeh, iy kakuhi iri kala Jerusalem kala bolo kou.
Eme iy edek eme mirihik ta kon Damaskus le badeh, se nawin bwe, sun lomadan labai anya udu kandrah eme andri awudi iy.
Eme ma iy atarah i andri bada munyak ma ndranyen anuhun sahou aloh i tan anya, “Sol, Sol, buku sah handru ou anya adai jo?”
Eme Sol anya, “Laban, ou are lau badeh?” Eme iy anya, “Jo Jises, na len mari, ou ale anya adai le jo kede-en.
Abo, ou suri ou, ya ou ala bolo kon tinan Damaskus. Ma idah kameh ndramak ari eme, tiye tam ta sasah kameh ou amekes.”
Ya oro lau nane adek hawe Sol doh badeh, boho oro ihis; oro anuhun nyaro boho ndramak, arile oro banyolom ari ndramak bwe.
Sol eme suri iy udu bada munyak eme loken, madan anya kasak badeh, iy banyolom se lakou bwe. Eme iri sirini iy ili Damaskus.
Len taloh badeh, iy winiyan batou kon bwe, iy ba-un gwa ma baimon nyamon bwe.
Ya udu Damaskus doh badeh, ndramak ari ta Jises udu aliy, nyaran Ananayas. Ya Laban badeh, asahan ta lele, tiye i tan anya, “Ananayas, ei!” Eme Ananayas anya, “Abo, Laban, jo udu kada-ah.”
Eme Laban tiye i tan anya, “Ou ales ala asiu ta Judas udu loboho nadu san iri aloh San Ales Le. Ya ou ndremenya oro ta ndramak ari badu Tasus, nyaran Sol. Iy badeh, asolom.
Udu bolo salom ta Sol badeh, iy anyolom ndramak ari nyaran Ananayas udu bolo lele eme, atehei limen i bwele-en ta amekes madan kasak.”
Eme Ananayas anya, “Laban, jo badeh, ndranuhun yoyou ta ndramak badeh, ma ndranuhun sisi-in iy amekes i tiri lau ta Kindrei ado Jerusalem.
Iy akohok boto-on badu mine iri tinan tiri pris ta aseu iri lau ala aloh nyaram udu bolo salom tiri.”
Arile, Laban tiye i ta Ananayas anya, “Bwe, ou ala! Iy ndramak doh badeh, jo ndralebelei iy ta atiye sahou tek i tiri lau badu leheleh, i tiri kabin tiri ma hawe i tiri lau badu Isra-el.
Jo amwenen kameh leheya iy ta iri maha-an ma sisi-in, iy kameh bwese ta nyarak.”
Ano Ananayas ili, ma iy ales ili bolo asiu badeh, atehei minen i bwele-e Sol ma iy anya, “Sol ou nadu tine, Laban Jises amwenen suni jo eme hawem; iy le mene adeh asahan hawem udu san ta ou ame dah. Iy suni jo eme dah badeh, ta amekes madam kanyolom kon ja, ma iy aso-ok ou adah na Malawin Ndrabun.”
Eme se nawin bwe, lakou i buku none bwisi ni udu madan taku eme len, ma iy anyolom kon ja. Eme iy ales udu loken ma alomwa iy.
Ano iy aimon nyamon ma nyamun eme hamon ja. Eme Sol badeh, udu hawe oro lau ta Jises udu Damaskus len solo-an sese.
Ya eme iy ales ili kon ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis, iy asehek ta nyala Jises badeh, Nadu Kindrei handru.
Eme iri are anuhun iy asehek sahou badeh, mani iri atur anya, “Kede-eh iy ndramak mene udu Jerusalem idi iri lau mene aloh i ta nyaran doh i buku iy asehek kede-eh! Ma iy kede-eh eme ta ateu iri lau kala hawe iri tinan tiri pris ma iri kala bolo kou ai.”
Arile, sahou Sol akeh badeh, i nyarahan nyarahan le gwek ma iy asehek sahou aleu handru i tiri Juwis ado Damaskus, ta Jises badeh, Krais handru, Kindrei suni iy eme. Sahou tan bolowani budon tiri Juwis doh, ma bwidi boho iri ihis.
Eme udu, udu len solo-an iu badeh, iri Juwis atilik nyala iri ta adi iy kimek. Ya ben len ben len badeh, iri atehei mada iri udu madasan ta kon tinan ta anya kadai iy. Arile, iy badeh, ndrandrei bale iri.
<range>
Ma iri lau tan badeh, andrei iy na ben ma atehei iy i bolo ndrom sahin rahak iu ta malou i san ta mada munu kowah i andri.
Na len Sol eme Jerusalem badeh, iy anya kili hawe oro lau ta Jises, arile oro mari anoh iy. Ma oro atehei budon anya iy badeh, ndramak badu hawe oro bwe.
Ndramak ari nyaran Banabas eme badeh, andrei iy, ma uru ala hawe oro aposel. Eme iy asehek nyala oro ta sasah asahan ta Sol na len iy edek ili Damaskus, ya iy anyolom Laban, ma Laban asehek sahou i tan. Ma asehek i toro ta iy udu Damaskus badeh, iy banoh ta asehek sahou, ta nyala nyara Jises nyarahan labai bwe.
Ma eme Sol udu hawe oro edek ili eme bolo Jerusalem atiye sahou nyarahan nyarahan ta nyara Laban.
Iy asehek sahou ma hawe andres oro lau badu Juwis nane asehek boho Grik, arile oro anya kadai iy kimek.
Eme iri lau ta Jises ado doh anuhun badeh, iri kuhi Sol ili Sesariya ma suni iy iu ili kon Tasus.
Ano iri lau ta budon handru badu loboho Judiya, Galili hawe Samariya sekesek handru ta iri babwese isi ja bwe. Iri badeh, abadok ma ales boto-on na boto-on ta Malawin Ndrabun. Ma eme, kane iri i sola ma iri anoh Kindrei, eme ma iri atudun iy.
Udu bolo tekedek ta Pita ili eme bolo kon munyak doh badeh, ma iy ili selesen oro lau ta Kindrei an kon Lida.
Iy ili badeh, ndruni ndramak ari nyaran Aneyas, badan mari imek. Iy in le bada sau andrei jaha ma ndru la-uh.
Eme Pita tiye i ta Aneyas anya, “Jises Krais ndramesekei ou ndramwenen. Ou suri ou, ma ou lukumwi kin tam.” Eme, se nawin bwe, iy suri iy eme loken.
Eme iri lau manyah ado Lida hawe Saron anyolom badeh, ma iri atehei budon tiri handru i ta Laban.
Ya udu kon Jopa badeh, badih ari nyaran Tabita (i boho Grik badeh, aloh iy Dokas). Iy badeh, badih ari ta in hamon ta Kindrei. Eme na len mari, iy amekes kandriyen mwasin i tiri lau, ma iy aseben iri lau, tiri lakou bwe.
Na len doh badeh, iy ibo sik ma iy imek. Ya eme iri anyuwi iy, ma nyahani iy udu bolo asiu loken.
Lida doh badeh, udu mirihik ta Jopa. Ya eme oro lau ta Jises anuhun Pita badeh, udu Lida. Eme oro suni uru lau la-uh badeh, ala andrek iy anya, “Ou ame suwi.”
Eme Pita i hawe uru, ya oro ame asos le badeh, oro kuhi iy iu ili bolo asiu loken. Ya iri badih nyau mari awudi iy, ya iri aden, ma leheya i tan iri awin lawe-en hawe awin rayah ja Dokas amekes, na len i bamak bwe le.
Eme Pita tiye iri mari ame len ta bolo asiu. Ano iy atehei bwili ndru-un i andri ya iy asolom. Eme iy tubuni batalan i ta bada kei nane dah ma iy anya, “Tabita, ou ales are loken.” Eme madan asak anyolom Pita, ma iy suri iy.
Eme ya Pita tawi minen ma suri iy ales na katin ere loken. Ano, iy aloh i toro lau ta budon handru hawe iri badih nyau ame, ma iy atehei iy i hawe iri, ya kohan ndrame hamon ja.
Eme iri lau mari badu loboho Jopa badeh, atanan ta aliy, ma atehei budon tiri handru i ta Laban.
Ya eme Pita badeh, udu hawe ndramak ari lahou tan ta asereh ku-i iri katin haka, nyaran Saimon, iy udu gwek sese.
Udu kon Sesariya doh badeh, ndramak ari nyaran Koniliyus udu aliy. Iy badeh, batun tinan ta atondrok lau ta bahun ma rinek (100) badu Rom. Iy ma hawe iri lau ta bahun tan badu rakum iri aloh lau ta bahun badu Itali.
Koniliyus ma hawe lowan oro badu Juwis bwe, arile iy ma hawe oro mara-ei ado asiu tan badeh, atudun Kindrei le ai. Iy badeh, edeu lakou i tiri lau lakou bwe, ma amekes salom i ta Kindrei na bolo len mari.
Eme na beyeh ari, mada an taloh badeh, iy amekes lele. Eme iy anyolom angelo ta Kindrei ari eme asahan hawen anya, “Koniliyus, ei!”
Eme Koniliyus anyolom ales i tan ma iy inoh, ma iy anya, “Laban tek, ou aso-ok sasah?” Eme angelo dah anya, “Kindrei ndrasumon salom tam ma iy ndranyolom sasah ou anyohan i tiri lau lakou bwe, ya balen bamani ou bwe.
Abo, ou suni rayah lau kala Jopa kakuhi ndramak ari udu aliy nyaran Saimon keme, iri ale aloh iy Pita.
Iy badeh, udu asiu ta liyen Saimon, ndramak ta asereh ku-i katin haka, ya asiu tan udu kabede ndras.”
Ano iy angelo nane asehek sahou i tan iu badeh, Koniliyus eme luhi uru lohowan tan ame ma hawe ndramak ari ta bahun. Iy ndramak ta bahun doh badeh, atehei budon tan handru in ta Kindrei. Ma iy badeh, ta lohowa Koniliyus na len mari.
Koniliyus eme sihidi sahou mari ta angelo nane asehek i tan, ano i toro, ano iy tiye oro ala Jopa.
Kon aleu, len ari ja, mada an udu le alih badeh, oro ma taloh ndradek ndrala mirihik ta san ili bolo kon tinan Jopa. Na len doh badeh, an nyarahan labai, Pita eme ili loken asiu ta Saimon ta akohok jor, ma iy anya kamekes salom kili ta Kindrei.
Eme Pita imeson handru en, ya eme iy aseken labai ta aimon nyamon. Ya nyamon oro lowosa kahis le badeh, lele asahan tan.
Eme iy anyolom kandrah asak ya lakou i buku none ra-ei kolau tinan suwin ma hahuw udu kandrah eme munyak.
Udu bolon badeh, iri katin haka randrah randrah, ma hawe iri sasah ta seselek badu bwele-e munyak, hawe iri sirih badu reu, ado bolo lakou nane doh.
Ano sahou ari aloh i tan anya, “Ou are loken, adai iri lakou doh, ma ou aimon.”
Eme Pita anya, “Laban, bwe, bwe handru en! Jo badeh, baimon se ari nyamon ko-ak i buku doh bwena bwe le!”
Eme Kindrei aloh san rasan ja anya, “Ou badeh, saloh anya iri lakou, Kindrei sikinei ko-ak ndra-au, ya ou saloh ko-ak udu aliy ja ai, ndri-iy.”
Kindrei aloh i san tulusin ano, suwi labai kolau dah iu i kandrah ja.
Pita lomondra moso iri lakou nane iy anyolom kahis le badeh, oro lau nane Koniliyus suni oro ame ndratakalahei asiu nane Pita udu aliy. Ya, eme oro are rasi are madasan are gwek.
Eme oro aloh ma ndremenya anya, “Saimon, iri aloh Pita udu aliy deh bwe?”
Pita lomondra ta lele kahis le badeh, Malawin Ndrabun tiye i tan anya, “Saimon ei, lau taloh takaleh ou.
Ou suri ou, ya ou au ala andri. Ou sanoh ta ala andri hawe oro. Oro badeh, jo suni oro.”
Eme Pita ili andri tiye i toro anya, “Ado asilah jo, jo asah idah. Ado ame dah luwa sah?”
Eme oro lau anya, “Aso dah ado hawe Koniliyus ndramak batun tiri lau ta bahun badu Rom ame dah. Iy badeh, ndramak mwasin handru ma iy badeh, inoh Kindrei labai, ma iy badeh, iri lau mari badu Isra-el aso-ok iy tinan labai. Angelo ndrabun badeh, tiye tan ta ou ala asiu tan, ya eme iy kanuhun sahou badu bohom.”
Ano Pita kuhi oro ala asiu hawen amadin. Eme kon aleu badeh, Pita i hawe oro ma hawe nadu tinen oro rayah badu Jopa ala hawe oro ma oro adek au ala.
Ano i bada len ari ja badeh, iy isos Sesariya. Ya Koniliyus badeh, abe-en oro kameh asahan na len doh. Eme iy luhi oro kawas tan, hawe lowan oro badu mirihik tan ala hawen.
Eme Pita ili bolo asiu le badeh, Koniliyus asumon iy, ano iy i andri na bwili ndru-un ta sekesek iy.
Arile, Pita tiye iy ere loken ma tiye anya, “Jo dah badeh, ndramak laleyah labai.”
Pita asehek sahou hawen ano iy i bolon badeh, anyolom iri lau solo-an labai.
Eme iy tiye i tiri i buku doh, “Ado badeh, tanan idoh badeh, ba-en hamon ta batanau malen bwe, ta ahi lau badu Juwis winiyan ba-en bolo aha bwe, ma ahi saselesen aha lau badu leheleh. Arile, Kindrei mene ndraleheyani ndrame tek, ta jo badeh, saloh ari ndramak ndra-in ta mada Kindrei.
Ya eme ado ala andrei jo eme dah, jo bandremenya ado ta aliy, bwe. Ya abo, sasah handru ado aseken?”
Eme Koniliyus anya, “Len hahuw mene ndra-au, na mada an taloh na beyeh badeh, jo udu asiu tek asolom. Nawin bwe badeh, ndramak ari asini awin belen nyikadin, ales udu bwena tek,
ma tiye eme tek i buku doh, ‘Kindrei badeh, ndranuhun salom tam ma hawe kandriyen mwasin tam, ta ou adeu lakou laleyah i tiri lau lakou bwe.
Ou suni ari ndramak kili Jopa kalelen ta ndramak ari nyaran Saimon Pita. Iy badeh, udu asiu ta liyen Saimon, ndramak ta asereh ku-i katin haka, udu kabede-e ndras.’
Eme jo suni oro awek suwi ta atou ou, ma mwasin handru ta ou ame. Ya abo, aso mari kada-ah are mada Kindrei ta anuhun sasah Laban tiye ewek tam ta asehek eme taso.”
Ano Pita asehek anya, “Kabwai, na dah jo ndranyolom handru ta Kindrei badeh, baseken ndramak rayah le bwe.
Arile, iy badeh, aseken lau mari badu kon munyak tinan labai, buku ndramak ari ari anoh iy, ma amekes kandriyen mwasin le.
Ya idah badeh, ado tanan sahou mene Kindrei tiye i tiri lau badu Isra-el, ta iri katiye sahou mwasin ta amekes mondrei i san ta Jises Krais, iy le ari, Laban ta lau mari.
Ado badeh, ndratanan sasah mene asahan bolo Judiya in hamon ta Jon ta alomwa atiye sahou ta iri lau kanyuwi iri. Lakou doh asahan udu Galili bwena.
Ma ado ndratanan i san mene Kindrei atehei nyosowan ta Malawin Ndrabun hawe boto-on ili ta Jises badu Nasaret. Ma hawe iy edek ili eme ta amekes lahou mwasin hawe amekes iri lau mene are le bahandra boto-on ta balik. Tasah, Kindrei badeh, udu hawen.
“Aso dah badeh, anyolom na mada aso amwenen, ta lakou mari iy amekes udu kon munyak tinan tiri Juwis ma hawe Jerusalem. Iri badeh, adai iy ma atahi iy imek i bada kei tondreh.
Arile, Kindrei suri iy ta imek tan udu hamon ta len taloh ma leheyani iy i mada iri lau solo-an anyolom iy.
Iri lau mari badeh, banyolom iy bwe, arile Kindrei lebelei le aso lau le mene anyolom iy, ma aimon nyamon ma a-un gwa hawen, udu hamon ta iy amak eme loken ta imek.
Iy badeh, batanau boto-on labai ta aso katiye sahou kili tiri lau mari ma katiye, iy le badeh, Kindrei atehei lahou i tan ta aleben sahou tiri lau ndramak bwena, ma hawe iri lau ma mulin kahis.
Iri propet badeh, tiye nyalan ale, buku none are lau atehei budon handru in tan badeh, karei ma lomondra ndra-in tan kameh, iy maniy i san ta nyaran.”
Pita asehek sahou doh kahis le badeh, Malawin Ndrabun eme bwele-e iri lau mari nane anuhun sahou dah.
Eme ma iri Juwis ta asan ku-i iri, atehei budon tiri in ta Jises, ado hawe Pita badeh, boho iri asak ta Malawin Ndrabun amou laleyah i tiri lau badu leheleh ale.
Tasah, oro anuhun iri badeh, asehek boho kon rakon labai ja, ma atudun Kindrei. Ano Pita anya,
“Are lau handru winiyan tawi oro lau doh, ta salomwa oro na gwa? Oro badeh, ndrakohok Malawin Ndrabun i le buku aso mene.”
Ya, eme iy tiye ta kalomwa oro na boto-on ta nyara Jises Krais. Ano oro tiye Pita udu hawe oro len sabe op.
Oro aposel hawe nadu tine oro badu loboho Judiya anuhun iri lau badu leheleh ale ndrandrei sahou ta Kindrei.
Ya, na len Pita ili Jerusalem badeh, oro lau mene atehei budon toro handru i ta Jises ado aliy. Oro ale atehei budon toro boto-on ta asan ku-i oro asehek iy anya,
“Ou badeh, ala bolo asiu tiri lau nane basan ku-i iri bwe, aimon nyamon hawe iri.”
Pita eme badeh, asehek amwenen i toro ta nyala sasah mene asahan tan i toro:
“Jo badeh, udu kon tinan Jopa asolom, eme lele asahan tek le badeh, jo anyolom lakou i buku none ra-ei kolau tinan suwin ma hahuw udu kandrah eme andri. Ya suwin badeh, ma hahuw eme andri batalak le dah.
Jo anyolom ili badan badeh, jo atou iri katin haka, randrah randrah, ma hawe iri lakou ta seselek badu bada munyak, iri ndriliu ma hawe iri sirih badu rewa kandrah.
Ano, jo anuhun aloh ari anya, ‘Pita, ou suri ou, ya ou adai rayah, ma ou aimon.’
“Eme jo anya, ‘Laban, bwe, bwe handru en! Jo badeh, baimon sese iri lakou ko-ak doh, bwe le.’
“Eme Kindrei aloh san rasan ja anya, ‘Ou badeh, saloh anya iri lakou Kindrei sikinei ko-ak ndra-au, ou saloh ko-ak udu aliy ja ai, ndri-iy.’
Kindrei badeh, aloh i san tulusin ano suwi labai kolau dah iu i kandrah ja.
“Ano, amwenen le na bolo len doh badeh, oro lau taloh, iri suni oro are Sesariya ame ales are rasi, boho asiu nane jo udu aliy dah.
Eme Malawin Ndrabun tiye tek badeh, ta jo sandrondro ta i hawe oro. Eme nadu tine oro ma onoh dah ame hawek ale, aso ala asiu ta ndramak doh.
Eme iy tiye taso ta nyala iy anyolom angelo asahan asiu tan ma tiye, ‘Ou suni oro kala Jopa kandrei ndramak ari nyaran Saimon Pita.
Iy kameh tiye sahou tam ma hawe oro lowam mari. Ma na sahou doh Kindrei kameh sebenei ado.’
“Ya jo asehek sahou i toro le badeh, Malawin Ndrabun eme la-u oro i buku none asahan eme la-u to ma mwena mene.
Ano jo lomondrani sasah Laban mene tiye i buku doh, ‘Jon badeh alomwa ado na gwa, arile ado kameh anyu ado na Malawin Ndrabun.’
Jo winiyan batebelese hawe Kindrei bwe, tasah iy edeu ndramas i tiri i le buku iy edeu eme tataha mene, kabatana to atehei budon tato handru in ta Laban Jises Krais.”
Eme oro anuhun badeh, oro basehek iy ja bwe, ma boho oro andru-uk ma oro atudun Kindrei i buku doh, “Handru labai, Kindrei badeh, anya kaseben iri lau badu leheleh ale ta iri winiyan tubuni kona iri ili tiri kandriyen ndra-in, ma kakohok manyah mwasin ta Kindrei ta winiyan bano bwe.”
Ya oro lau ta budon handru i ta Kindrei mene aseker ta iri mene adai Stiben badeh, iri rayah aseker ala kon munyak tinan Ponisiya, ma busu Saipres ma kon tinan Antiyok atiye sahou i tiri Juwis le.
Arile, oro lau rayah badeh, badu Sairini hawe badu Saipres ala Antiyok atiye sahou i tiri lau badu Grik ale ta nyala sahou mwasin nyala Laban Jises Krais.
Eme boto-on ta Laban badeh, udu la-u oro, eme lau solo-an badeh, atehei budon tiri handru ma tubuni ndrine iri ja i ta Laban.
Eme iri lau ta Kindrei badu Jerusalem anuhun nyala lahou doh badeh, ma iri suni Banabas ili Antiyok.
Ya eme na len iy isos badeh, iy sekesek tasah iy anyolom Kindrei atehei nyosowan i tiri, ma iy tiye iri mari kado handru le ta Laban na ndrine iri mari.
Iy badeh, ndramak mwasin idih na Malawin Ndrabun hawe budon handru. Ma iy aluwi iri lau solo-an a ta Laban.
Ano, Banabas ili takaleh Sol ili Tasus.
Eme iy ndruni iy badeh, iy kuhi iy eme Antiyok. Ya eme udu bolo jaha ari ma buruwen badeh, Banabas uru Sol atukum hawe iri lau ta budon handru ta Kindrei ma leheya iri lau solo-an. Oro lau ta Laban, iri lau aloh oro “Kristen” ma mwena badeh, udu Antiyok.
Udu bolo len doh badeh, iri propet rayah ale, ado Jerusalem ame andri, ame Antiyok.
Eme iy ari badu hawe oro badeh, nyaran Agabus, ales ere loken asehek sahou na boto-on ta Malawin Ndrabun anya, “Idah kameh, kon mari badu loboho tondrok ta Rom kameh nyamon bwe.” Idoh badeh, asahan na len Klodiyas atondrok kon).
Eme oro lau ta a-en hamon ta Jises tiye anya, idah kameh, oro ari ari kameh abudon ta oro winiyan adeu lakou ili ta aseben nadu tine oro rayah nane ado Judiya. Oro lau lakou toro solo-an badeh, adeu lakou solo-an ta aseben.
Oro amekes budon doh ano badeh, oro atehei luk i mine Banabas uru Sol, ma uru tiyani ili tiri lau ta Kindrei nane ado Jerusalem.
Na len doh badeh, kabin Herot ateu lau rayah badu hawe iri lau ta budon handru in ta Kindrei anya kidi oro kamak.
Iy badeh, tiye ndramak tan ari ta bahun ili mwetehei Jemis, nadu tine Jon, imek na samen gwak iri aloh bainat.
Eme iy anyolom, buku iri Juwis badeh, sekesek ta aliy, iy ili abwiyeh ta aseu Pita ale. Idoh badeh, udu bolo len ta nyamon tinan ta jabi ramen yis bala bolon bwe.
Iy tawi iy ano badeh, iy atehei Pita i bolo kou, i mine oro lau ma hahuw, badu bolo oro lau ma habuk ta bahun badeh, tondrokei iy. Oro ndrokei ta Pita badeh hahuw, hahuw ta bolo awa onoh onoh, ben ma len. Budon ta Herot badeh, anya iy keme lewan mada lau mari ta sahou, kudu hamon ta len ta Pasoba.
Ya eme iri atehei Pita udu bolo kou udu gwek, arile iri lau atehei budon tiri handru i ta Kindrei badeh, amekes salom boto-on tan, ili ta Kindrei.
Na ben ano kon kaleu doh badeh, Herot kameh edeu iy i ta sahou. Ya Pita badeh, amadin ndrokowa uru lau ta bahun ma la-uh. Sawei iy badeh, na sen ma la-uh. Ya, oro lau ta bahun rayah ja badeh, ado ta ndrokei ado madasan tinan, loboho manan.
Eme nawin bwe badeh, angelo ta Laban ari asahan, ma lomadan lomatani bolo kou dah. Iy tukuhi kabede Pita ma mete-ei iy amak anya, “Ou suri ou suwi!” Eme badeh, sen asoh laleyah bada bobwan tan.
Ano angelo tiye i tan anya, “Ou asini awin tam hawe ku-i katim kili.” Eme Pita mesekei i le buku aliy. Ano iy anya, “Ou atehei kolau tam ta bwele-em kili, ya ou an hamon tek.”
Ya eme Pita in hamon ta angelo dah eme manan ta bolo kou. Arile, iy badeh, bala tanan sasah angelo amekes doh bwe. Iy anya badeh, iy amekes lele.
Uru adek ame sakalawi ndramak ari ta ndrokei i hamon, ano uru ame sakalawi iy ari ja, ma uru ame asahan madasan amekes na hayen, madan i kon tinan. Eme madasan dah asak laleyah turu, ma uru ame manan. Uru adek san kakan lawe-en sese, ma se nawin bwe angelo doh amai iu laleyah.
Ano Pita baraseleyani ai, ta sasah nane asahan ma eme iy anya, “Jo ndratanan ndramwenen handru ai. Laban badeh, suni angelo tan eme sebenei jo ta bolo mine Herot boto-on, ma hawe ta mine iri Juwis mari anya kamekes keme badak.”
Eme iy anyolom tanan doh badeh, ma iy iu ili asiu ta Mariya tine Jon Mak. Iri lau solo-an badeh, atukum ala aliy asolom.
Eme Pita udu manan atukoh kou, ya eme lohowan badih ari nyaran Roda ili madasan anya katou are lau handru.
Eme iy anuhun nyaro bale Pita badeh, iy abasa, ma iy basulu-i kou bwe, ma iy sakaliye i hamon ja tiye anya, “Pita asah udu madasan kodo-oh!”
Eme iri anya, “Ou kede-eh budon tam ndra-au oh!” Bwai, iy asehek le ili anya, “Ado kanuhun jo. Ndrakan en! Iy asah udu manan kodo-oh.” Eme iri anya, “Sebwe, malawin eme ales nadeh.”
Arile, bwai, Pita atukoh kou udu le gwek, ya eme iri anya kasulu-i kou, oro atou iy. Eme mani iri atur handru.
Eme Pita atehei minen i loken amunum le ma iy tiye i toro kandru-uk, ma iy asehek i toro ta nyala Laban kuhi iy udu bolo kou eme len. Ano iy anya, “Ado badeh, kasehek nyala Jemis ma hawe oro nadu tine to oro rayah ja ta aliy. Ano ma iy ruwani oro, ya iy iu ili kon rakon ja.”
Eme ya na mandraben badeh, oro lau ta bahun lomondra solo-an ta aliy. Eme oro anya, “Sasah handru ndrasahan ta Pita doh?”
Ya eme Herot takaleh ili badeh, iy batakahei bwe, eme iy ndremenya oro lau ta ndrokei ma tiye ta kadai oro kamak. Udu hamon ta idoh badeh, Herot udu Judiya iu ili udu Sesariya winiya ben sabe.
Herot badeh, mene andra-i hawe iri lau badu kon Tair hawe Saidon; eme uru atukum ase asahan solo-an badeh, ta ala atou iy. Arile, ma mwena badeh, iri ala anyolom kawas tiri ari op, iy doh badeh, ndramak tinan ari ta asiu ta kabin, nyaran Blastus. Iri badeh, atamar iy, ta iy kati-i losen ta kabin Herot kimek ki-iu laleyah, tasah iri amwenen asih niri nyamon badeh, badu kon ta kabin Herot.
Eme na len ta Herot ndratiye, iy asini awin tan ta kabin, ma iy manyah udu bada koyeu asehek sahou i tiri lau.
Eme ya iri lau sarakau anya, “Idoh badeh, boho kindrei ari ai, asehek sahou doh, boho ndramak bwe!”
Eme nawin bwe, angelo ta Laban mesekei iy ibo sik ma atarah i andri, ma iri nadu un ani iy, ma iy imek, tasah iy batudun Kindrei bwe.
Arile, na bolo len doh badeh, sahou ta Laban asahan i tinan ma aseker ili bolo kon mara-ei, ma lau solo-an a-en hamon tan.
Ano, na bolo len doh ale gok ta amekes lahou ta Kindrei udu bolo Jerusalem badeh, Banabas uru Sol ndrabwidiy mari ndrano, eme ma, uru kuhi Jon Mak i hawe uru ili hamon ili Antiyok.
Udu bolo iri lau atehei budon tiri handru in ta Kindrei badu Antiyok badeh, iri propet rayah, ma hawe iri lau ta leheya rayah ale ado aliy. Nyara oro badeh, Banabas, Simiyon iri aloh iy Nijer, Lusiyus badu Sairini, hawe Mana-en iy mene asahan kawas ta kabin Herot na len iy atondrok kon, ma hawe Sol.
Ya eme oro atudun Laban hawe abeles oro ta nyamon ili badeh, ma Malawin Ndrabun anya, “Ado katehei Banabas uru Sol badeh, kare len ta amekes lahou tek mene jo aloh uru kamekes.”
Ya oro abeles oro ta nyamon ma salom ano, oro adeu lim i la-u uru, ano suni uru ma la-uh au.
Eme Malawin Ndrabun suni uru lau ma la-uh doh au ala andri ala kon Selusiya, akohok ndron, ma alakak au ala busu Saipres.
Uru ala asos kon Salamis badeh, oro asehek sahou ta nyala Kindrei udu ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis. Ya Jon udu hawe uru, buku ta aseben uru.
Oro badeh, adek awudi busu udu ranah ili taku ranah, ma oro asos kon iri aloh Papos. Eme udu loboho doh badeh, oro ndruni ndramak ari badu Juwis, iy tan balik udu aliy, ma iy wasai iri lau anya, iy propet, nyaran Bajises. I boho Grik badeh, iri aloh iy Elimas, moson, iy ndramak ta balahak. Iy badeh, kawas ta Sejiyus Polus ndramak ta atondrok busu doh. Ma Sejiyus badeh, tanan tan ili labai. Eme iy tiye Banabas uru Sol ame, tasah iy anya kanuhun sahou ta Kindrei. Arile, Elimas badeh, tebelese hawe Sol uru Banabas, tasah iy anya kamekes Sejiyus satehei budon tan handru sala ta Jises.
<range>
<range>
