Arile, nyara Sol ari ja badeh, Pol, iy idih na boto-on ta Malawin Ndrabun, anyolom boto-on i ta Elimas, ma iy tiye i tan anya,
“Ou badeh, nadu balik amwenen, ma ou badeh, baseken kandriyen mwasin mari bwe! Ou adah labai na kandriyen ta wasai ta balik. Ya, ma saba len kameh ou aruwe ta tobolowe sahou handru ta Laban kasahan wasai?
Na le dah kameh, boto-on ta Laban kameh edeu maha-an ewek la-um, ya idah kameh, ou winiyan banyolom kon bwe, winiya le len ta aliy barasahan.” Eme na le liliy badeh, Elimas atona lakou bokodon eme tubuluhi madan ilik, ma iy sokorokar lau ta sariye iy na lim.
Eme ndramak ta atondrok busu anyolom badeh, ma bohon asak ta leheya turu ta nyala Jises, ma iy atehei budon tan handru i ta Laban.
Eme Pol hawe uru lau badu hawen ruwani Papos, ya oro alakak au ala kon Pega. Pega doh udu bolo kon munyak tinan Pampiliya. Udu doh badeh, Jon ruwani uru ma iy iu i hamon ili Jerusalem.
Ano Banabas uru Sol ado Pega ala Antiyok, kon udu loboho Pisidiya. Eme na len ta amunyau, uru ala ndrahu atukum tiri Juwis, ma uru manyah ado aliy.
Udu hamon ta iri anuhun sahou aloh badu bolo batanau malen, hawe boho iri propet ano badeh, iri lau ta atondrok ndrahu atukum, suni sahou i turu anya, “Nadu tine ahi, i buku none ah sahou ta batanau ahi badeh, ah kasehek ai.”
Eme Pol ales udu loken edeu minen i loken amunum le ma anya, “Ado lau badu Isra-el, hawe ado lau badu leheleh, ado ta atudun Kindrei, ado kanuhun bohok!
Kindrei tiri lau badu Isra-el badeh, tiye tama taha iri ma mesekei iri asahan tinan labai, udu bolo len mene iri manyah ado Ijip, ano na le boto-on ta Kindrei, iy andrei iri ado bolo kon Ijip ame len.
Ma na bolo jaha hanoh (40) badeh, iy bwese maha-an ta kandriyen tiri ado kon lomale an.
Kindrei badeh, tikahei oro kon tinan ma ndro taloh ado munyak Kenan au, ma iy atehei munyak toro i tiri lau tan amwenen.
Iri lakou doh asahan udu bolo jaha ma hanek lomonoh (450). “Ano udu hamon ta idoh badeh, Kindrei atehei tiri, iri batun ta atondrok iri eme eme taku, ta Samuwel asahan propet tiri.
Ano iri aseken tiri ari kabin, ya eme iy atehei Sol asahan kabin tiri. Iy badeh, nadu Kis, asahan ta lundriye Benjamin. Iy atondrok kon badeh, jaha ma hanoh (40).
Eme Kindrei bwidi Sol ano ta kabin, iy atehei Debit i kabin tiri. Eme iy tiye i buku doh ta nyalan, ‘Jo badeh, ndrasilahei nadu Jesi ari, nyaran Debit, ndramak adek handru in tan labai, iy kameh winiyan in hamon ta sasah jo aseken iy ta amekes.’
Edek ta lundriyen kameh, Kindrei atehei ndramak ari ta seben iri Isra-el, nyaran Jises. I buku mene iy ndratandrakan ta aliy.
Jises basahan bwe le badeh, Jon tiye sahou i tiri lau badu Isra-el katubuni ndrine iri ta kandriyen ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in, ma kalomwa iri.
Ya eme suniya lahou ta Jon anya kano badeh, iy anya, ‘Ya, ado anya jo are lau handru? Jo badeh, iy bwe! Arile, are lau iy in hamon tek eme kameh, jo ndramak mwasin bwe, ta talou ku-i katin iu bwe!’
“Ya ado nadu tine, lundriye Abraham hawe ado lau badu leheleh ala an hamon ta Kindrei. Sahou ta nyala seben badeh, ndrame tataha.
Iri lau badu Jerusalem, ma hawe lau ta atondrok iri badeh, maliye seben tiri Jises, Kindrei nane suni iy eme ta aseben taha, bwe. Iri babudon sahou tiri propet, iri anuhun na bolo len ta amunyau mari bamwenen bwe. Eme ma iri tiye iy kimek. Ya, ta sahou doh, iri amekes sahou mene tiri propet asehek asahan handru.
Iri badeh, winiyan basilahei ari kati lakou ta amekes imek i badan bwe, eme ma, iri ndremenya Pailat kidi iy kimek.
Ano, udu hamon ta iri amekes sasah i tan, i buku none iri propet mene asehek, eme iri kuhi iy udu bada kei tondreh eme andri ma atehei iy i lek amekes na bek.
Arile, Kindrei suri iy udu lek amak eme loken ja.
Ma udu bolo len solo-an badeh, oro lau mene ta adek hawen ado Galili ili Jerusalem anyolom iy. Oro badeh, anyolom iy na mada oro amwenen, ma iri asehek sahou tan ili tiri lau badu Isra-el ai.
“Eme aso asehek nyala sahou mwasin dah ewek taha: Sasah mene Kindrei tandrakan i ta tubu taha iri badeh,
iy ndramesekei ndrasahan handru, ndrame tato nadu oro, i san ta iy suri Jises amak eme loken ja ta imek tan. I buku none ndratorowenei mene udu bolo wari la-uh ta Buk Wari tiye i buku doh: ‘Ou badeh naduk handru. Na dah jo ndrasahan tamam kabwe.’
“Eme Kindrei suri iy eme loken ta imek ja, ma iy winiyan bamak ma babola ja bwe. Sahou doh handru, eme ma Kindrei tiye i buku doh: ‘Jo kameh edeu ewek taha iri nyosowan turuwen mene jo tandrakan Debit ta aliy. Idoh kameh asahan handru buku jo ndratiye.’
“Ma, buk ndrabun ndrasehek udu bolo sahou rayah ja anya: ‘Ou kameh winiyan baruwani ndramak ndrabun tam bala bolo sisi-in bolo-an ta imek bwai.’
“Ya Debit mene amekes lahou ta Kindrei; ano iy imek ma ahi iy udu ka-u tubun oro, ma badan ndrabola ndra-au.
Arile, iy ndramak ala Kindrei suri iy eme loken ta imek tan badeh, babola bwe.
Eme ma, aha nadu tine, jo badeh, anya aha ki tana aha, i san ta Jises, Kindrei winiyan mani kandriyen ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in. Sahou dah badeh, aso asehek ndrawek taha. Na iy le badeh, are lau atehei budon handru in tan winiyan bala bolo maha-an ta kandriyen ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in mari bwe. Ya, na iy le, Kindrei winiyan aloh ari ndramak mwasin labai ta madan. Iri batanau malen mari ta Moses badeh, winiyan basebenei ou bwe, ma iri winiyan babwidi ou bala mwasin ta madan bwe le.
<range>
Aha badeh, katondrok aha kudu mwasin, ta sasah iri propet mene ndrasehek, sasahan bada aha. Iri asehek i buku doh:
‘Aha kanyolom, aha lau ta tebelese! Lahou laba tinan tek doh, jo kameh amekes udu bolo ndrokowa aha, arile sebwe aha baso-ok ta anuhun sahou doh bwe, ma aha winiyan batehei budon taha ba-en ta aliy bwe. Aha badeh, anya kasondrokonya, eme ma lakou tado le kameh mani ado atur, ma ado akohok maha-an laba tinan ta aliy.’”
Ya eme Pol uru Banabas anya kame len ta ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis badeh, iri lau ndremenya uru badeh, kame hamon ja na len ta amunyau ari ja, kasehek nyala iri ma sola.
Eme ma, iri lau au, arile iri Juwis hawe iri lau badu leheleh mene ndra-en hamon ta kandriyen tiri Juwis badeh, a-en hamon ta Pol uru Banabas. Uru aposel ame batanau iri i buku doh, “Aha badeh, kabadok ta bolo manyah mwasin ma tikisiy nane Kindrei ndratehei ndrame tataha.”
Ano, na len ta amunyau ari ja badeh, mirihik iri lau mari badu bolo kon tinan mari ame anuhun sahou ta Laban.
Eme iri Juwis anyolom iri lau solo-an labai ame badeh, ma mada iri alikis ma bwidi iri asehek sahou ndra-in labai i bada sahou ta Pol nane asehek.
Arile, Pol uru Banabas asehek sahou nyarahan labai i tiri anya, “Aru badeh, kasehek sahou ta Kindrei ki taha Juwis bwena op. Arile, aha badeh, baseken bwe, ma sahou taha badeh, leheya i buku, aha kameh winiyan bakohok manyah mwasin ta Kindrei ta udu le buku doh bwai. Eme ma aru kameh ruwani aha kon dah areu, ya, aru kameh ala aseben iri lau badu kon leheleh ai.
Tasah, idoh badeh, sahou ta Kindrei batanau aru ta aliy, i buku doh: ‘Jo badeh, atehei ou i buku sun anya lomada iri lau badu leheleh, ma ou ki nyara bohok kaseben iri lau badu bolo munyak mari.’”
Eme na len doh iri lau badu leheleh anuhun sahou doh badeh, iri sekesek ma atudun sahou ta Laban. Eme oro lau le Kindrei ndralebelei oro ta akohok koha oro ta udu le buku doh badeh, atehei budon toro handru i ta Kindrei.
Eme ya sahou ta Laban badeh, aseker udu loboho kon doh.
Arile, iri Juwis ala badeh, sosokei oro lau ta bwena ta kon tinan nane doh, ma hawe sosokei oro badih rayah tinan ta budon. Eme ma budon toro andra-i ta anya kadai Pol uru Banabas ma mesekei uru au ta loboho doh.
Eme uru atoroh kasu ndren ta bada kati uru iu ta leheya budon turu i tiri, ma uru ruwani Antiyok ma au ala Ikoniyum.
Ma iri lau atehei budon tiri handru in ta Laban ado Antiyok badeh, adah na sekesek ma na Malawin Ndrabun.
Udu kon Ikoniyum badeh, Pol uru Banabas ala ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis i buku none uru ndramekes ndra-au ndra-au. Eme uru asehek sahou nyarahan labai, eme iri lau solo-an badu Juwis, hawe iri lau badu leheleh atehei budon tiri handru ihis.
Arile, oro Juwis rayah batehei budon toro handru bwe badeh, sosokok budon tiri lau badu leheleh andra-i i bada iri lau ta Laban.
Eme Pol uru Banabas are gwek luluwen sese, asehek sahou boto-on ta Laban. Eme Laban leheya sahou ta tikisiy tan, uru asehek i handru i san ta iy edeu boto-on i turu ta amekes kalem ma lahou tinan.
Ma eme iri lau badu bolo kon tinan doh, apou iri i lumuk; iri rayah badeh, a-en hamon ta budon tiri Juwis, ya iri rayah badeh, a-en hamon ta budon tiri aposel.
Ano, iri Juwis hawe iri lau badu leheleh ala atilik sahou hawe iri lau ta bwena tiri anya, kadai uru ma anya korou uru na bek.
Arile, uru takalahei tanan tiri doh, ma eme uru atobwak au ala kon tinan Listra hawe Debi, udu kon tinan Likoniya, ma hawe uru ala loboho kon munyak doh ale.
Eme uru atiye sahou mwasin ta nyala Kindrei ili tiri mwan ma badih udu loboho idoh.
Eme udu Listra badeh, ndramak ari tinen atehei iy eme len badeh, katin imek. Iy badeh, badek bwe ma iy manyah udu le andri.
Eme iy atehei ndranyen i ta Pol asehek sahou. Eme Pol anyolom amwenen i tan badeh, iy anyolom budon tan handru udu aliy ta iy winiyan asahan amwenen ja.
Ya eme Pol aloh, “Ou ales na katim are loken!” Eme ma ndramak dah sandroh eme loke ma iy edek ja.
Eme iri lau anyolom sasah nane Pol amekes badeh, ma iri aloh i boho kon Likoniya anya, “Iri kindrei badeh, ndrasahan ndrame awas hawe taha!”
Eme iri aloh Banabas badeh, Sus ya Pol badeh, iri aloh iy Hermes tasah iy ndramak tinan ta asehek sahou.
Ya pris ari ta kindrei Sus, asiu tan ta atudun badeh, udu manan mirihik ta madasan ta kon tinan. Iy kuhi iri bulumakau hawe kanyeu ili madasan ta asiu ta atudun. Tasah, iy ma hawe iri lau anya kamekes salom kili ta Banabas uru Pol.
Eme Banabas uru Pol anuhun le badeh, uru tarani awin ta la-u uru iu ma uru sakaliye ala bolo iri lau dah aloh anya,
“Ado lau, ado anya kamekes lakou badeh, ta sasah? Aru dah badeh, ndramak laleyah i buku le ado badeh. Aru dah badeh, atiye nyala ado ta sahou mwasin ta ado badeh, katubuni ndrine ado ta lakou ndra-in laleyah i buku badeh, ki ta Kindrei kohan handru udu aliy. Iy le adeh mesekei munyak ma kandrah, ndras ma hawe lakou mari udu bolon.
Bwena ndra-au mene iy alelei iri lau mara-ei badu kon munyak adek na seken tiri.
Arile, iy badeh, leheya mwasin tan eme lewan ta sasah iy amekes: Iy badeh leheya laban tan i san ta iy edeu ur undruk udu kandrah eme andri ma iy badeh, isan len ta nyamon uni ma akohok; ma iy edeu nado nyamon solo-an solo-an ma iy mesekei ndrine ado idih na sekesek.”
Buku, sahou doh uru asehek ai, arile boto-on labai, ta uru satobohei iri. Iri anya kasun salom i turu le ai.
Ano iri Juwis rayah badu Antiyok, ma badu Ikoniyum ame andresei iri anuhun boho oro. Eme iri orowei Pol na bek, ma anya deh, iy ndramak, ma aluwi iy eme manan ta kon tinan.
Arile, udu hamon ta iri lau atehei budon tiri handru in ta Kindrei awudi iy, ano badeh, iy suri iy eme loken edek iu ili hamon ja ili kon tinan. Ano len ari ja badeh, Pol uru Banabas au ala kon Debi.
Uru asehek sahou udu bolo kon tinan doh badeh, ma aluwi iri lau solo-an labai atehei budon tiri handru i ta Kindrei. Ano uru ala hamon ala Listra, ano ala Ikoniyum ma ala Antiyok.
Oro ala badeh, batanau iri lau ta budon handru badeh, kabadok ta tanan handru ta bolo budon handru tiri. Eme uru anya, “Taha kameh bwese maha-an solo-an solo-an, ano taha barala baha tondrok ta Kindrei.”
Ano Pol uru Banabas atehei lau mwasin kasahan batun ta atondrok iri lau ta Kindrei badu kon rakon rakon. Eme iri abeles iri ta aimon nyamon, ma amekes salom i toro ma atehei oro a mine Laban ta lahou iri atehei i kani oro ta amekes.
Ya udu hamon ta uru ala loboho Pisidiya, badeh, uru ame bolo kon munyak tinan Pampiliya.
Ya eme uru atiye sahou mwasin i tiri lau ado kon tinan Pega, ano uru ala andri ala kon tinan Ataliya.
Ano udu kon Ataliya badeh, uru alakak ala hamon ala Antiyok. Kon tinan doh mene iri lau ta Kindrei suni uru ala a len, ta amekes lahou mene i kani uru i san ta tikisiy ta Kindrei. Uru ndramesekei lahou turu ndrano, ma uru ame hamon ame Antiyok ja.
Eme uru ala asos Antiyok badeh, uru nyuruwini iri lau ta Kindrei atukum, ma tiye i tiri ta lahou mari Kindrei ndramesekei na mine uru, ma i buku sah Kindrei ndrasihi san ndra tiri lau badu leheleh ta budon handru.
Eme uru ado hawe iri lau ta hamon ta Kindrei luluwen handru ado gwek.
Oro lau rayah ado Judiya badeh, ame andri kon Antiyok, ma eme oro leheya iri lau ta budon handru anya, “Ado badeh, winiyan bado mwasin bwe, i buku none ado basan ku-i ado bwe. Idoh badeh, in hamon ta batanau ta Moses tiye.”
Sahou doh le badeh, mesekei Pol uru Banabas andres boto-on boto-on ma hawe asehek sahou nyarahan labai i toro. Ya eme iri lebelei Pol uru Banabas ma hawe lau rayah ta budon handru ala hawe uru, ya oro ala Jerusalem, ala atou oro lau ta a-en hamon ta Jises, hawe iri batun tiri lau ta budon handru, ta lelen iri ta tanan doh.
Ya eme iri lau ta Kindrei badeh, suni uru au. Ya udu bolo tekedek turu badeh, uru ala bolo kon Ponisiya ma bolo kon Samariya asehek nyala iri ta iri lau badu leheleh badeh, ndratubuni ndrine iri ta kandriyen ndra-in. Eme sahou mwasin doh badeh mesekei iri lau ta budon handru sekesek laba tinan labai.
Eme, na len uru ame Jerusalem badeh, iri lau ta Kindrei ma hawe iri aposel ma hawe iri batun tiri lau ta Kindrei sekesek handru turu ame hawe iri. Eme uru asehek i tiri ta nyala iri lakou mari Kindrei ndramesekei na mine uru.
Ano oro lau rayah ta budon handru, badu hawe oro lau Parasi ales are loken tiye anya, “Iri lau badu leheleh badeh, ka-en hamon ta batanau ta Moses, ya kasan ku-i iri.”
Eme iri aposel hawe iri batun tiri lau ta Kindrei atukum ase badeh, anyolom bolo budon nane doh.
Eme hamon ta oro andres luluwen badeh, Pita eme ales ere loken tiye anya, “Ado nadu tine, ado badeh, mene ndratanan ta jo dah mene ndra mwena ndra-au, Kindrei lebelei jo udu bolo ado eme len ta atiye sahou mwasin i tiri lau badu leheleh ta iri kanuhun ma katehei budon handru ki ta Kindrei.
Eme ya Kindrei badeh, tanan ndrine iri ma leheyani iy aseken iri i san ta iy atehei Malawin Ndrabun i tiri, i buku none iy amekes eme tato mene.
Iy badeh, bamesekei iri bala randrah ja tato bwe; iy badeh, sikine ndrine iri amwenen i san ta budon handru tiri le.
Eme ya, i buku sah ado anya kanone Kindrei ma anya kadeu maha-an ki la-u iri lau ta budon handru? Idoh badeh, iri tubu taha hawe to winiyan babwese-ei bwe ale.
Bwe, handru en! Taha badeh, atehei budon handru bala san doh bwe. Idoh badeh, i san ta tikisiy ta Laban Jises le, ta koha taha kameh udu le buku doh, i le buku none oro.”
Eme iri lau mari badeh, andru-uk ado le anuhun Banabas uru Pol asehek sahou ta nyala kalem ma lahou tinan mene Kindrei amekes udu ndrokowa iri lau badu leheleh na mine uru.
Sahou turu ano le badeh, Jemis asehek sahou anya, “Ado nadu tine kanuhun jo.
Saimon mene ndrasehek ndraleu ndrame ta taha, ta ma mwena Kindrei leheya tikisiy tan i tiri lau badu leheleh. Ma iy le kuhi oro lau badu bolo iri eme len, ma asahan lau tan amwenen.
Eme ya sahou tiri propet amwenen le ta aliy, torowenei i buku doh:
‘Laban anya, “Len hamon eme, jo kameh eme hamon ja ta atudun kandriyen ha-un udu bolo lundriye Debit oro. Oro badeh, ndrandra-i i buku ra-em asiu ndra malen ma irou udu andri. Arile, jo kameh tutuni asiu doh ja, ma asahan ha-un mara-ei ja.
Idoh kameh asahan ta iri lau rayah ja kameh katakaleh jo, ma iri lau badu leheleh mari mene, jo aloh oro ame asahan lau tek.” Laban mene asehek i buku doh.
Ya eme Laban amekes lakou mari dah, mene lau ndratanan ndra bwena ndra-au ndra-au.’”
Eme Jemis asehek sahou ili le i buku doh, “Jo budon tek badeh, i buku doh: To badeh, samekes sabadok labai sala tiri lau badu leheleh, iri ala ndratubuni ndrine iri ndra ta Kindrei.
Arile, to atorou ki toro ma katandra-un toro saimon nyamon iri ndratehei ndra mine kindrei ta wendreya, iri amekes na sukumada kei; oro samekes kandriyen ndra-in ta karei; oro saimon oda iri lakou buku me ma bulumakau ndra udu ta aliy, ma sa-un ndraye iri ale.
Tasah, ndra bwena labai eme taku len dah, iri atiye sahou ta Moses mene torowenei udu bolo buk tan, ma udu bolo kon mari iri kandriyen malen ta batanau doh, ndrabwena labai udu aliy, ma udu bolo len mari ta tukum badeh, iri asehek ma aloh udu bolo asiu ta atukum tiri Juwis mara-ei. Eme ma iri tanan, buku iri lakou mara-ei doh, ndrabun handru.”
Ano iri aposel hawe iri batun tiri lau ta budon handru hawe iri lau ta Kindrei mari amekes budon ta kaleben oro rayah badu bolo iri, ya kasuni oro kala Antiyok hawe Pol uru Banabas. Eme iri lebelei Judas aloh Barsabas ma hawe Sailas. Uru ma la-uh doh badeh, batun badu bolo iri lau ta Kindrei.
Eme iri atehei la-ukei dah i mine uru ili: “Ya eme aso aposel hawe aso batun ta lau ta budon handru tiye sahou sekesek taso ewek taha nadu tine aso badu leheleh ta budon handru badu Antiyok, Siriya ma hawe Silisiya.
“Aso ndranuhun lau rayah badu hawe aso ndrawek bolo aha. Aso badeu ari budon bala toro bwe, arile oro ndrawek ndrabwidi budon taha ndrandra-i na sahou oro asehek.
Ya eme aso badeh, ndra le se ja, ma aso ndralebelei oro nadu tine aso rayah, ma ndrasuni oro ndrawek hawe nadu tine aso, Banabas uru Pol.
Uru lau doh badeh, ndratehei koha uru ndra ta imek ta nyara Laban tataha Jises Krais.
Ya eme aso suni Judas uru Sailas awek, kasehek na boho uru amwenen, nyala aha ta sasah udu bolo la-ukei, aso atorou.
Ya, budon ta Malawin Ndrabun hawe budon taso i le se, ta aso satu aha sala bolo iri batanau mari tiri Juwis. Mwasin ta aha a-en hamon ta iri batanau le doh:
Aha saimon nyamon ala ndrala ta salom tiri kindrei nane iri asehek na sukumada kei, ma aha saimon oda iri lakou buku me ma bulumakau ndra udu ta aliy, ma hawe sa-un ndraye iri, ma hawe aha samekes kandriyen ndra-in ta karei. Buku none aha kateleya aha tiri lakou doh, idah kameh aha ado mwasin. Kabwai.”
Eme oro lau nane suni oro au ala andri ala Antiyok, ya eme oro nyuruwini iri lau ta Kindrei mari ame le se, ma adeu la-ukei i mine iri.
Eme iri anyolom bolo la-ukei, ma iri sekesek ta sahou mwasin ta amekes iri kabadok.
Ya eme Judas uru Sailas badeh, propet ale, eme uru asehek sahou nyarahan labai, ta amekes iri nadu tine uru kabadok ale.
Ano udu hamon ja, nadu tinen iri badeh, suni oro au ma nyosowan ta bahun bwe, au ala hamon ala hawe oro lau mene suni oro ame.
<range>
Arile, Pol uru Banabas ado Antiyok ado gwek, ya uru ma hawe iri lau solo-an leheya iri, ma atiye sahou ta Laban.
Ano udu sese, Pol tiye i ta Banabas i buku doh, “Talu ka-au kala hamon kaselesen nadu tine talu iri mene udu bolo kon tinan mari mene ta atiye sahou ta Laban ili aliy, ta kala kanyolom iri ado mwasin deh bwe.”
Eme ya Banabas aseken Jon aloh iy Mak kili hawe uru.
Arile, Pol anya, idoh budon mwasin ta iy kili hawe uru bwe, tasah iy badeh, ndraruwani uru ma gok oro anya kamekes na len oro ala atiye sahou ili Pampiliya.
Eme uru andres ili, ma uru aseker. Eme Banabas kuhi Mak i hawen ma uru alakak au ala Saipres.
Ya Pol kuhi Sailas i hawen ma nadu tine uru i san ta Laban atehei nyosowan i bwele-e uru ma ndremenya Kindrei ta iy katehei tikisiy tan ki bwele-e uru, eme ma uru au.
Ya, uru ala bolo kon munyak tinan Siriya ma hawe Silisiya asehek sahou, ta amekes iri lau ta Kindrei kabadok.
Eme Pol edek ili isos Debi ano iy ili Listra. Eme udu kon doh badeh, ndramak ari ta budon handru manyah udu aliy nyaran Timoti. Tinen badu Juwis ma budon tan handru ndra ta Jises, arile taman badu Grik.
Iri lau ta Kindrei badu Listra ma Ikoniyum mara-ei badeh, masiye Timoti.
Eme Pol anya kakohok iy ki hawen, ya uru kadek. Eme Pol sani ku-in, tasah iy abudon loboho doh badeh, ndrahu iri Juwis, ya iri tanan tama Timoti badeh, badu Grik.
Ya eme oro adek ala bolo kon tinan rakon ala rakon badeh, tiye tanan i tiri lau ta budon handru ta batanau oro aposel hawe oro batun tiri lau ta Kindrei ndrasehek ta aliy, udu Jerusalem nyala iri lau, ma iri ka-en hamon ta aliy.
Ma iri lau ta Kindrei abadok ta budon handru tiri ma len mari badeh, kane iri edek i sola.
Eme Pol hawe oro lau badu hawen, adek ala loboho kon munyak tinan Prijiya hawe Galesiya. Oro badeh, batiye sahou bala bolo kon tinan badu Esiya bwe. Tasah, Malawin Ndrabun badeh, tiye oro sala.
Eme, na len oro ame asahan bada kobek ta kon Misiya badeh, oro anya kanone kala kon Bitiniya katiye sahou, arile Malawin Ndrabun ta Jises baseken bwe ale.
Ya eme oro sakalawi kon Misiya ma adek ala andri ala kon tinan Trowas.
Eme na ben badeh, lele asahan ta Pol ma iy anyolom ndramak ari badu kon Masadoniya ales indrek iy anya, “Ou ame Masadoniya, ma aseben aso.”
Eme ya Pol anyolom lele doh ano le badeh, aso alokou aso i le rasan, ta aso kala Masadoniya. Tasah, aso tanan Kindrei badeh, aloh aso kala katiye sahou mwasin ki tiri.
Eme aso an ndron are Trowas, alakak ame len ma ales ame busu Samotres. Ano len ari ja, aso asahan Niyapolis.
Ya eme udu doh badeh, aso adek ala lokei ala Pilipai. Kon doh badeh, kon ari tinan labai udu bolo kon munyak tinan Masadoniya, ya iri Rom atondrok kon doh. Eme aso ado doh len sabe sese.
Eme na len ta amunyau badeh, aso ame manan ta madasan tinan ta kon tinan ame kapa gwa anya katakaleh ndrahune kon ta asolom. Ya eme aso manyah ado andri ma asehek sahou i tiri badih atukum ame loboho doh.
Eme udu bolo iri badih nane anuhun sahou doh badeh, badih ari nyaran Lidiya udu aliy. Iy badeh, lahou tan ta asih kolau saraman iri amekes awin moroyan na aliy. Iy badu kon tinan Tayataira, ma iy atehei budon tan mara-ei i ta atudun Kindrei. Eme Laban mesekei ndrinen badeh, aseken labai ta anuhun sahou ta Pol asehek.
Eme iy hawe lowan oro mara-ei badeh, alomwa oro, ya eme iy kuhi aso ala asiu tan. Ma eme iy tiye i taso ma indrek aso anya, “I buku none ado lomondra jo badih ta budon handru i ta Laban eh, ado kame kado asiu tek.”
Na len ari aso anya kala ndrahune kon ta salom badeh, badih lohowan ari malawin ndra-in udu la-un eme bada aso. Iy winiyan tiye sasah kameh asahan udu bwena eme. Iy badeh, ndrakohok luk solo-an solo-an ndra-au ndra tiri lau ta atondrok iy i san ta sehek sasah asahan udu bwena.
Iy doh badeh, edek in hamon ta Pol hawe aso marakon, ma iy aloh anya, “Oro lau dah ala tiye sahou ta koha ado kameh udu le buku doh, badeh, oro lohowan ta Kindrei ere bwele-e kindrei mari badu loken.”
Eme iy amekes lahou tan doh badeh, len solo-an labai. Ya eme Pol eme ndrinen isi ta aliy, eme iy tubuni iy ma tiye sahou i ta malawin ndra-in anya, “I san ta boto-on ta nyara Jises, jo tiye ou ame len ta la-u badih badeh!” Eme na le liliy, malawin ndra-in udu bwele-en eme len.
Eme oro lau tan nane atanan ta san ta akohok toro luk badeh, ndrano, oro ame tawi Pol uru Sailas, ya seheyani uru ame lohalak ndrahu kon ta anuhun sahou, ame mada iri lau ta atondrok kon.
Eme oro kuhi uru ame mada iri lau ta anuhun sahou ma tiye anya, “Uru lau dah badeh, badu Juwis, ya uru amekes nono-ou udu bolo kon tinan tataha.
Uru badeh, leheya kandriyen bamwenen ta kandriyen tataha bwe; taha badeh, lau badu Rom, ya kandriyen doh taha banone ma winiyan bamekes bwe.”
Eme iri lau arou ala la-u Pol uru Sailas ala adai uru, ya eme iri lau ta anuhun ame tiye iri tarani awin ta la-u uru ma a-um uru na malou sakabuk i bek.
Iri ubwi uru andra-i labai, ano iri akahei uru ala bolo kou. Eme iri tiye ndramak ta ndrokei ta bolo kou katehei ndrabek kihis ma katondrok uru kamwenen.
Iy anuhun sahou iri tandra-un i tan ano badeh, iy atehei uru ala bolo asiu udu bolon handru, ma sawei kati uru ma totowaniy i bolo sabar.
Eme i ndrukulu ben alih badeh, uru asolom ma ayah wari ta atudun Kindrei. Ya eme iri lau rayah are bolo kou i buku uru badeh, anuhun uru ayah wari.
Eme nawin bwe, kon totoreh ma sali asiu nane dah nyukunyok. Eme madasan mari ta bolo kou dah asak, ma kati iri lau mari udu bolo sabar dah asoh.
Ya eme ndramak ta ndrokei atondrok iri, amak anyolom kou mari asak badeh, iy anya iri are bolo kou ndratobwak. Eme iy andrei samen ta anya kidi iy le badeh,
Pol aloh anya, “Ou sadai ou! Aso ba-au bwe, aso mari ado kada-ah!”
Eme ndramak ta ndrokei dah tanyarei ta sun ma sakaliye ili taku ma totoreh udu mada Pol uru Sailas.
Ano iy kuhi uru ame manan, ma eme iy lelen uru anya, “Ah ma la-uh, jo kamekes sasah handru ya jo kakohok kohak handru ta udu le buku doh?”
Eme uru anya, “Ou atehei budon tam handru ki ta Laban, idah kameh koham udu le buku doh ma hawe lowam oro.”
Ano, uru asehek sahou ta nyala Laban i tan ma i tiri lau nane are bolo asiu tan doh.
Eme na le liliy na ben doh, ndramak ta ndrokei doh kuhi uru ma sikine ndrana turu; ano na le liliy, iy ma hawe lowan oro alomwa oro a gwa.
Ano iy andrei uru ala asiu tan mesekei nyamon i nuru. Ma oro lowan mari badeh, sekesek tinan handru, tasah oro badeh, ndratehei budon toro handru ndra-en ta Kindrei.
Eme kon aleu, iri lau ta anuhun sahou tiye sahou i toro lau ta mwena tiri lulik ala tiye ta ndramak ta atondrok, katiye iri lau doh ka-au ai.
Eme iy tiye sahou i ta Pol uru Sailas anya, “Iri lau ta anuhun sahou anya ah ka-au ai. Abo, ah ka-au ma mwasin.”
Arile, Pol eme tiye i tiri lau ta mwena tiri lulik anya, “Aru badeh, lau badu baha tondrok ma kandriyen ta Rom. Ya, i buku sah oro lau ta anuhun sahou doh bwale oro ma banuhun sahou taru bwe. Aru bamekes se ari lakou bandra-i bwe, arile iri ame adai aru udu mada lau mari. Ano oro akahei aru laleyah ame bolo kou dah. Ya, na dah oro anya katone aru ka-au ai? Winiyan bwe, handru en! Oro le kame katiye aru ka-au.”
Eme iri lau ta mwena tiri lulik ala hamon tiye i tiri lau ta anuhun sahou, ta Pol uru Sailas badeh, ndra sali kon Rom eme ma iri abwerei iri.
Eme iri ame tiye sahou ta tikisiy i turu ma eme iri tiyani uru ame len ta bolo kou ma tiye uru ka-au ta kon tinan.
Eme uru ala asiu ta Lidiya, batanau iri lau nane atehei budon tiri handru in ta Jises, ma iri kabadok, ano ma uru au ai.
Uru adek ame bolo kon Ampipolis hawe kon Apoloniya ma ame asos kon tinan Tesalonaika. Ya udu kon doh badeh, ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis udu aliy.
Eme i buku none kandriyen ta Pol, iy ndramekes ndra-au, ndra-au badeh, iy ili ndrahune tukum. Eme na len taloh ta len ta amunyau ja badeh, iy andres hawe iri ta sahou badu bolo tarou ta Kindrei.
Ma, na tarou ta Kindrei le doh iy asehek aleu i tiri, ta Krais, iy mene bwese sisi-in, ma iy amak ta imek eme loken. Eme Pol anya, “Iy Jises nane jo asehek iy i tado dah, iy Krais.”
Eme iri Juwis rayah badeh, atehei budon tiri handru in ta sahou ta Pol uru Sailas; ma hawe iri lau solo-an badu Grik ta atudun Kindrei ma hawe iri badih ta mwena solo-an ale.
Arile, mada iri Juwis alikis, ya eme iri tukumwi iri lau rayah, budon tiri ndra-in udu bolo ba-en tiye iri ta amekes losen udu bolo kon tinan. Eme iri abotatahan ala asiu ta Jesen takaleh Pol uru Sailas anya kateu uru kame mada iri lau mari.
Arile, iri batakalahei uru bwe, eme iri seheyani Jesen hawe oro lau rayah ta Kindrei ame ales are mada iri lau mwena ma aloh anya, “Oro lau ala amekes losen udu bolo kon munyak mari, Jesen luhi oro ala asiu tan asah idah. Oro mari badeh, aluwi budon tiri lau eme len tiri batanau ta kabin badu Rom Sisa, ma tiye i tiri ta nyala kabin ari ja aloh Jises.”
<range>
Eme iri anuhun sahou doh ano badeh, iri lau tinan ma hawe iri lau nane are bolo kon tinan doh badeh, toroyani iri ma anyon labai.
Eme iri lau tinan ta atondrok iri badeh, mesekei Jesen hawe oro lau nane seheyani oro dah, akunoh iri, ano ma tiye oro au.
Ano kon ilik le badeh, oro lau ta Kindrei suni Pol uru Sailas au ala kon Beriya. Uru ala asahan badeh, uru ala ndrahu atukum tiri Juwis.
Ya eme iri lau badu doh badeh, budon tiri aleu labai ja tiri lau badu Tesalonaika. Tasah, iri badeh, atehei ndranye iri ta anuhun sahou tinan labai, ma na len mari mada iri udu ta tarou anya kanyolom Pol asehek sahou handru deh wasai.
Eme iri Juwis solo-an atehei budon tiri handru i ta Kindrei ma hawe iri badih rayah ta mwena badu Grik ma hawe iri mwan solo-an badu Grik ale atehei budon tiri handru.
Eme na len iri Juwis badu Tesalonaika anuhun Pol atiye sahou ta nyala Kindrei udu Beriya badeh, eme iri ala doh ale amekes ndrine iri lau atukum doh towodau.
Eme na le liliy nadu tine Pol oro ame badeh, suni iy ili mada ndras. Arile, Sailas uru Timoti are Beriya are gwek.
Eme oro lau ala hawe Pol badeh, tiyani iy ili isos Atens, ano oro ame hamon ma tuwi sahou ta tiye i ta Sailas uru Timoti, ta uru kame hawen, suwi suwi.
Na len Pol udu Atens abe-en Sailas uru Timoti, ndrinen isi handru ta kon tinan doh idih na iri sukumada kei, iri amekes solo-an labai.
Ya eme Pol ili bolo asiu ta atukum andres hawe oro Juwis ma hawe iri lau badu Grik ala atudun Kindrei. Ma hawe udu mada lau mari na len mari udu ndrahu tukum ta lau.
Eme oro lau rayah aloh oro Epikuriya ma hawe oro lau aloh oro Stowik ame andres hawe Pol. Oro rayah asehek anya, “Iy ndramak doh ta amou gwa laleyah, anya kasehek nyala sasah kede-eh?” Ya oro rayah anya, “Iy kede-eh asehek nyala iri kindrei rayah badu leheleh nadeh?” Oro asehek i buku doh, tasah Pol nane asehek sahou mwasin ta nyala Jises ndramak ta amak ta imek eme loken.
Ya eme oro lau rayah tiye Pol ili atou oro lau ta atondrok kandriyen tiri ado kon ta ndrahu tukum aloh Areyapakus. Ma oro tiye i ta Pol i buku doh, “Aso anya kanuhun ma katanan ta tanan ha-un ou asehek badeh.
Ou badeh, atiye tanan rayah i randrah labai ta ndranye ahi ma ahi anya kanuhun moson ta aliy i buku sah handru.”
(Eme iri lau mari badu kon Atens ma hawe lau badu leheleh manyah ado doh, na len mari badeh, bamekes se ari lahou bwe. Iri badeh, asehek nyala tanan doh ma anuhun tanan ha-un doh.)
Ano Pol ales udu loken ta ndrahu tukum tiri aloh Areyapakus doh, ma tiye anya, “Ado lau badu Atens! Jo anyolom ta bolo lahou tado mari, ado lau ta atudun iri kindrei solo-an.
Tasah, jo edek bolo kon tinan tado anyolom ndrahune aha ta atudun badeh, jo anyolom tarou ari udu bada koto-ok ta atudun, tiye i buku doh: ‘Ta Kindrei, Ahi Maliye Iy.’ Ya Kindrei ado maliye iy badeh, jo kameh asehek nyala ado na len dah.
“Iy Kindrei nane ta amekes munyak ma kandrah ma lakou mari udu bolon. Iy badeh, Laban ta atondrok munyak ma kandrah. Ya iy bamanyah bado bolo asiu ta atudun amekes na lim bwe.
Ma iy bandriliu ta se lakou badu mine lau katiye ki tan bwe. Tasah, iy le badeh, iy kati ndramak ta edeu koha taha, ma hawe sasah, sasah ja i ta lau mari.
Iy bwidi lau mari asahan badeh, in hamon ta ndramak ari le, ma iy weleyani iri lau mari manyah ado kon rakon rakon udu bolo kon munyak. Ma iy le amwenen sani len ta kon iri manyah ado aliy, ma iy atehei iri kobek ta aliy.
Kindrei amekes san doh badeh, ta lau kala katakaleh iy, i buku none bale iri kabwetenei. Tasah, iy badeh, udu le bakep hawe taha ari ari.
Ma, na iy le badeh, taha ado mulin ma adek ala doh, ala doh ma to asahan awas dah. I le buku none lau ta asehek kundruh tado ndrasehek ndra-au anya, ‘Taha badeh, nadun labai.’
“Ya eme i buku doh, taha badeh, nadu Kindrei ya eme taha satehei budon anya Kindrei kede-eh i buku none ari sukumada kei ndramak asehek na lim, deh, i buku bek nyikilikin gol deh, i buku none bek laleyah bwe.
Len bwena mene, Kindrei anyolom lau badeh, bala tanan iy bwe, ya iy batiye iri ta lakou iri amekes laleyah bwe. Arile, na len dah ja, iy batanau lau mari badu heh, badu heh badeh, katubuni ndrine iri.
Tasah, iy ndrasani len ta iy kameh aleben lau badu kon munyak mari, na ndramak ari mwasin labai iy ndratehei lahou dah ndra minen. Iy badeh ndraleheyani lakou doh ndrasahan handru ndrame len mada lau mari i san ta iy suni iy amak ta imek tan eme loken.”
Eme na len iri anuhun Pol asehek nyala amak eme loken ta imek badeh, iri lau rayah ja badeh, bobose iy. Arile, iri rayah anya, “Ahi anya kanuhun sahou ou nane asehek badeh, ja.”
Eme ma iy ruwani iri ma iy iu.
Eme iri lau sabe le badeh, atehei budon tiri handru ma iri an hamon ta Pol. Ya udu bolo iri nane doh badeh, Diyonisiyus ale. Iy badeh, tinan ari badu bolo iri lau rayah aloh Areyapakus ma hawe badih ari nyaran Damaris hawe iri lau rayah ja ale.
Ano Pol ruwani kon Atens ma iy iu ili Korin.
Iy udu Korin udu gwek badeh, iy ndruni ndramak ari badu Juwis nyaran Akwila, ya tinen atehei iy eme len udu kon munyak tinan Pontus. Iy hawe udun Prisila uru barado Itali barame ai. Tasah, Sisa Klodiyas tiye sahou boto-on i tiri Juwis ado kon tinan Rom badeh, ka-au.
Eme Pol edek ili selesen uru ma iy udu hawe uru amekes lahou ta asereh asiu balei, tasah lahou turu doh badeh i se buku lahou tan amwenen.
Na len ta amunyau mari badeh, iy ili ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis badeh, anya kaliu budon tiri Juwis hawe iri lau badu Grik.
Eme na len Timoti uru Sailas ado Masadoniya ame badeh, Pol eme ruwani lahou tan ta asereh asiu balei, ma atehei budon tan ihis labai ta atiye sahou i tiri Juwis ta Jises badeh, iy Krais handru, ndramak Kindrei atehei iy ta akohok iri lau tan ame hamon.
Eme iri Juwis abolosen i tan ma bobose iy badeh, iy turuhi awin tan i mada iri ma asehek i tiri i buku doh, “I buku imek asahan tado, ado sato-en ai. Lahou tek ndrano. Kabwai, udu kabatana dah kameh, jo kameh iu ili bolo iri lau badu leheleh ai.”
Ano Pol udu ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis eme len badeh, iy iu ili asiu ari udu mirihik le, ili hawe Titiyus Jastus. Iy badu Juwis bwe, arile iy badeh, ta atudun Kindrei.
Eme ndramak ta mwena ta atondrok ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis nyaran Krisipus ma lau mari badu asiu tan badeh, atehei budon toro handru i ta Laban; ma hawe iri lau solo-an badu Korin anuhun sahou Pol asehek badeh, ma iri atehei budon tiri handru i ta Laban ma Pol alomwa iri.
Eme na ben ari badeh, Laban asehek sahou i ta Pol i san ta ameh i buku doh: “Ou sanoh, ndri-iy, ma ou sandru-uk ta asehek sahou ale. Ou asehek sahou kili.
Tasah, jo kameh udu hawem, ya ari ndramak winiyan batawi ou ma winiyan bamekes isi bawek badam bwe. Tasah, iri lau tek solo-an labai are bolo kon tinan dah.”
Ya eme Pol udu hawe iri andrei jaha ari ranah, leheya iri na sahou ta Kindrei.
Na len iri lau atondrok Rom atehei Galiyo asahan kabin ta kon tinan Akaya, eme iri Juwis atukum ase tawi Pol ma aruwi iy ili ales ere mada sahou.
Eme iri anya, “Iy ndramak dah badeh, ndraluwi budon tiri lau ta atudun Kindrei i san ta kandriyen randrah labai ja, ya idoh bamwenen ta kandriyen malen bwe.”
Eme Pol anya kasehek sahou le badeh, Galiyo asehek sahou i tiri Juwis anya, “I buku none kandriyen ndra-in rayah iy mesekei badeh, mwasin ta jo kanuhun ado Juwis ai.
Arile, idah badeh, andres ta ndremenya ado hawe nyara ado ma andres ta bolo kandriyen malen tado. Ya eme ado kasehek ta aliy kudu ndrokowa ado le. Jo winiyan banuhun hawe baleben ta aliy bwai.”
Eme iy tiye oro au ta are mada sahou.
Eme iri Korin tawi tinan ta atondrok ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis nyaran Sostenes ma adai iy udu mirihik ta mada sahou. Arile, Galiyo batehei budon bala ta aliy bwe.
Eme Pol udu Korin udu gwek luwen sese. Ano iy ruwani nadu tinen oro ado gwek, ya iy ili kon Senkriya anya kalakak kala Siriya, ma Prisila uru Akwila a hawen ale. Iy ba-au bwe le badeh, iy udu Senkriya asiki batun iu tasah tandrakan tan mene ndrano.
Oro ala asos Epesus, eme iy ruwani Prisila uru Akwila ado gwek. Iy le ari badeh, ili ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis andres ta sahou hawe iri.
Eme iri lelen iy ta iy kudu hawe iri luluwen sese kudu gwek, arile iy bwalen.
Arile, iy anya ki-iu badeh, iy tandrakan i toro anya, “I buku none Kindrei aseken, badeh kameh, jo eme hamon ja.” Ano iy alakak udu Epesus iu ai.
Na len iy isos Sesariya badeh, iy i loke ili Jerusalem sekesek iri lau ta Kindrei. Ano iy iu ili andri ili Antiyok.
Ano, hamon ta iy udu Antiyok sese, Pol udu doh edek ili rakon ili rakon udu bolo kon munyak tinan Galesiya ma Prijiya batanau iri lau ta budon handru kabadok.
Udu bolo len doh, ndramak ari badu Juwis nyaran Apolos, ya atehei iy eme len udu Aleksandriya eme kon Epesus. Iy badeh, tanan tan ndrala labai, ma iy tanan bolo sahou ta Kindrei mwasin labai.
Iy badeh, tanan labai ta san ta Laban ma abe-ei iy asehek sahou ta nyala Jises ndra mwasin le. Arile, iy badeh, tanan le lahou ta Jon ta alomwa.
Eme iy asehek sahou nyarahan nyarahan udu ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis. Eme Prisila uru anuhun iy badeh, uru kuhi iy eme asiu turu ma leheya iy amwenen na bolo sahou ta Kindrei le gwek.
Na len Apolos anya kili Akaya badeh, nadu tinen oro ta Kindrei rayah amekes ndrinen abadok ta ili, ma oro atorou la-ukei ili toro lau ta hamon ta Jises kabe-en iy. Eme Apolos asahan badeh, ma iy ndramak mwasin ta aseben oro are mene asahan lau ta budon handru i san ta tikisiy ta Kindrei.
Eme iy bwidi andres i hawe iri Juwis udu mada lau mari na buk ndrabun, ma iy leheya i mada iri ta nyala Jises badeh, iy Krais handru, ndramak Kindrei ndratehei iy ta akohok iri lau tan ame hamon.
Apolos udu Korin udu gwek ya Pol badeh, andrei san udu bolo kon loken doh eme asahan Epesus. Udu loboho doh badeh, iy ndruni iri lau rayah iri atehei budon tiri handru in ta Kindrei,
ma eme iy ndremenya oro anya, “Na len ado atehei budon handru tado i ta Kindrei, Malawin Ndrabun ewek la-u ado deh bwe?” Eme oro tiye i hamon anya, “Bwe, aso badeh, banuhun se ari lakou i buku Malawin Ndrabun badeh, bwe.”
Ya eme Pol lelen oro ja anya, “Ya alomwa ado badeh, na alomwa tare?” Eme oro anya, “Alomwa aso badeh, na alomwa ta Jon.”
Eme Pol anya, “Alomwa ta Jon amekes badeh, ta i buku none ou tubuni ndrinem ta kandriyen ndra-in tam. Eme iy tiye i tiri lau badeh, katehei budon tiri handru ki-in ta ndramak ari in kona Jon eme. Iy badeh, Jises.”
Oro anuhun sahou doh ano badeh, ma alomwa oro na nyara Laban Jises.
Eme na len Pol edeu limen i la-u oro badeh, ma Malawin Ndrabun eme la-u oro, ma oro asehek boho kon rakon ja, randrah labai ma asehek sahou i buku iri propet.
Oro lau doh badeh, ma ronoh la-uh.
Udu bolo bun taloh badeh, Pol ili ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis asehek sahou nyarahan labai, ma andres boto-on ta aliu budon tiri ta nyala bolo tondrok ta Kindrei.
Arile, iri rayah badeh, ndrine iri boto-on labai, ma batehei budon tiri bala ta Kindrei bwe, ma iri asehek sahou ndra-in i bada bolo San ta Laban udu ndranye iri lau mari. Ya eme Pol ruwani iri ado gwek ai. Eme iy kuhi oro lau ta budon handru nane dah ala bolo asiu ta leheya ta Tiranus, ma iy udu hawe oro na len mari, ta leheya oro.
Pol amekes gok doh winiya jaha la-uh buruwen. Eme ma iri mwan ma badih solo-an labai badu loboho kon tinan Esiya doh anuhun sahou mwasin ta Laban, iri badu Juwis, ma iri badu iri kon leheleh ale.
Eme Kindrei leheya kalem randrah labai edek bada Pol.
Eme ma nyandroh ta Pol, buku iri andrei ili hawe iri lau ta sik, eme sik tiri ano ma iri malawin ndra-in atobwak tiri.
Eme iri Juwis rayah adek ala anya katikah iri malawin ndra-in ado la-u iri lau ka-au na boto-on ta nyara Laban Jises. Eme iri badeh, tiye i buku doh, “I san ta nyara Jises i buku none Pol asehek, jo tiye ou ame len.”
Oro lau nane amekes lakou doh badeh, oro ma ndro taloh, oro badeh, nadu tinan tiri pris ari badu Juwis nyaran Skeba.
Arile, na len ari, iri amekes lahou toro badeh, ma malawin ndra-in tiye i toro anya, “Jises hawe Pol badeh, jo tanan uru ai, ya ado, are lau bah?”
Eme ndramak nane malawin ndra-in udu la-un dah sandroh i la-u oro ribidi oro ma tarani awin toro ma ubwi oro andra-i labai. Eme oro atobwak ado asiu ame len, ma ndraye oro, hawe awin toro atarah iu.
Eme na len iri Juwis ma hawe iri lau badu Grik manyah ado Epesus anuhun badeh, iri anoh. Ma eme nyara Laban Jises badeh, bare andri bwai, nyaran i loke le gwek ai.
Eme iri lau ta budon handru mene ame tiye sahou ta tikisiy udu mada lau mari ta sasah ndra-in iri ndramekes.
Eme oro lau rayah boto-on ta balik mene udu toro ta amekes balahak, atukum iri buk ma lakou toro i se udu mada lau mari ma atehei jih i ta aliy. Oro andromwei sowan nane asahan buku (K150,000) iri winiyan bandromwei bwe.
Eme i san le doh badeh, sahou ta Laban aseker ma i tinan, ma amekes iri lau tan abadok le gwek.
Ano udu hamon ta lahou mari doh asahan badeh, Pol amekes budon tan ta anya kili Jerusalem. Iy kameh edek ili bolo kon Masadoniya ma Akaya. Eme iy anya, “Jo ili oro kon doh ano, udu hamon ta aliy badeh, jo kili kaselesen Rom ale.”
Eme ma, iy suni uru lau ta aseben iy, Timoti uru Erastus ala Masadoniya. Iy le badeh, udu kon munyak tinan Esiya udu gwek luluwen sese.
Na len doh badeh, tine losen asahan i bada San ta Laban.
Eme udu loboho doh ale, ndramak ari ta amekes iri lakou na hayen hawe silba nyaran Demitiriyus. Iy amekes silba nyolom tan badeh, i buku asiu ta atudun kindrei badih ari nyaran Atemis. Iy ma hawe lau solo-an akohok luk solo-an labai tiri lau ta lahou doh.
Eme iy luhi iri lau ta lahou tan ma hawe iri lau amekes lahou i le buku iy, ame, ma iy tiye i tiri i buku doh, “Ado lau mari ado ndratou ai, to mari badeh, akohok luk solo-an eme tato, ta lakou to amekes dah.
Iy lau Pol kede-eh, iy ndraluwi iri mwan ma badih solo-an. Iy ndrabolowani budon tiri, i buku ado ndranyolom ma ndranuhun. Ma iy bamekes kandriyen doh bado kon tinan Epesus dah le, bwe. Mirihik andrei loboho kon tinan Esiya ale. Iy asehek buku iri kindrei, lau amekes na lim, idoh kindrei handru bwe.
Ya idoh kameh atehei bohosak eme ta lahou tato ta aliu luk nyaran kameh andra-i. Ya idoh le bwe, idah kameh, ma atehei bohosak i ta asiu ta atudun kindrei Atemis ari moson bwe. Ma idah kameh, lomada kindrei badih tiri lau mari badu Esiya ma hawe munyak mari ta atudun kameh atokos.”
Eme iri anuhun sahou doh badeh, ma bwidi ndrine iri ibolosen ma iri sarakau anya, “Atemis kindrei badu Epesus badeh, iy le ai!”
Eme se nawin bwe, lau mari badu bolo kon tinan mari sarakau. Eme iri tawi uru lau ta Pol ma la-uh. Gayus uru Aristakus, uru badu Masadoniya, ya iri seheyani uru ala lohalak ndrahu tukum ta lau mari.
Pol badeh, anya kili mada iri lau mari, arile iri lau ta Kindrei badeh, balelei iy bwe.
Ma hawe iri batun rayah badu kon doh, hawe iri kawas tan suni sahou i tan, ta iy badeh, sala ndrahu tukum ta mada lau mari.
Iri lau mari badeh, anyon. Iri rayah badeh, sarakau i randrah labai, ya iri rayah i randrah labai. Ya iri lau solo-an bala tanan ta katin ta iri ala doh bwe.
Eme iri Juwis andrekei Aleksandra ili udu mwena tiri ma iri rayah sarakau, ta iy ki-in hamon ta boho iri. Eme ma iy tiye iri mari kandru-uk, ya iy kamekes sahou ta aseben iri lau.
Arile, udu ja iri atanan iy badeh, badu Juwis, eme iri sarakau i le buku bwena nane anya, “Atemis kindrei badu Epesus badeh, iy le ai.” Iri sarakau ili winiya awa la-uh.
Eme ndramak ta atorou lakou badu kon tinan tiye iri andru-uk, ano iy anya, “Aha lau badu Epesus, iri lau badu kon munyak mari tana iri ta kon tinan Epesus badeh, ta atondrok asiu ta atudun kindrei badih Atemis hawe sukumada hayen mene taku udu kandrah eme andri.
Iri lakou doh handru ya ari lau winiyan babisiniy bwe. Ya ado kandru-uk ma ado samekes lakou ta bobo-ap.
Ya ado ndraluwi uru lau kede-eh ame dah, uru babene-ei ari lakou badu bolo asiu ta tudun ta Atemis bwe, ma uru badeh, batiye sahou ndra-in bala ta kindrei tato bwe oh.
Ya i buku none Demitiriyus hawe oro lau ta lahou tan, toro budon ndra-in udu tare lau badeh, len ta amekes sahou udu aliy, ma iri lau ta atondrok are aliy. Oro winiyan tiye ndramak ta ari lakou ndra-in iy ndramesekei.
I buku none, ado ari budon ta asehek, badeh, kedek ki-in hamon ta batanau ma kandriyen tataha mari.
Ado kanuhun kamwenen! Tasah, idah kameh, to ndrare bohosak, ta to kameh are ta mada sahou ta gabman tinan tasah ta losen, to amekes dah. To ari madasan bwai, ta sasah to amekes dah, ma to ari kati sahou mwasin bwe le.” Sahou tan ano badeh, iy tiye iri aseker au ai.
Udu hamon ta sarakau tiri ano badeh, Pol suni sahou i toro lau atehei budon toro handru in ta Kindrei ame. Ya eme iy batanau oro. Ano ma iy edek iu ili Masadoniya.
Iy edek loboho doh badeh, iy asehek sahou ta batanau iri lau ili ili, ma iy isos kon munyak tinan tiri Grik.
Eme iy udu kon tiri Grik doh udu gwek winiya bun taloh. Eme iy alokou iy ta anya kalakak kili Siriya, arile iy anuhun yoyou, ta iri Juwis badeh, atilik nyala iri ta kadi iy. Ma eme iy bala bwai, iy ili hamon ili Masadoniya.
Ya oro lau a hawen badeh, nadu Pirus nyaran Sopater badu kon Beriya, Aristakus hawe Sekundus badu kon Tesalonaika, ya Gayus badu kon Debi, ma hawe Timoti, Titikus ma hawe Tropimus badu kon munyak Esiya.
Oro lau doh badeh, ala bwena ala Trowas abe-en aso.
Arile, aso badeh, alakak ado Pilipai ala badeh, udu hamon ta nyamon tinan ta jabi ramen yis bolon bwe. Aso alakak na len limeh, ano aso asos Trowas hawe oro. Eme aso ado gwek len ndro taloh.
Ano na len ma mwena ta wik ari ja badeh, aso atukum ame le se ta abo-os jabi ramen. Tasah, Pol badeh, anya ki-iu na len bi-i, ya iy asehek sahou ili tiri lau ili, ili asahan ndrukulu ben.
Sun solo-an badeh, udu bolo asiu loken nane aso atukum areu aliy doh. Ya lawe ta asiu loken doh i buku asiu tolo-em, ra-em udu bwele-e ra-em.
Eme ya ndramak loweu ari nyaran Yutikus manyah udu mada kadam. Iy anuhun Pol asehek sahou ili, ili, ya madan ndrundrun ili, ili, ma iy amadin tuk ili, ano ma iy taku udu loken eme andri. Eme iri anya kasuri iy badeh, iy ndramak.
Pol eme andri badeh, akabah i la-u ndramak loweu dah ma tawi iy. Eme iy anya, “Bale ado sasin iy. Kohan udu aliy!”
Ano iy ili bolo asiu loken abo-os jabi ramen ma aimon ai. Iy asehek sahou ili winiya boho len, ano iy iu.
Eme iri lau andrei iy ndramak loweu dah iu i kon ma mulin le, ma iri batikisiy ja bwe.
Aso badeh, a ndron alakak ales amwenen ala kon Asos. Aso ala badeh, ta asowe Pol. Iy amekes san doh, tasah iy badeh, edek na kati ilih aliy.
Eme iy eme isos bada aso udu Asos badeh, aso suni iy ma aso au ala Mitileni.
Ano i bada len ari ja badeh, aso alakak ala asos Kiyos. Ano na len ari ja badeh, aso alakak ala bilisiu ala Samos, ma na len ari ja badeh, aso asos Miletus.
Eme Pol atehei budon ta aso kasakalawi Epesus ta teleya aso badeh, sare loboho munyak tinan badu Esiya sado luluwen. Tasah, iy ibotatahan ta ili isos Jerusalem na len tinan ta Pentikos.
Eme Pol udu Miletus badeh, suni sahou i tiri batun tiri lau ta budon handru in ta Kindrei badu Epesus kame katou iy.
Eme iri asahan badeh, iy tiye i toro i buku doh, “Ado badeh, ndratanan bolo manyah tek ma mwena handru kabatana jo eme udu hawe ado eme eme taku len dah, udu loboho kon tinan badu Esiya.
San solo-an iri Juwis atilik sahou ta anya kanone jo ta bolo lahou jo amekes, eme ma, kandriyen tiri doh bwidi ndrinek maha-an labai, ma jo eden ta aliy san solo-an. Arile, i buku iri atehei nyarak i andri, jo babudon ta aliy bwe, jo amekes le lahou ta Laban.
Ado badeh, tanan jo babisiniy ta atiye sahou ta aseben ado se bwe. Arile, jo badeh, asehek udu mada ado mari ma hawe jo ili asiu ra-em i ra-em.
Jo badeh, asehek i ndranye iri Juwis hawe iri lau badu Grik katubuni ndrine iri ta kandriyen ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in tiri, ya katehei budon tiri handru ki ta Laban tataha Jises.
“Ya na dah jo in hamon ta boho Malawin Ndrabun, jo kameh ili Jerusalem. Ya jo bala tanan ta sasah katok badak udu doh bwe.
Jo le badeh, tanan ta Malawin Ndrabun ndrabatanau jo ta i buku jo ili bolo kon tinan mari, idah kameh, maha-an hawe a bolo kou udu aliy abe-en jo.
Arile, jo badeh, balek basin ta kohak bwe. Jo le badeh aseken ta jo kisos bilisiu ta bolo sakaliye tek, ma kamesekei kano lahou Laban Jises ndratehei kanik. Lahou doh ta atiye sahou mwasin ta nyala tikisiy ta Kindrei, ma ta leheya eme lewan.
“Ya, jo mene edek ewek bolo ado atiye sahou ta nyala tondrok ta Kindrei. Arile, na dah jo tanan idah kameh, ado winiyan banyolom jo ja bwe.
Ya eme na dah jo katiye tado kamwenen, ki buku none ado ari kamak, jo winiyan babwese maha-an ta aliy bwe.
Tasah, jo badeh, babisiniy ta tiye seken mari ta Kindrei ewek tado bwe.
Ado badeh, katondrok ado kamwenen, ma hawe katondrok lau ta Kindrei mene Malawin Ndrabun atehei iri ado baha tondrok tado. Ado badeh, a buku lau ta atondrok sipsip, ado katondrok iri lau ta budon handru ta Kindrei, ala iy mene konohei iri na ndraye nadun amwenen.
Ya aha katondrok iri kamwenen, tasah hamon kameh jo ruwani aha, idah kameh lau solo-an ndra-in ame bolo aha ta tobolowe budon hawe manyah taha. Ya kandriyen tiri kameh i buku iri mwi badu lokei ame atikah iri nadu sipsip.
Ma na len eme kameh, lau rayah badu bolo ado badeh, kameh tebeya wasai ta aliu iri mwan ma badih ame len ta budon handru, ma ta iri ka-en hamon toro.
Ya eme mada ado badeh, kaleu! Ado badeh, ndratanan, na jaha taloh mene jo ndrabatanau ado na ben na len ta aliy. Jo batanau ado ma wa-i madak amou ta tikisiy.
“Ya eme ta sendrehendreh ta aliy, na dah jo edeu ado ala baha tondrok ta Kindrei, ma jo aseken ado abudon sahou ta nyala tikisiy tan. Ya sahou doh kameh winiyan mesekei ado abadok, ma winiyan amekes kandriyen tado ki mwasin winiya ado akohok manyah mwasin, Kindrei ndralebelei ndra ta lau tan.
Jo badeh, bawasai ta akohok ra-ei kolau tado ma hawe bakohok ari silba hawe bek nyikilikin bwe.
Aha amwenen ndratanan jo badeh, ibo gok ma asilah luk ta atondrok jo hawe oro lau are hawek.
Ma udu bolo lahou tek mari, jo ndraleheya aha ta san ta kandriyen ta amekes gok boto-on, aha kaseben iri lau nyamu iri bwe. Ma taha kabudon sahou mene Jises asehek i buku doh, ‘Are ndramak, iy edeu lakou ili tare lau, iy badeh, sekesek tinan handru. Ma sekesek ta iy ndramak nane akohok lakou winiyan basakalawi sekesek ta iy ndramak nane aseben iy bwe.’”
Sahou ta Pol ano le badeh, iy atehei bwili ndru-un i andri hawe iri mari, ta adeu salom ma wurah i ta Kindrei.
Iri marakon tawi iy, ma iri aden, iri tikisi iy tinan labai, ma iri bwale iri iy iu.
Iri badeh, tikisiy tinan labai ta iri sahou nane iy asehek tiri anya, iri kameh winiyan banyolom madan ja bwe. Eme ma iri tiyani iy ili isos bolo ndron.
Aso adeu wurah ili tiri lau badu Epesus, ma anya, “Aha ndrado ai.” Aso alakak amwenen ala busu ari, iri aloh Kos. Ano, na len ari ja badeh, aso are Kos alakak ala busu Rodes. Aso alakak are busu Rodes au ala asahan kon tinan Patara.
Aso ruwani ndron nane aso au aliy ereu ai, aso anuhun ndron ra-ei kameh anya ki-iu kili Ponisiya. Eme ma aso sandroh ala bolo ndron nane doh ja, ere Patara ma alakak au ai.
Ahi alakak au ala bolo ndras laleyah, eme ma ahi anyolom busu Saipres udu loboho mine ahi kamweu. Eme ahi alakak ala, ala winiya le ahi asahan kon munyak tinan Siriya. Ma ndron doh ili Tair ta akeh sanuw ale.
Aso ala kon doh, ma ndruni oro lau ta Jises rayah, ma aso are hawe oro are gwek, winiya len ma ndro taloh. Udu bolo len doh badeh, boto-on ta Malawin Ndrabun tiye sahou randra ili tiri. Eme ma iri tiye sahou nane doh ili ta Pol i buku doh, “Ou sala kon tinan Jerusalem labai, bwe kameh iri kadai ou amak.”
Arile, len ma ndro taloh taso are hawe oro badeh, ndrano ai, eme ma aso ka-au kala hamon kala ndron ja. Eme ma oro lau marakon ta Jises nane, ma udu oro hawe nadu oro, tiyani aso ala babi. Eme ma ahi mari atehei bwili ndru-u ahi i bada on, ma asolom ili ta Kindrei.
Aso ateu lim hawe oro, ano aso sandroh ala bolo ndron. Eme ma oro adek au ala hamon ala ndrahune oro ja.
Eme ma ndron nane aso an bolon alakak are Tair ales ili kon tinan Tolomes. Eme aso ndruni oro lau ta Jises rayah ja are loboho doh, ma ateu lim hawe oro. Ma aso are hawe oro len ari le.
Na len ari ja badeh, ahi alakak are Tolomes ala kon tinan Sesariya. Udu loboho doh, badeh aso ala asahan asiu ta lau ta Jises ari nyaran Pilip, ma aso amadin hawen. Iy ta atiye sahou ta Jises na len mari, ma iy badu hawe oro lau ma ndro taloh mene iri lau ta Kindrei hawe oro aposel badu Jerusalem atehei oro ta aseben iri lau ta Kindrei.
Ma Pilip badeh, nadun oro ma hahuw ndra badih le. Oro ndra tinan ndra bihin, arile oro batasou bwe le, ma Malawin Mwasin ta Kindrei badeh, udu hawe oro badih nane doh, eme ma len rayah oro winiyan atiye sahou nane Kindrei edeu ili toro i buku propet.
Len sabe aso are hawe Pilip, eme ma propet ari nyaran Agabus udu Judiya eme andri hawe aso.
Iy eme asahan hawe aso, ano iy andrei molowa awin ta Pol. Ma iy bawei iy le, katin hawe minen ma la-uh na aliy, ma iy tiye eme taso i buku doh, “Malawin Ndrabun nane tiye eme tek i buku doh, tama molowa awin dah kameh iu ili bolo asiu lulik ili Jerusalem. Iri Juwis badu Jerusalem kameh bawei katin ma minen i buku doh. Ma iri kameh atehei iy ili mine iri lau badu leheleh, ta iri winiyan amekes kandriyen ndra-in i tan.”
Aso anuhun sahou doh badeh, eme aso ma hawe oro lau nane are doh, asehek sahou boto-on ili ta Pol i buku doh, “Pol, ou are dah areu, ou winiya bala andri bala Jerusalem bwe.”
Arile, Pol tiye i taso ja i buku doh, “Buku sah? Ado satikisi jo, ma ado satehei tikisiy badeh, same tek. Ado kanuhun, jo banoh ta ili bolo asiu lulik ili bolo kon tinan Jerusalem bwe, ma jo banoh bwe ale, buku iri anya kadi jo, tasah jo asehek nyara Jises, iy tinan labai. Eme ma ado winiyan batawi jo ta udu ja bwai.”
Aso badeh, winiyan batubuni budon tan bwe, ma aso basehek sahou bala tan ja bwai. Eme ma aso anya, “Ya, Laban, ou bwidi iri lakou kameh asahan na so-ok tam le amwenen.”
Len sabe ndrano ndra-au, ano aso lokowani lokowa aso, ta au ala Jerusalem. Aso ame adek au ala kon tinan Jerusalem,
ma oro lau rayah ta Jises badu Sesariya adek hawe aso ale. Oro tiyani aso ala asos asiu ta ndramak ari badu busu Saipres nyaran Nason. Iy ndreh doh mene in hamon ta Jises ndra bwena labai. Eme ma aso ado asiu tan.
Ya, aso asahan kon tinan Jerusalem badeh, iri lau ta Jises sekesek labai ta anyolom aso.
Na len ari ja badeh, Pol hawe aso mari ala anyolom Jemis; ma oro lau ta Jises rayah tinan are aliy ale.
Aso ateu lim hawe oro, ma aso mari ja sekesek a le se. Ano Pol asehek nyala iri lakou marakon nane Kindrei amekes ere bolo iri mwan ma badih badu leheleh udu bolo iri len bwena mene iy amekes lahou tan.
Iri anuhun nyala lahou ta Pol mari, ano iri atudun nyara Kindrei. Ma iri tiye ta Pol i buku doh, “Nadu tine aso, ou anuhun, ou ndratanam kane lau mwan ma badih nyaran bwe badeh, iri badu Juwis ma iri ndratehei budon tiri ndrala ta Jises. Ma iri mwan ma badih doh badeh, budon tiri irih labai ta a-en hamon ta batanau ta Moses.
Iri lau rayah asehek ou ili tiri i buku doh, ‘Pol badeh, leheya iri lau badu Juwis nane are kon munyak tiri lau badu leheleh, ta iri katehei kona iri kili ta batanau ta Moses, ma tiye iri, sasan ku-i iri nah mwan, ma sa-en hamon ta kandriyen tiri Juwis.’
Iri kameh kanuhun, ta ou ndrasahan dah. Ya idah kameh, to kamekes kili buku sah handru?
Ya, aso aso-ok ou an hamon taso ta saba lakou aso asehek. Udu bolo aso dah, oro lau ma hahuw badu Juwis badeh, ndramekes tandrakan boto-on labai i ta Kindrei, ta abeles lakou rayah ta manyah toro amwenen.
Ya, ou ala hawe oro ala bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ma ado kamekes kandriyen ta Kindrei ta amekes ado kasahan ha-un ta mada Kindrei. Ma ou asih lakou toro ta asun i ta salom, ta oro winiyan asik batu oro. I buku ou amekes i buku doh, iri kameh anyolom ou amekes amwenen handru i buku le kandriyen tiri Juwis. Ma iri kameh winiyan batehei budon tiri ba-en ta sahou, iri anuhun lau rayah mene amekes ewek tam.
Ahi ndratorowenei la-ukei ramen, ma ndratiyaniy ndrala tiri lau ta Kindrei badu leheleh, ma ahi tiye tiri i buku doh, ‘Aha saimon nyamon ala ndrala ta salom tiri kindrei nane iri asehek na sukumada kei. Ma aha saimon oda iri katin haka ndra udu ta aliy, ma hawe sa-un ndraye iri. Ma aha samekes kandriyen ndra-in ta karei.’”
Na len ari ja, Pol andrei oro lau ma hahuw nane doh, ma oro au ala asiu tinan ta Kindrei. Ma oro ala amekes kandriyen tiri Juwis ta iri kasahan ha-un ta mada Kindrei. Ano, oro adek ala bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ma Pol eme tiye iri tinan ta bwena ta asiu ta Kindrei, ta len sabe handru kameh ta kandriyen toro lau ma hahuw kameh amekes ano iu, ma na saba len ja kameh oro kame katiye lakou ta adeu i nyara salom ili ta Kindrei.
Eme ma len ma ndro taloh doh, mirihik tiri ta anya kano ai, iri Juwis rayah nane badu loboho kon Esiya anyolom Pol udu bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, oro tukumwi lau solo-an badu Juwis, ma iri ala tawi Pol.
Iri arah ma aloh i buku doh, “Aha lau badu Isra-el, aha kame kaseben aso. Iy lau dah le adeh, leheya lau badu kon mara-ei, iy bobose iri lau tataha, ta kandriyen malen ta Moses, ma asiu tinan ta Kindrei ale. Ya, iy bamekes kandriyen dah le bwe. Iy akohok iri lau badu Grik ale ame bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ma iri bwidi ndrahune Kindrei nane leheya iy amwenen udu aliy, ma bwidi ajah ta madan.”
Iri tiye iy i buku doh, tasah iri mene anyolom ndramak ari nyaran Tropimus, iy badu kon tinan Epesus, edek bolo kon tinan hawe Pol, ma iri abudon anya, Pol kede-eh ndrandrei iy ndrame bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei dah.
Iri lau marakon anuhun sahou doh, ma iri Jerusalem mara-ei badeh, mani iri atur labai, eme iri mari sakaliye ame atukum ala le doh. Iri tawi Pol ma aruwi iy udu bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei iu ili manan. Ma iri sulu-i kou marakon badu asiu tinan ta Kindrei ili.
Iri anya kadi Pol kimek ki-iu, arile tinan ta atondrok lau ta bahun badu Rom, badeh, ndranuhun lau solo-an labai ado Jerusalem ndratukum, ma anya kamekes bahun laba tinan.
Eme ma iy andrei iri tinan hawe iri lau ta bahun, iri sakaliye ala loboho nane iri lau mara-ei atukum are aliy. Iri Juwis anyolom tinan ta mwena tiri lau ta bahun hawe iri lau ta bahun le badeh, iri ruwani Pol ma iri ba-um iy ja bwai.
Ndramak tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun eme tawi Pol, ma tiye oro lau tan i buku doh, “Ado kasawei iy ndramak dah na la-uh sen.” Eme ma iy ndremenya iri lau nane i buku doh, “Ya, iy ndramak dah, iy are lau handru? Ma iy amekes saba kandriyen ndra-in handru?”
Lau solo-an arah boto-on labai, ma iri asehek sahou laleyah. Eme ma ndramak tinan tiri lau ta bahun nane dah winiyan bala tanan ta kati sahou doh bwe. Ma iy aloh oro lau tan kala katiyani Pol kili bolo asiu boto-on tiri ta bahun.
Iri lau ta bahun ame tiyani iy ili isos kati kandren ta adek ala loken le badeh, oro anyolom ma anuhun lau sakaliye ame hawe oro, ma arah i buku doh, “Aha kadi iy ndramak badeh, kimek ki-iu!” Eme ma oro lau ta bahun bwese-ei iy i kase oro iu ili loken, ma iri badai iy bwe.
<range>
Oro lau ta bahun anya katiye Pol kili bolo asiu tiri boto-on, Pol eme asehek sahou i boho kon Grik ili ta ndramak tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun i buku doh, “Buku sah, jo winiyan asehek sahou ewek tam deh bwe?” Mani iy ndramak tinan nane dah atur sese, ma iy asumon boho Pol i buku doh, “Buku sah, ou tanam boho kon tiri Grik?
Jo anya ou kede-eh badu Ijip, iy mene ale tukumwi iri lau ta bahun tan ala tebelese hawe iri lau tahi. Ma iy mene atobwak hawe iri lau, kane iri ma hawa (4,000) iri mene adi iri lau anya ka-en hamon ta gabman badu Rom, ma tiyani iri ala are kon lomale an.”
Pol eme asehek sahou i tan ja i buku doh, “Jo iy ndramak badeh, bwe. Jo ndramak ari labai badu Juwis, kon tek handru badeh, Tasus, udu bolo kon tinan Silisiya. Ma nyarak badeh, ere bolo buk badu kon tinan doh, arile na idah jo anya kandremenya ou. Jo anya kasehek sahou kili tiri lau mara-ei are kede-eh.”
Iy tiye i buku doh, ma tinan tiri lau ta bahun anya, “Mwasin, ou winiyan asehek sahou.” Eme ma Pol atehei minen i loken ta iri kandru-uk. Eme ma iri andru-uk i le rasan, ma iy asehek sahou ili tiri i boho kon Aramek.
Eme ma Pol tiye tiri i buku doh, “Aha mari, aha nadu tine, ma aha tama, jo anya kasehek taha kamwenen i buku doh, jo badeh tanan ari lakou jo amekes andra-i bwe. Aha kanuhun kamwenen.”
Eme ma iri anuhun iy asehek sahou i tiri i boho kon Aramek, ma iri mara-ei andru-uk, ma bamekes se sahou bwe, tasah iri anuhun iy amwenen labai.
Ma iy asehek ili le anya, “Jo badu Juwis, tine tuwi jo badeh, udu kon rakon iri aloh Silisiya udu bolo kon tinan Tasus. Arile, jo ma bwisik, jo ili akohok tanan ta leheya ma jo asahan ili awas badeh, udu kon tinan Jerusalem dah. Bolo len doh, ndramak tinan taha ari nyaran Gamaliyel badeh, leheya jo. Ma jo badeh, akohok tanan handru ta iri kandriyen malen mari ta tubu taha Moses. Jo abadok ma asahan boto-on ta in hamon le ta Kindrei, ta iri sahou tan, i buku le aha lau marakon nane are kada-ah amekes.
Bwena mene jo bokoro-ei iri lau a-en hamon ta San ta Jises, andra-i labai. Ma jo anya kidi iri kamak ka-au. Jo badeh, bawei iri mwan ma badih na sen, ano akahei iri ala are bolo asiu lulik.
Iri tinan tiri pris tataha hawe iri kansol mari badu Juwis are kede-eh, iri winiyan asehek sahou mari doh ewek taha, ta jo basehek sahou wendreya, ta iri lakou nane doh bwe. Iri lau mene torowenei la-ukei ramen ili tiri Juwis are Damaskus, iri atehei eme minek, ta jo kili kateu iri lau doh, kabawei iri na sen, ma kandrei iri kame Jerusalem ta iri lau tinan tataha kadeu maha-an ki tiri.”
Pol asehek i tiri i buku doh, “An udu halas badeh, jo edek ndrame mirihik labai ta kon tinan Damaskus. Se nawin bwe, sun ari lomadan tinan labai anya udu kandrah eme andri awudi jo mara-ei.
Ma jo atarah i andri bada munyak, ma ndranyek anuhun ndramak ari aloh jo i buku doh, ‘Sol, Sol, tasah handru ou anya adai jo kimek?’
“Eme ma jo asumon bohon i buku doh, ‘Laban, ou are lau badeh?’ Eme iy anya, ‘Jo Jises badu Nasaret, ou nane abo gok ta adai jo kede-eh!’
Ya oro lau rayah nane adek hawek badeh, anyolom lomada sun doh, arile oro banuhun boho ndramak nane asehek sahou eme tek bwe.
“Eme ma jo ndremenya iy ja, ‘Laban, ou aso-ok jo kamekes saba lakou tam handru?’ “Ma Laban tiye sahou eme tek i buku doh, ‘Ya, ou suri ou ma ou ala bolo kon tinan Damaskus, ya ndramak ari kameh tiye tam ta lakou marakon Kindrei aso-ok ou amekes.’
Madak ma la-uh badeh, ilik mara-ei, tasah lomada sun nane doh, lomadan tinan labai, eme ma oro lau nane adek hawek tawi minek, ma sirini jo iu ili bolo kon tinan Damaskus.
“Ndramak ari nyaran Ananayas, iy udu bolo kon nane doh. Iy lau ta Jises ari ai, len mari badeh, iy in hamon le tiri kandriyen ta batanau, eme ma iri Juwis nane are Damaskus badeh, aso-ok iy tinan labai.
Ya iy eme ales ere mirihik tek, ma iy asehek sahou eme tek i buku doh, ‘Sol, ou nadu tine ahi, na dah kameh ou winiyan anyolom kon ja.’ Sahou ano le bohon badeh, madak asak, ma jo anyolom iy amwenen.
“Iy asehek sahou eme tek i buku doh, ‘Kindrei ale mene, tubu taha iri atudun iy badeh, lebelei ou, ma aseken ou akohok tanan tiri lakou marakon iy aso-ok, ma iy aseken ou anyolom iy. Iy badeh, mwasin labai ta madan, ma ou winiyan anuhun iy asehek sahou na bohon amwenen.
Ma ou kameh a buku bohon ta tiye tiri lau mari ta saba lakou nane ou ndranyolom, ma ou ndranuhun.
Ma, na idah kameh ou sabe-en ja ai! Ou suri ou are loken, alomwa ou, ma ou aloh nyaran kasikine kandriyen tam ndra-in marakon ki-iu.’
“Jo eme hamon eme Jerusalem ja, ma iu ili bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, jo asolom udu le badeh, jo amekes lele.
Eme ma jo anyolom Laban asehek sahou eme tek i buku doh, ‘Ou anuhun, na le dah, ou suri ou a-au ta Jerusalem. Ou suri ou suwi, tasah iri lau kameh winiyan banuhun ou bwe, buku ou asehek nyarak ili tiri.’
“Jo anya, ‘Laban, iri marakon ndratanan jo mwasin labai ta jo mene edek ili bolo asiu ta ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis, ra-em ili ra-em, ta apeu iri, ma adai iri lau ale atehei budon tiri in tam.
Udu bolo len mene iri adi lau tam ari nyaran Stiben, badeh, jo udu aliy ale, anyolom iri adai iy. Jo badeh, ere aliy ta atondrok awin tiri lau nane adai iy imek na bek. Ya, ta madak badeh, iri amekes kandriyen mwasin i tan.’
“Laban tiye jo anya, ‘Ou adek ai, tasah jo aso-ok ou kameh ala bolo iri kon leheleh, ta aseben iri lau leheleh, iri tanan kandriyen tiri Juwis bwe.’”
Iri Juwis anuhun sahou ta Pol, arile iri anuhun iy asehek ja ta aseben iri lau badu leheleh, eme ma bwidi ndrine iri ibolosen, ma iri arah boto-on labai anya, “Iy sare kon munyak hawe taha! Kadi iy kimek ki-iu! Iy ndra-in labai, ma iy sado kon munyak dah!”
Iri arah, ma asehek sahou laleyah. Iri asini awin tiri udu bwele-e iri iu, iri akeh ili eme laleyah, ma iri akeh kasu-er ta ndren ili loken, atalan laleyah. Idoh leheya buku iri basekesek ta sahou Pol asehek nane bwe.
Tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun nane tiye oro lau tan i buku doh, “Ado kandrei Pol keme bolo kowah hawe to. Ma ado ka-um iy na malou sakabuk i bek, winiya le iy baratiye ta saba lakou handru iy amekes, ma to kameh winiyan atanan kati kandriyen nane doh, tasah handru iri Juwis abadok ta adi iy anya kimek ki-iu?”
Eme ma iri lau ta bahun ame bawei Pol, ano iri anya ka-um iy ai. Arile, Pol badeh, ales ere mirihik ta ndramak tinan ta bahun ari, iy ta atondrok iri rayah ai. Eme Pol tiye i ta ndramak nane i buku doh, “Ou anuhun se, buku nyara ndramak udu bolo buk badu kon Rom, ya kandriyen ta batanau asehek i buku doh, iy kili ta mada sahou mwena op, ta seleya iy ndramak nane doh, bwidi kandriyen handru o bwe. Ya, i buku sah handru, na idah ja ado kameh anya ka-um jo laleyah?”
Ndramak tinan nane dah anuhun sahou ta Pol, ma iy ales amwenen ili hawe tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun mara-ei. Iy asehek i ta tinan tiri i buku doh, “Ou abudon ma ou anuhun kamwenen op, ano ou baramekes saba lakou ndra-in barala tan, tasah nyaran badeh, ere bolo buk badu kon tato dah.”
Eme ma tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun mara-ei doh, ili atou Pol, ma iy ndremenya Pol i buku doh, “Ou tiye tek, nyaram in bolo buk badu kon tahi dah handru?” Eme Pol anya, “Ehe, jo asehek handru.”
Eme ma ndramak tinan nane dah anya, “Jo badeh, mene akeh luk solo-an labai ta adeu nyarak ili bolo buk badu Rom.” Ma Pol anya, “Badeh, handru, arile tama uru tine badeh, nyara uru udu bolo buk badu Rom bwena labai, eme ma nyarak udu aliy ale.”
Eme ma oro lau ta bahun nane bawei Pol ma anya ka-um iy badeh, anuhun sahou doh ja, oro anoh ma oro tolowei iy. Tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun mara-ei nane doh inoh ale, tasah iy badeh, tiye iri lau ta bahun ta bawei Pol na malou ma sen. Ya, iy tanan idoh ndrabun, ndrabun labai ta apeu ari ndramak laleyah, buku nyaran udu bolo buk badu Rom.
Na len ari ja badeh, tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun mara-ei nane dah tolowei Pol, ma iy udu bolo kowah laleyah. Ma tinan tiri lau ta bahun mara-ei dah anya kasilah kati sahou doh ale, iri Juwis nane amekes ta adeu Pol i ta mada sahou. Eme ma iy atehei sahou ili tiri tinan tiri pris, ma hawe iri kansol mara-ei tiri Juwis, ta kame ta tukum doh. Ma iy andrei Pol ili atehei iy ales ere mada iri mara-ei.
Pol anyolom amwenen mada iri kansol mara-ei, ma iy anya, “Aha nadu tine, Kindrei badeh, ndranyolom iri kandriyen tek mari na bolo len mara-ei, ndrabwena eme asahan dah. Jo batona ari kandriyen ndra-in jo amekes bwe.”
Pol asehek sahou doh ili ma tinan tiri pris nyaran Ananayas eme tiye oro lau rayah ales are mirihik ta Pol i buku doh, “Ado katabasi lim ki boho iy ndramak badeh.”
Pol tiye ili ta Ananayas i buku doh, “Kindrei kameh a-um ou. Buku ou badeh, atehei awin tiri tinan, arile bahandran ta aliy badeh, ou ndramak ndra-in, ma budon tam ndrandra-i. Ou anya ou ndramak ari handru ta a-en hamon ta kandriyen malen ta Moses, ma aseben ta amekes sahou tek, ya i buku sah, nadah ja ou ndrasakalawi kandriyen malen, ma ou tiye iri lau are kada-ah ta a-um jo laleyah?”
Ya, oro lau nane ales are mirihik ta Pol asehek i tan i buku doh, “Hei, Kindrei atehei i ndramak kodo-oh tinan tiri Juwis. Ya, ou sondrokonya iy na sahou badeh, tasah handru?”
Eme ma Pol anya, “Ado nadu tine, jo bala tanan buku iy ndramak kodo-oh tinan tiri pris badu Juwis bwe. Buku jo ki tanan badeh, jo winiyan basehek sahou doh bala tan bwe, tasah sahou randra udu bolo buk ndrabun, asehek i buku doh, ‘Aha sasondrokonya iri lau nane atondrok aha.’”
Pol ndranyolom buku lau lubuk are bolo tukum nane doh, rabuk Sadusi ya rabuk Parasi. Pol eme aloh i buku doh, “Aha nadu tine! Jo Parasi ari ai, jo nadu iri Parasi amwenen. Ya, nadah ja jo ales udu hawe aha ta aha atehei jo ili ta mada sahou, tasah jo in hamon ta budon tiri Parasi amwenen, ma ahi atehei budon tahi boto-on labai, buku len hamon eme, Kindrei kameh mete-ei iri lau ndramak are bolo lek tiri, amak ame awas ja.”
Pol atehei sahou doh ili badeh, ma bwidi losen asahan bolo ndrokowa iri Sadusi ma iri Parasi, ma apwai iri a lubuk.
Iri Sadusi anya iri lau ndramak badeh, winiyan bamak bame awas ja bwe, ma iri anya iri malawin mwasin ma angelo bwe, arile iri Parasi badeh, atehei budon tiri mara-ei in toro lakou mari doh, handru.
Eme ma bwidi iri arah i tinan labai, eme lau rayah ta leheya kandriyen ta batanau malen ta Moses, iri badu hawe iri Parasi ales are loke, asehek sahou nyarahan labai i buku doh, “Ahi winiyan basilahei ari kandriyen ndra-in ta iy ndramak kede-eh amekes bwe. Buku sah? Buku ari malawin mwasin, o, ari angelo ndradeu sahou ndrala tan!”
Losen toro ma lubuk badeh, i tinan le gwek ai. Eme ma, tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun anya, se luwen bwe, iri kameh tarani Pol. Eme ma iy tiye oro lau ta bahun tan rayah anya, “Ado kala bolo tukum kodo-oh, karuwi Pol udu mine iri lau keme len, ma kandrei iy keme, bolo asiu tato boto-on.”
Udu, i ben ari ja badeh, Laban eme ales ere mirihik ta Pol, ma iy asehek sahou i tan anya, “Ou abadok ma ou sanoh, ou badeh, ndraleheyani nyarak ndrala bolo kon tinan Jerusalem, ma ou kameh winiyan amekes i buku le aliy kameh, udu kon tinan Rom ale.”
Na mandraben ari ja badeh, iri lau rayah badu Juwis atukum ja, ta amekes sahou tandrakan ta adai Pol. Iri badeh, abeles iri winiyan bakohok nyamon, ma gwa bwe, winiya le iri kandrei batu Pol ki-iu labai.
Kane iri Juwis nane atilik sahou ta adi Pol badeh, udu bwele-e hanoh (40) ja.
Ano iri au ala atou iri tinan tiri pris hawe iri lau tinan ta atondrok iri, ma asehek sahou ili tiri i buku doh, “Ahi marakon ndratandrakan, ta ahi winiyan baimon nyamon ma ba-un gwa bwai, winiya le ahi kandrei batu Pol ki-iu labai.
Buku na dah ado hawe iri kansol katehei sahou kili ta tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun badu Rom badeh, katiye tan ki buku doh, ‘Ahi aso-ok aha lau tam katiyani Pol keme andri ja, ma ahi anya kandremenya iy ta lakou rayah ja. Ahi anya katanan kamwenen ta saba lakou handru iy amekes.’ Ya, na len iri tiyani iy, iy edek san kahis le, ahi kameh awe-ek iy, ma adi iy imek.”
Arile, nadu kali Pol ari badeh, anuhun ta iri anya kadi Pol kimek. Eme ma iy ili suwi, suwi ili asiu boto-on tiri lau ta bahun, ma iy edek ili bolon anyolom Pol ma tiye sahou nane doh i tan.
Eme ma Pol aloh tinan ta lau ta bahun ari eme hawen, ma iy asehek i tan i buku doh, “Ou andrei iy loweu kede-eh kili hawe tinan ta atondrok aha. Iy anya kasehek sahou ari kili tan ta iy kanuhun.”
Eme lau ta bahun doh andrei iy, ma sirini iy ili hawe tinan ta atondrok iri mara-ei, ma iy asehek i ta ndramak tinan doh anya, “Iy ndramak udu bolo asiu lulik kodo-oh nyaran Pol aloh jo ili ta jo kandrei iy loweu dah keme katou ou, tasah iy tan sahou ta asehek ewek tam.”
Ndramak tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun eme tawi minen, ma sirini iy, uru ala ales are loboho bolo asiu sese doh, ari lau bwe. Iy eme ndremenya iy loweu nane dah, “Ya, ou anya asehek tek ta nyala saba lakou handru?”
Iy loweu dah anya, “Iri tinan tiri lau badu Juwis badeh, ndrasehek nyala iri ndra le ari, iri anya, buku bi-i badeh, ou tiyani Pol kili andri kanyolom iri, iri anya katukum, kasehek nyala iri ja, ma iri anya kawendreya, buku iri kanuhun rayah sahou ta Pol ja.
Arile, ou sanuhun iri labai, tasah kane iri lau badeh, udu bwele-e kane lau ma hanoh (40), iri kameh are san atondrok ta adai Pol. Ma iri ndratandrakan ndrala ta Kindrei, i buku doh, iri kameh adi Pol imek labai, ano iri barakohok nyamon ma gwa ja ai. Eme ma iri atondrok ou, buku ou aso-ok ta atiye Pol ili hawe iri.”
Eme tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun tiye i ta iy loweu i buku doh, “Ou anuhun, ou sasehek labai sala ta ari ndramak ja, ta ou nane ndrasehek nyalak ta sahou dah.” Ma iy tiye iy iu ili hamon ili ndrahunen ja.
Eme, tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun luhi uru tinan la-uh ja badu bahandran ame, ma iy asehek i turu anya, “Ya, ah kandrei lau ta bahun ma lunek (200) kawek hawe ah ta ala Sesariya na ben kameh, hawe oro ndro tonoh (70) lau ta bahun, oro winiyan sakaliye ta hos, ma hawe lunek (200) lau ta bahun ja ta orou nyah. Ah katiye iri kado le katondrok mada an kili buku ndro-ari na ben dah.
Aha kandrei ari hos ale ta bwese Pol, ma ah katiyani iy kamwenen kili kisos hawe kabin Peliks.”
Ano, ndramak tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun mara-ei dah, torowenei la-ukei ramen, sahou udu bolon asehek i buku doh:
“Peliks, jo Klodiyas Lisiyas, jo atorou la-ukei ramen dah ewek tam. Ou ndramak tinan labai, ou atondrok kon mara-ei udu loboho badeh. Bada-an tam mwasin ai.
Jo tiye oro lau tek tiyani iy ndramak dah ewek hawem, tasah iri Juwis are kada-ah mene tawi iy, ma seheyani iy ili eme, mirihik iri kadi iy kimek. Eme ahi anuhun buku nyaran badeh, udu bolo buk tinan tataha badu Rom. Eme, jo ma hawe iri lau tek ta bahun ala andrei iy ere mine iri Juwis eme len.
Eme jo badeh anya ki tanan ta saba katin handru iri amekes kandriyen buku doh i tan. Eme ma jo tiyani iy ili hawe iri kansol badu Juwis.
Ma jo badeh, ndranuhun sahou, iri amekes ili ta Pol. Iri atehei iy ili ta mada sahou doh badeh, ta sahou rayah ta kandriyen ta batanau tiri Juwis. Ma iy ale, bamekes ari kandriyen ta iri kadai iy, ma katehei iy kili bolo kou, bwe.
Jo anuhun sahou i buku doh, eme ma jo tiye iri lau tek ta bahun tiyani iy kewek hawem suwi, tasah jo ndranuhun sahou ta lau rayah, atukum a le se ta adi iy ndramak dah. Eme jo tiye iri lau nane amekes i buku doh, ta awek hawem, ma ou kameh winiyan lebelei sahou tiri. Ya, sahou tek idoh le, kabwai.”
Ya, iri lau ta bahun andrei la-ukei doh, ma a-en hamon ta sahou ta tinan tiri. Iri tondrokei Pol, ma tiyani iy na le ben doh ili isos kon tinan Antipatris.
Na len ari ja badeh, iri lau ta bahun nane adek na kati iri ame hamon ame asiu tiri ta bahun ere Jerusalem ja. Arile, iri rayah nane ta hos badeh, tiyani Pol iu isos kon tinan Sesariya.
Oro ala asahan kon tinan Sesariya, eme oro lau ta bahun nane tiyani Pol amwenen iu ili hawe kabin ta kon doh. Ma oro atehei la-ukei nane ili minen.
Kabin eme anyolom la-ukei doh, ma iy ndremenya Pol, “Ya, ou badu saba kon handru udu loboho Rom?” Pol asehek i tan i buku doh, “Jo badeh, badu kon Silisiya.”
Kabin eme tiye Pol, “Mwasin jo winiyan anuhun sahou tam, buku iri lau nane anya kadeu ou ala ta mada sahou, asahan.” Ano iy aloh oro lau tan ta bahun ame, “Ya, ado katiyani Pol kili asiu tinan ta kabin Herot mene tutuniy, ma ado katondrokei iy.”
Udu len ma limeh ano iu, eme tinan tiri pris ari badu Juwis, nyaran Ananayas, iy eme ili asahan kon tinan Sesariya. Iy ma hawe iri tinan rayah, ma ndramak ari iy tanan labai ta kandriyen ta batanau ta sahou, nyaran Tertulus. Eme iri ala asahan bada kabin ta kon doh, ma iri asehek sahou marakon ta amekes Pol kili ta sahou.
Kabin tinan eme aloh Tertulus ta ili bwena ta asehek sahou. Iy ili ales ere bwena, ma iy asehek iri sahou ta amekes Pol kili ta sahou, i buku doh, “Peliks, ou tinan tahi, ma mwena, jo anya kedeu wurah kewek tam, tasah tanan tam mwasin labai. Eme ma, ahi badu loboho kon doh akohok manyah mwasin, ma ari bahun bwe, tasah ou amekes iri batanau mwasin ta amekes lakou rayah amwenen, ma amekes kon tahi edek amwenen.
Na bolo len mara-ei badeh, sekesek tahi tinan labai ere tam, ta idoh ma ahi anya kadeu wurah kewek tam.
Jo bwalek aliu sahou lawe-en labai, tasah ou tam gok solo-an ta amekes. Arile, na dah jo anya kandremenya ou ta tikisi aso, ma ou anuhun sahou taso ja, na dah aso anya kasehek kewek tam.
“Ya, iy Pol badeh, iy ndramak ari ndra-in labai, ta amekes ramwes solo-an. Ahi tanan, buku iy ta amekes losen ere bolo iri Juwis ere bolo kon mara-ei, ma iy ndramak tinan ari ale, tiri lau nane a-en hamon ta Jises badu kon tinan Nasaret.
Ou anuhun, iy ale none ta akohok iri kandriyen ndra-in solo-an eme bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei. Arile, na bolo len doh badeh, ahi tawi iy. Buku ou ndremenya iy ndramak kede-eh, ou amwenen kameh winiyan silahei iri lakou marakon nane ahi anya kadeu iy kili ta mada sahou ta aliy.”
<range>
<range>
Eme ma iri Juwis nane are bolo tukum doh aloh i le rasan anya, “Iri sahou marakon doh ndra handru le ai.”
Eme ma kabin ta kon dah anyoleh, ta iy anya kanuhun boho Pol. Pol eme suri iy, ma iy asehek sahou i buku doh, “Jo tanan ou asahan kabin are loboho tiri Juwis dah, na jaha solo-an labai, eme ma jo sekesek tinan labai ta ou aseben ta anuhun sahou tek nadah.
Len ma ronoh la-uh mene le kada-ah badeh, jo ili bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei udu Jerusalem ta amekes salom. Buku ou lelen iri, idah kameh ou winiyan atanan, buku sahou mari doh, handru.
Iri Juwis badeh, anyolom jo, batebelese hawe ari ndramak bwe. Ma jo batukumwi rayah lau ame ta amekes bahun bwe. Iri lau nane ta adeu jo i ta mada sahou dah badeh, banyolom jo andra-i, ma tebelese hawe iri bado bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, o ndrahu tukum udu loboho bolo Jerusalem, bo-oh.
Ma sahou marakon nane iri asehek ta adeu jo ili ta mada sahou doh badeh, wasai. Ma iri lau kede-eh winiyan baleheya ari lakou nane jo amekes andra-i bwai.
Arile, jo anya kasehek lakou ari, iri nane atehei jo i ta mada sahou ta aliy, badeh, kaleu kewek taha: Jo badeh, atudun Kindrei ta tubu ahi ari le, ma jo atehei budon tek mara-ei in hamon ta San ta Jises, iri Juwis kede-eh aloh san randrah ja. Ma jo atehei budon tek mara-ei i tiri lakou ndratorowenei ere bolo kandriyen malen ta Moses, ma ere bolo buk tiri propet.
Jo in hamon ta Kindrei, iri lau nane atehei jo ili ta mada sahou badeh, a-en hamon tan ale, ma ahi atondrok, len hamon Kindrei kameh mete-ei iri lau mwasin, ma hawe iri lau ndra-in mene ndramak, kameh amak ame awas ja.
Eme ma, na len mari, jo aseken budon tek badeh, kaleu, ma jo ki-in hamon ta kandriyen mwasin ta ere mada Kindrei, ma hawe iri lau badu munyak.
“Winiya jaha sabe kolek, jo ruwani kon tinan Jerusalem, jo iu ili bolo iri kon leheleh, ano jo eme hamon ja atiye luk i toro lau tek amwenen, toro lakou bwe, ma hawe iri lakou rayah ta asun i nyara salom ili ta Kindrei.
Ya, iri atou jo ere bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ma iri atou jo sikine badak ndrano, in hamon ta kandriyen tiri Juwis ta asahan ha-un ja ta mada Kindrei, ma ari ndramak, o, rayah lau batukum bame hawek, ma aso andra-i bwe. Ma ari ndramak barah laleyah bwe.
Arile, iri Juwis rayah badu loboho Esiya are ndra Jerusalem kodo-on. Buku oro lau doh toro sahou ta asehek eme badak, mwasin, oro amwenen kame kare madam dah, ma katehei jo kili ta sahou.
Ya, ou ndremenya iri lau are kede-eh se, oro kasehek ta saba kandriyen ndra-in udu tek handru, kala jo ales ere mada tinan ta kansol tiri mene.
Sebwe iri badeh, abolosen ta nadu lakou ari le, mene jo amekes. Jo ales ere bolo iri kansol tinan tiri marakon doh, ma jo asehek, ‘Jo atehei budon tek mara-ei in ta Kindrei, iy kameh mete-ei iri lau marakon are bolo lek tiri amak ame awas ja.’ Eme ta katin doh le, iri atehei jo ili ta mada sahou.” Ma Pol ano ta asehek sahou tan marakon.
Eme ma Peliks tanan mwasin labai ta iri kandriyen tiri lau ta Kindrei aloh San ta Jises. Ma iy tiye tiri i buku doh, “Ya, buku iy ndramak tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun nyaran Lisiyas udu Jerusalem keme kasahan dah, badeh kameh, jo baranuhun sahou taha ja ai.” Iy asehek sahou i buku doh ma sahou tiri kabwai.
Eme ma kabin tinan doh tiye ta tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun nane androkei ta Pol i buku doh, “Ou hawe oro lau tam katehei ndrokei ta Pol kamwenen, arile ado sabawei iy mara-ei. Ado karuwani iy kedek, ma oro lau badu hawen kame kanyolom iy ma katiye nan nyamon.”
Len sabe ano iu, eme Peliks hawe udun Ndrusila, ame ta atou Pol. Ndrusila doh, iy badih butuhu Juwis. Peliks eme aloh Pol kili katou iy. Pol eme ili tiye turu ta iri kandriyen ta atehei budon handru in ta Jises Krais.
Arile, Pol asehek iri sahou nane ili le, ma iy asehek ta lau ka-en hamon tiri kandriyen mwasin, ma iri katondrok manyah tiri kamwenen, ma iri samekes kandriyen ndra-in. Ma iy asehek ta nyala len hamon, Kindrei kameh seleya manyah ta lau marakon. Peliks anuhun iri sahou doh, ma bwidi iy inoh mara-ei labai. Ma iy tiye Pol i buku doh, “Ou au ai. Buku len rasan ja, jo baraloh ou barame, ma ou barame baratou jo ja.”
Peliks anya, Pol badeh, kedeu tan rayah luk, ma iy karuwani iy ere bolo asiu lulik keme len laleyah. Budon tan boto-on udu ta lakou doh, ma iy aloh Pol ili hawen san solo-an labai.
Arile, Peliks anya kasahan kawas hawe iri Juwis, ma iy baruwani Pol udu bolo asiu lulik bame len bwe. Eme ma jaha ma la-uh ano iu, ma ndramak ari ja nyaran Porsiyus Pestus akohok kon ta Peliks, ma iy akohok gok tan.
Pestus eme asahan Sesariya ta akohok kon ta Peliks. Ano, udu hamon ta len taloh iu, iy iu ili loke ili Jerusalem.
Udu Jerusalem doh badeh, iri tinan tiri pris ma hawe tinan tiri Juwis ala anyolom Pestus ta amekes sahou ta adeu Pol i ta mada sahou.
