Ou tanam, buku iri lau amekes gok ado bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, iri badeh, akohok nyamon badu asiu tinan ta Kindrei. Ya, iri lau amekes gok ta asun sipsip udu bwele-e mada koto-ok, iri badeh, akohok niri oda sipsip nane iri lau adeu ili ta asun ta nyara salom.
Idoh i buku Kindrei asehek sahou batanau doh eme tataha: Buku are lau ta atiye sahou tan, iy kakohok iri seben badu tiri lau nane anuhun sahou mwasin.
Arile jo amwenen winiya bamekes iri kandriyen nane ale Kindrei tiye jo winiyan ta amekes, bwe. Ma jo batorou iri sahou dah, ta akohok ari lakou taha bwe ale. Mwasin badeh, jo kimek bwena op. Jo asehek i buku doh, tasah, kandriyen tek amwenen badeh, jo tanan ta akohok lakou ta ari mwan o badih, bwe. Ma jo baso-ok ari mwan o badih keme kandrei kati sekesek tek dah ja bwe.
Jo winiya batudun nyarak bwe, buku jo asehek anya, jo amekes kandriyen mwasin labai. Ta atiye sahou badeh, gok ta Kindrei edeu eme tek ta jo kamekes. Jo saruwani gok nane doh. Buku jo batiye iri sahou tan doh bwe eh, maha-an tinan kameh eme bwele-ek, ma manyah tek winiya bado mwasin bwe.
Buku jo atiye sahou mwasin, tasah jo le aso-ok ta atiye, jo kameh akohok ndramas ta aliy. Arile, buku Kindrei ndratehei jo, mwasin, idoh gok ta Kindrei atehei eme tek ta jo kamekes.
Ya, saba lakou kameh i nyara ndramas tek? Iri lakou ale jo winiya akohok ta gok tek ta atiye sahou mwasin, idoh badeh, jo bakohok bwe. Tasah, jo badeh, sekesek le ta asehek sahou mwasin ili ta lau marakon, ari sihinek bwe. Ya iri sekesek nane jo akohok, idoh i buku ndramas tek ai.
Jo basahan bonyo-ou ta ari ndramak bwe. Arile, jo badeh, asahan i buku bonyo-ou ta lau marakon. Jo amekes i buku doh, ta ariu lau mwan ma badih solo-an ka-en hamon ta Krais.
I buku jo udu hawe iri Juwis, jo akohok kandriyen tiri Juwis amwenen, ma jo kameh winiya ariu iri solo-an ame hamon. Iri badeh, ado bahandra tondrok ta kandriyen malen ta Moses, jo badeh, bwe. Arile jo atehei jo mara-ei udu bahandra kandriyen malen, ta ariu iri Juwis ame hamon ja.
Buku jo ili udu hawe iri lau, iri bado bahandra tondrok ta kandriyen malen bwe, badeh, kameh jo kamani kandriyen malen, ta ariu iri ame hamon. Arile, jo bamani kandriyen ta Kindrei bwe. Jo badeh, edek udu bahandra batanau handru ta Krais.
Buku jo ili udu hawe iri lau, budon tiri bahis handru ta Krais bwe, jo kameh bwidi manyah tek i buku le iri, ta ariu iri ame hamon. Handru, jo badeh none ta in hamon ta kandriyen tiri mwan ma badih are laleyah, ta none iri madasan mara-ei, ta ariu iri rayah ka-en hamon ta Krais.
Jo amekes iri gok marakon doh ta aseben sahou mwasin ta Jises ili bolo kon mara-ei. Eme ma, jo hawe iri mwan ma badih rayah kameh winiyan akohok nyosowa sahou mwasin doh ale.
Iri lau sakaliye ta nyorei, iri marakon sakaliye, arile ndramak ari le udu bolo iri marakon kameh akohok ndramas. Ya, aha kasakaliye boto-on ta akohok ndramas doh.
Iri mwan ma badih marakon anya kasahan bwena ta iri nyorei, iri badeh atehei iri au ala andri mara-ei in hamon ta so-ok ta bada iri amwenen. Iri amekes i buku doh ta akohok ndramas ta winiya bare luluwen bwe. Arile, ndramas tataha lau ta Kindrei badeh bwe. Taha badeh, kasakaliye boto-on ta akohok ndramas ta ere le buku doh, winiya bandra-i bwe.
Jo badeh, amekes i buku ndramak sakaliye boto-on labai, ya iy banyolom bala doh bala doh bwe. Ya jo amekes i buku ndramak ta bahun, iy akeh minen amwenen i ta ndramak, ya iy bakeh minen laleyah bwe.
Jo bwidi badak amwenen i buku bonyo-ou tek. Jo a-um badak amwenen ta amekes iy kabadok ta bahun. Jo amekes i buku doh, tasah, kora-on jo kasehek sahou mwasin kili tiri mwan ma badih rayah, ano Kindrei kameh asehek eme tek i buku doh, “Ou ndramalin mara-ei.”
Aha nadu tine, jo aso-ok aha kabudon ki-iu kili hamon ta lakou marakon mene asahan ta tubu taha iri Isra-el. Udu bolo len ta Moses bwena mene, tubu taha iri marakon badeh, ado bahandra asi kandrah mene Kindrei atehei ta korohani iri. Ma iri adek bolo ndras aloh Retsi iri apou ala bilisiu.
Udu bolo asi kandrah ma bolo gwa ndras doh, iri marakon anyu, eme iri asahan lau ta Moses, ma a-en hamon tan.
Iri marakon aimon nyamon nane ale Malawin Mwasin ta Kindrei edeu ili niri.
Iri marakon badeh a-un gwa doh mene na boto-on ta Malawin Mwasin ta Kindrei edeu ili wa-i iri. Ya iri a-un gwa udu ta bek, Kindrei mene atehei udu aliy. Ya bek nane doh leheya buku Malawi Krais, iy amwenen mene udu hawe iri ta aseben iri.
Arile, Kindrei baso-ok kandriyen tiri lau mwan ma badih solo-an doh bwe. Eme iy idi iri amak, ma iri atalan laleyah are bolo kon lomale an.
Eme lakou marakon nane asahan ta leheya taha, ta anyolom, ma mada taha salikis ta iri lakou ndra-in, mene mada iri alikis ta aliy.
Aha sa-en hamon tiri lau ta atehei bwili ndru-u iri i andri ili ta kindrei iri amekes na sukumada kei. I buku le buk ndrabun ndrasehek, “Iri lau manyah ado andri aimon nyamon ma a-un gwa, ano iri mwan ala adi mana ma amekes karei hawe iri badih.”
Taha samekes iri kandriyen ndra-in ta karei, i buku le iri lau rayah bwena mene amekes. Eme na bolo len ari, lau nyaran bwe (23,000) badeh, amak. Jo bwalek aha samekes iri kandriyen ndra-in ta karei i buku doh.
Ma taha sanone Laban, sala buku iri bwena mene amekes, eme ma mwak ndra-in ini iri rayah amak.
Ma aha sanunu-uh Kindrei, sala buku iri rayah bwena mene amekes, eme ma angelo ta adai lau amak eme idi iri amak.
Iri lakou marakon asahan tiri nane doh ta leheya eme mada taha le. Lakou marakon nane doh iri ndratorowenei ale udu bolo buk ndrabun ta leheya taha lau nane ado kada-ah. Tasah, taha ndrame mirihik ta len ta kon munyak anya kano.
Eme i buku ari ndramak anya, iy ales boto-on labai, iy badeh, katondrok iy kudu mwasin. Kora-on iy kataku kandra-i mara-ei.
Buku iri none asahan taha, aha winiya atanan, idoh mene ndrasahan tiri mwan ma badih rayah. Arile, Kindrei badeh, in hamon tiri batanau tan, ma iy winiya balelei ari none ta atisih boto-on taha bwe-en. Buku iri none asahan taha, Kindrei kameh amekes san ta aseben aha. San i buku doh: Iy kameh atadau aha abadok, ma aha winiya ales boto-on ta tawiya none doh.
Aha kawas tek handru, aha kado ndra len ta kandriyen ta atudun iri kindrei ta wasai, iri amekes na sukumada kei.
Tanan taha udu aliy, eme ma jo asehek ewek taha. Aha amwenen baraseleya iri sahou tek.
Taha adeu wurah i ta bwesam nane taha lau ta Kindrei a-un na aliy, ma ndremenya Laban ta nyosowaniy op. Bwesam le doh tukumwi taha ala se hawe ndraye Krais. Ya, jabi ramen nane taha abo-os ta taha anya kaimon, idoh badeh, tukumwi taha ahis hawe bada Krais.
Handru, jabi ramen badeh, ari le. Eme ma, taha solo-an ahis badan ari le. Tasah, taha marakon badeh, aimon jabi ramen ari le doh.
Aha kabudon iri kandriyen tiri Isra-el bwena mene. Na len iri anya kaimon oda sipsip o bulumakau nane iri asun udu bwele-e mada koto-ok, idoh ta atukum iri marakon ame le se hawe Kindrei.
Aha kabudon, jo asehek sahou i buku sah? Sebwe jo asehek anya, “Salom nane iri lau adeu ili ta kindrei ta wasai, idoh lakou handru,” o, “Kindrei ta wasai iri amekes na sukumada kei, iy lakou handru ai, neh?”
Bwe! Idoh wasai handru. Jo asehek i buku doh: Lakou iri lau ta Kindrei bwe adeu i nyara salom, idoh iri adeu ili tiri balik. Iri badeu bala ta Kindrei bwe. Eme jo bwalek ta aha atukum ala hawe malawi iri balik.
Aha winiya ba-un na bwesam ta Laban ma hawe bwesam tiri malawin ndra-in i le rasan bwe. Ma aha ale winiya baimon nyamon bado bada sau ta Laban, ano bada sau tiri malawin ndra-in bwe ale.
Buku sah? Sebwe taha kede-eh anya kamekes ndrine Laban kandra-i nadeh? Ya, boto-on tataha kede-eh winiya boto-on tan deh? Winiyan bwe!
Aha rayah anya, “Ahi winiya amekes lakou marakon.” Arile jo kasehek taha, lakou marakon kameh winiya baseben taha bwe. Aha rayah anya, “Ahi winiya amekes lakou marakon.” Arile lakou marakon winiya baseben taha basahan lau mwasin ta Kindrei bwe.
Taha satehei budon ta aseben taha le amwenen. Taha badeh, katehei budon tataha ta aseben iri rayah ja.
Buku ou asih oda iri lakou badu mada ba-en, iri marakon badeh, mwasin ta aimon. Ou satehei budon solo-an ta ndremenya ta oda iri lakou dah, iri ndratehei salom ta kindrei ta wasai ndrala bwele-en, o, bwe.
Buk ndrabun ndrasehek, “Kon munyak ma hawe iri lakou marakon udu bwele-en badeh, ta Laban le ari.”
I buku ari ndramak iy tanan Jises bwe, iy eme ndremenya aha ta ala aimon nyamon hawen, mwasin ta aha kala. Mwasin ta aha kaimon iri nyamon marakon nane iy amekes ewek naha. Ya, aha sabudon solo-an ma satehei budon boto-on labai ta ndremenya iri nyamon dah asahan buku salom ta kindrei ta wasai ndrala aliy, o, bwe. Aha sandremenya, ndri-iy.
Arile, i buku ari ndramak eme asehek ewek taha ja i buku doh, “Nyamon badeh, iri atehei ndrala na kindrei ta wasai.” Badeh, aha saimon labai. Tasah, mwasin ta aha katehei budon taha kili ta ndramak nane tiye aha, eme ma aha saimon nyamon nane doh.
Jo basehek bawek taha anya aha amwenen kameh amekes andra-i, bwe. Jo asehek ta iy ndramak ari ja kameh atona i buku aha ndrabwidiy ndrandra-i. Arile, i buku ari ndramak bamekes iri sahou buku doh bwe, jo winiyan ta aimon iri saba lakou jo aso-ok. Ya, tasah handru jo ki-in le hamon ta budon ta ndramak ari ja, ta saba lakou iy anya jo kabeleben ta amekes?
Buku jo edeu wurah ili ta iri lakou nane jo aimon, tasah handru ja ndramak ari asehek sahou ndra-in eme tek ta iri lakou nane jo edeu wurah ili ta aliy? Sahou ta iy ndramak nane doh, ari moson bwe.
Eme ma, buku ou anya aimon nyamon, o, a-un gwa, o, amekes saba lakou ja, ou amekes iri lakou marakon doh ta atudun nyara Kindrei le ari.
Aha katehei budon taha kili tiri Juwis ma iri Grik, ma iri lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei. Ma, aha samekes ari lakou ja ta amekes budon tiri taku ili ta kandriyen ndra-in ta balik.
Handru, aha badeh, kamekes kandriyen i buku le jo amekes. Jo amekes iri lakou marakon doh, ta iri lau winiya aso-ok iri kandriyen tek. Jo bamekes gok ta aseben jo amwenen bwe. Jo ibo gok ta aseben lau mwan ma badih solo-an. Ya, Kindrei kameh winiyan andrei iri marakon ame hamon ja.
Aha kanyolom tekedek ma kandriyen tek, ma aha ka-en hamon ta aliy, tasah jo in hamon ta kandriyen ta Krais.
Jo atudun aha labai, tasah len marakon badeh, aha abudon jo le ai, ma aha a-en hamon ta leheya jo ndratehei ndrawek taha.
Na len dah jo aso-ok aha katanan ale ta sahou dah: Iri lau mwan marakon badeh, are bahandra tondrok ta Krais le ari. Ya iri badih badeh, are bahandra tondrok ta udu iri. Arile Krais badeh, udu bahandra tondrok ta taman Kindrei.
Moson ta sahou dah i buku doh: I buku are ndramak mwan iy asolom, o, iy asehek sahou i buku iri propet, iy su-i batun, iy ndramak doh badeh, bwidi bwilima tinan labai ili ta Krais, tasah iy badeh, udu bahandra tondrok tan.
Arile are badih iy asolom, o, asehek sahou i buku iri propet, iy basu-i batun bwe, iy badeh bwidi bwilima i ta ndramak nane iy udu bahandra tondrok tan. Idoh i buku badih, iri asiki lami batun mara-ei iu.
Buku iri badih batubuloh batu iri bwe badeh, iy kasani lami batun kamo-on. Arile, buku bwilin ama ta asan lami batun amo-on, o, asikiy marakon iu, badeh, iy katubuloh batun.
Ndramak mwan satubuloh batun. Tasah konen hawe nyasou tan i buku le Kindrei, ma Kindrei atehei budon ma nyasou mwasin ili tiri i buku le tan amwenen. Ya, badih badeh, leheya budon ma nyasou mwasin ta lau mwan.
Tasah, Kindrei bamekes ndramak mwan na kono-o badih bwe. Iy amekes badih badeh, na kono-o iy ndramak mwan.
Eme ma Kindrei babudon badih bwe, eme iy bwidi ndramak mwan ta aseben iy. Arile, iy abudon ta ndramak mwan, eme iy bwidi badih ta aseben iy.
Eme ma, iri badih kasu batu iri, ta leheya, iri a-en hamon ma anuhun boho udu iri, ma iri angelo kameh winiya anyolom kandriyen mwasin tiri.
Arile manyah tataha lau atukum are hawe Krais, eme ma iri badih winiya bare ndrahune iri le bwe, ma iri mwan ale winiya bare ndrahune iri amwenen bwe. Badih udu aliy ta aseben iy mwan, ma mwan udu aliy ta aseben iy badih.
Ma bwena handru Kindrei andrei kono-o bada mwan eme iy bwidi badih; udu hamon ja, iri mwan asahan na bada iri badih. Arile, Kindrei badeh, iy kati iri lakou marakon.
Aha amwenen kabudon sahou nane doh se. Buku badih, iy basu batun bwe, iy asolom ili ta Kindrei, idoh kandriyen mwasin o bwe?
Kandriyen tataha lau mwan ma badih leheyani taha amwenen i buku doh: Buku lami batu lau mwan lawe-en labai, badeh, bamwenen bwe.
Arile, i buku iy badih lami batun ateh lawe-en handru, idoh nyasou tan mwasin. Tasah, Kindrei atehei lami batun alawe ta tubuloh batun.
Arile, i buku ari ndramak anya kandres ta iri sahou tek nane dah, iy ki tanan i buku doh: Iri badih badeh, katubuloh batu iri buku iri anya kala bolo asiu ta Kindrei ta asolom. Ahi aposel, ma hawe iri lau ta Kindrei rayah ja badeh, ba-en hamon ta kandriyen ari ja bwe.
Na len dah jo anya katiye taha ta kandriyen aha marakon ka-en hamon ta aliy. Arile, jo anya kasehek ta kandriyen aha amekes udu bolo len ta aha atukum ta salom. Jo winiya batudun nyara aha ta kandriyen doh bwe. Tasah, kandriyen rayah aha amekes udu bolo tukum ta salom taha badeh, bamwenen bwe, eme ma, bwidi aha atalan.
Jo anya kasehek taha ma bwena ta lakou doh: Len ta atukum ta salom badeh, aha atalan laleyah; ari, ari in ndrahunen labai. Jo anuhun i buku iri sahou doh, handru.
Tasah, jo anyolom ndrokowa aha lau ta Kindrei badeh udu aliy. Sebwe, Kindrei anya kanone iri lau a-en hamon ta sahou handru le kameh kasahan keme lewan.
I buku len taha mari ta atukum, aha abudon anya, “Ahi anya kaimon nyamon ta Laban ai.” Arile, bwe!
Tasah, na len aha akohok nyamon, aha ari, ari badeh, batondrok iri lau rayah bwe. Aha abotatahan ta akohok nyamon taha amwenen, ma aha aimon. Eme ma, iri rayah ameson, ma iri rayah ja a-un waen solo-an, ma bwidi iri abo lolo-ou. Handru, idah asahan, tasah aha batukum nyamon bala se ta aseben iri lau, niri nyamon bwe.
Buku sah handru? Sebwe, aha badeh, ra-em asumwe aha ta aimon nyamon, ma a-un gwa are aliy bwe? Eme ma aha ame asiu ta Kindrei ta amekes iri kandriyen doh nadeh? Sebwe aha anya, iri lau ta Kindrei doh lakou laleyah, ma aha adeu bwilima ili ta nadu tine aha iri nane baimon nyamon bwe, nadeh? Jo kameh kasehek saba lakou kewek taha bah? Sebwe jo katudun nyara aha ai? Jo winiyan bwai!
Buku aha a-en hamon ta kandriyen mene ahi ndratehei ndrawek taha, aha winiyan bamekes kandriyen dah ja bwe. Tasah, sahou mene jo asehek taha badeh, badu mine Laban le ari. Sahou nane i buku doh: Na ben Judas atehei Jises ili mine iri lau ndra-in ta bahun, na le ben doh Jises andrei jabi ramen ere minen,
Ma, iy edeu wurah i ta Kindrei, ano iy abo-os jabi ramen doh i bwisik bwisik, ma iy asehek sahou ili toro lau tan i buku doh, “Idah odak amwenen. Jo edeu ta aseben ado. Ado kamekes kandriyen ki buku doh ta abudon jo.”
Oro aimon nyamon ano, iy eme kuhi bwiniu, eme iy amekes sahou i buku le bwena nane i buku doh, “Bwiniu waen dah, kalem ta sahou randra le ha-un ja, ta ndrayek amwenen. Len marakon aha atukum ta a-un waen dah, badeh, aha abudon jo.”
Len marakon aha aimon jabi ramen, ma aha a-un na bwesam doh, aha badeh, leheya iri lau ta imek ta Laban. Aha kamekes kili, winiya le len tan, ta iy eme hamon ja.
Nyamon ta Laban doh, iy lakou ari tinan handru. Arile, i buku ari mwan o badih, iy babudon bamwenen bwena ta iy aimon jabi ramen ta Laban bwe, ma iy a-un waen na bwesam ta Laban laleyah, idoh i buku iy ndrabwidi bada Laban ma ndraye Laban ndrandra-i, ya iy amwenen kameh akohok maha-an ta aliy.
Taha marakon kanyolom bolo ndrine taha ari, ari amwenen ma bwena, ano taha baraimon jabi ramen, ma a-un na bwesam ta Laban.
Buku ari ndramak, iy aimon jabi ramen, ma iy a-un na bwesam ta Laban laleyah, iy banyolom bamwenen bwe, iy ndramak doh, Kindrei kameh atehei iy i ta sahou, ma edeu maha-an ili tan.
Ta katin doh le, eme bwidi aha solo-an labai abo sik, ma aha nyamu aha bwe, eme ma bwidi aha rayah ndramak ndra-au.
Buku taha kanyolom ndrine taha ari, ari kamwenen bwena op, maha-an ta nyamon ta Laban kameh winiya basahan ta taha bwe.
Arile, i buku Laban edeu maha-an eme tataha, idoh ta aseben taha asahan nadun. Iy amekes i buku doh, ta taha sataku sala hawe iri lau badu kon munyak.
Aha kawas tek handru, i buku aha atukum ta aimon nyamon, aha sabotatahan ta aimon nyamon mwena, aha katondrok lau marakon kasahan op, ano aha baraimon nyamon.
Buku iy ari imeson labai, iy badeh, kaimon nyamon kudu ndra asiu tan mwena. Aha kamekes kili buku doh, kora-on tukum taha kabwidi aha kales kare ta mada sahou ta Laban. Jo kameh ewek barasehek taha ta iri lakou rayah mene aha ndremenya jo ta aliy.
Ya aha kawas tek, na idah jo anya kasehek taha, ta ndremenya taha mene eme tek, ta iri ndramas ta Malawin Ndrabun. Eme kameh, aha winiyan atanan mwasin ta aliy.
Aha kabudon, manyah taha bwena mene are ndra bolo lulik, ano aha ame lewan. Aha mene atehei aha ala bolo iri san ndra-in ta kindrei ta wendreya, ari koha iri bwe, iri lau amekes na sukumada kei.
Jo aso-ok na dah, aha katanan ta aleben iri malawin ndra-in, ma iri Malawin Mwasin ta Kindrei kamwenen. Buku Malawin Mwasin ta Kindrei irek ere ndrine ari mwan o badih, ma iy asehek sahou i tan, ya iy mwan o badih doh winiyan basehek sahou anya, “Jises ibo lolo-ou,” bwe. Ma ale, buku ari mwan o badih iy barek ta Malawin Ndrabun bwe, iy winiyan basehek anya, “Jises, badeh, Laban,” bwe.
Iri ndramas ta Malawin Ndrabun kede-eh solo-an labai. Arile, Malawin Mwasin badeh, ari le, ma iy edeu lakou doh eme tataha.
Taha winiyan amekes iri gok solo-an ta Laban. Arile, Laban badeh, ari le.
Kandriyen ta amekes gok kede-eh, iri solo-an labai, arile Kindrei badeh, ari le, ma iy edeu boto-on eme tataha lau marakon, ma taha winiya amekes iri gok doh.
Malawin Ndrabun badeh, ndraleheyani iy amwenen ndrame lewan ta lau ta Kindrei marakon. Iy amekes i buku doh, ta taha kaseben iri lau rayah ja.
Taha lau rayah badeh, winiya asehek sahou ta budon. Ya iri rayah ja winiya asehek sahou ta tanan, arile iri ndramas marakon doh badu mine Malawin Ndrabun le ari.
Lau rayah badeh, akohok budon handru badeh, boto-on labai. Ya lau rayah ja badeh akohok boto-on ta anyumor ndramak ibo sik amwenen ja. Iri lau mwan ma badih nane doh akohok ndramas ta Malawin Ndrabun ari le.
Ta iy ari ja badeh, iy edeu boto-on ta amekes lahou tinan ma kalem. Ta iy ari ja badeh, iy edeu ndramas ta asehek sahou buku propet. Ya, iy ari ja akohok ndramas ta seleya iri malawin marakon, ta Kindrei, deh bwe. Iy ari badeh, akohok ndramas ta asehek boho kon randrah labai ja. Iy ari ja akohok ndramas ta tobolowe iri boho kon doh, ma asehek ili tiri lau ta Kindrei.
Malawin Mwasin ari le nane adeh, amekes iri lakou marakon. Ta so-ok tan le, iy apwai ndramas tan marakon ili ta ndramak ari, ari.
Bada taha ari le, lakou solo-an badeh, udu aliy. Iri lakou mara-ei nane doh ahis are bada taha. Bada Krais badeh, i buku aliy.
Handru, taha rayah badeh, Juwis, ma rayah bwe. Taha rayah badeh, bonyo-ou, ma taha rayah badeh, bwe. Arile, Malawin Ndrabun ndratehei taha mara-ei ndrala ndrahis ta bada Krais le ari. Iy amekes doh bwena, kala taha mene alomwa taha na Malawin Ndrabun ari le nane, eme ma, Kindrei tiye iy ta eme ndrine taha mara-ei.
Sahou dah handru, bada taha kede-eh ari le bwe. Iy badeh, solo-an labai.
Sahou sokek ari i buku doh: Sebwe katim kameh asehek i buku doh, “Jo minem bwe. Eme ma, jo badu sese badam bwe.” Buku katim, iy abudon, ma iy asehek i buku le doh, kede-eh handru deh? Bo-oh!
O, i buku ndranyem anya, “Jo madam bwe, eme ma jo badu badam bwe.” I buku ndranyem tiye i buku doh, aha sanuhun sahou tan. Iy badeh, badu hawe badam amwenen.
I buku badam mara-ei ki madam le, ou winiya banuhun ari lakou bwe. Ma, i buku badam mara-ei ki ndranyem le, ou winiya bahon lakou bwe.
Arile, Kindrei ndratehei iri lakou marakon badu bada taha ili le se, in hamon ta tanan ma so-ok tan.
I buku badam ki sese le, ya badam handru kameh udu heh?
Arile, Kindrei bamekes bala buku aliy bwe. Iri lakou solo-an badeh, udu badam amwenen, arile, badam handru badeh, ari le.
Madam winiya basehek sahou bala ta minem anya, “Jo le winiyan, jo baso-ok ou bwe.” Ma batum winiya basehek sahou bala ta katim anya, “Jo le winiyan, jo baso-ok ou bwe.”
Badeh, bamwenen se bwai! Iri lakou rayah ou abudon, iri nyamu iri bwe, iri badu badam le amwenen. I buku iri bado badam bwe, badam kameh winiya bamwenen bwe.
Iri lakou rayah udu badam ou anya, iri ndra-in sese, ou badeh, nyosowani iri na nyasou solo-an. Ya, iri lakou rayah udu badam, bwilim ale ama ta aliy, ou badeh, tubuluhi iri amai udu mwasin labai.
Arile, lakou rayah udu badam, kone iri mwasin ja, badeh, bwai. Handru, Kindrei bwidi bada taha iri marakon ndrala le se. Ma bada taha rayah, i buku nyara iri bwe, Kindrei le amwenen edeu nyara iri.
Iy amekes i buku doh, ta bada taha iri satebelese, ma satalan laleyah, arile taha ari, ari winiyan atondrok iri rayah ta kandriyen randra le.
Buku bada taha sese atona isi, badeh, bwidi bada taha mara-ei isi. Buku bada taha sese sekesek ta akohok nyaran mwasin, idah kameh bada taha mara-ei sekesek labai.
Na dah bada aha marakon ndrahis ndrala bada Krais le ari, ma bada aha ari, ari badu hawe badan.
Udu bolo iri lau ta Kindrei, iy atehei iri aposel mwena, ano iri propet, hamon tiri propet, iri lau ta leheya. Ano iy ale atehei lau rayah ta amekes lahou tinan ma kalem, iri rayah ta anyumor lau abo sik, iri rayah ta aseben, iri rayah asahan kabin ta amekes lahou ta Kindrei, ma iri rayah ta asehek iri boho kon randrah labai ja.
Gok buku aposel, propet, ndramak ta leheya, ma ndramak ta amekes lahou tinan ma kalem; lau marakon winiya bamekes iri gok doh bwe.
Iri gok rayah ja ale, buku anyumor ndramak ibo sik, asehek boho kon randrah labai ja, ta tobolowe moso boho kon mara-ei; lau marakon winiya bamekes iri gok doh bwe.
Aha lau mwan ma badih badu Korin kede-eh amekes iri gok solo-an labai ta akohok ndramas ta Malawin Ndrabun. Arile, na dah, jo anya kaleheya aha ta san ari mwasin handru, ma iy udu bwele-en labai. San doh ta ou aso-ok iri lau rayah ja.
I buku jo kasehek sahou kili tiri lau mwan ma badih kili boho kon ta lau marakon, ma boho kon tiri angelo ale, arile jo batehei ndrinek mwasin bala tiri bwe, idah kameh jo i buku nyaro ndran, iri adi laleyah, ari moson bwe.
Ma i buku jo asehek sahou buku iri propet, ma jo ndratanan ta iri budon marakon ta Kindrei ale basahan bwe le, ma iri tanan marakon rayah ale, ma i buku budon tek boto-on labai winiya tohowei iri mandrei ili rasi ja, arile, i buku jo baso-ok ma batehei ndrinek mwasin bala tiri mwan ma badih bwe, badeh, kameh jo i buku lakou ndra-in laleyah.
Ano, i buku jo katehei iri lakou tek marakon kili tiri lau ndra-in, tiri lakou bwe, ma iri lau katawi jo, ma kasulumwi jo kandrakak ki-iu ki nyara salom, arile buku jo baso-ok ma batehei ndrinek mwasin bala tiri bwe, iri kandriyen tek marakon doh kameh winiya baseben se jo bwe!
Are ndramak iy aso-ok ndramak ari, ari, badeh, iy ta atondrok le ai; iy amekes kandriyen mwasin labai ta aseben ndramak ari, ari; iy ta madalikis ma lomondra ndra-in bwe, iy winiyan batudun nyaran bwe; ma iy winiyan balim aden bwe.
Ta aso-ok ndramak ari, ari, iy winiya bamekes lakou laleyah bwe. Iy winiya babudon iy le bwe, ma ndrinen winiya babolosen suwi bwe. Ta aso-ok ndramak ari, ari iy winiya babudon ndra-in iri nane amekes i tan bwena bwe.
Ta aso-ok ndramak ari, ari, iy winiya basekesek hawe iri kandriyen bamwenen bwe, arile iy badeh, sekesek hawe iri kandriyen mwasin ma handru.
Ta aso-ok ta ndramak ari, ari, iy udu le bwese iri maha-an. Buku maha-an asahan tan badeh, iy winiyan baruwani budon tan handru bwe, iy atondrok le Kindrei ta aseben iy. Handru, iy udu le ma iy ales boto-on na len mari.
Kandriyen ta aso-ok ndramak ari, ari badeh, winiya bano bwe. Arile, sahou iri propet asehek kameh ano. Iri ndramas ta asehek boho kon randrah ja kameh ano, ma hawe iri tanan tiri lau marakon kameh ano ale.
Tasah, na dah, tanan tataha tiri lakou badeh, sese le. Ma taha ale asehek sahou i buku iri propet badeh, sese le.
Arile, hamon kameh, iri lakou mwasin labai ja kameh asahan, ma iri lakou sese sese nane udu kada-ah kameh ano iu.
Sahou sokek ari i buku doh: Bwena mene jo ma nah nadu bwisik kahis, udu kala doh badeh, jo asehek sahou i buku iri nah nadu bwisik. Jo atona lakou i buku le iri nah nadu bwisik. Budon tek i buku nah nadu bwisik. Arile, udu hamon, jo asahan i ndramak awas badeh, jo ruwani kandriyen tiri nah nadu bwisik ano iu. I buku lakou ta Kindrei handru kameh eme, iri lakou sese sese le marakon doh kameh ano iu.
Na len dah taha anyolom iri lakou ta Kindrei asahan, arile taha bala tanan iy bala mwasin bwe. Idoh i buku taha anyolom malawi iri lakou doh ere kapa gwa. Handru, na len dah, badeh, jo tanan sese sese le tiri lakou baleu bamwenen handru bwe. Arile, udu hamon ta len dah, jo anyolom mada Kindrei handru, ma jo i tanan iy amwenen, i buku le iy ndratanan jo ndra bwena labai.
Kabwai, arile kandriyen ma taloh le. Kandriyen ma taloh kameh winiya bano bwe, oro kameh alih kahis le: Kandriyen ta atehei budon tataha kili ta Kindrei le ari; kandriyen ta atondrok Kindrei le ari; ma kandriyen ta aso-ok ndramak ari, ari. Kandriyen ari le udu bwele-e oro ma taloh badeh, kandriyen ta atehei ndrine taha mwasin ta aso-ok ndramak ari, ari.
Ya, aha badeh, ka-en hamon ta kandriyen ta adeu ndrine aha ta aso-ok ndramak ari, ari. Kandriyen le doh udu bwele-en mara-ei. Ma aha ale kaso-ok labai ta akohok iri ndramas, Malawin Ndrabun edeu eme tataha. Handru, ndramas ari le mwasin labai, aha ale asa-ar ma atehei budon taha ta akohok badeh, gok propet. Idoh le badeh, iy katin ta atiye sahou mara-ei ta Kindrei.
I buku ou akohok ndramas ta asehek boho kon randrah ja, ale iri lau rayah tana iri bwe, ou asehek amwenen ili ta Kindrei. Iy le ari badeh, tanan iri lakou marakon nane ou asehek. Ari ndramak ja winiya bala tanan ta moso iri sahou nane ou asehek ta aliy bwe. Ou asehek lakou Malawin Mwasin le ari tanan.
Arile, buku ou asehek sahou boho Kindrei, ou asehek amwenen ili tiri lau. Iri sahou tam nane doh atadau budon tiri abadok, sekeyani iri ta amekes kandriyen mwasin, ma amekes ndrine iri udu mwasin labai.
Are ndramak iy asehek boho kon randrah ja, idoh badeh, aseben ndrinen le ari udu mwasin. Arile iy ndramak iy asehek sahou ta Kindrei, iy ndramak doh badeh, iy atadau ma amekes budon tiri lau ta Kindrei abadok.
Jo Pol, jo aso-ok aha lau marakon ki tana aha ta asehek iri boho kon rakon ja. Arile, lakou ari jo aso-ok tinan labai ja badeh, ta aha katiye sahou ta Kindrei. Are lau iy tanan boho iri kon rakon ja, iy katobolowe iri sahou, idah kameh iri lau ta Kindrei winiya akohok boto-on ta iri sahou tan. Buku iy batobolowe iri sahou bwe, iy kameh winiya basahan bala buku ndramak ale atiye sahou ta Kindrei, bwe. Ndramak ta atiye sahou ta Kindrei kameh asahan bwena le ai. Tasah, sahou tan badeh irih, ma atadau iri lau ta Kindrei ta adeu budon tiri handru i tan.
Aha nadu tine, ma aha kawas tek, aha kabudon bolo iri sahou doh kamwenen: Jo winiyan ewek hawe aha ma jo winiya asehek boho kon rakon ja. Arile, buku jo basehek taha ta iri sahou rayah ta Kindrei, iy nane leheya eme tek, o, i buku jo badeu taha iri tanan mwasin bwe, o, jo basehek sahou ta Kindrei bwe, o, jo baleheya aha ta moso sahou ta Kindrei bwe, ya, barala buku sah kameh jo kaseben aha?
Aha kanuhun sahou sokek dah se: Lakou koha iri bwe, buku ndrah, bala-eu, ma ndran, buku iy bamekes nyaron randrah, randrah bwe, ya, kili buku sah handru kameh taha kanuhun nyaro ndran amwenen?
I buku ndran ta luloh bala bwe, are lau handru kameh baralokou lakou? Sebwe kameh bwe nadeh.
Aha i buku aliy ale, buku aha asehek boho kon rakon ja, ale iri lau tana iri bwe, ya iri lau katanan moso sahou barala buku sah handru? Idah kameh sahou taha iu laleyah, ari ndramak winiya banuhun bwe.
Handru, boho kon tataha badeh, solo-an labai udu bolo kon munyak dah, arile, iri boho kon tataha marakon doh, moso iri sahou mwasin ta ariu budon ta lau mwan ma badih marakon aleu.
Buku jo tanan ma jo banuhun boho kon iy ndramak nane asehek doh bwe, idah kameh jo anya, iy kede-eh badu leheleh. Ma iy kede-eh anya, jo badu leheleh ale.
Sahou sokek nane dah, badeh, ta kandriyen aha amekes. Aha aso-ok labai ta akohok ndramas ta Malawin Ndrabun, ma aha abudon anya, ndramas ta asehek boho kon rakon ja badeh, ndramas ari mwasin handru. Idoh mwasin, arile aha kabadok ta akohok iri ndramas randrah ja ta atadau lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei kabadok.
Ta katin doh le, i buku taha asehek sahou ili boho kon rakon ja, eme lau rayah tana iri bwe, taha badeh, kasolom kili ta Kindrei ta boto-on tan keme tataha ta tobolowe moso iri sahou kamwenen.
Aha kabudon. Buku jo asolom ili ta Kindrei i boho kon rakon ja, idoh badeh, malawik le asolom, arile budon tek mari badeh, udu laleyah, bakohok ari seben bwe.
Idah kameh jo kamekes barala buku sah handru? Sebwe, jo kameh asolom ili ta Kindrei na malawik, ma na iri budon tek marakon. Jo ale kiyah wari na malawik, ma na iri budon tek marakon ale.
I buku aha adeu wurah ili ta Kindrei na boho kon rakon ja, malawi aha le badeh, asehek. Eme ma, i buku lau rayah laleyah are bolo aha, iri kameh winiyan anuhun sahou doh, deh? Iri kameh winiyan asehek, “Handru,” deh? Bwe! Tasah, iri winiya bala tanan ta saba sahou handru aha asehek ili ta Kindrei, bwe.
Aha atudun nyara Kindrei mwasin labai, arile aha batadau iri lau rayah laleyah nane are bolo aha babadok se bwe.
Jo Pol, jo edeu wurah i ta Kindrei ta jo winiyan asehek boho kon rakon ja, aha winiyan basehek bala buku jo asehek bwe.
Arile, buku iri lau ta Kindrei katukum badeh, jo anya kasehek sahou ma limeh le kili boho kon iri marakon tanan. Jo bwalek ta amekes sahou solo-an labai (lakou buku 10,000) ili boho kon rakon ja, iri nane tanan moson ta aliy bwe. Iri sahou solo-an labai doh kameh baraseben iri barala buku sah? Winiyan bwe-en!
Aha kawas tek, budon taha sala buku tiri nadu nah bwisik. Arile, i buku iri nadu nah bwisik badeh, tana iri ari kandriyen ndra-in bwe, aha lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei badeh, kasahan buku le aliy. Ta kandriyen mwasin handru ja badeh, budon taha keme kasahan ki buku lau mwan ma badih en, iri tana iri ta lakou marakon doh.
Udu bolo buk ndrabun, Laban asehek i buku doh: “Jo kameh andrei iri lau leheleh, boho kon tiri randrah ja, ame asehek sahou ili tiri lau tek. Iri lau leheleh kameh asehek sahou ili tiri lau tek i boho kon rakon ja, arile iri lau tek winiya banuhun jo bwe le.”
Eme ma, sahou dah leheya taha, ta kandriyen ta amekes sahou ili boho kon rakon ja, Kindrei amekes ta aseben iri lau mwan ma badih batehei budon tiri ba-en tan bwe. Arile, kandriyen ta atiye sahou ta Kindrei eme lewan buku propet, badeh, Kindrei edeu ili tiri lau mwan ma badih, iri atehei budon tiri handru in tan.
Eme ma, buku aha lau ta Kindrei atukum a se, ma aha marakon kamekes sahou ta boho kon rakon, rakon, aha kabudon kamwenen op. Buku lau rayah tana iri bwe, ma batehei budon tiri bwe, buku iri kame bolon ale kanuhun aha, iri kameh abudon i buku sah bah? Sebwe, iri kameh asehek i buku doh, “Aha ndralolo-ou.”
Arile, i buku are lau nane iy batehei budon tan mari bala ta Kindrei bwe, o, are lau nane bala tanan bwe, iy eme bolon, iy anuhun aha marakon asehek sahou ta propet, idah kameh sahou taha mari orowei ndrinen ma nyuwani iri kandriyen ndra-in tan marakon iy amekes.
Iri kandriyen ndra-in tan marakon nane aton mara-ei asahan eme lewan. Iy kameh atehei bwili ndru-un i andri, ma iy atudun nyara Kindrei. Iy kameh tiye i buku doh, “Handru labai, Kindrei udu hawe aha kada-ah.”
Aha kawas tek, buku aha anya katukum ta atudun nyara Kindrei, aha kamekes saba lakou handru? Gok taha marakon udu aliy: Iy ari badeh, ta wari ai, iy ari ta leheya lau, iy ari ta asehek sahou Kindrei edeu i tan ta tiye ili tiri lau, iy ari ta asehek boho kon rakon ja; gok ta iy ari ja ta tobolowe boho kon nane doh. Handru, aha kamekes iri lakou marakon doh, ta atadau aha lau ta Kindrei kales boto-on.
Buku aha rayah anya kasehek boho kon rakon ja badeh, mwasin ta uru la-uh le, o, oro taloh le ka-iy kamekes. Oro le doh winiyan. Ya oro samekes sahou toro sala le rasan; iy ari asehek tan op, ano, iy ari ja, oro mari kamekes kili le buku doh. Ya ndramak ari ja badeh, kudu aliy ta tobolowe sahou toro.
I buku ari ndramak bado aliy ta tobolowe sahou toro bwe, ou amundru le, ou asehek sahou ki tam amwenen ma kili ta Kindrei.
Winiya lau la-uh, o, lau taloh ta tiye sahou ta Kindrei buku iri propet. Oro le lau doh winiya tiye sahou ta Kindrei. Ya iri lau rayah ja manyah winiya anuhun moso bolo sahou toro, eme ta Kindrei handru, deh bwe.
Buku iy ari nane manyah udu andri, Kindrei asehek sahou i tan, iy ndramak nane asehek sahou badeh, sasehek sahou op, ndramak ari ja kili kasehek sahou.
Ta kandriyen nane doh, idah kameh aha marakon winiya asehek sahou; iy ari op, ano iy ari ja. Idah kameh aha marakon winiya akohok tanan hawe boto-on.
Handru, aha winiyan a-en hamon ta kandriyen jo ndrasehek taha. Tasah, iri propet ta Kindrei handru badeh, atondrok malawi iri ma boho iri amwenen, buku iri anya kasehek sahou.
Jo kasehek, tasah Kindrei kede-eh winiya bawahei iri lakou laleyah bwe. Iy amekes ndrine taha amwenen, ma manyah tataha kudu mwasin.
Buku iri lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei atukum a se, iri badih badeh, winiya bamekes sahou bwe. Iri kandru-uk le ai. Iri lau ta Kindrei tataha rayah kede-eh badeh, amekes i buku le aliy. Iri badih badeh, winiya basahan kabin ta lau ta Kindrei bwe. Iri kare le bahandra tondrok tiri mwan, i buku le sahou batanau iri Juwis ndrasehek.
Buku ari badih, iy anya ki tanan moso ari sahou, mwasin ta iy kandremenya udun, buku oro ala hamon ala asiu toro amwenen. Tasah, buku iy badih amekes sahou udu bolo tukum tiri lau ta Kindrei are le se, iy badeh bamekes kandriyen bamwenen bwe, ma iy atehei bwilima ili tan amwenen.
Buku sah? Aha kede-eh anya kandriyen taha badeh, mwasin labai ja, tiri lau ta Kindrei rayah ja nadeh? Sebwe, aha le badeh kati sahou handru ta Kindrei ai? Sebwe aha le badeh, akohok sahou ta Kindrei ai? Ya, iri lau mwan ma badih rayah ja bwai? Bwe. Eme ma, jo aso-ok aha ka-en hamon ta sahou jo ndrasehek ndrawek taha.
Jo Pol, jo asehek i buku doh: I buku ou are lau, ou anya, ou asehek sahou ta Kindrei buku iri propet, o, ou anya budon ta Malawin Ndrabun udu tam, ou ki tanam kudu mwasin ta iri sahou marakon jo nane atorou ewek taha, idoh badeh, batanau ta Laban.
Arile, i buku are lau, iy ba-en hamon ta sahou batanau dah bwe, aha sanuhun iy, ma aha sa-en hamon tan.
Aha kawas tek, ma aha nadu tine, aha katehei budon taha mari kili ta atiye sahou ta Kindrei, ma aha satehei ndrabun sala ta are lau ta asehek sahou i boho kon rakon ja.
Arile, aha kamekes lakou marakon kili san mwasin, ma ki-in hamon ta kandriyen ta Kindrei.
Aha kawas tek, ma aha nadu tine, jo anya kasehek taha ja, ta aha samani iri sahou mwasin ta Kindrei mene jo ndrasehek ndrawek taha. Eme ma, aha ndratehei budon taha boto-on ndra-en hamon ta aliy.
Sahou mwasin ta Kindrei le doh badeh, akohok aha ame hamon, buku aha a-en hamon handru ta sahou, jo mene ndrasehek taha. Arile, buku aha bala tanan saba lakou aha atehei budon taha in tan bwe, ma aha atehei budon taha laleyah, eme ma sahou mwasin doh baseben aha bwe.
Jo ndrasehek taha ta sahou laba tinan labai, sahou nane doh jo akohok bwena. Moso sahou nane i buku doh: Krais mene imek badeh, ta talou taha ado ta kandriyen ndra-in tataha marakon ame len, i buku le ndratorowenei udu bolo buk ndrabun ta Kindrei.
Iri ahi iy ili andri bolo lek; udu bolo len ma taloh ano Kindrei mete-ei iy ja. Idoh le buku sahou udu bolo buk ndrabun ta Kindrei asehek.
Krais ma mwena asahan hawe Pita, ano ja iy asahan hawe oro lau tan ma ronoh la-uh.
Udu hamon ja, kane iri udu bwele-en ta ma lemenek (500) badeh, anyolom iy. Arile, eme ano kada-ah badeh, iri solo-an are kede-eh kahis, rayah ndramak.
Iy ale asahan hawe Jemis, ano iy barasahan hawe oro aposel tan marakon.
Udu hamon ta lau marakon ano, iy asahan eme madak amwenen. Kala doh badeh, jo i buku nah, tinen anya kedeu iy bado bada len tan amwenen bwe.
Jo badeh, nadu bwisik labai udu bolo iri aposel. Jo asehek i buku doh, tasah jo bwena mene amekes bahun ma adai iri lau ta Kindrei. Idoh le bwidiy, eme, udu budon tek anya, jo nadu bwisik labai ta aha aloh jo buku aposel.
Arile, Kindrei badeh, mwasin labai! Iy bwidi jo asahan aposel tan, ma jo udu kada-ah, ma tikisiy tan eme tek badeh, bala laleyah bwe. Jo amekes gok boto-on labai udu bwele-en ja tiri aposel tan. Arile, jo le amwenen bamekes iri gok marakon nane doh bwe. Kindrei tikisi jo, iy eme atehei boto-on eme tek ta amekes iri gok marakon nane doh.
Arile, buku jo amekes, o, oro aposel rayah mene amekes gok doh, ari sahou ta aliy bwe. Lakou handru i buku doh: Ahi mari kede-eh atiye sahou ari le doh. Eme ma, aha mara-ei ndratehei budon taha ndra-en ta sahou mwasin doh.
I buku ahi aposel atiye iri sahou mwasin ta nyala Krais imek ano iy amak eme awas ja, buku sah handru lau rayah ado bolo aha asehek anya, iri lau marakon ndramak ndra bwena, iri winiya bamak bame awas ja bwe?
I buku iri lau doh asehek sahou handru, anya, “Iri lau mene ndramak bwena badeh, winiya bamak bame awas ja bwe;” buku handru eh, taha kasehek anya, “Krais buku aliy ale, Kindrei badeh, bamete-ei iy bwe.”
I buku Krais imek, ma iy bamak bame awas ja bwe, idah kameh atiye sahou ta taha doh kameh i lakou laleyah, ma budon taha handru ale winiya baseben aha bwe, ta amak ame awas ja, ma akohok koha aha ta udu le buku doh.
Anya i buku aliy eh, ahi ndrasahan buku iri lau ta asehek sahou wendreya ta iri lakou ale Kindrei amekes. Tasah, ahi ndrasihidi sahou mari ndrame lewan tiri lau, i buku Kindrei mene mete-ei Krais imek udu bolo lek tan amak eme awas ja. Arile, buku idoh i handru, ta Kindrei winiyan bamak lau mene ndramak bwena bwe, iy badeh, ale bamete-ei Krais bwe.
I buku sahou handru anya iri lau ndramak bwena, Kindrei bamete-ei iri ja bwe, mwasin, taha kasehek ki buk doh, “Kindrei badeh bamete-ei Krais udu bolo lek tan bwe.”
Ya, i buku sahou handru anya Kindrei bamete-ei Krais udu bolo lek tan bwe, idah kameh aha atehei budon taha in tan kede-eh winiya baseben aha bwe. Aha kameh ado ndra bolo kandriyen ndra-in taha kahis.
Ya, iri lau ale atehei budon tiri marakon in ta Krais, arile iri ndramak bwena, iri lau doh ndra-au laleyah.
Taha atehei budon tataha handru in ta Krais, ma atondrok iy ta eme hamon ta akohok taha ja. Arile, buku taha atondrok seben ma mwasin tan eme tataha na len taha are kon munyak dah le, manyah tataha bado mwasin bwe, eme ma, ndra-in tataha ja udu bwele-en labai ta ndra-in tiri lau rayah badu kon munyak dah. Ma iri katikisi taha handru.
Arile, bala buku doh bwe. Krais ndramak, ma idoh handru, Kindrei mene mete-ei iy eme hamon eme awas ja. Iy amak ere bwena labai ta lau marakon mene ndramak bwena, i buku nyamon badu bilin uni ma bwena. Idoh ale leheya iri mwan ma badih atehei budon tiri handru in ta Krais, iri ale kameh amak ame awas ja.
Sahou dah handru. Tasah, ndramak ari nyaran Adam, iy mene bwidi kandriyen ta imek asahan. Ano ja, ndramak ari, nyaran Krais, eme bwidi kandriyen ta amak eme awas ja badeh, asahan.
I buku doh: Iri lau mwan ma badih bwena mene ahis hawe Adam, iri marakon badeh ndramak. I buku le, iri lau mwan ma badih ahis handru hawe Krais, iri kameh amak ame awas ja, ma akohok koha iri mwasin.
Arile, taha marakon ado bolo lek tataha kameh amak ame awas ja, na bolo len tataha amwenen. Ma bwena handru badeh, Krais amak eme awas ja. Ano, udu ta len iy anya keme hamon ja, taha lau tan marakon, kameh amak ame awas ja.
Na bolo len doh kameh, iri lakou marakon kameh ano iu. Ma Krais kameh bwidi iri kabin marakon, iri lau bwele-en, iri malawin boto-on ta amekes bahun hawe Kindrei, iri marakon doh kameh ano au. Ano kameh, Krais baradeu tondrok tan barala mine taman Kindrei.
Tasah, Krais kameh atondrok kon marakon winiyan le Kindrei baratehei iri lau ta ato-ou kaliu barala bahandra katin.
Iy asahan nyekelen ta iy amekes bahun hawe iri lau ta ato-ou kaliu, ano kameh iy amekes bahun hawe imek ta akohok iy kano ki-iu ale.
Iri torowenei udu bolo buk ndrabun asehek i buku doh, “Kindrei mene atehei iri lakou marakon udu bahandra tondrok tan.” Eme ma, taha atanan, ta Kindrei ndratehei lakou marakon ndrala bahandra tondrok ta Krais. Arile, Kindrei le amwenen bado hawe iri lakou doh bwe.
Hamon kameh, iri lakou marakon ano ili le bahandra Krais, ano Nadu Kindrei atehei iy amwenen ili bahandra taman Kindrei, iy mene atehei udu bahandra tondrok ta Krais. Ma Kindrei kameh udu bwena ta atondrok iri lakou marakon.
Ya ndremenya tek rayah i buku doh: Sahou ta Kindrei dah kameh mete-ei iri lau mwan ma badih ndramak bwena ado bolo lek tiri amak ame awas ja. Buku sahou dah handru bwe, tasah handru lau rayah ja anyu ta aseben iri lau mene ndramak bwena? Ya, saba tanan handru iri anya kamekes? Ya, buku iri lau mene ndramak, bamak bame awas ja bwe, tasah handru lau rayah anyu ta aseben iri ja?
Ou anyolom ahi ale. Len marakon lau rayah anya kadi ahi, tasah ahi badeh, ta atiye sahou ta Jises Krais. Buku Kindrei winiya bamete-ei ahi bwe, tasah handru ahi akohok sisi-in ta amekes iri gok nane doh?
Aha nadu tine mwan ma badih, na bolo len marakon jo atona iri lau anya kadi jo kimek ki-iu. Jo asehek sahou handru! Arile, jo sekesek tinan labai ta gok mene jo amekes ta akohok aha ame hawe Jises Krais, eme ma, jo asehek iri sahou dah.
I buku sahou handru anya, iri lau ndramak bwena Kindrei bamete-ei iri ja bwe, mwasin taha kasehek ki buku doh: “Abo, ndri-iy ai! Taha kaimon nyamon, ma ka-un gwa na dah; tasah na bi-i kameh taha amak au.” Arile, jo ba-en hamon ta budon ma kandriyen doh bwe. Buku jo anya ki-in hamon ta aliy handru, buku sah ja jo katebelese hawe iri Epesus nane a-en hamon ta kandriyen ndra-in buku iri bondriliu? Ya, buku jo kimek laleyah, jo kameh kudu mwasin ki buku sah handru?
Aha sanuhun iri lau rayah awek wendreya aha. Aha ndratanan iri sahou dah: “Buku taha ka-en hamon hawe iri lau ndra-in, idah kameh iri adi kandriyen tataha mwasin iu.”
Aha kamani iri kandriyen lolo-ou taha ki-iu, ma budon taha kamwenen. Aha samekes iri kandriyen ndra-in ja ai. Aha kanuhun! Iri taha rayah badeh, bala tanan ta Kindrei bwe le. Jo amekes iri sahou dah ewek taha ta bwili aha kama ta iri kandriyen taha.
Sebwe lau rayah kameh ndremenya i buku doh: “Iri lau mwan ma badih iri ndramak ndra bwena ndra-au, i buku sah handru kameh iri kamak kame awas ja? Iri kameh amak ame awas ja, ya bada iri kameh ili buku sah handru?”
Are lau mwan o badih iy asehek sahou ale i buku doh, iy se balen bwai! Ya ou ndratanam ta atah buwa kei, i buku babosar ma bamak bwe, idah kameh nyubudon winiya bateh bame loken bwe.
Buwa kei nane ou tahiy, idoh bala buku iri kei hamon kameh asahan i kuhuyen bwe. Ou badeh, tahi buwan laleyah.
Na so-ok tan le amwenen, Kindrei edeu bada iri, amwenen ta buwa iri ari ari.
Bada iri lakou mulin marakon are bwele-e munyak badeh, ari randrah, ari randrah labai. Bada taha ndramak badeh, ari ai, ya bada iri lakou buku bou badeh, i randrah ja ai. Ya iri sirih badeh, bada iri i randrah ale, ma iri ni bada iri i randrah ale.
Bolo kandrah badeh, bada iri lakou solo-an udu aliy, ma bolo kon munyak ale, bada iri lakou solo-an udu aliy. Lomada bada iri lakou badu bolo kandrah badeh, i randrah, randrah labai, ya lomada bada iri lakou badu munyak badeh, i randrah labai ja.
Taha anyolom an badeh, nyasou tan randrah labai, bun nyasou tan randrah labai, ya iri ndrau anya na ben udu kandrah, nyasou tiri badeh, randrah labai. Ya, udu bolo ndrokowa iri ndrau mari, lomada iy ari ma nyasou tan, i randrah labai ta iy ari ja.
Kandriyen ta lau ndramak ndra bolo lek, ma lau amak ame awas ja badeh, i buku le aliy. Bada taha udu bolo lek badeh, abola, ma bada taha udu bolo lek amak eme awas ja badeh, kameh winiya bandra-i ma babola ja bwe.
Buku taha amak, iri ahi taha ala bolo lek, idoh lakou ari ndra-in handru. Bada taha udu bolo lek, amak ja eme awas, idoh mwasin ja. Bada taha ndramak a-eh ili bolo ndren, iy ari boto-on bwe. Bada taha udu bolo lek amak eme awas ja, badeh, boto-on labai.
Bada taha imek a-eh ili lek, idoh ta munyak labai. Bada taha amak udu bolo lek eme awas ja badeh randrah labai ja, idoh Malawin Ndrabun edeu kohan ili tan.
Iri torowenei sahou udu bolo buk ndrabun ta Kindrei i buku doh, “Ndramak ma bwena handru badeh, Adam, iy andrei kohan.” Arile Adam ari ja badeh, asahan hamon labai, iy asahan ta Malawin Mwasin ta edeu kohan handru ili ta lau marakon.
Koha kon munyak badeh, asahan bwena handru. Arile, koha Malawin Mwasin asahan hamon, ma iy udu bwele-en labai ja.
Adam ma bwena badeh, badu kon munyak. Kindrei bwidi iy badeh, na le munyak. Adam ari hamon ja badeh, badu bolo kandrah.
Iri lau marakon badu munyak badeh, a buku le iy ndramak nane badu munyak. Ya iri lau marakon badu kandrah kameh asahan i buku le iy ndramak nane badu kandrah.
Na idah ja badeh, taha ado buku le iy ndramak nane badu munyak. I buku hamon ja kameh, taha asahan i buku le iy ndramak nane badu kandrah.
Aha nadu tine, jo asehek amwenen ewek taha, ndramak badu munyak dah winiyan bala bolo tondrok ta Kindrei bwe, ma iy winiyan bakohok iri lakou marakon mwasin tan bwe. Ma iri lakou kameh andra-i, iri winiyan bakohok iri lakou ale winiyan bandra-i bwe.
Aha mari kanuhun. Jo anya kasehek sahou ari doh, lau banuhun bwena bwe, kewek taha: Idah kameh taha marakon bamak bala lek bwe. Na len Krais eme hamon ja, taha rayah kameh ado ndra loken kahis. Arile taha marakon kameh nyolom tataha i randrah ja, ma taha asahan randrah labai.
Idoh kameh asahan suwi labai udu bolo len ta ndrah ari eden in hamon handru. Handru, ndrah nane kameh eden, ma iri lau ndramak ndra bwena, iri marakon kameh amak ame awas ja. Ya iri kameh winiyan bandra-i ja bwe. Ya taha lau ale bamak bwe le, Kindrei kameh tubuni taha ili randrah labai ja.
Kandriyen tataha ta ndramak imek doh kameh winiya bado ja bwe. Kindrei kameh akahei mara-ei iu; kohan handru ta udu le buku doh kameh akohok ndrahune kandriyen ta imek nane doh.
Handru, bada taha kameh imek, ano abola. Arile, Kindrei kameh tubuni iy ja, ma kohan kameh udu luluwen udu le buku doh. Na bolo len doh sahou udu bolo buk ndrabun asehek, kameh asahan handru: “Kindrei amekes bahun hawe kandriyen ta imek, ma iy idi iri kandriyen ndra-in ta imek marakon ano iu.”
“Ya ou, kandriyen ta imek, boto-on tam ta atik iri lau mene, ndraheh?”
Nyamu imek ta edeu sisi-in badeh, ta kandriyen ndra-in. Ma boto-on ta kandriyen ndra-in doh, eme ta batanau Kindrei mene atehei ili mine Moses.
Arile, taha kadeu wurah kili ta Kindrei. Na le boto-on ta tinan tataha Jises Krais, Kindrei amekes taha abadok, ta adi iri kandriyen ndra-in ta imek marakon kano ki-iu.
Eme ma, aha nadu tine mwan ma badih i san ta Krais, aha kabadok, ma aha kado le rasi. Tasah aha ndratanan, lahou boto-on aha amekes ta Laban kameh winiya ba-au laleyah bwe.
Na idah jo anya katiye ta luk nane aha anya katukum kili tiri lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei iri ado Jerusalem. Jo ndraleheyani san ta amekes gok nane doh ndrala tiri lau ta Kindrei badu loboho Galesiya, ma aha ale ka-en hamon le ta kandriyen nane iri amekes.
Na len bwena ta wik marakon, aha ari, ari, kabudon ta iri luk nane aha akohok na bolo len mene ndra-au on! Ya, aha kapwai luk, ano aha katehei rayah kamwenen kudu ndra bolo asiu taha kabe-en madasan ta amekes gok ta Laban. Ma luk kameh winiya a sola sese. Eme ma, buku len jo ewek badeh, aha winiya babo gok ta asilah luk ta adeu ili tiri ja, bwai.
Len jo asahan badeh, jo aso-ok aha amwenen katehei rayah lau ta atiye luk taha nane ta ili Jerusalem. Jo kameh atehei la-ukei ramen ili mine oro, ma tiye oro ta ala. La-ukei tek doh kameh asehek ta oro lau heh handru, ma oro amekes saba lakou handru.
I buku jo abudon ta ili ale, mwasin, oro marakon kame hawek op, ano aso barala.
Jo ta ewek hawe aha, arile jo kameh ili anyolom iri lau ado loboho Masadoniya mwena, ano badeh, jo barasahan hawe aha.
Sebwe, jo kameh udu hawe aha luluwen sese. Jo bala tanan bwai, sebwe jo kameh udu hawe aha winiya le len ta nyala, ma jor amondrei. Ano, jo anya kili kon rakon ja badeh, jo aso-ok aha kaseben jo ta ili.
Aha ndratanan, udu bolo tekedek tek badeh, jo bwalek ewek manyah hawe aha ta ben ari le. Buku Laban aso-ok handru, jo aso-ok labai ta udu hawe aha luluwen sese.
Arile, jo anya kudu ndra kon tinan Epesus op, winiya le len tinan ta Pentikos ano.
Tasah, Kindrei ndrasihi san, ma iy atehei gok laba tinan eme tek ta aseben lau solo-an kasahan lau tan. Jo anya kamekes gok dah kili ma kabadok, arile handru, lau solo-an ndra-in ale ado aliy ta anya katuruk gok tek sala.
Buku Timoti kasahan hawe aha, jo aso-ok aha kaseben iy, ta ndrinen kudu mwasin ta ndrokowa aha, ma iy sanoh. Tasah, iy amekes lahou ta Laban, i buku le jo amekes.
Kora-on iri rayah taha kanyolom iy i buku ari ndramak laleyah, ma iri katehei kona iri ki tan. Aha kabwidi ndrinen kudu mwasin, ma aha kaseben iy ta san. Eme ma, iy kameh winiyan eme hamon eme hawek ja. Jo hawe iri lau rayah ta Kindrei atondrok iy ado kada-ah.
Ya sahou ta nadu tine taha Apolos, i buku doh: San solo-an labai jo asehek sahou boto-on ili tan, ta iy kili hawe iri rayah lau ta Kindrei, iri kawek kanyolom aha. Arile, iy bwalen ewek na dah. Udu ja, buku iy anyolom len mwasin ta ewek, idah kameh iy barawek ai.
Aha katehei ndrokei kamwenen ta Krais kameh eme hamon ja. Ma aha kales boto-on ta budon taha ari le. Aha kabadok kado le, ma aha sanoh.
Ta iri lakou marakon aha amekes, aha badeh, ka-en hamon le ta kandriyen ta aso-ok handru iri lau rayah ja.
Aha nadu tine i san ta Krais, aha tanan, Stepanas oro badeh, ndrasahan iri lau ta Kindrei ma bwena handru, ta iri lau rayah ja ado bolo kon tinan Akaya. Na so-ok toro le, oro amekes gok ta aseben iri lau ta Kindrei.
Jo asehek sahou boto-on ewek taha, ta aha kanuhun ma aha ka-en hamon ta iri lau nane doh, ma ta iri lau amekes gok boto-on ta aseben iri nane amekes gok dah.
Stepanas uru Potunatus hawe Akaikus oro ma taloh mene ame hawek. Eme bwidi jo sekesek labai ta anyolom oro, tasah aha marakon winiyan bame dah banyolom jo bwe. Oro ma taloh nane doh akohok ndrahune aha ta amekes gok doh ta aseben jo.
Jo badeh abwerei sese, arile oro lau ma taloh doh ame badeh, bwidi ndrinek ma hawe ndrine aha sekesek ale. Eme ma aha badeh, kasekesek iri lau buku doh.
Iri lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei badu bolo kon tinan Esiya tiye sekesek tiri ewek taha. Akwila uru Prisila hawe iri lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei badeh, atukum ala le asiu turu, eme iri tiye sekesek tiri tinan ewek taha in ta nyara Laban.
Iri nadu tine taha rayah are kada-ah tiye sekesek tiri tinan ewek taha ale. Ta kandriyen tataha lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, aha marakon kateu mine nadu tine aha ari, ari, iri are ndrokowa aha amwenen.
Ta sendrehendreh ta la-ukei tek dah, jo Pol, jo atorou sahou sekesek tek ewek taha na minek le amwenen.
Buku ari ndramak mwan, o, badih iy baso-ok Laban bwe, jo aso-ok iy kakohok maha-an ma sisi-in ndra-in kudu le buku doh. Maranata!
Tikisiy ta Laban Jisas kudu hawe aha.
So-ok tek tinan labai ewek taha mara-ei aha are ahis hawe Krais Jisas. Handru.
Jo Pol, jo aposel ari ta Krais Jises. Ta so-ok ta Kindrei le amwenen, iy atehei jo asahan aposel. Jo hawe nadu tine taha ari Timoti, aru mala-uh atorou la-ukei dah ewek taha mwan ma badih ta Kindrei are kon Korin, hawe iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei marakon are loboho kon munyak tinan Akaya.
Aru mala-uh anya tama taha Kindrei, hawe Laban Jises Krais, uru kamekes kandriyen ta tikisiy kewek taha, ma kamekes ndrine aha kamunum.
Jo sekesek handru i ta Kindrei, iy tama Laban tataha Jises Krais. Ma iy kati iri kandriyen handru ta tikisiy, ma iy amekes maha-an udu ndrine iri mwan ma badih amunum.
Ya, iy bwidi ndrine ahi amunum, na len iri maha-an ame asahan ma ndruni ahi. Tasah, iy bwidi ahi winiyan ta aseben ndrine iri mwan ma badih rayah ja maha-an solo-an labai udu tiri, ma ndrine iri winiyan amunum i buku ahi.
Krais mene bwese maha-an ma iy akohok sisi-in. Ahi ale bwese maha-an ma akohok sisi-in i buku le iy. Eme ma, ahi ahis hawe Krais ma Kindrei badeh, aseben ahi i buku le iy mene aseben Krais.
Na len ahi bwese maha-an, idoh aseben aha ma Kindrei winiyan andrei aha ame hamon. Na len Kindrei aseben ahi ma ndrine ahi amunum udu le udu, idoh badeh, aseben ndrine aha winiyan udu mwasin ale. Ya, len aha ales boto-on, ma bwese iri maha-an i buku ahi ale bwese, Kindrei badeh, amekes ndrine aha amunum.
Eme ma, ahi abudon aha kameh ales boto-on ta iri maha-an asahan. Tasah, ahi tanan aha bwese maha-an hawe ahi, ano kameh Kindrei amekes ndrine aha hawe ndrine ahi amunum.
Ahi atorou sahou dah ewek taha. Tasah, ahi anya aha kameh katanan ta iri maha-an doh mene asahan tahi udu bada kon Esiya. Maha-an tinan labai mene ati-i ahi, ma tihisi boto-on tahi. Eme ma ahi abudon i buku: Ahi kameh amak na dah.
Handru labai! Ahi atona iri maha-an i buku ndramak lalou atona ta len ndramak ta anuhun sahou asehek ano ta iy kameh imek. Maha-an doh mene asahan tahi ma ahi kameh winiyan babudon ta boto-on tahi amwenen kameh udu awas bwe. Ahi badeh, atehei budon udu ta Kindrei le ari, iy le ari winiyan mete-ei iri mene ndramak ame hamon ame awas ja.
Ehe, iri maha-an marakon doh anya kadi ahi kamak, arile Kindrei badeh, aseben ahi, ma ahi bamak bwe. Hamon ale, Kindrei kameh aseben ahi ta iri maha-an doh winiyan badi ahi bamak bwe. Ahi atehei budon tahi handru in ta Kindrei ta iri lakou doh.
Ehe, Kindrei kameh amekes lakou doh ja, ma buku aha asolom ili tan ta ahi. Handru, aha amekes salom i buku doh, ma Kindrei kameh anuhun salom doh taha, ma iy aseben ahi. Ma mwan ma badih solo-an kameh anuhun ma bwetenei lakou doh Kindrei amekes eme tahi, ma iri kameh adeu wurah ili ta Kindrei ta aliy.
Budon tahi atona sahou dah handru, ma ahi sekesek ta lakou dah: Ta lakou marakon ahi mene amekes ili tiri mwan ma badih badu kon munyak dah, ahi mene a-en hamon ta kandriyen mwasin, ma kandriyen handru. Ahi ba-en hamon ta tanan mene ahi akohok tiri mwan ma badih badu munyak dah bwe. Tikisiy ta Kindrei le mene aseben ahi, ma ahi amekes i buku aliy. Ma ahi mene amekes kandriyen doh ili le kala ahi abo gok hawe aha mwan ma badih badu Korin.
Iri la-ukei ale jo atorou ewek taha, sahou rayah udu bolon badeh, bamai bwe. Iri lakou jo atorou badeh, aleu ma aha winiyan atanan moson ta aliy. Na len dah aha bala tanan jo bamwenen bwe, o, ta lakou jo anya kamekes kewek taha. Arile, hamon, jo abudon aha katanan jo kamwenen, ma lakou jo amekes taha. Eme ma hamon, len ta Laban Jises eme ta tunuhun sahou tiri mwan ma badih, aha kameh sekesek ma atudun nyara ahi i buku jo kameh sekesek ma atudun nyara aha ale.
<range>
Jo anya aha kameh katanan kamwenen ta iri lakou doh jo mene asehek ta aliy. Eme ma, jo mene abudon ma mwena ta a-en hamon ta san ta ili Korin na len jo ili bada kon Masadoniya. Ma hamon kameh jo eme le san dah ma anyolom aha san rasan ja. Ma ta kandriyen doh aha kameh winiyan anyolom aru ma la-uh, ma aru winiyan sekeyani ndrine aha handru. Ma hamon ta idoh, aha winiyan aseben jo, ma tiye jo kili hamon loboho bada kon Judiya ja.
<range>
Handru! Idoh budon mene jo anya ki-in hamon ta aliy. Arile, jo bawek hamon batou aha bwe. Aha anya jo ndramak ari ta tobolowe lakou laleyah nadeh? Bwe, jo bala buku i ndramak doh anya, “Ehe ma bwe” hawe a-en hamon ta so-ok tek laleyah, bwe.
Sahou ta Kindrei handru ta ere le buku doh. Eme ma jo kasehek taha, jo tiye handru buku jo asehek: Jo bala buku ndramak anya “Ehe” udu bohok amwenen, ma jo tone budon “Bwe” ta ndrinek badeh, bwe!
Jo hawe Sailas uru Timoti, aso ma taloh mene atiye sahou udu ndrokowa aha. Ma sahou ta Nadu Kindrei, Jises Krais doh handru. Ma aha atanan, Krais badeh, winiyan batubuni iy bwe. Iy badeh in le hamon ta so-ok ta Kindrei, ma iy amekes gok tan ta in hamon tiri sahou tandrakan Kindrei mene amekes eme tataha mwan ma badih.
Idoh handru labai: Krais amekes iri sahou tandrakan ta Kindrei asahan handru mara-ei. Idoh leheya taha Kindrei anya “Ehe,” arile ma a-en hamon ta sahou tan. Eme ma, taha kasekesek ma katudun nyara Kindrei ta idoh: Iy in hamon ta sahou tan.
Kindrei leheya ahi i buku doh: Ahi hawe aha Korin, taha marakon badeh, Kindrei bwidi taha winiyan ales boto-on hawe Krais. Ma ale, Kindrei mene atehei ahi ta amekes gok aposel dah.
Iy mene atehei kalem tan amwenen eme tataha: Iy atehei Malawin Ndrabun eme ndrine taha. Ma Malawin Ndrabun doh i buku ari le tiri lakou Kindrei anya kedeu taha hamon. Eme ma taha winiyan atanan i buku doh: Handru labai, Kindrei kameh edeu iri lakou marakon, iy mene tandrakan ta aliy eme tataha.
Kindrei tanan budon tek. Eme ma, buku jo kawendreya badeh, Kindrei winiyan nyowani wendreya tek doh, iri mwan ma badih kameh winiyan atanan ta aliy. Arile, jo bawendreya bwe. Jo asehek handru. Jo bwalek edeu maha-an tinan ewek taha, ma abolosen ewek taha ta kandriyen ndra-in mene asahan ndrokowa aha. Eme ma, jo mene bawek hamon bawek Korin ta anyolom aha ja bwe.
Na len jo asehek “Jo ibolosen ewek taha” jo basehek anya ahi atondrok budon taha bwe. Ahi tanan aha ales boto-on ta budon taha. Ahi abo gok le hawe aha, ta amekes aha kasekesek.
Eme ma, jo ndraruwi ndrinek. Jo abudon i buku doh: Jo winiyan bala Korin ja, ma amekes maha-an ili tiri ja bwe.
Tasah, buku jo bwidi aha tikisiy, ya are lau kameh winiyan bwidi ndrinek kasekesek ja? Bwe nadeh! Aha le lau badeh adeh, amekes ndrinek sekesek.
Ehe, aha le badeh, amekes jo sekesek. Eme ma, jo bwalek ewek hawe aha ja, ma amekes sahou boto-on, ma ndrine aha amaha labai, bwe. Eme ma, idoh kati lakou jo atorou ewek taha ma mwena. Jo bwalek ewek edeu maha-an ari ja ewek taha ta kandriyen udu ndrokowa aha. Buku ndrinek sekesek ta koha aha, jo tanan aha ale ado mwasin ma sekesek asahan.
Handru, mwena mene jo torowenei la-ukei ramen ewek taha, ma na len doh ndrinek maha-an ma isi, ma jo eden ale. Arile, jo batorou la-ukei doh ta edeu maha-an laleyah ewek taha bwe. Jo anya kaleheya aha buku jo aso-ok aha handru ma jo ibo gok ta aseben aha karuwani kandriyen ndra-in udu ndrokowa aha ki-iu.
Na dah, i buku ari ndramak mene ndrabwidi maha-an ndrala tare lau, idoh badeh bame tek bwe, arile idoh ewek taha marakon. (Jo asehek dah, tasah jo amwenen bwalek edeu maha-an ili bwele-e ndramak doh).
Aha ranah ma buruwen badeh, ndratikahei iy ndramak mene udu ndrokowa aha ndra-au, idoh ta leheya iy ndrabwidi lakou ndra-in labai. Eme ma idoh winiyan.
Na dah, jo aso-ok aha kamani kandriyen tan nane iy amekes ewek taha, ma aha kamekes ndrinen kasekesek. Kora-on maha-an laba tinan kabwidi ndramak doh kandra-i.
Eme ma jo asehek taha. Aha kandrei iy keme hamon hawe aha, ma aha kaleheya aha kili tan buku aha badeh aso-ok iy labai.
Jo mene atorou la-ukei ewek taha ta none aha le. Jo anya ki tanan aha kameh winiyan a-en hamon tiri sahou tek marakon mene o bwe.
Buku aha mani kandriyen ndra-in ta ndramak nane amekes ewek taha, jo ale kameh maniy. Saba lakou jo maniy (buku lakou udu aliy doh jo kamaniy), i buku Krais anyolom jo, jo ale maniy na nyaran ta aseben aha.
Tasah, jo abudon i buku doh: Kora-on balik kawendreyani taha ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in kili ta nadu tine taha nane doh, ma iy kameh kamai laleyah ma kandra-i. Taha ndratanan labai ta budon ta balik.
Jo ili asahan kon tinan Trowas ta atiye sahou mwasin ta Krais badeh, Laban ndrasihi san tek ta amekes gok dah.
Arile, jo tikisiy tinan labai, tasah jo banyolom nadu tine taha Taitus bwe. Eme ma jo batanau iri mwan ma badih ano, jo iu ili kon munyak tinan Masadoniya.
Arile, jo baradeu wurah barala ta Kindrei adeh. Tasah, len marakon iy badeh, atehei ahi ala kon rakon, rakon ta atiye lahou tinan, Krais ndrabwidiy ta akohok ahi ame hamon ma amekes ahi asahan lau tan handru. Ehe, buku manahu buburen asahan, ma jor aluhiy iu ili bolo kon marakon, i buku le tekedek tahi aseben iri mwan ma badih marakon akohok tanan ta Kindrei.
Handru labai, ahi aposel amwenen badeh, a buku kasu-er ta manahu buburen mwasin, Krais eme andrei, ma iy atehei i ta Kindrei i nyara salom. Manahun doh iu ili ndrokowa iri mwan ma badih iri atehei budon tiri handru in ta Krais, ma iri are san ta iu ili kandrah, ma ta ndrokowa iri mwan ma badih iri batehei budon tiri bwe, ma iri are san ta ili bolo jih nyarahan labai.
Ta iri lau are san ta ili bolo jih, ta gok ahi amekes ma ta sahou ahi atiye badeh, asahan i buku manahu lakou kameh imek. Arile sahou ma gok ahi amekes ere ndrokowa iri mwan ma badih are san ta ili kandrah, asahan i buku manahu lakou kohan udu aliy kahis. Are lau handru winiyan amekes iri gok doh?
Ahi aposel badeh, bala buku iri lau solo-an ala rakon, rakon ta atiye sahou ta Kindrei bwe. Iri amekes i buku doh ta ariu luk tiri mwan ma badih rayah, ma iri winiyan ado mwasin. Ahi aposel badeh, bwe. Ahi akohok gok dah badu mine Kindrei amwenen, ma ahi bawendreya laleyah bwe. Ndrine ahi badeh, udu mwasin hawe Krais, ma ta mada Kindrei ahi badeh, atiye amwenen iri sahou tan mene iy edeu eme tahi.
Buku sah? Aha abudon ahi aposel anya katudun nyara ahi ja nadeh? O, aha anya ahi a buku lau rayah, ma ahi badeh, kadeu ramen la-ukei iri lau mwena ndratorowenei ta atudun nyara ahi nadeh? O, aha ndratorowenei la-ukei ta aseben ahi deh? Bwe.
Aha amwenen asahan buku la-ukei ta atudun nyara ahi. Aha badeh, ado bolo budon ma ndrine ahi handru, ma iri mwan ma badih marakon ndratanan ta aliy.
Iri mwan ma badih ndratanan, koha aha badeh, i buku ramen la-ukei Krais amwenen atorou. Ehe, ta gok ahi amekes ta atiye sahou mwasin, Krais amekes gok ewek taha i buku ramen la-ukei. Iy batorou la-ukei dah na ndraye kei o atilik udu bada bek bwe. Iy atorou na Malawin Mwasin ta Kindrei kohan handru udu aliy ta atorou ndrine aha mwan ma badih.
Ehe, ahi ndratanan, Kindrei ibo gok boto-on labai ta koha aha i san ta Krais, ma aha akohok koha aha badeh, tan amwenen. Eme ma ahi amekes sahou i buku doh: Aha badeh, a buku la-ukei le, leheya iri mwan ma badih, Kindrei atehei ahi a buku aposel tan amwenen.
Handru, ahi amwenen winiyan ta amekes gok doh bwe. Eme ma ahi sasehek, sahou tahi amwenen mene bamekes ari lakou bwe. Kindrei le ari badeh aseben ahi, ma bwidi ahi winiyan ta gok.
Kindrei amwenen mene bwidi ahi winiyan, ma ahi bwidi gok tan ta sahou randra le ha-un nane doh. Sahou randra le ha-un nane doh, bala buku batanau ta Moses bwena mene bwe. Idoh lakou ha-un ja Malawin Ndrabun badeh, amekes asahan. Batanau malen ta Moses badeh, leheya taha kameh amak le. Iy nyamun ta edeu kohan buku lakou Malawin Ndrabun amekes asahan eme tataha bwe.
Bwena mene Kindrei torowenei sahou ta batanau malen badeh, udu bwele-e bek. Ma gok ta batanau doh leheya taha kameh amak le, tasah taha winiyan ba-en hamon handru ma akohok kohan mwasin bwe. Na len Kindrei edeu batanau ili mine Moses, lomada Kindrei badeh, asahan hawen, ma lomotani mada Moses labai. Eme ma, iri mwan ma badih badu Isra-el anoh, ma bwidi iri winiyan banyolom madan bwe. Ano, lomada sun nane udu mada Moses anya i bwisik, ma amak mara-ei.
Ya, gok Kindrei amekes ta edeu Malawin Ndrabun eme tataha mwan ma badih marakon, kameh udu bwele-en labai mara-ei ja ta sahou randra le malen mene, ma sun ta Kindrei kameh anya handru amwenen eme tataha.
Handru, batanau malen bwena mene edeu taha marakon a ta sahou ma tiye taha kameh amalin ta Kindrei. Ya, batanau malen doh mene asahan hawe lomada Kindrei. I buku le, sahou randra le ha-un doh ja badeh, akohok iri mwan ma badih ame hamon ma aloh iri lau mwasin labai, idoh kameh ibo gok ta edeu tataha sun ta Kindrei solo-an labai.
Batanau doh mene iri mwan ma badih badu Isra-el anya lakou laba tinan labai, ma leheyani Kindrei eme tataha, na dah iy asahan laleyah. Tasah, sahou randra le ha-un doh taha aloh sahou mwasin udu bwele-en mara-ei labai ja, ma leheya buku Kindrei aso-ok taha labai.
Ehe, batanau bwena doh mene ta udu luluwen bwe, iy asahan hawe sun ta Kindrei. Arile, lakou ha-un doh ja kameh ta udu le buku doh, sun asahan hawen kameh i tinan mara-ei.
Ehe, atondrok lakou doh kameh ta ere le buku doh. Eme ma, bwili ahi winiyan bama ta atiye sahou mwasin doh bwe.
Arile, ahi batone ari sahou ta sahou mwasin bwe. Ahi tanan kameh asahan i tinan mara-ei. Eme ma ahi bamekes kandriyen buku Moses amekes bwe. Iy mene tone madan na ranah kolau, ma iri mwan ma badih badu Isra-el sanyolom sun doh anya i bwisik ma ano mara-ei.
Budon ma ndrine iri lau Isra-el bwena ndrahis, ma iri bala tanan moson o kati batanau doh, Moses mene edeu ili tiri bwe. Ma na dah ale, iri lau Isra-el, iri bala tanan moso kati sahou batanau bwe. Buku iri atehei budon tiri handru in ta Krais, Kindrei kameh winiyan sihi budon tiri, ma iri winiyan atanan handru ta kati moson ta sahou batanau.
Ehe, idoh handru, bolo len marakon iri mwan ma badih badu Isra-el anyolom sahou ta Moses udu bolo asiu ta Kindrei, budon tiri ihis, ma iri bala tanan saba lakou Kindrei anya kaleheya iri ta batanau doh bwe. Arile, buku mwan o badih iy tubuni ndrinen ili ta Laban, iy badeh ndrasihi budon tiri ma iri ndratanan Jises Krais iy are lau handru. I buku Kindrei tolowei kolau tubuluhi mada iri, ma iri winiyan anyolom amwenen.
<range>
Na dah, Laban badeh, ndra Malawin Mwasin; ma are lau Malawin Mwasin ta Laban udu hawen, iri kameh ari maha-an ta a-en hamon ta batanau ta Moses ja bwe. Ma iri ale kameh are len labai ta kandriyen ndra-in.
Na dah, taha mwan ma badih marakon asahan lau ta Kindrei, taha badeh, batone kandriyen asahan ta manyah tataha bwe i buku bwena mene Moses amekes. Koha taha badeh, leheya sun ta Kindrei asahan tataha i buku torowe leheya lakou. Eme ma, len marakon taha badeh, akohok sun ta Laban solo-an, solo-an labai, ma idoh tubuni taha, ma taha asahan buku le Laban amwenen. Malawin Mwasin ta Laban bwidi lakou doh eme tataha.
Kindrei mwasin, ma iy tikisi ahi, ma iy mene atehei gok ta atiye sahou mwasin dah eme tahi. Eme ma, ahi bawoyah ta amekes gok dah bwe.
Ma ale, ahi badeh, bawendreya iri mwan ma badih, o tobolowe sahou ili randrah ja bwe. Ahi ba-en hamon tiri kandriyen ta adeu bwilima i ta nyara Kindrei bwe. Ahi badeh, atiye sahou handru ta Kindrei ili tiri mwan ma badih marakon, ma iri winiyan anuhun. Ta kandriyen doh, ahi leheya iri, kandriyen tahi mwasin, ma iri winiyan atanan gok ahi amekes dah, idoh ale mwasin udu mada Kindrei.
Iri mwan ma badih rayah, iri abudon sahou mwasin ahi atiye doh, idoh boto-on labai ta atanan moson ta aliy. Sahou mwasin asahan i buku le, ta iri mwan ma badih anya kandrakak kala bolo jih.
Tasah, kindrei ta wendreya badu munyak dah, iy mene wahei budon tiri mwan ma badih doh batehei budon tiri bala ta Kindrei bwe. Eme ma, sun ta sahou mwasin ma lomada Krais, idoh winiyan bala bolo budon ma ndrine iri bwe, ma iri winiyan akohok Krais bwe, konen i buku Kindrei amwenen.
Ehe, sahou dah handru, tasah ahi badeh, batiye sahou tahi bwe. Ahi atiye sahou i buku doh: Krais Jises, iy badeh, Laban tataha, ma ahi lau ta gok taha, tasah Jises aloh ahi ta amekes iri gok doh.
Ehe, ahi atiye sahou ta Jises. Tasah, bwena mene Kindrei bwidi munyak dah anya, “Sun kanya bolo lulik.” Kindrei amwenen doh irek labai ta sun, ma iy akohok ahi ame hamon ja. Jises Krais, iy le sun doh udu ndrine ahi. Eme ma sun doh aseben ahi leheya iri mwan ma badih, Kindrei i buku sah handru.
Lakou mwasin doh badeh, udu bolo oda ahi mwan ma badih. Ma ahi badeh boto-on bwe, buku kun amekes na ndren. Arile, idoh iy mwasin, tasah iy leheyani iri mwan ma badih, ta boto-on ta sahou mwasin nane ahi atiye, idoh ta Kindrei ma boto-on tan sakalawi boto-on tiri lakou mara-ei ja. Ahi amwenen badeh, bwe.
Udu bolo iri kon rakon, rakon maha-an badeh, asahan tahi, arile badi ahi bamak bwe. Lakou solo-an badeh, wahei budon tahi, arile budon tahi bala bwe.
Iri lau laleyah badeh, atikah ahi ta amekes ndra-in eme tahi, arile Kindrei baruwani ahi bwe. Iri a-um ahi, ma adeu kandriyen ndra-in solo-an eme tahi, arile ahi bamak bwe.
Na len marakon, iri lakou abo gok ta adai ahi amak buku Jises mene imek. Arile, ahi bamak bwe le. Idoh leheya iri mwan ma badih buku Jises ale udu ndra awas kahis, ma atondrok ahi.
Ehe, ahi badeh, amekes gok ta Jises, ma ta iri len marakon ahi ado awas are kon munyak dah, iri mwan ma badih badeh, none ta adai ahi kamak. Arile, ahi bamak bwe le, ma idoh leheya iri mwan ma badih, buku koha Jises badeh, udu bolo oda ahi, oda ahi doh badu kon munyak le.
Handru, ta iri len marakon ahi atiye sahou mwasin, ma iri lau none ta adai ahi aposel kamak. Arile, lakou doh ja atehei kohan handru ta udu le buku doh ewek taha.
Udu bolo buk Wari ta bolo buk ndrabun, ndramak ari torowenei i buku doh, “Jo atehei budon tek handru, Kindrei kameh in hamon le ta sahou tan. Eme ma, jo asehek iy ili tiri mwan ma badih.” Ahi aposel ale, budon tahi i buku le ta ndramak doh. Eme ma, ahi badeh, atiye sahou mwasin ta Laban.
Tasah ahi badeh, ndratanan, Kindrei mene mete-ei Laban Jises imek udu bolo lek eme awas ja. Eme ma, iy kameh mete-ei ahi ale hawe Jises, ma tiyani ahi hawe aha ala kandrah, ma ado hawen.
Iri lakou ndra-in doh mene asahan tahi ta aseben aha. Udu hamon, so-ok ma tikisiy ta Kindrei andrei iri mwan ma badih solo-an labai ame hamon ja, iri kameh winiyan adeu wurah amwenen ili ta Kindrei, ma iri winiyan atudun nyaran.
Ahi abudon ta lakou doh kameh asahan. Eme ma, ahi bawoyah ta amekes gok ta Kindrei bwe. Idoh handru, oda ahi sudi boto-on ta nyamu iri, ma hamon kameh iri andra-i. Arile, ndri-iy ai, kohan mwasin Kindrei edeu eme tahi, iy bwidiy asahan ha-un mara-ei ta iri len ari, ari.
Iy i buku doh: Iri maha-an marakon badeh, abo gok ta sokoso-ou ahi, iri ta len ranah le, ma tinan handru bwe. Arile, lakou doh lokowani ahi ta akohok manyah mwasin udu kandrah. Ma manyah udu kandrah doh kameh udu bwele-en labai tiri maha-an marakon doh nane asahan tahi.
Eme ma, ahi babudon solo-an ta iri lakou marakon doh, ahi winiyan anyolom na mada ahi amwenen, bwe. Ahi atehei budon tahi ili tiri lakou ahi winiyan banyolom udu kandrah bwe. Tasah, iri lakou taha winiyan anyolom na mada taha, idoh kameh ano. Arile, iri lakou udu bolo kandrah, kameh ta udu le buku doh.
Ehe, taha atehei budon tataha ta lakou udu bolo kandrah. Tasah, taha ndratanan anya: Hamon, buku bada taha nane kada-ah kameh imek ma andra-i, Kindrei anya kedeu ari ja keme tataha. Idoh badeh, basahan ta kandriyen ta mwan ma badih tasou a-en hamon ta aliy bwe. Kindrei le amwenen kameh amekes udu bolo kandrah kodo-oh, ma iy kameh ta udu le buku don ai.
Taha badeh, ndrawoyah ta bada taha nane kada-an ai. Eme ma, taha tikisiy labai ta anya kakohok bada taha badu kandrah doh, kasini kili bwele-e taha i buku ndramak isin awin in bwele-en.
Tasah, taha amak badeh, taha baso-ok malawi bada taha ere laleyah.
Handru labai, taha lau marakon badeh, bada taha i buku asiu balei. Taha aden, tasah ta maha-a iri sisi-in taha bwese. Taha bala bwale bada taha badu munyak nane dah bwe. Arile, taha badeh, aso-ok bada taha ari ja ha-un nane Kindrei ndratandrakan ta edeu eme tataha, tasah bada taha doh kameh imek ma tubuni iy ja, ma akohok kohan ta ere le buku doh, ma iy winiyan bamak ja bwe.
Kindrei le ari badeh, ndralokowani taha ta akohok koha taha ha-un doh. Ma iy ndratehei Malawin Ndrabun ndrame tataha. Handru labai, Malawin Ndrabun, iy i buku sahou tandrakan ta Kindrei, ta iy kameh edeu iri lakou hamon, iy mene tiye ta edeu eme ta taha.
Eme ma, ndri-iy ta saba lakou kameh asahan. Taha banoh ta aliy bwe. Taha tanan bada taha na idah i buku asiu taha ado aliy are kon munyak dah. Na bolo len dah, taha bado hawe Laban bare kon tan bwe.
Ya, na idah badeh, taha ndratanan iri lakou marakon doh handru. Taha banyolom bwe le, arile taha atehei budon tataha tinan labai, iri atondrok taha are bolo kandrah.
Eme ma, taha banoh ta amak bwe. Ta budon tataha, idoh mwasin. Tasah, buku taha amak ma ruwani bada taha doh, taha kameh are hawe Laban ado kati kon handru.
Eme ma, buku taha ado hawen are kati kon handru, o, taha are len kahis le, ndri-iy ai; len marakon badeh, taha abudon boto-on labai ta amekes iri kandriyen marakon, Laban aso-ok.
Tasah taha tanan, hamon kameh taha marakon ales are ta mada sahou ta Krais, ma iy kameh tunuhun iri lakou marakon taha amekes bwena ndra-au. Eme, buku taha ndramekes kandriyen mwasin na bolo iri len doh, taha are ndra bada taha malen kahis, o taha mene amekes kandriyen ndra-in kahis, idah kameh taha ari, ari akohok sihine taha ili le winiya kandriyen nane taha amekes bwena ndra-au.
Taha ndratanan, hamon kameh Krais aleben iri lakou marakon taha amekes mwena ndra-au. Eme ma taha anoh tinan labai, eme ma ahi amekes gok ta ariu budon tiri mwan ma badih katehei budon tiri kili le ta sahou mwasin. Kindrei badeh, tanan budon tataha ma iy tanan ndrine taha handru. Eme ma, ahi atehei budon tahi i buku doh: Aha mwan ma badih badu kon Korin tanan, ahi bamekes kandriyen ta wendreya bawek taha bwe.
Ta sahou dah badeh, ahi batudun nyara ahi ja bwe, ya aha winiyan abudon, ahi badeh, lau mwasin, bwe. Ahi torowenei iri sahou dah ta aha kasekesek ahi. Eme ma, aha kameh winiyan atanan ta ndremenya ta sahou tiri mwan ma badih asehek, “Ndramak ki konen, ma bohon ki boto-on ta asehek sahou nyaman handru.” Lau mwan ma badih abudon i buku doh, iri batehei budon tiri bala tiri kandriyen nane iri lau mwasin amekes bwe.
Buku jo ibo lolo-ou buku iri mwan ma badih rayah nane asehek, jo anya, ndri-iy ai, jo kamekes le gok ta Kindrei, ma jo kasahan lolo-ou! Arile, ahi lau mwasin, ma ahi amekes gok ta aseben aha ka-en hamon ta sahou mwasin ta Kindrei.
Iri lakou marakon ahi amekes badeh, ta aseben ahi bwe. Tasah, tikisiy hawe so-ok ta Krais badeh, tutuni ahi ta amekes gok tan. Tasah, ahi ndratanan ta lakou ari le dah: Ndramak ari le tubuni taha ma iy ndramak, ma idoh i buku taha marakon amak ta iri lakou taha amekes mwena.
Handru labai, iy ndratubuni taha marakon, ma iy imek. Iy amekes i buku doh, ta taha mwan ma badih kameh akohok koha taha nane ha-un doh, taha sabudon taha le amwenen, ma sa-en hamon ta so-ok tataha, na len taha are ndra kon munyak dah. Arile, taha katehei budon tataha kili ta Krais le ari, iy mene tubuni taha, ma iy imek, ano iy amak eme awas ja. Eme ma, taha ka-en hamon ta kandriyen, iy amwenen aso-ok.
Mwasin labai, na dah badeh, ahi ndrasahan lau ta Kindrei. Eme ma, ahi ba-en hamon ta kandriyen ta ndrine ahi malen mene ja bwai, ma ahi baleben koha ari mwan o badih an hamon ta budon tiri solo-an nane are kon munyak amekes, bwe. Handru labai, bwena mene ahi a-en hamon ta budon badu kon munyak dah, ma i buku taha tunuhun Krais. Arile, nadah badeh, ahi ndratanan, iy are lau handru, ma ahi bamekes ja bwai.
Ya, bolo len dah, are lau mwan o badih, atehei budon tiri mara-ei in ta Krais, badeh, Kindrei ndrabwidi iri ndrasahan ha-un labai. Eme ma, kandriyen malen bwena ndra-au mara-ei, ma kandriyen mwasin ha-un ndrasahan.
Kindrei le amwenen, kati iri lakou marakon doh. Bwena mene ahi ta amekes bahun i tan, arile na gok Krais amekes, Kindrei aseben ahi asahan mwasin hawen. Ma iy edeu gok dah eme tahi ta aseben iri mwan ma badih rayah ame asahan mwasin.
Sahou ahi asehek tiri i buku doh: Ta gok Krais ndrabwidiy, Kindrei ibo gok ta ariu iri mwan ma badih karuwani kandriyen ta bahun, ma kasahan kawas tan ma kamanyah mwasin. Eme ma, iy babudon ja ta iri ndra-in nane iri mwan ma badih amekes bwe. Ma iy edeu gok eme tahi ta atiye sahou tan dah, ma bwidi bahun kano, ma iri mwan ma badih kasahan mwasin ja hawen.
Eme ma, ahi akohok boho Krais ma atiye sahou tan. Idoh, i buku Kindrei le amwenen aloh ili tiri lau na boho ahi. Ahi badeh, asehek sahou ta Krais amwenen ili tiri mwan ma badih, ma tiye tiri i buku doh: “Mwasin ta aha karuwani kandriyen ta bahun ma aha kasahan kawas ta Kindrei.”
Iy Krais doh, iy tanan ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in bwe, arile Kindrei ndratukumwi kandriyen ndra-in tataha marakon ndrala le bwele-en, ma iy asahan i buku ari ndramak ndra-in handru. Iy amekes i buku doh, ta taha winiyan are hawe Krais, ma na le boto-on tan amwenen, taha winiyan asahan iri mwan ma badih mwasin ta mada Kindrei.
Ahi aposel badeh, abo gok hawe Kindrei, ma ahi tiye sahou boto-on ewek taha i buku doh, “Aha badeh, ndrakohok tikisiy ta Kindrei. Eme ma, kora-on aha karuwani laleyah.
Tasah, Kindrei tiye udu bolo buk ndrabun i buku doh, “Jo anuhun ndrelen taha ma jo mene aseben aha ta len jo ndratehei ta amekes i buku doh. Ehe, jo mene aseben aha udu ta len jo ndratehei ta akohok iri mwan ma badih ame hamon.” Aha kanuhun! Na dah, len mwasin handru ta Kindrei anya kaseben iri mwan ma badih. Ehe, na len dah ale len ta Kindrei anya kakohok taha mwan ma badih kame hamon kado hawen.
Ahi aposel badeh, baso-ok iri mwan o badih kameh bobose gok tahi dah bwe. Eme ma, ahi ba-en hamon ta kandriyen nane ale amekes iri mwan o badih andra-i ma tebelese hawe ahi bwe.
Ta iri lakou marakon ahi amekes, ahi badeh, leheya iri mwan ma badih i buku ahi lohowan ta Kindrei handru. Eme ma, bolo len marakon ahi ales boto-on labai ta iri maha-an solo-an anya kasahan tahi. Ma ale iri lakou rayah anya kamekes ahi kandra-i, arile ahi atadau ahi boto-on.
Iri lau adai ahi ma atehei ahi ala bolo asiu lulik. Iri tikahei ahi ma luhani ahi. Ahi awoyah ta amekes gok solo-an labai ma bwidi ahi bamadin bamwenen bwe. Na len rayah badeh, ahi ameson ta nahi nyamon bwe.
Ahi leheya iri mwan ma badih buku ahi badeh, lohowan ta Kindrei ta idoh: Ahi badeh, a-en hamon ta kandriyen, ari lakou winiyan basahan ta aliy bwe, ma ahi tanan ta sahou mwasin ta Laban. Ndrine ahi winiyan bato-ou ta losen suwi bwe. Ahi abo gok ta amekes kawas hawe iri mwan ma badih, ma Malawin Ndrabun badeh, aseben ahi ta amekes iri lakou doh. Ma ahi ale badeh, amekes iri kandriyen handru ta aso-ok iri mwan ma badih. Na boho ahi laleyah bwe, ahi aseben iri handru.
Ahi badeh, asehek sahou handru, ma amekes iri gok na le boto-on ta Kindrei. Ma ahi ale a-en hamon ta kandriyen mwasin, ma idoh leheya i buku beteleu ma nyekelen ahi tawiy ta amekes bahun.
Iri mwan ma badih rayah badeh, atudun nyara ahi, ma amekes sahou mwasin eme tahi. Arile, iri sahou rayah badeh, bamwenen tahi bwe, ma bwidi nyara ahi andra-i. Iri anya ahi lau ta wendreya. Arile, bwe. Ahi badeh, asehek le sahou handru.
Iri lau rayah anya, ahi badeh, lau laleyah, arile iri anuhun nyara ahi, ma iri tanan ahi badu heh handru. Ahi badeh, anya ki buku ari ndramak iri atehei sa-oh ta adai iy. Arile, ahi bamak bwe. Handru labai, iri badeh, abo gok ta sokoso-ou ahi, arile lakou doh badai ahi bamak bwe.
Ahi badeh, atona maha-an solo-an labai, arile idoh kameh winiyan basani sekesek tahi bwe. Ahi bateu lakou solo-an badu kon munyak dah bwe, arile ahi adeu lakou ili tiri mwan ma badih ta aseben budon tiri handru kabadok. Ya, ahi badeh, bateu ari lakou bado mine ahi ja bwe. Ahi badeh, tawi iri lakou solo-an labai badu kon ta Kindrei.
Aha kawas tahi badu kon Korin. Aha kanuhun. Ahi anya kasehek kaleu kewek taha. Ahi badeh batone budon tahi bawek taha bwe. Ahi badeh, aso-ok aha labai.
Ahi batone ndrine ahi taha bwe. Ahi badeh, aso-ok aha tinan labai. Aha amwenen badeh, tone ndrine aha, ma taha bado mwasin bwe.
Eme ma, jo anya kasehek taha i buku ndramak ari asehek ta nadun oro: Ado kasihi ndrine ado ma kaso-ok ahi i buku ahi aso-ok ado tinan labai.
Aha lau ta Kindrei, aha sadek hawe iri lau, tana iri Kindrei bwe, ma aseben iri ta a-en hamon ta kandriyen tiri le. Tasah, iri randrah labai. Kandriyen mwasin ma kandriyen ndra-in uru badeh, kawas turu bwe. Len hawe lulik, uru winiyan basahan le rasan bwe.
Barala buku sah handru, sohowa Krais uru balik, kili le randra? Sebwe, winiyan bwe! Eme ma, iri lau ta Kindrei, ma iri lau mwan ma badih nane batehei budon tiri ba-en ta Kindrei bwe, iri badeh, winiyan bamekes budon ma kandriyen tiri bala le ari bwe.
Kili buku sah bah? Sebwe taha badeh, katehei asiu ndrok ta Kindrei, hawe asiu ta asumwe iri sukumada kei kili le ra-em, nadeh? Sebwe kameh winiyan bwe-en! Ma aha tanan, taha lau ta Kindrei, taha amwenen badeh, asahan buku asiu ndrok ta Kindrei kohan udu aliy, ta udu le buku doh. Ma iy winiyan manyah mwasin udu bolo asiu doh. Bwena mene Kindrei tiye i buku doh, “Jo kameh udu hawe iri ma edek bolo iri. Ma jo kameh asahan Kindrei tiri, ma iri kameh asahan iri lau tek.”
Eme ma, Laban tiye taha lau mwan ma badih tan amwenen, “Aha badeh, karuwani iri lau, tana iri Kindrei bwe. Ma aha sa-en hamon ta kandriyen tiri. Ma aha kare ndralen ta kandriyen ndra-in. Eme ma, jo kameh sekesek tinan labai ta akohok aha ame ado hawek.”
“Ma jo kameh asahan tama aha, ma aha kameh asahan naduk iri handru. Laban badeh, iy kati iri boto-on mari; iy amwenen asehek i buku doh.”
