Aha kawas tek handru, Kindrei edeu iri tandrakan doh eme tataha. Eme ma, taha badeh, karuwani iri kandriyen ndra-in ale taha amekes na bada taha o na budon tataha. Ya, taha badeh, kasahan ha-un mara-ei. Taha badeh, katehei budon tataha kili ta Kindrei, ma katehei koha taha mara-ei kili le tan, tasah taha anoh iy.
Aha badeh, kaleheya buku: Aha aso-ok ahi labai! Ahi bamekes ndra-in bawek taha bwe. Ahi babokoro-ei aha bwe. Ma ahi bawahei budon taha ta akohok lakou taha eme tahi, bwe.
Jo amekes sahou dah ta edeu aha ala ta mada sahou bwe. Tasah, ahi ndrasehek i buku doh: Ahi aso-ok aha tinan labai, eme ma, buku aha amak, ndrine ahi ale badeh, imek hawe aha. O, i buku aha bamak bwe, ahi kameh sekesek ta are hawe aha.
Jo asehek amwenen ewek taha. Jo ale batone ari sahou bwe. Jo badeh, sekesek taha, ma atudun nyara aha ta kandriyen aha a-en hamon ta aliy. Ta iri maha-an asahan tahi, jo badeh, abudon aha ma atehei budon in taha, ma idoh bwidi ndrinek amunum, ma jo sekesek tinan labai.
Ehe, idoh handru. Na len aso ala asahan bada kon tinan Masadoniya, manyah taso bado mwasin bwe. Tasah, maha-an solo-an labai asahan taso. Ma loboho doh ale, iri mwan ma badih rayah ame tebelese hawe aso, ma bwidi ndrine aso inoh.
Kindrei le adeh, bwidi ndrine iri mwan ma badih amunum mara-ei. Ya, na bolo len doh badeh, iy ale bwidi san ta Taitus eme isos hawe ahi, ma idoh bwidi ndrine ahi amunum ale.
Ahi anyolom madan, ma bwidi ahi sekesek labai. Tasah, iy asehek nyala ahi ta iri lakou aha amekes i tan. Ma idoh ale bwidi ndrinen amunum mara-ei. Ya, iy asehek tahi ale ta aha aso-ok labai ta anyolom jo, ma ndrine aha eden, ma aha abudon solo-an labai ta manyah mwasin hawek. Eme ma, bwidi jo sekesek tinan mara-ei.
Jo tanan, la-ukei mene jo atorou ndrawek taha badeh, bwidi ndrine aha tikisiy. Bwena mene jo tikisiy labai, arile na len dah, jo batikisiy ta jo mene atorou ewek taha bwe. Jo tanan la-ukei badeh, atehei maha-an ma bwidi bwilima ewek taha, arile badeh, ta ere luluwen bwe.
Arile, nadah jo ndra sekesek labai. Tasah, tikisiy taha ma iri maha-an doh ja badeh, bwidi aha tubuni ndrine aha asahan mwasin mara-ei. Kindrei le amwenen badeh, atehei iri lakou marakon doh ewek ndrine aha. Eme ma, la-ukei nane jo atorou ewek taha babokoro-ei aha bwe.
Idoh handru, iri maha-an ale Kindrei atehei udu bolo ndrine iri mwan ma badih badeh, ta leheya iri ta tobolowe ndrine iri, ma Kindrei winiyan akohok iri ame ta manyah mwasin. Ma are mwan o badih edek san doh winiyan batikisiy ta aliy ja bwe. Arile, maha-an ma bwilima kameh asahan ta ndrine iri lau badu kon munyak. Idoh kameh edeu imek ili tiri le kabwe.
Aha kanyolom saba lakou handru Kindrei amekes ta maha-an taha! Iy leheyani kandriyen mwasin ewek taha. Ma iy andrekei aha suwi, suwi, ma aha abo gok boto-on handru ta amekes mondrei ta sahou doh, ma leheya ahi buku, aha ari kandriyen ndra-in ja bwe. Eme ma, aha ato-ou ala ma tebelese hawe iy ndramak nane amekes ndra-in. Aha abwerei labai, kora-on maha-an kasahan ja. Ndrine aha badeh, eden labai ta anyolom ahi, ma aha abudon boto-on labai ta aseben iy ndramak nane amekes ndra-in ewek taha akohok budon mwasin ja. Kandriyen taha leheya ahi buku, nyala aha i le randra, eme ma, iri lau winiyan bato-en aha ta ari lakou bwe.
Jo mene atorou la-ukei doh ewek taha, jo batehei budon bala ta iy ndramak nane amekes ndra-in ewek taha bwe. Ma jo ale babudon boto-on ta ndramak akohok andra-i bwe le. Katin ta jo atorou la-ukei mene badeh, i buku doh: Jo anya kaleheya aha amwenen, buku aha badeh, aso-ok ahi labai, ma aha a-en hamon ta boho ahi. Eme ma Kindrei tanan iri lakou mara-ei dah.
Lakou le dah badeh, bwidi ndrine ahi amunum mara-ei, ma bwidi ahi sekesek tinan labai! Tasah, Taitus asehek tahi ta kandriyen aha amekes i tan, ma bwerei tan ano mara-ei.
Mwena mene ahi atudun nyara aha na len ahi asehek sahou hawe Taitus. Eme ma, ta kandriyen aha amekes i tan badeh, leheya Taitus ta sahou tahi ewek taha mara-ei badeh, ndra handru le ai. Eme ma, bwili ahi bama ta sahou nane ahi amekes bwai. Len mara-ei badeh, ahi a-en le hamon ta sahou handru ma kandriyen taha leheya i buku doh: Ahi badeh, atiye sahou handru.
Taitus asahan hawe aha, ma aha anoh ma totoreh, eme ma aha andrei iy ewek hawe aha ma anuhun sahou handru udu bohon. Eme ma, aha a-en hamon tiri lakou marakon nane iy tiye aha ta amekes. Iy abudon i hamon ja, ma iy aso-ok aha tinan labai.
Nadah jo sekesek! Tasah, jo atehei budon tek mara-ei badeh, ta aha kameh winiyan amekes kandriyen mwasin ta lakou mara-ei.
Aha nadu tine aso i san ta Krais. Aso anya katiye tanan ta kandriyen mwasin ma tikisiy, Kindrei mene edeu ili tiri lau tan, mwan ma badih, are bada kon Masadoniya.
Maha-an laba tinan labai asahan tiri ta none budon ma tekedek tiri. Arile, iri badeh, sekesek handru labai. Na bolo len dah badeh, tiri lakou bwe, ma iri asahan buku nadu nyohan. Arile, iri abudon iri lau ta Kindrei rayah, ma iri tukumwi luk solo-an labai, ta aseben iri lau rayah ja.
Jo badeh, ndratanan, ma jo asehek amwenen ewek taha: Iri badeh, a-en hamon ta tanan ma so-ok tiri le ta adeu luk doh. Lakou tiri badeh, udu aliy, ta iri anya kadeu. Ehe, ma iri suriy labai, ma iri adeu ranah ili bwele-en ja.
Iri abadok labai ta ndremenya ahi kaso-ok ta iri kabo gok hawe iri mwan ma badih ta atukum luk, ma aseben iri lau ta Kindrei are bada kon loboho Judiya mara-ei.
Bwena badeh, ahi anya, iri kameh adeu rayah luk ta aseben iri lau ta Kindrei rayah badu Jerusalem. Ma iri bamekes bala buku aliy le bwe. Iri amekes kandriyen mwasin udu bwele-en labai ja. Ma bwena iri asehek ta sahou tandrakan ta iri ka-en hamon ta so-ok ta Laban ta lakou mara-ei. Ano, udu hamon ja, iri tiye ahi i buku doh, iri kameh a-en hamon ja tiri sahou ahi asehek tiri, ya iri amekes doh in hamon ta so-ok ta Kindrei le amwenen.
Bwena mene Taitus ewek orowei ndrine aha ta aha katukum luk, ma kaleheya tikisi taha ili tiri lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei rayah ja. Eme ma, ahi abadok ta iy kewek hamon ja kaseben aha kabwidi iri gok doh kano mara-ei.
Ta iri lakou mara-ei doh, aha badeh, amekes kandriyen mwasin labai. Ma aha atehei budon taha tinan labai in ta Kindrei. Aha badeh, amekes lahou boto-on labai ta atiye budon dah. Tanan taha solo-an labai, ma aha ale boto-on ta amekes gok ta Kindrei. Ma aha aso-ok ahi ale. Mwasin, aha badeh, ka-en le hamon ta kandriyen mwasin ta atukum luk, aha ndratehei katin bwena.
Jo batiye ta aha katukum luk ma kadeu bwe. Jo asehek ta gok dah, iri lau ta Kindrei mwan ma badih badu kon tinan Masadoniya, iri sekesek ta amekes. Tasah, jo anya kanone aha, ma jo anya ki tanan tikisiy taha handru, o boho aha le.
Aha ndratanan Laban tataha Jises Krais, iy tikisi taha marakon tinan labai. Ma iy tawi lakou solo-an. Arile, ta aseben taha, iy ruwani iri lakou mara-ei doh, ma iy asahan buku ndramak laleyah tan ari lakou bwe. Ma iy asahan buku nadu nyohan, ta aseben aha akohok lakou solo-an, Kindrei anya kedeu kewek taha.
Ya, ta nyala luk ta salom, jo anya kasehek budon tek kewek taha. Na bolo jaha mene ndra-au on, aha badeh, atudun gok dah, ta atukum luk ta salom. Ma jo kasehek taha buku doh: Aha kabwidi gok dah kano mara-ei op. Tasah, aha badeh, asahan lau ma mwena handru are mwena ta budon ta gok dah, ma ta amekes.
Ya, nadah, aha kabwidi gok dah kano mara-ei. Aha ale kasekesek ta amekes gok dah kano mara-ei, i buku aha ma mwena mene sekesek ta atudun. I buku luk taha sabe udu aliy, mwasin, aha kakeh ki-in hamon ta so-ok ma tanan taha.
Buku aha aso-ok labai ta adeu lakou, mwasin, Kindrei aso-ok kandriyen badeh. Iy babudon ta lakou aha andriliu ta aliy, bwe. Iy abudon ta lakou badu bolo lokowa aha amwenen, ma iy sekesek le ta ndramas doh aha adeu.
Jo batiye ta edeu maha-an ewek taha ta aseben iri mwan ma badih rayah winiyan manyah ado mwasin bwe. Arile, na bolo len dah, aha bandriliu ta ari lakou bwe. Ya, iri lau ta Kindrei rayah badu Judiya badeh, iri ari lakou bwe mara-ei. Eme ma, idoh mwasin, buku hamon aha ado ndra-in, ya, iri ado mwasin ja; iri kameh winiyan abudon ma aseben aha ja. Ta kandriyen doh le, taha mara-ei kameh winiyan manyah ado mwasin.
<range>
Ya, buk ndrabun tiye i buku doh: “Iri lau ale atukum nyamon solo-an, niri nyamon kameh solo-an bwe. Ya, iri lau atukum nyamon solo-an bwe, niri nyamon kameh solo-an labai.”
Jo edeu wurah i ta Kindrei. Iy bwidi ndrine Taitus ato-ou ma iy abudon buku le ahi. Iy ale aso-ok ta aseben aha.
Eme ma, iy anya “mwasin” udu bada ahi ndremenya iy ta ewek atou aha. Iy abudon boto-on labai ta ewek, ma iy alokou iy ta ndremenya, buku ahi kaso-ok ta iy kewek.
Ahi tiye lau ta Kindrei ari ta ewek hawe Taitus ale. Ta bolo iri lau ta Kindrei mara-ei badeh, nadu tine taha ari le doh, iy nyaran udu aliy ta atiye sahou mwasin.
Idoh handru, arile sahou solo-an kahis. Iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei kada-ah, atehei iy ta edek hawe ahi, ma aseben ahi ta amekes gok ta atukum luk ta salom. Ahi amekes gok dah ta atudun nyara Laban, ma ta leheya iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, budon tahi badeh, tinan labai ta aseben iri.
Ahi baso-ok ari mwan o badih aluhe kandriyen nane ahi amekes ta atondrok ndramas laba tinan dah, ja bwai. Eme ma, ahi atehei nadu tine taha ari doh, ewek hawe Taitus.
Tasah, ahi anya kamekes kandriyen mwasin, Laban aso-ok, ma iri mwan ma badih badu kon munyak mara-ei kanyolom ale.
Ahi atehei nadu tine taha lau ta Kindrei ari ewek hawe uru ale. San solo-an ahi none iy ta iri gok mara-ei, ma ahi anyolom iy boto-on handru ta amekes iri gok doh. Nadah badeh, iy atehei budon tan boto-on handru, buku aha kameh amekes kandriyen mwasin ma atukum luk. Eme ma, iy abadok labai ta ewek hawe uru ta aseben uru ma ta amekes gok dah ale.
Ya, oro lau ma taloh kameh awek atou aha. Taitus badeh, aha tanan iy ai. Iy badeh, badu hawek handru en, ma aru amekes gok randra le, ta aseben aha. Ma nadu tine taha uru nane badeh, badu dah amwenen. Aha kameh winiya atanan uru ale. Uru badeh, amekes gok tiri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei badu kon dah, ma uru atudun nyara Krais na gok uru amekes.
Eme ma, aha kaleheya oro buku aha aso-ok oro tinan labai. Aha katondrok oro ma kaseben oro. Eme ma, iri lau ta Kindrei badu dah kameh winiyan anuhun ma atanan, aha aso-ok oro handru. Ma aha aso-ok nadu tine taha iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei badu kon mara-ei. Ma iri kameh atanan ahi ta asehek sahou laleyah, ma sekesek laleyah ta gok aha amekes, bwe.
Aha ndranuhun ma ndratanan ta ndramas, ahi bwese anya kili ta aseben iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei. Eme ma, jo batorou sahou lawe-en ta nyala aliy bwe.
Tasah, jo ndratanan, aha badeh, aso-ok ta amekes gok dah, ta atukum ma adeu luk ta aseben iri. Eme ma, len mara-ei jo atudun nyara aha, ma tiye iri lau ta Kindrei badu kon tinan Masadoniya. Jo tiye tiri i buku doh: “Na jaha mene ndra-au, iri lau badu Akaya lokowani iri ta amekes gok ta atukum luk.” Ma iri anuhun sahou ta aha amekes gok dah ta aseben iri lau badu Judiya, ma suri ndrine iri lau solo-an badu Masadoniya amekes ale.
Arile, jo bwalek sahou ahi amekes ta atudun nyara aha asahan buku sahou laleyah. Mwasin ta aha kalokou le, buku jo mene asehek tiri. Jo abudon ta aliy, eme ma jo tiye nadu tine to oro awek hawe aha.
Ehe, ahi abudon handru, aha kameh alokou ta adeu lakou. Eme ma jo abudon, kora-on iri lau ta Kindrei rayah badu Masadoniya kala hawek ale ta atou aha, ma aha balokowani luk bwe, bwilima kameh eme hamon ta to ja.
Eme ma, jo abudon ta tiye nadu tine oro ma taloh doh kawek kasahan hawe aha kalokowani ndramas nane aha tandrakan ta adeu ili. Jo kameh in hamon ewek, ya buku iri lau kame hawek iri winiyan atanan, aha amwenen sekesek ta adeu luk doh. Bala buku jo ewek ariu budon taha, ma bwili aha ama ta atukum luk doh.
Ya, aha kabudon kamwenen ta sahou dah: Ndramak batah nyamon sola bwe, iy kameh bakohok sali nyamon solo-an bwe. Ya, ndramak atah nyamon solo-an, iy kameh akohok sali nyamon solo-an.
Eme ma, aha ari, ari kabudon ndrinem le amwenen op, ma ou tanam ta saba lakou, aha anya kadeu. Kora-on ari mwan o badih, ndrinen basekesek ta edeu lakou bwe, ma iy abudon i buku doh: “Iri mwan ma badih abadok labai ma aruwi jo, ma bwilik ama buku jo badeu rayah luk bwe.” Kora-on iri budon solo-an doh udu taha, ma aha adeu luk. Kindrei badeh, aso-ok ndramak, iy sekesek ma edeu lakou na so-ok ma na budon tan amwenen.
Ma Kindrei kameh winiya edeu taha lakou solo-an handru. Ma aha kameh taha lakou solo-an labai ja, ta winiyan aseben manyah taha. Ma lakou solo-an doh kameh udu aliy ta aseben aha ta amekes iri gok mwasin.
Udu bolo buk ndrabun, Kindrei asehek i buku doh: “Iy ndramak dah badeh, edeu lakou solo-an labai ili tiri lau ndra-in, Kindrei winiyan bamani budon tiri lakou mwasin nane iy amekes bwe, ma iy kameh nyosowani iy ta udu le buku doh.”
Kindrei amwenen kameh edeu buwa kei ta atah ili tiri mwan ma badih. Ma iy ale kameh edeu nyamon ili niri mwan ma badih mara-ei. Eme ma iy kameh edeu taha lakou ili le winiya aha. Ma aha winiyan adeu ili tiri lau ta Kindrei rayah ja. Ma kandriyen taha kameh asahan mwasin mara-ei, i buku ndramak atah buwa kei, ano ato-ou salin solo-an labai.
Ya, Kindrei kameh edeu lakou solo-an ewek taha, ma aha kameh winiyan adeu solo-an ale ili ta nadu tine aha iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei. Aha amekes i buku doh ta ahi bwese ndramas doh iu, ma iri mwan ma badih kameh adeu wurah ili ta Kindrei ta gok aha amekes.
Sahou mara-ei dah handru. Gok aha amekes ta adeu luk, kameh aseben iri lau rayah ta Kindrei, iri lakou bwe. Ma idah kameh bwidi iri adeu wurah tinan labai mara-ei ili ta Kindrei.
Gok aha amekes dah ta aseben iri lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, kameh leheya i buku doh: Aha badeh, aso-ok labai ta aseben iri lau rayah ja. Eme ma, iri kameh atudun nyara Kindrei. Tasah, iri kameh atanan aha badeh, a-en hamon le ta sahou ta Kindrei, ma atiye sahou mwasin ta Krais. Ma ale, udu bolo iri lau ta Kindrei badu Judiya akohok ndramas dah, ma iri kameh winiya atanan aha anya kadeu luk ta aseben iri rayah ale. Iri kameh atudun nyara Kindrei iu ili loken mara-ei.
Ma iri kameh atanan Kindrei badeh, amekes kandriyen mwasin labai handru ewek taha. Eme ma, iri kameh aso-ok aha labai, ma iri winiya asolom ili ta Kindrei, iy edeu nyosowan laba tinan ewek taha.
Ndramas, Kindrei edeu eme tataha badeh, tinan labai, ma taha winiyan basehek na boho taha bwe. Taha badeh, kadeu wurah kili ta Kindrei ta ndramas tan.
Jo Pol, jo ndramak nane iri lau rayah taha asehek nyalak anya, “Pol kede-eh, iy inoh buku iy asehek sahou udu hawe taha, arile iy ja winiya banoh ta asehek sahou boto-on eme tataha ja bwe, buku iy iu ili len.” Ya, aha kanuhun! Krais badeh, batudun nyaran amwenen bwe, iy ta amekes le kandriyen mwasin. Eme ma, ta katin doh le, jo anya kandremenya aha:
Jo tiye taha ta len buku jo ewek, jo kameh winiyan asehek sahou boto-on labai ewek taha, arile jo bwalek amekes ai. Arile, jo kameh winiyan amekes ili tiri mwan ma badih nane orou sahou eme badak, anya jo badeh, ba-en hamon ta kandriyen ta Kindrei bwe, ta munyak le.
Handru, taha manyah ado kon munyak dah buku lau laleyah, arile ta bahun dah, taha atik balik ili andri, ahi bakohok ari lakou badu munyak ta amekes bahun doh, bwe.
Ahi badeh, bakohok boto-on ta lakou badu munyak bwe. Ahi badeh, adek na le boto-on ta Kindrei, ta adi boto-on ta balik mara-ei ano iu.
Boto-on ta Kindrei le winiya sani sahou tebelese tiri lau anya kamekes, ma iri budon mara-ei nane turuki san tiri mwan ma badih anya katanan Kindrei. Ma na le boto-on ta Kindrei, badeh, kameh ahi winiyan ta aruwi budon tiri mwan ma badih nane amekes bahun i ta Kindrei, ma katubuni ndrine iri ka-en hamon ta budon ta Krais.
Ahi kameh adek na le boto-on ta Kindrei le ai, ta aha kameh winiya anuhun ma a-en hamon ta sahou tan. Hamon kameh, iri mwan ma badih amekes lakou laleyah, ma tebelese sahou. Ahi kameh none boto-on ta Kindrei dah ili tiri, ma adeu kaliu ndra-in ili bwele-e iri.
Aha badeh, babudon bamwenen bwe! Aha aleben iri lakou nane aha anyolom badeh, na mada aha le. Ndramak ari, iy ere hawe aha, iy asehek i buku doh, “Jo le ari badeh, akohok boho Krais, ma jo udu bwele-en labai, tiri lau rayah ja.” Ya sahou tek i buku doh: Iy ndramak dah badeh, kabudon ta ndrinen le, ma iy kameh i tanan i buku, jo Pol, jo ale akohok boho Krais.
Laban atehei tanan eme tahi ta amekes gok dah. Iy aso-ok ahi katadau budon taha kabadok, ma gok tahi ta sokolowa aha bwe. Eme ma, buku jo sekesek ta atudun nyara ahi sese ta gok ale ahi amekes dah, bwilik kameh winiyan bama ta sahou jo amekes bwe.
Arile, jo bwalek atehei budon anya jo atorou iri la-ukei ta nohowa aha.
Handru, lau rayah asehek i buku doh eme tek: “Udu bolo iri la-ukei ta Pol badeh, iri sahou solo-an boto-on labai ere aliy, arile buku len iy amwenen asahan ma asehek sahou eme tataha, taha anyolom iy se nyamun bwai, ma iy tanan kandriyen ta asehek sahou bwe le.”
Iri lau ale amekes sahou doh, iri kabudon kamwenen ma katanan, buku kandriyen ahi kameh amekes na len ahi awek are hawe aha, idoh kameh in hamon ta sahou ahi torowenei udu bolo la-ukei, na len ahi bare hawe aha bwe.
Ahi winiyan basehek ahi a buku le iri lau rayah sekesek ma atudun nyara iri, bwe. Ma ahi winiyan basehek kandriyen tahi i buku le kandriyen tiri bwe le. Iri lau doh badeh, aleben kandriyen tiri na tanan tiri le amwenen. Iy ari, ari aleben kandriyen tan amwenen i hawe kandriyen ta ndramak ari ja. Iri lau amekes i buku doh, iri ari tanan mwasin bwe.
Arile, ahi baso-ok ta amekes i buku doh bwe. Ahi kameh atudun le nyara ahi ta iri gok Kindrei atehei eme tahi ta amekes. Kalem le doh badeh, Kindrei lebelei ma iy andromwei eme tahi. Ma aha lau badu kon Korin, aha badeh, are bolo kalem ta gok dah, Kindrei amwenen edeu eme tahi.
Kindrei atehei aha ale are bolo kalem ta gok iy edeu eme tahi. Eme ma, jo basakalau kalem Kindrei edeu eme tek bwe, na len jo mene ewek kon Korin ma atiye sahou mwasin ta Krais ewek taha.
Ahi batudun nyara ahi ta gok nane iri lau rayah amekes ta kon Kindrei batiye ahi ta ala amekes gok ala aliy bwe. Ahi abudon i buku doh: Budon taha kameh abadok i tinan, eme ma gok nane ahi atehei katin ma mwena udu ndrokowa aha, kameh asahan i tinan mara-ei.
Eme ma, nadah jo winiyan ili kon ra-on ja ere len labai taha i loboho an i andri o-on, ta atiye sahou mwasin ta Krais. Arile, jo bwalek ta sakalau kalem nane Kindrei atehei jo ta amekes gok tan, ma atudun nyarak ta gok nane ndramak ari amekes mwena.
Kindrei asehek udu bolo buk ndrabun i buku doh, “Are lau iy anya katudun nyaran, iy badeh, katudun nyara Laban le ari ta lakou marakon iy ndrabwidiy.”
Tasah, buku are mwan o badih, iri atudun nyara iri le amwenen, bala buku Kindrei abudon kalem udu tiri bwe. Arile, buku Laban le amwenen atudun nyara are mwan o badih, badeh, nyara iy mwan o badih le doh.
Na len dah, jo aso-ok aha katehei keme tek ta amekes sahou laleyah op. Aha winiyan atehei deh?
Tasah, jo abudon solo-an ta tekedek taha, i buku Kindrei abudon boto-on labai tiri lau mwan ma badih tan, kora-on iri katelei san mwasin. Jo aso-ok aha ka-en hamon handru ta Jises Krais le ari. Jo anya katehei aha kala mine Krais, buku tama badih bihin atik nadun anya kili bahandra mwan tan. Jo aso-ok aha kare le buku badih bihin iy bare bada ari mwan bwe le, winiya le len iy ili bahandra mwan tan nane uru ndra tandrakan ta atasou.
Arile, jo badeh, inoh. Jo abudon ta balik ibin i mwak, iy tanan mwasin labai ta kandriyen ta wendreya, ma mwena mene iy ndrawendreya Ip. Kora-on kandriyen ndra-in buku doh, kameh asahan taha, ma aha kameh alelei iri rayah wendreya aha, ma budon taha winiyan bado rasi bwe, ma aha kameh mani Krais mara-ei.
Tasah, aha badeh, lau ta atehei budon taha in ta wendreya. Aha winiyan sekesek ma alelei lau rayah, ale asahan hawe aha ma atiye sahou rayah ta Jises, ahi basehek bwe le. Ma iri ale kasehek sahou ta malawi lakou ari ja, sala Malawin Ndrabun mene aha akohok badu mine ahi. Aha winiya anuhun ma a-en hamon ta “sahou mwasin” doh, sala sahou mwasin ta Jises amwenen ahi mene ndrasehek ndrawek taha.
Aha kanuhun! Jo amwenen abudon, jo badeh, bare bahandra iri aposel taha nane, aha abudon iri are bwele-en labai, bwe!
Handru, bohok badeh, winiyan basehek sahou hawe kandriyen ta andrek bwe. Arile, kandriyen tek ta sahou mwasin badeh, udu bwele-e tanan toro mara-ei ja. Ta iri kandriyen mara-ei ma bolo len mara-ei ahi ndraleheya aha ta iri tanan dah. Eme ma aha ndratanan mwasin labai ta tanan tahi.
Udu bolo len mwena jo atiye sahou mwasin ta Kindrei ewek taha, jo bandremenya aha ta luk ta amekes gok dah bwe. Jo amwenen atehei jo ili andri mara-ei ta amekes gok ta atudun aha. Sebwe kandriyen, jo amekes doh, ndra-in nadeh?
Jo aso-ok aha katanan. Jo mene akohok luk, ma hawe iri lakou badeh, tiri lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei rayah labai, ta aseben jo ta amekes gok udu bolo aha. Ta kandriyen i buku doh le bwidi jo ariu lokowa iri lau laleyah.
Eme ma, buku bwena mene jo udu hawe aha, jo tek ari lakou bwe, jo batehei maha-an bala ta ari mwan o badih taha bwe. Iri nadu tine taha, iri lau ta Kindrei badu Masadoniya ame asahan Korin, iri badeh, atondrok jo ta lakou mara-ei, buku tek ano mara-ei. Jo badeh, abudon boto-on labai, ta jo bwalek edeu ari maha-an ewek taha ja. Ma jo badeh, in hamon ta budon doh le kahis.
Sahou handru ta Krais badeh, udu bolo ndrinek. Eme ma, ta idoh le, jo tiye taha handru ta loboho Akaya mara-ei, ari mwan o badih winiyan baturuki san ta jo atudun nyarak, ta kandriyen jo ale amekes ta adeu sahou mwasin laleyah ili tiri lau mwan ma badih, bwe.
Sebwe, budon taha kede-eh ta ndremenya, tasah handru jo amekes i buku doh? Aha anya, jo baso-ok aha bwe, ma jo amekes i buku doh? Bwe handru en! Kindrei tanan, jo badeh, aso-ok aha labai.
Katin ta jo amekes, i buku doh: Lau rayah badeh, asilah madasan ta atudun nyara iri le, ma iri anya kasahan buku le ahi, ta mada iri mwan ma badih. Jo badeh, ibo gok ta aturuk san tiri doh. Eme ma, jo kameh ibo gok udu le buku don ai, ma jo kameh winiyan bandrek luk taha ja bwai.
Iri lau doh, iri aposel handru bwe. Boho iri irek ta wasai. Iri wendreya ta amekes gok nane, ma tobolowe kandriyen tiri ta andrek iri mwan ma badih. Ma iri aseken iri mwan ma badih kabudon iri badeh, aposel handru ta Krais.
Taha winiya atanan, tasah handru iri asahan i buku doh. Balik le amwenen tobolowe kandriyen tan, ma iy bwidi iri mwan ma badih abudon i buku doh, “Sebwe, iy badeh, angelo ta Kindrei ari nadeh?”
Eme ma, ari lakou handru bwe, buku iri lau tan ale tubuni kandriyen tiri, ma bwidi iri mwan ma badih tan asahan i buku lau mwasin ta Kindrei le ai. Hamon kameh, Kindrei aleben iri, ma iri kameh akohok maha-an in hamon ta gok nane iri amekes.
Jo ndrasehek mwena ndra-au. Ya, nadah jo anya kasehek ja: Iri lau sabudon anya jo lolo-ou ndramak. Arile, buku aha anya jo lolo-ou eh, ka-iy ai. Arile, aha kabwidi san tek, ta jo winiya atudun nyarak sese.
Jo ba-en hamon ta tanan ta Laban ta amekes sahou i buku dah, bwe. Jo asehek sahou ma atudun nyarak i buku ndramak lolo-ou amekes.
Lau solo-an badeh, atudun nyara iri ta kandriyen, nane iri mwan ma badih badu kon munyak a-en hamon ta aliy. Eme ma, jo ale anya ki-in hamon ta kandriyen badu kon munyak ta atudun nyarak le amwenen.
Eme ma jo kameh amekes. Tasah, tanan taha mwan ma badih badeh, tinan labai. Budon taha ale mwasin mara-ei, eme ma aha aso-ok labai ta anuhun ndramak lolo-ou asehek sahou ewek taha.
Iri sahou mara-ei doh handru! Buku rayah lau ame ma atondrok aha, o iri kame kandrei lokowa aha mara-ei kano ki-iu, o iri kandrek aha ka-en hamon ta sahou tiri, o iri kati-i aha, o kaluhani aha, ma kasehek sahou ta bobose aha, aha batikahei iri bwe. Aha anyolom iri le ai.
Aha nadu tine, jo tikisiy tinan labai! Na len mene ahi are hawe aha, bwilik ama labai ta amekes iri kandriyen solo-an labai, iri lau doh, amekes ewek taha. Mwasin! Saba lakou iri anya katudun nyara iri, jo kameh amekes i buku le aliy.
Iri anya iri Juwis? Jo ale jo Juwis! Iri anya iri lau badu Isra-el? Jo ale, jo badu Isra-el! Iri anya tubu iri Abraham? Jo ale i buku aliy!
Iri anya iri ta amekes gok ta Krais? (Nadah, jo anya kasehek sahou buku ari ndramak lolo-ou ai.) Jo badeh, udu bwele-e iri ja, ta gok ta Krais. Jo ibo gok boto-on labai, ma jo mwasin mara-ei ja tiri lau ta atiye sahou mwasin. Len tek badeh, solo-an labai ja tiri, ta len sabe jo udu bolo asiu lulik. Iri lau adi jo na malou sakabuk i bek, san solo-an labai, jo winiyan bandromwei bwe. San solo-an labai, jo mirihik kimek.
Ya, iri lau ta bwena tiri Juwis badeh, adai jo na malou sakabuk i bek san limeh, ma androm ili asahan san ma tonoh ndro ari (39).
San ma tulusin iri lau tinan badu Rom badeh, adai jo na kandro kei. San rasan ja badeh, iri lau orowei jo na bek, arile jo bamak bwe. San ma tulusin ndron atasah udu ndras ma jo amai udu bolo ndras. Ari ben, ari len jo ateheh laleyah udu bolo ndras.
San solo-an jo edek ili eme na le kati. Len rayah badeh, jo apou gwa, ma wadah teheyani jo ma jo amai. Len rayah ja, jo ndruni iri lalou, ma mirihik iri kadi jo kimek. Len rayah, iri Juwis, ahi boho kon ari le, iri badeh, anya kadai jo kimek ale. Len rayah iri lau badu kon rakon ja anya kadai jo kimek ale. Eme ma, jo anya kimek kudu kon tinan, ma jo anya kimek kudu kon lau aliy bwe. Len rayah jo anya kimek kudu bolo ndras. Len rayah jo anya kimek kudu mine iri lau iri anya iri lau ta Kindrei amwenen.
Ma jo ale andra-i mara-ei ta gok solo-an labai. Len solo-an labai jo ibo gok na ben, ma jo bamadin bamwenen bwe. Jo imeson, ma balek amar ta gwa. Len solo-an jo mani nyamon, jo akohok nyala ma jo awin solo-an bwe!
Iri lakou doh le bwe. Lakou rayah udu aliy ale! Na bolo len mara-ei, jo abudon solo-an ta atondrok iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei atalan are bolo kon laleyah. Ma idoh atehei maha-an laba tinan labai eme tek.
Sebwe, budon tiri mwan ma badih rayah badeh, babadok bwe le, eme ma, jo amwenen atona sisi-in doh. Sebwe, iri lakou rayah ndraruwi budon tiri nadeh, ma iri amekes kandriyen ndra-in doh, eme ma bwidi ndrinek andra-i labai tiri lakou doh.
Aha mara-ei kanuhun! Sebwe, jo ari madasan ja bwai, ta atudun nyarak amwenen. Eme ma, jo winiyan batudun nyarak ta iri lakou leheya, jo nyamuk, bwe. Jo anya katudun nyarak ta iri lakou leheya jo i buku ari ndramak laleyah.
Ma Kindrei badeh, tama Laban Jises, iy le ari tanan, jo bawendreya bwe. Taha katudun nyaran kudu bolo len mara-ei!
Bwena mene jo udu Damaskus. Ndramak ari ta bahandra kabin, nyaran Aretas atehei ndrokei udu mada kou tinan badu Damaskus. Iri anya kateu jo, ma kadeu jo kili bolo asiu lulik.
Arile, iri lau ta Kindrei rayah badeh, anyuhi jo ili bolo ndrom sahin rahak, ano oro bawei malou i ta lu-u ndrom nane doh, ma oro atehei jo i san ta mada munu kowah le eme andri ma eme manan. Eme ma jo ruwani iy ndramak ta kabin doh ma jo atobwak iu.
Jo amwenen ibo gok ta atudun nyarak kahis. Handru, kandriyen doh winiya baseben iri mwan ma badih atanan jo aposel bwe, arile jo ari madasan ja ta leheya aha ta lakou dah bwai. Arile, nadah jo anya kasehek nyala ameh ma sahou rayah Laban asehek eme tek.
Jo tanan ndramak ta Krais ari. Udu bolo jaha ronoh hahuw (14) ndra-au, Kindrei badeh, andrei iy ma mwasin iu ili bolo kandrah loken, loken labai handru on. Sebwe, iy ma mwasin o malawin le, jo bala tanan bwai. Kindrei le ari badeh, tanan ai.
Jo anya kasehek ja. Jo tanan, Kindrei andrei iy ndramak doh, iu ili bolo kandrah loken, loken labai mara-ei on. Sebwe, iy ma mwasin o malawin le, jo bala tanan bwai. Kindrei le ari badeh, tanan ai. Ya, udu bolo kandrah loken labai nane doh, iy anuhun sahou rayah doh, lau winiyan basehek na boho iri bwe. Ma sahou rayah doh ndrabun labai ta asehek ale.
<range>
Eme ma, jo anya katudun nyara ndramak doh. Arile, jo winiya batudun nyarak ja bwai. Jo winiyan asehek le ta jo nyamuk bwe, ma jo winiyan atudun nyarak ta lakou doh le.
Aha mara-ei kanuhun se! Buku jo anya katudun nyarak amwenen, jo kameh winiyan basahan ndramak ta wasai ja bwai. Iri lakou mara-ei doh, jo winiyan asehek ta aliy, handru, ma mene ndrasahan tek. Arile, jo batudun nyarak amwenen bwe. Tasah, jo bwalek ari ndramak mwan o badih ja anuhun sahou dah, ma abudon anya jo ndramak mwasin. Jo aso-ok aha lau mwan ma badih kanyolom kandriyen jo amekes, ma sahou jo asehek. Ta idoh le, aha winiyan anyolom jo, ma atanan jo.
Ya, lakou nane Kindrei leheya eme tek doh badeh, laba tinan labai. Eme ma, iy bwalen jo atudun nyarak ili loken labai mara-ei. Eme ma, iy atehei sik ari eme badak. Sik doh bokoro-ei jo i buku bodo lakou madan, madan tatahi ndramak. Sik doh, i buku ndramak ta balik ari, iy eme ta a-um jo ma tolomwa jo, ta jo satudun nyarak.
San tulusin badeh, jo asalom ili ta Laban ta iy kanyumuri sik udu bwele-ek dah ki-iu.
Arile, Laban anya, “Jo winiya banyumor ou bwai, arile, jo kameh udu hawem. Idoh le. Tasah, boto-on tek le badeh, ibo gok handru, tiri lau nyamu iri bwe.” Eme ma, jo winiya babudon ta sik dah, ma jo nyamuk ja bwai. Jo sekesek labai ja ta udu buku dah, ma boto-on ta Krais ere hawek.
Eme ma, gok jo amekes dah badeh, ta Krais. Buku jo nyamuk bwe, maha-an solo-an akohok jo, iri lau anya kadi jo, mwasin jo kasekesek le ai. Ya, buku jo nyamuk bwe, na len le doh, boto-on ta Kindrei udu bwele-ek.
Sahou nane jo amekes ta atudun nyarak, idoh i buku sahou ta ndramak lolo-ou. Jo bwalek ta asehek, arile aha badeh, bwidi ndrinek ta amekes. Tasah, aha amwenen batudun nyarak bwe. Idoh mwasin, aha amekes i buku doh. Arile, bwe. Jo ndramak laleyah, arile jo sakalau iri lau ta wasai mara-ei nane aha aloh iri, “aposel mwasin handru.”
Na len mene jo udu hawe aha, jo amekes lakou solo-an labai ta leheya aha, buku jo aposel handru, ma Kindrei amwenen tiye jo ta ewek. Ehe, jo amwenen atehei jo iu ili andri mara-ei, ma amekes iri gok solo-an buku doh: Jo amekes kalem solo-an ndrawek taha, ma lahou tinan rayah bwidi mani iri mwan ma badih atur, ta anyolom boto-on ili ta Kindrei.
Jo mene amekes kandriyen le dah ewek taha, jo amekes ili tiri lau ta Kindrei rayah ale are laleyah. Arile, sebwe kandriyen tek ndra-in nadeh! Tasah, jo badeu ari maha-an bawek taha bwe, ma jo amwenen ale bandrek aha ta luk ta amekes gok dah bwe le. Arile, mwasin, aha kamani iri “lakou ndra-in” nane doh jo mesekei ndrawek taha!
Ya, na len dah jo alokou jo ta ewek hawe aha, i buku san tulusin ai. Buku jo ewek, jo kameh winiya bandrek luk o saba lakou taha ja bwai. Aha kanuhun! Jo bwalek akohok lakou taha. Tasah, jo baso-ok luk taha bwe. Jo badeh, anya kakohok aha ndramak le amwenen. Aha tanan, iri nah badeh, winiya bamekes gok ta asilah, ma atukum lakou i ta tama ma tine iri bwe. Tama ma tine iri le badeh, winiya asilah ma atukum lakou ta aseben nadu iri le kabwe.
Eme ma, jo kameh sekesek ta edeu iri lakou tek mara-ei, ma hawe kohak ewek taha ta aseben aha asahan iri lau boto-on ta Kindrei. Handru, jo badeh, aso-ok aha labai. Arile, sebwe aha tanan lakou doh nadeh? Eme ma, tasah handru aha batehei ndrine aha mara-ei bame tek bwe?
Arile, iri taha rayah badeh, asehek ta kandriyen tek i buku doh: “Handru, taha banyolom iy akohok lakou tataha bwai. Arile, tanan tan badeh, mwasin labai ta andrek taha, ma kandriyen ta balagwah ta orou no-o taha ta akohok lokowa taha laleyah.”
Ya, i buku sah handru? Badu mine iri lau mene jo tiye iri awek hawe aha nadeh?
Jo mene edeu budon mwasin i ta Taitus, ano jo tiye iy ma nadu tine taha ari ja, ta awek hawe aha. Sebwe, uru ndrakohok rayah luk taha ndrado mine uru ndrame nadeh? Sebwe, ndrine aso badeh, bala le ari, ta amekes gok dah bwe nadeh? Sebwe, ahi bamekes kandriyen bala le ari, ma ba-en hamon ta boto-on ta Malawin Ndrabun ari le doh, bwe nadeh? Aha kabudon kamwenen!
Sebwe aha kameh anyolom iri sahou mara-ei doh, ma aha kameh abudon ahi torowenei ta amekes sahou tahi kamwenen ta mada aha. Arile, bwe. Ahi ado mada Kindrei i buku nadu tine aha i san ta Krais, ma ahi aseken aha labai. Eme ma, ahi amekes iri sahou dah, ta atadau budon taha kabadok.
Tasah, jo inoh sese, ma jo abudon i buku doh, kora-on jo kewek ma katawei aha bala buku ndramak nane jo anya kanyolom ja bwe. Ma kora-on aha ale anya kanyolom jo bala buku ndramak nane aha anya kanyolom. Kora-on jo katou iri kandriyen solo-an doh udu ndrokowa aha. Idoh kandriyen ta tebelese sahou, ma kandriyen ta ndrinem irih i tiri lau rayah ja, ma kandriyen ta amekes lakou laleyah, buku aluhe, sondrokonya, batun boto-on, ma kandriyen ta bolowa lakou laleyah.
Ma kora-on jo kewek, ma Kindrei tek kameh kabolei jo kudu mada aha. Kora-on bwilik kama ma jo keden ndranye iri lau rayah are bolo aha mene amekes kandriyen ndra-in. Iri batubuni ndrine iri bwe, ma badeu kona iri bala ta kandriyen ndra-in ta karei bwe, ma kandriyen ta amadin hawe udu ndramak ari ja. Jo inoh labai tiri lakou mari doh.
Idah, ili asahan san tulusin ai, ta jo anya kewek katou aha. Buk ndrabun asehek i buku doh, “Buku lau la-uh o taloh asehek anya, oro anyolom ari ndramak amekes kandriyen ndra-in, mwasin ta aha kasehek sahou hawen.”
Iri mwan ma badih amekes kandriyen ndra-in bwena, ma aha mwan ma badih rayah ale, aha ndranuhun batanau tek udu bolo len mene jo udu hawe aha. Jo asehek taha ta kandriyen jo anya kamekes, ma nadah badeh, jo udu len labai taha. Arile, jo anya kasehek taha ja: Buku jo ewek atou aha ja, jo winiya balelek iri mwan ma badih nane amekes kandriyen ndra-in ja bwai. Jo kameh ikoh udu bwele-e iri le kabwe.
Tasah, aha anya katanan handru, Krais amekes sahou na bohok o bwe. Mwasin, aha kameh winiya atanan amwenen ta lakou mara-ei doh. Krais badeh, bamunyau bwe le, iy ibo gok boto-on labai ta aseben aha.
Handru, Krais mene asahan ndramak le, ma iy nyamun handru bwe. Eme ma, iri tatahi iy i bada kei tondreh, ma iy imek. Arile, nadah ja bwe. Na boto-on ta Kindrei laba tinan labai, bwidi iy amak eme awas ja. Ahi aposel badeh, ahis hawe Krais, ma ahi ale lau laleyah, ma ahi nyamu ahi bwe. Arile, na le boto-on ta Kindrei, ahi ale ado hawe Krais. Eme ma, ahi kameh adek bolo aha ta amekes ndrokowa aha kudu mwasin na boto-on dah.
Aha katona ndrine aha ma katanan kamwenen, sebwe, aha atehei budon taha handru in ta Jises o bwe. Sebwe, aha ndratanan, Krais Jises badeh, udu ndrine aha. Buku bwe eh, budon taha ndrataras nadeh?
Handru, hamon kameh aha winiya atanan ahi aposel handru, ma ahi atehei budon tahi mara-ei in ta Krais.
Ma, ahi asalom ili ta Kindrei, ta iy kaseben aha, ma aha samekes ari kandriyen ndra-in. Jo amekes sahou dah ta Kindrei winiya leheya aha, ahi aposel handru. Ahi aso-ok aha kameh kamekes le kandriyen mwasin; iri lau abudon ahi aposel handru o bwe.
Aha tanan, taha badeh, winiya bamekes ari lakou ta aturuk o tubuloh sahou mwasin ja bwe. Taha kaseben le ta sahou mwasin dah kabadok boto-on.
Aliy, ahi nyamu ahi o bwe, arile, buku aha ales boto-on ta budon taha kahis, ahi kameh sekesek labai. Ma, len mara-ei kameh ahi asalom ili ta Kindrei, ta aha winiya asahan lau tan boto-on labai.
Katin ta jo udu ndra len atorou la-ukei ewek taha dah, i buku doh: Jo aso-ok aha kasehek nyala manyah taha op. Buku jo ewek asahan hawe aha, jo bwalek ta tone boto-on ta gok nane Laban edeu eme tek, bwe. Iy atehei eme tek dah, ta atadau aha; ta amekes aha andra-i bwe.
Aha nadu tine mwan ma badih, aha ndrado ai, ma bale aha kudu taha. Jo aso-ok aha kabadok ta asahan lau ta Kindrei handru. Aha kanuhun sahou tek, ma katawiy kihis kudu budon taha, ma ndrine aha mara-ei kameh udu mwasin. Kindrei aso-ok aha lau mwan ma badih mara-ei, ma aseben ndrine aha udu mwasin. Iy amwenen kameh udu hawe aha.
Ta kandriyen ta taha mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, aha ari, ari badeh, kateu lim hawe nadu tinem mwan ma badih rayah ja.
Iri lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei mara-ei are kada-ah adeu bada an tiri mwasin owek taha.
Jo Pol: Jo badeh, aposel tiri lau ta Kindrei. Jo atorou la-ukei dah ewek taha lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei ale are bolo kon munyak tinan Galesiya. Iri lau nane ahi amekes lahou se badeh, ale are hawek, ma iri ale anya, bada-an mwasin tiri ewek taha. Jo aposel ari, eme ma jo badeh, edek ma atiye sahou ta Kindrei. Idoh badeh, basahan na seken ta ari ndramak, bwe. Idoh badeh, asahan na seken ta Jises Krais hawe taman Kindrei le amwenen. Uru le amwenen badeh, atehei gok dah eme tek ma suni jo ta atiye sahou mwasin ewek taha. Jises mene imek, arile Kindrei ndramete-ei iy udu ta imek tan badeh, ndrame awas ja.
<range>
Jo anya kedeu bada-an mwasin kewek taha ale. Tikisiy ma mondrei ta tama taha Kindrei hawe Laban tataha Jises Krais ewek taha.
Kindrei mene suni Jises eme andri kon munyak, iy le amwenen imek ta sikine karei ma lomondra ndra-in tataha. Iy bwalen iri kandriyen ndra-in badu munyak dah kabokoro-ei taha. Eme ma, iy eme dah badeh, ta aseben taha, ta iri kandriyen doh kameh winiyan baluwi taha bwe. Idoh, in hamon ta seken ta tama taha Kindrei le.
Iy badeh, udu bwele-en labai tiri lakou mara-ei. Boto-on tan hawe lomadan badeh, winiyan bano bwe. Eme ma taha kamasiye ma katudun iy kudu le buku doh! Handru.
Aden! Manik badeh, atur labai ta kandriyen aha amekes. Tasah, aha badeh, a-en hamon ta kandriyen mwasin ta Jises nane dah, ma se nawin bwe, aha anya karuwani Kindrei, ta a-en hamon ta kandriyen randrah ja. Ta tikisiy ta Krais le badeh, Kindrei luhi aha ame asahan lau tan. Arile, kandriyen nane aha abudon ta a-en hamon ta aliy badeh, bado se hawe sahou mwasin tan handru bwe.
Ya, kandriyen ha-un nane badeh, mwasin handru bwe. Kandriyen ari le doh badeh, mwasin mara-ei. Idoh badeh, kandriyen ta Krais. Iri lau nane ndrasahan hawe aha badeh, iri anya katobolowe kandriyen ta Krais kasahan randrah ja. Ma iri ale anya kabolowa budon ma manyah taha sasahan samwenen.
Sahou mwasin ta Krais doh badeh, aso mene leheyani aha ta aliy badeh, mwasin labai. Eme ya, ki buku none aso deh, bwe-em, ari angelo badu kandrah, karuwani sahou mwasin ta Krais doh, ma katiye sahou mwasin ki randrah labai ja, ta aha sa-en hamon ta sahou mene aso atiye dah, badeh, jo aseken ta iy ndramak doh badeh, kakohok maha-an hawe sisi-in ndra-in, ta udu le buku doh!
Aso mene ndrasehek ndra-au, ya, na dah badeh, jo anya kasehek ja: Ki buku are lau katiye sahou randrah ja, ta sahou mwasin ta Krais mene aha ndranuhun badeh, jo aso-ok iy ndramak doh badeh, kakohok maha-an ma sisi-in ndra-in labai kudu le buku doh!
Jo babudon solo-an ta budon tiri mwan ma badih bwe. Buku iri baso-ok jo bwe, jo ari sahou ta aliy bwe le. Jo ndramak ari ta atiye sahou handru, ma jo aso-ok Kindrei le amwenen kasekesek ta gok tek. Buku iri basekesek ta sahou nane jo asehek bwe, ndri-iy ai. Buku jo ndramak ari ta atamar le iri lau, jo winiyan basahan lohowan ta Krais bwe.
Aha nadu tine, jo anya katiye kamwenen ki taha, ta aha katanan ta sahou mwasin jo atiye mene ewek taha badeh, basahan ta budon ta ari ndramak bwe.
Jo badeh, bakohok ma banuhun sahou mwasin dah badu boho ari ndramak bwe. Ma ari ndramak baleheya sahou mwasin dah bame tek bwe. Jises Krais le amwenen badeh, leheyani jo ta iri sahou mwasin mara-ei doh.
Aha mene ndranuhun ma ndratanan kandriyen ta bolo tekedek tek ma loweu udu bolo iri Juwis. Jo badeh, in hamon ta kandriyen tiri. Jo udu buku doh badeh, ma jo baso-ok iri lau ta Kindrei bwe. Ma jo anya kidi iri lau ta Kindrei kamak kano ka-au.
Ya, oro Juwis rebesem badu hawek badeh, jo sakalau oro ja ta kandriyen ta batanau. Jo sakalau oro ta bolo kandriyen ta tubu ahi, iri asehek eme tahi Juwis. Ma eme, budon tek irih labai ta in hamon ta kandriyen ta tubu ahi iri.
Jo badeh, in hamon ta kandriyen doh, arile Kindrei baso-ok lakou doh bwe. Arile, jo basahan bwe le, Kindrei badeh, ndratanan jo ai, ma iy ndratehei jo ta amekes lahou tan. Eme ma, na tikisiy tan le badeh, iy atehei jo amekes lahou tan.
Iy le amwenen leheyani nadun asahan eme madak, ta jo kameh katiye sahou tan mwasin kili tiri lau badu leheleh. Ya jo bala hawe ari ndramak bakohok tanan tan bwe.
Oro aposel ado Jerusalem badeh, bwena tek labai. Arile, jo bala hawe oro bakohok tanan toro bwe. Jo badeh, ili kon ari doh, lau solo-an bado aliy bwe, iri aloh Arabiya. Jo ili ere aliy ano badeh, jo eme hamon eme kon tinan Damaskus.
Udu bolo jaha ma taloh ano badeh, jo ili kon tinan Jerusalem ta atou aposel ari, nyaran Pita. Jo udu hawen badeh, len ma ronoh limeh (15) le.
Jo badeh, batou oro aposel marakon bwe. Jo badeh, atou le Pita hawe Jemis, nadu tine Laban tataha Jises.
Sahou marakon jo atorou ewek taha dah badeh, ndra handru le ai. Jo bawendreya aha bwe. Kindrei tanan saba lakou jo asehek.
Ano jo udu Jerusalem iu ili loboho munyak tinan Siriya hawe Silisiya.
Na len doh, iri lau ta Kindrei badu Judiya bala tanan jo bwe le.
Arile, iri anuhun le, lau asehek anya, “Iy ndramak mene ta idi taha. Arile, nadah ja badeh, iy ndraruwani kandriyen ndra-in doh ndra-au. Bwena badeh, iy bwalen labai ta sahou mwasin ta Krais, arile, nadah ja badeh, iy ndratiye ndrala ta lau ja ai.”
Eme ma, iri sekesek ma atudun nyara Kindrei. Tasah, jo badeh, ndra-en hamon ta Jises.
Ano, hamon ta jaha ma ronoh hahuw (14) ano badeh, jo hawe Banabas uru Taitus, aso ma taloh au ala hamon ala Jerusalem.
Kindrei asehek sahou eme tek, i san ta ameh, eme ma jo ili. Aso ala asahan Jerusalem, ano jo ili atukum hawe iri lau ta mwena tiri lau ta Kindrei. Jo batukum hawe iri lau mari bwe. Jo atukum hawe iri lau ta mwena le tiri. Jo asehek tiri le ta sahou mwasin jo mene ndrasehek tiri mwan ma badih badu leheleh. Jo badeh, abudon i buku doh: “Kora-on iri basekesek ta sahou jo asehek dah bwe, ma iri gok jo amekes dah kameh iu laleyah.” Eme ma jo asehek nyala iri.
Ya Taitus badeh, udu hawek na len doh. Iy badu Grik, arile iri lau mene ta Kindrei badu Juwis ado Jerusalem badeh, bandrek iy ta kasan ku-in bwe.
Tasah iri lau rayah ta wasai ame bolo oro i buku nadu tine oro tiye anya, are lau anya kasahan lau ta Kindrei badeh, kasan ku-in. Arile winiyan bwe. Iri lau doh badeh, lalou, ya iri aton ame le ta anya kasilah manyah mwasin taha akohok udu bada Jises Krais. Tasah, manyah tataha ba-en hamon ta kandriyen malen bwe. Ma iri anya kamekes taha kasahan bonyo-ou ta kandriyen tiri Juwis.
Iri aseken taha mara-ei ka-en hamon ta kandriyen tiri Juwis, arile aso banuhun se sahou ta nyala iri lau doh, bwai! Aso badeh, basekesek ta sahou tiri doh bwe. Buku aso mene ka-en hamon tiri lau ta wasai doh badeh, sebwe sahou handru nane aso ndrasehek ndrawek taha badeh, iu laleyah.
Arile, oro tinan tiri lau ta Kindrei badu Jerusalem badeh, bamekes bala buku iri lau ta wasai doh bwe. Taha anya, oro tinan tiri lau ta Kindrei doh badeh, are bwele-en sese tiri lau rayah ja, arile Kindrei ja badeh, baso-ok oro lau tinan nane doh bwe. Iy ja badeh, banyolom oro ta lakou badu manan bwe. Eme ma, lakou laleyah ta budon tek, iri tinan deh bwe. Oro badeh, badeu sahou toro amwenen bala hawe sahou mwasin nane aso asehek ewek taha bwe,
tasah, oro ndratanan Kindrei ndratehei lahou ndrame kanik ta atiye sahou mwasin ili tiri lau badu leheleh. I le buku none iy mene atehei, i kani Pita atiye sahou mwasin, i tiri lau badu Juwis.
Tasah, na boto-on ta Kindrei le jo asahan aposel ta atiye sahou tan i tiri lau badu leheleh, i le buku none Pita mene asahan aposel ta atiye sahou tan i tiri Juwis.
Eme Jemis, Pita hawe Jon badeh, oro lau ta batun dah, ndratanan Kindrei badeh, ndratehei lahou dah ndrame kanik; eme, oro ndrateu lim hawe aru Banabas. Eme, aso ndrasehek sahou randra le, ta aso amekes lahou le. Oro amekes lahou i bolo iri Juwis, ya aru Banabas amekes lahou i bolo iri lau badu leheleh.
Sahou ari le oro tiye i buku doh, “Ado kabudon ta aseben iri lau tiri lakou bwe, are bolo aso dah.” Seben dah mene, jo aseken labai ta amekes ale.
Na len Pita eme asahan Antiyok badeh, jo asehek i bwilin amwenen, tasah iy bamekes lakou bamwenen bwe.
Na len Jemis basuni oro lau rayah bala hawe Pita bwe le badeh, Pita aimon nyamon hawe iri lau badu leheleh. Arile udu, oro lau ta Jemis asahan ale, iy inoh ma iy ruwani ta aimon nyamon hawe oro lau badu leheleh. Eme iy baimon nyamon hawe oro ja bwe. Tasah, iy inoh oro Juwis doh, tiye tiri lau badu leheleh kasan ku-i iri bwena.
Eme, oro nadu tine rayah badu Juwis anyolom Pita amekes badeh, ma oro an hamon tan amekes i le buku aliy. Oro tanan kandriyen doh bamwenen ta i bada nadu tine oro, iri lau badu leheleh, bwe. Ma Banabas ale tanan kandriyen doh bamwenen bwe, arile oro aluwi iy in hamon toro ale.
Eme, jo anyolom oro ba-en hamon ta sahou handru ta sahou mwasin bwe. Eme jo tiye i ndranye Pita udu mada iri lau mari i buku doh, “Ou badeh, Juwis labai, arile manyah tam ndra buku iri lau badu leheleh. Eme ya ou bala Juwis bwe. Arile na dah, ou barandresei iri lau badu leheleh barakohok kandriyen tiri Juwis barala buku sah handru?”
Ya, jo asehek i ta Pita amwenen i buku doh, “Taha ndraye iri Juwis amwenen. Taha bala buku iri lau ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in i buku iri lau badu leheleh ala are baha tondrok ta kandriyen tataha Juwis bwe.
Arile ndri-iy ai, ahi tanan labai, ta Kindrei aloh ndramak mwasin mara-ei ta madan badeh, i san ta budon handru le, i ta Jises Krais; ba-en hamon ta batanau malen tiri Juwis, nane leheya kede-eh, bwe. Ma, taha Juwis ale kasahan mwasin ta mada Kindrei i san ta budon handru le in ta Krais Jises, bala san ta a-en hamon ta batanau malen bwe. Tasah, ari ndramak badeh, winiyan bamwenen ta mada Kindrei i buku iy ki-in hamon ta batanau malen asehek, bwe.
Taha anya kanone kasahan mwasin ta mada Kindrei i san ta taha ka-en hamon ta Krais ma taha kahas kase hawen. Arile, i buku none taha kasahan ndramak ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in ta mada iri Juwis, i le buku none iri lau badu leheleh, idoh kameh moson ki buku sah? Jises badeh, suni taha amekes kandriyen ndra-in? Bwe!
I buku jo anya katudun batanau malen mene jo ndratokosei ndra-au, badeh kameh, jo le nyowani jo ba-en hamon ta batanau malen handru bwe, ma jo kasahan i buku ndramak ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in ja.
Tasah, jo tanan, i buku none jo anya kudu baha tondrok ta batanau malen le badeh, gok ta batanau malen le ta suni jo i san ta imek, ma jo ki buku iri lau ndramak. Arile, na dah, gok ta batanau malen doh kano ai. Ya jo badeh, ki hamon ja ta kandriyen mwasin ta mada Kindrei.
Jo mene imek hawe Krais udu bada kei tondreh tan, eme na dah, jo badek ba-en hamon ta so-ok tek le amwenen ja bwai, arile na len dah badeh, Krais manyah udu hawek ma jo edek in hamon ta so-ok tan. Handru, na len dah, jo manyah le na budon tek handru i ta Nadu Kindrei. Tasah, iy le tikisi jo, ma iy le akohok kon tek imek udu ta kei tondreh.
Eme ma, jo winiyan bakahei tikisiy ta Kindrei bwai. Buku iri batanau mene Kindrei edeu ili tiri lau badu Isra-el, idoh winiyan sebenei taha ta mada sahou ta Kindrei hamon, buku handru eh, Jises winiyan bamak ta aseben taha bwe. Iy badeh, imek laleyah le. Arile, jo winiyan baruwaniy kandriyen ta tikisiy ta Kindrei nane jo in hamon ta aliy bwai.” Eme ma, jo asehek nyala Pita ta aliy.
Aha mwan ma badih badu Galesiya, bale aha ndra-au! Are lau ndrawahei budon taha, ma aha ndra bale aha bwe? Jo mene udu hawe aha amwenen badeh, jo leheya aha aleu handru ta iri adai Jises Krais imek, udu bada kei tondreh.
Eme jo anya ndremenya aha ta aliy, ma aso-ok aha badeh, kasehek kamwenen keme tek: Aha badeh, akohok Malawin Ndrabun ta Kindrei i san ta aha a-en hamon ta batanau malen deh? Bwe! Aha akohok Malawin Ndrabun i san ta aha anuhun, ma hawe i san ta budon taha handru ki ta sahou mwasin.
I buku sah aha a bale aha bwe badeh? Aha bwena mene amekes na Malawin Ndrabun ta Kindrei; ya idah ja kameh, aha anya kamekes na boto-on ta ndramak ai?
Sebwe iri maha-an aha ndruniy udu bolo tekedek taha bwena mene, moson bwe nadeh? Bwe! Iri lakou doh moson udu aliy.
Aha abudon i buku sah? Kindrei badeh, edeu Malawin Ndrabun ma amekes kalem udu ndrokowa aha. Sebwe iy edeu tasah aha an hamon ta batanau malen? Bwe! Idoh badeh, i san ta anuhun sahou ma hawe ta budon taha handru badeh, i ta sahou mwasin labai.
Aha badeh, kalomondra tekedek ta Abraham se: I buku buk ndrabun ndratiye, “Abraham atehei budon tan handru in ta Kindrei, eme ma Kindrei aloh iy ndramak mwasin mara-ei ta madan.”
Eme ma, aha badeh, ndranyolom ma ndratanan ndramwenen ta lakou doh: Iri mwan ma badih nane atehei budon tiri handru in ta sahou ta Kindrei, iri doh badeh lundriye Abraham amwenen.
Sahou ta Kindrei badeh, ndrasehek ndra bwena, ta iy kameh aloh iri lau badu leheleh mwasin mara-ei ta madan i san ta budon handru le. Eme ma iy ndrasehek ndra ta Abraham ta sahou mwasin ta Krais i buku doh, “Na lundriyem oro le kameh, jo kameh edeu nyosowan i la-u iri lau mari badu munyak.”
Abraham atehei budon tan handru i ta Kindrei, ma Kindrei nyosowani iy; eme ma are lau oro atehei budon handru i le buku Abraham badeh, kameh i le buku aliy.
Are lau oro abudon anya oro winiyan an hamon le ta batanau malen mari, eme ma Kindrei kameh sekesek ta budon toro doh, badeh kameh oro akohok andra-i na len iri ales an ta mada sahou ta Kindrei. Tasah, ari ndramak winiyan ba-en hamon ta lakou mari batanau malen tiye iy kamekes, bwe. Idoh i buku le sahou ta Kindrei ndratiye, “Are lau ba-en hamon ta lakou mari torowenei udu bolo buk ta batanau malen dah bwe, Kindrei le kameh edeu maha-an i tiri!”
Handru, aha winiyan anyolom sahou ta Kindrei tiye ale i buku doh, “Are lau le atehei budon tan handru in ta Kindrei, Kindrei kameh aloh iy mwasin mara-ei ta madan, ma iy ndramak doh le winiyan akohok kohan ha-un ta udu le buku doh.” Eme ma taha ndratanan lakou dah: Ari mwan o badih sabudon anya iy winiyan in hamon ta batanau malen, ma na lahou tan doh iy winiyan akohok kohan ha-un ta udu le buku doh, ndri-iy.
Arile, kati budon ta ndramak anya ki-in le hamon ta batanau malen badeh, bala buku none kati budon ta ndramak i san ta budon handru, bwe. Sahou ta Kindrei tiye i buku doh, “Are lau le, iy in hamon ta lakou mari, batanau malen asehek, iy kameh akohok kohan ha-un ta udu le buku doh.”
Arile, batanau malen le badeh, leheya taha buku taha winiyan ba-en hamon ta lakou mara-ei batanau malen tiye, bwe, ya taha kakohok maha-an ta aliy. Arile, Krais badeh aseben taha, iy ndrakonohei taha mene ado bolo maha-an ta batanau malen ndrame len. Iy le ari badeh, ari kandriyen ndra-in bwe, arile iy akohok kon tataha bwese maha-an tataha; tasah sahou ta Kindrei tiye i buku doh, “I buku, are lau atahi iy sukik udu bada kei ta kandriyen ndra-in tan badeh, iy udu bahandra maha-an ta Kindrei.”
Handru, Krais Jises badeh, ndrakonohei taha ma ndrakohok taha ndrame hamon. Iy ndramesekei lakou doh, tasah iy anya katehei nyosowan keme tataha lau mari. Idoh nyosowan Kindrei mene tandrakan i ta Abraham ki tiri lau badu leheleh. Ya taha akohok nyosowan doh i san ta Krais le ari. Eme ma, taha i san ta budon handru badeh, winiyan akohok boto-on ta Malawin Ndrabun mene Kindrei tandrakan.
Aha nadu tine mwan ma badih, jo kameh asehek i buku none lakou taha anyolom na len mari kede-eh: Buku none ndramak la-uh amekes tandrakan ta amekes sahou randra le ta ari lakou, badeh sahou randra le doh abadok. Ari ndramak winiyan batubuniy bwe, ma winiyan badeu ari budon bala ta aliy bwe.
Eme ma, udu bolo buk ndrabun, Kindrei amekes i buku le aliy. Iy amekes iri tandrakan i ta Abraham hawe lundriyen oro. Sahou ta Kindrei batiye anya “toro lundriyem solo-an,” bwe. Badeh tiye, “i ta lundriyem ari” le. Ya iy doh badeh, Krais.
Moson jo tiye badeh, i buku doh: Ma mwena mene Kindrei amekes sahou randra le, ma iy tandrakan ta iy winiyan bamaniy bwe. Ano udu hamon ta jaha ma hanek tonoh (430) iu, ma batanau malen tiri Juwis barasahan. Eme ma, batanau malen doh, winiyan batokosei sahou randra le bwe, ma winiyan basokosowei tandrakan ta Kindrei amekes i ta Abraham bwena, bwe.
I buku none seben ma manyah mwasin ta Kindrei badeh, sukik udu ta kandriyen ta a-en hamon ta batanau malen, taha bakohok bala san ta tandrakan tan mene bwe. Arile bwai, seben ta Kindrei hawe manyah mwasin tan, iy ndratehei ndra ta Abraham i san ta tikisiy ma tandrakan tan le.
Ya, lahou ta batanau malen i buku sah bah? Kindrei mene aseken kati kandriyen ndra-in keme lewan. Eme ma, hamon ta iy edeu sahou tandrakan i ta Abraham, iy edeu batanau malen ale. Idoh ta leheya batanau malen doh boto-on ta aliy eme taku kabatana lundriye Abraham le barasahan. Ya ta lundriye Abraham le doh, Kindrei amekes sahou tandrakan i hawen. Ya lakou ari ja i buku doh, batanau malen mene Kindrei atehei i kani iri angelo, ano iri angelo atehei i kani iri lau badu Isra-el.
Arile, na len Kindrei amekes sahou tandrakan i ta Abraham iy ba-en hamon ta kandriyen doh bwe. Kindrei le ari asehek sahou amwenen i ta Abraham, ma amekes sahou tandrakan hawen. Eme ma, sahou tandrakan doh badeh, lakou laba tinan labai ja, ma sakalawi batanau malen mari ta Moses.
Idoh badeh, ma mesekei batanau malen badek se hawe tandrakan ta Kindrei bwai? Bwe labai! I buku none batanau malen mene ndratehei winiyan edeu kohan ha-un ma mesekei lau manyah mwasin, badeh Kindrei winiyan aloh iri lau mwasin mara-ei ta madan na san ta batanau malen le.
Arile bwai! Sahou ta Kindrei ndratiye anya lau mwan ma badih badu kon munyak mara-ei badeh, ado bolo kowah ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in. Kindrei le alelei lakou doh asahan tasah, iy anya katehei nyosowan mwasin tan mene iy tandrakan badeh, ki tiri lau heh atehei budon tiri handru in ta Jises Krais.
Ma mwena badeh, budon handru basahan bwe le, batanau malen turuki taha i buku none lau are bolo kou, winiya le, budon handru asahan eme lewan.
Handru labai. Krais bame bwe le badeh, taha are ndra bahandra tondrok ta batanau malen. Ya lahou ta batanau malen doh ta tiyani taha ala hawe Krais, ta taha katehei budon tataha handru ki tan, eme ma Kindrei winiyan aloh taha mwasin mara-ei ta madan.
Eme na len dah, budon handru ndrasahan ai, ya batanau malen winiyan batondrok taha ja bwe.
Aha mari atehei budon taha handru in ta Krais Jises. Ya, na kandriyen doh, aha asahan nadu Kindrei, ma aha ahas hawe Krais.
Aha ndralomwa, ma aha ndrala le se hawe Krais, eme ma aha ndrakohok kandriyen ta Krais.
Eme ma, iri lau badu hawe Krais badeh, iri Juwis, iri lau badu leheleh, iri bonyo-ou ma iri bonyo-ou bwe, ma hawe iri mwan ma iri badih badeh, ari bala randrah, ari bala randrah ja bwe. Iri mara-ei doh badeh, asahan ari buruwen hawe Krais le ari.
Ya, buku none aha badu hawe Krais handru, badeh, aha nadu Abraham ai. Ma idah kameh, aha akohok kohan ha-un ma manyah mwasin mene Kindrei tandrakan ta aliy.
Ya, kandriyen tataha ari badeh, i buku sahou sokek ta amekes moso sahou jo atorou dah kaleu kamwenen. Buku ndramak ari munyak tan ranah laba tinan udu aliy, ya, buku iy ndramak doh, nadun mwan ari udu aliy. Nadun amwenen badeh, ibo gok udu bwele-e munyak doh, luluwen labai i buku ari bonyo-ou. Udu hamon, buku taman anyolom nadun ndrasahan awas handru, iy kameh winiyan tiye nadun ta atondrok munyak tan doh.
Tasah, iy mene ma bwisik badeh, iy in hamon ta sahou tiri lau ta atondrok iy, ma iy i buku ndramak ari laleyah ta gok le, winiya na len le taman barasan ben tan.
Eme ma, nadu sahou sokek jo nane torowenei dah badeh, moson ta aliy i buku doh: I buku taha mene are ndra buku iri nah bwisik badeh, ta budon tataha, ma taha mene a buku bonyo-ou, tasah kandriyen ma batanau solo-an nane badu bolo munyak atondrok taha.
Eme na len ta aliy amwenen asahan, Kindrei suni nadun amwenen eme. Iy asahan eme len ta badih awas eme udu baha kandriyen ma batanau malen tiri lau badu Juwis.
Ya, Jises eme akunoh taha are bahandra batanau malen tiri bonyo-ou tiri Juwis ame len, ma taha asahan nadu Kindrei. Eme ma, na len dah ja badeh, taha ndrasahan ndra tinan, ma taha winiyan akohok ma atondrok iri lakou mwasin nane tama taha ndratehei ndrame tataha nadun amwenen.
Eme ma Kindrei suni Malawin Mwasin ta nadun Jises eme udu ndrine taha ari ari, tasah taha ndrasahan nadun. Eme ma iy bwidi taha aloh i ta Kindrei i buku doh, “Tama, tama.”
Eme ma, taha badeh, bado buku nadu Kindrei nyandren, buku bonyo-ou tan ja bwe, tasah taha ndrasahan ndra tinan ndra en, ma Kindrei ndratehei kalem ndrame tataha ta akohok manyah mwasin doh, hamon.
Bwena mene ndra-au, aha tana aha Kindrei bwe. Eme aha a bonyo-ou tiri kindrei rayah ja; iri doh badeh, Kindrei handru bwe.
Arile, na dah, aha ndratana aha Kindrei handru. O, sebwe jo katiye taha ki buku doh: Kindrei ndratanan aha. Ya, i buku sah ja, aha anya kala hamon ja kala hawe iri malawin ndra-in ja? Iri nyamu iri bwe, ma iri winiyan bala ari lakou handru bwe. I buku sah, aha anya kala bonyo-ou tiri ja?
Aha atehei budon taha ihis ta kandriyen tiri Juwis ta len, ta bun, ma jaha, ma hawe len ta ur ma an.
Eme ya jo abudon aha solo-an labai. Sebwe, boto-on ta lahou tek ewek taha badeh, iu laleyah?
Aha nadu tine, jo aseken aha kanuhun sahou tek. Jo badu hawe iri Isra-el, arile batanau malen tahi badeh, bateu jo bareu bolo kou ja bwai. Eme ma na dah, jo udu bahandra maha-an ta aliy eme len, ma jo udu laleyah buku aha lau badu leheleh amwenen. Arile, nadah ja, aha anya kala bahandra tondrok ta batanau malen ja. Kora-on aha kala bolo kou ta kandriyen taha nane doh. Ndri-iy ai. Aha ka-en hamon tek, buku jo ki-in hamon ta Krais. Aha bamekes ari budon ndra-in bame badak bwe.
Aha ndratana aha, ma mwena handru mene jo atiye sahou mwasin ewek taha badeh, sik le sahei, ma jo asehek sahou ta Kindrei mwasin ewek taha.
Ya eme sik tek badeh, ndra-in labai, arile aha basumukok jo bwe. Handru, aha nyowo-ei jo, i buku none angelo ta Kindrei badu loken; ya, i buku none Jises Krais keme i buku none jo dah, sebwe aha kandrei iy, ki le buku jo nadeh?
Aha mene sekesek handru ta kandriyen mene jo ndramekes. Eme na dah ja, saba lakou ndramesekei aha? Bwena mene, aha winiyan baso-ok jo kameh imeson o barah ta ari lakou bwe-en. Na bolo len bwena mene doh, aha winiyan sekesek ta aha sudi mada aha amwenen, ma atehei eme tek, ta aseben jo.
Ya jo asehek sahou handru. Aha abudon anya, jo dah budon tek ndra-in i bada aha, tasah jo atiye sahou handru dah?
Iri lau rayah aseken labai ta anya kaliu budon taha ki hawe budon tiri ja, arile budon tiri badeh, ndra-in. Iri anya kasosokok aha same hawek. Eme iri anya kaliu budon taha ki hawe budon tiri ta aseben ma atudun iri le.
Ya, i buku none jo udu hawe aha, deh, jo bado hawe aha bwe, mwasin, aha kamekes lahou mwasin le kili. Ma, i buku kati budon taha ta amekes lahou amwenen, aha katehei budon taha handru na len mari kihis ta lahou doh.
Eme ya, aha naduk, jo atona isi, ma jo tikisi aha laba tinan labai, i buku isi ta badih anya kedeu nah udu ndrinen eme len. Tasah, len mari jo tikisiy ma abudon aha, ma atondrok kandriyen ta Krais handru barawek ndrine aha.
Jo badeh, aso-ok labai ta udu hawe aha, arile jo udu len labai. Buku jo kudu hawe aha, badeh, kameh jo winiyan seleyani aha, ta iri saba lakou handru, i nyara kati maha-an asahan taha badeh, ma jo ale winiyan asehek iri sahou rayah ja. Arile, na len dah badeh, jo anya kasehek boto-on kewek taha, ta maha-an tinan labai udu bwele-ek, eme ma jo atorou la-ukei ramen dah ewek taha ta aliy.
Jo anya katiye taha, ta are lau oro anya ka-en hamon ta batanau malen tahi lau badu Isra-el: Aha banuhun batanau malen tiye i buku sah bwe le?
Udu bolo buk ndrabun ndratorowenei i buku doh: Abraham nadun mwan ma la-uh. Iy ari, asahan ta udun amwenen Sara, ya iy ari, asahan ta lohowan tan Haga.
Eme, nah badu ndrine lohowan tan, adeu iy eme len i buku none iri adeu nah eme len kede-eh. Arile, i nah ta udun handru, adeu iy eme len in hamon le ta tandrakan ta Kindrei.
Eme budon dah, moson asahan i la-uh. Uru badih ma la-uh leheya sahou lundra. Nadu Haga oro, sahou randra le, badeh, ari ai. Ya oro badu mandrei Sainai, atehei oro ta asahan bonyo-ou.
Haga badeh, moson i buku mandrei Sainai udu bolo kon Arabiya. Eme, kandriyen ta bonyo-ou badu ta Haga ndrame Jerusalem na dah, tasah iy ma hawe lundriyen oro badeh, bonyo-ou kahis le.
Arile, Jerusalem badu kandrah badeh, kon tiri bonyo-ou bwe. Iy doh, tine taha mari.
Tasah, tarou ta Kindrei badeh, tiye i buku doh: “Ou badih kis badeh, ou sekesek, ou sarakau ma ou sandroh, ou mene batona isi ta nah bwe. Tasah, badih udun ruwani iy kameh nadun i sola, sakalau badih udun udu aliy ja.”
Eme, aha nadu tine, aha badeh, nadu Kindrei i hamon ta tandrakan i le buku Aisik.
Eme na len doh mene, nah adeu iy eme len i buku nah mari kede-eh, kameh, iy edeu sisi-in i ta nah asahan na boto-on ta Malawin Ndrabun. Ya na dah i buku aliy le.
Arile, sahou bolo buk ndrabun tiye i buku doh, “Ou tikahei badih ta bonyo-ou ma nadun uru ka-au. Tasah, nadu badih ta bonyo-ou kameh, winiyan bakohok se lakou badu mine taman bwe. Nah le badu ndrine udun amwenen badeh, bonyo-ou bwe. Iy kameh akohok lakou mari.”
Eme, aha nadu tine, taha badeh, lundriye badih ta bonyo-ou bwe. Taha bonyo-ou bwe, taha badeh, lundriye udu Abraham ta badih bwena labai, eme ma taha ado mwasin ai.
Taha ado mwasin na dah, tasah Krais kuhi taha, ado bahandra batanau malen ame len. Eme ya aha badeh, kabadok aha, ta aha sala bonyo-ou sala baha maha-an ta batanau malen ja.
Aha kanuhun, jo Pol amwenen tiye taha dah: I buku ado anya ka-en hamon ta batanau malen tiri Juwis ta asan ku-i ado, badeh, Krais kameh winiyan baseben ado se bwe.
Tasah, jo tiye sahou ndraleu ndrawek taha! Buku aha a-en hamon ta ari batanau malen badu Juwis, i buku ta asan ku-i aha, badeh, aha ka-en hamon ta batanau malen mara-ei tiri Juwis ale.
Buku aha anya ka-en hamon ta batanau malen, ya, na san doh aha abudon Kindrei winiyan aloh aha mwasin mara-ei ta madan, aha ndrandra-i kede-eh! Aha winiyan bwe! Arile, ta kandriyen doh badeh, aha ndratehei kona aha badeh, ndrala ta tikisiy ta Kindrei, ma ta kandriyen ta Jises Krais mene imek udu ta kei tondreh, ta aseben taha mwan ma badih marakon.
Arile, Malawin Ndrabun ta Kindrei badeh, ibo gok ta amekes budon tahi mara-ei kabadok, na len ahi atondrok manyah mwasin ta Kindrei hamon doh. Ma Krais kameh amekes ahi asahan amwenen handru i le buku iy.
Ma, Krais badeh, aso-ok taha labai, eme ma taha aso-ok iy ma a-en hamon tan. I buku ari ndramak iy anya kisan ku-in, o bwe, idoh lakou laleyah. Lakou laba tinan badeh, i buku doh: Taha badeh, katehei budon tataha handru ki-in le ta Krais, tasah taha badeh, aso-ok iy tinan labai.
Aha mene an hamon ta kandriyen ta Krais ma aha sakaliye mwasin labai. Ya, are lau handru eme sokei san taha, ma tiye aha tebelese i ta sahou handru? I buku sah iy aruwi aha?
Kandriyen ta andrek badeh, bare boho Kindrei aloh ado mene bwe.
Aha tana aha kandriyen ta andres badeh, i buku yis. Iri atehei sese le, arile winiyan abe-ei jabi ramen mara-ei.
Arile, taha badeh, ahas hawe Krais, eme budon tek ndrabadok ndrala ta Laban, ta aha winiyan bakohok budon ari ja bwe. Eme ma, are lau oro wendreya aha kameh bwese maha-an ta aliy.
Aha nadu tine, buku jo amekes sahou ta leheya aha lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei ka-en hamon ta batanau malen tiri Juwis ta asan ku-i aha; iri Juwis kameh winiyan bamekes kandriyen ta bokoro-ei jo bwe. Arile, jo baleheya aha bala buku badeh, bwe. Eme ma iri abo gok ta bokoro-ei jo le ai. Ma ndrine iri badeh, irih tek kahis, tasah jo badeh, asehek ta nyala kei tondreh mene iri tatahi Jises Krais udu aliy.
Ya, i buku none iri rayah kandres labai ta kasan ku-i iri, jo anya, mwasin labai ta oro doh, kasani ku-i oro mari ki-iu!
Ya, aha nadu tine, aha ndrasahan mwasin, tasah Kindrei ndraluhi aha ndrame len ta batanau malen tiri Juwis. Arile, aha salelei kandriyen mwasin doh samesekei aha sa-en hamon ta budon ta bada aha badu munyak. Arile, kandriyen ta tikisiy badeh, kamesekei aha kaseben aha ari, ari.
Tasah, batanau malen mari eme bahandra batanau ari le: “Ou aseken iri lau ari ari badu hawem, i le buku ou aso-ok ou le.”
Arile, i buku none aha anya ka buku mwi amekes isi i tiri ari ari, bale aha kudu aliy. Idah kameh aha bokoro-ei ndrokowa aha, ma aha andra-i mara-ei.
Eme ma, jo asehek i buku doh: Aha kalelei Malawin Ndrabun katondrok manyah ma kandriyen taha, ya, i buku aha amekes eh, aha winiyan ba-en hamon ta seken ta kandriyen ta bada aha ja bwe.
Tasah, so-ok ma kandriyen ta bada taha i randrah labai, bala buku none so-ok ma kandriyen ta Malawin Ndrabun bwe. Uru ma la-uh doh winiyan badek se bwe. Eme ma, iri lakou aha anya kamekes, aha winiyan bamekes bwe.
Arile, i buku none aha a-en hamon ta Malawin Ndrabun eh, badeh, aha ba-en baha batanau malen bwai.
Kandriyen ta bada taha badeh, i buku doh: Kandriyen ta karei i buku mwi, kandriyen ndra-in ta sumukok;
kandriyen ta adeu budon i ta sukumada kei i nyara Kindrei, ya kandriyen ta kau hawe omor lau; ya kandriyen ta budon ndra-in ta losen hawe sobobo; ya hawe kandriyen ta madalakis; hawe ndramak ndrinen ndra, ma hawe kandriyen ta ndrakok. Ya kandriyen ta amekes iri lau atalan, rayah ka len, ya rayah ka len;
Iri kandriyen i buku madalakis ta lakou, ma hawe a-un gwa boto-on ta amekes lau abo lolo-ou, ma ta amekes lakou laleyah. Jo tiye sahou batanau i taha dah, i buku bwena jo ndrasehek taha: Oro are lau amekes kandriyen doh, winiyan bado bahandra tondrok ta Kindrei bwe.
Arile, Malawin Ndrabun badeh, edeu kandriyen ta tikisiy, kandriyen ta sekesek, kandriyen ta amekes mondrei, kandriyen ta bohon bwe, kandriyen ta aseben, kandriyen mwasin hawe kandriyen ta amekes lahou mwasin ta budon tan handru,
kandriyen ta ou amekes ou batudun ou bwe, ma hawe kandriyen ta budon tam winiyan bandra-i bwe. Ya eme ari batanau malen winiyan baturuki iri kandriyen doh bwe.
Eme, are lau oro badu hawe Jises Krais badeh, ndrasani san ta kandriyen ta bada oro satondrok oro. Idoh i le buku oro ndratahi so-ok ndra-in ta bada oro kimek ki-in bada kei tondreh.
Malawin Ndrabun edeu kohan handru eme tataha; eme ma taha kalelei iy katondrok bolo tekedek tataha.
Taha sabudon anya taha ndra ari ai, bwe. Ma taha sasakalau ndramak ari ari, ma hawe mada taha salikis ndramak ari ja.
Aha nadu tine mwan ma badih, ki buku none aha ari kamekes kandriyen ndra-in, aha are an hamon ta Malawin Ndrabun badeh, kaleheya iy kasahan ta budon mwasin i san ta manamun; arile, bale aha ale ki-in taha, kora-on aha kataku ja.
Aha badeh, kabwese maha-an ta nadu tine aha ari ja. Ya i buku none aha kamekes kandriyen doh, aha an hamon ta kandriyen ta Krais.
I buku none ari ndramak anya kasakau anya, iy le ai, iy le amwenen kameh wendreyani iy.
Ndramak ari ari kanyolom kandriyen tan kamwenen labai. Ya, i buku none kandriyen tan mwasin, iy le kasekesek ta lakou mwasin nane, iy amekes. Ya, iy sanyolom iy sala ta lakou, ndramak ari ja amekes.
Tasah, ndramak ari ari kameh, bwese maha-an ta kandriyen tan amwenen.
Are lau akohok tanan ta ndramak ta leheya iy na sahou ta Krais, mwasin ta iy kaseben ndramak ta leheya tan na lakou mwasin tan.
Aha sawasai aha le; ma aha sabudon anya, aha winiyan wahei Kindrei, ndri-iy labai. Tasah, ndramak ari ari kameh, bwese maha-an tan amwenen in hamon ta lakou iy amekes. Idoh handru, tasah taha tanan, saba nyamon taha atah kameh, taha akohok sali nyamon doh amwenen.
Are lau anya ki-in hamon ta kandriyen ndra-in badu badan, iy kameh akohok kunoh ma imek ta aliy; arile, are lau anya ki-in hamon ta Malawin Mwasin ta Kindrei, ma amekes iri kandriyen mwasin le, eme ma Malawin Mwasin le kameh winiyan edeu kohan handru ta udu le buku doh.
Eme ya, taha sawoyah ta amekes kandriyen mwasin; ya, i buku none taha baruwaniy bwe, badeh kameh, taha akohok ndramas ta aliy na len hamon. Idoh i buku ndramak ta bilin akohok sali nyamon ta lahou boto-on mene iy amekes.
Eme ma, na madasan mari Kindrei sihiy, taha kamekes kandriyen mwasin ki ta lau mari. Arile, ma hutuwen badeh, i toro lau ta Kindrei le, ala budon toro ihis handru.
La-ukei dah mirihik ano ai. Aha ndranyolom tarou laba tinan jo atorou na minek amwenen aleu ewek taha. Jo aseken aha kanyolom ma kanuhun kamwenen sendrehendreh ta sahou batanau jo amwenen atorou ewek taha dah!
Iri lau doh badeh, abadok labai ta asan ku-i aha, iri kameh amekes i buku doh, tasah iri aso-ok nyara iri kasahan ki tinan ta ndranye iri, ma mada iri lau rayah ja. Iri ale badeh, anoh ma abudon i buku doh, “Kora-on iri lau rayah ja katanan, buku to badeh, atehei budon tato mara-ei in ta kei tondreh ta Krais, ma kora-on iri anya kamekes ndra-in keme tato.”
Handru, iri asan ku-i iri; arile iri ba-en hamon handru ta batanau malen bwe. Ya iri anya, aha kasan ku-i aha, ta amekes anya iri le ai, tasah aha badeh, ndra-en hamon ta budon tiri.
Arile, jo le, jo winiyan batudun nyarak o nyara ndramak ari ja bwe. Jo kamasiye kei tondreh ta Laban tataha Jises Krais le. Tasah iy le imek udu bada kei tondreh tan. Ya, na lahou iy amekes doh, boto-on tiri kandriyen mari badu munyak badeh, ndramak ale udu budon tek. Ya, idoh ale, i buku jo imek udu bada kei tondreh hawen, eme ma jo winiyan ba-en hamon ta kandriyen badu munyak ja bwe.
Eme nadah, ari katin bwe, ki buku none asan ku-i taha, o, i buku none basan bwe; arile katin handru i buku doh: Ta ndramak badeh, kasahan ha-un.
Ya, are lau oro an hamon ta kandriyen doh, mondrei ma tikisiy kudu hawe oro mara-ei. Oro le badeh, Isra-el handru ta Kindrei.
Ya ta sendrehendreh ta aliy i buku doh: Ari ndramak badeh, sadeu jo sala bolo maha-an ma sisi-in ja, tasah jo bwese ndrana udu badak dah ta leheya jo badeh, lohowan ta Jises.
Ya eme aha nadu tine mwan ma badih, tikisiy ta Laban Jises Krais kudu hawe malawi aha mari. Handru!
Jo Pol, jo aposel ari ta Krais Jises. Na so-ok tan amwenen, Kindrei atehei jo buku ari aposel, ma jo edek rakon, i rakon ta atiye sahou mwasin ta Jises Krais. Jo atorou la-ukei dah ewek taha mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, aha are kon tinan Epesus. Aha badeh, a-en hamon handru ta Krais Jises, ma aha ahis hawen.
Jo aso-ok tama taha Kindrei hawe Laban Jises Krais, uru katikisi aha ma kamesekei kandriyen mwasin kewek taha, ma kamekes ndrine aha kudu mwasin.
Taha badeh, katudun nyara Kindrei, iy tama Laban tataha Jises Krais. Na Krais le badeh, iy ndratehei tataha lakou marakon mwasin badu kandrah ta aseben malawi taha.
Kindrei bamekes kon munyak bwe le badeh, iy ndratehei taha ndrahis hawe Krais. Eme ma, taha kameh winiyan ado mwasin, ma ndrabun, ma ari ndra-in winiyan bado madan bwe.
Kindrei aso-ok taha tinan labai, eme ma ndra bwena handru, iy abudon ta atehei taha a buku nadun amwenen, na gok Jises Krais kameh amekes hamon. Ya, Kindrei abudon i buku aliy, eme ma, iy amekes eme tataha.
I san ta nadun amwenen Jises Krais, iy aso-ok iy labai, iy tikisi taha ma bwidi kandriyen mwasin labai eme tataha. Eme ma, taha badeh, katudun nyaran ta tikisiy ma seben laba tinan doh.
Ya, Krais bwidi kandriyen mwasin labai ndrame tataha. Iy imek ta konohei taha ame hamon, ma ndrayen amou ta sikine kandriyen ndra-in tataha marakon.
Kindrei solowei tikisiy tan tinan labai ndrame tataha, iy atehei iri tanan randrah randrah, ma iri budon mwasin eme tataha.
Kindrei bwetenei ndra bwena ta lakou iy anya kamekes ta gok ta Krais. Iy in hamon ta budon tan amwenen, ma iy leheya taha ta lakou tan doh, bwena mene aton mara-ei.
Budon doh, Kindrei kameh bwidi marakon ano, ta len ta aliy amwenen, ta atukum lakou marakon iy amekes i le se, iri lakou marakon badu kandrah, ma udu bwele-e munyak ma Krais le ari atondrok iri marakon.
Kindrei badeh, in hamon le ta budon tan amwenen, iy andromwei taha, ma atehei taha ala ahis hawe Krais. Ehe, buku Kindrei abudon ta amekes ari lakou, iy kameh amekes le. Saba lakou iy anya kamekes na dah, idoh udu budon tan bwena mene ale.
Tasah handru Kindrei amekes kandriyen mwasin buku doh eme tataha? I buku doh: Ahi lau badu Juwis ala bwena, ma atehei budon tahi handru in ta Krais ma a-en hamon tan. Eme ma iy anya, ahi kabudon tikisiy tan, ma katudun nyaran.
Ma aha lau badu leheleh, aha ndrasahan lau ta Kindrei ale, kala le aha mene anuhun sahou handru. Sahou mwasin doh amekes, ma Kindrei atehei aha ahis hawe Krais. Aha atehei budon taha handru in ta Krais, ma Kindrei ndratehei Malawin Ndrabun ndrawek taha i buku kalem ta lakou, iy ndratandrakan ta edeu.
Ehe, Malawin Ndrabun doh, i buku kalem tiri lakou mwasin, Kindrei kameh edeu ewek taha hamon. Aha badeh, lau tan handru. Ya, Kindrei atehei kalem doh udu ta lau tan, winiya le iy konohei taha ame hamon. Iy amekes i buku doh, ta taha winiyan atondrok na len iy anya kakohok taha kala hawen. Ta lakou doh, taha badeh, katudun nyaran kudu loken labai.
Jo ndranuhun sahou, ta aha atehei budon taha handru in ta Laban Jises, ma aha badeh, aso-ok iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei labai.
Eme ma, len marakon jo edeu wurah ili ta Kindrei tataha. Jo badeh, bamani kandriyen ta asolom aha bwe. Len marakon ta salom, jo abudon aha ma jo asolom Kindrei kameh kaseben aha.
Jo badeh, asolom ili ta Kindrei ta Laban tataha Jises Krais, iy tama taha ari le udu kandrah. Jo asolom ili tan, ta iy kedeu Malawin Mwasin kewek taha, ma iy kedeu tanan mwasin ta kati sahou tan kewek taha, eme ma aha winiyan atanan Kindrei amwenen.
Jo asolom ta iy kameh katehei sun kanya kudu ta budon taha. Eme ma, aha kameh winiyan atanan ta ndramak ta seben nane, iy aloh aha katehei budon kihis ki-in tan, ma aha kasekesek le ta atondrok iy. Ya, ma aha kameh winiyan atanan iri lakou, Kindrei ndraleheyani ta amekes ewek taha, idoh mwasin labai.
Ma aha kameh winiyan atanan buku, boto-on tan ibo gok ta aseben taha lau atehei budon handru in tan. Idoh badeh, tinan labai, taha winiyan batomondrohei bwe. Nadah, boto-on tinan doh, ibo gok ta koha taha, i buku iy le mene ibo gok ta koha Krais.
Iy ndramak, ma na boto-on tan doh Kindrei mete-ei iy, ma atehei iy ili ere loken labai mirihik ta boto-on tan udu kandrah.
Nadah, Krais ndra tinan, ma iy ere bwele-en labai tiri kabin marakon badu kandrah, ma iy atondrok iri lau marakon ta bwena, iri kabin ta kon, iri lau boto-on, ma hawe iri tinan. Iy udu bwele-en labai ja tiri lau, nyara iri i tinan na bolo len dah, ma ta len hamon ale.
Ya, Kindrei atehei iri lakou marakon ndrala bahandra tondrok ta Krais, ma atehei iy udu bwele-en handru tiri lau mwan ma badih tan.
Lau ta Kindrei doh badeh, bada Krais, ma iri badeh adih na Krais, eme ma, lakou mari doh, idih na le Krais.
Bwena mene aha mwan ma badih ado buku iri lau ndramak. Tasah, aha tebelese sahou ta Kindrei, ma amekes iri kandriyen solo-an ndra-in.
Ya, kala len doh badeh, aha an ndra hamon ta kandriyen ndra-in badu kon munyak. Aha an ndra hamon ta tinan tiri malawin ndra-in balik. Na bolo len dah, malawin ndra-in doh edek ili bolo ndrine iri mwan ma badih ale, ta tebelese sahou ta Kindrei, ma iy atondrok iri.
Taha marakon mene badeh, asahan buku iri mwan ma badih doh, ma taha an ndra hamon ta so-ok ndra-in ta budon tataha malen. Ya, taha ndra-en hamon tiri lakou marakon, bada taha ma budon tataha anya kamekes. Taha ado buku le aliy, ma taha kameh winiyan akohok ndramas ndra-in doh, buku iri mwan ma badih rayah ba-en hamon ta Kindrei bwe.
Ya, taha amekes kandriyen ndra-in solo-an labai, ma taha a buku iri lau ndramak ta budon ta Kindrei. Arile, iy aso-ok ma tikisi taha tinan labai.
Eme ma, iy mete-ei taha asahan ame awas hawe Krais. Ya, Kindrei bwidi kandriyen mwasin eme tataha, ma iy andrei taha ame hamon.
Kindrei mene mete-ei taha ame awas ja hawe Krais Jises. Ma ta Krais le badeh, Kindrei aso-ok taha katondrok iri lakou marakon udu kandrah, hawe Krais.
Iy amekes iri lakou marakon doh, ta leheya iri mwan ma badih ta len hamon, kandriyen mwasin ma tikisiy tan badeh, laba tinan labai. Ya, Krais Jises amekes ta akunoh taha ame hamon, eme ma, ta gok doh, Kindrei ndraleheyani taha, iy aso-ok iri mwan ma badih labai.
Lakou doh, aha amwenen mene bamekes bwe. Kindrei edeu laleyah ewek taha. Aha mene atehei le budon handru in ta Krais, ma na so-ok ta Kindrei le amwenen, iy andrei aha ame hamon ja.
Idoh winiyan basahan bala buku ndramas ta gok nane aha amekes, bwe. Eme ma, ari mwan o badih winiyan batudun nyara iri amwenen bwe, ma anya, “Jo le amwenen ibo gok, ma jo asahan mwasin ta budon ta Kindrei, ma iy andrei jo eme hamon ja.” Idoh sahou ta wasai!
Tasah, Kindrei le amwenen amekes taha, ma ta gok mene Krais Jises amekes, Kindrei bwidi taha asahan ha-un ja, eme ma taha winiyan amekes kandriyen mwasin buku bwena mene iy lowosa taha, ma aseken taha kamekes, ma ka-en hamon ta aliy.
Aha ndratanan, na mine iri le amwenen, iri lau badu Isra-el mene asan ku-i iri. Ma iri aloh aha lau tiri bwe. Eme ma, aha kabudon kili hamon ja, aha mene are buku sah handru.
Bolo len doh badeh, aha bahis hawe Krais bwe le. Aha are ndra len labai tiri lau badu Isra-el, iri lau mene Kindrei atehei iri kasahan lau tan amwenen. Iy edeu sahou randra le ili tiri, ta iy kameh nyosowani iri, buku bwena mene iy ndrasehek. Arile, aha are ndra manan ta lakou doh. Handru, aha ado ndra kon munyak dah, arile aha batondrok Kindrei ta akohok aha bwe. Tasah, aha bala tanan sahou randra le ta Kindrei ma tandrakan tan bwe.
Ma, aha are ndra len labai ta Kindrei, arile na dah, ndraye Krais badeh, tiyani aha ame, na Krais Jises le, aha are mirihik labai ta Kindrei.
Krais le ari bwidi iri mwan ma badih marakon asahan amwenen. Buku sah handru? Bwena mene iri lau badu Isra-el amekes bahun hawe iri lau badu leheleh, ma budon tiri doh asahan i buku kowah udu ndrokowa taha. Arile, na badan amwenen, Krais ndratohowei kowah doh ndra-au, ma iy tukumwi iri lau tataha marakon ala le rabuk.
Ma iy ndrakahei kandriyen malen mene ta Moses hawe iri sahou batanau badu hawen badeh ndra-au. Iy amekes i buku doh ta atukum iri mwan ma badih badu Isra-el amwenen, ma iri mwan ma badih badu kon leheleh. Ma iri asahan lau rabuk ha-un ja ahis le hawe Krais. Ta kandriyen doh le, bwidi ndrine taha udu mwasin labai.
Ehe, Krais imek udu bada kei tondreh, ma ta gok doh, iy ndrasani kandriyen ta adai lau laleyah udu ndrokowa iri mwan ma badih badu Isra-el amwenen, ma iri mwan ma badih badu kon leheleh, kasahan rabuk le. Eme ma, iy ndradai kandriyen ta bahun laleyah ndra-au.
Iy mene eme kon munyak ta atiye sahou mwasin i buku doh: “Na dah aha mwan ma badih marakon, ndrine aha winiyan udu mwasin.” Ya, iy ndratiye sahou mwasin doh ndrawek taha lau nane tanan batanau ta Kindrei bwe, ma iri lau badu Isra-el doh tawi batanau ta Kindrei ma tanan ta aliy.
Sahou doh handru. Tasah, na Krais le ari, taha lau marakon akohok Malawin ari le nane doh, ndrasihi san, ta taha winiyan asahan hawe tama taha Kindrei.
Eme ma, aha mwan ma badih badu kon leheleh, aha bare buku lau leheleh ja bwe. Idoh ndrano. Na dah aha ndrala le hawe iri lau ta Kindrei, ma ndrasahan lau tan amwenen.
Aha asahan buku asiu, Kindrei amekes. Iy mene atah ahi aposel hawe iri propet bwena; ahi asahan buku ndru ta asiu doh. Ya, Krais Jises asahan buku ndru alih ta bwese maha-a asiu marakon doh.
Iri ka-e asiu doh badeh, ihis hawe Krais, ma udu boto-on labai. Kindrei le amekes kahis, ma anya kasahan ki tinan handru, ma kasahan asiu ndrabun ta atudun Laban.
Ma aha ale ndrahis hawe Krais. Ma Kindrei ndratukumwi taha hawe iri lau ta Kindrei rayah, ma aha ndrasahan asiu tan handru. Eme ma, Kindrei badeh, na Malawin Ndrabun tan, winiyan ere bolo aha.
Jo Pol, jo ta amekes lahou ta Krais Jises, eme ma jo udu bolo asiu lulik kada-ah. Tasah, jo badeh, atiye sahou i buku doh: Aha mwan ma badih badu leheleh, aha ale are bolo iri lau ta Kindrei.
Sebwe, aha ndranuhun buku, Kindrei badeh, tikisi jo, ma atehei jo ta amekes gok dah; iy amekes ta tikisi aha ale.
Sahou dah, ta lakou Kindrei amekes, bwena mene aton kahis, arile Kindrei le amwenen ndraleheyani ndrame tek, eme ma jo ndratorowenei sese ndrawek taha.
Na dah, aha anyolom sahou dah, ano aha kameh atanan buku, jo badeh, ndratanan handru ta sahou mene aton ta gok ta Krais amekes.
Bolo len marakon bwena badeh, Kindrei batiye baleu bame lewan ta sahou mene aton doh bwe. Arile, idah na Malawin Ndrabun, Kindrei asehek sahou dah aleu eme tahi aposel hawe iri propet tan.
Ma sahou i buku doh: Na le sahou mwasin, aha mwan ma badih badu leheleh winiyan asahan rabuk le, ma aha a le se hawe ahi lau badu Isra-el. Eme ma taha marakon kameh winiyan akohok iri lakou Kindrei ndratandrakan ta edeu eme tataha mwan ma badih ahis hawe Jises Krais.
Kindrei atehei jo, ya jo asahan lau ta atiye sahou mwasin dah. Kindrei amekes i buku doh, tasah iy tikisi jo, ma na boto-on tan amwenen, iy atehei ndramas eme tek ta atadau budon handru tiri mwan ma badih. Eme ma, gok doh badeh, jo amekes.
Jo lau laleyah udu ndrokowa iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, arile iy tikisi jo, ma iy atehei jo ta atiye sahou mwasin ili tiri mwan ma badih badu leheleh. Sahou mwasin doh ta iri lakou marakon iri mwan ma badih winiyan akohok ta koha iri, buku iri a-en hamon ta Krais. Ma lakou doh kameh winiyan bano bwe.
Bwena mene, Kindrei bwidi iri lakou marakon, ma na len doh badeh, iy tone iri budon tan ta iri kandriyen marakon hamon iy anya kamekes. Ya, budon doh mene aton udu bwena, eme ano dah. Arile, na dah, iy atehei jo ta asehek aleu eme lewan iri budon tan dah.
