Aha nadu tine aso, aso anya kabatanau aha buku doh: Aha badeh, kanoh ma kanuhun boho iri lau amekes gok are ndrokowa aha, ma aha ka-en bahandra iri. Laban atehei iri are badeh, buku ndramak ta atondrok koha aha, ma kandriyen mwasin taha. Ma iri kameh leheya aha ma lowosa budon taha.
Eme ma, aha katudun nyara iri, ma kaso-ok iri handru. Tasah, iri amekes gok ta aseben aha ta a-en hamon ta Laban. Eme ma, aha katawi budon randra le ta nadu tine taha iri, ma ndrine taha kamunum kili tiri.
Aha nadu tine aso, na dah, aso anya kabatanau aha boto-on buku doh: Aha badeh, kabatanau iri lau ta gwaman, samanyah laleyah. Ma aha ale kamekes gok ta atadau ndrine iri lau ta anoh kabadok, ma kaseben iri lau nyamu iri bwe, katehei budon tiri kili ta Kindrei. Aha badeh, kamekes kamunum kili tiri lau marakon.
Handru, kora-on aha kadeu saluwe kandriyen ndra-in kili tiri lau mene amekes kandriyen ndra-in ewek taha bwena. Bwe! Arile, len marakon badeh, aha kabadok ta amekes kandriyen mwasin kili ta nadu tine taha iri, ma hawe iri lau marakon.
Bolo iri len marakon aha kasekesek.
Ma aha kasolom kudu le buku doh.
Handru, aha kadeu wurah ki ta Kindrei ta lakou marakon asahan taha, tasah na Krais Jises le badeh, Kindrei aso-ok aha ka-en hamon ta kandriyen buku doh.
Aha sasemete-ei jih ta Malawin Ndrabun udu ta koha aha.
Aha badeh, satobolowe kona aha sala ta sahou ta Kindrei, Malawin Ndrabun ale edeu ili tiri propet tan ta tiye ewek taha.
Aha badeh, kaleben iri sahou aha anuhun badu boho iri lau, ma aha katawiy kihis, ma ka-en hamon tiri lakou mwasin.
Handru, aha badeh, kare ndra len labai tiri kandriyen ndra-in.
Ahi aso-ok Kindrei labai. Iy badeh, kati kandriyen mwasin marakon, iy amwenen winiyan amekes aha asahan ha-un, ari kandriyen ndra-in ja bwe. Ma Kindrei winiyan atehei aha, tan amwenen. Handru, iy winiyan atondrok malawi aha, koha aha, ma bada aha, ma aha kameh are mwasin mara-ei. Eme ma ari ndra-in winiyan bare madan bwe, na len Laban tataha Jises Krais eme hamon ta akohok taha ja.
Kindrei atehei aha badeh, tan amwenen, ma iy amwenen badeh, mwasin mwasin labai, ma iy kameh amekes aha asahan mwasin, ma ari ndra-in winiyan bare madan ja bwe.
Aha nadu tine aso, aha kasolom kili ta Kindrei, iy kameh kaseben aso.
Ta kandriyen tataha lau marakon ta Kindrei, aha kateu lim, ma aha kaleheya sekesek taha kili ta nadu tine aha iri marakon.
Jo asehek sahou boto-on ewek taha in ta nyara Laban Jises i buku doh: Aha kanyolom, ma kaloh la-ukei dah kili tiri lau ta Kindrei marakon badu Tesalonaika.
Aso badeh, aso-ok tikisiy ta Laban tataha Jises Krais kewek kudu hawe aha.
Jo Pol, jo atorou la-ukei dah. Sailas uru Timoti badeh, are hawek ale. Eme ma, aso ma taloh atehei la-ukei ramen dah ewek taha lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei are bolo kon tinan Tesalonaika.
Aha lau mwan ma badih ta tama taha Kindrei, ma hawe Laban tataha Jises Krais. Aso aso-ok Kindrei hawe Laban Jises Krais, uru katikisi aha, ma ndrine aha kudu mwasin.
Aha nadu tine, len marakon badeh, aso adeu wurah ili ta Kindrei ta aha. Handru, kandriyen ta tiye wurah i ta Kindrei doh amwenen. Tasah, budon taha badeh, asahan boto-on labai. Ma ale, aha marakon badeh, aso-ok nadu tine aha mwan ma badih rayah labai ja. Ma kandriyen mwasin asahan a sola le ai, ere ndrokowa aha.
Ta idoh le, aso badeh, atudun nyara aha udu ndrokowa iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei. Ma aso asehek sahou i buku doh: “Na len iri lau amekes kandriyen ndra-in ili tiri lau badu Tesalonaika, ma len ta maha-an asahan tiri, iri badeh, ales boto-on, ma tawiy ihis budon tiri, ma bwese iri maha-an ma isi.”
Ya, ta kandriyen mwasin, ale aha amekes udu bolo iri lau ndra-in ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in laleyah ewek taha, Kindrei badeh, leheya taha i buku doh: Iy badeh, seleya taha mwan ma badih badu kon munyak na le kandriyen mwasin. Aha bwese sisi-in doh, ta aseben iri lau mwan ma badih, ta Kindrei winiyan atondrok iri, ma Kindrei ale kameh winiyan atehei aha ta ala ado bolo iri lau mwan ma badih nane, iy amwenen atondrok iri.
Handru, Kindrei kameh amekes kandriyen mwasin buku doh: Hamon, iy edeu maha-an ili tiri mwan ma badih, iri nane adeu maha-an ewek taha. Kindrei abudon, idoh amwenen.
Ma iy ale anya kakohok maha-an, aha bwese doh ki-iu, ma iy anya kedeu amunyau kewek taha, ma aso ale. Lakou doh kameh asahan, na len Laban Jises hawe iri angelo tan boto-on, iri are kandrah ame andri, ma asahan ame lewan. Iy kameh eme hawe jih laba tinan, ma nyarahan labai.
Udu bolo len doh kameh iy edeu ndramas ndra-in ili tiri mwan ma badih baso-ok Kindrei bwe, ma iri bwale iri ta a-en hamon ta sahou mwasin ta Laban tataha Jises Krais.
Ya, iri mwan ma badih doh kameh, akohok ndramas ndra-in labai i buku doh: Laban kameh atehei iri are len labai ta madan, ma ta sun badeh, asahan na boto-on tan, ma iri kameh andrakak are ndra bolo jih ta udu le buku doh.
Iri mwan ma badih doh kameh, ano mara-ei udu bolo len ta Krais eme hamon eme munyak ja, ma iri lau marakon ta Kindrei kameh atudun nyaran ta lakou marakon iy amekes ili tiri. Ya, iri lau marakon mene atehei budon tiri handru ndrala tan, iri kameh sekesek. Aha kameh i buku aliy ale. Tasah, aso mene tiye sahou ta Kindrei udu ndrokowa aha amwenen, ma aha atehei budon taha handru in ta sahou doh.
Aso abudon ta lakou dah kameh asahan na len ta Krais eme munyak ja, eme ma len marakon aso amekes salom ili ta Kindrei tataha, ta iy kameh kaseben aha. Aso abudon aha ta len mene aha a-en hamon ta Kindrei, ma iy ariu aha ta sahou mwasin ta Krais. Eme ma, aso asalom ta iy amwenen kabwidi aha winiyan ta ala bolo kandriyen mene iy ndratandrakan aha ta amekes. Ma aso ale asolom i ta Kindrei, iy kedeu boto-on kewek taha, ma aha winiyan amekes iri kandriyen mwasin marakon aha anya kamekes. Handru, aha winiyan amekes iri gok marakon aha atehei budon handru in ta Krais, aha anya kamekes.
Buku aha amekes kandriyen buku doh, aha winiyan atudun nyara Laban tataha Jises, ma iy winiyan atudun nyara aha ale. Tikisiy ma mwasin ta Kindrei tataha hawe Laban Jises Krais le, winiyan amekes iri lakou marakon doh asahan handru.
Ya, aha nadu tine aso, na dah, aso anya katiye taha ta Laban tataha Jises Krais kameh eme hamon eme munyak ja, ma taha kameh atukum ala hawen. Aso asehek taha i buku doh:
Mani aha satur laleyah ta sahou rayah, aha anuhun ta Laban Jises, anya iy mene ndrame hamon. Arile, bwe! Kahis. Sebwe malawin ari ta wendreya le atehei sahou doh ndrala ta ari ndramak. O, sebwe ari ndramak asehek na le budon tan amwenen, nadeh. O, sebwe iri rayah anya, aso badeh, atorou la-ukei i buku doh ili tiri. Bwe labai. Buku aha ndranuhun sahou solo-an doh, aha sabudon solo-an ta aliy. Tasah, sahou doh wendreya.
Aha sanuhun lau rayah wendreya aha na sahou tiri, o, ta kandriyen rayah. Tasah, len ta Laban ta anya keme hamon doh badeh, winiyan basahan laleyah bwe. Ma bwena, lau solo-an kameh tebelese, ma adeu kona iri ili ta Kindrei, ma ndramak ari doh ta balik, iy ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in, ma iy banuhun sahou batanau bwe, iy kameh asahan eme lewan, ma iri lau kameh atanan iy amwenen. Hamon kameh ndramak doh andrakak udu bolo jih.
Iy kameh amekes bahun ili tiri budon solo-an ta lau badu kon munyak a-en hamon ta aliy, ma iy aseken iri katudun iy buku Kindrei. Ma iy ale kameh atudun nyaran amwenen, ma tubuloh budon tiri lau rayah. Eme ma, iy kameh ili manyah udu bolo asiu ndrabun ta Kindrei, ma iy kameh asehek sahou i buku doh: “Jo amwenen, jo Kindrei.”
Bwena mene jo udu hawe aha, ma jo asehek nyala aha ta iri lakou marakon doh. Sebwe aha ndramani budon doh nadeh?
Aha tanan ale ta lakou ari udu aliy na dah, iy aturuk san ta ndramak ndra-in nane doh, ta iy winiyan asahan eme kon lewan ta mada iri lau na bolo len dah.
Ya, aha ndratanan kandriyen dah, ta tebelese sahou batanau badeh, udu aliy, ma asahan amunum, amunum le eme loken. Arile, basahan bala tinan bwe le, ma iy kameh udu le buku doh, winiya le len ta lakou doh nane turuki san ta ndramak ndra-in, Kindrei le ari kameh winiyan aruwi ma andrei lakou doh iu ili len.
Na len doh, iy ndramak ta balik kameh asahan eme lewan. Ma iri lau marakon kameh atanan iy. Arile, hamon kameh, Laban Jises eme ja, ma hawe lomada sun tan tinan labai, ma iy kameh idi ndramak ta balik nane na jor ta bohon le amwenen. Ma iy kameh amekes iy ndramak doh asahan lakou laleyah.
Tasah, ndramak ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in ma ta tebelese sahou batanau kameh eme hawe boto-on ta balik le. Ma, na boto-on ta balik le, iy kameh amekes iri gok marakon boto-on ma kalem solo-an ta wendreya.
Ta kandriyen solo-an doh, iy kameh wendreya iri lau ta ala bolo jih ta andrakak au. Buku iri lau doh mene aso-ok ma anya kanuhun sahou handru, badeh kameh Kindrei winiyan akohok iri ame hamon. Arile, iri baso-ok bwe.
Eme ma, Kindrei kameh atehei boto-on ta wendreya ili tiri, ma iri kameh atehei budon tiri in ta sahou wasai.
Kindrei amekes lakou doh, tasah iri lau marakon mene batehei budon tiri ba-en ta sahou handru bwe, iri mene sekesek ta kandriyen ndra-in le. Iri kameh akohok ndramas ndra-in labai ta mada sahou ta Kindrei.
Arile, aha nadu tine aso mwan ma badih, Laban aso-ok aha labai, ma na len marakon, aso badeh, adeu wurah ili ta Kindrei ta aha. Tasah, ma bwena handru, Kindrei ndratanan aha kameh ta ame hamon. Malawin Ndrabun badeh, ndraleheyani aha ndrala ta Kindrei, ma aha atehei budon taha in ta sahou handru. Ma ta kandriyen doh le, Kindrei andrei aha ame hamon.
Iy andrei sahou mwasin handru ta Krais, aso mene tiyaniy ndrawek taha, ma iy aruwi ndrine aha ili le tan. Eme ma, iy anya kedeu sun, ma iri lakou mwasin ta Laban tataha Jises Krais badu kandrah kewek taha.
Eme ma, aha nadu tine aso, aha kales boto-on. Ma iri sahou marakon ta Kindrei aso mene leheya aha ta aliy, na boho aso, o, na la-ukei aso atorou ewek taha, sahou doh aha ka-en hamon ta aliy.
Laban tataha Jises Krais hawe tama taha Kindrei mene tikisi taha. Eme ma Laban bwidi kandriyen mwasin eme tataha, ma bwidi budon tataha amwenen udu le buku doh. Ma iy aseben taha ta budon, ma taha atondrok Kindrei kamekes manyah tataha kudu mwasin.
Eme ma, aso asolom, ta iy katadau ndrine aha hawe koha aha kabadok, ma kaseben aha ta amekes iri kandriyen mwasin, ma asehek sahou mwasin.
Na dah, aha nadu tine aso, mwan ma badih, sahou taso ari ja i buku doh: Aha kasolom kili ta Kindrei, iy kaseben aso ta atiye sahou ta Krais, ma sahou ta Laban kameh winiyan sakaliye ili bolo kon mara-ei, iri kandrei, ma katawi kihis kudu budon tiri, i buku le iy mene amekes udu ndrokowa aha, na len aha anuhun, ma atehei budon in ta sahou mwasin doh.
Ma aha ale, kasolom kili ta Kindrei, iy kandrei aso are mine iri lau ndra-in kame len; iri badeh, ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in. Tasah, aha tanan, lau solo-an labai badeh, batehei budon tiri handru bala ta Kindrei bwe, ma iri baso-ok gok aso amekes dah bwe.
Ya, lau rayah ja badeh, batehei budon tiri bala ta Kindrei bwe, arile Laban badeh, ta amekes kandriyen handru na len mari. Eme ma, taha katehei budon tataha handru ki-in tan, ma iy kameh atadau budon tataha, ma atondrok aha, ma balik kameh winiyan baruwi budon taha bwe.
Laban badeh, aruwi budon taso, ma aso atanan aha i buku doh: Iri kandriyen mari, aso mene asehek badeh, aha a-en hamon ta aliy ai. Ma hamon ale kameh, aha amekes i buku le aliy.
Aso badeh, aso-ok Laban ki-in bwena taha kaleheya budon mwasin kewek taha, ma aha winiyan atanan Kindrei, iy aso-ok aha labai, ma Krais winiyan aseben aha ta ales boto-on, ma ta bwese maha-an, buku iy mene amekes udu ndra kon munyak.
Aha nadu tine aso mwan ma badih, ta bwele-e nyara Laban tataha Jises Krais, aso anya kabatanau aha badeh, buku doh: Aha badeh, kare ndra len ta nadu tine aha iri rayah nane manyah laleyah, ma ba-en hamon ta tanan nane aso adeu ili tiri bwe.
Tasah, aha ndratanan, aha badeh, ka-en hamon ta kandriyen taso. Bwena mene, aso are hawe aha, aso bamanyah laleyah bwe!
Aso bakohok nyamon rayah badu mine aha laleyah bwe. Aso asih le! Aso abo gok boto-on na len ma ben, aso winiyan badeu maha-an bawek taha bwe.
Aso badeh, winiyan ndremenya aha ta aseben aso, arile aso abo gok ta aseben aso le, ta aha kanyolom ma ka-en hamon ta aliy.
Aso mene ado hawe ado badeh, aso atehei batanau boto-on labai ewek taha i buku doh, “Are lau, buku iy bamekes gok bwe, iy winiyan bakohok nyamon bwe.”
Aso amekes, tasah aso anuhun lau rayah ado bolo aha badeh, bamekes gok bwe. Iri badeh, are laleyah, arile iri asehek sahou solo-an ja, ta lahou ta ndramak ari labai.
Ta nyara Laban tataha Jises Krais le badeh, aso batanau iri boto-on, i buku doh: Aha kamanyah kamwenen, kamekes gok ta atondrok manyah taha.
Aha nadu tine aso mwan ma badih rayah ja, aha sawoyah ta amekes kandriyen mwasin.
Buku iri mwan ma badih rayah ba-en hamon tiri sahou, aso torowenei in bolo la-ukei dah bwe, mada aha kaleu kamwenen kudu tiri. Ma aha sadek hawe iri, ma idah kameh bwidi bwili iri mara-ei ama.
Arile, aha sabudon kaliu tiri udu bwele-e aha, ndri-iy. Aha badeh, kabatanau iri, ki buku nadu tine aha iri handru.
Laban kudu hawe aha mara-ei. Laban badeh, kati nyosowa mondrei, ya aso aso-ok mondrei tan badeh, kudu hawe aha na len mara-ei kudu le buku doh.
Jo Pol, jo atorou sahou sekesek tek ewek taha na minek le amwenen. Ya tarou dah badeh, kalem tek amwenen, jo edeu ndra bwena in bolo iri la-ukei jo atorou ili kon marakon, jo atorou marakon i buku le doh.
Tikisiy ma nyosowa mondrei ta Laban Jises Krais badeh, kudu hawe ado mara-ei.
Jo Pol: Jo badeh, aposel ari ai, ta Krais Jises. Idoh badeh, asahan na sahou boto-on ta Kindrei, ndramak ta seben taha ma hawe Krais Jises, iy ndramak ta taha katehei budon handru ki tan.
Jo atorou la-ukei dah i tam Timoti, ou naduk handru i san ta budon handru: Tikisiy ma mondrei ta tama taha Kindrei ma Krais Jises, iy Laban tataha badeh, kudu hawem.
I buku jo mene indrek ou, na len jo edek ili kon Masadoniya, ta ou badeh, ado Epesus ado gwek, ta abarah lau rayah ta wasai ado badeh, saleheya tanan ta wasai.
Ma oro sasehek sala le ta nyala kundruh laleyah, ma hawe sasehek sare tubu oro. Bolo iri sahou doh kameh ta amekes ndrales udu bolo oro le, ya winiyan basebenei oro ta budon handru i ta Kindrei bwe, ma hawe winiyan basebenei lahou tan bwe.
Budon laba tinan jo asehek dah badeh, ta kandriyen ta tikisiy. Kandriyen ta tikisiy badeh, kasahan kudu ndrine ndramak mwasin keme len. Kaleheya kandriyen mwasin ta bar lewen, ma hawe budon handru.
Oro rayah ndraruwani budon doh, ya oro ndra-en hamon ta sahou laleyah.
Oro anya kasahan ndramak ta leheya kandriyen malen tiri Juwis, arile oro bala tana oro sasah oro asehek ta aliy doh bwe, ma ale oro tanan katin bwe, arile oro abadok ta aliy le ai.
Taha tanan, ta kandriyen malen badeh, mwasin, i buku none ndramak ki-in hamon ta aliy na len mari.
Taha tanan ale, kandriyen malen atehei eme badeh, ta leheya iri lau mwasin bwe. Arile, kandriyen malen atehei eme, ta leheya iri lau ta tebelese labai. I buku none iri lau ta banuhun sahou ta Kindrei bwe, ya ta i tiri lau ta amekes karei ma lomondra ndra-in, ya i tiri lau ta a-um tama iri hawe tine iri amak, ma hawe i tiri lau ta adai lau amak.
Ya kandriyen malen badeh, ta leheya iri lau ta karei, hawe i tiri lau mwan amekes mwan, ya i tiri badih amekes badih, ma i tiri lau ta bahana iri ndramak, ma hawe i tiri lau ta wasai, hawe i tiri lau ta wasai ta tandrakan handru i loken. Ma hawe i ta saba kandriyen bamwenen ta sahou handru bwe.
Sahou handru ta lomadan hawe nyosowan ta Kindrei badeh, udu bolo sahou mwasin tan, eme iy badeh, atehei eme kanik ta atiye.
Jo edeu wurah i ta Krais Jises, Laban tataha, tasah iy le badeh, edeu boto-on eme tek. Iy anyolom jo badeh, ta anuhun sahou, eme iy atehei lahou tan eme kanik jo amekes dah.
Jo mene bobose nyaran, ma jo mene idi iri lau tan, ma jo badeh, ndramak ta tebelese i badan. Badeh mene, tasah jo batehei budon handru bala tan bwe, ma jo bala tanan iy bala mwasin bwe. Arile, iy tikisi jo labai.
Tikisiy ta Laban i tataha badeh, amou handru eme bwele-ek, eme jo atehei budon tek handru i ta Krais Jises, ma jo atehei ndrinek mari i tan. Ya taha are lau ahas hawe Krais badeh, kandriyen doh, kudu tataha.
Ya sahou tek dah lau kanuhun, idah sahou handru aha kanuhun: Krais Jises eme andri bolo munyak ta aseben lau ta karei ma ta lomondra ndra-in. Ya jo dah badeh, ndra-in labai ja, sakalawi lau mari.
Ta katin doh, Kindrei tikisi jo, ta Krais Jises baruwani jo bwe, eme ya iy kaleheya iy mari udu bolok, tasah jo ndramak ndra-in labai ta lau mari. Ya jo badeh, i buku none ndramak ma mwena handru ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in. Ya, i buku none iri lau ado hamon kame kanyolom, ya eme iri katehei budon tiri handru badeh, ki ta Jises, ma iri kakohok koha iri mwasin, ta bano bwe, ta kudu le buku doh.
Eme ya masiye ma tudun badeh, ki ta kabin ta udu le buku doh, ma hawe ki ta kabin ta winiyan ta ano bwe, ma hawe ki ta kabin taha batou iy bwe. Ki ta Kindrei le ari doh, masiye ma tudun ki tan kudu le buku doh. Handru!
Eme naduk Timoti, jo atehei sahou batanau ewek kanim. Tasah idoh amwenen le, ta sahou mene iri propet ta Kindrei mene ndrasehek ndra-au ta nyalam. Ou andrei sahou dah ki nyara beteleu tam, ta ou kameh asahan nyekelen mwasin ta bolo bahun.
Ma ou tawi budon handru kaleu kudu bar tam. Tasah lau rayah bamekes bar mwasin bwe, ya budon tiri handru badeh, ndrataku.
Eme udu bolo oro badeh, Himeneyus hawe Aleksandra. Jo ndratehei uru ndra mine tama balik Satan. Idoh kameh ki bale uru ya hamon badeh, uru samekes luhe ndra-in ja sala ta Kindrei.
Ma mwena udu bwele-e lakou mari handru, jo anya kasehek sahou boto-on ki ta lau mari i buku doh, “Ado badeh, kasehek budon tado ma kadeu wurah ma hawe kasolom ki ta Kindrei bwena;
ma kamekes ki tiri kabin mari, ma hawe are lau ateu batu lahou tinan ta atondrok, eme ma manyah ta to kudu mwasin; i san ta manyah mwasin ta Kindrei ma ta kandriyen lewen.”
Idoh mwasin labai ma amekes Kindrei ta seben taha, kameh sekesek.
Tasah, iy aseken lau mari samak ma lau katanan sahou handru.
Tasah, Kindrei badeh, iy Kindrei le ari, ma hawe ndramak awas ari le udu ndrokowa Kindrei hawe taha ndramak, badeh Krais Jises le.
Iy le badeh, atehei kohan ta akunoh taha lau mari. Idoh asahan handru eme lewan amwenen le, ta Kindrei anya lau mari badeh, samak.
Eme ta katin doh baden adeh, jo asahan aposel ta atiye sahou, ma ta leheya iri lau badu leheleh. Ma iy atehei jo ta atiye sahou ta budon handru dah. Eme ya jo bawasai bwe, jo tiye sahou handru.
Eme ya budon tek, jo aseken aha lau mwasin ta mada Kindrei badu kon mari kamekes salom ma kasore mine aha ki loke. Ma hawe aha kateu lim, ma aha sasobobo ndri-iy.
Ya aha badih, aha kalomondra kolau taha, ma aha kanyasou aha kamwenen; ma aha sanyasou batu aha sala buku none aha adeu lakou i bada aha, i buku none bek nyikilikin, i ndranye aha, hawe buwandralou, ma hawe kolau lomadan sowan tinan labai.
Arile, aha kamekes ki san mwasin ta leheya aha i buku badih handru ta atudun Kindrei.
Aha badih kakohok kandriyen ta kado le bahandra mwan.
Jo baseken aha ales ta leheya lakou ma hawe katondrok iri mwan bwe; aha badeh, kado le.
Tasah, ma mwena handru mene bamekes Ip bare bwena bwe, amekes Adam badeh, ere bwena labai.
Ma Adam ale bataku bwena bwe, Ip badeh, taku bwena ma iy ba-en hamon ta kandriyen mwasin ta Kindrei bwe.
Arile, iri badih katawi kandriyen ta budon handru, ma hawe kandriyen ta tikisiy, ma hawe kandriyen mwasin ta are mada Kindrei, ma iri sala badih ta atudun iri ta anyasou bada iri. Ya buku none iri amekes i buku doh kameh, na len iri adeu nah kameh iri adeu udu mwasin.
Idah badeh, jo tiye sahou handru: I buku none are lau aseken handru ta asahan ndramak ta atondrok lau ta Kindrei, lakou doh badeh, mwasin labai.
Ndramak ta atondrok lau ta Kindrei, iy badeh ki ndramak, ari ndra-in badan bwe, ya iy badeh, kasoh badih ari le, iy badeh, ki ndramak ta budon mwasin; ma iy badeh ki ndramak ta atondrok badan kudu mwasin. Ma iy badeh, ki ndramak nyaran mwasin handru, ma lau kamasiye iy, ma iy badeh, ki ndramak ta asumon lau mari kame asiu, ma hawe iy badeh, ki ndramak ta tanan ta leheya;
Ya iy badeh, sasahan lolo-ou ta gwa boto-on, ma iy badeh, sala ndramak ta ndrine reh. Arile, iy badeh, ki ndramak ta udu le, ma iy badeh, ki ndramak ta amekes mondrei; ma iy sala ndramak ta aseken luk labai.
Ma iy ale badeh, katondrok udun ma nadun kudu mwasin ma iy badeh, kaleheya nadun kanuhun sahou hawe kinoh iy.
I buku none are lau winiyan batondrok udun ma nadun bwe, iy winiyan batondrokei lau ta Kindrei bwe le.
Iy ale winiyan batondrok lau ta Kindrei bwe, buku iy barasahan lau ta Kindrei ai, bwe kameh, budon ta atudun iy kameh i tinan ma idah kameh iy anya, iy le. Ya, buku none iy amekes i buku aliy, idah kameh iy akohok maha-an kameh i le buku balik.
Nyaran badeh, ki mwasin ta ndranye lau mari. Ya, ki buku none bwe, badeh kameh iy akohok bwilima ma balik kameh sawei iy.
Ya oro lau ta seben badu bolo iri lau ta Kindrei badeh, kandriyen toro ki mwasin labai, ma oro badeh, sala ndramak ta wasai. Oro sa-un gwa boto-on solo-an, iri aloh waen, ma oro samekes ndrakok ta luk toro.
Oro katawi sahou handru mene Kindrei tiye ta budon handru ma budon toro kaleu kudu mwasin.
Eme ya kanone oro op. I buku none oro ahas, oro winiyan ateu lahou ai. I buku none bwe badeh, oro sateu lahou.
Ma udu oro badeh, kandriyen toro ki mwasin, ma oro sasehek sahou ndra-in sala bada ndramak ari ari. Oro badeh, sala badih ta a-un gwa boto-on, ma oro badeh, kasehek sahou handru le ta bolo lahou mari.
Ndramak ta seben ta lau ta Kindrei badeh, kasoh badih ari le. Ya iy katondrok nadun ma udun kudu mwasin.
Are ndramak ta seben amekes lahou mwasin, nyaran kameh asahan mwasin, ma idah kameh iy winiyan asehek sahou boto-on ta budon handru ta Krais Jises.
Jo abudon ta anya kewek katou ou suwi na len jo atorou la-ukei dah ewek tam.
Arile, i buku none jo bawek suwi bwe, sahou udu bolo la-ukei dah, winiyan tiye nyala to ta kandriyen ta to kudu mada kindrei udu bolo lau ta Kindrei ki buku sah. To badeh, lau ta Kindrei, ya iy badeh, kohan handru ta udu le buku doh. Tasah, to badeh, tawi sahou handru ta Kindrei i buku to abe-ei i loke i buku bek, udu le buku doh.
Lakou laba tinan ta Kindrei aton mene ndrasahan ndrame lewen asah idoh: Jises Krais badeh, asahan ndrame awas, Ma Malawin Ndrabun leheyani iy doh badeh, amwenen handru, Ya eme iri angelo anyolom iy, Ma iri lau tan atiye sahou ta nyalan i tiri lau badu kon munyak mari, Ya iri lau badu kon munyak atehei budon tiri handru i tan. Ano iy iu ili loken i kandrah, ma atondrok lakou mari hawe taman.
Malawin Ndrabun tiye aleu i buku doh: Na len hamon eme, lau rayah kameh ruwani budon handru tiri; ya iri kameh an hamon ta malawin ndra-in ta wasai, ma an hamon ta leheya ndra-in tiri balik.
Leheya doh aseker na lau ta wasai; budon tiri badeh, mwasin handru bwe. Budon tiri badeh, ndramak, ma bar tiri balomondra bala mwasin bwe.
Iri tiye iri lau satasou, ma saimon nyamon rayah ndri-iy. Arile, Kindrei mesekei iri nyamon doh badeh, ta aimon le, i buku none to lau ta budon handru amekes salom, ma adeu wurah ta aliy. Tasah, to badeh, ndratanan sahou handru.
Ya, i buku none lakou mari kede-eh, to kamekes salom ki ta aliy, badeh, ndra mwasin le ta aimon; ari lakou badeh, ndra-in ta kakeh ki-iu, bwe.
Tasah, sahou ta Kindrei mene, ma hawe salom badeh, mesekei udu mwasin ta mada Kindrei.
I buku none ou leheya batanau dah i ta nadu tinem oro, ou lohowan mwasin labai ta Krais Jises. Ma ou ale amekes ou abadok na aliy. Ma idah kameh, ou abadok na sahou ta budon handru mene ou anuhun ma ou a-en hamon ta aliy.
Ou sa-en hamon ta kundruh tiri lau ta wasai ma hawe ou sa-en hamon ta sahou laleyah. Arile, ou abadok ou ta bolo manyah mwasin ta Kindrei.
I buku none ou amekes ndrayem kaseselek, mwasin; arile san ta Malawin Ndrabun badeh, mwasin labai ja ta ou sakaliye niliy. Tasah, idoh kameh sebenei manyah tam udu mwasin na len dah, ma hawe na len hamon kameh eme.
Idoh sahou handru, ya lau mari katehei budon handru ki ta aliy:
To asa-ar dah badeh, tasah to abudon boto-on in ta Kindrei. Ma iy ale ta aseben lau mari. Arile, ma hutuwen labai ki toro are atehei budon handru in tan. Tasah, iy badeh, ta ano bwe.
Ou batanau iri mwan ma badih ta sahou dah, ma leheya iri ka-en hamon ta aliy.
Lau badeh, satehei budon sandra-i anya ou ma loweu le, bwe. Arile, ou badeh, asahan i buku torowe mwasin ta mada lau, ta bolo sehek sahou tam, ma ta bolo tekedek tam. Ma ou ale asahan ta aseben lau mari hawe budon tam ki lewen. Ma hawe ou badeh, ki buku torowe handru ta mada lau ta san ta budon handru.
Ou atehei boto-on tam mari ki ta asehek sahou ta bolo tarou mari ki ndranye lau mari, ma ou leheya ma asehek sahou ta Kindrei, winiya jo le barasahan.
Ou saruwani nyosowan mwasin ta Malawin Ndrabun udu tam badeh. Idoh mene udu tam, ya iri propet asehek ma hawe iri lau ta bwena ta lahou ta Kindrei mene adeu boto-on na mine iri ewek la-um.
Ou atehei ou a bolo sahou doh, ma ou none lahou, eme iri lau kanyolom lahou doh udu ndra badam.
Balem ki tam kamwenen ma balem ki ta sahou ou leheya. Ou saruwaniy labai; tasah lakou ou amekes badeh, winiyan sebenei koha iri are anuhun sahou, ma winiyan sebenei ou ale.
Ou sabolosen sala tiri lau ndra alon, ndri-iy. Arile, ou atamas iri badeh, ki buku tamam amwenen. Ou atamas iri lau loweu badeh, ki buku none nadu tinem oro handru,
ya iri badih en badeh, ki buku tinem, ma hawe iri badih bihin ki buku none nadu tinem oro badih na kandriyen mwasin le.
Ou amekes kandriyen mwasin kili tiri badih nyau handru.
Arile, i buku none oro are badih nyau, nadu oro ma hawe nadu tubu oro udu aliy, badeh, oro ka-en hamon ta san ta Kindrei, ya katondrok oro badih nyau. Tasah, oro ma bwisik mene, oro awoyah ta anyo-ou oro; kandriyen doh badeh, mwasin ma amwenen ta mada Kindrei.
Are badih nyau ndramak ta atondrok iy bwe badeh, iy katehei budon ma boto-on tan na len mari kili le ta Kindrei ta seben.
Arile, are badih nyau iy amekes kandriyen ndra-in in hamon ta so-ok ta badan le, malawin mwasin tan badeh, ndramak mara-ei.
Katiye sahou batanau doh ki toro, ya lau sasehek oro, ndri-iy.
Arile, i buku none oro are batondrok lowan oro bwe, ma oro batondrok nadun ma udun oro bwe, badeh kameh iy sakalawi budon handru, ma iy badeh, ndra-in labai ja, ma kandriyen ndra-in tan badeh kameh sakalawi iri lau ala budon tiri ba-en hamon ta Kindrei ja ai.
Ado satorou nyara iri badih nyau ala jaha tiri udu baha ndro hanoh (60) badeh, sala hawe nyara iri badih nyau ala jaha tiri udu bada ndro hanoh (60) i loke. Tasah, iri badih nyau jaha tiri udu bada ndro hanoh (60) i loke badeh, badu hawe iri lau ta Kindrei labai, ya iri lau ta Kindrei atondrok iri labai. Ya iri badih nyau doh mene are ta mwan ari le.
Ma iri badeh, nyara iri bandra-i bwe, hawe iri badeh, mene ta leheya nadu iri ta kandriyen mwasin. Ya eme mesekei iri lau badu leheleh badeh, adah asiu. Ma iri badeh, mene badih ta leheya kandriyen mwasin, i buku none lohowan sikine kati iri lau ta Kindrei. Ya ma iri ale badeh, aseben iri lau ado ta maha-an, ma iri atehei ndrine iri badeh, i ta kandriyen mwasin.
Arile, iri badih nyau bihin badeh, sala bolo iri badih nyau bwena. Tasah, buku none budon tiri aseken ta anya ki tasou, iri kameh mani lahou ta Krais;
ma iri kameh are ta mada sahou, tasah iri mene mani tandrakan tiri hawe Krais.
Ma idah kameh, iri lolo-an a asiu ra-em ano asiu ra-em; ma laba tinan ta aliy handru badeh, iri kameh none kandriyen ta asehek lau ma sokolowa bolo lahou ta lau. Ma hawe iri asehek sahou laleyah.
Eme, jo abudon ta badih nyau bihin badeh, katasou ja kamekes nah ma katondrok oro. Kora-on iri lau ale budon tiri ndra-in udu ta to, sasehek to.
Tasah, iri badih nyau rayah badeh, ndra mine tama balik Satan ma ndra-en hamon tan.
Arile, ki buku none ari badih ta Kindrei ya ari badih nyau kudu hawen badeh, iy badeh, katondrok iy. Iy satehei maha doh sala la-u lau ta Kindrei. Eme ya iri lau ta Kindrei ja, bale iri ki tiri badih nyau rayah ja, ala iri lau ta atondrok iri bwe, ya iri katondrok iri.
Iri lau ta bwena ta lau ta Kindrei amekes lahou mwasin, kameh akohok sihine iri solo-an labai. Arile, i toro ala atiye sahou ma leheya sahou, kameh oro akohok ere bwele-en ja.
Tasah, sahou ta Kindrei tiye i buku doh, “Ou badeh, saseu boho oks buku none iy kamekes lahou tam ta katisih buwa wit,” ma hawe, “Ndramak ta lahou badeh, kakohok sihinen.”
Ya, i buku none ou anuhun sahou laleyah, iri kasehek tam, ta sahou ndra-in i bada iri lau ta bwena ta lau ta Kindrei badeh, ndranyem ki-iu ai. Ki buku none uru la-uh deh, oro taloh kasehek badeh, ou baranuhun ai.
I buku none oro are lau ta bwena ta lau ta Kindrei kamekes karei ma lomondra ndra-in badeh, ou asehek keme ndranye lau mari kanuhun. Eme ya iri lau mari kanuhun ma iri kanoh ta aliy, ya iri sa-en hamon ta aliy.
Udu mada Kindrei ma hawe udu mada Jises hawe iri angelo ndrabun badeh, jo tiye sahou boto-on dah i tam, ta ou badeh, a-en hamon ta sahou batanau dah. Ma ou abudon kamwenen, ou sala mwasin ta ndramak mwasin tam le, ndri-iy. Ou badeh, a mwasin ta ndramak ndra-in ale, i buku le ndramak mwasin tam. I buku none ou manyah anuhun sahou turu, ou areu le alih turu, ta aseben uru ari ari. Ma budon doh badeh, kudu bolo lahou tam mari ou amekes.
Ou badeh, sabotatahan ta adeu boto-on sala la-u are lau anya kateu lahou ta Laban ndri-iy. Ma ou sala bolo iri samekes lomondra ndra-in ma karei iri lau amekes. Ou atondrok ou amwenen.
Ou badeh, mene abo sik san solo-an, eme ya ou sa-un gwa laleyah, ou badeh, a-un sese waen ki hawen ta amekes ndrinem kudu mwasin.
Lomondra ndra-in ma karei ta lau mwan rayah badeh, bamai bwe; idah kameh ilih ilih bwena isos bada len ta sahou. Arile, lomondra ndra-in ma karei ta lau rayah kameh, udu hamon kameh barasahan barame lewan.
Idah kameh, i le buku none kandriyen mwasin kameh winiyan bamai bwe; ma hawe kandriyen aton kameh winiyan bamai bwe.
Budon tiri lohowan mari badeh, iri kamekes ki ta lau ta atondrok iri badeh, ki buku doh: Saba lahou ndramak ta atondrok iri katiye iri kamekes badeh, ndra iri kamekes le, tasah kandriyen doh badeh, mwasin. Ya, ki buku none iri katebelese, badeh kameh, iri lau kameh bobose nyara Kindrei, ma hawe leheya ta to ale.
Ya iri lohowan rayah tiri lau ta Kindrei badeh, sakohok budon anya, “Mwasin ai, ndramak ta Kindrei badeh, nadu tine to labai.” Ndri-iy, ado sakohok iri budon doh; budon doh badeh, bamwenen bwe. Arile, oro lohowan kakohok doh: “Bwe, ndramak ta lau ta Kindrei ta to doh badeh, ndramak ta Kindrei labai, eme ma to kaseken iy. Ma hawe to kamekes lahou boto-on ja ta aseben iy.”
Eme ya ou badeh, leheya ma tiye sahou dah ta aliu oro: I buku none oro are lau leheya tanan randra labai; bala buku none sahou handru ta Laban Jises Krais bwe, ma hawe bala buku none sahou handru ta lau ta Kindrei, aso leheya dah bwe; badeh kameh, iy ndra ari ai, arile iy tanan lakou bwe. Ma iy doh badeh, tanan sahou bwe, ma iy ta asoh sahou, ma ta aburoh sahou. Ya idoh kameh tiyani madalakis, losen ta lakou, ma hawe sondrokonya, ma amekes budon laleyah,
<range>
ma hawe andra-i kameh asahan tiri lau, budon tiri bado mwasin bwe, idah kameh amekes andra-i udu le buku doh. Eme ma, sahou handru badeh bado toro bwe. Eme oro anya kandriyen ta an hamon ta Kindrei badeh kameh amekes oro akohok lakou solo-an.
Arile, a-en hamon ta Kindrei badeh, bamekes ou akohok lakou solo-an bwe. I buku none ou tam lakou solo-an, o lakou solo-an bwe oh, badeh ou sekesek ta aliy le ai. Ya sekesek tam doh kameh sakalawiy, ou tam lakou solo-an ja.
Taha tanan, tine taha edeu taha ame len bolo kon munyak badeh, taha bakohok ari lakou bame hawe taha, bwe. Ya, buku taha amak, taha winiyan bakohok ari lakou badu munyak bala hawe taha bwe le.
Eme ya, i buku none tato kolau, ma hawe nato nyamon udu aliy, badeh, winiya to ka-i ai.
Arile, i buku none iri lau anya ka-en hamon tiri lau lakou tiri solo-an, ya kasahan i buku iri. Badeh kameh, iri taku ma arah are bolo kandriyen ta madalakis, ma iri kameh bale iri bwe, ma hawe amekes nono-ou laleyah ta aliu iri le, ma iri taku andra-i handru.
Tasah, kandriyen ta ou aseken luk solo-an badeh, kati kandriyen ndra-in mari. Ya lau rayah ala labai ta aseken lakou solo-an, eme aluwi iri ame len labai ta budon handru. Eme ya oro le badeh, amekes bohosak i toro amwenen.
Arile, ou ndramak ta Kindrei badeh, teleya lakou doh. Ou badeh, asa-ar ta amekes kandriyen ta ou asahan mwasin ta mada Kindrei. I buku none ou abadok ta kandriyen mwasin ta Kindrei, i buku none kandriyen ta budon handru le, ya, i buku none kandriyen ta ou ales boto-on, ya kandriyen ta tikisiy ma hawe kandriyen ta ou bato-ou ta losen suwi bwe,
ou badeh, abadok ta sakaliye ta budon handru. Ma ou anyolom ki bwena ta koham handru ta winiyan bamak bwe. Ma koham handru doh mene Kindrei ndratehei ndrawek tam; na len iy aloh ou ame len, asehek budon tam handru i ndranye lau mari anuhun.
Ou amekes iri lakou doh udu mada Kindrei anyolom. Tasah, iy le ari badeh, edeu mulin i ta lakou mari. Ma ou amekes iri lakou doh kudu mada Jises Krais, i buku none iy mene ale ales udu mada Pontiyus Pailat tiye sahou ta budon handru;
Ya udu mada Kindrei hawe Jises jo tiye batanau i buku doh, “Ou tawi batanau dah kihis, winiya le Krais barasahan, bwe kameh lau kabobose ou.
Ya iy kameh asahan na len Kindrei le tanan, eme ya masiye ma tudun ki tan, tasah iy le ari badeh, atondrok, ma iy le ari badeh, kabin tiri kabin mari ma hawe iy le ari badeh, Laban sakalau Laban mari.
Ya iy le ari badeh, ta udu le buku doh, ma iy badeh, manyah udu lomadan labai, winiya ari lau winiyan bala mirihik tan bwe. Udu ndra bwena, eme taku dah, ari lau banyolom iy bwe, ma ari ndramak winiyan batou iy bwe le. Eme ya masiye ma tudun ki tan hawe boto-on ki tan, tasah iy badeh, winiyan ta ano bwe, ma iy badeh, ta udu le buku doh. Handru!”
Ou batanau oro lau ala lakou toro solo-an, ta oro satudun oro ma hawe oro satehei budon toro boto-on sa-en ta lakou solo-an toro, tasah lakou doh, winiyan bado luwen bwe. Arile, oro katehei budon toro kabadok ta Kindrei. Tasah, iy badeh, lakou tan solo-an labai, ya idah kameh iy edeu eme tato kasekesek ta aliy.
Ou batanau oro ta oro badeh, kadih na kandriyen mwasin hawe kandriyen ta anyohan lakou i tiri lau ari ari.
Ya, ki buku none oro kamekes kandriyen doh, idah kameh, oro atukum toro le lakou mwasin labai, ta udu le buku doh na len hamon kameh eme. Ya idah kameh, oro winiyan kuhi koha oro handru.
Eme ya Timoti, ou tawi lahou udu kanim badeh, kamwenen labai. Ma ou teleya ou, ta tanan ta wasai ala iri aloh anya, “Tanan handru.” Arile bwe. Badeh bamwenen ta sahou ta kindrei bwe, badeh.
Ya iri lau rayah badeh, ndra bolo tanan doh, ma iri ndrala len labai ta budon handru.
Jo Pol, jo aposel ta Krais Jises. Tasah, Kindrei mene ndratiye, iy anya kedeu kohan handru keme tataha mwan ma badih na gok Jises Krais amekes. Eme ma, iy atehei jo asahan aposel tan ta atiye sahou mwasin doh.
Timoti, ou badeh, buku naduk handru, ta lakou ta Kindrei, eme ma, jo atorou la-ukei ramen ja dah ewek tam. Jo aso-ok tama taha Kindrei hawe Laban tataha Krais Jises, uru mala-uh katikisi ou ma katondrokei ou, ma kabwidi ou ado mwasin.
Bwena mene, tubu oro badeh, a-en hamon ta kandriyen ta Kindrei ma atudun nyaran. Eme ma, jo ale ki-in hamon tan ta ndrinek, jo atona kandriyen jo in hamon ta aliy doh ta amekes gok tan, idoh amwenen handru. Na len dah badeh, jo abudon ou, ma jo edeu wurah i ta Kindrei, tasah ou badeh, atehei budon tam handru in tan, ma ou a-en hamon ta kandriyen tan.
Jo asolom ili ta Kindrei badeh, jo abudon ale ta len mene jo ruwani ou, ma wa-i madam mene iroh en. Eme ma, jo anya kanyolom ou ja, ma jo kameh sekesek labai.
Jo edeu wurah i ta Kindrei ale, eme ma, jo bwetenei budon tam, tasah iy budon handru, iy ta wendreya bwe. Iri budon buku doh, ma bwena udu ta bu-um Lowis, ma hamon ja udu ta tinem Yunis. Ma jo i tanan amwenen, budon doh ere tam ale.
Budon doh ere tam handru, eme jo anya katadau budon tam kabadok ta ndramas ta Kindrei nane udu hawem badeh. Ou akohok ndramas doh badeh, kabatana jo asolom ou ma edeu minek udu bwele-em. Eme ma jo aso-ok ou amekes ndramas badeh, kamwenen i buku ndramak asumwe jih ma anya i tinan.
Ou tutuni ndramas badeh, ma ou amekes gok Kindrei ndratiye ndrawek tam. Tasah, Malawin Ndrabun, Kindrei atehei eme tataha doh, iy winiyan babwidi taha banoh bwe. Iy badeh, ndranyuhi taha marakon na boto-on tan ta amekes gok tan, ma taha winiyan tikisi iri lau mari, ma taha winiyan atondrok ndrine taha amwenen.
Eme ma, bwilim sama ta atiye sahou mwasin ta Laban tataha. Jo kada-ah udu bolo asiu lulik, tasah jo atiye sahou mwasin ta Laban. Eme ma, bwilim sama jo. Ou andrei boto-on ta Kindrei, ma ou alokou ou ta bwese maha randrah le, buku jo bwese maha-an ta bolo gok tek ta atiye sahou mwasin.
Kindrei luhi taha, ma iy andrei taha ndrame hamon, ma tondrohon taha asahan lau tan amwenen. Iy babudon ta kandriyen mwasin taha amekes, ma iy akohok taha ame hamon ma tondrohon taha asahan lau tan, bwe. Iy le amwenen abudon ta amekes lakou doh. Ndra bwena handru Kindrei babwidi munyak bwe le, iy abudon ta gok Jises anya kamekes, ma ta doh le iy badeh, tikisi taha, ma iy tondrohon taha ta asahan lau tan.
Arile, na len nane kada-ah, Krais Jises iy ndramak ta akohok taha ame hamon badeh, ndrasahan ndrame lewan. Ma ta gok doh badeh, iy amekes tataha, tikisiy ta Kindrei badeh, ndrasahan ndrame lewan mara-ei. Krais Jises mene apwai boto-on ta imek, tasah taha amak badeh, malawi taha bandra-i bwe. Buku taha anuhun sahou tan mwasin ma atehei budon in ta aliy, taha kameh winiyan akohok kohan handru ta udu le buku doh, ma bada taha winiyan bandra-i bwe.
Kindrei ndratondrohani jo asahan aposel ma ndramak ta leheya. Tasah, iy aso-ok jo kamekes gok ta atiye sahou mwasin dah.
Eme ma, jo bwese maha-an doh, ma jo eme udu bolo asiu lulik kada-ah. Arile, bwilik bama ta udu bolo asiu lulik ma bwese maha-an kada-ah, bwe. Tasah, jo ndratanan Krais Jises, ma jo atehei budon tek handru in tan. Ma jo tanan, iy winiyan tondrokei gok ta atiye sahou tan dah udu mwasin, iy ndratehei ndrame minek, ma gok doh kameh udu mwasin mara-ei ili winiyan le len iy eme hamon ja.
Ou a-en hamon ta sahou, ou mene ndranuhun badu bohok. Sahou doh kameh leheya kandriyen ta ou a-en hamon ta aliy, ma ou leheya ki tiri mwan ma badih. Na len ou atiye sahou dah, ou atehei budon tam kabadok kili ta Jises Krais, ma ou aso-ok iri mwan ma badih.
Ou atondrok sahou mwasin doh kamwenen, Kindrei mene ndratehei ndrawek minem. Malawin Ndrabun ta Kindrei doh, iy udu bolo taha, iy kameh aseben ou ta atondrok lakou badeh.
Sebwe ou ndratanam, mirihik iri mwan ma badih marakon ta Kindrei badu kon tinan Esiya, iri badeh, ndraruwani jo. Pigelus hawe Hermogenes ale ndraruwani jo.
Arile, jo aso-ok Kindrei katikisi Onesiporus ma hawe lowan oro, tasah Onesiporus badeh, bwidi ndrinek sekesek san solo-an labai. Ma bwilin bama jo bwe, kala jo udu bolo asiu lulik dah.
Arile, na len iy isos Rom, iy asa-ar labai ta asilah jo winiya le iy baranyolom jo.
Ou ale ndratanam mwasin labai ta iri seben Onesiporus mene anyohan jo, kala jo udu kon Epesus. Eme ma, jo aso-ok Kindrei katikisi iy ta len doh kameh, iy atehei iri mwan ma badih a ta mada sahou.
Ya, Timoti, ou badeh, buku naduk, ta lahou ta Kindrei. Len marakon ou ahas hawe Krais Jises, ma ou ales boto-on na le tikisiy tan eme tataha.
Ya, iri sahou marakon ou ndranuhun jo ndrasehek udu bolo iri lau, idoh ou andrei, ma ou asehek kili tiri lau rayah ja, iri katondrok kamwenen, ma iri winiyan leheya iri lau rayah ja ale.
Ou ales boto-on are hawek, ma bwese maha-an, buku ndramak ta bahun ta Krais Jises, iy ales boto-on labai.
Handru, ou asahan buku ndramak ta bahun. Ndramak ta bahun aso-ok tinan tan udu bwele-en kasekesek ta gok iy amekes, ya iy winiyan bateu gok rayah hawe gok tan ja bwe. Eme ma, ou a-en hamon le ta gok Kindrei ndratehei ndrawek tam, ma ou salelei sala le tiri lakou anya kariu ou.
Ou asahan ale buku ndramak iy sakaliye ta nyorei. Ndramak sakaliye ta nyorei, iy badeh, ki-in hamon le ta sahou batanau ta nyorei. Buku bwe, iy winiyan bakohok ndramas doh bwe. Eme ma, ou atondrok koham kamwenen, ma ou a-en hamon le ta gok nane Laban ndratehei ndrawek minem, ma hamon kameh iy edeu ndramas ewek tam.
Ou asahan ale buku ndramak atah bilin. Iy asa-ar labai ta atah ma ta atondrok bilin, ma iy amwenen badeh, akohok nyamon ere bwena tiri lau rayah. Eme ma, buku ou amekes gok laba tinan ta Laban Krais Jises, iy kameh edeu lakou mwasin ewek tam.
Ou abudon kamwenen ta sahou jo asehek dah. Tasah, buku ou amekes i buku doh, Laban kameh bwidi budon tam mara-ei aleu, ma ou kameh atanam moso iri sahou marakon dah.
Len marakon jo aso-ok ou bwetenei gok ta Jises Krais mene amekes, ma idoh winiyan aseben ou ales boto-on, ma bwese iri maha-an. Jises badeh, badu boho kamen hawe kabin Debit, ma iy banoh ta bwese iri maha-an bwe. Iy mene imek, ano Kindrei mete-ei iy eme awas ja. Iri sahou mwasin dah, jo ndrasehek ndrala tiri lau.
Ou bwetenei jo ale, ta ales boto-on ma bwese iri maha-an. Jo ndratiye sahou mwasin, eme ma, ta kandriyen le doh iri lau abudon anya jo ndramak ndra-in, ma iri atehei jo ili bolo asiu lulik. Arile, sahou ta Kindrei winiyan bala bado bolo asiu lulik barah bare gwek bwe.
Eme ma jo sekesek ta ato-ou iri maha-an mari ale asahan tek. Jo bwese iri maha-an ta aseben iri mwan ma badih marakon Kindrei ndrandromwei iri ndrala tan, ma jo anya, iri kameh kakohok kohan handru ta Jises Krais doh, ma iy kameh winiyan andrei iri ala ado hawen are kandrah ta are le buku doh.
Taha kales boto-on ta bwese iri maha-an, tasah sahou dah handru, ma iy asehek i buku doh: “Buku taha amak hawe Krais, taha kameh ado awas hawen ale.
Buku taha ales boto-on ta bwese maha-an marakon, taha kameh asahan kabin tiri mwan ma badih are hawen. Buku taha adeu kona taha ili tan, iy kameh edeu konan eme tataha ale.
Buku taha anya, taha ka-en hamon tan, arile taha ba-en hamon ta sahou tataha amwenen bwe, ndri-iy ai, iy ki-in hamon ta sahou tan le amwenen, ma iy kameh atehei taha a ta mada sahou. Tasah, iy winiyan batubuni sahou tan amwenen bwe-en!”
Len marakon, ou aliu budon tiri lau ta leheya sahou dah, jo mene edeu ndrawek tam. Ma ou asehek boto-on kili tiri ta mada Kindrei ki buku doh: Iri satebelese sala ta sahou batanau. Kandriyen ta sahou tebelese doh kameh winiyan baseben ari ndramak ta in hamon ta Kindrei bwe. Kandriyen doh, ta sokolowa budon tiri lau le ta anuhun sahou solo-an doh.
Ou abo gok boto-on handru ta asahan lohowan mwasin ta mada Kindrei, eme ma iy winiyan aso-ok gok tam. Buku ou asahan lohowan mwasin, bwilin winiyan bama ta gok tan bwe, tasah Kindrei anyolom ou, ma ou atiye sahou tan amwenen handru.
Bohom sala tiri sahou ndra-in, ari moson bwe. Tasah, iri sahou doh, iri lau amekes ta ariu lau a sola ala le san ta adeu kona iri ili ta Kindrei.
Sahou ndra-in tiri doh, i buku ndrana laba tinan ndra-in, iy aimon bada ndramak bilisiu ili ili ma andra-i mara-ei. Himeneyus uru Piletus badeh, badu bolo iri adeh, ta amekes sahou ndra-in doh.
Iri lau buku doh badeh, bado se mirihik bwai, ma iri teleya sahou handru. Iri asehek sahou i buku doh: “Kindrei badeh, ndramete-ei iri lau tan ja, ma taha an hamon kada-ah winiyan bamak bame awas ja bwe.” Eme ma, na sahou le doh, iri ndraruwiy ma ndrabolowani budon tiri mwan ma badih rayah handru.
Arile, sahou ta Kindrei kameh asahan buku iy mene ndratiye. Iri lau a-en hamon ta Kindrei, iri kameh a buku ndru, Kindrei ndratahiy, ma ales udu le ta atah asiu ili bwele-en. Ma udu ta ndru doh badeh, Kindrei torowenei sahou randra i buku doh: “Laban badeh, ndratanan iri mwan ma badih tan.” Ya, “Are lau anya, iri ta Kindrei ma Kindrei atondrok iri, ya iri katehei kona iri kili ta kandriyen bamwenen bwe.”
Bolo iri asiu tinan badeh, bwekei solo-an solo-an udu aliy. Rayah iri amekes na bek nyikilikin ma silba, ma rayah ja iri amekes na kei ma ndren. Iri bwekei, nane amekes na bek nyikilikin ma silba, iri ta gok tinan le buku molak, tasou ha-un, kabek ma tukum ta nyamon tinan. Arile, bwekei iri amekes na kei ma ndren, badeh, ta amekes nyamon ili aliy ta gok nadu bwisik laleyah ta len marakon.
Eme ma, iri lau akahei kandriyen ndra-in udu ndrine iri eme len, ma asahan ha-un ja, iri lau doh badeh, buku bwekei iri amekes na bek nyikilikin ma silba, iri lau amekes nyamon i bolon ta gok mwasin ta molak le. Kindrei winiyan akohok iri lau rayah doh, ma iri winiyan amekes gok mwasin. Handru, iri alokou ta amekes iri gok rayah mwasin.
Ya, Timoti, buku ou anya asahan buku bwekei mwasin don eh, idoh badeh, ou atobwak a len labai ta iri kandriyen ta ndrine iri lau loweu aso-ok. Ma ou abo gok boto-on in le hamon ta kandriyen mwasin ma amwenen, ma hawe budon mwasin ta Kindrei, kandriyen ta aso-ok iri mwan ma badih rayah ja, kandriyen ta ndrine taha kudu mwasin. Ma ou amekes iri kandriyen doh, hawe iri mwan ma badih, ndrine iri ndraleu mara-ei, ma iri asolom ili ta Kindrei kaseben iri ka-en hamon tan le amwenen.
Ma ou adeu konam kili tiri sahou ari katin ma moson bwe. Tasah, ou tanam iri sahou doh badeh, ta amekes kandriyen ta tebelese asahan.
Arile, are lau handru amekes gok ta Laban, iy badeh, sasahan ndramak ta tebelese hawe iri lau rayah ja. Iy badeh, kamekes kandriyen mwasin kili tiri lau. Iy ale kasahan ndramak ta leheya, ma iy samekes bundruwe losen sala tiri lau, ma iy kasahan ndramak ta udu le udu.
Ma iy kaleheya iri lau nane amekes ndra-in ili tan, ma iy ale kamekes kamunum le ta amekes budon tiri lau nane tebelese hawen. Iy kamekes ki buku doh, tasah Kindrei kameh aseben iri, ma iri kameh winiyan tubuni ndrine iri, ma iri kameh winiyan atanan ta sahou handru, ma iri winiyan a-en hamon tan.
Ma iri ale kamani iri kandriyen tiri i buku kubwin ta balik amekes ta aturuk ma amekes iri i ndra-in mara-ei. Balik badeh, ta atamar iri lau ta ka-en hamon ta so-ok tan. Arile, buku iri ndratanan sahou handru, budon tiri kameh winiyan aleu amwenen ja, ma iri kameh winiyan ruwani kubwin ta balik.
Ou atanam ta lakou doh: Len badeh, ndra mirihik ta Jises kameh eme hamon, iri lau ndra-in kameh amekes maha-an solo-an asahan, ma amekes i ndra-in mara-ei ja ili tiri mwan ma badih anya ka-en hamon ta kandriyen mwasin.
Idah kameh i ndra-in mara-ei, tasah iri lau ndra-in kameh aso-ok iri le amwenen. Ma iri aso-ok luk tinan ale. Iri kameh atudun nyara iri le amwenen, ma iri kameh aluhe iri lau, ma bobose Kindrei. Iri ale kameh tebelese sahou ta tama hawe tine iri amwenen, ma iri tanan sekesek bwe, ma badeu wurah bwe, ma iri winiyan babudon ari lakou laba tinan bwe.
Iri ale kameh winiyan bamekes kawas hawe iri lau rayah ja bwe. Ma iri winiyan batehei ndrine iri bamunum bala hawe ari ndramak bwe. Iri kameh andra-i, udu le buku doh! Iri kameh asehek lau laleyah, ma iri winiyan batondrok ndrine iri ma bada iri bamwenen bwe. Iri kameh amekes ndra-in i tiri lau laleyah, ma iri ateu kaliu ta kandriyen mwasin.
Iri kameh atehei iri kawas tiri ili mine iri lau ndra-in ta bahun, ma a-en hamon ta budon tiri ndra-in. Iri kameh abudon iri le, ma iri aso-ok, ta amekes bada iri kasekesek, ma iri baso-ok Kindrei bwe.
Iri kameh atukum ta salom hawe iri mwan ma badih, ma tiye iri ka-en hamon ta budon tiri lau ta Kindrei. Arile, ta ndrine iri, iri adeu kona iri ili ta kandriyen ta Kindrei nane tubuni koha iri mwan ma badih. Handru, ou are ndra len labai tiri lau doh!
Tasah, rayah ado ndrokowa iri atamar iri mwasin labai, ma ala bolo asiu tiri lau, ma iri wasai iri badih budon mwasin bwe, ma iri badih kede-eh atehei budon in ta sahou tiri. Iri badih buku doh, kandriyen ndra-in tiri badeh, solo-an labai. Ma ndrine iri maha-an labai ta kandriyen iri a-en hamon ta aliy, ma aruwi iri sandroh ala ame.
Iri a-en hamon ta sahou solo-an, arile iri winiyan ba-en hamon ta sahou handru bwe.
Iri lau ta leheya wasai badeh, a buku le Janes hawe Jambres bwena mene. Uru badeh, ta tebelese sahou handru Moses mene asehek. Ya, iri lau ta leheya wasai doh a buku le aliy. Iri abudon, arile, ta lakou rayah ndra-in le, ma Kindrei atehei konan ili tiri, tasah iri batehei budon tiri ba-en ta sahou handru bwe.
Arile, kandriyen tiri ta atamar lau ka-en hamon tiri, winiyan basahan tinan bwe. Tasah, iri mwan ma badih kameh atanan kandriyen lolo-ou iri amekes, ma idah kameh iri adeu kona iri, i buku iri mwan ma badih mene badu Ijip anyolom kandriyen ta Janes uru Jambres, ma bar tiri aleu handru ta kandriyen lolo-ou turu.
Arile, Timoti, ou badeh, basahan buku iri lau ta leheya wasai bwe. Ou mene are hawek, ma ou ndratanam iri sahou marakon jo leheya, ma ou tanam iri tekedek tek. Ma ou tanam ndrinek, jo atehei budon tek mara-ei in ta Kindrei, ma jo atadau ndrinek, ma ales boto-on ta lakou ndra-in asahan tek. Ma ndrinek ale winiyan barih suwi bala tiri lau bwe. Jo aso-ok iri labai.
Ou ndratanam ale ta iri kandriyen iri lau amekes eme tek, ma ta iri sisi-in ndra-in handru jo akohok udu kon Antiyok, Aikoniyam ma Listra. Ou ndratanam iri maha-an solo-an iri adeu eme bwele-ek, arile jo bwese-ei. Laban ndratalawei maha-an marakon udu bwele-ek doh ndra-au ndrala len, ma jo udu mwasin ja.
Ehe, sahou dah handru. Iri lau marakon anya kahis hawe Krais Jises, ma ka-en hamon ta kandriyen ta Kindrei, idah kameh iri lau ta adi lau laleyah amekes ndra-in ili tiri.
Ma iri lau ndra-in ale kameh amekes kandriyen ndra-in mara-ei ja. Eme ma iri lau ta wasai kameh wendreya iri lau. Balik ale kameh wendreya iri lau ta wasai doh, ma kandriyen tiri kameh asahan ndra-in mara-ei ja.
Arile, Timoti, ou tawiy kihis sahou mene ou ndrandrei, ma ou atehei budon tam ki-in aliy. Tasah, ou ndratanam ta ahi lau mene leheya ou. Ahi leheya ou amwenen ta sahou dah.
Eme ma, ou ale tanam lakou doh: Ou mene ma nadu nah bwisik kahis, tinem mene leheya ou, ma ou akohok tanan ma bwena ta buk ndrabun. Ou tanam, buk ndrabun dah winiyan ta edeu budon mwasin ewek tam, ma Kindrei kameh andrei ou ame hamon. Tasah, ou atehei budon tam mara-ei in ta Krais Jises.
Malawin Mwasin ta Kindrei atehei budon ili tiri lau, ma iri torowenei sahou tan ili bolo buk ndrabun. Eme ma, iri tarou marakon udu bolo buk dah, iri mwasin, ma iri adeu tanan eme tataha ta sahou handru. Ma iri leheya taha ta kandriyen ndra-in tataha, ma lowosa tekedek tataha kamwenen, ma leheya taha ta kandriyen mwasin ma amwenen.
Na san doh, Kindrei lowosani iri lohowan tan, kamekes iri gok mwasin.
Krais Jises kameh eme hamon ja, ma iy asahan kabin ta atondrok iri mwan ma badih marakon. Ma iy ale kameh aleben iri lau are ndra awas ma iri lau ndramak bwena. Jo abudon ta aliy, ma Kindrei hawe Krais Jises, uru anyolom jo, eme ma jo tiye sahou boto-on ewek tam i buku doh:
Ou atiye sahou ta Kindrei. Ya, ou abudon ta lakou doh kameh asahan, ma ou atiye sahou ta Kindrei kili. Buku iri lau alokou iri ta anuhun sahou, o, iri balokou iri bwe, ndri-iy ai. Len marakon ou abadok ta atiye sahou tan kili. Sahou tam badeh, korou ndrine iri ta asor iri ta tobolowe ndrine iri, ma karuwe kandriyen ndra-in. Ou suruni ndrine iri ta a-en hamon ta kandriyen ta Kindrei. Ou leheya iri ki buku doh, arile ou winiyan bandra-i hawe iri bwe. Ou abo gok le, ta leheya iri.
Ou amekes ki buku doh, tasah hamon kameh iri lau winiyan baso-ok ta anuhun sahou mwasin bwe. Iri kameh a-en hamon ta so-ok tiri le amwenen, ma amekes kandriyen ndra-in. Eme ma, iri kameh akohok lau ta leheya solo-an labai, ma lau ta leheya doh kameh leheya iri mwan ma badih, ta lakou iri abasa labai ta anuhun.
Ma, iri kameh adeu kona iri ili ta sahou handru, ma iri adeu ndranye iri ili ta anuhun iri kundruh laleyah.
Arile, ou le amwenen winiyan bamekes buku doh bwe. Ou atondrok budon tam kamwenen na len mari, ma ou abadok ta bwese iri maha-an anya kewek bwele-em. Ou badeh, lohowan ta Kindrei, eme ma ou atiye sahou mwasin tan kili tiri mwan ma badih, ma ou amekes gok tam handru ta aseben iri lau.
Ya, ou a-en hamon tiri lakou mene jo ndrasehek tam, tasah len tek ta imek badeh, ndrame mirihik labai. Ma ndrayek kameh amou i buku waen, iri lau ale adeu i ta Kindrei i nyara salom.
Jo badeh, akeh lim mwasin labai, ma jo ndrabwidi nyorei doh badeh, ndrano mara-ei. Jo badeh, tawi budon mara-ei doh ihis labai.
Ya, ndramas ari udu aliy abe-en jo. Ndramas doh i buku barak ari ta kandriyen mwasin labai jo ndramekes ta bolo nyorei. Laban badeh, anuhun sahou ta lau amwenen labai, ma udu ta len ta sahou, iy kameh edeu barak doh eme tek, ma i tare lau ja nane atehei budon tiri in ta anyolom iy eme hamon ja.
Ou asilah san tam, ta ame hawek suwi.
Demas badeh, atehei budon tan in tiri lakou mara-ei badu munyak, iy ndraruwani jo, ma iy ndra-au ndrala Tesalonaika. Ya Kresens badeh, ndra-au ndrala Galesiya. Ya Taitus ndrala Dalmesiya.
Luk le ari badeh, udu hawek kada-ah. Buku ou anya ame, ou andrei Mak, ah ma la-uh kame, tasah iy mwasin ta aseben jo ta gok tek dah.
Jo suni Tikikus ndrala Epesus.
Buku ou anya ame, ou andrei awin tek lawe-en mene jo ruwaniy udu hawe Kapus udu ndra Trowas. Ma balem samani iri buk tek, ma hawe iri buk tek rayah ale iri amekes na ku-i katin haka.
Balem kudu ta Aleksandra, iy ndramak ta amekes lakou i hayen, tasah iy mene amekes ndra-in solo-an labai eme tek. Laban kameh konohei iy, ta saba lakou iy amekes.
Eme, balem kudu tam ta ndramak doh. Tasah, iy mene ndratebelese boto-on labai hawe aso ta sahou ta Laban taha atiye.
Ma bwena handru jo ales udu ta sahou, ma asumon boho ndramak ta anuhun sahou badeh, ari ndramak bales bare hawek, ma aseben jo ta asumon sahou bwe-en! Iri lau marakon anoh, ma iri ruwani jo. Jo asalom ili ta Kindrei ta iy sabudon ta ndra-in iri amekes eme tek doh.
Arile, Laban ndrame ndrales ndrare hawek, ma iy atadau jo. Eme ma, jo mene winiyan atiye iri sahou mwasin marakon, ma iri lau badu leheleh marakon winiyan anuhun. Ma Kindrei mene aseben jo, ma iy andrei jo eme len ta sahou laba tinan doh. I buku iy ndraruwi jo ndrame len ta lihi layon.
Eme ma, jo tanan Kindrei kameh tolowei jo ta iri lakou marakon ndra-in iri lau dah anya kamekes keme tek, ma iy kameh andrei jo ili bolo tondrok tan udu kandrah. Ya, taha badeh, katudun nyaran kudu le buku doh. Handru!
Ou tiyani bada-an tek kili ta Prisila uru Akwila, ma kili ta lowa Onesiporus oro.
Erastus badeh, ere ndra Korin kahis. Ya, Tropimus badeh, sik udu tan, ma jo ruwani iy udu ndra Miletus.
Eme ma, jo aso-ok ou asilah san suwi ta ame. Kora-on len ta ur ma jor laba tinan kasahan. Yubulus, Pudens, Linus, Klodiya, ma iri lau ta Kindrei are kada-ah badeh, anya bada-an tiri mwasin ewek tam.
Jo asolom ili ta Laban iy winiyan udu hawe malawim, ma aseben ou. Ma tikisiy ta Kindrei winiyan udu hawe aha lau ta Kindrei mari.
La-ukei dah badeh, jo Pol atorou. Jo badeh, Kindrei le tiye jo asahan lohowan tan, ma tiye jo asahan aposel tan ta atiye sahou badu boho Jises Krais. Kindrei amekes doh badeh, ta jo kaleheya oro lau tan badeh, katehei budon toro handru ki-in hamon ta budon handru. Ma hawe jo kaleheya oro kaleu handru ta tanan ta Kindrei. Ya eme na tanan handru ta Kindrei doh badeh, winiyan leheya oro ta manyah mwasin i buku seken ta Kindrei.
Eme ya, ta tanan handru doh badeh, oro winiyan atanan oro udu mwasin ta koha oro winiyan ta bano bwe. Ma oro winiyan atanan udu mwasin labai ta Kindrei badeh, ndramak ta wasai bwe. Eme ya udu ndra bada katin, ta lakou mari basahan bwe le badeh, Kindrei tandrakan iri lau tan kameh winiyan bamak bwe. Iri kameh ado hawen udu le buku doh.
Ano na len ta aliy asahan badeh, Kindrei, ndramak ta aseben taha atehei sahou dah eme kanik. Ma na le sahou jo tiye doh badeh, mesekei budon tiri lau mari aleu ta nyala Krais.
Eme ya la-ukei dah badeh, jo atorou ewek tam, Taitus, tasah ou badeh, i buku naduk handru. Ou badeh, budon tam handru badeh, i le buku tek. Eme ya tikisiy ma mondrei ta tama taha Kindrei hawe Krais Jises ndramak ta aseben taha, kudu hawem.
Katin ta jo anya, ou ado busu Krit ado gwek sese badeh, ta ou badeh mesekei lahou doh kano, ma kabadok, ta aliu budon toro kamwenen ja. Eme ya ou leheya iri lau rayah badeh, ma ou adeu iri kasahan batun ta atondrok iri lau ta Kindrei badu kon ari ari. I buku none jo mene ndrasehek tam ndra-au.
Ndramak ta batun badeh, nyaran ki mwasin labai, ma iy badeh, udun ari le. Ma hawe nadun oro badeh, ka nah ta budon handru, ma oro sala nah ta tebelese ta amekes lakou laleyah. Arile, oro badeh, ki nah ta anuhun boho tama oro.
Eme ya, ndramak ta atondrok iri lau ta Kindrei, hawe ta ateu lahou ta Kindrei badeh, kandriyen tan kudu mwasin, ta iri lau badeh sasehek iy. Ma iy badeh, sabudon anya, iy ndra ari ai. Ma iy badeh, sala ndramak ta ndrinen ato-ou suwi ta losen, ma hawe iy badeh, sala ndramak ta a-un gwa boto-on solo-an. Ma hawe iy sala ndramak ta akeh lim suwi, ma hawe iy sala ndramak ta ndrakok.
Arile, iy badeh, ki ndramak ta asumon lau mari kame asiu tan, ma aseken ta aseben lau. Ma iy badeh, ki ndramak ta budon ta amekes lakou kamwenen le. Ma iy ale ki ndramak ta amekes kandriyen mwasin i tiri lau ari ari. Ma hawe iy badeh, ki ndramak ta atehei iy mari i mine Kindrei, ma iy ki ndramak ta winiyan atondrok iy udu mwasin ta kandriyen ndra-in.
Iy katawi budon tan handru kihis ta sahou ta Kindrei mene ndratiye, eme iri winiyan anuhun, ma winiyan atehei budon handru tiri i ta aliy, in hamon ta bolo tanan handru. Ma i san le doh kameh winiyan mesekei iri abadok ta budon, ma ale winiyan mesekei iri lau abadok ado bolo sahou ta wasai, ame bada sahou handru.
Tasah, iri lau solo-an ba-en hamon ta sahou ta Kindrei bwe. Iri asehek sahou laleyah ma wendreya iri lau. Iri lau ta wendreya doh badeh, iri lau ala ta asan ku-i iri, ya udu bolo iri doh badeh, iri Juwis solo-an.
Eme ou ma hawe oro lau ta batun badeh, kabarah oro kandru-uk, tasah oro badeh, sekere-ei iri boho kamen satehei budon tiri handru sa-en hamon ta sahou handru. Oro amekes leheya doh ta amekes madasan ta lau kanyohan oro na luk. Ya kandriyen doh badeh, ndra-in labai.
Eme ya ndramak ari ta tiye boho iri anya, “Iri lau badu Krit badeh, ndra ta wasai le, iri badeh, ndra-in labai, ma hawe iri badeh, ta gwaman ta aimon le nyamon.”
Kandriyen doh badeh, handru. Eme ou tiye sahou boto-on ki toro lau mene ndra-en hamon ta leheya wasai, kame hamon ma ka-en hamon ta leheya handru.
Ma oro satehei ndranye oro sala ta kundruh ta wasai tiri Juwis, ma ale, oro sa-en hamon ta batanau toro lau ale ba-en hamon ta leheya handru bwe, ndri-iy.
Ya kati tanan handru i buku doh: I buku none tekedek ta lau udu mwasin ta mada Kindrei, sasah lau beleben badeh, winiyan badai iy bwe, idoh badeh, ndra mwasin le. Arile, i buku none tekedek ta lau bamwenen ta mada Kindrei bwe, ma hawe iri batehei budon handru ba-en tan bwe; iri beleben sasah, arile idoh badeh, bamesekei iri bamwenen ta mada Kindrei bwe le. Ma laba tinan ta aliy badeh, budon toro bala mwasin ja bwe. Oro bala tana oro ndra-in udu heh bwe, hawe oro bala tana oro mwasin udu heh bwe. Eme sasah ndra-in oro amekes badeh, oro batona anya idoh ndra-in bwe. Oro anya ndra mwasin le ai.
Oro anya oro tana oro Kindrei, arile kandriyen toro batiye bala buku aliy bwe. Tasah, kandriyen ndra-in toro, Kindrei sumukok, ma oro ta tebelese ma winiyan bamesekei ari kandriyen mwasin ja bwe.
Eme Taitus, ou badeh, leheya oro ja ta tanan handru ta Kindrei.
Ma ou leheya oro lau-en badeh, ka-en hamon toro kandriyen doh: Oro badeh, budon toro kaleu, ma oro badeh, ki ndramak ala lau mari kanuhun oro, ma oro badeh, ki ndramak ta atondrok bada oro, ma oro badeh, ki ndramak handru ta budon toro kihis ta tanan handru. Ma oro badeh, ki ndramak ta amekes mwasin i ta lau mari, ma hawe oro badeh, ki ndramak ta ado le i buku none oro bwese maha-an solo-an.
Eme ou leheya oro badih en ki le buku aliy. Oro badeh, kandriyen toro ki mwasin i buku badih ta Laban. Oro badeh, sasehek lau ma hawe oro sala badih ta a-un gwa boto-on i buku nyamon toro. Oro badeh, ki badih ta leheya lau ta kandriyen mwasin.
Ano oro badeh, ki badih winiyan ta leheya iri badih tasou bolohau ta kanuhun ma kaseken udu iri, ma hawe kaseken nadu iri.
Ma oro katiye oro katondrok bada oro kudu mwasin ta oro sakohok mwan ari ja. Ma hawe oro ka badih ta gok ma kaleheya oro ta kanuhun boho udu oro. Ya eme, lau badeh, sabobose sahou ta Kindrei.
Eme ou batanau oro loweu ki le buku aliy. Oro katondrok bada oro kudu mwasin ta bolo tekedek toro mari.
Eme ya udu bolo lahou tam mari, kandriyen tam kudu mwasin labai, ta iri lau kanyolom ou. Ma, i buku none ou leheya iri lau, ou asehek na ndrinem ki handru le.
Eme lau sasehek to, tasah to asehek sahou in badan amwenen. Ou amekes lahou doh, ya i buku none are lau kandres to ta aliy badeh, bwilin kameh ama ta aliy, tasah sahou iy asehek doh bamwenen bwe.
Ano ou leheya iri bonyo-ou badeh, kanuhun are lau iri are bahan ta bolo lahou mari, ma oro kamekes iy kasekesek, ya oro sasehek iy.
Ma hawe oro sakolowa lakou ta lau oro are bahan, sakolowa lakou ari ari sa-au le. Arile, oro badeh, ka lau mwasin ta tiye sahou handru le, ta mada lau mene oro are bahan, ta iy winiyan babwerei oro bwe. Kandriyen toro bonyo-ou badeh, i buku le doh. Eme ta kandriyen mwasin oro amekes doh kameh lau anyolom, ma atanan ta leheya ta Kindrei, ndramak ta akohok taha ado bolo kandriyen ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in, ame hamon.
Katin ta ou leheya, ma batanau iri lau ta Kindrei, ka-en hamon ta kandriyen doh badeh, asah i buku doh: Na tikisiy ta Kindrei le, eme la-u taha mari badeh, mesekei iy suni Jises Krais eme munyak, ta sikine karei ma lomondra ndra-in tataha.
Ma ale tikisiy tan badeh, leheya budon tataha aleu ta tiye taha sala bolo kandriyen ndra-in bamwenen ta mada Kindrei bwe. Ma taha badeh, karuwani kandriyen ndra-in taha amekes ta bada taha sekesek i buku iri lau badu munyak dah amekes, ki-iu. Arile, taha katondrok bada taha kudu mwasin, ma kamekes kandriyen mwasin i buku none lau handru ta Kindrei, na len mari udu bolo munyak na bolo len dah.
To mari badeh, kandriyen tato ki le buku doh na len mari. Tasah, to abe-en lakou kameh eme, eme ma lakou doh kameh mesekei to sekesek ta aliy. Lakou to abe-en doh badeh, Jises Krais ta aseben taha, iy kameh eme, ma hawe lomadan tan. Iy badeh, Kindrei tataha, iy Kindrei boto-on labai, ma iy le badeh, mene sebenei taha ado bolo kandriyen ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in ame hamon.
Iy le badeh, atehei iy imek i saluwe taha ta akunoh taha ta lakou ndra-in taha amekes, ma sikinei taha amwenen mara-ei, ma mesekei taha asahan lau tan handru, ma mesekei taha anya kamekes kandriyen mwasin le.
Eme oro tanan mari doh badeh, ou leheya oro na len mari, ma ou batanau oro, ma aliu oro, are ba-en hamon ta aliy bwe, kame hamon. Ou amekes lakou mari doh, i buku none ou ndramak handru, ta anoh bwe. Ya iri sabudon anya, ou badeh ari ndramak laleyah, ndri-iy.
Ou tiye ki tiri lau ta Kindrei kare bahandra tondrok tiri lau ta atondrok iri, ma kanuhun boho iri. Ma oro lowosa oro kado le ta kamekes lahou mwasin le.
Oro saluhe ndra-in sala tiri lau, ma oro sasobobo. Arile, oro kaseken seken tiri lau ari ari kudu bwena ta budon toro. Ma oro kaleheya kandriyen ta satudun oro le ki ta lau mari.
Na len ndra-au bwena mene, taha ale i buku aliy. Taha badeh, bale taha bwe. Taha banuhun sahou bwe, ma taha atehei budon tataha i ta sahou wasai. Bolo manyah tataha badeh, ta amekes bada taha sekesek ta kandriyen ndra-in le. Eme taha mene amekes kandriyen ndra-in na len mari. Ma taha ale badeh, mada taha alikis ta lakou tiri lau, ya taha aseken. Ma idoh amekes budon tiri lau badeh, andra-i eme tataha, ma hawe amekes budon tataha andra-i i ta ndramak ari ari.
Arile, na len ta tikisiy ta Kindrei, ndramak ta aseben taha asahan kameh,
iy sebenei taha badeh, ba-en hamon ta kandriyen mwasin tataha mene bwe. Arile, na tikisiy tan le badeh, iy konohei taha, ma sikine taha asahan randrah labai, asahan lau tan na boto-on ta Malawin Ndrabun.
Eme jo katiye kaleu ki tado ta sahou jo asehek dah: Kindrei badeh, tiye Jises Krais, ndramak ta akohok to ado bolo kandriyen ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in ame hamon, ma suni Malawin Ndrabun eme la-u to. Eme ta katin doh, Kindrei le mesekei Malawin Ndrabun tan amekes lahou boto-on udu bolo to.
Ya eme, to badeh, kamekes budon ta to kirih ma kabadok, ta bolo manyah tato udu le buku doh hawe Kindrei. Ki buku none ari nah abe-en lakou mwasin badu mine taman. Tasah, na kandriyen ta tikisiy tan le badeh, mesekei to ado mwasin labai ta madan.
Eme sahou, jo tiye tam dah badeh, handru. Ou ales ya asehek sahou boto-on ki toro lau ala ndratehei budon toro handru ndra ta Kindrei badeh. Eme ma oro katehei budon toro ki ta amekes kandriyen mwasin. Eme ya leheya dah badeh, mwasin labai ta aseben lau mari.
Arile, ou badeh, teleya ou ta tebelese ta sahou laleyah ta sare iri Juwis. Ya, i buku none iri kandres ou ta kandriyen malen tiri Juwis, ou sala ta aliy. Tasah, iri sahou doh, ari moson ta aliy bwe, ma ba-en badan bwe.
I buku none are lau leheya tanan randrah labai bamwenen ta leheya handru bwe, ya aliu budon tiri lau iu i len, ou abarah iy kandru-uk ta leheya doh. Ya, i buku none iy amekes le kili badeh, ou abarah iy san rasan ja. Ya, i buku none iy banuhun bwe le, ou teleya iy.
Tasah, ou badeh, ndratanam ai, ndramak i buku doh ndratubuni konan ndra ta leheya handru. Ma iy amekes lakou ndra ndra-in le. Buku iy tanan lakou doh bamwenen bwe, arile iy amekes le ili, ma iy le kameh amekes iy udu bolo sahou ta Kindrei.
Jo kameh tiye ari turu lau ma la-uh doh awek akohok kon tam, Atemas deh Titikus kameh ewek hawem. Ya, i buku none ari turu asahan le badeh, jo aseken ou ame hawek ame kon tinan Nikopolis. Katin ta jo anya ou ame badeh, i buku doh: Tasah, jo ndratehei budon tek ta ili udu doh, na len ta jor ma ur.
Ya, i buku none ndramak ta tanan labai ta batanau nyaran Senas ma hawe Apolos, uru anya kado Krit ka-au badeh, ou aseben uru ta lakou mari uru aseken, ta aseben uru ta bolo tekedek turu.
Ma laba tinan ta aliy badeh, iri lau tataha ta Kindrei badu hawe to katanan ta kandriyen mwasin ta aseben ta lakou i buku none iri ado ndra-in ta bolo manyah tiri. Oro ka-en hamon ta kandriyen doh, ya oro samanyah laleyah.
Oro are lau ado hawek kada-ah tiye sahou sekesek toro ewek tam. Ma ou badeh, tiye sahou sekesek tek ki toro lau mari aseken aso ado Krit badeh. Ma oro atehei budon handru toro i le buku taso are kada-ah. Ya salom tek i ta Laban Jises Krais ta iy badeh, katehei tikisiy tan ki tado mari ado badeh.
Pilemon, jo Pol, jo atorou la-ukei ramen dah ewek tam. Ou badeh, kawas taso mwasin ma to amekes gok randra le. Jo badeh, udu bolo asiu lulik kada-ah, tasah jo atiye sahou mwasin ta Krais Jises ili tiri mwan ma badih. Timoti badeh, i buku nadu tine to, iy udu hawek kada-ah ale,
ma jo atorou la-ukei dah ewek tam, ma hawe buru-u to badih ari nyaran Apiya, ma hawe ndramak ari ta bahun tato nyaran Apikus, iy ta amekes lahou ta Krais i buku le to amekes. Ma ewek toro lau ta Kindrei ale atukum awek asiu tam ta atudun Laban.
Jo anya kasolom kili ta tama taha Kindrei, ma hawe Laban tataha Jises Krais, ta mondrei ma tikisiy turu mwasin kudu hawe aha na bolo len mari.
Len marakon jo asolom ili ta Kindrei tek, jo badeh, abudon ou ma aloh nyaram ta adeu wurah i ta Kindrei.
Tasah, jo anuhun iri lau rayah ta Kindrei asehek ou i buku doh, ou badeh, ndratehei ndrinem ndrala ta Laban Jises, ma ou ndratehei budon tam handru ndrala tan. Ma ou ale badeh, aso-ok iri lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei tinan labai.
Eme ma jo asolom ili ta Kindrei i buku doh: Udu bolo len ou tiye budon tam ma asehek ta lau rayah ta aliy, ma idoh kameh winiyan atehei tanan mwasin ewek tam, ma ou ale kameh winiyan atanam handru ta lakou mara-ei mwasin, taha marakon nane akohok badu mine Krais.
Ya, nadu tine, ou badeh, aso-ok labai iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, ta kandriyen ou amekes doh badeh, bwidi ndrine iri abadok. Eme ma jo sekesek tinan labai tiri kandriyen ou amekes, ma bwidi ndrinek amunum, udu le udu.
Jo abudon boto-on labai i tiri lakou nane, ou amekes i tiri, eme ma, iri budon doh udu tek. Jo aso-ok ou bwidi lakou tek ari. Ou badeh, nadu tinek handru i san ta Krais, ma jo winiyan asehek sahou boto-on ewek tam, ta ou a-en hamon ta bohok.
Arile bwai, jo bwalek amekes i buku doh. Tasah, kandriyen ta tikisiy badeh, turuki talu ma la-uh. Eme ma jo asehek amunum le ewek tam. Jo Pol, jo kawas tam handru, ma jo badeh, udu ndra bolo asiu lulik kada-ah kahis, tasah katin ta jo atiye sahou mwasin ta Krais Jises.
Eme ma, jo anya kasehek tam ki buku doh: Jo aso-ok ou tikisi Onesimus. Iy badeh, i buku naduk ari handru. Iy asahan naduk badeh, i buku doh: Jo udu bolo asiu lulik, jo leheya iy ta budon handru ta Kindrei. Ta idoh le, iy asahan naduk handru.
Bwena mene iy bamekes ari gok mwasin ta aseben ou bwe. Arile na dah ja, iy ndrasahan mwasin labai, ta aseben talu ma la-uh.
Ya, eme jo kameh suni iy ewek hamon ewek hawem ja, ma hawe ndrinek kameh udu hawen ewek.
Jo mene amekes gok ta atiye sahou mwasin, ma iri atehei jo ili bolo asiu lulik. Eme ma, jo bwetenei kandriyen mwasin ta Onesimus ja amekes udu bolo asiu lulik hawek, ya jo abudon ta iy kudu hawek kudu gwek, ma iy i nyara ou winiyan aseben jo udu dah.
Arile, jo bamekes bala buku doh bwe. Jo badeh, bwalek ta amekes ari lakou i tan, buku ou baso-ok ta aliy bwe. Eme ma, jo bwalek ta indrek iy. Jo kameh suni iy ewek hawem. Jo bwalek ta indrek ou boto-on labai ta ruwani iy kudu hawek dah ta aseben jo bwe. Jo aso-ok ou amekes kandriyen doh, na budon ma tanan tam amwenen.
Sebwe katin ta Onesimus mene ruwani ou luluwen sese badeh, ta ou kameh winiyan andrei iy ewek hamon ja, ma iy kameh winiyan udu hawem luluwen labai.
Arile, nadah kameh iy winiyan bado hawem ma asahan buku bonyo-ou ja bwai. Iy badeh, ndrasakalawi kandriyen doh. Ya, jo abudon iy nadu tinek handru, jo ma hawe ndrinek aso-ok iy tinan labai. Ya, ou winiyan abudon iy i buku bonyo-ou tam ma nadu tinem i san ta Laban ale, ma ndrinem mara-ei kaso-ok iy labai, i buku le jo mene aso-ok iy handru.
Ya, i buku ou abudon jo kawas tam handru ta lahou ta Krais, ou andrei Onesimus kewek hamon, ma ou amekes mwasin ki tan, buku le jo mene ewek hawem, ma ou amekes eme tek.
Ma ale, buku ndra mwena ndra-au, iy ndramesekei madam ndrandra-i, ta lakou tam iy andrei, ma iy batehei saluwen bawek hamon bwe, mwasin ta ou atehei lakou badeh, keme la-uk.
Jo Pol, jo atorou la-ukei dah na le minek amwenen. Ou anuhun! Jo le amwenen kameh atehei bundruwe iri lakou tan ili hamon. Handru, tasah bundruwe lakou tek udu hawem badeh, i buku doh: Idoh badeh, koham le amwenen, tasah jo aseben ou asahan lau ta Kindrei.
Ya, idoh handru. Eme ma ta nyara Laban, jo aseken ou amekes lakou badeh, keme tek. Talu ma la-uh ndrasahan lau ta Krais, ya ta kandriyen le doh, ou bwidi ndrinek sekesek labai.
Jo atehei budon tek boto-on handru, ta ou kameh a-en hamon ta sahou tek. Eme ma jo atorou la-ukei dah ewek tam. Ma jo ale ndratanan kandriyen ou amekes kameh udu bwele-en labai ja ta kandriyen nane jo ndratiye tam ta amekes, ma kameh asahan mwasin labai mara-ei.
Ya, sahou tek randra ja. Jo atehei budon tek handru in ta Kindrei, iy kameh winiyan anuhun salom tado, ma jo kameh ano ta asiu lulik, ma jo ewek asahan hawe ado ja. Eme ma, jo aso-ok ou lowosaniy sese bosoh badu bolo asiu tam, ta jo winiyan manyah udu hawem.
Ya, Epapras badeh, udu bolo kou hawek kada-ah ale. Iy anya, bada-an tan mwasin ewek tam. Ya, aru ma la-uh ado bolo asiu lulik kada-ah badeh, ta atiye sahou mwasin ta Krais Jises.
Ma hawe oro lau ta amekes lahou hawek ale, buku Mak, Aristakus, Demas hawe Luk, oro badeh, anya bada-an toro mwasin ewek tam ale.
Jo aso-ok tikisiy ma sekesek ta Laban Jises Krais badeh, kudu hawe malawi ado mari.
Bwena mene Kindrei asehek sahou ili ta tubu taha iri san solo-an, ma i san solo-an labai ili tiri propet.
Arile udu bolo len tataha hamon kada-ah, Kindrei asehek sahou eme tataha i san ta nadun ari le mwan. Kindrei leheyani nadun doh ta akohok iri lakou marakon. Na nadun le, iy bwidi lakou marakon asahan.
Nadun doh leheyani lomada sun tinan ta taman Kindrei, ma lomadan tinan labai eme tataha, ma konen mara-ei i buku le Kindrei amwenen. Sahou tan nyamun labai, ma tawi iri lakou marakon udu munyak ma kandrah. Iy ndrabwidi gok tan ndrano ta talou iri mwan ma badih ado ta kandriyen ndra-in, ame ta kandriyen mwasin. Ano iy ili manyah udu kandrah mine Kindrei salin, iy boto-on labai.
Iy udu bwele-en ja tiri angelo, i buku le Kindrei tondrohon nyaran udu bwele-en labai ja ta nyara iri.
Bwena mene Kindrei tiye i ta nadun i buku doh, “Ou naduk handru, Na dah jo ndrasahan tamam kabwe.” Kindrei basehek bala toro angelo tan bala buku doh bwe. Arile iy asehek nadun: “Jo kameh tamam, ma ou kameh naduk.”
Na len Kindrei anya katiye nadun ari le keme andri kon munyak, iy eme asehek: “Iri angelo ta Kindrei katehei bwili ndru-u iri ki andri kili tan.”
Iri angelo tan badeh, iy batehei budon tan mara-ei bala tiri bwe, i buku le buk ndrabun ndrasehek: “Kindrei bwidi iri angelo tan asahan i buku siyer laleyah, ma iri lau ta amekes lahou tan anya i buku jih nyarahan labai.”
Arile iy asehek ta nadun: “Tondrok tam, O Kindrei, ta udu le buku doh, winiyan bandra-i bwe! Ou tondrokei iri lau tam kado le tiri kandriyen mwasin.
Ou aso-ok kandriyen mwasin tinan labai, ou bwalem iri kandriyen ndra-in. Eme ma Kindrei tam amwenen ndranyahani ou ndrala loken labai, bwele-e oro lau tam mwasin. Ma iy mene solowei ndrelekei ta sekesek ndrawek bwele-em.”
Iy asehek ta nadun ale: “O Laban, ndra bwena mene ou bwidi kon munyak, ma, na minem amwenen ou bwidi kandrah ja.
Uru ma la-uh kameh amai laleyah. Arile, ou le ari kameh are le buku doh. Uru ma la-uh kameh i buku ra-ei kolau ili malen, ano atarah.
Ou kameh lukumwi uru i buku ou alokom kolau malen, ano ou atehei kolau ha-un ili turu, ma uru asahan randrah ja. Arile ou kameh areu le buku doh, ma jaha tam kameh udu luluwen labai.”
Kindrei winiyan basehek bala ta ari angelo tan bwe: “Ou ame manyah ado loboho minek salin, winiya jo le baratehei iri lau ta amekes budon ndra-in i tam barado bahandra katim.” Kindrei asehek sahou doh ili ta nadun amwenen.
Iri angelo badeh, malawi iri le, iri ta amekes gok ta Kindrei. Kindrei tiye iri ala ta aseben lau, ta akohok iri kame hamon ja.
Taha badeh, kanuhun kamwenen labai kili ta sahou handru, taha nane ndranuhun, ma taha samani sahou batanau doh labai.
Bwena mene Kindrei edeu sahou i ta tubu taha iri, eme boho iri angelo. Sahou batanau eme asahan handru ta lau ka-en hamon ta aliy. Are lau iy ba-en hamon ta aliy, o, banuhun bwe, iy kameh akohok maha-an ta kandriyen nane iy amekes.
Buku taha teleya lakou laba tinan ta akohok taha, taha katobwak barala buku sah handru? Laban ndrasehek nyala seben doh ma bwena ndrame tataha, eme iri lau nane anuhun sahou tan, ame asehek tataha ja, “Sahou doh ndra handru le.”
Kindrei ale eme leheya sahou tan badeh, boto-on na san ta amekes iri kalem ma iri lahou tinan. Ma iy ale andromwei ndramas ta Malawin Ndrabun ili tiri lau na le budon tan.
Taha kasehek ma katehei budon tataha kili ta munyak ha-un, Kindrei kameh amekes hamon. Iy batehei bala bahandra iri angelo tan bwe.
Arile taha ndratanan, iy kameh atehei taha mwan ma badih ta atondrok lakou marakon doh. In bolo buk ndrabun ndramak ari ndratiye: “Ahi saba lakou tam handru, ou atehei budon tam tinan labai eme tahi? Ya, nadu ahi saba lakou, eme ou atondrok iri ja?
Kindrei, ou bwidi ahi, ma ou atehei nyara ahi udu bahandra nyara iri angelo tam ta luluwen bwe. Arile na dah, ou ndramasiye ahi, ma tutuni ahi ala are bahandra lomada nyaram.
Ou atehei ahi are bwele-e iri lakou marakon ou ndrabwidiy. Ano ja ou atehei iri lakou marakon eme bahandra tondrok tahi.” Udu bolo iri sahou doh, Kindrei tiye, taha mwan ma badih katondrok iri lakou marakon doh. Taha ndratanan, iy asehek nyala iri lakou marakon nane doh ndrame bahandra tondrok tataha, eme ma ari lakou winiyan bare laleyah bwe. Arile, na len dah, taha banyolom ari tataha amwenen batondrok iri lakou marakon doh bwe.
Arile taha ndranyolom Jises, iy akohok boto-on tan. Bwena mene iy udu bahandra tondrok tiri angelo luluwen bwe, iy imek ta akohok kon ta lau marakon, ma tikisiy ta Kindrei kameh winiyan sebenei iri lau marakon. Jises bwese maha-an tataha tinan labai ma iy imek. Arile na dah, Kindrei ndrasuruni iy, ma ndratehei lomadan nyaran ndra tinan labai udu bwele-e iri lakou marakon.
Kindrei badeh, iy kati iri lakou marakon, tasah iy bwidi iri lakou marakon. Ma iy aso-ok ta akohok nadun iri kala hawen kakohok lomadan mwasin. Eme iy atehei budon in ta nadun ta kamekes iri gok ta akohok iri lau mwan ma badih kame hamon ja, iy eme atehei Jises eme akohok sisi-in tinan labai. Ta sisi-in doh le, ma iy atehei Jises udu bwena ta aseben iri lau mwan ma badih. Kindrei amekes iri kandriyen marakon doh amwenen le ai.
Taha tanan, Jises amekes iri lau mwan ma badih asahan lau ta Kindrei, ma iri lau nane iy ndrabwidi, iri a ndrabun. Iri marakon doh badeh, tama oro ari le, ma Jises eme aloh oro, nadu tinen, ma bwilin bama ta aloh oro bwe.
Taha ndratanan, iri sahou doh handru, tasah buk ndrabun mene ndrasehek: “Jo kameh tiye ta nadu tine oro ta lakou ou ndrabwidiy, jo kameh iyah wari ta atudun nyaram udu bolo tukum toro.”
Eme iy tiye ja: “Jo kameh atehei budon tek in ta kindrei.” Iy asehek i buku doh ale: “Idah jo hawe oro nah nane Kindrei atehei oro ndrame tek.”
Oro nah nane Jises asehek doh, oro lau mwan ma badih. Eme Jises asahan ndramak awas ma konen i buku le oro, iy kameh winiyan imek, ma iri kandriyen doh kameh winiyan sulumwi boto-on ta balik nane, amekes iri lau amak.
Iri mwan ma badih, iri nane anoh ta amak. Na len marakon iri ado kon munyak, nohonoh tiri doh ta amekes iri, buku iri ado bolo kowah lulik ta balik. Arile Jises imek ta talou iri ado bolo kowah lulik ame len.
Handru labai, Jises mene bamekes gok doh ta aseben iri angelo bwe, iy amekes gok doh ta aseben lundriye Abraham iri.
Kindrei ndrabwidi iy ndrasahan i buku le nadu tinen oro amwenen, ta iy kameh asahan tinan tiri pris toro. Iy asahan tinan tiri pris ta tikisi oro, ma iy in hamon tiri sahou marakon ta Kindrei ma iy amekes gok tan. Gok doh, ta akunoh ma ta mani kandriyen ndra-in ta lau marakon ano.
Iri lakou marakon doh ndrasahan tan, iy le ari eme badeh, akohok sisi-in ta aliy. Eme badeh, ma iy winiyan sebenei iri lau marakon, i buku lakou ndra-in anya kawendreya iri.
Ado nadu tine i san ta Jises, Kindrei udu kandrah kodo-oh iy aloh ado ale. Ado kabudon kamwenen kili le ta Jises, Kindrei tiye iy eme ta asahan aposel ma tinan tiri pris. Taha ale atehei budon in tan, ma asehek nyaran ili ta lau marakon.
Kindrei ndratehei gok doh ndrala tan, ma iy in hamon ta sahou handru ta Kindrei ta iri kandriyen i buku le ta Moses bwena mene amekes udu asiu ta Kindrei.
Moses batah asiu doh bwe, iy amwenen i buku asiu doh. Arile to atudun nyara ndramak ta atah asiu badeh, udu bwele-en labai ta asiu le amwenen. Eme ma Kindrei atehei nyara Jises i tinan labai ja ta nyara Moses.
Iri asiu marakon kede-eh lau atah. Arile Kindrei le ari bwidi iri lakou marakon.
Moses badeh, buku ndramak ta amekes lahou ta Kindrei, iy in hamon handru ta sahou ta Kindrei, ma iy amekes gok in asiu tan. Gok tan ta tiye iri lakou Kindrei asehek ta aliy kameh asahan hamon.
Arile Krais, iy Nadu Kindrei mwasin labai. Iy atondrok asiu ta Kindrei mara-ei. Taha mari badeh, asiu ta Kindrei, buku taha sanoh ta atehei budon tataha boto-on in tan, ma taha sawoyah ta atondrok iy. Badeh, taha lau tan handru.
Malawin Ndrabun asehek boho Kindrei i buku doh: “Buku aha anuhun bohok na dah,
aha satunuhun ja ai. Aha sala buku tubu aha iri Isra-el mene tebelese hawek, udu bolo len bwena jo none iri udu kon lomale an.
Iri ndranyolom boto-on handru ta gok marakon jo amekes udu bolo jaha ma hanoh, arile iri tunuhun ma none jo ja.
Eme ma bwidi jo ibolosen tinan labai ili tiri lau nane doh, ma jo asehek tiri, ‘Aha ba-en hamon tek bwe. Ma len marakon aha bwale aha an hamon ta tanan tek mwasin.’
Eme ma ndrinek ibolosen ma jo tandrakan iri, ‘Aha winiyan bala bolo kon tek ta amunyau bwe.’”
Aha nadu tine, aha katondrok aha kamwenen, kora-on nadu tine taha ari udu ndrokowa taha, budon ndra-in udu ndrinen, ma iy kamani budon tan mwasin, ma iy katubuni konan kili ta Kindrei, iy le ari kohan handru.
Na len dah Kindrei aloh “Na dah” kahis le. Iy isan len eme tataha ta anuhun sahou tan. Eme ma ta len marakon, taha kadeu sahou mwasin kili ta nadu tine taha mwan ma badih, ta amekes budon tiri kabadok. Tasah, kora-on taha ari ka-en hamon ta kandriyen ndra-in ta wasai, ma tebelese hawe Kindrei.
Ma bwena mene to atehei budon tato in ta Krais. Eme na dah, to katehei iri budon tato mari kihis handru kudu winiya le to baramak. Buku to amekes ili buku doh, idah kameh to akohok lomada Krais, ma to asahan kawas tan handru.
