Buk ndrabun nane asehek: “Buku aha anuhun bohok na dah, aha satunuhun bohok ja ai. Aha sala buku tubu aha iri bwena mene tebelese ma banuhun sahou tek bwe.”
Lau heh bwena mene anuhun boho Kindrei, eme iri tebelese ma banuhun bohon bwe? Idoh iri lau mwan ma badih marakon mene Moses andrei iri are Ijip ame len. Iri le adeh amekes iri kandriyen doh.
Kindrei ibolosen hawe lau heh mene udu bolo jaha ma hanoh (40)? Iy ibolosen ili tiri lau mwan ma badih marakon nane amekes kandriyen ndra-in are kon lomale an, ma iri amak.
Kindrei mene tandrakan ta lau rayah winiyan bala bolo kon ta amunyau tan bwe. Ya, iy tandrakan lau heh handru? Iri le lau mwan ma badih marakon mene banuhun sahou tan bwe.
Taha ndranyolom, iri mene bala bolo kon ta amunyau doh bwe. Tasah, iri batehei budon tiri mara-ei bala ta Kindrei bwe.
Tandrakan ta Kindrei ta atiye taha ala bolo kon ta amunyau udu aliy kahis. Eme ma taha kabudon kamwenen, kora-on Kindrei kanyolom ari tataha, iy winiyan bala bolo kon ta amunyau doh bwe.
Taha ndranuhun iri sahou mwasin, i buku le bwena mene iri Isra-el anuhun. Iri anuhun, arile baseben iri bwe, tasah iri batehei budon tiri mara-ei bala ta sahou nane iri anuhun bwe.
Idah, are lau iri atehei budon tiri mara-ei ndrala ta Kindrei, idah kameh iri winiyan ala bolo kon tan ta amunyau. Idoh mene Kindrei abudon ta lakou nane doh ma iy asehek: “Eme ndrinek ibolosen ma jo asehek, ‘Jo ndratandrakan loken handru, iri winiyan bala bolo kon tek ta amunyau doh bwe.’” Handru, Kindrei ndrabwidi gok tan ta amekes iri lakou marakon ndrano ndra bwena, arile iy tiye iri sahou doh, tasah iri lau batehei budon tiri bala tan bwe, eme ma iri winiyan bala bolo kon tan ta amunyau bwe.
Udu bolo buk ndrabun asehek nyala len ma ndro taloh i buku doh: “Udu bada len ma ndro taloh doh Kindrei amunyau, tasah iy ndrabwidi gok tan marakon ndrano.”
Buku sahou le nane doh iy asehek ja: “Iri winiyan bala bolo kon tek ta amunyau doh bwe.”
Idoh ta leheya taha. Iri lau ma bwena mene anuhun sahou mwasin, arile iri bandrei amunyau doh bwe, tasah iri batehei budon tiri bala tan bwe. Arile, na dah, lau winiyan akohok amunyau doh kahis.
Iri winiyan akohok, tasah Kindrei ndratehei len tan ari ja, ta taha mwan ma badih winiyan ala bolo amunyau tan. Kindrei luhi nyara len doh “Na dah” ja. Bwena mene Kindrei tiye iri Isra-el, eme ma Debit torowenei ili bolo buk ndrabun: “Buku aha anuhun bohok na dah, aha satunuhun bohok ja ai.”
Buku bwena mene Josuwa katehei amunyau kili tiri ta udu le buku doh, idah kameh Kindrei winiyan batiye ta ari len hamon ja bwe.
Taha lau ta Kindrei ndratanan, len ta Kindrei ta amunyau udu kede-eh kahis. Amunyau doh i buku le Kindrei amunyau udu bada len ma ndro taloh.
Taha ndratanan, are lau anya ki bolo amunyau ta Kindrei, badeh, iy kamunyau ta gok tan amwenen o. Idoh i buku le Kindrei bwena mene amunyau ta gok tan.
Taha kabadok ta akohok amunyau doh. Kora-on ari mwan o badih in hamon ta kandriyen ta tebelese boho Kindrei, i buku le iri Isra-el bwena mene amekes, ma iri taku.
Sahou ta Kindrei doh badeh, kohan udu aliy, iy amekes gok boto-on labai. Iy madan labai ja ta samen ari, madan la-uh iri aloh bainat. Sahou doh iy winiyan orowei ili bolo oda ndramak amai iu ili alih. Iy winiyan seleyani kohan uru malawin. Ma iy seleyani bolo ndruwin ma bolo bwisi bar ale. Iy ndraseleyani mwasin ma ndra-in tiri budon ma iri so-ok ta ndrine taha marakon ere le lewan.
Iri lakou marakon Kindrei mesekei, ari winiyan bamai ta madan bwe. Iri lakou marakon ere le lewan, ma udu kon lewan labai ta madan. Ma iy le ari kameh winiyan anyolom iri kandriyen taha amekes, ma taha kanyowonya marakon ki tan.
Tinan tiri pris tataha badeh, in aliy. Nyaran Jises, iy Nadu Kindrei. Iy ndra-au ndrala kandrah hawen. Eme ma taha katawi iri budon marakon nane taha ndrasehek ndrala tiri lau badeh, kihis mara-ei.
Tasah, nyamu taha amwenen winiyan batisih iri kandriyen ndra-in iu bwe. Arile tinan tiri pris tataha amwenen doh, iy le ari winiyan tikisi taha. Tasah, iri maha-an asahan tataha, badeh, mene ndrasahan tan ta none iy ale. Arile iy bamekes ari kandriyen ndra-in bwe.
Taha sanoh ta ala mirihik ta koyeu ta Kindrei, iy ndrinen mwasin ma iy ta tikisiy. Iy winiyan aseben taha, buku maha-an tataha tinan labai, ndrinen mwasin ma tikisiy tan kameh winiyan sebenei taha.
Kandriyen ta adeu ndramak asahan tinan tiri pris i buku doh: Kindrei le badeh, akohok ndramak badu ndrokowa iri lau, ma atehei iy ta aseben iri lau ta ndrokowa lau hawe Kindrei. Iy i saluwe iri lau mwan ma badih, ma iy edeu ndramas i ta Kindrei, ma edeu salom ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in tiri iu.
Iy tanan, iy nyamun bwe, ma iy winiyan bamekes iri lakou solo-an bwe. Eme ma iy amekes amunum le ili tiri lau tana iri lakou bwe, ma ta iri lau ndramani san mwasin ta Kindrei.
Ma iy ale ta amekes iri salom ta talou kandriyen ndra-in tan amwenen, ma hawe tiri lau mwan ma badih, tasah iy nyamun bwe, ma iy ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in ale.
Ndramak asahan tinan tiri pris, nyaran ndra tinan kabwe, ma ari ndramak winiyan bakohok gok doh na so-ok tan amwenen bwe. Kindrei kameh aloh iy bwena, ano iy barakohok gok nane doh, i buku le mwena mene Kindrei aloh Aron.
Ma Krais ale i buku aliy. Iy batudun nyaran ta asahan tinan tiri pris bwe. Kindrei le atehei iy ili aliy ta amekes iri gok doh. Kindrei eme tiye i tan: “Ou naduk handru, Na dah jo ndrasahan tamam kabwe.”
Ndrado bolo buk ndrabun sese kede-eh Kindrei tiye i buku doh: “Ou kameh asahan pris ta udu le buku doh, in hamon ta gok ta pris ari mene nyaran Melkisedek.”
Len ta Jises mwena mene iy edek udu ndra kon munyak, iy amekes iri salom ma iy asolom ili ta Kindrei. Iy tanan idah kameh Kindrei winiyan aseben iy ta iy winiyan bamak bwe. Eme ma iy asolom ma eden boto-on labai ili tan. Iy anuhun ndrelen ta nadun, tasah iy atehei iy mara-ei iu ili andri labai.
Jises badeh, Nadu Kindrei, arile iy bwese isi tinan labai. Ta san le doh, ma iy i tanan kandriyen handru ta in hamon ta sahou ta taman.
Ma idoh bwidi iy asahan ndramak handru ta in hamon ta sahou ta Kindrei. Eme ma iy asahan kati kandriyen handru ta aseben ma ta akohok are lau iy in hamon ta sahou tan, ta iri kameh are le buku doh.
Eme ma Kindrei atehei iy asahan tinan tiri pris, ma iy asehek i buku doh, “Ou kameh asahan tinan tiri pris in hamon ta gok ta pris ari mene nyaran Melkisedek.”
Sahou solo-an labai ta nyala lakou dah, arile boto-on labai ja ta leheya aha, tasah aha winiyan bakohok bolo sahou dah suwi bwe.
Aha akohok tanan badeh, luluwen labai, eme ma Kindrei aso-ok aha kaleheya iri rayah ja ta sahou tan. Arile aha winiyan bwe, aha aso-ok ari ndramak kudu ndra hawe aha kaleheya aha ta sahou handru ta Kindrei mara-ei kili hamon ja. Akohok kon ta nyamon boto-on, aha aso-ok ta a-un sur kahis.
Are lau ere ndra ta sur badeh, iy ma nyandren kahis. Eme ma iy winiyan baseleyani iri kandriyen mwasin ma ndra-in bwe.
Nyamon boto-on badeh, tiri lau ndra tinan ndra-en. Iri lau doh badeh, iri ndranone ma iri ndratanan mwasin labai ta seleya iri kandriyen mwasin ma ndra-in, iri ndratanan ma budon tiri mara-ei ndraleu.
Ta idoh, taha sasehek ja ta iri leheya mwasin taha ndrakohok ma bwena mene ta nyala Krais. Arile, na dah taha kala ta leheya tiri lau-en le ai. Taha sala hamon ja tiri lakou mene taha ndrakohok tanan tiri. Iri lakou doh: ta mani kandriyen ndra-in ili san ta imek; ma ta atehei budon in ta Kindrei;
ta leheya san ta anyu; ma ta adeu mine ndramak ili bwele-en; ta amak ame awas ja ta imek; ma len ta sahou winiyan bano bwe. Iri lakou marakon doh mwasin, ta lau kakohok tanan ta aliy op. Arile, tanan doh i buku ndru ta asiu taha ahiy bwena udu aliy. Na idah ja, taha atah asiu handru ili bwele-e iri ndru nane udu aliy bwena, eme ma taha kala le ta tanan tiri lau-en ai. Taha sala hamon ja.
Taha kala le bwena. Taha winiyan, i buku Kindrei aso-ok.
Iri lau mwan ma badih rayah mene ndrandrei tanan handru ta sahou ta Jises Krais. Eme ma iri ndratehei Jises le ari badeh, udu budon tiri, ma iri ndranone ndramas ta Malawin Ndrabun badu kandrah.
Iri ndratanan sahou ta Kindrei mwasin ma boto-on labai, ma iri ndratona ta boto-on ta Kindrei kameh asahan tiri mwan ma badih.
Buku oro taku, ma atehei kona oro ili ta Kindrei, ari madasan ta akohok oro ame hamon ame len ta iri kandriyen ndra-in ja bwe. Ta kandriyen toro le doh, oro tatahi Nadu Kindrei ja ili bada kei tondreh, ma oro abolei iy udu mada iri lau marakon.
Ur undruk eme bwele-e munyak ma edeu gwa i ta munyak, ma munyak doh ato-ou nyamon mwasin ta aseben iri lau nane atah bilin ili aliy. Eme ma munyak akohok nyosowan mwasin ta Kindrei.
Arile, i buku bada malou bobodon ma bwidiu ndra-in ateh, idoh leheya munyak ndra-in. Mirihik kameh Kindrei asehek sahou boto-on ili ta munyak, ano, ma jih kameh sulumwi marakon andrakak ano iu.
Aha kawas tek handru, ahi asehek sahou boto-on dah ewek taha. Arile, ahi ndratanan aha kameh winiyan bakohok ndra-in bwe. Tasah, Kindrei aseben aha ma iy andrei aha ame hamon.
Aha tanan, Kindrei mwasin labai, iy ndra-in bwe. Iy kameh winiyan bamani gok aha amekes bwe. Aha suri aha ta aseben iri lau mwan ma badih tan, ma aha bamunyau se bwe. Idoh leheya, aha aso-ok Kindrei labai, eme ma iy winiyan bamani kandriyen doh bwe.
Budon tahi tinan labai ta aso-ok aha marakon kamekes gok boto-on ki buku le doh, winiya le len hamon. Buku aha amekes iri lakou i buku doh, saba lakou aha nane abe-en, kameh asahan handru.
Ahi baso-ok aha asahan gwaman bwe, arile ahi aso-ok aha ka buku le iri lau atehei budon tiri in tan, ma atondrok iy. Iy are lau iy amekes i buku doh, iy kameh akohok lakou Kindrei ndratandrakan ta aliy.
Bwena mene Kindrei tandrakan, iy anya kedeu lakou kili ta Abraham. Iy eme amekes sahou handru in hamon ta tandrakan tan. Iy tandrakan ta nyaran amwenen, tasah nyara ari kindrei ja bare bwele-e nyaran ja bwe.
Iy eme tandrakan Abraham i buku doh: “Jo kameh nyosowani ou, ma amekes lundriyem oro kameh asahan nyaran bwe.”
Abraham tondrokei udu le, ano iy andrei iri lakou nane Kindrei tandrakan ta edeu ili tan.
Buku ari ndramak asehek sahou kili handru, iy kameh aloh nyara ari tubun oro lau-en. Sahou tandrakan tan nane winiyan bwidi sahou tan abadok, ma iri lau winiyan basehek ja bwe.
Bwena mene Kindrei amekes tandrakan ta iy kameh amekes mwasin eme tataha nadu tubu Abraham. Iy eme leheyani taha amwenen labai, ta iy winiyan batubuni budon tan bwe, eme ma iy tandrakan ili loken handru labai ta amekes sahou tan abadok ma ili handru.
Sahou ma tandrakan, lakou ma la-uh doh winiyan batubuniy bwe, ma Kindrei ale winiyan bawendreya bwe. Ya, lakou ma la-uh doh bwidi ndrine taha abadok ta sakaliye ala hawe Kindrei ta aton are bahandra tondrok tan. Eme ma taha katawiy kihis kudu budon tataha, iri lakou nane iy ndratandrakan ta edeu eme tataha.
Taha ndratanan, iri lakou nane taha atondrok doh, handru, i buku le hanai ta koha taha. Hanai o sahou tandrakan ta ateu taha ahis hawe Kindrei, i buku le bwena mene tinan tiri pris le ili kona kolau laba tinan, iri talahaniy udu bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, iu ili alih handru bolo asiu ndrok ndrabun ndrabun labai ta mada Kindrei.
Ta akohok kon tataha, Jises ndrala mwena tataha ndrala bolo asiu ndrok doh. Eme ma iy ndrasahan tinan tiri pris ta udu le buku doh, in hamon ta gok ta pris ari mene nyaran Melkisedek.
Melkisedek doh iy kabin badu Salem, ma iy ale badeh, pris ta Kindrei in loken labai. Abraham idi oro kabin rayah, eme ma bahun ano, iy eme edek anya keme hamon keme kon, Melkisedek edek eme ndruni iy in san, eme ma iy nyosowani Abraham.
Eme ma, Abraham apwai iri lakou nane iy akohok ta bahun i ronoh, ronoh, ano iy edeu ari, ari badu bolo ronoh doh i ta Melkisedek. (Moson ta nyara Melkisedek badeh, “Kabin mwasin labai.” Iri aloh iy ale “Kabin badu Salem.” Moson ta nyaran doh, “Kabin ta mondrei.”)
Melkisedek iy ari taman ma tinen bwe, iy ari tubun bwe ale, ari len ta tinen edeu iy bwe, o ari len ta iy imek bwe le. Iy ari saren bwe. Eme ma gok tan ta pris kameh ta udu le buku doh, i buku Nadu Kindrei.
Taha kanyolom Melkisedek se, nyaran kabin labai. Nyaran ja udu bwele-en ta tubu taha Abraham. Tasah, tubu taha Abraham ndrapwai iri lakou tan ta bahun i ronoh, ronoh, ano iy edeu ari, ari badu bolo ronoh doh ndrala ta Melkisedek.
Lundriye Libai iri le badeh, winiyan amekes iri gok ta pris. Kandriyen malen ta Moses asehek i buku doh, lundriye Libai iri badeh, kakohok ari, ari badu bolo ronoh ta lakou tiri lau badu Isra-el. Handru, iri Libai badu hawe iri Isra-el, ma iri mari badeh lundriye Abraham. Arile Kindrei anya, iri Libai kede-eh kakohok lakou nane ta nadu tine iri rayah ja.
Melkisedek badeh, badu boho kamen ta Libai iri bwe. Arile iy ndrakohok lakou rayah ta Abraham. Eme Melkisedek nyosowani Abraham, iy ndramak nane tandrakan ta Kindrei udu bwele-en.
Taha ndratanan ndramwenen, i buku ndramak boto-on ta edeu nyosowan ili ta ndramak ari ja, iy doh iy kabin. Ndramak nane akohok nyosowan, iy doh udu bahandran ja.
Iri Libai badeh, akohok lakou ranah tiri Isra-el, arile udu, iri Libai amak. Arile Melkisedek doh iy akohok lakou, arile iy bamak bwe. Iy udu le buku doh, i buku le buk ndrabun asehek.
Taha winiyan asehek i buku doh: Lundriye Libai iri adeu lakou ili ta Melkisedek in bwele-e tubu iri Abraham.
Libai basahan bwe le badeh, Melkisedek ndruni Abraham udu san, arile iy udu ndra bolo oda tubun Abraham kahis, udu bada len Abraham edeu iri lakou rayah ili ta Melkisedek. Eme ma idoh leheya taha ta Melkisedek badeh, pris randrah labai ja, ma iy udu bwele-en labai ja tiri pris badu boho kamen ta Libai.
Mwena mene iri lau mwan ma badih badu Isra-el akohok kandriyen malen ta Moses. Kandriyen malen nane asehek i buku doh: Iri lau badu boho kamen ta Libai le badeh, kamekes gok ta pris. Arile, i buku gok tiri pris badu boho kamen ta Libai winiyan bwidi iri lau mwan ma badih asahan mwasin labai, i buku sah handru Kindrei asehek ta pris ari ja kameh asahan hamon? I buku sah handru pris doh kameh i buku le Melkisedek? I buku sah iy winiyan bala buku Aron bwe?
Arile kandriyen malen ta Moses nane doh winiyan basebenei iri mwan ma badih asahan mwasin ta budon ta Kindrei bwe. Eme ma Kindrei atehei pris ari ja, iy i randrah labai, ta akohok kon ta pris bwena. I buku Kindrei akohok pris ari ja, kandriyen malen ta Moses nane doh ale kameh i randrah labai ja.
Iy ndramak nane Kindrei asehek iy kameh asahan pris, badeh, badu boho kamen ari ja. Oro ari badu boho kamen nane doh bamekes se gok ta mada koto-ok bwena i buku pris bwe.
Taha ndratanan ai, Laban tataha badeh, iy asahan boho kamen ta Juda. Eme Moses mene basehek se sare boho kamen nane doh kameh iri asahan pris bo-oh.
Handru, iri pris badu boho kamen ta Libai winiyan basebenei mwan ma badih asahan mwasin ta mada Kindrei bwe. Kati sahou dah aleu mara-ei labai, buku taha abudon ta pris ari nane doh kameh asahan i buku le Melkisedek.
Iri Libai asahan pris, tasah kandriyen tiri malen asehek i buku aliy. Arile, ndramak asahan pris i buku le Melkisedek, nyamu kohan badeh, boto-on labai udu le buku doh, eme bwidi iy asahan pris.
Kindrei asehek i tan i buku doh: “Ou kameh asahan pris ta udu le buku doh, in hamon ta gok ta pris ari mene nyaran Melkisedek.”
Sahou dah leheya taha i buku doh: Kindrei ndrakahei kandriyen malen ta Moses bwena mene ndra-au, tasah kandriyen malen doh winiyan basebenei taha bwe.
Iy babwidi ari lakou basahan bala mwasin bwe. Eme ma Kindrei sihi madasan rasan ja, idoh udu mwasin ja ta kandriyen malen. Taha atondrok madasan doh, eme ta madasan le doh, taha kameh winiyan ala mirihik ta Kindrei.
Na len Kindrei atehei ndramak nane asahan pris i buku le Melkisedek, iy batehei iy bala laleyah bwe. Iy asehek sahou badu loken handru ano iy atehei iy ili aliy. Iri pris bwena bala buku aliy bwe.
Eme Kindrei le tandrakan, ano iy atehei Jises asahan pris. Udu bolo buk ndrabun ta Kindrei asehek i buku doh: “Laban ndratandrakan, ‘Ou kameh asahan pris ta udu le buku doh,’ eme iy winiyan batubuni budon tan ja bwe.”
Tasah ta idoh, taha winiyan atanan, sahou randra le Jises ndratawiy ndrahis, idoh mwasin labai. Iy udu bwele-en ja ta sahou randra le ta Moses bwena mene. Tasah, Jises amwenen kameh atondrok sahou randra le ha-un nane doh.
Mwena mene iri lau solo-an asahan pris, tasah iri amak, eme ma pris rayah ja akohok kon tiri nane ndramak.
Arile Jises iy ta udu le buku doh, eme gok tan i buku pris, ari ndramak ja winiyan bakohok ndrahunen bwe.
Eme ma, are lau iri ndrala mirihik ta Kindrei badeh, an le bwele-e boto-on ta nyara Jises, iy winiyan sebenei koha iri ta udu le buku doh. Tasah kohan badeh, ta udu le buku doh, ma bolo len mari iy asolom i ta Kindrei ta aseben iri.
Jises doh, iy tinan tiri pris. Iy le ari winiyan sebenei taha. Iy ndrabun labai; iy ari budon ndra-in bwe; ma iy ndra nyikilikin labai ta mada Kindrei. Eme Kindrei atehei iy udu len labai ja tiri lau ta amekes iri kandriyen ndra-in. Ma iy andrei iy iu ili loken ili kandrah, ma atehei nyaran ndra tinan labai.
Len ari buku ari, gok tiri pris rayah ta adi iri lakou buku bulumakau i ta salom. Ma bwena badeh, iri amekes salom ta ruwani kandriyen ndra-in tiri amwenen iu. Ano ja, iri amekes salom ta ruwani kandriyen ndra-in tiri lau mwan ma iri badih marakon. Arile Jises bamekes bala buku iri amekes doh bwe. Iy amekes salom badeh, san rasan le, iy atehei kohan le amwenen ili ta Kindrei.
Kandriyen malen ta Moses ta akohok ndramak asahan tinan tiri pris, iri akohok ndramak nyamun bwe, ma iy ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in. Arile sahou ma tandrakan ta Kindrei badeh, asahan hamon labai ta kandriyen malen ta Moses. Eme ma sahou nane doh, atehei nadun asahan tinan tiri pris handru. Iri gok mari Kindrei aso-ok iy kamekes, iy bwidi marakon ndrano, ma ndra mwasin le ai.
Eme ta kati sahou nane dah, taha ndrasehek i buku doh: Tinan tiri pris tataha udu aliy, eme iy ndrala ndramanyah udu loboho limen salin ta koyeu ta kabin badu kandrah.
Iy amekes gok i buku tinan tiri pris udu bolo asiu ndrok ta Kindrei udu kandrah, asiu handru ta Kindrei. Asiu doh, iri lau batutuniy bwe, Laban le ari tutuniy.
Iri tinan tiri pris marakon badeh, gok tiri ta atiye ndramas, ma ta adi iri lakou buku bulumakau i ta salom ili ta Kindrei. Eme ma Jises kamekes iri lakou doh ale.
Buku iy kudu kon munyak dah, iy winiyan basahan pris bwe. Tasah iri pris ado aliy bwena, iri ndradeu ndramas solo-an labai ndrala ta Kindrei, i buku le kandriyen malen ndrasehek.
Gok tiri pris mene iri amekes in hamon ta koroha malawin le; lakou handru udu kandrah. Idoh i buku le bwena mene Moses alokou ta atah asiu balei le badeh, Kindrei batanau iy i buku doh: “Ou an hamon le ta koroha malawi tarou mene jo leheya i tam udu bwele-e mandrei.”
Arile idah, Jises ndrateu gok i buku pris udu bwele-en labai tiri rayah ja. Tasah, iy ndrala buku ndramak ta ere le alih ta sahou randra le ha-un, nane Kindrei amekes hawe iri lau. Sahou randra le ha-un ja doh ere bwele-en labai ja ta sahou randra le bwena mene Kindrei edeu i ta Moses. Tasah, iri lakou mwasin asahan ta sahou tandrakan ha-un badeh, udu bwele-en labai ja tiri lakou mene asahan ta sahou tandrakan malen.
I buku sahou randra le mwena kudu mwasin, idah nane Kindrei winiyan bamekes ari ja bwe.
Arile Kindrei ndrasilahei ndra-in tiri lau tan amwenen, eme ma iy asehek: “Jo Laban asehek, len eme kameh, jo amekes sahou randra le ha-un hawe iri lau badu Isra-el ma iri Juda.
Idah kameh winiyan bala buku sahou randra le mene jo amekes hawe tubu iri mwena mene bwe. Eme jo tawi mine iri, ma sirini iri ado bolo kon Ijip ame len, arile iri ba-en hamon ta sahou randra le jo mene asehek hawe iri bwe, eme ma jo winiyan banuhun iri ja bwai.
Jo Laban, jo kameh asehek sahou randra le dah hawe iri lau badu Isra-el na len eme: Jo kameh atehei kandriyen tek ili bolo budon tiri, ano kameh jo torowenei iri sahou tek udu bwele-e ade iri. Jo kameh asahan Kindrei tiri, eme iri kameh asahan iri lau mwan ma badih tek.
Udu bolo len doh kameh ari ndramak winiyan baleheya ari nadu tinen bwe, o ari ndramak winiyan basehek sahou hawe lowan bwe, anya, ‘Aha katanan Laban.’ Tasah, bolo len doh kameh lau marakon atanan jo, udu ndra bada iri nadu bwisik ili ano tiri lau alon.
Jo kameh mani kandriyen ndra-in tiri, ma jo winiyan babudon kandriyen ndra-in tiri ja bwe.”
Kindrei tiye ta sahou randra le “ha-un.” Eme ma, ta sahou doh, iy bwidi sahou randra le ari mene, eme ndra malen. Ma lakou asahan malen ma amu-uk, kameh udu sese, ano ma iu mara-ei.
Sahou randra le ma bwena mene badeh, iri kandriyen ta atudun nyaran udu aliy, eme ma iri bwidi ndrahune lau ta atudun nyaran, na mine iri amwenen.
Iri tutuni asiu balei i loken, iri apwai bolon ili la-uh na kolau tinan. No-on ranah ili manan doh iri aloh kon ndrabun. Udu bolon badeh, lakou ari ta ndrahune sun ere aliy, ma sau hawe jabi ramen ta adeu salom i ta Kindrei.
Bolon udu alih hamon ta kolau tinan nane doh iri aloh ndrok ndrabun ndrabun labai ta mada Kindrei.
Udu bolo asiu hamon nane doh iri atehei mada koto-ok ta asun lakou manahu buburen, hawe bwisi sahou randra le iri bwidiy na kei, ano iri tubuluhiy na bek nyikilikin. Udu bolo bwisi sahou randra le doh badeh, sabok iri amekes na bek nyikilikin udu aliy, ma bolo sabok doh, nyamon iri aloh mana udu bolon. Bolo bwisi sahou randra le doh ale kandro ta Aron nyabun ma sisinen ateh ja ere aliy, hawe bek malahan ma lusi, Kindrei torowenei sahou randra le ta batanau ma ronoh udu aliy.
Udu bwele-e bwisi lakou nane doh, iri bwidi lakou la-uh, kone uru buku angelo. Uru doh leheya lomada Kindrei i buku iy udu bwele-e bwisi lakou doh. Udu bahandra koroha bani uru, kon ta leheya tikisiy ta Kindrei udu aliy. Kon doh ta toboroya ndra ta mani kandriyen ndra-in tiri lau iu. Arile, na dah, jo winiyan basihidi kati iri sahou marakon doh bwai.
Iri bwidi lakou marakon udu ndrahune iri ano. Len marakon, iri pris ala bolo asiu ranah ili manan, iri aloh kon ndrabun, ta amekes gok ta atudun Kindrei.
Arile, tinan tiri pris le winiyan ili bolo asiu ndrok ndrabun ndrabun labai nane doh. Buku iy babwese ndraye bulumakau o sipsip bwe, iy winiyan bala bolo asiu ndrabun doh bwe. Iy ili bolon san rasan le ta bolo jaha ari, ma ndra udu minen ta salom tan amwenen, ma ta salom tiri lau nane amekes kandriyen ndra-in, arile iri bala tanan ta idoh kandriyen ndra-in bwe.
Ta kandriyen doh, eme ma Malawin Ndrabun leheya taha i buku doh: Buku asiu balei bwena mene ales kahis, ma amekes gok udu aliy kahis le, san nane ta ala mada Kindrei ta ala bolo asiu ndrabun handru doh badeh, basak bwe le.
Lakou mene asahan bolo asiu ndrok ndrabun ndrabun labai, idoh leheya sahou sokek, na idah eme tataha. Udu bolo asiu ta Kindrei doh, iri pris adeu iri ndramas solo-an ili ta Kindrei, ma iri ale adeu salom solo-an ili tan. Arile, iri lakou doh winiyan babwidi ndrine iri o budon tiri lau ta atudun Kindrei bwe. Eme ma iri winiyan baruwani maha-an mene iri atona ta iri kandriyen ndra-in iri amekes bwena bwe.
Tasah iri ndramas ma salom solo-an doh, ta nyamon, ta gwa ta a-un, ma iri lakou solo-an ta anyu. Iri kandriyen doh ta bada lau le, ta iri ka-en hamon ta aliy, winiya le len ta Kindrei kameh baramekes iri lakou marakon amwenen ma i ha-un ja.
Arile Krais ndrame ndrasahan tinan tiri pris ta iri lakou mwasin nane ndrame tataha. Iy ili bolo asiu balei handru ta Kindrei udu kandrah. Asiu balei doh ja, mwasin labai ta asiu balei tiri mwena. Asiu balei badu kandrah nane doh, iri lau bamekes na mine iri bwe, tasah iy badu kon munyak dah bwe.
Iy ili bolon alih nane ndrabun ndrabun labai en, iy bakohok ndraye ari me ma bulumakau ta adeu salom i ta Kindrei, bwe. Iy amekes salom badeh, san rasan le, iy atehei kohan ma ndrayen amwenen ili ta Kindrei. Kohan ma ndrayen doh winiyan bano bwe, eme ma, iy winiyan sebenei taha ta udu le buku doh.
Ndraye iri me ma bulumakau mwan, ma hawe koloweh ta nadu bulumakau badih nane iri ndrasulumwiy ndrandrakak, iri ame toboroya koloweh hawe ndra doh ili bwele-e iri lau nane basikine ndraka-an tiri ba-au bwe. Iri amekes i buku doh ta bada iri le kameh asahan ndrabun, ma ari ndraka-an bwe.
Arile, ndraye Krais doh udu bwele-en labai ja, ta ndraye me ma bulumakau. Iy atehei kohan mara-ei amwenen ili ta Kindrei i nyara salom. Eme ma ndrayen doh basikine ndraka-an ta bada taha le bwe, iy sikine taha mara-ei handru, ma ndrine taha batona maha-an ja ta iri ndra-in mwena mene taha amekes, bwe. Ma iy tolowei iri kandriyen solo-an, taha amekes laleyah, ari kohan handru amwenen bwe. Eme ma taha katawiy kihis gok ta Kindrei doh, kohan handru udu aliy. Tasah, Krais ari ndra-in bare tan bwe. Bwe labai. Ma na boto-on ta Malawin Mwasin, iy amekes gok doh kameh ta udu le buku doh.
Ta katin le doh, Jises ere le alih ta amekes sahou randra le ha-un doh abadok. Iy ndramak ta akunoh taha lau ame hamon ja, ma tolowei iri ndra-in marakon iri mene amekes mwena udu ndra bada sahou randra le ma bwena mene udu aliy kahis. Iy amekes tiri le lau nane Kindrei aloh iri, ta iri winiyan an hamon tan, ma ta iri winiyan akohok kohan doh mwena mene Kindrei tiye ta edeu ili ta nadun iri, ma ta iri kameh are mwasin ta udu le buku doh.
Buku ari ndramak iy tanan iy kameh imek, ma iy tiye ta are lau le winiyan akohok iri lokowan, iy luhi o torowenei nyara iri ma saba lakou handru iri akohok. Idoh i buku sahou randra le. Udu hamon ja, buku nadun anya ki-in hamon ta sahou randra le, ta akohok iri lakou ta taman, iri lau badeh katana iri mwena ta taman ndramak. Ano iy barakohok.
Tasah, sahou randra le taman asehek doh, iy udu ndra loken iy bamak bwe le, idoh sahou handru, arile lau ba-en hamon ta aliy bwe le. Udu winiya ndramak imek labai, iri bara-en hamon ta aliy ai.
Eme ta idoh le, kandriyen malen ta Moses mwena mene iri adai me o bulumakau, ano asolou ndrayen ta amekes sahou randra le tiri kabadok.
Moses asehek iri sahou batanau, ma kandriyen malen ili tiri lau, ano iy andrei ndraye nadu bulumakau ma me, hawe gwa, ma lami sipsip saraman bawei i bada andra kei ari iri aloh hisop. Iy eme tahiy ili bolo ndra, ano iy toboroya ili bwele-e buk ndrabun ta kandriyen malen, ma ili bwele-e iri lau.
Iy asehek i buku doh, “Ndra dah ta sahou tandrakan randra le ta Kindrei, iy batanau ta aha ka-en hamon ta aliy.”
I buku le ma mwena mene, Moses toboroya ndra ili bwele-e asiu balei ta Kindrei, ma ili bwele-e iri lakou marakon nane iri akohok ta atudun nyara Kindrei na aliy.
Lakou marakon doh handru. Udu bahandra kandriyen malen tiri bwena, mirihik iri lakou marakon badeh, ndra le sikine iri. Eme ma kandriyen ndra-in tataha kameh Kindrei maniy. Buku ndraye iri bulumakau o me bamou bwe, Kindrei winiyan batalou kandriyen ndra-in tiri lau iu bwe.
Iri lakou marakon udu bolo asiu balei ta Kindrei, idoh malawi le iri lakou marakon in kandrah, ma taha tanan, ndraye bulumakau ma me le sikine iri lakou doh. Arile iri lakou badu kandrah ja sakalawi iri lakou marakon badu munyak. Eme ma, kandriyen ta sikine lakou badu kandrah, udu bwele-en labai ja ta kon munyak.
Krais bala bolo asiu ndrabun nane lau atah na mine iri amwenen bwe, idoh malawi le asiu ndrabun handru ta Kindrei udu kandrah. Iy iu ili bolo kandrah amwenen. Iy ndrala mirihik hawe Kindrei, iy asehek taha i tan ma iy amekes gok ta aseben taha ale.
Tinan tiri pris ili bolo asiu ndrok ndrabun ndrabun labai ta bolo jaha marakon. Iy bakohok ndrayen amwenen bwe, iy ili hawe ndraye iri me o bulumakau. Pris doh edeu lakou san solo-an labai, arile Krais iu ili kandrah, ta iy amwenen ili bolon ta nyara salom san rasan le, iy bala buku iri pris ala san solo-an bwe.
Buku iy amekes san solo-an, idah kameh iy kabwese maha-an san solo-an labai, udu ndra bada len Kindrei amekes kon munyak asahan eme ano dah. Arile, na dah taha ndratanan, Krais ndrame kon munyak san rasan le ta edeu iy le amwenen ili ta Kindrei i nyara salom ta talou iri kandriyen ndra-in tataha iu.
Lau marakon kameh amak san rasan le, ano kameh iri asahan ta len ta sahou.
I buku le Krais amwenen atehei iy san rasan le i nyara salom ili ta Kindrei ta talou iri kandriyen ndra-in ta lau solo-an. Hamon kameh iy eme kon munyak ja. Arile, iy eme ta bwese ndra-in tataha ja bwe. Iy eme doh ta aseben ma ta akohok iri lau nane atondrok iy, ame hamon hawen.
Kandriyen malen ta Moses doh malawi le iri lakou mwasin hamon kameh eme. Arile, kandriyen malen nane doh malawin bala mwasin bwe. Tasah, kandriyen malen batanau i buku doh: Iri pris badeh, kamekes salom ki buku le ta jaha mari. Arile, are lau iri anya kame mirihik ta Kindrei ta san ta salom, salom nane doh winiyan babwidi iri lau ame asahan mwasin ta budon tan ta jaha mari, bwe.
Buku kandriyen malen winiyan bwidi iri lau asahan mwasin handru, badeh iri pris samekes salom ja ai. Buku Kindrei ndratolowei kandriyen ndra-in tiri lau nane ame bolo asiu tan, ma na salom rasan le iy bwidi iri ndra bele, iri kameh winiyan batona maha-an tiri kandriyen ndra-in udu ndrine iri ja bwe.
Arile, salom asahan doh ta iri lau marakon kanyolom ma kabudon kandriyen ndra-in iri amekes udu bolo jaha ari ari.
Tasah, ndraye bulumakau hawe ndraye me winiyan basikine iri kandriyen ndra-in ba-au bwe.
Eme ma Krais eme bolo kon munyak, iy asehek i buku doh i ta Kindrei: “Ou baso-ok kandriyen ta asun lakou ta salom, hawe adeu ndramas ta salom bwe, arile ou ndrabwidi badak ndrame awas.
Ou badeh, basekesek ta asun iri bulumakau hawe me ma buruwen ili bwele-e mada koto-ok i nyara salom ta sikine iri kandriyen ndra-in iu bwe.
Ya, jo asehek i buku doh, ‘Kindrei tek, jo asah kada-ah ta amekes iri gok ou aso-ok jo kamekes, i buku le iri ndratorowenei amwenen ndra-en bolo buk ndrabun.’”
Ma bwena iy asehek i buku doh, “Ou baso-ok kandriyen ta asun lakou ta salom, hawe adeu ndramas ta salom bwe. Ma ou ale basekesek ta asun iri bulumakau ma buruwen ili bwele-e mada koto-ok i nyara salom ta sikine iri kandriyen ndra-in iu bwe.” Handru, kandriyen malen asehek ta iri kamekes iri salom ki buku doh, arile Kindrei basekesek ta iri lakou doh bwe.
Eme Krais asehek ja, “Jo asah kada-ah ta amekes iri gok ou aso-ok jo kamekes.” Eme ma Kindrei andrei iri kandriyen ta asun lakou i buku iri salom malen iu, eme iy atehei Krais akohok kon tiri i nyara salom.
Taha ndrasahan ndra buku iri lau ndrabun, tasah Krais anuhun Kindrei, ma iy atehei badan amwenen i nyara salom san rasan le ma kabwe.
Iri pris amekes gok tiri len marakon, iri tawi kandriyen ta asun lakou i buku salom badeh, kahis. Arile iri salom doh winiyan basikine iri kandriyen ndra-in tataha ba-au bwe.
Arile Krais badeh, atehei iy i nyara salom ili ta iri kandriyen ndra-in, eme ma gok tan i buku pris asahan mwasin labai ta udu le buku doh. Ano iy iu ili manyah udu loboho mine Kindrei salin.
Eme iy kameh udu doh udu gwek winiya le Kindrei baratehei iri lau ta ato-ou kaliu hawen ala ado bahandra katin.
Ta salom tan ari le, iri lau Kindrei aloh iri ndra tan, iy eme ndrasikinei kandriyen ndra-in tiri marakon ndra-au, ma iy ndrabwidi iri ndrasahan mwasin labai ta are le buku doh.
Malawin Ndrabun ale asehek tataha ta nyala iri lakou dah. Iy asehek ma mwena i buku doh:
“Jo Laban, jo kameh asehek sahou randra le dah hawe iri na len eme: Jo kameh atehei kandriyen tek ili bolo budon tiri, ano kameh jo torowenei iri sahou tek udu bwele-e ade iri.”
Malawin Ndrabun tiye ja: “Jo kameh mani ndra-in tiri, ma jo winiyan babudon kandriyen ndra-in tiri ja bwe.”
Kindrei ndramani iri kandriyen ndra-in tataha mari, eme ma taha winiyan bamekes gok ta salom ta talou kandriyen ndra-in ja bwe.
Ado nadu tine, ndraye Jises le badeh, ndrasikinei iri kandriyen ndra-in tataha ndrano ndra-au, eme ma taha sanoh ta ala bolo asiu ndrok ndrabun, ndrabun labai ta Kindrei.
Iy ndrasihi madasan ha-un ndrame tataha, san doh Jises amwenen, iy mene asahan eme awas. Eme san ha-un doh kameh winiyan andrei taha ala asos kona kolau laba tinan nane udu madasan. Kolau nane doh leheya i buku oda Jises amwenen.
Tinan labai tiri pris tataha udu aliy ta atondrok asiu ta Kindrei.
Ta iri lakou doh le, taha ale kame mirihik ta Kindrei hawe ndrine taha kirek tiri budon mwasin. Taha katawi ndrine taha kudu mwasin, tasah ndraye Jises badeh, ndrasikinei lomondra ma iri kandriyen ndra-in tataha ndrano ndra-au, ma Kindrei ndrasikine bada taha na gwa tan lewen.
Taha ndrasehek iri budon tataha ndrame len, eme ma taha atondrok iri lakou mwasin nane Kindrei anya kedeu keme tataha. Taha katawi kihis iri lakou doh, ma taha sanoh ta aliy. Tasah, taha ndratanan, lakou marakon Kindrei ndratandrakan ta amekes o edeu, idah kameh, iy bwidiy handru.
Taha ale kabudon iri lau mwan ma badih rayah ta Kindrei, ma taha kasilah san mwasin ta aseben iri ta aso-ok iri rayah ja, ma ta amekes kandriyen mwasin ili tiri lau.
Taha samani kandriyen tataha ta atukum taha marakon a le se, ta atudun Kindrei. Taha sala buku iri lau rayah ndramekes, arile taha kabadok ta amekes ndrine iri lau ta Kindrei kudu mwasin. Tasah, taha ndratanan ta len ta Laban anya keme hamon ja badeh, ndrame mirihik.
Buku taha ndratanan sahou handru ta Krais, arile udu ja, budon tataha boto-on labai anya kili hamon tiri kandriyen ndra-in, taha winiyan bamekes ari salom ta sikine iri kandriyen ndra-in iu ja bwe.
Are lau iri ala hamon ja ta kandriyen ndra-in, iri ari madasan ta atobwak ja bwe, iri le kameh anoh ndra-in labai ta atondrok len ta sahou ta Kindrei. Tasah, iy ibolosen, ma losen tan doh kameh i buku jih anya nyarahan labai udu le buku doh ta asun iri lau anya kamekes bahun hawen.
Buku uru lau la-uh, o, taloh ndranyolom ari ndramak, iy amekes lakou handru, ma iy ba-en hamon ta kandriyen malen ta Moses mene batanau bwe, iy ndramak nane doh, iri winiyan batikisi iy bwe, iri adi iy imek iu.
Ya, taha winiyan atanan handru, are mwan o badih atehei konan i ta Nadu Kindrei, iy kameh akohok maha-an tinan labai. Tasah, ndraye sahou randra le ta Krais mene bwidi ndramak doh asahan ndrabun. Arile, iy ndramak nane doh ja amekes ndraye sahou randra le i buku ari lakou ndra-in laleyah. Ma iy ale amekes kandriyen ndra-in handru, ili ta Malawin Mwasin ta Kindrei, iy nane tikisi taha.
Taha ndratanan Kindrei tataha, iy ndrasehek i buku doh: “Jo kameh atehei maha-an ili tiri, ma jo konohei saba kandriyen nane iri amekes.” Buk ndrabun ndrasehek ale: “Laban kameh atehei iri lau tan amwenen ala ta mada sahou.”
Taha kanoh Kindrei, iy boto-on labai ma kohan ta ere le buku doh. Kora-on iy kandruni kati ndra-in tataha, ta adeu taha ala ta mada sahou.
Aha kabudon kili hamon ta len bwena mene ja, len mwena mene aha ndrakohok sun ta Kindrei, ma aha ndratanan, idoh sahou mwasin ta Krais. Na bolo len doh, iri lau ta ato-ou kaliu i ta Kindrei badeh, adeu maha-an solo-an i ta budon taha, ma aha bwese sisi-in solo-an. Arile aha ales boto-on.
Len rayah mene iri atehei aha ales are alih tiri lau, ma iri lohani aha, ma iri adeu maha-an ewek taha. Ma len rayah ja, aha ales are kona iri lau, ta aseben iri ta bwese maha-an hawe iri, buku le mwena mene aha bwese.
Aha amekes mwasin ili tiri lau ado bolo asiu lulik. Ma iri lau rayah akohok lokowa aha laleyah iu, arile aha babolosen ta aliy bwe, aha sekesek. Aha amekes i buku doh, tasah aha ndratanan lakou taha mwasin udu aliy. Iri lakou doh udu bwele-en labai ja tiri lakou badu munyak, ma iri kameh winiyan bandra-i bwe ta udu le buku doh.
Aha sanoh! Buku aha ales boto-on are le ta budon taha, idah kameh aha winiyan akohok sihine aha tinan labai.
Aha sawoyah ta atondrok. Buku aha amekes i buku doh, aha kameh winiyan bwidi iri gok Kindrei aso-ok. Ano ma aha kameh akohok iri saba lakou iy ndratandrakan ta edeu ewek taha.
Buku le buk ndrabun ndrasehek: “Mirihik ai, are lau kameh eme, iy kameh eme hamon handru! Winiya bala luwen bwe.
Arile, iri lau mwan ma badih tek mwasin, iri atehei budon tiri in tek, eme ma koha iri kameh ta ere le buku doh. Ma buku iri tubuni kona iri eme tek, o, iri batehei budon tiri bame tek ja bwe, ndrinek kameh winiyan basekesek tiri bwe.”
Ya, taha bala buku iri lau rayah ale ndratobwak ndra-au, ma ndra-au kede-eh, bwe. Arile, taha a buku le iri lau atehei budon tiri in ta Kindrei, idah kameh taha winiyan bamak bwe, ma taha kameh ta are le buku doh.
Kandriyen ta atehei budon ili le ta Kindrei i buku doh: Iri lakou nane taha atondrok Kindrei anya kedeu keme tataha, taha katawiy kihis kudu ndrine taha. Ndrine taha ndratanan, iri lakou marakon nane doh udu aliy handru, arile mada taha amwenen banyolom bwe.
Budon ta tubu taha iri handru in le ta Kindrei, eme ma bwidi iy sekesek tinan labai.
Taha atehei budon tataha in ta Kindrei, eme ma taha ndratanan, Kindrei badeh, bwidi kandrah hawe munyak, na sahou batanau tan le amwenen. Lakou mari taha ndranyolom, Kindrei amekes na lakou taha winiyan banyolom na mada taha bwe.
Ebol atehei iri budon tan mara-ei ili le ta Kindrei, eme iy edeu salom ili tan. Kindrei aso-ok salom ta Ebol labai, iy baso-ok salom ta Ken bwe. Ebol ndramak ai, arile budon tan tinan labai udu ta Kindrei, eme ma Kindrei aloh iy ndramak mwasin labai ta madan, ma iy aso-ok ndramas tan ale. Kandriyen ta budon ta Ebol le doh, leheya taha ta atehei budon tataha ili le ta Kindrei.
Inok atehei iri budon tan mara-ei ili le ta Kindrei le ari, eme bwidi iy bamak bwe. Iy udu ndra loken badeh, iy bwidi Kindrei sekesek, eme ma Kindrei andrei iy ma buruwen iu ili hawen ili kandrah. Ta idoh le, iri lau badu kon munyak banyolom sese badan bwe.
Ari ndramak winiyan babwidi Kindrei basekesek bwe, i buku iy batehei iri budon tan mara-ei handru bala tan bwe. Buku are lau anya kili hawe Kindrei badeh, iy katehei budon mara-ei kili tan, tasah iy Kindrei handru udu aliy, ma iy edeu ndramas ili tiri lau asilah iy handru.
Nowa atehei iri budon tan mara-ei ili le ta Kindrei, eme iy i tanan iri saba lakou iy banyolom bwena bwe kameh asahan hamon. Iy anuhun boho Kindrei, iy eme bwidi ndron ra-ei ta aseben iy, udun hawe nadun oro mara-ei ala bolon. Ta budon tan i ta Kindrei le badeh, iy atehei iri lau marakon badu kon munyak ala ta mada sahou, ma Kindrei aloh iy lau mwasin labai ta madan, tasah ta kandriyen tiri budon tan mara-ei ili le Kindrei.
Abraham atehei budon tan handru in ta Kindrei, eme ma bwidi iy anuhun boho Kindrei aloh iy ta ili kon ari nane doh, Kindrei ndratandrakan ta edeu ili tan. Iy ruwani kon tan amwenen, iy bala tanan saba kon handru kameh iy ili aliy bwe.
Abraham atehei iri budon tan mara-ei handru, eme ma iy manyah i buku ndramak badu kon leheleh udu bolo kon ta tandrakan nane doh. Ndrahunen badeh, udu bolo balei, i buku le Aisik uru Jekop. Uru akohok tandrakan ta Kindrei i buku le Abraham le mene akohok.
Abraham amekes i buku doh, tasah iy atondrok kon tinan labai nane doh, Kindrei le abudon, ma iy ndratahiy na iri lakou boto-on labai, ma winiyan bandra-i bwe.
Abraham ndrasahan alon kabwe, ma Sara ale winiyan bato-ou nah bwe, arile Abraham atehei budon tan mara-ei handru udu ta Kindrei le ari, iy ta amekes iri lakou marakon badeh, in hamon le tiri tandrakan tan mwena. Eme ma Sara tuwi nadun mwan.
Handru, Abraham ndrasahan alon ai, ma iy ari nadun bwe. Ma iy ale mirihik ta imek, arile lundriyen iri badeh, ndrasahan solo-an labai, i buku le iri ndrau anya udu kandrah, ma i buku le on udu bada babi, ari ndramak winiyan bandromwei bwe.
Iri lau marakon nane atehei budon tiri in ta Kindrei winiya le len iri amak. Iri mene are ndra kon munyak, arile iri bandrei saba lakou nane Kindrei tandrakan ta edeu i tiri bwe. Iri sekesek labai ili tiri lakou nane udu ndra len, eme iri asehek sahou randra le i buku doh, “Ahi badu dah bwe, ahi badu kon leheleh labai, ahi ame kon munyak dah ta manyah le.”
Buku taha anuhun iri lau asehek sahou i buku doh, taha ndratanan ai, iri lau kede-eh asilah munyak tiri handru.
Buku iri abudon ta munyak tiri are aliy bwena, iri badeh, winiyan ala hamon a munyak tiri ja.
Arile, koha iri ndrapwe ta ala kon mwasin labai ja udu kandrah. Ta idoh le, Kindrei bwilin bama ta iri aloh iy Kindrei tiri bwe. Tasah, iy ndranyuri kon tinan labai ta iri ala ado aliy.
Abraham atehei budon tan mara-ei handru in le ta Kindrei, kabatana Kindrei mene none iy. Kindrei mene tiye Abraham, ta iy katehei nadun Aisik ki nyara salom, eme ma Abraham anya kedeu nadun ari le nane doh ki nyara salom kili ta Kindrei. Handru, Kindrei mene ndratandrakan iy i buku doh, “Lundriyem oro hamon kameh asahan solo-an labai, in hamon ta san ta nadum Aisik amwenen.” I buku iy kidi Aisik, ano iy katehei iy ki buku salom kili ta Kindrei, badeh, iy ndrasani san ta lundriyen oro ta asola ndra-au. Arile, bwe, Abraham badeh atehei budon tan abadok labai in ta Kindrei, eme ma iy anya kedeu Aisik ki nyara salom kili ta Kindrei.
<range>
Abraham tanan, idah kameh Kindrei winiyan mete-ei Aisik imek, winiyan amak ja. Taha kasehek kundruh kili buku doh: Abraham ndrandrei nadun Aisik imek udu bolo lek ndrame loken ja.
Aisik atehei budon tan mara-ei handru in ta Kindrei. Iy ndrala alon labai, iy eme tiye Kindrei ta nyosowani Jekop uru Iso. Ta nyosowan doh, iy asehek ta lakou kameh asahan turu hamon.
Jekop atehei budon tan handru in ta Kindrei. Mirihik Jekop anya kimek, iy atehei nyosowan i ta nadu Josep uru ma la-uh, ano iy baramak hamon. Iy tawi iy ales na kandro tan, ma iy atudun nyara Kindrei.
Josep atehei budon tan mara-ei handru in ta Kindrei. Mirihik ta iy anya kimek badeh, iy asehek ta hamon kameh iri lau badu Isra-el kameh ruwani Ijip, ma iri au. Ma iy tiye iri ta bwese ndruwin ale ki hawe iri kahiy kili kon Kenan.
Tama Moses uru tinen atehei budon turu udu ta Kindrei, eme tine Moses atehei iy, uru ame anyolom iy nadu mwasin ndra-au ai. Eme ma uru ame tone iy amai winiya bun taloh, tasah uru banoh ta uru ba-en hamon ta batanau ta kabin badu Ijip bwe.
Moses asahan i lau-en, iy atehei budon tan in ta Kindrei, iy baso-ok ta iri lau aloh iy kadok ta boho kamen ta kabin badu Ijip, bwe.
Iy atehei budon tan boto-on labai ta bwese maha-an hawe iri lau ta Kindrei. Iy bwalen ta in hamon tiri kandriyen ndra-in ta sekesek, ta winiyan bado luwen bwe.
Moses atehei budon tan i buku doh: Buku iy andrei bwilima ta nyara Mesaya, idoh le kameh udu bwele-en labai ja ta sowa iri lakou marakon badu Ijip. Tasah, iy abudon boto-on labai ta sihinen mwasin kameh Kindrei edeu, eme iy anya kales boto-on kudu le buku doh.
Moses atehei budon tan handru in ta Kindrei, iy eme ruwani Ijip, ma iu ili kon rakon ja. Kabin badu Ijip ibolosen i tan, arile iy banoh iy kabin doh bwe. Iy atehei budon tan in ta Kindrei nane doh, i buku iy anyolom iy amwenen, arile taha lau winiyan banyolom iy na mada taha bwe. Eme ma iy ales boto-on labai ta iri none marakon nane Kindrei edeu iy tan.
Moses ale atehei budon tan boto-on labai in ta Kindrei, ta iy kameh aseben iri lau tan badu Isra-el. Eme ma iy tiye iri Isra-el ta adi sipsip ta nyamon ta Pasoba, ma katah ndraye sipsip kili mada kou ta asiu tiri. Eme ma angelo ta idi lau amak kameh winiyan badi nadu iri kadok bwe, ma iy kameh winiyan bame mirihik ta asiu tiri Isra-el nane ndra udu aliy bwe.
Budon tiri Isra-el handru in ta Kindrei, eme ma bwidi iri adek are gwa ndras aloh Retsi are bilisiu ala bilisiu i buku iri adek are kon soboren. Arile iri lau badu Ijip an hamon tiri Isra-el ame anya kamekes bahun kili tiri, arile iri marakon atuh ma iri amak.
Iri Isra-el atehei budon tiri boto-on handru in ta Kindrei, eme iri asar ala ame awudi kowah tinan badu Jeriko, iri amekes na bek. Iri adek ala ame awudi kowah tinan nane doh winiya len ma ndro taloh. Eme ma kowah doh atohou ili andri.
Rahap, iy badih ari ta bada belei, arile iy atehei budon tan boto-on handru in ta Kindrei, iy eme aseben uru lau la-uh badu Isra-el mene ala anya kanyolom saba lakou handru udu bolo kon Jeriko. Eme ma iy bamak bwe, bala buku iri lau nane banuhun boho Kindrei bwe.
Ya, saba lakou ja kameh jo kasehek? Len winiyan bwai, jo kameh winiyan basehek nyala Gidiyon, Barak, Samson, Jepta, Debit, Samuwel ma hawe iri propet bwai.
Oro lau doh atehei budon toro handru in ta Kindrei. Eme ma, oro banoh ta ari bahun bwe, oro adi iri lau solo-an tiri kabin rayah ja amak, oro ale andrei lakou nane Kindrei tandrakan ta edeu i toro. Oro ale ndremenya Kindrei ta atondrok oro, eme ma oro tawi boho iri layon ta winiyan baimon oro bwe.
Jih anya laba tinan ma nyarahan labai, eme iri akahei oro ala bolo jih, arile jih basulumwi oro bwe. Iri lau anya kadi oro na bainat, arile oro atobwak au laleyah. Oro nyamu oro bwe, arile udu hamon ja, nyamu oro asahan, ya oro ame asahan boto-on labai ta bahun. Eme ma oro tikahei iri lau ta bahun badu kon rakon ja au.
Oro badih rayah badeh, atehei budon toro handru in ta Kindrei, eme ma lowa oro badih nane ndramak, amak ame awas ja. Oro lau rayah mene ala bolo asiu lulik, ma iri lau ta amekes bahun badeh, bwidi bada oro mara-ei andra-i labai, amekes ili ili winiya le oro amak. Tasah, iri lau ta amekes bahun ndratiye toro, buku oro katubuni kona oro kili ta Kindrei, iri kameh winiyan tolowei oro au laleyah. Arile, oro bwale oro ta adeu kona oro i ta Kindrei, eme ma oro aso-ok ta are ndra bolo asiu lulik, winiya le oro amak. Oro abudon anya, oro kameh amak are bolo lek toro ame awas ja, ma oro kameh akohok koha oro mwasin labai ja.
Oro rayah ja, iri bobose oro, ma a-um oro na malou sakabuk i bek. Ma oro rayah ja, iri bawei oro na sen, ano atehei oro ala bolo asiu lulik.
Oro rayah ja, iri orowei oro na bek ma oro amak. Iri mwetehei oro rayah, iri aso-ei oro rayah na no-o samen madan. Oro rayah badeh, oro adek ala ame, ari asumwe oro bwe, toro lakou bwe. Oro taliye ku-i sipsip ma ku-i me ndra-in i kalawi oro. Iri lau batondrok oro bala mwasin bwe, iri atehei maha-an ma sisi-in ili le toro.
Eme ma, oro adek laleyah ala aton ado kon ari lau bado aliy bwe. Asumwe oro udu bolo mandrei solo-an labai, ma oro ado lek udu bolo mandrei ndra bek le, ma oro ado bolo lek laba tinan udu bolo munyak. Ya, oro lau doh mwasin labai ja ta mada Kindrei, ma iri lau badu kon munyak, iri winiyan bala buku oro lau nane atehei budon toro mara-ei in tan bwe.
Iri lau mwan ma iri badih marakon doh atehei budon tiri handru in ta Kindrei! Eme ma, iy anya, nyara iri badeh, mwasin handru ta madan. Iri bwena mene ado kon munyak, arile iri bakohok iri lakou mwasin i buku Kindrei tandrakan ta edeu ili tiri, bwe.
Tasah, mwena mene Kindrei lowosani lakou ari doh mwasin labai tataha marakon. Eme iy bwalen ta iri lau mwan ma iri badih mwena doh kasahan mwasin kare mwena tataha. Iy aso-ok taha badeh, kasahan mwasin labai hawe iri, ma taha marakon ka le se kakohok lakou nane iy ndralowosaniy tataha.
Iri lau mwan hawe iri badih bwena mene awudi taha are le alih i buku asi kandrah, eme iri leheya taha ta kandriyen ta budon tataha kili ta Kindrei. Eme ma taha kamani iri lakou ale tawi taha winiyan basakaliye boto-on bwe, ma taha karuwani iri kandriyen ndra-in marakon ale tawi taha ihis. Eme ma, taha kamekes ndrine taha kabadok ta sakaliye ta akohok lakou mwasin doh, Kindrei ndraleheyani taha sakaliye ta aliy.
Taha katehei mada taha kili le ta Jises, i buku le ndramak sakaliye ta nyorei, madan badeh, anyolom ili le bwena tan. Iy le ari kati budon tataha ma bwena, ma hamon kameh iy bwidi kundruh ta iri budon tataha marakon ano, ma udu mwasin labai ja. Iy ndrabwese-ei bwilima ta iri tatahi iy ili bada kei tondreh, arile iy babudon ta aliy bwe, tasah iy tanan hamon kameh iy udu ta sekesek ta iri lakou marakon iy ndrabwidiy. Na idah iy ndramanyah udu bada koyeu loboho mine Kindrei salin.
Taha katehei iri budon tataha marakon kili le ta Jises. Iy ales boto-on labai ta iri lau atehei kona iri i tan ta kandriyen ndra-in tiri. Eme ma, taha sawoyah ta asehek sahou ma taha satobwak.
Handru, aha amekes bahun ta kandriyen ndra-in iu, arile bahun aha amekes badeh, ndraye aha bamou bwe, ma aha bamak bala buku Krais imek bwe.
Buku sah? Sebwe aha ndramani sahou udu bolo buk ndrabun asehek, Kindrei badeh, aloh taha nadun amwenen: “Naduk, buku Laban amekes ari kandriyen ewek tam ta leheya ou, ou sabudon anya, idoh lakou ndra-in. Buku iy edeu maha-an ewek tam ta amekes ou amwenen, ya ndrinem sandra-i sala ta iri maha-an doh.
Tasah, ou ndratanam, buku Laban aso-ok ari ndramak, eme kameh iy aseben ta leheya iri kandriyen mwasin i tan. Buku iy andrei ndramak doh i nadun amwenen, iy kameh a-um iy, ta leheya ma batanau iy ta asahan ndramak mwasin.”
Handru, Kindrei badeh, aso-ok iri lakou ndra-in doh kasahan tataha, ta amekes taha kamwenen ma taha kado le. Tasah iy amekes kandriyen doh eme tataha i buku ndramak amekes ili ta nadun amwenen. Tama taha iri mwasin, len marakon badeh, iri batanau taha ta iri kandriyen ma lakou mwasin.
Kindrei batanau nadun iri marakon, eme buku iy babatanau aha bwe eh, idah aha ndratanan ai, aha badeh, nadun handru bwe. Aha i buku iri nah laleyah badu san.
Tama taha iri badu kon munyak, iri batanau taha, eme taha beleben iri kahis. Mwasin ja ta taha mari kala le bahandra tondrok ta tama taha badu kandrah, eme ma koha taha kameh ta udu le buku doh.
Tama taha badu kon munyak dah, iri batanau taha sese luluwen bwe, iri amekes i buku iri abudon mwasin. Arile Kindrei batanau taha ta iri kandriyen mwasin ta aseben taha handru, tasah iy aso-ok taha kala ndrabun ki buku le iy.
Len ta adeu maha-an eme tataha ta batanau taha, taha basekesek bwe. Ndrine taha atona maha-an labai. Arile, len ta batanau taha marakon ndrano, taha kameh amekes kandriyen mwasin handru ta mada Kindrei, ma ndrine taha kameh udu mwasin.
Na idah aha kales kamwenen! Kati aha satotoreh ja!
Eme, “Aha kadek san monen.” Ya, i buku ari ndramak iy badek bamwenen bwe, iy kameh edek amwenen ja.
Aha marakon kanone ka-en hamon ta kandriyen ta lau marakon kamanyah kare le se. Ma aha kabadok ta an hamon ta kandriyen mwasin ta are mada Kindrei. Buku aha bamekes bwe eh, aha kameh winiyan banyolom Laban bwe.
Aha katondrok aha kamwenen, kora-on aha katehei kona aha kili ta tikisiy ta Kindrei mene edeu eme tataha. Tasah, kora-on ari mwan, o, ari badih kamekes kandriyen ndra-in kili buku doh, ma katehei maha-an kewek taha, ma aha kamekes kandriyen ndra-in kili ta budon ta Kindrei. Iri mwan, o iri badih doh, i buku ra-ei kei ato-ou salin nyakadan, ma iy kameh kabwidi kandriyen tiri lau ta Kindrei solo-an labai kandra-i.
Mada aha kaleu ta ndramak iy in hamon ta kandriyen ta karei. Kora-on ari ndramak katehei konan kili ta Kindrei, i buku le Iso mene, iy anya kisih nyamon san rasan le, eme iy atehei iri lakou marakon mwasin ta iy winiyan akohok i buku iy kadok, ta iu laleyah.
Aha tanan, udu ja iy anya kakohok iri lakou doh kili hamon. Arile taman anya, winiyan bwai. Iso eden san solo-an labai ta akohok nyosowan kili hamon, arile iy ari madasan ja ta amekes ja bwai.
Len ta taha ame hawe Kindrei, lakou asahan tataha bala buku asahan tiri lau badu Isra-el bwe, iri mene ala mirihik ta mandrei aloh Sainai. Iri ame ado mirihik ta mandrei doh, iri winiyan anuhun ma atona iri lakou mari doh handru. Eme ma iri anyolom jih taladan ili loken, ma lulik hutu-un tinan labai, ma jor atohou a tinan.
Eme ma iri lau marakon badu Isra-el anuhun boho Kindrei badeh, i buku ndrah eden tinan labai, eme bwidi iri anoh labai. Eme ma iri asehek ili ta Moses i buku doh, “Ahi bwale ahi ta anuhun boho ndramak doh ja.”
Iri anoh labai, tasah Kindrei mene asehek ili tiri i buku doh, “Buku ari ndramak o me le anya kili bwele-e mandrei kodo-oh, aha kandrei bek, korowei iy kimek ki-iu.”
Eme bwidi iri marakon anoh labai ta lakou nane iri anyolom, eme Moses ale asehek, i buku doh, “Jo inoh labai eme bwidi jo totoreh.”
Arile, aha bala basahan ta lakou i buku doh bwe le. Aha ndrame ndrasos mandrei ta Sayon, eme aha ala kon tinan ta Kindrei kameh udu le buku doh, kon tinan Jerusalem udu bolo kandrah. Aha ndrame ndrasahan hawe iri angelo ma nyaran bwe, ame atukum ta sekesek.
Idah aha ndruni iri nah Kindrei aso-ok iri tinan labai, nyara iri iy ndratorowenei udu bolo buk tan udu kandrah. Eme aha ndrasilahei Kindrei amwenen, iy atehei lau marakon are ta mada sahou. Ma malawi iri lau ale mwena mene ndramak, Kindrei aloh iri lau mwasin, ma iri ndrasahan mwasin labai ta madan.
Eme aha ndrasilahei Jises ale, iy le ari adeh amekes sahou randra le ha-un ta Kindrei hawe taha. Eme ma ndrayen le bwidi sahou randra le abadok. Ndrayen doh udu bwele-en labai ja ta ndraye Ebol, tasah ndraye Ebol leheya i buku doh: Ndramak ari kameh kakonohei ndra-in doh. Arile, ndraye Jises bwe. Ndrayen amou ta akunoh iri kandriyen ndra-in tataha mari iu.
Bale aha ki-in taha, kora-on aha katunuhun, ma aha ba-en hamon ta boho Kindrei bwe. Tasah, ma bwena mene Kindrei ere bwele-e mandrei Sainai asehek sahou boto-on ili tiri lau badu Isra-el are kabede mandrei doh, arile iri tebelese bohon. Eme ma, na bolo len bwena mene doh, iri winiyan batobwak ma bateleyani ndramas ta kandriyen ndra-in tiri bwe. Na idah, Kindrei udu kandrah, ma iy asehek sahou boto-on labai ja eme tataha. Buku taha atehei kona taha i tan, taha winiyan batobwak ma bateleyani ndramas ta kandriyen ndra-in nane doh bwe, handru en.
Kindrei asehek sahou ma bwena badeh, kurutuwe bohon le bwidi kon munyak doh totoreh. Arile, na dah, iy ndratandrakan, “Jo kameh nyokoda kon munyak san rasan ja; kon munyak le bwe, jo kameh nyokoda kon munyak ma hawe kandrah ale.”
Sahou doh, “san rasan ja” iy leheya taha i buku doh: Iri lakou bwena Kindrei mene amekes buku kandrah hawe munyak, na idah iy nyokoda, iri lakou ale doh kameh ano, ma winiyan bado ja bwe. Arile iri lakou iy bandrokonya bwe, badeh iri lakou handru badu kandrah, kameh ta are le buku doh, winiyan ba-au bwe.
Ya, taha kadeu wurah kili ta Kindrei, tasah taha ndrasahan iri lau ta are bahandra tondrok ari, badeh, winiyan bandrokonya ma babwidiy bandra-i bwe. Taha badeh katudun nyaran ki-in hamon ta kandriyen iy amwenen aso-ok; taha kanoh ma kabeleben iy,
tasah, “Kindrei tataha badeh, iy i buku jih ta asun lakou ano iu.”
Taha samani kandriyen ta aso-ok nadu tine taha iri rayah ja i san ta nyara Jises.
Aha samaniy ta asumon iri lau badu kon leheleh ame bolo kon tam. Aha ndratanan, bwena mene iri lau rayah amekes i buku aliy, ma iri andrei iri angelo rayah ala asiu hawe iri, ma tondrokei iri. Arile, iri bala tanan ta angelo eme bwe, iri anya ndra ndramak awas le ai.
Aha kabudon iri lau ta Kindrei rayah ado bolo asiu lulik. Aha kabudon iri, i buku aha ado bolo asiu lulik hawe iri ale. Aha kabudon iri lau ado ta maha-an solo-an, aha katehei aha i buku aha bwese maha-an hawe iri ale.
Tasou badeh, lakou ari mwasin handru. Eme ma kandriyen aha amekes ta tasou, badeh, kudu mwasin labai ta mada Kindrei. Kora-on aha amekes ndra-in ili ta budon ta Kindrei. Tasah, aha ndratanan, hamon kameh Kindrei edeu ndramas ndra-in ili tiri lau mwan ma badih amekes kandriyen ta karei, ma iri lau amekes laleyah ta bolo tasou tiri.
Mada taha salikis ta luk. Iri saba lakou nane taha ndrakohok ma tataha udu aliy badeh, ndra winiyan ai. Kindrei ndratandrakan, “Jo winiyan bamani aha bwe-en, ma jo winiyan bakahei aha bwe.”
Eme ma, taha winiyan amekes budon tataha abadok, ma amekes i buku le ta sahou udu bolo buk ndrabun asehek, “Laban kede-eh iy aseben jo. Jo winiyan banoh bwe. Iri lau kameh winiyan bamekes kandriyen ndra-in bame tek bwe, ma iri winiyan babwidi jo bamani seben ta Kindrei bwe.”
Aha samani iri lau ta Kindrei nane a-en mwena taha, iri mene leheya aha ta sahou ta Kindrei. Aha kabudon saba kandriyen asahan ta manyah ma tekedek tiri, ma aha katehei budon taha ki buku le iri.
Kandriyen ta Jises Krais badeh, bala randrah bwe, iy i buku le bwena mene, iy i buku le na dah, ma iy ta udu le buku doh.
Eme ma aha satehei aha sala bolo iri sahou solo-an, eme ta ariu budon taha, ma aha mani san mwasin ta Kindrei. Kindrei amekes kandriyen mwasin labai eme tataha, ma idoh amekes taha abadok ta a-en hamon tan. Buku taha a-en hamon ta iri batanau ta beleben nyamon solo-an labai, idoh baseben taha ta a-en hamon ta Kindrei bwe. Tasah kandriyen doh, baseben iri lau bwena mene ba-en hamon ta aliy bwe le.
Jises Krais badeh, salom tataha. Eme ma iri pris a-en hamon ta batanau ta Moses ma iri amekes salom tiri kahis le, iri winiyan bakohok seben mwasin ta salom tataha nane doh bwe.
Tinan tiri pris amekes gok udu bolo asiu balei ta Kindrei, iy andrei ndraye sipsip ma bulumakau, eme iy tiyani ndra nane doh ili bolo asiu ndrok ndrabun ndrabun labai ta amekes salom ta talou kandriyen ndra-in tiri iu. Arile, sali iri sipsip ma bulumakau nane doh badeh, iri sulumwiy andrakak iu udu ndra manan, bado bolo kon bwe.
Jises ale akohok sisi-in tinan labai udu manan loboho madasan ta kon tinan, bado bolo kon amwenen bwe. Iy amekes i buku doh, ta amekes iri lau marakon asahan ndrabun, ma ndrayen amou ta akunoh taha ame hamon ja.
Eme ma taha karuwani iri lau rayah nane anya ka-en hamon ta kandriyen ta salom tiri Juwis. Taha kamani iri, ma kame hawe Jises Krais. Idoh i buku taha ala are manan ale, ma taha kabwese bwilima i buku le iy bwese.
Udu bwele-e kon munyak dah, taha ari kon tinan ta udu le buku doh bwe, arile taha atondrok kon tinan ari doh kameh asahan hamon.
Eme ma taha kasekesek ta Kindrei ta nyara Jises, ma taha kadeu sekesek doh kili tan kudu le buku doh, i nyara salom tataha. Salom nane tataha amekes dah, i buku sahou ta atudun nyaran, ma ta leheya kandriyen tan mwasin kili tiri lau mari.
Aha samaniy ta amekes iri kandriyen mwasin ili tiri lau mwan hawe iri badih. Buku iri rayah, tiri lakou bwe, aha kaseben iri. Kindrei aso-ok iri kandriyen doh, tasah kandriyen doh ale asahan salom mwasin labai ta madan.
Aha kanuhun boho iri lau ta Kindrei nane a-en bwena taha, aha ka-en hamon ta saba lakou iri aso-ok aha kamekes. Tasah, iri atondrok aha, ano iri kameh asehek ili ta Kindrei ta tondrok tiri i buku sah. Eme ma aha kanuhun sahou tiri. Buku aha amekes i buku doh, iri kameh winiyan sekesek ta ateu gok tiri, ma iri winiyan batona maha-an ta aliy bwe. Ya, buku iri basekesek ta atondrok aha bwe, idoh kameh winiyan basebenei aha bamwenen bwe.
Aha kasolom kili ta Kindrei ma kandremenya iy ta aseben ahi. Ahi ndratona ndrine ahi ere mwasin labai ta madan. Eme ahi anya kadek kamwenen bolo len marakon.
Jo aso-ok aha kasolom kili ta Kindrei, ta iy kaseben jo, eme ma, jo kameh winiyan ewek hamon suwi ta anyolom aha ja.
Kindrei mene mete-ei Laban tataha Jises. Eme ma iy asahan ndramak mwasin labai ta atondrok taha mwan ma badih buku sipsip. Tasah, ta ndrayen mene amou, eme iy tutuniy ma bwidi sahou randra le doh abadok ta ere le buku doh. Kindrei badeh, kati manyah mwasin tataha. Eme ma, jo aso-ok iy katehei iri kandriyen mwasin mari doh kewek taha, ta aha ka-en hamon ta tanan tan. Ma jo aso-ok, iy kaleheya kandriyen mari kasahan bolo taha, buku iy amwenen aso-ok. Kandriyen doh asahan ta Jises Krais, iy amwenen aseben taha ta amekes. Taha katudun ma kamasiye nyaran kudu le buku doh. Handru!
<range>
Aha nadu kawas tek. Jo aso-ok aha kanuhun kamwenen ta iri sahou jo ndratorowenei ndrawek taha ta amekes budon taha kabadok. Tasah la-ukei nane jo atorou ndrawek taha se lawe-en bwe.
Jo anya kasehek tado i buku doh: Iri ndrandrei nadu tine taha Timoti ndrame manan ta asiu lulik. Buku iy asahan hawek suwi, idah kameh aru ma la-uh kameh awek ta anyolom aha.
Aha katiye sekesek taru ma la-uh kili tiri lau ta Kindrei a-en mwena taha, ma hawe iri lau mwan ma badih marakon ta Kindrei. Iri lau badu kon munyak tinan Itali tiye sekesek tiri ewek taha ale.
Tikisiy ma iri kandriyen mwasin mari kudu hawe aha lau marakon ta Kindrei.
Jo Jemis, jo ndramak ta lahou ta Kindrei hawe Laban Jises Krais. Jo atorou la-ukei dah ma edeu sekesek tek ewek taha mwan ma badih mari badu boho kamen ma ronoh la-uh badu Isra-el aseker areu bolo kon munyak mara-ei nane dah.
Ya, ado nadu tine, buku iri none ndra-in solo-an asahan tado, mwasin ta ado kasekesek le.
Ado ndratana ado, buku iri none ndra-in solo-an doh asahan tado, badeh, kandriyen ta none ndrine ado, ta atadau aha ta ales boto-on ta budon, ma a-en hamon ta sahou handru ta Kindrei.
Buku none ado atehei budon handru in ta Kindrei, ma ado a-en hamon ta sahou handru, idoh kameh winiyan sebenei ado ta ales boto-on, ta iri lakou anya kasahan tado. Eme ma, ado kameh asahan lau handru ta Kindrei, ma winiyan barah ta lakou mwasin tan bwe.
Buku none rayah lau areu rewa ado, aso ta budon mwasin, oro badeh, kasolom ki ta Kindrei, ya Kindrei winiyan sebenei oro. Tasah, Kindrei ale edeu lakou solo-an eme tataha lau, hawe iy winiyan edeu budon mwasin ewek taha, ya iy winiyan babolosen bala tare lau nane ndremenya iy ta budon mwasin bwe.
Arile, ndramak ale ndremenya Kindrei doh, iy katehei budon tan handru, ma iy sabudon solo-an, ya iy kasolom ki ta Kindrei. Iy samaniy, ya iy satehei budon buku doh, “Kindrei kameh atehei lakou doh eme tek deh bwe?” Tasah, ndramak iy edek na budon la-uh, iy badeh, buku none mada bayau ale jor oloh, ma atohou ili eme.
Ndramak buku doh satehei budon anya Kindrei kameh atehei ari lakou i tan, winiyan bwe.
Budon ta ndramak doh bameles ba-en rasi bwe, ya iy badek ta budon ari le bwe.
Iri lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, buku iri, tiri lakou bwe, iri badeh, kasekesek, tasah udu budon ta Kindrei badeh, nyara iri tinan labai.
Arile, iri lau nadu batun, iri badeh, sasekesek le ta aliy. Iri kasekesek ale, buku Kindrei karuwani iri lakou mari nane, iri tawiy udu mine iri ki-iu mara-ei. Tasah, iri kameh amak buku kanyeu awa-is na beyeh; luk nane doh winiyan basebenei oro na bolo len doh bwe.
Ya, taha tanan, an anya eme loken badeh, nyarahan labai, ma sulumwi bwidiu asara mara-ei. Buwa bwidiu mari badeh, iroh ili andri, ma kone iri iu mara-ei. Idoh i buku le, iri mwan ma badih tiri lakou solo-an labai, iri kameh amak, udu ndra bada gok solo-an solo-an nane iri amekes.
Kindrei kameh winiyan nyosowani ou are lau, buku ou ales boto-on handru ta bwese iri maha-an. Ma iy kameh edeu kohan handru i ndramas i tiri ta udu le buku doh. Kindrei badeh, ndratandrakan ndrala tare lau nane atehei budon tiri mara-ei in tan ma aseken iy labai.
Ya, aha kanuhun! Buku lakou kanone kasore ndrine ari mwan o badih ta ariu iri ala ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in, iri sasehek anya, “Kindrei badeh, anya kanone jo ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in doh.” Arile bwe, idoh badeh, sahou wendreya. Kandriyen ndra-in badeh, winiyan baruwi Kindrei bwe, ma Kindrei badeh, winiya banone ta ariu ari mwan o badih ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in bwe.
Arile, ndrine taha mari ari ari badeh, atadau ma ariu taha. So-ok tataha ndra-in amwenen nane doh badeh, indrek taha ma wendreya taha ta amekes kandriyen ma lomondra ndra-in.
Ya nadah, jo anya kasehek sahou sokek ari i buku doh: Kandriyen ta ndrine taha towodau badeh, i buku badih atehei nah udu ndrinen eme len. Nyara badih doh badeh, “Kandriyen ta ndrine ndramak towodau.” Ya, nyara nah doh badeh, “Kandriyen ndra-in.” Na len kandriyen ndra-in asahan i tinan, iy badeh, leheya kandriyen ndra-in asahan, iri aloh imek.
Ado mwan ma badih ta Kindrei badu hawek handru, kora-on ado katawi iri kandriyen ta wasai badeh, kawendreyani ado.
Iri lakou hawe ndramas mwasin labai mari badeh, marakon badu kandrah eme andri. Ya, tama taha Kindrei badeh, mesekei lomadan marakon badu kandrah, iy le amwenen badeh, suni iri lakou marakon mwasin doh eme andri tataha. Iy badeh, mwasin labai ma iy batobolowe kandriyen tan bala bame bwe, buku ari lakou, an bwidi malawi iri asahan, an anya ya tobolowe malawi iri lakou a lawe ano a mo-on ja. Arile Kindrei badeh, batobolowe iy bala bame bwe, iy ta udu le buku doh.
Na budon tan le amwenen, iy bwidi taha asahan nadun na sahou tan handru, ma iy asahan tama taha. Handru, iy atehei sahou tan eme tataha, eme ma taha atehei budon tataha mara-ei in le tan. Iy amekes i buku doh, ta taha kare bwele-e lakou marakon iy ndramesekei.
Ya aha badeh, kabudon kamwenen! Aha nadu tine mwan ma badih tek handru, aha katehei ndranye aha suwi ta anuhun sahou. Arile, aha sabobo-ap ta amekes sahou. Ma ndrine aha ale satowodau ta losen suwi.
Tasah, kandriyen ta losen udu bolo ndrine taha mwan ma badih badeh, bamesekei kandriyen mwasin Kindrei aso-ok bwe.
Eme ma, aha badeh, karuwani iri kandriyen ndra-in ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in nadah asahan solo-an labai udu bolo ndrine iri mwan ma badih. Ma aha katehei aha ka-au ka andri mara-ei ta akohok sahou nane Kindrei ndratahiy udu bolo ndrine aha. Sahou le doh badeh, winiyan andrei malawi aha mara-ei eme hamon ja.
Jo asehek sahou boto-on ewek taha badeh, i buku doh: Kora-on aha anuhun sahou doh laleyah. Aha badeh, ka-en hamon ta aliy ale. Buku bwe eh, badeh, aha ndrawendreyani aha le ai.
Tasah, are mwan o badih iy anuhun sahou ta Kindrei doh, ya iy ba-en hamon ta aliy bwe, iy badeh, i buku ndramak anyolom madan amwenen udu bolo torowe.
Iy anyolom madan amwenen mara-ei, arile iy ili hamon ja amekes lakou i le buku iy amekes bwena ndra-au, ya se luwen bwe, iy badeh, ndramani kone madan nane udu bolo torowe ja ai.
Arile, sahou ta Kindrei udu bolo tarou malen ma hawe sahou mwasin badeh, amekes gok ta atokos kandriyen ndra-in iu, ma bwidi taha ado mwasin. Batanau doh badeh, amwenen mara-ei. Buku taha mwan o badih anyolom batanau doh amwenen ma a-en hamon ta sahou tan handru, ma Kindrei kameh winiyan amekes iri gok mara-ei tiri mwan o badih nane asahan mwasin labai. Ma iri mwan ma badih buku doh badeh, iri winiyan banuhun sahou laleyah doh bwe, ma maniy suwi labai.
Buku none ari mwan o badih iy anya, iy lau ta Kindrei ma iy atudun iy handru, arile iri batondrok boho iri bamwenen bwe, iri ndrawendreyani iri amwenen, ya eme ma budon hawe salom tiri doh badeh, ari moson ta aliy bwe.
Tasah, kandriyen ta lau ta Kindrei badeh, amwenen mara-ei, ma ari lomondra ndra-in bado budon ta tama taha Kindrei bwe, i buku doh: Taha badeh, kabudon ma katondrok iri nah, tama iri ma tine iri ndramak, ma hawe iri badih, udu iri ndramak, ma kaseben iri ta bwese maha-an tiri. Ya, lakou ari ale i buku doh, taha badeh, kantondrok tekedek tataha kamwenen, idah kameh kandriyen badu kon munyak winiyan baruwi taha bala bolo ndraka-an bwe.
Aha nadu tine mwan ma badih tek amwenen, aha ndratehei budon taha ndra-en ta tinan tataha Laban Jises Krais. Iy Laban ta lakou mwasin mara-ei badu kandrah. Eme ma, kora-on aha kabo gok ta amekes kandriyen mwasin ili le tiri lau nyara iri tinan, ma aha atehei kona aha ili tiri mwan ma badih nyara iri bwe. Aha badeh, kamekes kandriyen mwasin randra le kili tiri mari.
Buku none ari ndramak asini awin moroyan, ya iy anyuhi kandro minen ari i bolo bek nyikilikin iri amekes na bek, ewek bolo asiu ta ndrahu tukum taha, ma hawe ndramak ari, awin tan ndraka-an, ewek bolon ale.
Ya, aha kameh amekes mwasin i ta ndramak nane awin tan moroyan ma bek nyikilikin udu kandro minen kameh anya, “Ou ame manyah ado bada bwabwai mwasin dah.” Arile, aha kameh tiye i ta ndramak nane awin tan ndraka-an, anya, “Ou ala ales an kabwek kodo-on op, bwe ou ame manyah an bada kamus mirihik ta katik kada-ah.”
Buku aha amekes kandriyen i buku doh ta bokoro-ei i ndramak nane tan ari lakou bwe, badeh, aha ndrabwidi kandriyen ndra-in kabwe. Idoh i buku aha ndralebelei iri lau ta Kindrei rayah na budon ndra-in taha. Aha badeh, babudon anya iri ale buku aha, ma aha amekes kandriyen mwasin i buku doh i tiri, bwe. Aha le amwenen badeh, aleben aha ta anuhun sahou tiri, ma idoh badeh, bamwenen bwe.
Aha nadu tine mwan ma badih, aha kanuhun. Kindrei badeh, ndralebelei iri lau, tiri lakou bwe badu kon munyak badeh, ta iri kameh are mwasin labai ta budon handru in ta Kindrei. I buku le Kindrei bwena mene ndratandrakan i buku doh, iri mwan ma badih doh atehei budon tiri in tan handru ma aseken iy labai, iy kameh bwidi iri asahan lau tan, ma iy atondrok iri.
Arile, aha badeh, atehei bwilima ili tiri lau nane, tiri lakou bwe. Aha kabudon doh kamwenen. Are lau handru bokoro-ei aha ma atehei maha-an ewek la-u aha ma aluwi aha ala ta mada sahou? Iri le nadu batun badeh, amekes iri lakou doh.
Ya, Kindrei ale badeh, ndratehei nyara Krais mwasin labai ndra-en la-u aha. Arile, are lau handru bobose nyara Krais? Iri nadu batun, iri ateu luk solo-an udu mine iri.
Buku aha a-en hamon ta batanau ari le mwasin nane Kindrei atehei eme tataha anya, “Ou aseken iri lau ari ari badu hawem, i le buku ou aso-ok ou le,” idoh mwasin. Jo ari sahou ta aliy bwai.
Arile, buku aha apwai iri lau ta Kindrei a rabuk doh, rabuk doh, eme ma aha atondrok iri mwan ma badih nane tiri luk solo-an ai, ya aha atehei kona aha ja ili tiri lau nane tiri lakou bwe, badeh, aha ndrabwidi kandriyen ndra-in kabwe, ma aha ale badeh, ndrabokoro-ei batanau ta Kindrei.
Ya, sahou dah handru. Tasah, buku ari ndramak anya, iy in hamon ta sahou batanau mara-ei, arile iy bokoro-ei sahou batanau ari le udu bolo oro sahou batanau ta Kindrei mara-ei, Kindrei anya iy badeh, ndrabokoro-ei batanau mari ndrandra-i kabwe.
Taha ndratanan, Kindrei badeh, asehek anya, “Aha tasou badeh, samekes kandriyen ta karei.” Ma iy ale asehek anya, “Ou sadai ndramak samak.” Ya, i buku ou bamekes kandriyen ndra-in ta karei bwe, arile ou adai ndramak ari imek, ou amwenen badeh, asahan ndramak ari ndra-in labai ta bokoro-ei batanau ta Kindrei.
Ya, aha kasehek sahou mwasin, ma ka-en hamon ta kandriyen mwasin, tasah Kindrei kameh edeu lau mari ala ta mada sahou, buku le iy mene ndrabatanau taha bwena i buku doh, “Aha badeh, kaso-ok iri mwan ma badih rayah ja, i buku ou aso-ok ou le amwenen.”
Tasah, i buku ari mwan o badih, iy batikisi iri lau rayah ja bwe, udu bada len Kindrei atehei iy ere ta mada sahou, idah kameh Kindrei winiyan batikisi iy bwe le. Arile, are mwan o badih, iy abudon iri mwan ma badih rayah ja, ma amekes kandriyen mwasin ili tiri, iy amwenen kameh winiyan eme len ta mada sahou. Tasah, kandriyen ta tikisiy badeh, udu bwele-en labai ja, ta kandriyen ta adeu maha-an i la-u ndramak.
Aha nadu tine mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, buku ari taha anya, “Jo atehei budon tek mara-ei badeh, in le ta Jises Krais,” arile iy badeh, bamekes kandriyen mwasin ma ba-en hamon ta budon handru bwe, eme budon handru ta i ndramak doh badeh, ari moson bwe. Sebwe iri budon handru buku doh badeh, winiyan basebenei ndramak ales udu mada sahou ta Kindrei hamon kameh eme bwe.
Buku ari lau ta Kindrei, iy badu hawe ado, iy tan ari kalawin ma nan nyamon bwe,
ya ari badu bolo ado badeh, tiye i tan i buku doh, “Kindrei kanyosowani ou ma iy kudu hawem! Ou satikisiy labai, ndrinem kudu le kudu, Kindrei winiyan sebenei ou, iy winiyan silahei tam kolau mwasin ma nam nyamon mwasin.” Ya, sahou laleyah doh kameh baraseben oro barala buku sah handru bah?
Kandriyen ta budon handru tataha badeh, buku le aliy ale. Buku budon taha handru baluwi budon taha ta amekes kandriyen mwasin ma aseben iri mwan ma badih rayah ja bwe, ya budon taha handru badeh, kameh ari moson bwe, i lakou laleyah. Ya, buku taha bamekes gok mwasin ta aseben ndramak ari ja bwe, budon tataha badeh, ari katin bwe.
I buku ari ndramak anya, “Lau rayah badeh, tawi ihis budon handru, arile lau rayah ja badeh, amekes kandriyen mwasin. Sebwe budon ma la-uh doh i le randra.” Jo kasehek ki buku doh, “Buku none ou atehei budon tam boto-on i ta Kindrei, arile ou tanam ta amekes kandriyen mwasin bwe, ki buku sah handru jo ki tanan kandriyen ta budon tam in ta Kindrei nane? Arile, jo anya kamekes kandriyen mwasin ale, ya kandriyen mwasin doh kameh leheyani budon tek boto-on in ta Kindrei nane.”
Buku none ou badeh, atehei budon tam anya, Kindrei badeh, ari le. Mwasin. Arile, badeh, lakou laleyah. Tasah, iri malawin ndra-in abudon buku aliy ale, ya iri anoh ma totoreh, tasah Kindrei kameh atehei iri ala ta mada sahou, ma iri kameh ala bolo jih. Ya budon tiri le nane winiyan bamesekei iri asahan mwasin ta mada Kindrei bwe.
Ou lolo-ou ndramak, buku ou atehei budon tam le in ta Kindrei, ya ou bamekes kandriyen mwasin Kindrei aso-ok ja bwe, budon tam badeh, ari moson bwe. Sebwe ou anya atanam le ta kati sahou dah nadeh? Mwasin ta ou anuhun sahou badu bolo buk ndrabun asehek i buku doh:
Bwena mene tubu taha Abraham atehei nadun Aisik i bwele-e mada koto-ok anya ki nyara salom ki ta Kindrei. Eme ma, udu kabatana doh badeh, Kindrei anyolom lahou tan, ma iy aloh Abraham ndramak mwasin labai ta madan.
Aha kanyolom kamwenen. Budon hawe kandriyen ta Abraham badeh, asahan ari le. Budon tan mara-ei badeh, asahan eme lewan, in hamon le tiri kandriyen mwasin iy amekes.
Buk ndrabun badeh, asehek i buku doh, “Abraham atehei budon tan handru in ta Kindrei, eme ma Kindrei aloh iy ndramak mwasin mara-ei ta madan.” Ya Kindrei ale aloh Abraham badeh, i buku, “Kawas tan handru.” Ya, kati sahou “atehei budon tan mara-ei in ta Kindrei” doh badeh, asahan eme lewan ta kandriyen nane Abraham amekes i ta nadun Aisik.
Ya idah aha ndratana aha, Kindrei basehek anya ndramak kameh asahan mwasin na budon tan le bwe, iy badeh, aso-ok budon tam hawe kandriyen ta gok tam ale kudu mwasin ta madan.
Buku Rahap badeh, badih ta madasarah, iy tone uru lau ma la-uh mene Josuwa suni uru ala ta anyolom bolo kon Jeriko, ya Rahap leheyani uru a hamon a san ari ja. Ya idoh le, iy asahan mwasin na kandriyen tan ta tone uru lau ma la-uh nane doh. Ya Kindrei bwetenei kandriyen ta Rahap nane, ma iy aloh iy badih mwasin ta madan.
Taha ndratanan, buku malawi taha ruwani bada taha mwan o badih, badeh basa taha le kameh erah udu api. Buku le, are mwan o badih atehei budon laleyah, ya budon tan doh bamekes ari kandriyen mwasin bwe, budon ta iy mwan o badih doh badeh, ndrasahan i buku bada kei, kohan aliy bwe.
Aha nadu tine mwan ma badih, aha mari sasahan ndramak ta bwena ta leheya iri mwan ma badih ta kandriyen Kindrei aso-ok. Tasah, udu bolo len ta Kindrei aleben kandriyen tiri mwan ma badih mari, iy ale kameh seleya amwenen labai iri gok tataha lau nane ta areu bwena ta leheya iri mwan ma badih mari.
Na len ari, ari taha badeh, abudon ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in, ma taha atalei. Arile, kandriyen doh badeh, asahan tataha mari. Buku ari mwan o badih basehek rayah sahou ndra-in bwe, iy badeh, lau mwasin handru, ya iy winiyan tondrokei badan ma kandriyen tan mara-ei.
Taha badeh, adeu hayen ranah i tondreh in boho hos, ta amekes iy ki-in hamon ta budon tataha ta adek. Taha badeh, atondrok boho iri, ya ta kandriyen doh le badeh, taha atondrok bada hos doh mara-ei ta iy in hamon le ta budon tataha.
Aha kabudon ale ta ndron lahek tinan atas bolo ndras. Ndron laba tinan, ya jor laba tinan atohou badeh, tubuluhi iy amai iu ili bolo ndras. Ya kulik tan badeh bos nadu bwisik labai. Arile, buku ndramak ta ateu kulik anya kili adai o sam, iy badeh, awoha le ili loboho heh iy anya ndron katas kili aliy.
Idoh i buku kalime taha, iy badeh lakou ari nadu bwisik badu bada taha, arile iy badeh, nyaladan labai ta amekes lakou mara-ei andra-i, ma ta atudun iy ale. Taha tanan, buku nadu katala jih sese le badeh, winiyan sulumwi lokei ma buruwen andrakak ano iu.
Kalime taha badeh i buku jih, iy nadu bwisik ereu bolo boho taha. Arile, iy badeh, ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in solo-an asahan tataha, ya iy badeh, winiyan tubuni bada taha mara-ei amekes kandriyen ndra-in labai, i buku jih nyarahan ta asun iri lakou. Jih doh badeh, buku le jih ta Kindrei, winiyan bamak bwe, ta asun lau na len hamon.
Ya, iri mwan ma badih badeh, andrei ma nyohonei iri lakou mari badu munyak dah, buku iri bwisir badu lokei, iri sirih, mwak, hawe iri lakou badu bolo ndras. Eme ma iri tondrokei iri lakou mari doh, ma mesekei iri anuhun sahou, ma a-en hamon ta budon tiri.
Arile, are mwan o badih iy badeh, winiyan batondrokei bohon amwenen bwe. Len mara-ei boho taha badeh akeh sahou ndra-in solo-an labai, ma sahou doh badeh, i buku le lakou ndra-in nyakadan ta adai lau amak. Lakou doh badeh, idih udu boho taha.
Taha atudun ma adeu wurah i ta Laban hawe tama taha Kindrei badeh, na boho taha. Ma na boho taha le amwenen badeh, taha aten iri lau. Taha amekes kandriyen ndra-in buku doh, arile Kindrei badeh, mesekei kone taha mari asahan i buku le iy amwenen.
Sahou ta atudun nyara Kindrei ma aten badeh, udu boho taha amwenen eme len. Aha nadu tine mwan ma badih, kandriyen doh ndra-in mara-ei, taha samekes.
Aha kabudon kamwenen. Gwa lakon hawe gwa ndras, uru winiyan ado mada munu kaloh ari le ame len, deh bwe?
Bwe, gwa lakon hawe gwa ndras, uru mala-uh winiyan bado munu lek ari le ame len bwe. Ya, aha nadu tine mwan ma badih, jo anya kandremenya aha, kei ra-ei iri aloh pik, winiya ato-ou olip deh? Bwe.
Buku rayah mwan o badih areu ndrokowa aha, budon ma tanan mwasin udu tiri, ya tekedek tiri badeh kasahan mwasin, ma iri winiyan bamekes lakou laleyah ma batudun nyara iri bwe. Ma iri mwan ma badih rayah ja kameh winiyan anyolom kandriyen mwasin iri amekes.
Arile, buku aha abudon ta totowa budon ndra-in taha ili tiri mwan ma badih rayah ja, ya len mara-ei aha abo gok ta a-en hamon ta san ndra-in ta atudun nyara aha amwenen ta udu bwele-e iri rayah ja, aha ta wendreya ma kandriyen taha badeh, bokoro-ei sahou handru ta Laban. Aha samekes kandriyen doh ndri-iy.
Iri budon hawe tanan doh badeh, bado kandrah bame andri bwe. Iri lakou doh badeh, badu kon munyak le amwenen. Iri asahan ta ndrine taha ndra-in bwena, ma balik in bwena ta aliy.
Aha kanuhun! Are lau ale ta lomondra ndra-in ma ta ndrakok udu tiri, iri lau doh badeh, ta amekes lakou laleyah ma ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in.
Arile, iri tanan ma lakou mara-ei mwasin taha akohok badeh, udu kandrah eme leheya taha kamekes kandriyen mwasin ki buku doh: Taha kasahan ha-un, ma taha kamekes mwasin ki ta nadu tine taha iri rayah ja, taha kanuhun sahou tiri mwan ma badih rayah ja, taha katikisiy lau rayah ja, taha kamekes mwasin ki tiri, ma taha badeh, sawasai.
Iri mwan ma badih aso-ok labai ta ado hawe iri lau rayah ja badeh, iri doh badeh, ka-en hamon ta kandriyen mwasin labai, ma idoh ale, aseben ndrine iri lau rayah ja udu le udu. Buku taha amekes iri kandriyen i buku doh, idoh i buku ndramak atah buwa kei ili bolo bilin tan; udu hamon ja badeh, ato-ou salin solo-an ma asahan mwasin mara-ei.
Saba lakou handru ale amekes bahun hawe losen udu bolo ndrokowa aha? Sebwe iri kandriyen ta ndrine aha ato-ou ta losen suwi, badeh, udu bolo oda aha, ma amekes bahun hawe budon ma tanan mwasin ta atondrok bada aha mara-ei.
Aha aso-ok lakou solo-an labai, arile aha bakuhi ari bwe, eme ma aha adai iri lau amak, arile aha bandrei saba lakou tiri nane aha aso-ok bwe. Mada aha alikis iri lakou ma aha ada aha le amwenen. Arile, aha bandrei bwe, tasah aha bandremenya Kindrei ta aliy bwe.
Buku aha asolom i ta Kindrei ta lakou aha aso-ok, ya aha bakuhiy bwe, tasah budon taha bamwenen bwe. Ya, aha asolom laleyah i ta Kindrei ta akohok lakou nane ta aseben ndrine aha, ma ta amekes aha kasekesek.
Aha badeh, ndraruwani Kindrei, i buku le badih ndraruwani udun, ya iy ndrasahan badih ta madasarah. Buku ari mwan o badih, iy aso-ok kandriyen badu kon munyak labai, iy lau le doh kameh baseken Kindrei bwe. Sebwe, aha tana aha bwe nadeh? Jo katiye taha ja, buku none ari ndramak anya kasahan kawas ta kandriyen badu kon munyak, iy ndrasahan lau ta bahun i ta Kindrei.
Buk ndrabun ndratiye, i buku doh, “Malawin mwasin nane Kindrei atehei udu bolo taha, len mari iy aso-ok taha ka-en bahandran amwenen.” Aha anya, sahou dah, sahou laleyah nadeh?
Arile, Kindrei badeh, tikisi taha tinan labai. Eme ma buk ndrabun tiye i buku doh, “Kindrei badeh, bwalen iri lau ta atudun nyara iri amwenen i loken, arile iy badeh, tikisiy, ya iy amekes mwasin i tiri lau ale atehei nyara ma so-ok tiri i andri mara-ei.”
Eme ma, aha badeh, katehei aha amwenen ka-au kala andri mara-ei kala kado bahandra Kindrei. Aha kales boto-on ma karuwani iri kandriyen ndra-in badu munyak, balik nane amekes kede-eh, ma iy kameh ruwani aha, ma iy atobwak iu.
Aha badeh, kala mirihik handru ta Kindrei, ya iy kameh eme mirihik handru taha. Aha lau mwan ma badih ta lomondra ndra-in ma ta karei, kandriyen taha badeh, kasahan mwasin i buku ndramak sikine minen asahan ha-un ja. Buku budon taha i lundra, baden eh, aha karuwani budon ndra-in nane udu ndrine aha badeh, ki-iu ai.
Buku aha ame mirihik ta Kindrei badeh, ndrine aha katikisiy, ma aha kaden handru ta kandriyen ndra-in nane aha ndramesekei. Aha are lau mwan ma badih ehe-en na idah, aha katubuni ehe-en kasahan ki ndrelen ja, ya sekesek ja badeh, kili ta tikisiy.
Ta mada Kindrei badeh, aha katehei aha ka-au kala andri mara-ei. Buku aha amekes i buku doh, iy kameh mani ndra-in taha, ma suruni aha au ala loken mara-ei labai.
Aha nadu tine mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, aha badeh, saluhe iri lau ta Kindrei. Are mwan o badih, iy aluhe o asehek nadu tinen iri rayah ja, iy badeh, aluhe batanau amwenen. I buku aha orou sahou i ta batanau, ou badeh, bado bahandra batanau ja bwe, tasah ou ndrasahan buku ndramak ta anuhun sahou, ma ou asehek i bada batanau amwenen.
