Oro mara-ei badeh, asini awin moroyan, ma se ndraka-an aliy bwe. Ma oro ale bawei balaban udu batala oro, kone balaban doh badeh i buku bek nyikilikin.
Ya, lakou ari ma mulin badu bolo oro ma hahuw badeh, eme atehei bwekei bek nyikilikin ma ndro toloben ili mine oro angelo ma ndro taloh. Ma hawe lakou udu bolo iri bwekei nane, leheya losen ta Kindrei ili tiri lau marakon badu kon munyak, iri lakou doh badeh, irek udu bolo oro bwekei bek nyikilikin ma ndro taloh nane doh. Ndrinesen doh badeh, ta Kindrei, iy winiyan bamak bwe, iy ta ere le buku don ai.
Kasu boto-on ma lomada Kindrei badeh, tubuluhi bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei nane doh. Ma ari ndramak winiyan bala bolo asiu ndrabun doh bwe. Iri lau marakon badeh, atondrok le oro angelo ma ndro taloh nane doh, kabwidi gok toro lakou ndra-in ma ndro taloh nane doh, mara-ei kano labai.
Ano badeh, jo anuhun boho ndramak ari asehek sahou boto-on labai udu bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei ili toro angelo ma ndro taloh i buku doh, “Ado kala kasolowei bwekei ma ndro taloh losen ta Kindrei udu bolon kodo-oh ki-iu kili andri bwele-e kon munyak!”
Iy asehek sahou ano le badeh, jo anyolom angelo ari atah ili solowei bwekei tan amou ili bwele-e kon munyak. Eme ma se nawin bwe, soso-ou ma hawe sisi-in ndra-in mara-ei badeh, asahan bada iri mwan ma badih, iri nane kalem ta nyabwe munyak udu bada iri ma iri atudun malawin iri bwidiy na sukumada kei.
Ano, angelo ari ja ili solowei bwekei tan amou ili bwele-e ndras. Eme ma gwa ndras asahan i buku ndraye ndramak imek, eme ma iri lakou mara-ei, bwisik ma tinan, are bolo ndras, mara-ei amak.
Uru angelo la-uh ndrano ai, iy ari eme len ja solowei bwekei tan amou ili bwele-e gwa lakon ma kaloh mara-ei. Bwekei doh asahan ili taloh ai. Eme ma gwa mara-ei asahan ndra.
Eme ma jo anuhun boho angelo atondrok gwa mara-ei nane asehek i buku doh, “Ou ndrabun labai. Ta sahou tam, ou anuhun sahou tiri lau ndra-in amwenen labai. Tasah, nadah ou are aliy, ma ndra bwena mene ou are aliy ale.
Iri mwan ma badih mene ale adai ma bwidi ndraye iri lau ma hawe iri propet tam amou. Eme ma ou atehei ndraye iri lau badeh, ili wa-i iri. Eme ma iri akohok bundruwe ndra-in tiri amwenen.”
Ano ja badeh, jo anuhun ndramak ari udu loboho mada koto-ok, asumon boho angelo nane i buku doh, “Ya, ou Laban handru, ou Kindrei, boto-on marakon udu tam. Ou badeh, aleben iri mwan ma badih are ta mada sahou, iri sahou tam badeh, ndra handru le, ma amwenen mara-ei.”
Ano badeh, angelo ari ja eme len ili solowei bwekei tan amou amwenen ili bwele-e an, ma jih taladan eme loken, ma sulumwi bada iri mwan ma badih. Ya bwekei doh ili asahan hahuw ai.
Jih ta an nane doh badeh, nyarahan labai ma sulumwi bada iri mara-ei atabuk, eme ma bwidi iri abolosen, ma iri aten nyara Kindrei. Tasah, Kindrei badeh, amekes iri lakou mara-ei nane doh. Eme ma iri bwale iri ta tobolowe ndrine iri, ma ta a-en hamon ta sahou handru, ta atudun nyara Kindrei.
Ya, iy angelo ari ja eme ili solowei bwekei tan amwenen ili bwele-e koyeu ta nyabwe munyak. Ya bwekei doh ili asahan limeh ai. Eme ma lulik asahan tubuluhi tondrok ta nyabwe munyak. Eme ma bwidi iri lau atohei kalime iri, ta sisi-in tiri nane doh.
Iri abudon ta sisi-in hawe soso-ou tiri, eme ma bwidi iri aten nyara Kindrei badu kandrah. Arile, iri badeh, batubuni ndrine iri ma batehei kona iri bala tiri kandriyen ndra-in nane iri amekes bwe.
Iy angelo ari ja badeh, ili solowei bwekei tan amou amwenen ili bwele-e gwa tinan Yupretis. Ya bwekei doh ili asahan onoh ai. Eme ma gwa Yupretis asamar mara-ei, ta adik san tiri kabin badu loboho rai mara-ei kameh ame.
Ano ja, jo anyolom oro malawin ndra-in ma taloh, kotowa oro i buku basen. Oro ado boho mwak laba tinan banin ere aliy sandroh ame len, ma udu boho nyabwe munyak, ma udu boho propet ta wendreya ale.
Oro basen ma taloh doh badeh, malawi oro ndra-in labai, ta amekes iri kalem solo-an hawe lahou tinan. Oro ma taloh badeh, ala hawe iri kabin marakon tiri mwan ma badih badu kon munyak. Iri anya katukum iri kala le se kamekes bahun kameh udu bada len laba tinan ta Kindrei, boto-on mara-ei udu tan.
“Aha ari ari kanuhun! Jo Jises, jo kameh ewek i buku ndramak ta bahana! Eme buku are mwan o badih, iy atehei ndrokei amwenen na bolo len mara-ei, ma lowosani kolau tan kudu mirihik tan, iy kameh winiyan badek ndrakane mada iri lau, ma iri lau winiyan banyolom badan bwe. Iy lau doh badeh, kasekesek.”
Eme ma, malawi oro balik ma taloh nane badeh, ame tukumwi iri kabin mara-ei ala le loboho doh, i boho Hiburu badeh, iri aloh Amagedon.
Ano, iy angelo in ndrobek toro mara-ei badeh, ili solowei bwekei tan amou ili bolo kandrah. Ya bwekei doh ili asahan ndro taloh ai. Eme ma ndramak ari ales mirihik ta mada koto-ok udu bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, iy asehek sahou i buku doh, “Lakou marakon badeh, ndrano ai.”
Bolo len doh badeh, kalik takamek ili eme, ma kuruh atohou, kurutuwen laba tinan labai, ndroi asahan, iy nyokoda kon ma kon munyak mara-ei totoreh andra-i mara-ei. Ndroi ari le doh badeh, i randrah labai, bala buku iri ndroi rayah ale Kindrei amekes kala iy bwidi iri lau manyah bwele-e munyak eme taku dah, bwe. Iy ndroi le doh badeh, iy ndra-in, ndra-in labai udu bolo iri ndroi mara-ei!
Kon tinan nane iri aloh Babilon, badeh asak asahan i tolokon, ya kon tinan badu kon munyak tinan mara-ei, badeh, irou i andri ma ano iu. Ya, Kindrei badeh, bamani kandriyen ndra-in mara-ei tiri mwan ma badih badu kon tinan Babilon amekes bwe. Eme ma bwidi ndrinen ibolosen labai, ma iy a-um iri na lakou doh. Ya, iy bokoro-ei iri badeh, eme ma iri asahan i buku iri lau a-un waen solo-an labai, ma iri abo sik i ndra-in mara-ei.
Ya, ndroi laba tinan nane asahan badeh, ndratolomwani iri busu mara-ei udu bolo ndras laba tinan, badeh ndratuh ndra-au ndrala baha ndras. Ma iri mandrei mari ale arou ame le andri, ma atohou iu laleyah, ari madan bwe.
Ma ur laba tinan undruk eme andri i buku bek. Maha-an ta mada ur ari ari doh badeh, i buku kilo ma lomonoh (50). Ur doh badeh, i buku bek, undruk udu bolo kandrah eme andri ili bwele-e iri mwan ma badih badu loboho kon munyak mara-ei, ma bokoro-ei iri andra-i labai. Eme ma, iri aten nyara Kindrei ta ur i buku bek nane bokoro-ei iri.
Ya, oro lakou nane doh ano badeh, angelo ari badu hawe oro ma ndro taloh nane tawi bwekei, eme asehek tek i buku doh, “Ou ame. Iy badih tinan ta karei manyah udu bwele-e gwa laba tinan kodo-oh, iy kameh akohok bundruwe iri kandriyen ndra-in tan marakon nadah. Jo anya kaleheya ou ta idoh le, ma saba maha-an handru kameh, iy akohok.
Iri kabin badu kon munyak mara-ei badeh, amekes kandriyen solo-an ta karei hawe i badih doh. Iri mwan ma badih mara-ei badu kon munyak ale amekes kandriyen doh hawen, ma iri asahan lolo-ou, i buku iri lau a-un gwa boto-on.”
Malawin Ndrabun ta Kindrei eme la-uk, ma angelo doh bwese-ei jo ma mwasin amwenen iu ili kon lomale an. Jo udu loboho doh badeh, jo anyolom badih ari, iy manyah udu bwele-e nyabwe munyak ari badan saraman mara-ei. Nyabwe munyak doh badeh, nyara iri lakou solo-an labai irek udu badan, ma nyara iri lakou doh badeh, i buku, iri sahou bobose, iri sahou sondrokonya, ma iri sahou ta aluhe Kindrei. Nyabwe munyak ale doh badeh, batun ma ndro taloh, ma hawe kasoh ma ronoh udu batun.
Ya, jo atou iy badih doh badeh, nyosowani iy na awin saraman ma lu-ei, ma iri nyasou nyikilikin solo-an labai tubuluhi iy, ma iri bek nyikilikin, hawe iri buwandralou sowa iri tinan labai. Ya, iy tawi raben bwesam nyikilikin labai udu minen. Ya, waen badeh, irek udu bolo bwesam nyikilikin doh, leheya iri kandriyen ndra-in solo-an abola labai ta budon ta Kindrei, ma hawe iri kandriyen mara-ei ta karei, i badih doh amekes.
Iri ndratorowenei nyaran udu bwilin, nyaran doh i buku sahou sokek, moson ta aliy mene aton. Ya, moson ta nyaran amwenen badeh, i buku doh, “Kon tinan Babilon, mene tutuni nyaran i tinan labai i loken, iy tine iri badih mara-ei ta karei, ma tiri kandriyen ndra-in mara-ei badu kon munyak.” ”
Iy badih doh mene idi iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, ma iri lau atehei budon tiri handru in ta Jises, ma iri atiye sahou tan. Ma jo anyolom i badih doh a-un ndraye iri, ma bwidi batun ibo lolo-ou, i buku ari badih iy a-un gwa boto-on solo-an labai, ma bwidi iy ibo lolo-ou. Jo anyolom lakou doh, manik atur, ma jo abudon solo-an labai.
Ano angelo asehek sahou eme tek i buku doh, “Manim atur tasah handru? Jo anya kasehek tam ta nyala iy badih kede-eh ma nyala nyabwe munyak. Iy badih nane doh manyah in bwele-e nyabwe munyak, ma nyabwe munyak nane, batun ma ndro taloh ma kasoh ma ronoh udu batun. Uru lakou ma la-uh doh kameh leheya malawi iri lakou rayah, ya moso iri lakou doh badeh, aton mara-ei, arile nadah kameh jo leheyaniy mara-ei ewek tam.
Nyabwe munyak nane ou ndranyolom eh, bwena mene iy ere aliy, arile nadah badeh, iy bare aliy ja bwai. Arile, iy kameh udu mana munu lek lawe-en labai, ari katin bwe, eme len, ma iy kameh ili akohok andra-i labai ma amai mara-ei. Iri lau mwan ma badih badu kon munyak nane nyara iri bado bolo buk ta Kindrei bwe, udu ndra bada len mene Kindrei bamekes kon munyak bwe le en, iri winiyan bakohok kohan handru bwe, arile iri doh kameh anyolom nyabwe munyak, ma mani iri kameh atur. Tasah, bwena mene iy ere aliy, ma na len dah ja iy bare aliy bwe, arile iy kameh barasahan na len hamon.
“Buku are mwan o badih, iy budon mwasin, iri winiyan atanan iri lakou doh. Batun ma ndro taloh doh badeh, i buku mandrei ma ndro taloh, ta iy badih doh manyah udu bwele-e oro.
Batun ma ndro taloh doh ale badeh, i buku oro kabin ma ndro taloh. Arile, oro limeh badeh, ndrataku, ya, uru la-uh ja badeh, ari udu kabin kahis ai, ya ari ja badeh, basahan kabin bwe le. Ya, hamon kameh iy asahan kabin, arile iy kameh winiyan bado luluwen bwe.
Ya, nyabwe munyak doh mene udu aliy, arile nadah ja badeh, iy bado kede-eh ja bwai, iy kameh asahan, buku kabin ma ndru la-uh. Iy badu le hawe oro kabin ma ndro taloh nane bwena, arile iy kameh amai iu mara-ei.
“Ya, ou ndranyolom kasoh ma ronoh udu batu nyabwe munyak nane ai. Idoh i buku oro kabin ma ronoh. Oro doh badeh, basahan buku kabin bwe le. Arile, oro kameh akohok boto-on ta atondrok kon hawe nyabwe munyak. Ma oro kameh asahan kabin bado sese luluwen bwe, i buku awa ari le.
Oro kabin ale doh badeh, budon toro randra le. Nyara oro badeh, ndra tinan ma oro boto-on labai, ya oro kameh adeu ili ta nyabwe munyak.
Oro kameh amekes bahun hawe Nadu Sipsip ta Kindrei. Arile, Nadu Sipsip ta Kindrei kameh kimidi iri mara-ei ano. Iy badeh, Laban tiri Laban ma kabin tiri kabin mara-ei. Ma iri mwan ma badih are hawen, iri lau doh badeh, iri mene anuhun sahou mwasin, ma iri lau iy mene edeu kalem i tiri, ma iri a-en hamon ta sahou tan, iri mwan ma badih marakon doh, hawe Nadu Sipsip ta Kindrei kameh adai iri lau marakon nane amekes bahun hawen ano mara-ei.”
Udu ja badeh, angelo asehek eme tek i buku doh, “Ou ndratou iri gwa nane iy badih tinan ta karei manyah udu bwele-e iri. Idoh badeh, leheya iri mwan ma badih bada iri randrah ja, ma iri lau solo-an solo-an atukum are aliy, ma iri lau badu kon munyak tinan mara-ei, ma iri boho kon rakon rakon badu kon munyak mari.
Ya, ou ndratou kasoh ma ronoh doh, oro marakon doh hawe nyabwe munyak kameh amekes bahun i ta badih laba tinan ta karei. Ya, oro kameh bokoro-ei iy ma andrei iri lakou solo-an tan, ma tarani awin udu badan mari iu. Ma oro kameh ani odan, ma sulumwi iy mara-ei i jih andrakak iu.
Iri lakou doh kameh asahan, tasah Kindrei le amwenen badeh, edeu iri budon doh ili tiri kabin, ta amekes iri lakou marakon doh kasahan, in hamon ta iri lakou iy ndrasehek ta aliy. Ya, budon tiri mari kameh randra le, ma boto-on nane iri akohok ta asahan kabin, iri kameh atehei marakon doh ili ta nyabwe munyak. Iri kameh amekes ili le buku don ai, ili, ili winiya le len ta lakou mari nane Kindrei ndrasehek ta aliy asahan.
Ma iy badih nane ou ndratou, badeh, i buku kon laba tinan iy udu bwele-en tiri kabin mara-ei badu kon munyak.”
Udu hamon ta lakou mara-ei nane doh ano, jo anyolom angelo ari ja atah udu kandrah eme andri. Iy badeh, boto-on labai, ma lomada nyosowan badeh, lomotani kon munyak mara-ei anya.
Ma iy asehek sahou boto-on labai i buku doh, “Kon tinan Babilon mene udu bwele-en labai, arile nadah iy ndratohou ndra andri mara-ei! Nadah badeh, iy ndrala ndrahune iri malawin ndra-in ta balik are aliy. Iri malawin ndra-in ma hawe iri sirih ta aimon lakou bolo-an, ma hawe iri sirih ndra-in mara-ei, are loboho doh ale.
Tasah, lau mwan ma badih badu kon munyak tinan mara-ei mene atudun iri kindrei, iri amekes na sukumada kei badeh, ndramekes kandriyen ta karei solo-an labai hawen. Idoh i buku iri ale badeh, ndranyuwi waen tan boto-on labai ta lolo-ou. Ma iri kabin badu kon munyak mara-ei amekes karei hawen ale. Ma hawe iri lau nadu batun ta amekes ba-en ma ta sisih badu kon munyak mara-ei badeh, akohok luk tinan labai ta iri kandriyen tan solo-an ndra-in, ma bwilin winiyan bama ta aliy bwe.”
Ano ja, jo anuhun boho ndramak ari asehek sahou udu bolo kandrah i buku doh, “Aha lau tek, aha kame len ta iy badih badeh! Idah kameh aha winiyan bala bolo maha-a kandriyen ndra-in tan bwe; eme ma aha ale winiyan bakohok bundruwe iri ndra-in tan bwe!
Suhuye iri kandriyen ndra-in tan mara-ei badeh, ili isos kandrah, eme ma Kindrei bwetenei iri kandriyen ndra-in mara-ei ta kon doh.
Aha badeh, kabwetenei iri kandriyen mara-ei iy badih ta karei amekes ili tiri rayah nane op, ano aha baramekes barala tan ai. Iy badeh, amekes kandriyen rayah ja ili le bwele-e bwena, ma bwidiy ili solo-an labai. Eme ma aha kamekes kili tan ma sola, ki-in hamon le tiri kandriyen mara-ei, iy nane amekes. Iy badeh, ale tubuni gwa lolo-ou i bolo bwesam. Ya, aha ale katubuni gwa lolo-ou kili ndra-in labai ja ma solo-an kili tan.
Iy ale badeh, atudun nyaran amwenen, ma amekes kandriyen solo-an ndra-in ta karei, ma hawe iri kandriyen ndra-in rayah ja. Eme ma aha kadeu sisi-in ma solo-an kili badan, kili, kili winiya le iri kandriyen ndra-in iy nane amekes. Iy badeh, asehek iy i buku doh, ‘Jo badeh, ere mwilis, jo manyah udu bada koyeu ta mwilis. Jo bala buku badih udun imek ma iy ere laleyah bwe. Iri maha-an kameh winiyan basahan tek bwe, ma jo kameh winiyan baden ja bwai.’
Ta budon doh le, bolo len ari le kameh, iri lakou marakon ndra-in doh kameh asahan tan. Sik solo-an kameh asahan, ma lau solo-an kameh aden, son kameh asahan i tinan mara-ei. Ma jih kameh sulumwi Babilon andrakak mara-ei iu. Laban Kindrei boto-on labai, ma iy kameh edeu bundruwe iri kandriyen ndra-in tan.
“Iri kabin mara-ei badu kon munyak badeh, mene atudun kindrei ta wasai iri amekes na sukumada kei, ma amekes kandriyen solo-an ndra-in ta karei hawen. Eme ma iri kabin mara-ei doh kameh anyolom kasu-er ta jih nane asun iy, iri kameh alim ade iri, aden, ma tikisiy le ai.
Iri kameh anoh labai, tasah sisi-in ndra-in nane bokoro-ei Babilon doh kameh asahan tiri. Eme ma iri badeh, ales are ndra len labai, ma aden ma asehek i buku doh, “‘Lakou ta tikisiy, Babilon, iri lau katikisiy ou labai, tasah sisi-in tinan labai kameh ewek bwele-em! Ou kon laba tinan labai, ma ou kon boto-on labai! Udu bolo awa ari le, bundruwe kandriyen ndra-in tam badeh, ndrasos hawem!’
“Iri nadu batun solo-an ta amekes ba-en ma ta sisih badu kon munyak mara-ei kameh, abudon ta kon le doh, ma iri kameh aden ndranyen ma tikisi iy. Tasah, lau kameh winiyan basih lokowa iri ja bwai.
Iri sanuw buku bek nyikilikin, silba, bek man nyikilikin hawe iri bek rayah sowa iri badeh, tinan labai, ma iri kolau belen mwasin labai, iri kolau saraman tariyen solo-an hawe iri kolau sosowan. Ma iri kei tiri solo-an manahun buburen mwasin labai, ma iri lakou rayah ja iri amekes na kasoh tiri elepen, ma lakou rayah ja, sowan laba tinan labai iri mwan ma badih amekes na kei. Iri bras ma hayen, iri bek tariyen mwasin labai; idoh iri lau kameh winiyan basih ja bwai.
Ma sanuw rayah ja i buku sinamon, lei ta aimon, eh ma ndrelekei ta amekes suluw manahu buburen mwasin ma ta anyas i bada lau. Waen hawe ndrelekei, ndrom plaua ma wit, bulumakau ma sipsip, iri hos ma hawe karis tiri, iri lau bonyo-ou hawe lau awas rayah ja. Iri lakou tiri mara-ei doh badeh, iri lau kameh winiyan basih ja bwai.
Ya, iri nadu batun nane amekes lakou ta sisih, kameh asehek i tan i buku doh, ‘Iri lakou mara-ei nane sowa iri tinan labai, ou ndrasakalamiy hawe nyasou tam mwasin, iri lakou marakon doh badeh, ndramani madan. Iri mwan ma badih kameh winiyan banyolom iri lakou doh bado badam ja bwai.’
“Ya, iri lau nadu batun ta amekes ba-en ma ta sisih nane amekes iri lakou doh, ma akohok luk solo-an badu kon tinan doh, iri badeh, anoh labai, tasah sisi-in hawe ndra-in ta kon laba tinan doh kameh akohok iri. Eme ma iri badeh, bales bare mirihik tan bwai. Iri kameh aden ma tikisi iy.
Iri kameh aden i buku doh, “‘Ahi tikisiy, ahi tikisiy tinan labai, ta kon tinan doh! Tasah sisi-in tinan labai ndrame ndrala la-un. Iy mene anyasou na awin belen hawe kolau saraman tariyen solo-an labai udu aliy, ma iy nyosowani badan mara-ei na bek nyikilikin, bek rayah hawe man sowa iri tinan labai.
Ma sese luwen bwe, buku bolo awa ari le badeh, iri luk ma nyasou mari ndrandrakak ndrano ndra-au.’ “Ma hawe iri lau tinan ta atondrok iri ndron mara-ei udu bolo ndras, ma iri lau ta sandroh ala ndron are kon rakon ala rakon, ma hawe iri lau nadu batun badu bolo ndras, iri mara-ei doh kameh ales are len labai ta kon tinan Babilon.
Ya, iri anyolom kasu-er ta jih nane asun iy, iri kameh anyar i buku doh, ‘Ari kon tinan udu kede-eh ja, i buku kon tinan Babilon doh, o bwai?’
Iri kameh atah koloweh ili batu iri, iri aden, ma iri tikisiy tinan labai. Eme ma iri asehek i buku doh, “‘Ahi tikisiy, ahi tikisiy tinan labai, ta kon tinan doh! Tasah sisi-in tinan labai ndrame ndrala la-un. Tama iri ndron mara-ei ale atas bolo ndras asahan iri nadu batun ta luk, badeh, na le kon tinan nane doh. Ahi tikisiy tinan labai! Tasah, udu bolo awa ari le badeh, iy ndratohou mara-ei ndrano ndra-au!
Aha lau marakon badu kandrah, hawe iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, ma iri aposel hawe iri propet, aha marakon badeh, kasekesek ta lakou nane asahan ta kon tinan doh. Tasah, Kindrei badeh, ndralebelei bundruwe iri lakou tan ndrala. Ma ta kandriyen tan doh, iy edeu bundruwe kandriyen ndra-in mene kon tinan nane doh amekes ewek taha.’”
Sahou mara-ei ano le badeh, jo anyolom angelo ari boto-on labai, iy andrei bek ari laba tinan, i buku bek laba tinan ta atisih wit. Iy tutuni bek nane doh i loken, ma iy akahei iu ili andri atuh i bolo ndras. Ma iy anya, “Ta kandriyen doh le badeh, iri kameh andrei kon tinan Babilon, ma akahei boto-on labai ili andri, eme ma iri lau kameh winiyan banyolom iy ja bwai.
Eme ma nyaro iri ndran iri aloh hap, ma nyaro iri ndran bala-eu, ma hawe iri ndran rayah ja hawe ndrah, iri lau kameh winiyan banuhun oro bado hawem ja bwai. Iri lau ale tana iri ta amekes lakou na kei, o hayen, o bek nyikilikin, o lakou mwasin ja, iri lau ta tanan doh winiyan bare hawem ja bwai. Ma nyaro bek laba tinan ta atisih wit, iri lau kameh winiyan banuhun iy bado hawem ja bwai.
Lomada sun kameh winiyan banya lomadam ja bwai. Sohowa loweu ma bihin anya katasou, iri kameh winiyan banuhun bado bolo kon tinan Babilon ja bwai. Bwena mene iri nadu batun tam ta amekes ba-en ma ta sisih badeh, lahou tiri udu aliy, ma nyara iri badeh, tinan labai ere bolo kon munyak. Ma ou badeh, wendreyani iri mwan ma badih na kandriyen tam ta balahak ma ta lakou solo-an ndra-in, ou a-en hamon ta aliy, ma idoh mene ariu ndrine iri ta a-en hamon tiri kandriyen ndra-in ou amekes.
Ma Kindrei anyolom kon tinan Babilon doh badeh, maha-an ndra-in labai ta adai iri propet, hawe iri mwan ma badih tan badeh, udu aliy. Ma iri mwan ma badih mara-ei badu kon munyak, ala iri lau ndra-in mene, ndradai iri ndramak badeh, bundruwe iri lakou marakon doh ale udu kon tinan Babilon le.”
Udu hamon ta lakou nane doh ano, jo anuhun nyaro lakou doh, i buku iri lau solo-an labai asehek sahou boto-on udu bolo kandrah. Boho iri i tinan labai ma iri aloh i buku doh, “Haleluyah! Tasah, Laban Kindrei tataha iy le ari mene andrei taha ame hamon. Nyaran badeh, laba tinan ma iy boto-on labai.
Ta mada sahou, Kindrei badeh, aleben ma anuhun iri mwan ma badih ta kandriyen tiri handru ma amwenen mara-ei. Iy badih tinan ta karei doh mene, bokoro-ei iri mwan ma badih badu kon munyak, ta kandriyen ta mani Kindrei handru, ma ala atudun iri kindrei ta wasai. Eme ma Kindrei edeu bundruwe iri kandriyen ili hamon i tan. Iy badih doh mene idi iri lohowan ta Kindrei, eme ma Kindrei edeu bundruwe iri lakou doh ili hamon i tan ja.”
Ano ja, boho iri i tinan labai ma iri aloh i buku doh, “Haleluyah! Tasah, kasu-er ta jih nane sulumwi kon tinan Babilon, idoh ili loken i kandrah, ma ta udu le buku don ai!”
Ya, oro batun ma lunoh hahuw (24) hawe oro lakou ma mulin ma hahuw badeh, atehei bwili ndru-u oro i andri ma oro atudun Kindrei, iy manyah udu bada koyeu ta kabin. Iri marakon asehek i le rasan i buku doh, “Handru labai! Haleluyah! Taha badeh, katudun Kindrei le ari!”
Ano, nyaro boho ndramak ari udu loboho bada koyeu ta Kindrei asehek i buku doh, “Aha lohowan ta Kindrei, aha katudun iy, aha hawe iri mwan ma badih nyara iri tinan, ma aha lau nyara aha bwe, ma aha anoh iy. Aha mari badeh, katudun nyara Kindrei le ari!”
Ano ja, jo anuhun nyaro boho iri lau solo-an labai asehek sahou, i buku nyaro goi laba tinan ma kuruh atohou. Jo anuhun iri asehek sahou i buku doh, “Haleluyah! Iy Laban Kindrei tataha, boto-on marakon udu tan! Nadah iy udu kabin ta atondrok taha handru!
Nadah badeh, ndrine taha kudu mwasin ma taha kasekesek, ma katudun nyaran! Tasah, len ta tasou ta Nadu Sipsip badeh, ndrasahan. Ya, badih tan badeh, ndranyosowani iy.
Kindrei atehei awin belen ra-ei i tan, awin doh mwasin handru en, nyikadin labai, ma ha-un mara-ei, iy asiniy ili badan.” Awin belen mwasin doh, i buku kandriyen mwasin, iri lau ta Kindrei amekes.
Ano angelo eme asehek tek i buku doh, “Ou torowenei ki buku doh: Are lau, iri aloh iri ta ala ta nyamon tinan ta tasou ta Nadu Sipsip, nyosowa Kindrei udu la-u iri ma iri mara-ei badeh, kasekesek!” Angelo eme asehek ja, “Iri sahou dah badeh, sahou handru ta Kindrei.”
Eme ma jo atehei bwili ndru-uk i andri udu mirihik ta kati angelo, ta anya katudun iy, arile angelo anya, “Ndri-iy, ou samekes! Jo badeh, ta amekes gok ta Kindrei hawem, ma jo ale badu hawe nadu tinem oro, oro ala atehei budon toro ki-in ta sahou handru ta Jises asehek. Ou atehei bwili ndru-um ki andri ma ou atudun Kindrei le ari kabwai. Ya taha tanan sahou mara-ei iy asehek, idoh le badeh, suri ndrine iri lau mara-ei ta asehek iri sahou propet.”
Ano ja badeh, jo anyolom kandrah asak, ma hos belen udu aliy. Ya, nyara ndramak manyah udu bwele-e hos doh badeh, i buku, “Ndramak atondrok gok tan mara-ei udu mwasin” ma “Ndramak amekes kandriyen mara-ei badeh, ndra handru ma mwasin le ai.” Na len iy aleben ma anuhun sahou tiri mwan ma badih, ma iy ale alokou ta amekes bahun, iy badeh, in hamon le tiri kandriyen mwasin iy amekes.
Madan badeh, anya i buku jih, ma barak tiri kabin solo-an labai badeh, udu batun. Bwilin badeh, iri torowenei nyara lakou ari udu aliy. Iri mwan ma badih badeh, bala tana iri ta moso nyara lakou doh bwe. Iy le ari amwenen badeh, tanan ai.
Iy asini awin ari doh, iri lomwaniy na le ndra. Ma iri aloh nyaran badeh, “Sahou ta Kindrei.”
Iri lau ta bahun mara-ei badu kandrah badeh, manyah ado bwele-e hos belen, ma sakaliye a-en hamon tan. Iri mara-ei badeh, asini awin ndra belen le, se ndraka-an aliy bwe.
Samen gwak raho doh lawe-en, ma madan labai, iri aloh bainat, badeh, udu boho ndramak nane atas eme len. Samen gwak le doh kameh amondroh bale iri mwan ma badih badu kon munyak tinan mara-ei. “Iy kameh tawi balekei hayen ari udu minen ta atondrok iri mwan ma badih boto-on handru.” Ma iy kameh atisih waen na katin udu bolo kun laba tinan. Idoh leheya losen ndra-in labai ta Kindrei, iy boto-on labai.
Udu bada awin tan lawe-en, ma bada ndrubulon badeh, iri torowenei nyara lakou ari udu aliy i buku doh, “Kabin tiri Kabin ma Laban tiri Laban.”
Ano ja badeh, jo anyolom angelo ari ales udu bwele-e an. Iy aloh boto-on labai ili tiri sirih mara-ei atah ado bolo asi kandrah, i buku doh, “Aha katukumwi aha mara-ei ka le se, ta nyamon laba tinan ta Kindrei!
Aha kameh aimon oda iri kabin mene ndramak, oda iri lau batun ta bahun, oda iri lau boto-on labai ta bahun, oda iri hos, ma oda iri lau nane manyah ado bwele-e iri hos. Aha kameh aimon oda iri lau mara-ei; oda iri lau bonyo-ou, ma oda iri lau ado laleyah, ma oda iri lau nadu batun ma hawe iri lau nyara iri bwe.”
Ano ja, jo anyolom nyabwe munyak hawe iri kabin badu kon munyak, ma iri lau tiri mara-ei ta bahun atukum ala le se ta amekes bahun hawe i ndramak nane sakaliye hos hawe iri lau tan ta bahun.
Arile, iy ndramak doh tawi nyabwe munyak doh, ma atehei iy udu bolo asiu lulik hawe propet ta wendreya. Iy propet ta wendreya doh mene, amekes iri kalem solo-an ma lahou tinan labai udu mada nyabwe munyak, ma hawe malawin. Ma, na iri kalem solo-an ma lahou tinan doh, iy wendreyani iri lau mene ndrandrei kalem ta nyabwe munyak, hawe atudun malawin. Nyabwe munyak ma hawe propet ta wendreya doh badeh, iri akahei uru ma mulin au ala andri bolo lek ta jih anya na bek solpa, asun uru.
Iy ndramak nane manyah udu bwele-e hos tan badeh, mwetehei iri lau ta bahun turu mara-ei ano na samen madan labai, iri aloh bainat nane udu bohon eme len. Ma iri sirih mara-ei ame ani oda iri lau nane doh ano mara-ei, ma ndrine iri irek.
Udu le badeh, jo anyolom angelo ari atah udu kandrah eme andri kon munyak, iy tawi lakou ta aseh kou ta mada munu lek lawe-en labai, ari katin bwe, hawe sen maha-an labai udu minen ale.
Iy ili badeh, tawi mwak laba tinan banin ere aliy, mwak doh badeh, ndra bwena labai, iy balik o Satan, iy ta edeu lau solo-an labai ala ta mada sahou. Angelo eme badeh, bawei iy na sen nane maha-an labai udu minen. Sen maha-an labai doh kameh udu gwek winiya le jaha ma rawa (1,000) ano.
Angelo eme akahei iy iu ili andri bolo lek nane lawe-en labai, ari katin bwe, ano iy sulu-i kou tan ihis mara-ei, eme ma iy kameh winiyan bawendreya iri mwan ma badih badu kon munyak ja bwai. Iy kameh udu gwek winiya le jaha ma rawa (1,000) ano. Hamon ta jaha ma rawa ano badeh, idah kameh tolowei iy eme udu len sese, ta edek bolo kon munyak ili eme op.
Ano ja, jo anyolom koyeu rayah buku tiri kabin, ma iri lau manyah ado aliy. Kindrei ndratehei gok ili tiri ta tunuhun sahou tiri lau. Jo ale anyolom malawi iri lau ndramak bwena. Iri lau mene ndrasani bale iri ma ndradai iri ndramak, tasah iri atiye sahou handru ta Jises mene asehek, ma hawe sahou ta Kindrei. Iri badeh, batehei bwili ndru-u iri bala andri bwe, ma batudun nyabwe munyak hawe malawin bwe. Iri ale bakohok kalem bado bwili iri ma mine iri bwe. Eme ma koha iri mwasin asahan eme hamon ja, ma iri asahan i buku iri kabin ta atondrok kon hawe Krais, udu gwek winiya le jaha ma rawa (1,000) ano.
(Iri lau rayah ndramak bwena badeh, bakohok koha iri na len doh bwe. Iri kameh atondrok ili winiya jaha ma rawa ano.) Len dah badeh, kameh asahan buku len ta lau amak ame awas ta imek ma bwena.
Sekesek handru ki tiri lau nane amak ame awas ma bwena! Kandriyen tiri ndra mwasin le. Tasah, iri lau doh ta Kindrei. Imek hamon doh kameh, ari nyamun ta atisih iri lau doh ja bwai. Iri kameh asahan buku iri pris ta Kindrei hawe Krais. Ma iri kameh asahan kabin hawe Krais ta bolo jaha ma rawa (1,000) doh.
Udu hamon ta jaha ma rawa (1,000) doh ano, iri kameh sihi kou ta mana munu lek nane lawe-en labai, ari katin bwe doh kameh asak. Ma Satan kameh ano ta udu bolo asiu lulik eme len.
Iy kameh eme len ta wendreya iri lau marakon atalan laleyah ado bolo kon munyak mara-ei. Iri lau badu kon Gok ma Magok. Satan kameh tukumwi iri marakon doh ala le se ta amekes bahun. Kane iri mara-ei ili le se badeh, i buku on mamarin badu bada babi, winiyan bandromwei bwe.
Iri kameh, adek ala bolo kon munyak mara-ei, ma iri atehei kenyer ta ndrahune iri lau ta Kindrei hawe kon tinan iy aso-ok labai. Arile, jih udu kandrah anya eme andri badeh, sulumwi iri amak ano au.
Balik badeh, ndrawendreyani iri mwan ma badih doh, eme ma Kindrei akahei iy ma buruwen ales amwenen ili bolo lek laba tinan, ta jih nyarahan labai anya udu ta bek solpa. Nyabwe munyak uru propet ta wendreya badeh, are aliy bwena; eme oro ma taloh kameh akohok sisi-in, ben, len, ben, len ta udu le buku don ai.
Ano ja, jo anyolom koyeu laba tinan belen ta kabin, ma ndramak ari manyah udu bada koyeu doh. Ma kon munyak hawe kandrah badeh, sakaliye iu ta madan, uru bado ndrahune uru bwena nane ja bwe.
Ma jo ale anyolom iri lau ndramak bwena on! Iri lau nadu batun, iri lau laleyah tiri lakou bwe, iri lau marakon doh badeh, ales are bwena ta koyeu ta kabin. Iy ndramak manyah udu bada koyeu badeh, tiye iri angelo kasihi iri buk mara-ei. Iri sihi buk ari ale, buk doh badeh, nyara iri mwan ma badih kameh winiyan akohok kohan handru ado hawe Kindrei. Kindrei badeh, anyolom bolo iri buk ma aleben kandriyen marakon tiri lau ndramak, mene amekes.
Ano, jo anyolom iri lau mene amak bwena badeh, ado bolo ndras hawe iri lau badu kon ta lau mene ndramak ndrasu-u are aliy, iri ari ari ala ales are madan. Ma iri akohok maha-an badeh, in hamon le ta kandriyen, iri amekes.
Ano, iy ndramak nane manyah udu bada koyeu ta kabin badeh, eme akahei imek hawe kon ta ndrahune lau amak are aliy badeh, ala bolo lek ta jih. Lek ta jih doh badeh, ta imek hamon ja ai.
Buku are lau nyaran bado bolo buk ta lau winiyan akohok kohan handru doh bwe, Kindrei kameh tiye iri angelo tan, akahei iy ales amwenen iu ili bolo lek laba tinan ta jih.
Udu hamon ta lakou doh ano badeh, jo anyolom kandrah ma kon munyak ha-un asahan. Kandrah hawe kon munyak malen badeh, amai ndra-au laleyah. Ma gwa ndras ale bado ja bwe.
Ma jo ale anyolom kon tinan Jerusalem ha-un ndrabun labai asahan. Jo anyolom kon tinan doh udu hawe Kindrei, udu bolo kandrah eme andri, i buku badih ndralokowani iy, ma ndranyosowani iy ta anya kili bahandra mwan tan.
Jo ale anuhun boho ndramak ari udu bada koyeu ta Kindrei asehek sahou boto-on labai i buku doh, “Nadah, ndrahu manyah ta Kindrei udu hawe lau mwan ma badih! Iy kameh manyah udu hawe iri, ma iri kameh asahan lau tan. Kindrei le amwenen kameh udu hawe iri, ma iy kameh asahan Kindrei tiri.
Iy kameh owei wa-i mada iri mara-ei iu. Iri mwan ma badih kameh winiyan bamak ja bwai, iri kameh winiyan batikisiy ma baden, o babwese iri maha-an ma sisi-in ja bwai. Iri lakou malen bwena badeh, ndrano mara-ei.”
Ano ja, iy ndramak nane manyah udu bada koyeu ta kabin tiye i buku doh, “Nadah kameh jo bwidi iri lakou mara-ei asahan ha-un ja.” Iy tiye ale i buku doh, “Ou torowenei sahou doh kili bolo buk. Tasah, sahou doh handru mara-ei, ma iri mwan ma badih winiyan atehei budon tiri handru in hamon ta aliy.”
Ma iy tiye eme tek, “Iri lakou marakon nane jo anya kamekes badeh, ndrano ai! Jo ma mwena handru, ma jo in ndrobek mara-ei, jo ale badeh, kati iri lakou marakon, ma jo in ndrobek handru ta amekes iri gok mara-ei ano. Buku are lau, balen amar ta gwa, jo kameh edeu gwa i wa-in badu kaloh ta adeu kohan handru winiyan bano bwe, ya iy kameh winiyan bakeh ari luk ta asih gwa doh bwe.
Buku are mwan o badih ale ales boto-on udu bolo bahun nane balik amekes i tiri, ma iri baruwani budon tiri handru bwe, iri lau doh kameh akohok lakou mara-ei doh badu minek amwenen. Jo kameh asahan Kindrei tiri, ma iri asahan naduk.
Arile, iri lau nane anoh, ma atobwak ala hamon, ma iri lau batehei budon tiri bala ta Kindrei bwe, ma iri lau amekes kandriyen ndra-in solo-an labai, ma iri lau adai lau rayah amak, iri lau ta amekes kandriyen ta karei, iri lau balahak udu tiri ta bekebek lau amak, iri lau ta atehei bwili ndruu iri i andri i ta sukumada kei, iri lau ta amekes sahou wendreya, ya kon tiri lau mara-ei doh badeh, bolo lek ta jih nyarahan, anya udu ta bek solpa. Imek ari hamon ja dah badeh, ma kabwai.”
Ano, angelo ari badu hawe oro ma ndro taloh mene, tawi bwekei ma ndro taloh irek na losen ta Kindrei udu aliy, eme hawek asehek i buku doh, “Ou ame ma jo kaleheya ou ta udu Nadu Sipsip, iy badih doh kameh i tasou i tan.”
Malawin Ndrabun eme bwele-ek, ma angelo bwese-ei jo ma mwasin iu ili bwele-e mandrei ari doh loken labai. Ma iy leheyani jo ta Jerusalem ha-un, kon laba tinan ma ndrabun labai, ta Kindrei udu bolo kandrah eme andri.
Nyikadi lomada Kindrei badeh, anya ili bwele-e kon tinan nane doh. Lomadan badeh, i randrah labai, i buku bek mwasin, sowan tinan labai. Lomadan i buku bek ari iri aloh jaspa, lewen mara-ei i buku torowe, ou winiyan anyolom udu bilisiu tabasi bilisiu.
Kon tinan doh badeh, kowah awudiy mara-ei, ma ili loken labai. Ma kou tan ma ronoh la-uh, ya oro angelo ma ronoh la-uh badeh, atondrok oro kou doh. Udu bwele-e oro kou ma ronoh la-uh doh badeh, iri torowenei nyara boho kamen ma ronoh la-uh tiri lau badu Isra-el udu aliy.
Kowah doh badeh, iri atehei kou taloh, taloh udu kabowen ma hahuw. Iri atehei taloh ili loboho rai, taloh udu loboho kum, taloh udu loboho tolau, ma taloh ja udu loboho jaha.
Kabowe kon tinan nane doh, bilisiu ma bilisiu iri atudun i bwele-e bek laba tinan. Ya udu bada oro bek nane doh iri torowenei nyara oro aposel ma ronoh la-uh ta Nadu Sipsip ta Kindrei udu aliy.
Iy angelo nane asehek sahou eme tek badeh, tawi bala kei ari nyikilikin labai, udu minen ta tumundroh tinan ta kon tinan doh, ma kou hawe kowah awudi kon tinan nane doh.
Kon tinan nane doh, kabowen ma hahuw badeh, i le randra. Lawe-en ma tinan tan mara-ei badeh, ili le randra ale. Angelo tomondrohei na bala kei tan ta tumundroh lakou, ma lawe ta kon tinan amwenen i buku luwa lunek (2,200) kilomita mara-ei. Kabowen ma hahuw hawe bwele-en ta loboho loken badeh, ili le randra.
Angelo ale tomondrohei kowah mara-ei asahan buku ndro hanoh limeh (65) mita lawe-en ta iu ili loken. Tumundroh doh badeh, in hamon tiri lau ale tumundroh lakou. Angelo tumundroh kowah badeh, in hamon ta san ari le nane doh.
Kowah ta kon tinan nane doh, iri amekes na bek jaspa, ya kon tinan mara-ei, iri amekes na bek nyikilikin, lewen mara-ei i buku torowe.
Mwe-e ndru ta kon tinan doh badeh, ma ronoh la-uh, ma Kindrei nyosowani mwe-e ndru ari ari doh na iri bek, randrah, randrah sowa iri laba tinan labai. Mwe-e ndru ma bwena badeh, iy nyosowaniy na bek jaspa, ano bek sapaya iy nyosowani mwe-e ndru la-uh na aliy, bek aget iy nyosowani mwe-e ndru taloh na aliy, ano bek emeral iy nyosowani mwe-e ndru hahuw na aliy.
Bek sadonikis badeh, sowan laba tinan labai, iy nyosowani mwe-e ndru limeh na aliy. Tariyen badeh, saraman hawe belen. Ano bek ari ja, koniliyen tariyen saraman, iy nyosowani mwe-e ndru onoh na aliy, iy atehei bek krisolait tariyen nyokowan udu bada mwe-e ndru ndro taloh, bek beril tariyen nyorowan, iy nyosowani mwe-e ndru ndru la-uh na aliy. Ano iy atehei bek topas, tariyen nyokowan udu bada mwe-e ndru ndro ari. Iy atehei bek krisopres udu bada mwe-e ndru ronoh. Bek hayasin badeh, iy atehei udu bada mwe-e ndru ronoh ari. Ano badeh, iy nyosowani mwe-e ndru ronoh la-uh na bek ametis, tariyen saraman.
Ya, madasan ma ronoh la-uh badeh, Kindrei amekes na bek man ma ronoh la-uh. Kou ari, ari, iy amekes na laba bek man ari, ari. San mara-ei badu bolo kon tinan doh badeh, iy amekes na bek nyikilikin, lewen mara-ei i buku torowe.
Jo badeh, banyolom asiu tinan ta Kindrei bado bolo kon tinan doh bwe, tasah Kindrei badeh, iy boto-on labai, hawe Nadu Sipsip tan, uru ma la-uh badeh, i buku asiu tinan tan.
Udu bolo kon tinan nane doh, an ma bun badeh, banya bwe, tasah lomada Kindrei le ari anya ili bwele-en. Ya, Nadu Sipsip badeh, anya i nyara sun ta aliy.
Iri lau marakon badu kon munyak tinan kameh adek ta lomada sun doh, ma iri kabin mara-ei badu kon munyak kameh, atiye iri nyasou tiri mari mwasin eme le ta lomada sun doh.
Kou mari ta kon tinan doh kameh asak ta udu le buku doh, winiyan bahis bwe, tasah ben kameh winiyan basahan ja bwe.
Iri nyasou hawe luk tiri lau badu kon munyak tinan mara-ei kameh, iri tiyaniy ili le bolo kon tinan nane doh.
Arile, iri lakou ndraka-an, hawe iri lau ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in, iri lau ta karei, ma iri lau ta amekes sahou wasai, iri mara-ei doh kameh winiyan bala bolo kon tinan doh bwe. Iri lau le nyara iri udu bolo buk ta Nadu Sipsip, iri le lau doh kameh akohok kohan handru ma winiyan ala bolo kon tinan don ai.
Angelo nane leheya jo ale ta gwa ari doh, kohan handru udu aliy, ta adeu ili wa-i iri lau. Lewen mara-ei, i buku torowe. Bare gwa doh badeh, udu loboho bada koyeu ta Kindrei uru Nadu Sipsip tan, arorou eme len.
Ma gwa doh badeh, arorou amwenen lawe-e le bolo san ta kon tinan nane doh. Udu kapa gwa bilisiu ma bilisiu badeh, iri kei ta adeu kohan handru ili tiri lau, ateh udu aliy. Iri kei doh, ato-ou sali iri badeh, san ma ronoh la-uh udu bolo jaha ari, ma san rasan ta bolo bun ari, ari. La-u iri badeh, ta amekes iri mwan ma badih badu kon munyak tinan mara-ei amwenen.
Ya, iri lakou marakon Kindrei anya kakeh ki-iu, kameh winiyan bado bolo kon tinan doh ja bwai. Kindrei kameh akahei marakon iu. Kindrei hawe Nadu Sipsip tan kameh ado bolo kon tinan doh, ma atondrok iri mwan ma badih nane are aliy. Ma iri lohowan ta Kindrei kameh, amekes lahou tan ma atudun iy are aliy.
Ma iri winiyan anyolom madan, ma iy kameh torowenei nyaran udu bwili iri.
Ben kameh winiyan basahan ja bwai, ma iri kameh winiyan batelem sun ta lomada iri o lomada an anya na len ja bwai, tasah Laban Kindrei le ari kameh asahan sun ta lomada iri, ma iri kameh asahan kabin ta atondrok lakou marakon hawe Kindrei ta ere le buku don ai.
Ano angelo asehek eme tek ja i buku doh, “Iri sahou marakon ou ndranuhun ma ndratou ta iri lakou doh badeh, ndra handru le ai, ma iri kameh asahan. Ma iri mwan ma badih kameh winiyan atehei budon tiri handru in ta aliy. Ma Laban Kindrei badeh, ta atadau malawin mwasin tiri propet, ta atiye sahou tan. Ya, iy don adeh, ndrasuni angelo tan ari eme leheya iri lohowan tan ta saba lakou kameh mirihik asahan.”
Jises anya, “Aha kanuhun! Se nawin bwe kameh, jo asahan hawe aha. Buku are mwan o badih, iy in hamon handru ta sahou propet ta Kindrei udu bolo buk dah, badeh, nyosowan ta Kindrei udu la-un ma iy winiyan sekesek handru!”
Jo Jon, jo amwenen anuhun ma anyolom iri lakou marakon doh. Jo anuhun iri lakou doh ano le badeh, jo eme atehei bwili ndru-uk i andri ili ta angelo nane leheya iri lakou eme tek, ma jo anya katudun iy.
Arile, iy anya, “Ndri-iy, ou samekes! Jo Kindrei bwe! Jo ale amekes gok i buku le ou, ma hawe nadu tinem oro, iri propet, ma hawe iri lau anuhun sahou badu bolo buk dah ma a-en hamon ta aliy. Aha marakon katudun Kindrei le ari!”
Ma iy asehek eme tek ja i buku doh, “Ou satone iri sahou ta Kindrei badu bolo buk dah, tasah len ndrame mirihik ai, ta iri lakou marakon doh, kameh asahan.
Eme ma, buku are mwan o badih ale ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in, iri badeh, kamekes kili le ai, ma buku are ale ta amekes kandriyen abola labai, mwasin ta iy saruwaniy, iy kamekes kili le. Ya, buku iri mwan ma badih ta amekes kandriyen mwasin labai, iri kamekes kili le ai. Ya, iri mwan ma badih, Kindrei ndratehei kalem ndrala tiri ta ado ndrabun, iri badeh, saruwaniy, iri kabadok.”
Eme Jises anya, “Aha marakon kanuhun! Jo kameh asahan nawin bwe. Jo kameh andrei iri ndramas ewek, ta adeu ewek taha mwan ma badih. Jo kameh edeu saluwe ndramas ili tiri mwan ma badih ari, ari ta bundruwe kandriyen iri mene amekes.
Jo le ari badeh, asahan mwena handru, ta iri lakou marakon, jo kameh udu le kahis, buku iri lakou marakon ano. Ya, jo ma bwena handru, ma jo in ndrobek mara-ei. Jo ale badeh, kati iri lakou marakon ta asahan, ma jo in hamon ndrobek badeh, ta amekes gok mara-ei ano.
“Iri mwan ma badih ale sikine awin tiri asahan belen mara-ei, badeh, nyosowan ta Kindrei udu la-u iri, ma iri winiyan sekesek handru, ma iri kameh winiyan aimon buwa kei, badu ta kei kohan handru udu aliy, ma iri ale winiyan adek ala madasan ta ili bolo kon tinan.
Arile, iri lau ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in labai i buku iri mwi amekes, iri ta amekes balahak, iri ta amekes karei, iri ta adai lau amak, iri ta atehei bwili ndru-u iri i andri ili ta kindrei ta wendreya, ma iri mwan ma badih ale aso-ok kandriyen ta wasai, ma a-en hamon ta aliy; iri lau marakon doh kameh are ndra manan ta kon tinan nane, iri winiyan bala bolo kon tinan ta Kindrei doh bwe.
“Jo Jises, jo mene tiye angelo tek amwenen ewek bolo aha ta asehek nyala iri lakou marakon doh i taha lau ta Kindrei. Jo badeh, i buku nyabun asahan boho kamen ta Debit. Ya, lomadak badeh, anya i buku lomada ndrau ta boho len.”
Malawin Ndrabun hawe udu Nadu Sipsip anya, “Ou ame.” Eme ma iri lau marakon anuhun boho uru, iri ale kasehek sahou anya, “Ou ame.” Buku ou are mwan o badih, balem amar ta gwa kohan handru udu aliy, ou ame akohok wa-im gwa ta edeu kohan handru, na so-ok tam, i buku ndramas Kindrei edeu laleyah.
Jo Jon, jo batanau aha mwan ma badih marakon, anuhun sahou propet ta Kindrei udu bolo buk dah. I buku ou are mwan o badih, amekes sahou na le budon tam amwenen ili bolo iri sahou dah, ya iri lakou ndra-in handru nane, Kindrei asehek ta aliy udu bolo buk dah, Kindrei kameh edeu ili bwele-e iri mwan o badih nane amekes sahou ta balen le amwenen.
Ma, i buku are ale bahana sahou propet badu bolo buk dah iu, Kindrei ale, kameh andrei iri lakou mwasin nane, iy ndraleheyaniy ndrala tan, badu ta buwa kei kohan handru udu aliy, badu kon tinan ndrabun labai, ma iri asehek badu bolo buk dah, marakon doh kameh iu.
Iy lau doh asehek sahou ta nyala iri lakou marakon nane anya, “Ehe, jo kameh ewek, nawin bwe!” Handru! Laban Jises, ou ame!
Tikisiy ta Laban Jises kudu hawe aha lau marakon ta Kindrei, kudu le buku don ai. Handru.
